item.text: (nya) @#/ ! /gsang sngags rgyud 'bum gyi skor bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 秘密經第八部
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta tat+t+wa sam gra ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad thugs rje chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs
dang / dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i
dbu rgyan gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po dbang bskur ba mnga' brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud cing / thams cad kyi dgos pa mdzad pa nyid kyis/

sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba yongs su bskong ba'i phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad dus gsum du rtag par bzhugs shing / sku dang gsung dang /

thugs thams cad rdo rje lta bur gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs shing bsngags bstod pa/ nor bu dang / rin po che chen pos spras pa/ kha dog sna tshogs shing dril bu btags pa/ dar dang /

'phan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang / zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la 'di lta ste/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha'i mdzod

dang / bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs

te/ de yang 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med pa de dag gi skus kyang til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar snang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med tshad med pa rnams snang

ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na yang chos kyi tshul 'di dag 'chad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lta

bur gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas/ rdo rje dbyings thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs las byung

ba'i ye shes kyi snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa nyid kyi rdo rje chen po'i ye shes rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i rin po che chen po/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs

par byang chub pas byang chub par gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dag par thugs su chud pa/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad/

du yang dag par ston pa mkhyen pas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i khams rnams gdul bar spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nod cing don yod par mdzad pa nyid kyis thams

cad dang mnyam pa med cing bla na med pa'i phrin las thams cad mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen por sems brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbang chen po bskur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i rin po che'i dpal dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po dang de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa'i chos chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen po'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'chad pa dang de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha shin du brtan po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i gnod sbyin dang /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i ye shes rnams so/ /kun bzang rab tu gdon mi za/ /bdud dang rab dgyes gtso bo dang / /mkha' skyes shin du gzi chen dang / /rin chen dpal

dang 'dzum pa che/ /kun du gzigs pa'i dbang chen dang / /'jam dpal dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / /mi gsung ba dang thams cad las/ /brtson 'grus ma rungs dam du gzung / /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu dang / /rin chen nyi ma

rgyal mtshan 'dzum/ /pad ma ral gri 'khor lo gsung / /las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcings/ /thog ma tha ma med cing zhi/ /ma rungs khro bo bzod pa che/ /gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan/ /gzi chen dpa' bo dbang po che/ /u ma'i

bdag po skye dgu'i mgon/ /gtogs 'dod rgyal 'dod thub pa che/ /'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dang sa/ /'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa/ /'byung chen sems can don rab mdzad/ /thams cad gu lang tshangs pa dang / /'khor dang mya ngan 'da' dang rtag /yang dag

'tsho dang mchod pa che/ /sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che/ /srid gsum rtag pa'ang de yin no/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal bde spyod dang / /bde spyod gtso bo rab 'dul mdzad/ /rdo rje gtso dang sa rab mchog /ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /byang chub

sems dpa'i rnam par thar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi spyod/ /sangs rgyas don dang sangs rgyas thugs/ /byang chub kun dang bla na med/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba'i gtso/ /rang byung gzungs dang dran pa dang / /sems dpa' che dang

phyag rgya che/ /ting 'dzin sangs rgyas phrin las mdzad/ /yang dag sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /yod pa rtag don rtogs mdzad pa/ /sdong po chen po nag po che/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /thabs chen dang ni mchog chen mchog /kun

gyi mchog dang gnas dbang po/ /bcom ldan byang chub chen po'i thugs/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis

sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying por bzhugs pa gang na ba

der gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku bstan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par

dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing / ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyis bskul bas mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ ji ltar na bsgrub

par bgyi bka' stsal par gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la rtog cing mnyam par zhog la rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags

'di ci dgar zlos shing bsgrub par gyis shig /oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+haM ka ro mi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

bdag gi snying ga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu sems de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na de ni ji ltar sbyangs pa de ltar gyur te/ dper na ras

dkar po mtshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA/ ta yA mi zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis/ yang byang
chub sems dpa' chen po de'i sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bkas byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /zla ba'i dkyil

'khor lta bur mthong ba gang lags pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyis mngon sum du

gyur gyis/ de legs par bsgrubs shig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'dis rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibs su soms shig /oM tiSh+Tha badzra/

byang chub sems dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje 'dug par bdag gis mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

kun tu bzang po'i sems rdo rje/ des sngags 'dis brtan par gyis shig /oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dbyings

ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin brlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams

cad grub pa de la/ rdo rje'i dbyings/ rdo rje'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i ming gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dbyings kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi d+harma'i sku ni bdag legs par mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na/ sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnam pa'i

mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags ci dga' bar zlos la sgoms shig /oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta tas+tha a ha~M/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i

dbyings kyis bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin

gyis rlobs la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig /de nas de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i dbyings kyis skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid

kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos

mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa rang bzhin gyis dag go/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mnyam pa nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed/

nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad la bzhag nas/ ri rab kyi rtse mo gang

na ba dang / khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs nas dbyer med par

gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i gdan la zhal kun tu bstan te bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras

gzigs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du so so nas bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po

ma lon pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu

spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad gdon mi za bar ston pa/ thogs pa med pa/ dgongs pa rdzogs pa/ yid kyi bsam pa'o

cog yongs su rdzogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba/ sems

dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di

rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra satwa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas byung ste/ sems can

thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po yang dag par sbyangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyogs phyogs su 'khod do/ /de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo

rje byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su zhugs par gyur to/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis gcig

tu 'dres par gyur nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad du 'od zer rtse lnga pa'i phreng bas khyab par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lta bu'i dbyings su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi thugs ka nas byung ste phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje de las rdo rje de lta bu'i 'od zer gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed pa rnams byung ngo / /rdo rje lta bu'i 'od

zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams

cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par byang chub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa

dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sna tshogs pa bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par mdzad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po chen por gshegs pa dang bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ ji srid sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su skyob cing thams cad la

phan pa dang bde ba mdzad pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa dam pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams kyi bar du bstan nas/

rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun tu bzang po yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs

la gnas nas/ 'di skad du ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o bdag ni rang byung ba'i/ /kun tu bzang po sems dpa' brtan/ /de ni brtan phyir lus min yang / /sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin/ /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i sku/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes

rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang sems can gyi don bya ba dang thabs chen po dang / stobs dang brtson 'grus dang ye shes chen po'i dam tshig dang sems

can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam

pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa bla na med pa dang / theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa grub pa'i mchog thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tu bzang po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje de de'i lag par byin no/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ lag na rdo rje lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings par bzhugs te/ phyag g.yas

pas rdo rje thugs kar gsor zhing 'phen pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi grub pa yi/ /rdo rje bla na med pa 'di/ /bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin/ /rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra rA dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma

thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen por gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/

rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i dbyibs chen po de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin

gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gdon mi za

ba'i rgyal po yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di

ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rdo rje las byung ba'i/ /lcags kyu nges pa'i rgyal po bdag /gang phyir kun tu sangs rgyas khyab/ /grub phyir kun nas spyan 'dren to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon

mi za ba'i rgyal po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus

pa med pa thams cad dgug pa dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba'i byin gyis brlabs dam pa'i bar du bsgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje'i lcags kyu de byang chub sems

dpa' gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po de'i lag par de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgug pa rdo rje dgug pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dgug pa rdo rje lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yi/ /ye shes bla na med pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas

kun gyi don grub phyir/ /kun nas spyan drang dam pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpas byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo / /badzra rA ga /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me tog gi mdar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig

tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje'i mda' chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje mda'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bdud byed pa dang

rab tu brtan pa'i phyir/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud bya bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma
'o bdag ni rang bzhin dag /rang byung ba dag dgyes byed pa/ /'dod chags bral rnams dag bya'i phyir/ /'dod chags kyis ni 'dul bar byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ bdud de'i lus bcom ldan
'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad mnyes par byed pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud rdo rje dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus shing

lus pa med pa rnams mgu bar bya ba dang / thams cad kyis bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi mchog grub pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i mda' de byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba de'i phyag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i gzhu rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i mda' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi/ /ye shes

'di ni dri ma med/ /'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom/ /bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las

byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying

po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo / /badzra sA d+hu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de legs so zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das

rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gc-ig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul

shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/
rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu dga' bar byed pa nyid dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i lus su
gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o thams cad mkhyen kun gyi/ /legs byin nang na bdag mchog

pas/ /rnam rtog bral ba de dag gi/ nges par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can thams cad mgu bar bya ba dang thams cad bde ba

dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i ro bla na med pa dam pa grub pa 'thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje dgyes pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal

po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgyes pa rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rdo rje dgyes pas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi legs

sbyin pa/ /'di ni rab tu 'jug byed pas/ /rdo rje thams cad dgyes par byed/ /lha rdzas dgyes pa spel ba'o/ /byang chub kyi sems chen po dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes dang / dgyes pa chen po dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig las byung ba/ rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur

ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra rat+na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i

ting nge 'dzin/ thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ngo / /nam mkha' thams

cad kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas pas thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings lta bur gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ nam mkha'i dbyings
de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin du bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad las byung ba'i/ 'jig

rten gyi khams thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dbyibs de las 'jig

rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu

'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'-i ting nge 'dzin ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi snying po las shin du byung ba dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par

gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o chags med rgyal
ba yang / /khams gsum dbang por dgongs pas na/ /rdo rje rin chen dam pa yi/ /dbang gi mchog ni bdag yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i lus de bcom ldan 'das

kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

nor bu rin po che'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i

don thams cad yongs su grub par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don dam pa phun sum tshogs pa grub pa thob pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor bar rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas lag tu rdo rje'i nor bu de byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis

rdo rje snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos rdo rje'i nor bu de rang gis dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog cing ched du brjod

pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sems dpa'i dbyibs/ /dbang bskur de ni bdag yin te/ /bdag gi lag tu byin pas na/ /rin chen la ni rin chen bzhag /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra te dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thags pa 'di ni bcom

ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom
ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung nas/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer 'gyed pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin du gzi brjid che

ba nyid dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ ched du

brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sems can khams kun du/ /snang byed gzi brjid dpe med bdag /gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa yi/ /'dren pa rnams kyang sbyor bar byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ bka' nod cing bzhugs

par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi 'od 'thob cing dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje nyi ma de byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo

rje'i 'od/ rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba'i/ rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje nyi ma des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang bar byed cing ched du brjod pa
'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snang ba 'di/ /mi shes mun nag 'joms byed pa/ /shin du phra rdul ji snyed pa'i/ /nyi ma'i 'od pas shin du lhag /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba/ rin po che'i byin gyis rlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra ke tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka las

byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de rgyal mtshan kha dog dang gzugs dang rgyan dang dbyibs sna tshogs par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig

tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin

gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin

ni rin po che'i dpal dang shin du brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i dpal gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/
ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o don kun grub pa dang / /dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa yi/ /don rnams thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/ /'dra med dpal ni bdag yin no/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka'

nod cing 'dug par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bkang bar bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde

ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don chen po'i dngos grub dam pa 'thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal de'i lag tu de

bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan/ rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje

rgyal mtshan gyis/ rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor du bcug nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun/ /yongs su

rdzogs par byed pa yi/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ni/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i

dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra hA sa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi 'dzum par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs su gyur te/ phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /

de nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba la sogs pa

dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po yin pa dang shin du brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /
rtag tu mnyam par bzhag rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas don la rab sbyor phyir/ /e ma'o bdag ni kun mchog gi/ bzhad chen rmad du byung ba yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par
dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung

ba bskyed pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi dbang po bla na med pa bya ba dang thams cad bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi dbang po yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes mngon par thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po de'i lag tu rdo rje 'dzum pa de de bzhin

du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dga' ba/ rdo rje dga' ba zhes/ rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i dga' ba rdo rje

'dzum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rmad byung skyed pa ston pa po/ /dgyes chen byed pa'i ye shes te/ /

gtsug lag gzhan gyis shes mi nus/ /dbang bskur ba chen po dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang ba dang sems dpa' chen po'i don dang dgyes pa chen po dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang
chen po'i sems dpa'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra d+har+m+ma/

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes

rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung ngo / /dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun du snang bar byas pas chos kyi dbyings lta bur gyur to/ /
chos kyi dbyings de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas nam mkha' thams cad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi

pad ma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje pad ma'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas nas/ rdo rje

sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yin pa dang / shin du brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i skur

gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rang byung gdod nas dag /dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te/ /gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos rnams las/ /
rnam par dag pa dmigs par gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das rnams par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dam tshig las byung ba

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi bdag dang gzhan rnam par

dag par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob par byed pa'i bar du/ 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/

byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas de'i lag tu rdo rje pad ma de byin no/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje spyan rdo rje'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rdo rje pad ma de'i

'dab ma kha phye bas/ 'dod chags rnam par dag cing mi chags pa'i ngo bo nyid du gzigs pas gzigs shing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi/ /de yi kho na rtogs pa
'di/ /bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin/ /chos la chos ni gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis

brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i dam tshig ces ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po

'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra tIk+Sh+T+N+Na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de shes rab dang ye shes kyi ral grir gyur te de

byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs

de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu 'jam pa'-i dpal yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /'jam dbyangs bdag ni yin
par dgongs/ /gang phyir shes rab gzugs med kyang / /dbyangs nyid du ni dmigs pa yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab
dang ye shes kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcad pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can
gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad gcad pa dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba rnams myongs bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung
gi rjes su 'brang ba'i shes rab dam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bar du/ 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje ral gri de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal de'i lag tu de bzhin

du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje blo rdo rje blo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blos de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje ral gri des 'debs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /dgra rnams thams cad tshar gcod cing / /
sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin

gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs

ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra he tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su

gnas par gyur to/ /de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rnams byung nas/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos

kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
ba yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur te bcom

ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /rdo rje dam pa chos can gyi/ /e ma'o rdo rje 'khor lo bdag /gang phyir sems bskyed tsam gyis kyang / /chos kyi 'khor lo
bskor bar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par 'jug pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor

lo dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dam pa grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje 'khor lo de

ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming
gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'khor lo des de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /chos rnams thams cad rnam par sbyong / /phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang / /byang chub snying po yin par dgongs/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'

chen po mi gsung ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyis byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brjod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra b+hA Sha de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid
de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi yi ger gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje brjod pa'i dbyibs su gyur te

phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje brjod pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

chos nyid la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul la sogs pa byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu tshig ma yin pa dang shin du brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par
gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rang byung rnams kyi
gsang / /ldem po ngag du bdag dgongs te/ /gang phyir dam pa'i chos 'chad pa/ /tshig tu spros las rnam par bral/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi
thugs las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi mi gsung ba'i gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams

ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi tshig grub pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba thob pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi

phyir/ rdo rje brjod pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje tshig rdo rje tshig ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming

gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje brjod pas yang dag par smra zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje bzlas par brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sngags ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes dang de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes dang chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i ye shes dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnam par ldog pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sems dpa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phrin las thams cad ces bya

ba'i dam tshig las byung ba/ las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra kar+m+ma/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi phrin las kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyibs lta bur gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyibs de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam du gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyibs de las/ las thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas yang rdo rje'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du

phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rnams byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho

'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las mtha' yas pa yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te byang chub sems dpa'
chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /
e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges/ /phrin las mang po kun bdag yin/ /sangs rgyas don ni lhun grub phyir/ /rdo rje las ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi/ phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par

gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad mchod par bya ba la sogs pa gdon mi za ba'i tshad med pa dang las kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyis

las thams cad grub pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phrin las nyid dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa dam pa rnams 'grub

pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i bdag gis dbang

bskur nas de'i lag tu las kyi rdo rje de de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje thams cad rdo rje thams cad ces bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' chen po rdo rje thams cad ces bya bas rdo rje de rang gi snying gar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las la sbyor zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /
las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog /bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin/ /sna tshogs la ni sna tshogs gzhag /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka'i dam tshig las

byung ba las thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsrung ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra rak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ cho ga brtan par gyur te byung nas/

bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje go cha chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje go cha'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten

gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsrung ba'i go cha rgyas pa'i las la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni brtson 'grus dam pa thub dka' ba dang shin du brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po
brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o brtson 'grus go cha ni/ /brtan pa'i bdag nyid
rab brtan bdag /de ni brtan phyir lus med kyang / /rdo rje'i lus su byed pa mchog /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po thub dka' ba de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas
byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi rdo rje brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa

med pa rnams yongs su bskyang ba dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sku 'thob pa'i mchog 'grub par bya ba'i bar du/ de dag gi phyir rdo rje go cha de/ byang

chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje grogs po rdo rje grogs po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje grogs pos rdo rje go cha des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la go cha bskon zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /
byams pa'i go cha dam pa ste/ /brtson 'grus brtan pas bsrung ba che/ /grogs po chen por brjod pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms

pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/ las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra yak+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon

cha chen por gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs

de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bos gdul ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang

cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yin pa dang / shin du brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad

rab tu 'joms pa'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams/ /thugs rje can gyi thabs chen te/ /
zhi yang sems can don du ni/ /ma rungs par ni ston par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu khro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma rungs pa gdul ba'i dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang
yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnams 'thob cing dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje mche ba'i

mtshon cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khro bo rdo rje khro bo zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khro bos rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de rang gi thugs kar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsngags shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi/ /ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog /rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon rno ste/ /thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems

dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang

thugs rdo rjes bcings pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra san+d+hi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa

'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcings par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu

'dres par gyur nas rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje bcing ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems

dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur shin du bcings pa dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i

skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rab tu brtan bcings pa'i/ /dam tshig bdag ste brtan pa'i bdag /bsam pa thams cad rab

grub phyir/ /grol ba rnams kyang bcings bar byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lha rnams kyis
dgongs pa brtag pa dang grub pa thams cad dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang phyag rgya'i dbang dam pa

'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje bcing ba de byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje khu tshur zhes rdo rje bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba des rdo rje bcings pa des de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad la 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya bcing ba che zhing brtan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis myur grub phyir/ /dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar dka'/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i/ cho ga rgyas pa'i las dang brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha brtan pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i ye shes
dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las chen po'i sems dpa'o// // bam po gnyis pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par

snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin

gyis brlab zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung

ngo / /satwa badzrI/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu/ rdo rje'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /'od zer de las kyang 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas

byin gyis brlabs nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje'i dbyibs chen por gyur te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil

'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa'i bdag /gang phyir brtan pas lus med kyang / /rdo rje'i lus su gyur pa yin de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir rin

po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs

ka nas phyung ngo / /rat+na badzrI/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu rin po che'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /rin po che'i 'od zer

de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs

nas yang gcig tu 'dres/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas

shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje rin chen bdag yin grags/ /gang phyir phyag rgya thams cad kyi/ /dbang gi tshul ni dam pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir

chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /d+har+m+ma badzrI/ de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu pad ma'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /pad ma'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad

kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad ma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /

e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /chos kyi rdo rje gtsang ma bdag /gang phyir rang bzhin rnam dag pas/ /'dod chags yin yang dri ma med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdon mi za bar grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs

pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje byin gyis brlabs

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /kar+m+ma badzrI/ de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag tu las thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /las kyi 'od zer de dag las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul

shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te yang gcig tu 'dres nas 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi thams cad du rtse mo ltas pa'i las kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas

ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /las kyi rdo rje mang po bdag /gang phyir gcig kyang sangs rgyas dbyings/ ma lus par ni las bzang byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba chen po dang rdo rje'i chos nyid dang / mchod pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rnams so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam

par snang mdzad kyis de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha

mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra lA s+ye/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid

do/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i rtse mo de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo

rje 'dzin ma'i lus thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra zhing kha dog dang gzugs dang mtshan ma dang spyod lam sna tshogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad sdud par

gyur pa rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mor gyur nas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rang byung rnams kyi ni/ /
mchod pa bdag 'dra gzhan med de/ /gang phyir 'dod pa dga' mchod pas mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i phreng ba'i dbang

gis dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra mA le/ de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rin po che chen po'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya de dag las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams

cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje phreng bar de bzhin du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor

gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rin chen mchod pa zhes bdag dang 'dra bar grags pa med/ /gang phyir khams gsum rgyal mchog kyang / /rab tu mchod

pa byed par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu'i mchog gi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje/ zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams

kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzri gI ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan

'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu

'dres te lha mo chen mo rdo rje glur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o bdag ni kun gzigs

pa'i/ /glu mchog tshul gyis mchod pa yin/ /gang phyir sgra brnyan 'dra ba yin/ /mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes par byed/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung

ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra nrI ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las

byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas par gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa de dag

thams cad las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te lha mo chen mo rdo rje gar du gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa

gdon mi za bar grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o mchod kun don mdzad pa'i/ /mchod pa rgya chen bdag yin te/ gang phyir

rdo rje gar cho gas/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa'i dam tshig dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi glu dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las bla na med pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin

gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu tshim pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yog mo'i gtso mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra d+hu pe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de bdug pa'i mchod

pa'i sprin mang po rnam pa du mas rdo rje dbyibs thams cad du khyab par gyur nas phyung ngo / /bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs

pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas byung ste yang gcig tu 'dres nas rdo rje bdug pa'i lha mo'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla

ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o bdag ni mchod pa che/ /rab tu tshim ldan dge ba yin/ /gang phyir sems can dbab ldan pas/ /myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir rin po che'i rgyan gyi mchod pa dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ka ma 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra puSh+pe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das

rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ngo / /me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul

shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te rdo rje me tog gi lha mo'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu rin po che las byas

pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o me tog mchod pa bdag /thams cad kyi ni rgyan byed de/ /gang phyir mchod nas de bzhin gshegs/ /rin chen nyid du myur du 'grub/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las

byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra A lo ke/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma

thag tu thams cad du snang ba'i mchod pa'i bkod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /thams cad du snang ba'i mchod pa'i bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi

khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te lha mo rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa

rtse mo rdo rje nor bu rin po che las byis pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o mchod pa'i mar me ni/ /rgya chen dge ba bdag yin te/ /gang phyir snang bcas myur

du yang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan yang 'thob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod

pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dris mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bran mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /

badzra gan+d+he/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu dri thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin

pa de nyid do/ /dri thams cad kyi mchod pa'i bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te lha mo rdo rje dri zhes bya

ba'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o lha rdzas mchod
pa yi/ /yid 'ong dri ni bdag yin te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dri/ /lus rnams kun la sbyin par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab pa dang byang chub chen po'i yan lag bsags

pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kun du snang ba dang tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ston pa'i dri rnams ni de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mang po thams cad kyi bdag po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra a~M ku sha / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las de byung ma thag tu

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mang po thams cad du gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams

cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse

mo rdo rje nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi/ /yang dag spyan 'dren brtan pa bdag /gang phyir bdag gis spyan drangs pas/ /dkyil 'khor kun la bsten par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig tu 'jug pa/

sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'dren pa gsol ka ba 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /

badzra pA sha /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las de byung ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dren pa'i phyag rgya mang por gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dren pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig
