dzA karma ku ru ku ru/ sim pa can dang byang chub chen mo'i yan lag ldan ma dang mig ldan ma dang dri ldan ma rnams na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi mchod pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus shing lus pa

med pa rnams la mchod pa byed pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i bya ba bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje bya ba zhes kyang grags/ /dkyil 'khor chen

po'i tshul du ni/ /sangs rgyas sku rnams gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje sems sogs tshul du ni/ /lha mo phyag rgya bcas pa bri/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje bya ba 'dir gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di bshad do/ /de la

dang por rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis gzhug par bya ste/ bcug nas kyang 'di skad du/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i dam tshig yin gyis/ mchod pa bcu drug po 'di rnams khyod kyis nyi

ma re re zhing ci nus pa gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te las kyi dkyil 'khor bstan la thams cad kyi mtshan ma lag pa gnyis su sbyin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyis kyang mchod na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos de nas byang chub chen po'i sems bsgrub pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas

yin bsam shing / /dga' ba bdag ni mchod byed cing / /sangs rgyas kyi ni bde ba'ang 'thob/ /byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam shing / /phreng ba la sogs mchod pa yis/ /mchod na

de ni dbang yang bskur/ /byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsams shing / /snyan pa'i glu yis mchod pas bdag /mchod pa de ni mgu bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed par/ /

bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsams shing / /gar gyi mchod pas bdag mchod pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang bdag mchod 'gyur/ /de la snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /bud+d+ha At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ bud+d+ha stu ti

ka ro mi/ bud+d+ha pU dzA ka ro mi/ /bud+d+ha pU dzA ka ro mi/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /mchog gi tshul gyis phyag 'tshal zhing / /

de bzhin sangs rgyas kun mchod na/ /rtag tu phyag byar 'os par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams che/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje skyes/ /rjes su yid rang bas mchod na/ /myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/ /
lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /lha rdzas bdag dbul la sogs pa'i/ /mchod pa kun gyis sangs rgyas rnams/ /mchod na de yang mchod par 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams

cad ni/ /yongs su bsngo ba'i mchod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /pra NA mA mi a nu mo de/ bud+d+ha pU dzA pa ri nA ma/ de nas chos kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes

bslab par bya'o/ /chos rnams rang bzhin gyis kyang gsal/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gdod nas dag /chos de dag gis mchod pas ni/ /dga' ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /chos rnams kun ni 'dus pa yi/ /a zhes bya ba bsgom

zhes brjod/ /chos kyi phyag rgya de yis ni/ /de yi sdug bsngal thams cad gcod/ /'dir ni chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /rgyu ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ /dam chos 'khor lo mchod pa yis/ /mchod pas chos ni 'chad

par 'gyur/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ /sgra snyan dag dang 'drar bshad de/ /chos kyi mchod pa de dag gis/ /mchod na sangs rgyas gsung yang 'thob/ /de la de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /

sarba shud+d+ha sa man+ta b+ha dra/ d+harma tsakra ni Sh+tha pany+tsa/ de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya ye shes bslab bo/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams/ /rdo rje dbyings su bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje bdag nyid myur du 'thob/ /

lus dang ngag sems rdo rje 'i/ /rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun tu bsgoms na ni/ /chos kyi skur ni myur du 'grub/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje

sems dpar mnyam par 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni skur bsgoms na/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /badzra

kA ya/ d+harma kA ya/ satwa kA ya/ bud+d+ha kA ya/ de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ /rang byung la ni lus kun gyis/ /'khyud pa'i bde ba'i mchod pa ni/ /phul na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /

'dra ba de ni myur bar 'gyur/ /shin tu chags pa'i sbyor ba yi/ /dam pa'i gzung ba'i bde ba ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phul gyur na/ /rdo rje rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur/ /shin du dga' zhing bde chags pas/ /sprad par gyur

pa'i mchog bde ba/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni/ /rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni sbyar ba yi/ /kun du sbyor ba'i bde ba ni/ /mchod pa'i phyir ni phul bas na/ /rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /

de dag gi gsang ba'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /ra ti badzra/ rA ga badzra/ pra ti badzra/ karma badzra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phrin las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab par

bya ste/ snying gar rtsibs logs rgyab sbyor ba/ /dpral ba la sogs de bzhin du/ /kha dang rna ba mgo ltag pa/ /spyi bo phrag pa rked par bzhag /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig mchod pa'i phyag rgya

ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas la/ /snying ga la sogs gnas tshul du/ /bzhag nas rgyal ba rnams mchod do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod

pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /oM kra sa y+Y+ya sA dr-i ra~M kra~M kha~M sha~M hU~M hU~M sha no shI sA~M/ las kyi phyag rgya'i mdor bsdus na/ /las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i

mngon par rtogs pa las/ rtogs pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje las zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyis byin gyi brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu

ba'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta muSh+Ti ba~M`/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di yi dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i

snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badzra satwa muSh+Ti a/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badzra rat+na muSh+Ti trA~M/ de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i

cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badzra d+harma muSh+Ti kha~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badzra karma muSh+Ti ha~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rang gi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir rdo rje dngos grub ces bya ba phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor

'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje dngos grub zhes kyang grags/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /mkhas pas rab tu sbyin par bya/ /thog mar sangs

rgyas gzugs gzhag ste/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhi yang bri/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya la sogs bri/ /de nas rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'gugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas

nas de bzhin du btsud de 'di skad du smra bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis gsang ba'i le'u 'di su la yang ma bstan cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ log par lta ba dang sdig pa'i las byed pa'i mi sems can rnams kyang yod do/ /btson 'grus

chung ba dang / sbyor ba med pa dang / ri mo mi shes pa'i sems can rnams kyang yod de/ de dag rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams su/ brtson 'grus chung bas mi

'dug ste/ de dag gi don du rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig tu gyur pa 'di ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang /

phan pa dang bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad myong bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du byin gyis brlabs so/ /khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang

ba 'di rnams la yid mi ches shing ma dad par ma byed cig /sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang yid dgas kyi khams su lhung bar 'gyur ba'am/ mi bde ba ma spangs par dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la/ gdong g.yogs

pa bkrol te dkyil 'khor bstan to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'di brjod do/ /bdag nyid chen po gang gang gi/ phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa/ /bzlas pa'i snying po'i don du ni/ /der ni bdag nyid bsgom

par bya/ /ye shes 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin/ /bdag nyid chen po phyag rgya kun/ /de dag kun gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba brjod par bya'o/ /rang gi dbang po bshig nas ni/ /rdo rje

bcing bas gzung bar bya/ /de yis phyag rgya gang reg pa/ /de ma thag tu de dbang 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi chos nyid brjod par bya'o/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ /ye shes phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /

ye shes phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya kun gyi las brjod par bya'o/ /glu dang gar dang zas dang bro/ /spyod pa la sogs bde ba rnams/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas dkyil 'khor thams

cad du bsgrub pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /mtshan ma brtan par rang gyur nas/ /dkar por gyur pa'i ras la gnas/ /mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlabs te/ /bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings su bsgom/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /gung mo

myu gu bzhin du gshibs/ /mthe chung dang ni mdzub rtse bsgreng / /dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig go/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /rab tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor te/ /ting 'dzin dbang du gyur pa'i tshul/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis

bcings la/ /de gnyis rdo rje dam du gzung / /mdzub mo mthe'u chung bsnol ba ni/ /rdo rje dgos mchog dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i bcing ba bzhi bslabs nas/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i

cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/ /rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du mi g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du rang rang gi phyag rgya rnams

su bris na dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub bo/ /de ltar ras dang brtsig pa dang nam mkha' dang gnas thams cad du bris na dngos grub thams cad 'grub bo/ /dkyil 'khor brtag pa nas brtsams te/ la la ni dkyil 'khor du de nyid

kyi tshe/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub/ la la ni de nas brtsams nas nyin zhag gcig gis/ la la ni nyi ma bzhis/ la la ni zhag bcu drug gis/ la la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang ji ltar 'dod pa bde blag tu don thams cad byed

cing thams cad dga' ba dang bro dang zas dang spyod pa thams cad kyi bde ba myong bar byed kyang / lo gcig gis mchog 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo / /badzra satwa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad kyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa

rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub par bya ba'i bar du theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor

'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na rdo rje sems dpa' zhes kyang bshad/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo/ /

zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya/ /de nas dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thob pa'i ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /

de la 'di skad du khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang khong du ma chud pa su la yang gsang ba 'di ma smra shig /khyod ngan song thams cad du ltung ba'am mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o/ /de

nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dam pa bsgrub pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /zla ba rgyas la 'dug nas kyang / /phyag rgya chen po gzung byas nas/ /bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar ni/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas

dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu/ /khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/ /de bas 'dod pa'i chags bral bar/ /khyod kyis kyang ni ma byed cig /

ma hA sa ma ya ha na phaT/ de nas mna'i snying po 'di sbyin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rnams su dam tshig gi sdom pa sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen

po la sogs pa bzhi bcing ba bslab par bya'o/ /dngos grub kyang de bzhin no/ /ri mo la sogs pa dang / lugs ma'i sku gzugs thams cad la yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bzhin du byas nas/ dngos grub thams cad

kyang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par byas pa ci lta ba bzhin du yang bya'o/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo byang chub kyi sems chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na rdo rje chen po la rdo rje dgyes pa'i snying po 'dis legs pa gsol to/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /

legs so rin chen rdo rje khyod/ /rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pas/ /rje rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ /ni par rdo rje sems dpa'i

mtshan nyid kyang / /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /dag par byas pas bsgrubs na ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang bde bar 'thob/ /rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba ni/ /'dod pa kun gyi bde bas bde/ /tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub pas na/ /bde ba mi

zad med mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po dum bu dang po rdzogs s+ho// // bam po

bzhi pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor lo chen po bskor ba la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis

gsol ba btab bo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che/ /rdo rje mgon po rab bsgrub mdzad/ /rdo rje dbang bskur rdo rje 'od/ /rdo rje dpal khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen po/ /rdo rje ral gri mtsho chen po/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi rgyal po

mchog /spros med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje las dang srung ba che/ /gnod sbyin gtum pa gdon chen po/ /rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che/ /phyag rgya kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dang byang chub che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin

gshegs/ /rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ /theg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don kun gyi ni de nyid don/ /sems can don chen kun rig pa/ /kun mkhyen kun byas thams cad de/ /kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bdag rab rdo rje

mchog /rdo rje brtson rab rdo rje 'chang / /dam tshig chen po de nyid don/ /sems chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa che/ /rab tu dga' ba 'od chen po/ /rdo rje 'od dang 'od gsal ba/ /sangs rgyas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

rdo rje rgyal mchog rdo rje drag /rigs mchog mchog dang mi yi mchog /rdo rje dam pa mchog chen mchog /rigs mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dbyings dang gsang ba che/ /rdo rje gsang ba rab gsang 'chang / /rdo rje phra ba bsam gtan che/ /

rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mchog sangs rdo rje mchog /sangs rgyas byang chub mkhas pa che/ /sangs rgyas ye shes sangs rgyas che/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa mchod pa che/ /

sems dpa' mchod pa rab mchod pa/ /thabs chen dang ni dngos grub che/ /rdo rje grub khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems chen po/ /

rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan/ /sangs rgyas gtso bo bshes gnyen skyes/ /rnam par snang mdzad che dang khyab/ /ston zhing khro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid che/ /yang

dag mtha' ste che ba'i tshul/ /pha rol phyin pa kun mkhyen pa/ /don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun du bzang dang spyod pa mchog /bdud dang bdud ni rab 'dul ba/ /kun ni mchog dang mnyam nyid mkhyen/ /kun du 'gro

khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas hU~M zhes hU~M zhes pa/ /rdo rje hU~M zhes 'dul ba po/ /rdo rje thams cad rdo rje mchog /phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phyag byas mchod cing brjod pa dang / /rim gror de bzhin gshegs pas byas/ /gang phyir rdo rje

sems brtan pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya khyod/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus/ /kun gzigs yab ni khyod yin te/ /byung ba dang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /

rab tu mos pas bstod byed cing / /glu blangs gang zhig bstod byed pa/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun la mnga' mdzad pa'i/ /mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sems can kun don mdzad pa'i phyir/ /rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzad/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo phyag na rdo rjes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i tshig thos nas/ rdo rje bdag nyid kyi thugs kar bzhag ste de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bos nas 'di skad

ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa ci'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa

ma rungs pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bas 'dul bar mi spyod pa de dag la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam par 'phros nas/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo ni rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par yang gcig tu
'dus te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnyam nyid du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kyi dpal be'ur zhugs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su

bskyab pa dang phan pa dang bde ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes la dmigs te/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs khro bo chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di byung ngo hU~M/ de nas de byung ma thag tu phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ kun du 'bar ba'i

snying po khro gnyer can smin ma bcum zhing dpral bar gnyer ba mche ba lha ger byung zhing so gtsigs pa/ rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang zhags pa la sogs pa rdo rje me lce 'bar ba'i mtshon cha lag na thogs pa/ rnam pa du ma'i

kha dog dang rgyan rnams kyi cha lugs can phyag na rdo rje'i sku byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tu shin du ma rungs pa thams cad gdul bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs kun du rdo rje dbyings kyi

dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o thabs kyis 'dul ba yi/ /thabs chen ldan pa bdag yin te/ /gang phyir sems can 'dul thabs phyir/ /dri ma med pa'i

khro bor gyur/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis brlabs

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/

gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M A na ya ho b+ha ga bA~M badzra hU~M phaT/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka las byung ma thag pa bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer gyur te byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i

sprin thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs te/ spyan drangs nas rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste/ dam tshig gis bcings nas yang

gcig tu 'dus te rdo rje khro bo'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar 'dug ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o byang chub sems 'di ni/ /kun du bzang zhing sdig med de/ /gang phyir sems can 'dul

don du/ /khro bo yang ni yid 'ong 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje khro bo'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas babs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis 'gugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di

nyid kyi thugs ka nas byung ngo / /hU~M Tak+ki dzaH/ de nas de byung ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad na 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten

thams cad na gnas pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i lcags kyus bkug nas/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i

khang bu brtsegs pa gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa thams cad du bskor nas 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs ka nas rdo rje de blangs te/

gsor zhing khams gsum pa ji snyed pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo la bltas te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la zhugs la nga'i bka' yang nyon cig /

de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /skyabs su 'gro bar bsgrub par byos/ /kun mkhyen ye shes thob bya'i

phyir/ /grogs po rnams kyis bsgrub par gyis/ de nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po lha chen po 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa dregs te cher khros par ston cing 'di

skad ces smras so/ /kye+e gnod sbyin nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi gtso bo dbang phyug byed pa po 'jigs pa po 'byung po thams cad kyi dbang po lha'i yang lha chen po yin na gnod sbyin khyod kyi ngag nga ci phyir nyan/ de nas yang phyag na

rdo rjes rdo rje gsor zhing bka' stsal pa/ kye+e sems can ma rungs pa dkyil 'khor du myur du zhugs la nga'i dam tshig la yang dag par gnas par gyis shig /de nas lha'i yang lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu'i sems can dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa 'di su zhig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi tshogs thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces

gsungs so/ /grogs po rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang dam tshig dang sdom pa la bsgrub par gyis shig /phyag na rdo rje 'di skad gnod sbyin khro bo ma rungs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ste/ rdo rje 'bar bas khams gsum po

'di dag thams cad brlag par byas ta re/ de nas dbang phyug chen po 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang por gyur pa dang / rang gi shes pa'i dbang gis 'khor mang po dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'jigs par bstan pa'i

phyir/ khro bo gtum pa chen por rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'bar ba chen po gtong zhing / ma rungs pa chen pos rta skad du dgod pa rnams bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye+e nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po yin na khyod kyis

nga la ci'i phyir bka' stsal pa/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje de bsnyems pa dang bcas par rdo rje gsor zhing 'dzum ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye+e lus srul po'i mi'i sha za ba zas su ro bsregs pa'i thal ba za zhing kha zas dang mal dang gos

kyang de las byed pa nga'i bka' bzhin byos shig /de nas lha chen po dbang phyug chen pos 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag dang nam mkha'i khams rnams khro ba khro ba chen pos non par byin gyis brlabs te 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod kyang de'i

bka' nyon la dam tshig kyang long shig /de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das lha chen po zhes bgyi ba'i lha 'di ni/ rang gi 'tshal ba'i stobs kyis dregs

pa dang dbang phyug chen po'i dbang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la 'dud du mi btub na 'di la ji ltar bgyi ba'i rigs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ba'i rdo rje

chen po'i dam tshig dran par byas so/ /oM ni sum+b+ha badzra hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i snying po 'di brjod do/ /hU~M/ de nas de brjod ma thag tu khams gsum pa thams cad nas 'dus pa'i lha chen po la sogs

pa 'jig rten gsum po'i dbang po thams cad kha bub tu 'gyel te/ nyam thag pa'i tshig 'byin cing bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo / /lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha de ni sa la 'gyel te dran pa med par

gyur nas shi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo 'di thams cad la skyabs sbyin pa byos te ma

bsad cig /de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas lha thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /gal te khyod rang gi srog 'dod na/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge

'dun la skyabs su deng la nga'i bka' yang nyon cig /de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa la skyabs su mchi'o/ /khyod kyis bstan pa'i bka' ni bdag

cag gis ma 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la bos nas 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /kye+e lha rnams 'di ni nged dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'o/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' bzhin byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun

tu bzang po ste/ sems can thams cad gdul ba'i don byas pa'i phyir/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen por dbang bskur to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyed kyi nang na yang lha chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can yod de/ de rnams

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bar mdzad pas/ sdig pa las bzlog par mi spyod pa'i sdig pa'i sems can de dag rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs so/ /de bas na khyed rnams 'di'i dam
tshig la gnas par byos shig par bka' stsal to/ /de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi srog yal ba las bskyab tu gsol/ bdag cag kyang bka' stsal pa bgyid cing mchis/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye+e grogs po rnams 'di nyid la skyabs su dong dang 'di nyid kyis kun du skyob te gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/ /de nas khams gsum kun nas 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po de rnams bcom ldan

'das rdo rje 'dzin pa ga la ba de logs su bltas nas nyam thag pa chen po'i sgra mgrin gcig tu phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las kun tu bskyab par gsol/ bde bar

gshegs pa kun tu bskyab par gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye+e ma rungs pa rnams nga'i bstan pa la zhugs shig /rdo rje

'bar ba 'dis gcig tu 'bar bar byas nas thams cad kyang thal bar byas ta re/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs bskyed pa zhi ba dul ba sems

can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol ba lags na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bsregs par 'gyur/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos de dag la

'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye+e grogs po dag gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa de'i phyir nga ni kun du bzang po ste/ khyed lta bu'i sems can ma rungs pa'i ngang tshul can sdig pa'i sems

rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir gal te nga'i dam tshig la mi gnas na chud gsan par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa'i lha de dag gzhan dbugs dbyung

zhing bslang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje'i bslang ba zhes bya ba 'di smras so/ /oM badzro t+tiSh+Tha/ de nas de skad smras ma thag tu dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs par khams gsum pa 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi

bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kun brgyal ba las sems dbugs phyung ste lha'i bde ba myong zhing 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang spu langs pa med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la lta zhing langs so/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa sems dpa' chen po lha'i bdag po lha chen po 'di ma bslang na 'di srog de chud gsan par byas te ci rung / gsos na 'di yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur ro/ /

de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin du bya'o snyam nas shi ba gso ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /badzra A yuHde nas de smras ma thag tu lha chen po lha'i bdag po shi ba las gsos te ldang 'dod na yang ldang ma nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci bdag cag 'di lta bus 'dul lam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa khyod skyes bu chen po 'di bka' nyan par mi 'jug na/ khyod la 'dul ba 'di nyid yin gyi nga ma

yin no/ /dbang phyug chen pos gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis ma rungs pa'i sems can de las skyabs mdzad par mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'di las skyabs mi nus so/ /gsol pa/

ci'i slad du/ bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis ma 'tshal to/ /ci'i slad du zhe na/ khams gsum gyi bdag

po/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i bdag po mchis par ma 'tshal na 'di su lags de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang lha chen po la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /

kye+e ma rungs pa'i sems can nga'i bka' mi nyan tam/ de nas lha chen pos rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig thos nas 'khrugs shing khros par gyur te/ de ltar bsgyel bzhin du yang 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs bstan te 'di skad ces

smras so/ /nga shi bar bzod kyi/ khyod kyi ngag nga mi nyan no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rab tu khros par ston cing rang gi rkang pa'i mthil nas rjes su spyod pa 'di byung ngo / /oM pa ta ka ri Sha Na badzra hU~M/ de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mthil nas kun du 'bar ba'i snying po khro gnyer byas nas mche ba lhag ger byung ba gdong chen po rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa byung nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan snga na bka' nod cing

'dug par gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes dbang phyug chen po sbyang ba'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /oM pa ta ka ri Sha/ ki ri sha /sarba badzra d+ha ra a nu tsa ra ka ta badzra hU~M dzaH/ de nas de skad smras pa dang lha chen po dang

lha mo u mar bcas te rkang pa gyen kar bstan nas gcer bur phyung ste/ skye bo thams cad kyis gad mos btab cing rkang pas 'gugs pa'i rjes su spyod pas de bkug ste bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan
sngar zhabs kyi drung du bzhag go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can ma rungs pa rjes 'brang dang bcas pa 'd-i ji

ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM badzra kra ma ho/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha chen po zhabs g.yon pas mnan zhabs g.yas pas

lha mo u ma'i steng du mnan nas/ rang gi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badzra A be sha ha na pa ta~M traT/ de nas de smras ma thag tu lha chen babs nas rang gi lag stong gis rang gi gdong stong la 'tshog go/ /de nas rdo rje'i nor bu

rin po che'i rtse mo'i rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i phyi rol na srid pa gsum pa thams cad kyis nged kyis dbang po 'di bdag nyid chen po des btul lo zhes sgra chen po byung ngo / /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po la thugs rje chen po bskyed pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byams pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM bud+d+ha mai tri badzra rak+Sha ha~M/ de nas de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ lha chen po la babs pa'i

sdug bsngal kun zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis reg pas/ bla na med pa'i grub pa'i dbang dang ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa dang gzungs dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnams

thob pa nas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub pa'i bar du gyur to/ /de nas lha chen po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /

gzungs dang rnam par thar pa'i bde ba myong ste lha chen po'i lus phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phul nas/ 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten khams kyi rdul

phra rab snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na thal bas khebs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par skyes so/ /de nas lha chen po'i lus de las

ched du brjod pa 'di byung ngo / /e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /yi ge'i tshogs kyis mnan nas su/ /mya ngan las ni 'das par gzhag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
phyag na rdo rjes/ de las gzhan pa mthu bo che la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam
tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs shig /zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig srungs shig /de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bka' ji skad stsal pa bzhin du
bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes srid pa gsum 'dus pa de rnams bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /grogs po rnams yang gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa dang dam

tshig dang sdom pa zung la nga'i dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig /de dag gis gsol pa/ de bzhin du 'tshal na bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang dam tshig glo bar ma chud do/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam

tshig 'di byin no/ /byang chub sems ni rim bzhin du/ /bskyed nas de yi 'og tu ni/ /byang chub chen por ci nus par/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag 'bad par bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ lha la sogs pa de rnams 'jug pa'i

dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas/ dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya snying po 'dis 'ching du gzhug go/ /oM badzra sa ma ya grih+Na s+t+wa~M ban+dus ma ya/ badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu sma ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/

s+thi ro me b+ha ba/ A hA r+yo me b+ha ba/ a pra ti hA r+yo me b+ha ba sarba karma su tsa me tsit+ta~M shre yaH/ ku ru hU~M ha ha ha ha hoH/ de nas de smras ma thag tu khams gsum gyi srid pa gsum gyi skye bo 'dus pa thams cad rdo rje khro bo ti rin+ti rI'i

phyag rgya lag tu babs nas dam du bcings par gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes tshul bzhin du btsud nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad go rim bzhin du bstan te rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas/ rdo

rje'i mtshan ma'ang lag tu byin te/ rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems can gyi don la bkod do/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum po'i bdag po rnams yin te/

'di lta ste dbang phyug chen po ni khro bo'i rdo rje'o/ /mthu bo che ni sgyu ma'i rdo rje'o/ /kaR+ti ka sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o/ /tshangs pa ni thub pa'i rdo rje'o/ /dbang po ni rdo rje'i mtshon cha ste de la sogs pa ni rig pa'i rgyal po

rnams su zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad la rjes su byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ bdud rtsi 'khril ba ma ni rdo rje 'khyil ba'o/ /zla ba ni rdo rje'i 'od do/ /dbyug pa chen po'i gtso bo ni rdo rje

dbyig pa'o/ /ser smug ni rdo rje ser smug ste de la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ sbrang rtsis myos pa ni rdo rje'i glang po'i sna'o/ /

sbrang rtsi byed pa ni rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/ /rgyal po ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo / /rgyal bar byed pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ste/ de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas sa bla'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa

'di lta ste/ mdzod skyong ni rdo rje tho ba'o/ /me ni rdo rje'i me'o/ /rlung ni rdo rje'i rlung ngo / /ku be ra ni rdo rje 'jigs pa'o/ /de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas sa'i 'og gi dbang po lha thams cad la

byin pa 'di lta ste/ phag ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o/ /gshin rje ni rdo rje dus so/ /gtsug phud sa'i rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo'o/ /ba ru Na ni klu rdo rje ste de dag la sogs pa ni bran zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas 'jig rten

gsum gyi bdag po'i lha mo thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ rang gi mtshan ma rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

sems can gyi don la rab tu bkod pa la 'di lta ste/ u ma ni khro bo rdo rje ma'o/ /gser ldan ma ni rdo rje gser ro/ /drug ldan ma ni rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o/ /tshangs ma ni rdo rje zhi ma'o dbang mo ni rdo rje khu tshur ma te/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje'i

rgyal mor dbang bskur to/ /de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ mi 'chi ba ni rdo rje mi 'chi ma'o/ /ro hi na ni rdo rje mdangs ma'o/ /dbyug 'dzin ma ni rdo rje dbyug mchog ma'o/ /skye ba 'phrog ma ni rdo rje'i

rked chings ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni khro ba mo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ gsod ma ni rdo rje 'ju ma'o/ /za ba ni rdo rje za ba ma'o/ /brgo ba ni rdo rje bgo ba ma'o/ /dga'

ba ni rdo rje dga' ba ma'o/ /de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso mor dbang bskur to/ /de nas sa la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ zhi ba ma ni rdo rje pho nya mo'o/ /rlung ni mgyogs ma rdo rje ma'o/ /me ni rdo rje 'bar ma'o/ /

ku be ra ma ni rdo rje'i 'khor ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje'i pho nya mor dbang bskur to/ /de nas sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ phag mo ni rdo rje kha'o/ /tsa muN+Di ni rdo rje dus ma'o/ /snang

chen po ni rdo rje rul pa ma'o/ /ba ru Na ma ni rdo rje chu srin ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran mor dbang bskur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes zhugs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnams

bskyed nas phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad bslabs te rdo rje'i dam tshig mna'i snying po 'di byin no/ /rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /dam tshig 'di las 'das na ni/ /rigs rnams myur du thal bar

byed/ /oM ha na sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ de nas snying po gzung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di byin do/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings sde/ /mdzub mo lcags kyur bcings nas ni/ /gcu zhing phyir yang gcu bar bya/ /dgos pa don sems gang yin

pa/ /de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni/ /dgos par grub phyir 'dug par byos/ /khyed kyi srog ni ma rung par/ /dam tshig des ni gyur ta re/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /mdzub mo bkug nas rab tu mnan/ /mthe bong gnyi ga mtshams

sbyar bas/ /gung mo gnyi ga rab tu mnan/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yin/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa las/ /gal te 'ga' yis 'das gyur na/ /dam tshig 'dis ni khyed gsod do/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyi ga

yi/ /mthe'u chung sor mo bcings nas ni/ /mdzub mo sor mo'i rgyab nas mdud/ /bzlog ste mgo bor bzhag par bya/ /bdag nyid che ba'i dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje rig 'dzin bcings nas ni/ /khros te gang la bltas na ni/ /

de yi mdun du de bzhin 'dug /rdo rje bsdams pa'i rdo rje yi/ /bsrung ba dam bcings mnan pa n-i/ /de ni srung ba'i dam tshig ste/ /sems can thams cad srung ba'o/ /gang zhig la la bskyab pa'i phyir/ /khro bor ldan pa

bcings nas ni/ /sems can gang la bsrung ba yi/ /de yi rgyab tu 'dug par byas/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/ /mthe'u chung gis ni bsdam byas te/ /gcu zhing slar gcu

dra bkrol nas/ /khro bor mnyam gzhug y-in pa yi/ /dam tshig de yang sbyar byas nas/ /khyed kyis de yi mdun du ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog phyir 'khod/ /rdo rje bcing ba sbrel ba ni/ /mdzub mo gnyi ga dam por

sbyar/ /mthe bong gung mo rtse mo gnyis/ /rdo rje phyag rgyar bcings nas kyang / /bzlog ste dpral bar gzhag par bya/ /gal te gson par 'dod na ni/ /'gug par byed pa gang yin pa/ /de yi mdun du rtag par 'dug /

de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi snying po 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di yin no/ /oM ba li tod ba li ta badzra A kar Sha ya hU~M dza dzan/ /rdo rje gcu ba'i phyag rgyas

lha dgug pa'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra a gra d+hi pa ya sa ma ye hU~M/ bar snang la spyod pa rnams kyi'o/ /oM badzra mA la a gra ba~M/ phreng ba can rnams kyi'o/ /oM badzra ban+b+ha ha~M/ sa la spyod pa rnams kyi'o/ /oM badzra pA tA

la b+hany+dza b+hany+dza hU~M phaT/ sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o/ /oM he ru ka badzra sa ma ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA b+hany+dza ka hU~M phaT/ bud med rnams kyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba por dbang bskur na/ bcings pa'i dkyil 'khor ma rungs pa de dag thams cad ji ltar bsgrub par

bgyi ba legs par bka' stsal par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsan nas 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /oM badzra sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes

sems can thams cad la bskyab pa'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya sarba maN+Da la/ badzra d+hA ra sad+t+ya mA ti kra ma hU~M phaT/ rdo rje lcags kyus

gnyis bcings te/ /snying gar yongs su bskor bar bya/ /mdzub gnyis lcags kyus phyi rol gyi/ /dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i mchog yin to/ /de nas de bshad ma thag tu dkyil 'khor thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo phyi rol

kun du bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye+e grogs po dag srog gcod pa spangs shing dam tshig gzung ba la bsgrub par gyis/

de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi sems can de dag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba ma rungs pa'i sems can lags pas mdangs 'phrog pa la srog

ltos na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar 'tsho bar bgyi ba de bka' stsol cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ma rungs pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs so/ /oM tuSh+Ta badzra kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wan sa ya bi ka ri/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma

ya mu drA maN+Dal/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza maR+d+ha maR+d+ha/ khA da khA da/ ba ra man+t+ra badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ rdo rje khro mdzub lag par ni/ /sen mo sprad de dkris nas kyang / /rtse mo gnyis ni dam sbyar ba/ /phyag rgya de ni ma rungs 'joms/ /de nas de smras ma

thag tu ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa du mas gtse zhing bral ba dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa dral to/ /ma rungs pa'i dam tshig gi sems can de rnams yang sreg cing shin du bcos pas 'o dod chen

po 'bod cing phongs pa'i sgra byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po ga la ba der thal mo sbyar te 'di skad gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag srog dang mi 'bral bar skyabs mdzad du gsol/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang bcom

ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM ni sum+b+ha ha na da ha pa tsa gr-ih+Na ban+d+ha

hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje khro bo mi bzad pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma hA badzre khu ra kro d+ha pa ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta maN+Da li khi nA sha ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya~M b+hi ga ki ra bid+ha na sa ya s+pho Ta ya b+hany+dza ya sarba

duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA ban+d+ha gr-ih+Na ha na da ha pa tsa sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya sa twa~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ de nas de smras ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dam tshig dang phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus te rgya mtsho chen por dong ngo / /de nas byang

chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ma rungs pa thams cad thul cig ces bka' stsal na/ phra men ma dang gdon la sogs pa gdon de dag

thams cad la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM ha na ha na badzra hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa

thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra A kaR+Sha ya shI g+h+ra~M sarba duSh+Ta gra ha badzra d+ha ra satwa na hU~M dza/ de nas de smras ma thag tu phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad ri rab kyi rtse mo'i phyi rol bskor

te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye+e bzod ldan rnams srog gcod pa spang ba'i bslab pa dang dam

tshig dang sdom pa gzung bar byos shig /rdo rje 'od 'phro ba gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pas khyed kyi rigs rnams ma lus shing bsregs ta re/ de nas phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la

ba der thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba ni/ ji ltar bgyi bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'

stsal to/ /phyag na rdo rje sems can de rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed la/ thabs sbyin par byos shig /de nas phyag na rdo rje chen pos sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i mtshan ma shes pa'i phyag rgya dang snying po 'di gsungs so/ /

oM badzra pra ti grih+Na hri da ya mA kaR+Sha ya yad+t+ya ba ya~M ma ta mA ma d+hA ra d+de na mi ya te tad+ya s+ya hri da ya~M ni skra mi tu sa ma ya hU~M dzaH/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /snying gar rdo rje lag ngar gnyis/ /shin du dam par bcings nas ni/ /

rdo rje mdzub mo rtse mo yis/ /rang gi mchan khung brud par bya/ /khyod rnams kyis phyag rgya des sems can thams cad kyi snying rus la zo shig /de nas phra men ma la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad dga' ba'i sgra thos

nas mchongs rgal byas te rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa

'dul ba lags par bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rims la sogs pa nad de rnams la ci ltar bgyi bdag la bka' stsol cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po

phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nad dgug pa'i snying po smras pa/ oM badzra sa ma ya A na ya sarba duSh+Ta dz+wa ra d+ha ni nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ de nas de smras ma thag tu rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol

du bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye bzod ldan dag sems can gsod pa las ldog pa'i bslab pa gzung ba'i sdom pa long shig /de dag gis

gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can gyi mdangs 'phrog ste 'tsho bar bgyid na da bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar bgyi legs par bka' stsol cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes

rang gi las rnams dag par 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra karma bi sho d+ha ya sarba A ba ra NA ni bud+d+ha sat+t+ya na sa ma ya hU~M`/ de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje thal mo dam bcas te/ /mdzub

mo gnyis ka bkug nas kyang / /mthe bo mnyam ste sbyar nas ni/ /mnan pa de ni sdig 'phrog pa/ /phyag rgya de rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad kyis gang la btab pa la las byas la bstan na de khyed rnams kyis thong shig /khyed

cag srog dang bral la re/ de nas de rnams de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol te slar dong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

rnams kyis bdag sgrib pa sbyang du gsal ba dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du nyid kyi thugs ka nas byung na de nas bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song de rnams

thams cad ji ltar bgyi bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM k+Sha pa ya badzra swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ ngu 'bod la sogs pa ngan song gi 'gro ba'i 'khor

lo thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba a pA ya A kaR+Sha Na bi sho d+ha na badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ de nas de smras ma thag tu ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po la sogs pa ngan song na gnas pa rnams ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi

rol du bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ngan song gi sar ltung ba'i sems can thams cad la bos nas 'di skad gsungs so/ /kye+e bzod ldan rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang dam

tshig dang sdom pa dang ngan song thams cad las thar ba'i phyag rgya dang snying po zung shig /de nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba 'di las bskyab par

gsol/ bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes ngan song thams cad 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /o~M` badzra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya sarba a pA

ya b+han+d+ha nA ni pra mok+Sha ya sarbA pa ya ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba satwa~M sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ya trAT/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /gung mo gnyis ga sbyar nas su/ /tha ma bzhi ni rtse mor sbyar/ /

sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin/ /de nas ngan song gsum gyi 'khor lo na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya de mthong nas ngan song thams cad las shi 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das rnam

par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes so/ /ngan song de rnams ni rgya mtsho chen por bor ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ma

pa lus pa med pa'i skyabs dang phan pa dang bde ba thams cad myong bar bgyi ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa dam pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar du tshol cig par bdag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal na/ mi de rnams ji ltar bgyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsol cig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu

'dus nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /o~M` badzra pA Ni ma hA maN+Da la~M pra be sha ya sarba duSh+Ta ro dran+ni ba ra ya pra be bya pra ma sha ya tru r-i dr-iSh+Ta par+yA pa~M ma~M` bi sho d+ha yanA sha ya bi nA sha ya ha ha ha ha hU~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyis bka' stsal pa'i tshig de thos nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa bskyabs pa dang phan pa dang bde ba thams cad dang dngos grub dam pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i

'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /

dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba yi/ /dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/ /rdo rje dam tshig las byung ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'byin byed pa/ /ma rungs thams cad

rnam par 'jig /de la sngags 'dis srad bu bre bar bya'o/ /oM badzra sa ma ya s+'u trA~M mA ti kra ma ho/ /gru bzhir bya zhing sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis kyang rab tu brgyan/ /srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ /dar dang phreng bas shin du brgyan/ /

dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa rnams dang / /sgo yi mu khyud nang rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen brgyan bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim srad bu bre/ /shes rab can gyis de nang du/ /gru bzhi la ni sgo bzhi pa/ /ka ba brgyad dang rta babs bcas/ /

rdo rje ka ba'i gnas mchog tu/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa ste/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor srad bu bre/ /srad bu bres par mtshon gyis dgang / /de la mtshon la bzlas pa ni 'di'o/ /o~M` badzra tsit+t+ra sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas dbus su 'dug nas

ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhag pas/ /rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po/ /yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya/ /de la sgo rnams dbye ba'i sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzro t+g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya hU~M/ gser ram dngul las byas pa 'am/ /

sa yang rung ste legs bris pa'i/ /pha gu gru bzhir byas pa'i steng / /sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra dz+wa la ag+ne pra dIp+ta A kaR+Sha ya sarba

ta thA ga tA nA~M ma hA badzra sa ma ye hU~M dzaH/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni/ /'bar bar bskor bas gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin rin chen 'od skor ba/ /pad ma rdo rje kun de bzhin/ /de nas rdo rje dam tshig phyag rgya rnams dgod pa'i snying po 'di

yin no/ /oM satwa badzrA dz+wA la mA la hU~M phaT/ oM rat+na badzrI dz+wA la mA la hU~M trA~M/ oM d+harma badzrI dz+wA la mA la hU~M hrIH/ oM karma badzrA dz+wA la mA la hU~M aH/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar de bzhin du/ /shes pas cho ga bzhin

bri ba/ /rdo rje hU~M zhes dkyil 'khor ro/ /de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma hU~M/ de bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la yang srad bu la brgal te thams

cad du 'gro bar bya'o/ /de nas 'di'i snying po bshad do/ /yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni/ /rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung / /phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang ni/ /dam tshig 'gal bar de mi 'gyur/ /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /

phyag na rdo rje bri ba ni/ /uta pal che sngo 'tsher ba'i mdog /rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bar 'dus/ /mche ba cung zad phyung ba'i zhal/ /khro dang bcas par 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs pa ste/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas

dkris pa'i 'od/ /zhabs g.yon pa yi thil gyis ni/ /dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya/ /zhabs g.yas pa yis u ma yi/ /nu ma'i steng du mnan par bri/ /de'i snying po ni 'di yin no/ /hU~M/ de yi phyogs ni thams

cad du/ /rdo rje khro bo bzhag pa ni/ /khros pas mche ba phyung ba ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pa'i 'od/ /de nas de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra satwa kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ o~M` badzra kro d+ha A be sha ya hU~M` phaT/ o~M`

badzra karma kro d+ha rA ga ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha sA d+hu sA d+hu hU~M` phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /der ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ /rdo rje khro bos bskor bar bri/ /de nas de rnams

kyi snying po 'di bshad do/ /tra~M oM badzra b+h+r-i ku TI kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hU~M` phaT/ oM badzra sUr+ya ma hA dz+wa la mA la kro d+ha dz+wa la ya sarba~M hU~M phaT/ o~M` badzra kro d+ha ke tu de hi hU~M` phaT/ o~M` badzra hA sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum

par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /rdo rje sde ni bri bar bya/ /khro bo bdag nyid chen por bskor/ de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do/ /hrIHoM badzra d+harma kro d+ha bi nA sha ya bi sho d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ o~M` badzra tIk+Sh+Na kro d+ha ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/

o~M` badzra he tu kro d+ha pra be sha ya maN+Da le sarba~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha b+hA Sha ba ta ba ta hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /rdo rje dbab pa bri bya ba/ /rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /de la

de rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad do/ /aH/ hU~M badzra karma hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA da khA da hU~M phaT/ o~M` badzra kro d+ha muSh+Ti sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnams su/ /rdo rje dbyings

kyi tshul bzhin du/ /ji ltar go rim bzhin du ni/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa kun bri'o/ /de nas de dag gi snying po'i phyag rgya 'di yin no/ /oM badzra rA s+ye rA ga ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M phaT/ o~M` badzra gI ta ga da ga da

hU~M phaT oM badzri nri t+ye ba shi ku ru hU~M` phaT dkyil 'khor dam pa'i phyi rol du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /de yi grwa rnams nyid du ni/ /mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi rnams bzhag de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di/

rnams so/ /oM badzra d+hU pa pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M` phaT o~M` badzra puSh+pa pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT oM badzra A lo ke pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT o~M` badzra gan+d+he pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus

su ni/ /lcags kyu la sogs bzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams su/ /phyi yi rdo rje'i rigs rnams so/ /de nas de dag gi snying po rnams bshad do/ /o~M` badzra a~M ku sha ma hA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya sarba

sa ma ya~M hU~M dzaH/ oM badzra pA sha ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha ya sarba sa ma ya hU~M` hU~M`/ oM badzra s+pho Ta ma hA kro d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sarba sa ma ya hU~M ba~M oM badzra A be sha ma hA kro d+ha A be sha ya sarba sa ma ye hU~M aH/ de nas 'dir 'jig

rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad do/ /de la dang po nyid du rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo te rin+ti rI'i phyag rgya bcings te zhugs shig zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad la gsol ba btab ste bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i dbang du mchis te/ tshar gcad pa'i rigs pa rnams ni tshar gcad do/ /bsdu ba'i rigs pa rnams ni bsdu ba ni ji ltar

bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas nas/ rdo rje khro bo ti rin+ti rI'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag ste/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas nas yang dam tshig

thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcings shig dang des na thams cad byon par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi byas nas bdug pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /de nas cho ga 'dis rdo rje slob ma chug cig rdo rje

slob dpon rang gis rdo rje khro bo te rin+ta rI'i phyag rgya bcings te/ slob ma yang snying po 'di dag 'ching du chug cig /o~M` gr-ih+Na badzra sa ma ya hU~M ba~M/ de nas gos sngon po bgos la mgo la gtsug tor sngon pos bcings te/ dar sngon

pos gdong dkris la sngags 'dis chug cig /oM badzra sa ma ya~M pra be shA me/ de nas bcug ste rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang snying po 'dis de la dbab par gyis shig /oM badzra A be sha AH/ de nas babs nas de ltar babs

pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ /'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar thams cad kyang skad cig gis shes so/ /gnod pa yang med par gyur to/ /de thams cad kyis mi tshugs par

gyur to/ /hU~M zhes bya bas kyang sems can thams cad tshar gcad pa dang phan bdags par byed nus par gyur to/ /phyag na rdo rje yang rtag tu de'i dgos pa thams cad bsgrub bo/ /de nas mna'i snying po byin cig /de nas gdong g.yogs

pa dkrol te dkyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin du ston cig /dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag las rnam par rgyal bar nus par gyur to/ /

hU~M zhes bya bas lha chen po la sogs pa lha thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba dang mnan pa nus par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das

byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rtag tu 'brang zhing rang gi dngos grub sbyin par mdzad/ de nas de la rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ rang gi mtshan ma rdo rje rnon po ji lta ba bzhin du sngags 'dis lag pa gnyis su sbyin no/ /

oM badzra pA Ni badzra karma kA rod b+ha ba/ de nas sngags 'dis rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur to/ /badzra kro d+ha twa~M a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badzra nA ma/ de nas gang la ming gang btags pa de la kye+e zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar

bar bya'o/ /de nas ye shes rnams bskyed de/ /rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/ /'bar ba mang po'i 'od can gyi/ /rdo rje'i dbyibs ni snying gar bsam/ /skye bo kun la 'bebs par byed/ /rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/ /dpral bar rdo rje

rin chen yang / /de bzhin du ni bsam byas nas/ /sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ /rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od/ /rdo rje pad ma mgul du bsam/ /sems can thams cad rlag par byed/ /rdo

rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od/ /rdo rje thams cad spyi bor bzhag /skye bo de dag thams cad srung / /de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /hU~M sarba badzra kro d+ha A be sha

aH/ ho rat+na badzra kro d+ha b+hA Sha mA na ya tra~M hU~M/ badzra d+harma kro d+ha nA sha ya phaT/ hU~M karma badzra kro d+ha rak+Sha/ de nas lha rnams dgug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab bo/ /hU~M zhes bya ba bcings nas ni/ /lag pa rdo rje lcags kyur

bsam/ /khros nas mdzub mo bskul ba ni/ /lha rnams dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /rang gi rkang mthil dbus su ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bris nas su/ /de nyid kyis n-i rtag mnan na/ /lha rnams nges pa nyid du dgug / /rdo rje
lcags kyu nyid phyag rgya/ /legs par phye ste bzhag nas su/ /bskul nas u ma la sogs pa/ /bud med thams cad 'gugs par byed/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bzhag pa ni/ /mdzub mo nyid du de bzhin de/ /des

mnan lha yi gang yin pa/ /de ni 'gugs pa'i dam pa'o/ /de dag g-i snying po ni 'di yin no/ /o~M` badzra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra karma a~M ku sha kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha daN+Da A gra A

kaR+Sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa~M gats+tsha A kaR+Sha ya mi te badzra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M phaT/ de nas phyag rgya rnam bzhi'i ye shes bslab bo/ /brkyang zhing bskum par gnas pa ni/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul

gyis ni/ /hU~M tsam gyis kyang skad cig gis/ /skye bo thams cad 'bebs par byed/ /rdo rje dag ni legs par smras/ /hU~M zhes bya ba bzhi ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yis/ /thams cad kyang ni nges par 'gugs/ /

rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/ /rdo rje khro bo'i lha mchog gis/ /skye bo thams cad gsod byed cing / /rdo rje hU~M gi rnal 'byor to/ /yid kyis lus la go bgo ba/ /bdag gam pha rol rnams la ste/ /go cha chen po'i sbyor bas

ni/ /skye bo de dag thams cad bsrung / /de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha kA ya A be sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra bi d+yot+ta ma ma hA kro d+ha A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzra hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ha na da ha pa tsa ba nI

sha ya hU~M ka re na pA ta ya badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ oM ma no dri D+ha badzra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ de nas sems can thams cad rgyas btab pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes dang / rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/ /badzra hU~M zhes bzlas

pa yis / /gang dang gang la kun zhugs pa/ /phyag rgyas btab par de gyur to/ /sgra chen du ni brjod par bya/ Tak+ki hU~M phaT/ khros nas lan gcig gang la smras/ /rdo rje 'bar bas de mngon bkug /rdo rje khro bo'i ting

'dzin cing / /rdo rje'i lta bas bltas pa yi/ /sems can gang dang gang yin pa/ /de dang de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bsod snyom yid la bsams nas su/ /snying gar rdo rje bsgom par byed/ /hU~M zhes bya ba yid kyis su/ /rang

gi rgyas ni 'debs par dgongs/ /sems can gang la gang gis su/ /yid kyi rgyas ni 'debs pa 'di/ /phyag rgya 'dis ni shin du yang / /las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag go/ /

Tak+ki a/ Tak+ki dza/ Tak+ki hU~M`/ Tak+ki ha~M/ phyag rgya re res kyang las bzhi rnams la phyag rgya'i snying po bzhis sbyar ro/ /de nas gsang ba khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /yan lag kun gyis 'khyud nas ni/ /

hU~M zhes yul la sbyar bya ba/ /dbang po gnyis ni sprad byas nas/ /de yi srog ni ma rung 'gyur/ /hU~M zhes bya bar ldan pa yis/ /mchu sprad sos ni mchu bzung nas/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sprad pa/ /gang yin de ni mngon sum

'gyur/ /hU~M zhes sbyor ba gang yin pa/ /de ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni sprad gyur na/ /gang yin de ni sdug bsngal 'thob/ /hU~M zhes bya ba gang sbyor zhing / /dbang po gnyis ni sprad nas kyang / /yan lag kun gyis

btsir gyur na/ /de yi lus ni bsrungs par 'gyur/ /de des de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag go/ /hU~M a/ hU~M dza/ hU~M ho/ hU~M ha~M/ he/ de nas 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig de nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes

bslab bo/ /gang gis sems can phan pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas na/ /de ni sangs rgyas 'thob par 'gyur/ /dbang phyug dang ni u ma yang / /sa la bris te de ltar gnan/ /

ji ltar bris pa'i go rim bzhin/ /sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /de ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /de ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba/ /rdo rje hU~M dang 'dra ba yi/ /dngos grub rdzu 'phrul myur du 'grub/ /ji ltar ri

mor bris pa bzhin/ /'bar bas bskor ba'i dbus bzhugs pa/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis/ /sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /de nas de rnams las bshad de/ /rdo rje las ni bla na med/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran

grub pas/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob bo/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal bcings na/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal 'gyur/ /rdo rje tshe dang kun du 'gro/ /rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba 'dra/ /rdo rje dbang gis rgyal por
'gyur/ /chos bzang ldan pas 'jig rten dbang / /las kyi rdo rje khro bo che/ /rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ /sems dpa' khro bor rab tu brtan/ /khro bo'i lcags kyus yang dag 'gugs/ /khro bo chags pas

chags par byed/ /khro bo legs pas dga' ba ster/ /khro gnyer gyis kun ma rungs byed/ /khro bo nyi mas gzi brjid mchog /dpal gyi khro bo don rnams bsdud/ /ha ha god pas bdud byed do/ /chos kyi khro bos chos

rnams bdud/ /rdo rje ral gris gcod pa ste/ /rgyu yi khro bo sdug bsngal 'phrog /khro bo smra bas tshig 'phrog go/ /las kyi khro bo las rab ste/ /srung ba yis ni bsrung bar byed/ /khro bo gnod sbyin dgra yang za/ /khro bo'i khu tshur

dngos grub ste/ /de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje gnyis su gyur pa ste/ /dam tshig mchog tu grags pa yin/ /de dag bcing ba bshad par bya/ /khro bo'i bcing ba bla na med/ /lag ngar rdo rjer byas
nas ni/ /mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing bar bya/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/ /de bzhin mdzub mo ngos sbyar te/ /nor bu 'dra bar rab tu dgug /gung mo mnyam

bsgreng pad mar bya/ /gung mo mdzub mo gnyis kas bsdigs/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka rdo rjer bya/ /g.yas pa lcags kyur dgug par bya/ /de nyid hU~M zhes bya bar mdud/ /legs pa sbyin par de bzhin te/ /mdzub gnyis
dpral ba'i gnyar mar bzhag /snying gar mdzub mos nyi mar bskor/ /lag pa brkyang ste spyi bor bzhag /mdzub mo kha nas rgod ltar bya/ /mdzub mo'i sen mo sbyar ba ste/ /g.yas pas ral gri bcings pa'o/ /

gung mdzub mnyam bsgreng 'khor lo yi/ /kha yi nang nas dbyung ba dang / /mdzub mo gung mo rdo rjer bya/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni mche ba che/ /mdzub mo bkug pa rdo rjer bcings/ /rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs pa/ /sems ma'i

phyag rgyas de nyid hU~M`/ /zhes dbye chos kyi phyag rgya de/ /hU~M` zhes bya bar lhan cig go/ /de nas rdo rje'i dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/ /hU~M` ni sangs rgyas rdo rje yi/ /tA~M` ni rdo rje snying po yi/ /hrI ni rdo rje sde yi'o/ /

a ni rdo rje thams cad kyi hU~M` he/ tra~M`/ ta~M`/ hi hi de ha/ d+hi ka d+hi hU~M`/ grA/ kri ba~M` dr-i a/ rdo rje khro bo mang po yi/ /chos kyi phyag rgya rab 'grub pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni chen

po yi/ /las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na/ /rdo rje 'gying la sogs tshul gyis/ /khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis su bshad/ /gang dang gang gi phyag rgya rnams/ /las kyi phyogs ni gang du ba/ /de dang der ni bsgyur nas kyang / /phyag

rgya de ni sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga'o/ /de nas 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i spyi'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje

mdzub mo dam tshig gi/ rdo rje hU~M zhes sngags kyi ste/ /dngos grub thams cad yud kyis 'thob/ /mthe'u chung gnyi ka lcags kyur bcing / /rdo rje gnyi ka'i bla 'og tu/ /dam tshig lcags kyu'i phyag rgya de/ /skad cig
gis ni thams cad 'gugs/ /rig pa dam pa thams cad ky-i/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad/ /thams cad kyang ni gnod pa ste/ /de bzhin las rnams thams cad byed/ /rdo rje mdzub sor gnyis legs

par/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas mnyam nas ni/ /shi ba thams cad slong ba ste/ /rdo rje slong ba zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje gnyis ka legs par ni/ /rdo rje bcing bas bcings nas su/ /bzlog ste gtsug tu bzhag pa ni/ /tshe dang
nad med 'phel ba'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /mthe bo mnyam nas nang du gzhug /mdzub mo dam por bkug nas su/ /bcug pa rkang par 'gugs pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal bcings nas su/ /
gang gi gzugs la rkang g.yon pas/ /legs par mnan pa'i sems can de/ /zla ba phyed kyis grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /gcig la gcig ni brdabs na ni/ /sems can gang gi
lus la ni/ /babs na de yang rdob par byed/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /bdag gam pha rol cho gar bya/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis bcings byas na/ /nges pa nyid du srung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje mthil du

bcings nas kyang / /yid kyis khros nas dgab bya ba/ /mthe bo rdo rje dam po ste/ /rdo rje rigs chen grub par 'gyur/ /sems dpa' rdo rje srar bya ste/ /mthe bo gnyis kas gung mo mnan/ /mthe'u chung rdo rje rtse mo ni/ /

rnon por dam tshig 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /mdzub mo gnyis bkug bcings nas su/ /gcu zhing phyir gcu byas pa ni/ /lha dgug pa yi dam pa yin/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /mdzub mo gnyis

bkug rab tu mnan/ /mthe bo gnyis ka sbyar ba yis/ /dbus su bcing ba bar snang gi'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyi ga las/ /mthe'u chung gnyi ka bcings nas su/ /rgyab sbyor mdzub mo gnyis sbrel te/ /bsgyur ba mkha' la spyod

pa'i 'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa bsdams nas su/ /rdo rje srung bas bcing bar bya/ /de ni sa pa'i dam tshig ste/ /thams cad byed pas 'da' bar dka'/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/ /mthe'u

chung 'khyud cing rtag tu gtogs/ /de ni sa 'og 'gugs pa'o/ /rdo rje bcings pas sbrel ba ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka dam po ste'o/ /gung mo mthe bo rdo rjer ni/ /gdug pa'i phyag rgya 'joms pa'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis

bcings te/ /mnyam bzhag ste ni snying gar bzhag /khro bo khu tshur gyis btsir ba/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'jig pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas bzung / /rab tu khros nas drag

gtogs na/ /ri rab kyang ni lhung bar byed/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus bzung / /rab tu khros shing bkug pa yis/ /gdon rnams kun la dbang du byed/ /rdo rje bcing ba byas

nas su/ /lag ngar snying gar shin du bsdams/ /rdo rje mdzub mos nyid mchan khung / /brud pa yis ni snying sbyin no/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yis/ /mthe bong gnyis kyi drung du ni/ /yid kyis khros nas btsir ba bya/ /

rims la sogs dgug dam pa'o/ /rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te mdzub mo gnyi ga bkug nas su/ /mthe bo rab tu mnyam sbyar bas/ /mnan pa de ni sdig 'phrog pa'o/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis nang du/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni sbas

nas kyang / /legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni/ /lhung ba slong ba'i dam pa'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /gung mo gnyis ka ngos sbyar te/ /tha ma bzhi yi ngos sprad pa/ /skad cig tu ni sdig 'dral lo/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bzung nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dang por srad bu bre/ /srad bu bres la phyi nas ni/ /srad bu ji bzhin bre ba bshad/ /

rdo rje phyag rgya gnyi ga yis/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mor rab sbyar ba/ /byas nas mtshon rnams thams cad la/ /'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya/ /rdo rje'i mdzub mos legs par ni/ /sbyar la rkan te bsdams nas su/ /rab

tu khros nas dbye ba ni/ /sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin no/ /de nas rdo rje rigs rnams kyi phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa bshad do/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi tshul byas te/ /khro bo yi ni skad 'byin cing / /khro ba'i blta bas bltas na ni/ /
las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga

rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // bam po lnga pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang

gi rig pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba badzri Ni/ badzra mA te A na ya/ sarba badzra sat+t+yen hU~M dza/ de nas de gsungs pa tsam gyis phyag rgya rdo rje'i thugs ka nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid phyag na rdo rje dra

ba bdag gis lus thams cad 'bar ba'i sgo nas/ rdo rje khro bo gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don bsgrubs

nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo gsang ba sba ba'i phyir/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par

rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i ye shes bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

bde ba'i phyir/ /btsun mo nyid du gyur pa yin hrIH/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rje rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje'i dkyil

'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /khro bo'i gsang ba zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi gnas rnams su/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya

gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni sangs rgyas sku rnams bzhag par bya/ /sangs rgyas khro bo dam tshig kyang / /ji bzhin par ni mkhas pas bri/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil

'khor der/ /dbus su mdung rtse mchur bris la / /rdo rje rab tu gzhag bya zhing / /'od 'bar dbus su bri bar bya/ /de yi go rim ji bzhin te/ /rdo rje rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /mda' dang dga' ba de bzhin no/ /rdo rje shugs

kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis pa yang / /'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje rin chen bri bar bya/ /khro gnyer dbus su rdo rje bri/ /de bzhin rdo rje nyi rgyal mtshan/ /de bzhin so yi phreng ba de'i/ /

dngos su rdo rje bri bar bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa yang / /pad ma'i dbus su gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje pad ma lha rdzas bri/ /'bar ba'i dbus su pad ma bri/ /ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin no/ /rdo rje'i

lce yang tshul bzhin du/ /rtag tu de yi phyogs su gzhag /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par yang / /rdo rje bsnyal la rdo rje bri/ /rdo rje'i 'od ni chen pos bskor/ /de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /

'bar ba kun gyis dkrigs pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje thams cad go cha mchog /rdo rje mche ba khu tshur mchog /grwa dang phyi yi gnas rnams la/ /tshul bzhin du ni bri bar bya/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya rig pa mdor bsdu na/ dz+hiH/

oM badzra kro d+he sa ma ye dz+hiH/ oM badzra kro d+he ro Sha a~M` gu sha A na ya sarba na dz+hiH/ oM badzra ro She kA ma/ badzri Ni ba sham+me A na ya hi dz+hiH/ oM badzra duSh+Ta kro d+he to Sha ya sarba na dz+hiH/ rdo rje dz+hiHzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dziH/ oM badzra

b+h+r-i ku TI kro d+he ha ra sarba aR+tha na dziH/ oM badzra dz+wA la mA lA pra be ma hA kro d+ha ag+ni dz+wA la ya sarba na ra bi ro She dziH/ oM badzra d+h+wa dza a gr-i ke y+'u ra ma hA kro d+he de hi me sarba aR+tha na dziH/ oM badzra aT+Ta hA sa ni hA sa hA sa aT+TA

T+Te hA se na mA ra ya dziH/ rdo rje dziHzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor to/ diH/ oM badzra shud+d+ha kro d+he ha na ha na mA ra ya duSh+Ta na diH/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na kro d+he ts+tshin+da/ badzra ko She na/ sarba ni diH/ oM badzra he tu ma hA kro d+he pra be sha tsakra pra be sha ya sarba na diH/ oM badzra

dzi hA ma hA kro d+he ba she ba tsa muny+tsa diH/ rdo rje diHzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /hIH/ oM badzra sarba na mu khe karma badzra Ni ma hA kro d+he ku ru ku ru sarba na hIH/ oM badzra ka ba tsa kro d+he rak+Sha ma ma hiH/ oM badzra tsaN+Da kro d+he ma hA yak+Shi

ni badzra da~MSh+T+rA kA rA la b+hISha ne pa ya hiH/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+he muSh+Ti ban+d+ha hiH/ rdo rje hiHzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnams su/ rdo rje gar la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rig pa'i snying po

rnams gsungs pa/ oM badzra hU~M kho/ badzra hU~M g+hu~M/ badzra hU~M te/ badzre hU~M twa~M/ phyi rol gyi grwa rnams su sil snyan gyi mchod pa'i snying po rnams brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra tri te/ badzra Da~M` Da/ badzra d+hA tu/ badzra Dau m+mu d+ha/ de nas sgo ba'i mchod

pa'i snying po rnams gsungs pa/ badzra dzaHdzaH/ badzra hU~M hU~M/ badzra ba~M ba~M/ badzra aHaH/ de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di bshad do/ /de nas de la thog ma nyid du re zhig 'jig

rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i tshig bzhin du gzhug ste/ rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang nye ba'i phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya

rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang ba mchod pa'i phyir gar gyis mchod par bya'o/ /de la gar dang gar gyi lan dang nye ba'i gar dang ye shes kyi gar rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/ /de la dang po nyid du

rdo rje dbyings su bsdus pa'i snying pos rdo rje glu len cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pas mchod pa byas nas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya drag tu gtog par bya'o/ /de nas ji snyed

bzhugs pa rnams phyag rgya rnams kyis yang dag par dbab par bya'o/ /rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgyar ni/ /snying gar shin du bcing bar bya/ /de nas gar gyi
