cho ga yi/ /rdo rje khro bo lcags kyu yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang ngo / /rdo rje mda' ni 'phang ba bya/ /rdo rje mda' ni 'phangs nas kyang / /rdo rje dga' bas bsgrub par bya/ /phyag rgya cho ga bzhin bkrol te/ /thal

mo brdab cing bcing bar bya/ /mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni/ /phyag na rdo rje mnyes par bya/ /mnyes nas dgos pa thams cad ni/ /'dod bzhin skad cig nyid kyis 'grub/ /de la gar gyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /

sad+h+ya badzra/ A na ya badzra/ rA ga ya badzra/ sA d+hu badzra/ de'i 'og tu lan gyi gar gyi mchod pa bya ste/ de bzhin gar gyi g.yon pa ni/ /khu tshur g.yas pas bzung nas ni/ /bsgyur zhing mdzub mo'i ngos kyis ni/ /dpral ba

nyid la gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin gar byed nyi ma yang / /bskor nas yang dag dgug par bya/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan bslang nas ni/ /rdo rje ha ha zhes rgod cing / /mchod pa 'di ni cho ga yis/ /rgyal po la sogs mi kun kyang / /

dbang dang rab kyi gzi brjid dang / /sbyin dang dgos pas mnyes par byed/ /de la de rnams ni lan phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /a hi badzra dz+wA la ya badzra/ da hi badzra hA sa hA sa badzra/ de bzhin gar kyang dkrol
nas ni/ /pad ma kha 'bus sbyar ba yi/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo snying gar gzhag /bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya/ /de bzhin gar byed rdo rje yis/ /ral gris bgegs ni gcod ltar bya/ /mgal me'i 'khor

lo bskor ba yis/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du bskor/ /rdo rje tshig tu glu len ltar/ /phyag na rdo rje mchod par bya/ /mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis/ /thams cad nges pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de la 'di rnams ni

nye ba'i/ /phyag rgya'i snying po rnams yin no/ /kA ma ya badzra/ ts+tshin+da ya badzra/ brA ya badzra/ bru hi badzra/ rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub yang dag /rkan nas rtse mo sbyar nas kyang / /bsgyur te de nas gtsug tor du/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo

gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis ni/ /lus kun mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ /gar gyi cho gas bstan par bya/ /snying gar rab tu gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin gar gyi cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje bsrung ba bcing bar bya/ /

rdo rje mche ba bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje'i bcing bas mnan par bya/ /mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis/ /las rnams kun kyang nus par 'gyur/ /mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni/ /cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya bkrol/ /de dag gi

snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /nr-i t+ya badzra/ rak+Sha badzra/ khA da badzra/ ban+da badzra/ de nas khro bo'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po rdo rje gsang ba'i lag gnyis kyis/ /khros pa'i yid kyis drag gtog bya/ /skye bo gang gi ming smos

pa/ /de yi snying po 'gas par 'gyur/ /ma mchu so yis bzung nas su/ /gang gi ming smos gzir ba ni/ /de yi mgo yang myur 'gas te/ /gang gi bka' las 'das pa'i 'o/ /khro bo khro chen lta ba yi/ /mig kyang 'dzums par byed

pa ni/ /gang gi ming ni smos bltas pa/ /de yi ming ni rdol bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag la/ /bdag rang gi yang snying gar yang / /rdo rje bcings pa btsir na ni/ /de yi sems ni 'jig par byed/ /de la de dag gi snying po

rnams ni 'di yin no/ /hU~M badzra s+pho Ta thaHhU~M badzra mu ka badzra thaH/ hU~M badzra ne dra tha hU~M`/ hU~M badzra ma ne tha de nas rdo rje chen po'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ de la dang por re shig phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bshad do/ /mthe'u chung lcags

kyu bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje khro bo gzhag par bya/ /g.yon par rtse gsum rgyab tu ni/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad/ /g.yon pa mdzub mo thad kar brkyang / /de bzhin bkan pa pad ma ni/ /de bzhin du yang

bsgyur nas ni/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rjer gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje mthil du bcings byas te/ /'khros pa yis ni dga' bya zhing / /mthe boM rdo rje dam pas so/ /khro bo te r-in+ti rIr bshad/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu dgug pa nyid/ /
mdzub mo ngos ni sbyar ba'o/ /de bzhin mdzub gnyis legs sbyin pa/ /mdzub mo sprad de dpral bar gzhag /snying gar nyi ma rab tu brtan/ /mdzub mo bsnyams nas spyi bor gzhag /bsgyur nas dgod par gzhag

par bya/ /mdzub bsnyams pad ma kha 'bus bzhin/ /gnyis ka ral gri chad par 'dzin/ /mdzub gnyis 'khor lor bcings pa'o/ /mdzub mo bsnyams te kha nas dbyung / /mdzub mo legs par brkyang ba dang / /mdzub mos mgul

du bcing bar bya/ /de gnyis kha 'gram mthe bar bzhag /khu tshur dam du bcings pa ni/ /phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /gsang ba'i khu tshur las byung

ba/ /dam tshig mchog tu rab tu grags/ /de rnams bcing ba bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje bcing ba bla na med/ /snying gar bzhag nas rtsibs logs gcu/ /mda' drang ba ni g.yon pa nas/ /snying ga nas ni dbyung bar bya/ /khro gnyer du ni bsgyur

nas ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang / /spyi bor lag pa brkyang ba dang / /bsgyur nas dgod par gzhag par bya/ /kha yi dbus su rab bzhag pa/ /mdzub mor ral gri 'dabs pa 'dra/ /'khor lo bskor ba bston pa dang / /kha nas

rab tu 'byin pa ste/ /spyi bor lus mchog dkyil 'khor ro/ /dpung pa snying ga rtsibs logs rnams/ /rdo rje bsrung ba de bzhin bya/ /mche ba'i gnas su gzhag pa dang / /khu tshur dam du bsdams pa'o/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor phyag

rgya ni/ /mtshan ma'i go rim bzhin du bcing / /dam tshig rdo rje bcings pa las/ /de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur gzhag /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/ /phaTaHshaTaHmaTaHsaTaHraTaHhaTaHd+hiTaHhaTaH

paD+TaHtaD+TaHkaD+TaHd+haD+TaHkuTiHriTaHkha TaHpaTaH/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas te/ /gnas gang yin par gzhag

par bya/ /khro bo'i lta ba khro dang ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las khro bo gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// //
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rigs pa

dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+hA hU~M phaT/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM suk+Sh+ma badzra

kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra rat+na kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub

sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra pad ma kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra kaR+ma kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs

bskyed pa'i phyir/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du 'khod de/ de rnams kyi snying po gsungs pa/ oM badzra satwa s+'uk+Sh+ma dz+nyA na kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/ oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra a~M gu sha A kaR+Sha ya ma hA kro d+hA hU~M phaT/ oM badzra

s+'uk+Sh+ma rA ga kro d+hA a nu rA ga ya ti bi kra ma hU~M phaT/ oM badzra s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra puSh+TiM kro d+hA hU~M phaT/ oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra b+h+ra ku TI kro d+hA ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/ oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra dz+wA la maN+Da la kro d+hA sUr+ya dz+wA la hU~M phaT/ oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra tsakra kro d+hA sarba

ar+tha mA me pra yats+tsha shrI kra ma hU~M phaT/ oM badzra s+'uk+Sh+ma hA sa kro d+hA ma hAT+Ta T+Ta hA sa/ ha ha ha ha hU~M phaT/ oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra d+harma badzra kro d+hA ya hU~M phaT/ oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra ts+tshe da kro d+h-i ts+tshin+da b+hin+da hU~M phaT/ oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+he ma hA tsakra ts+tshin+da pa

tA ya shrI pra be sha ya hr-i da ya~M b+hin+da hU~M phaT/ oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra hU~M kA ra ha na tA ya wA ka ma tren+na hU~M phaT/ oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra karma kro d+ha sarba karma kA ro da b+ha ba/ sarba kA ra ya sa d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra s+'uk+Sh+ma ka ba tsa kro d+hA rak+Sha rak+Sha

hU~M phaT/ oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra yak+Sha kro d+hA ha na b+ha ya sarba duSh+Ti ny+tsit+ta mA tre badzra da~MSh+TA hU~M phaT/ oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra muSh+Ti kro d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor

gsungs pa/ de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /khro bo'i ye shes zhes kyang bshad/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu

bre/ /de yi dbus su sangs rgyas bri/ /ye shes rdo rje'i dbus chud pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/ /sangs rgyas de nyid kun bris shig /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams su yang / /'jig

rten gsum las rnam rgyal sogs/ /rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya/ /de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun du/ /rdo rje khro bo'i cho ga bzhin/ /de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa

rgyas pa bshad do/ /de la dang po nyid du re shig bcug nas bsgo ba ni/ de ring khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo nyid du bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur gyis de legs par nan tan

gyis shig /sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde ba dang dam pa grub pa thob pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir gyi bar du rdo

rje khro bos sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir bdud byed na ma rungs pa thams cad lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/ de skad bsgo nas gdong g.yogs dkrol te/ de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad

bstan nas rdo rje ci lta ba bzhin du lag pa gnyis su byin no/ /de nas rdo rje khro bo'i ye shes phra mo rnams slobs shig /rdo rje hU~M gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje phra mo bstan byas la/ /hU~M zhes bya ba gang sbyar ba/ /de yi

srog ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /rdo rje phra mo bstan byas te/ /cho ga bzhin du mched pa ni/ /ji srid bar du mched pa des/ /de srid kyi ni dgra 'di 'jig /rdo rje hU~M gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ /khro bor ldan pa ji

srid mched/ /de snyed thams cad ma rungs byed/ /de bzhin de yi bsdu ba yang / /rnal 'byor can gyis 'dod na yang / /ma lus par ni thams cad la/ /slar yang 'tsho ba sbyin par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /hU~M

hU~M nA sha ya badzra hU~M bi nA sha ya sarba suk+Sh+ma badzra pra t+ya nA ya shI b+h+ra~M hU~M/ sems can gang gi dgra la ni/ /lhan cig gyur pa cher bstan pa/ /byams pa mchod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /dgra bo sbro bas gzhig par bya/ dgra bo spro ba'i

rnal 'byor gyis/ /gang yang rung ba'i snying rje can/ /snying rje rnal 'byor de yis ni/ /gdug pa thams cad nges 'jig go/ chos sam yang na chos min pa/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/ /de ltar bsgoms na sems

can la/ /hU~M zhes bya bas 'jig par byed/ /gdul bar dka' ba'i sems can gang / /sangs rgyas byang chub snod min pa/ /de nas yang dag bshad pa'i phyir/ /hU~M zhes bya bas gzhig par bya/ /de la de rnams kyi snying po rnams

ni 'di dag yin no/ /b+hai ra badzre kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ hU~M b-i shud d+ha badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM bi sho d+ha na badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ni bris nas kyang / /yid kyis kyang ni gang su yi/ /khyim gyi dbus su ltung bsams na/ /de yi rigs

de 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bzhin phra ba'i cho ga yis/ /snying gar rdo rje bsgoms nas kyang / /byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs/ /ltung na rigs ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen po/ /bsgoms

na gang du lhung ba de'i/ /snang srid nyes pa sna tshogs kyis/ /btsun mor bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgoms nas ni/ /snang ba gang la ltung ba ni/ /de yi snang srid nges

par 'jig /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /hU~M badzra pra ba ta/ hU~M bo d+hi satwa pra ba ta/ hU~M badzra d+ha ra pra ba ta/ hU~M bud+d+ha pra ba ta/ rdo rje phra mo rab sbyar bas/ /zla ba'i gzugs la bdag rang nyid/ /bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid

yang / /gang du lhung ba der ltung 'gyur/ /zla ba rdo rje bdag rang nyid/ /bsgoms nas su ni bdag rang yang / /rab tu khros nas gar ltung ba/ /de yi rigs ni mod la ltung / /bdag rang phyag na rdo rjer ni/ /bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid

yang / /gang du ltung ba de yi yul/ /ring por mi thogs 'jig par 'gyur/ /bdag rang sangs rgyas gzugs nyid du/ /bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid yang / /gang du ltung ba de yi ni/ /snang srid ring por mi thogs 'jig /de la

de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yin no/ /bo d+hA gra pra tu ya hU~M/ satwa badzra pra ba ta ya hU~M/ badzra satwa pra ba ta hU~M/ bud+d+ha pra ba ta ya hU~M/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya ye shes bslab bo/ /rdo rje khro bor snyoms

zhugs la/ /rang gi lus kyis yongs bskor ba/ /rdo rje hU~M las 'khyud nas ni/ /gang gi ming smos de 'chi'o/ /rdo rje phra mo snyoms zhugs la/ /sna nas phra ba thang gcig min/ /dbugs dang hU~M zhes bya tshul gyis/ /'jig rten

gsum yang ltung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ /khros nas rdo rje lta ba yis/ /bltas pas su ni ldongs par 'gyur/ /yang na 'chi ba ru ni 'gyur/ /bu ga nas ni zhugs nas ni/ /yid kyis gang yang rung ba yi/ /

snying drangs pas ni de yis ni/ /rang ngam 'di yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po rnams gsungs pa/ hU~M badzra ba li ta kro d+ha mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra shwa sa bi shra pa tA ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra drISh+Ti bi sha bi sha bi

nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ hU~M hr-i da ya kA na kro d+ha pra bi sha ka yi/ hr-i da ya ts+tshin+da b+hin+da ka ta ka ta hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /de la re zhig phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bshad de/ /rdo rje ye shes

sbyor ba yis/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje khro bor bdag nyid ni/ /bsgoms na de ma thag tu 'grub/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /ting 'dzin dam tshig ye shes

las/ /hU~M zhes bya ba gnyis dang ldan/ /ci rigs gnas su bzhag nas ni/ /bsgrub pa thams cad ster ba'i mchog /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /phaT/ shaT/ maT/

saT/ raT/ taT/ hr-iT/ haT/ praT/ traT/ daT/ b+haT/ kr-iT/ riT/ kha Ta/ baT/ zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus bshad pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /

chos kyi khu tshur gnyis byas te/ /ji ltar rigs pa'i gnas su sbyar/ /las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdu na/ /cho ga bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi
rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las

kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kaR+me shwa ra hU~M/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pu dzA karma bi d+hi bi stA ra sa ma ye trai lo kya bi dza ya ki ra sarba duSh+Ta~M sa ma ya badzri Ni hU~M/

de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya sha du sa ma ya s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dzA karma bi d+hi stA ra ya sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas

yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dzA karma bi d+hi bistA ra sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen

po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba A ba lo ka d+hA tu ma bi ma hA pU dzA karma bi d+hi bistA ra sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po

phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i lha mo rang gi snying ga nas bskyed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang dbang du bya ba dang
mnyes par bya ba dang las thams cad bsgrub pa'i dgos pa byed pa nyid du yang dag pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa
byas te/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag
na rdo rjes rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /las kyi
rdo rje zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas su ni/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya/ /sangs rgyas kyi
ni phyogs kun du/ /dam tshig mchog rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams la yang / /rdo rje gtso sogs bzhi po rnams/ /ji ltar rim bzhin

gzhag par bya/ /de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun du/ /mchod pa chen po rnams bzhag go/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bshad/ /oM badzra satwa sid d+hi dz+nyA na karma sa ma ye hU~M dza/

oM badzra A kaR+Sha Na karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M dza/ oM badzra ra ti rA ga karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M dza/ oM badzra sA d+hu karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M dza/ oM badzra b+h+r-i ku TI ba shiM ku ru hU~M/ oM badzra sUr+ya maN Da le ba shiM ku ru hU~M/ oM

badzra d+h+wa dzA gra ke yu ru re ba shiM kru~M ru hU~M/ \u0f00 badzra da ta hA se ba shiM ku ru hU~M/ \u0f00 badzra pad+ma rA ge rA ga ya hU~M/ \u0f00 badzra tIk+Sh+Na rA ge rA ga ya hU~M/ \u0f00 badzra maN+Da la rA ge rA ga ya hU~M/ \u0f00 badzra bA ka rA ge rA ga ya hU~M/

\u0f00 badzra karma sa ma ya tsa ya hU~M/ \u0f00 badzra ka ba tsa ba~M d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M/ \u0f00 yak+Shi Ni mA ra ya badzra daMSh+Ta ya b+ha n+di b+ha d+hi ya mu ga s+ya hU~M phaT/ \u0f00 badzra karma muSh+Ti sid d+hi hU~M phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir

cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du ste/ rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes rnams bskyed do/ /de la dang po nyid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /yam shing mngar po rnams kyi me/ /rab sbar rdo rje
khro bo yi/ /mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms 'jug pa/ /til bsregs pas ni sdig bsregs shing / /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /me ni rab tu sbar nas kyang / /rtag tu 'bras ni bsreg byas na/ /gdon mi za bar

khyim rgyas 'gyur/ /yam shing dngar po rnams kyis kyang / /mkhas pas rab tu me sbar te/ /dUr ba'i yal ga mar bcas pa/ /bsreg pa byas na tshe 'phel lo/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /me ni rab tu sbar byas la/ /

ku sha'i yal ga 'bru mar gyis/ /bsreg par byas na nges par bsrung / /de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnams yin no/ /oM sarba pA pa~M da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ oM badzra puSh+Ta ya swA hA/ oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ oM badzra a pra ti ha

ta badzrA ya swA hA/ te ba ru ba miM d+hi d+hu l+yag ni sa ma hri sa dzu he ta ri ga ta ya la~M ku to ma ti pU ta pa ta ye ta/ yam shing tsha bas dang por ni/ /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /me sbar nas kyang se ba yi/ /tsher ma can gyis 'gugs

par 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /khro dang ldan pas me sbar na/ /me tog dmar mang 'bras bu'ang rung / /sbyin bsregs byas na skye bo rengs/ /rnal 'byor can gyis khros nas kyang / /yam shing des ni me sbar la/ /

lcags kyi phye ma bsregs na ni/ /rdo rje bcings pa nyid du 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /mnyam par bzhag ste me bus la/ /'bras bu kha ba khros bzhin bsreg /skad cig tu ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de la de dag

gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /hU~M badzra A kaR+Sha ya swA hA/ hU~M badzra rA gA ya swA hA/ hU~M badzra ban d+hA ya swA hA/ hU~M badzra mA ra NA ya swA hA/ mkhas pas yam shing skyur po yis/ /khros nas byin za spar nas ni/ /'bras bu lo

ma skyur bsregs na/ /dbang du bya ba dam pa'o/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /mnyam par bzhag la me sbar la/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu khros bsregs na/ /'dod pa bzhin du gzugs bskyed do/ /de 'dra ba yi yam

shing gis/ /me ni rab tu sbar byas kyang / /mi snang me tog sdong bu yis/ /sbyin sreg 'dod na mi snang 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /mnyam par bzhag ste me sbar la/ /nam mkha'i lcug ma'i me tog

gis/ /sbyin sreg byas nas mkha' la 'gro/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM badzra ba sha~M gA rA ya swA hA/ oM badzra karma rU pa badzrA+e ya swA hA/ oM a d+ya sh+ya badzrA ya swA hA/ oM badzra kha brtsa ri Ni

swA hA/ khro bor mnyam bzhag yam shing ni/ /shin du kha bas me sbar la/ /badzri me tog bsregs byas na/ /rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /khro dang ldan zhing me sbar te/ /

dpa' bo gang gis phreng ba bsreg /de yang bka' ni nyan par 'gyur/ /khro bo nyid du mnyam bzhag pa/ /yam shing des ni me sbar te/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phreng ba bsreg /de yang bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag

nyid kyis ni/ /rab tu khros te me sbar la/ /chos gos bsregs pas sangs rgyas kyang / /skad cig nyid du bka' bzhin mdzad/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /hU~M badzra ba sha~M kA rA ya swA hA/ hU~M so ri ba sha~M

ka ra badzrA ya swA hA/ hU~M badzra pA Ni ba sha~M ka rA ya swA hA hU~M bud d+ha ba sha~M ka rA ya badzrA ya swA hA/ de nas gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /yid 'ong bud med lhan cig du/ /gnas shing bu gar any+dza
na/ /bcug nas bskul bar byas nas kyang / /de yis mig bskus dbang du 'gyur/ /ldong ros bu gar bcug nas ni/ /rdo rje bsdams pas de g.yogs te/ /mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi yis ni/ /dngos grub rnam pa bzhir

'gyur ro/ /go ro tsa na bu gar bcug /gsung ba'i khu tshur gyis btsir na/ /gzhag pa de ni 'bar gyur na/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gur kum bu gar bcug nas ni/ /bu gar sems dpa'i rdo rje yis/ /bkad

nas 'bar bar gyur na ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM gu h+ya ra ti badzra ba sha~M kA ra~M sid d+h+ya hU~M/ oM badzra gu h+ya sid d+h+ya hU~M/ oM gu h+ya badzra sid d+h+ya hU~M/ \u0f00 badzra d+ha ra

h+ya sid d+h+ya hU~M/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo/ /rdo rje dgongs pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdu na/ /rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje khro bor mnyam par

bzhag /hU~M zhes mdzub mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /dam tshig mchog ni 'dir de bzhin/ /chos kyi phyag rgya 'dir de bzhin/ /oM zhes dang po yi ge as/ /las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdu na/ /las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su byas/ /

thams cad grub byed dag pa ste/ /rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa

rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa

'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /hU~M badzra ma tha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'

chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /hU~M b+h+r-i ku TI badzra ra ta/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs

so/ /hU~M ma hA pad ma badzra dr-i D+ha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /hU~M badzra karma a gr-i kr-i te/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen

po phyag na rdo rjes 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i dky-il 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje

khro bo zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs bri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dkyil 'khor

'khor chen po'i tshul du dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa byas te bcug nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/ /

bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la/ /bud med lhan cig gnas nas ni/ /grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur/ /rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/ /bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la/ /chags pas bud med la bltas nas/ /

grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur/ /rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/ /bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la/ /bud med mdzes la bskrad pas 'grub/ /rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/ /bris nas chos nyid dag

brjod la/ /lhan cig 'khyud na grub kun thob/ /de la chos kyi dag pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi shud d+ha d+harma te ho/ /oM badzra bi shud d+ha driSh+Ti dza/ oM sarba bi shud d+ha mu tri hU~M/ oM sarba bi

shud d+ha kA ya ba~M ma na karma badzrI hU~M/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang zhing sba ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang / /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis ni/ /

bud med mchog ni mgu byas la/ /shin du grub pa thob par 'gyur/ /de nas 'di'i snying po brjod do/ /ho badzra kArma/ de nas ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rjes mnan pa'i rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa dam tshig gi

phyag rgya bzhi po rnams cho ga rgyas pa dang ldan par bslab ste/ phyag rgya bzhi'i tshul 'dis rdo rje sil snyan dang rnga dang brdung ba brdabs nas rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa'i snying po glu blangs te phul nas phyag rgya

dang / lan gyi phyag rgya dang nye ba'i phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o/ /de la gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa ni 'di yin no/ /rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje khro

bo'i mdzub mo gnyis/ /rdo rje hA~M gi phyag rgya ni/ /snying ga nyid du bcing bar bya/ /de bzhin gar bya g.yon pa ni/ /g.yas pa'i chang pas gzung bar bya/ /bsgyur nas dpral ba nyid du ni/ /mdzub mo'i ngos ni gzhag par

bya/ /de bzhin gar yang dkrol nas ni/ /mnyam par pad ma kha 'bus sbyar/ /mdzub mo snying gar bzhag nas ni/ /bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya'o/ /rdo rje khro ba'i mdzub bsnyams te/ /bkan nas rtse mo sprad bya zhing / /de las

bsgyur zhing gtsug tor du/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo bzhag pa'o/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khro ba'i dam tshig 'di gsungs pa/ hU~M`/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa/ /de

nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/ /de yi dbus su legs bri ba/ /zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje hU~M gi phyag rgya che/ /lag na 'dzin pa rdo rjer bcas/ /brkyang bskum tshul du gnas pa dang / /kha dog gzugs ni ji bzhin bya/ /de nas 'dir gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas
pa thams cad byas te rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang / /'jig rten gsum rgyal mdzub mo ni/ /bu gar bcug nas bsgrubs na ni/ /las

kun rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas bsgrub pa'i snying po 'di bshad do/ /hU~M badzra sa ma ya kri ta/ de nas rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /dkyil 'khor legs par zhugs nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen

po mchog gnas pa/ /gnas na rdo rje hU~M zhes bya/ /las rnams kun ni byed par 'gyur/ de la 'di bsgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa/ hU~M badzra sa ma ya hU~M`/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi bcing ba ji lta ba bzhin bslabs te de

bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du ras la sogs pa la bri ba dang lugs ma la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad la yang dngos grub ni thun mong ngo / /phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil
'khor ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi rigs 'di la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ ci
nas kyang sems can thams cad ji ltar dga' ba bzhin bgyis kyang dngos grub thams cad thob par bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te 'jig rten

gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po la byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos ni khyod kyang legs/ /

rdo rje las khyod rab tu legs/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ste/ /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi

rtog pa chen po las rdo rje chen po'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nyon la dbang phyug chen po'i lus 'di khyod kyang rkang pa'i 'og nas btang bar byos/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i khro bor dbang bskur nas de bdag gis bskum lags na/ ji ltar de
bdag gis btang bar bgyi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen po'i lus kyi srog gso ba'i phyir shi ba'i rnam par shes pa dgug pa'i snying

po 'di nyid kyi thugs las phyung ngo / /oM badzra satwa hU~M dza/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /gsang ba'i lcags kyu bsdams bya ste/ /tha ma mnyam du brkyang nas kyang / /shi ba'i mgo bor bzhag na ni/ /srog

ni phyir yang thob par 'gyur de nas de thob ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs te/ thal bas khebs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas slar phyin te dbang phyug gi lus

der zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /gang phyir shi ba'i lus 'di yang / /'tsho ba'i khams su gyur pa yin/ /de nas byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rkang pa 'degs pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra muH/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs par/ /zur

sprad bsdams te bzhag pa ni/ /rdo rje de dag bsgyur byas shing / /'og nas de dag 'byin par byed/ /de nas de dag gsungs ma thag tu rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhabs kyi 'og nas lha chen po thar bar rang gis shes
par gyur to/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po'i lus de/ de bzhin gshegs pa des sos par byin gyis brlabs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyi don dang / ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul

ba'i phyir nyid kyi rgyal tshab tu bcug go/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil de nas zla ba'i zhabs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya byung ngo / /oM tsan+d+ro t+t+wa

re sa man+ta b+ha dra ki ra ni ma hA badzri Ni hU~M/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung mnyam par ni/ /mnyam nas legs par brkyang na ni/ /rdo rje ri mo zhes kyang grags/ /

de nas de byung ma thag tu zhabs kyi mthil de las zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas dbang phyug chen po de'i mgo bo la phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mnan pa'i rjes su zla ba phyed pa gnas par gyur te g.yon

logs na 'dug go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje'i grogs su lag du rdo rje'i mdung rtse byin nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa zhes rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur nas dbang

bskur ro/ /de nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mdung rtse des mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor zhing gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa byas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /

e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /zhabs mchog gis ni gar reg pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa thob/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i

ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi sug par rdo rje stsal te/ phyag na rdo rje nyid du dbang bskur bas lha

la sogs te phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs de rnams 'jig rten gsum las rnams par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di la gnas pa'i rim pa bgyis nas gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
las sems can de rnams phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi gtsug tor 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra satwa uSh+NI Sha hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnams las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de kha dog du ma'i 'od zer du
gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gtsug gi mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi tshul du 'phungs nas 'khod do/ /

de nas gzi brjid kyi phung po de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor 'di byung ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na a wa lo ki te mUr d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/ oM hU~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka / da ra da ra/ bi da ra

bi da ra/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ b+hin da b+hin da/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM ni sum b+ha badzrA hU~M phaT/ de nas phyag na

rdo rje de nyid kyi thugs las snying po 'di phyung ngo / /oM Tak+ki dzaH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na ut+ta ma dz+wA la ya

hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAH/ badzra pad ma sho d+ha ya sarba~M bi d+yot+ta ma hU~M` phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po

rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra karma ut+ta ma badzra d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sum b+ha ni sum b+ha A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ sa ma yaM/ gra ha

ya sarba karmA Ni mai ku ru ma hA satwa hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa'i dam pas rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir

phul ba/ oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha badzra bi d+yot+ta ma hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro bo'i rig pa'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas rang gi snying po 'di gsung

sa so/ /oM badzra shU la/ de nas rdo rje sgyu ma'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa'i snying po dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra sa ma ya d+ha ri Sha ya sarba~M hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje dril bu'i rig pa rgyal pos rang gi rig

pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra g+haN+Ta ra na ra na hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje thub pas rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzra mo na ma hA pra dz+nyA hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje mtshon chas rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzrA s+phu d+ha dA

ma ka hU~M phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje khro bos bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rang gi snying po 'di zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo/ /oM badzra kuN+Da li ma hA badzra kro d+ha gr-ih+Na

ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa bi d+hAn sa ya badzre Na mu da na~M pa la ya ti b+h+r-i ta sa hr-i da ya badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'od rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badzra pra b+ha mA ra ya s+yo ma kro d+ha hU~M` phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbyug

pa rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po 'di phul lo/ /oM badzra daN+Da ya sarbA duSh+Ta~M ma hA kro d+ha hU~M` phaT/ de nas rdo rje khro bo rdo rje ser pos rang gi snying po 'di phul lo/ /oM badzra ping+ga la bi sha ya sarba duSh+TaM bi ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/

rdo rje khro bo rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje glang sna tshogs kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la snying po 'di phul lo/ /oM badzra sho d+ha ma hA ga Na pa ti rak+Sha sarba duSh+Te b+h+yo/ badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya hU~M phaT/

de nas rdo rje phreng bas rang gi snying po 'di phul lo/ /oM mA la ga na pa ti mA la ya A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya ba sha~M ku ru mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzra

ba shi ma hA ga Na pa ti ba sha~M ku ru hU~M phaT/ de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag pos rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzra bi dza ya bi dza ya ma hA ga Na pa ti hU~M phaT/ tshogs kyi bdag po rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje tho ba

rdo rje pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phyag na rdo rje la phul lo/ /oM badzra mu sa la ku ru sarba duSh+Ta~M hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje rlung gi pho nyas rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzra nI la ma hA be ga Na pa ti sarba duSh+Ta hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje me'i

pho nyas rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzra a na la ma hA duSh+Ta dz+wA la ya sarba b+hasmi ku ru sarba duSh+Ta~M hU~M phaT/ rdo rje 'jigs pa'i pho nya chen pos rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzra b+hai ra ba badzre hU~M da ba sha la sarba duSh+Tan ma hA

yak+Sha hU~M phaT/ pho nya rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje bran gyis rang gi snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul lo/ /oM badzra a ku sha A kaR+Sha ya/ sarba~M ma hA tsit+ta hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje dus kyis

rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzra kA la ma hA mr-i t+yu mut+pA da hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje ngan khrid kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzra bi nA ya ka s+ya big+h+nan ku ru hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje klu'i rdo rjes rang gi snying po 'di phyag

na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo/ /oM badzra nA ga badzra A na ya sarba da na da ne h+yir+ya garna ne muk+ta a lang+kAr bi ni sarbo pa kA ra Na ni badzra d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nu smar ka ta/ b+hin da b+hin da ha ra ha ra prA NA~M ma hA

ts+tshe ta hU~M phaT/ bran rnams so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra a~M ku sha A kaR+ma ya hU~M phaT/ de

nas de gzhug pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs pa/ oM badzra pA shA kaD+D+h+ya hU~M/ de nas thams cad bcing ba gsungs pa/ hU~M badzra s+pho Ta ba~M/ de nas las kyi snying po gsungs pa/ oM badzra kaR+ma sa ma ya kri ta/ de nas bcom ldan
'das phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni/ /dkyil 'khor

thams cad srad bus bre/ /de la 'di ni srad bu bre ba'i snying po yin no/ /oM sarba badzra sU tra~M A kaR+Sha ya sarba maN+Da la hU~M/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su yang / /seng ldeng phur bu btab nas ni/ /de nas srad bu nyis rim du/ /

byas nas de yis srad bu bre/ /de la 'di ni phur bu'i snying po yin no/ /oM badzra kI la ya kI la sarba big+h+ni ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa dang / /dkyil 'khor zlum po srad bu bre/ /de yi phyi rol byung nas ni/ /nyis

'gyur du ni de bzhin no/ /de yi rim pa gsum du ni/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bu bre/ /phyogs mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs tshul du/ /gra yi ri mo srad bu bre/ /srad bu bre ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas srad bu bres pa

der/ /dag pa'i tshon gyis dgang bar bya/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis/ /cho ga bzhin du bzung bar bya/ /dang po bris nas phyis ci bde/ /de la 'di ni tshon gyi snying po'o/ /oM badzra rang+ga sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas rdo rje slob

dpon yang / /mnyam par bzhag la dbus 'dug nas/ /rdo rje yi ni sgo bzhi rnams/ /yid kyis kyang ni dbye bar bya/ /de la sgo dbye ba'i snying po ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra ud ga Ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya shI g+h+ra~M sma ra badzra

sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ gser ram yang na dngul yang rung / /sa la bar du bris pa'am/ /pha gu gru bzhi'i steng du ni/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya/ /de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ni 'di'o/ /
oM sarba bid/ sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/ /sems dpa' chen po bzhi bzhag go/ mdun du phyag na rdo rje ni/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/ /de la sems dpa' chen po'i snying po ni

'di rnams yin no/ /oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+Na na gr-ih+Na na hU~M/ gr-ih+Na na pa ya gr-ih+Na na pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bA~M badzra hU~M phaT/ oM badzra b+h+r-i gu TI kro d+ha A na ya sarba~M rat+na hrIHhU~M phaT/ oM badzra dr-iSh+Ti kro d+ha dr-iSh+Ta

mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra bi shwa kro d+ha ku ru sarba bi shwa rU pa ta ya sid d+ha ye hU~M phaT/ 'jug gang phyir ni byung ba na/ /srad bu'i 'og 'dzul yid bsams nas/ /rdo rje shugs su brjod pa ste/ /de yis ri mo brgal

bar bya/ /de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra bai gA kra ma hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dang por de bzhin du/ /ltag 'og go rim ji bzhin du/ /rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs bri/ /

de la dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra tsakra hU~M/ oM badzra g+haN+Ta Da hU~M/ oM badzra DaN+Ta ka sha hU~M/ oM badzra A yu d+ha hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin

te/ /rdo rje 'khyil ba la sogs pa/ /rdo rje khro bo gzhag par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pra dz+wa li ta dIp+ta badzra hU~M/ oM badzra sau me hU~M/ oM badzra daN Da hU~M/ oM badzra bi kri ta hU~M/ rdo rje
shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /sgo ni bzhi po rnams su yang / /rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa/ /thams cad rim pa bzhin du bri/ /de dag gi dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra d+ha ma hU~M/

oM badzra mA la hU~M/ oM badzra ar+tha hU~M/ oM badzra a si hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gsum par bri ba ni/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /rdo rje tho ba la sogs pa'o/ /de dag gi

snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra mu sa la hU~M/ oM badzra pA ta hU~M/ oM badzra dz+wA la hU~M/ oM badzra gra ha hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi par bri ba ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la

sogs bran/ /ltag 'og rim pa bzhin du'o/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra daMSh+DA hU~M/ oM badzra mA ra Na hU~M/ oM badzra be ga hU~M/ oM badzra ha ra Na hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /phyi rol

dkyil 'khor gzhag pa ni/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /ma mo thams cad bri bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje sgo bzhir yang / /sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas rab tu bshad pa ni/ /cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin pa'o/ /de nas

'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las kun byas te/ rdo rje slob dpon nyid rdo rje khro bo ti rin+ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te 'di skad bsgo zhing / ngas khyod la rdo rje dam

tshig gi ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ de khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig /mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas te dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes bsgo ste mna'i snying po 'di sbyin no/ /rdo rje khro bo t-i ran+ti r-I phyag rgya yang ston

cig /gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ /rdo rje khro bo chen po yi/ /dam tshig khyod kyi rigs sreg pas/ /glad pa nas ni brtsams nas kyang / /lus rnams ma rungs par yang byed/ /dam tshig bcing ba'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang

ba'i las kyi phyag rgya snying po 'dis bcing ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+hA ra/ gr-ih+Na ban d+ha sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas 'di phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /lag gnyis bla 'og gnyis su btang / /mthe bo mthe'u chung sbrel ba dang / /

las kyi phyag rgya dam tshig 'di/ /rdo rje bcing ba zhes kyang bshad/ /de nas rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur te snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra a b+hi She ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra d+hA ra ta sa ma gra gra~M/ de nas g.yogs pas gdong

g.yogs te/ snying po 'di gzhug go/ oM badzra pra be sha ya/ badzra A be sha ya a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra hU~M/ de nas bcug nas snying po 'dis me tog gtor ro/ /oM pra tIts+tsha a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra hoH/ de nas de dag gar lhung ba
de 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas dkyil 'khor go rims bzhin du bstan te/ lha gang yin pa de ni de la mi bstan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can log par lta ba dag yod
de gang dag ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rigs su phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam zhes dad par mi

'gyur ro zhes pa ni dam tshig go/ gzhan du na lha gang dag la dad pa de dag la mna'i snying po 'di byin nas bstan par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i rin po che'i mtshan ma'i phreng bas dbang bskur nas las kyi rdo rje lag

pa gnyis su byin la/ rdo rje ming btags te ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bslab bo/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /mthe bong nang du sbyar
nas ni/ /'dzub mo bkug nas gnyi gas bkab/ /sems dpa'i gtsug tor zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba byas nas ni/ /mthe bo gung mo mthe'u chung bsgreng / /gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ste/ /gzi brjid

chen po'i btsun pa'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung sbrel ba ni/ /dam du lcags kyu bcings pa ste/ /rig pa chen po dam pa'i 'o/ /rigs pa chen po dam pa yi/ /phyag rgya bcings nas
rab bcing ba/ /snying gar mthe bo'i ngos kyis so/ /sems dpa' yi ni snying por bshad/ /de nyid las gung mo srin lag /sor mo rab tu bsdams nas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen tshul du ni/ /bsgyur nas gdong du
gzhag par bya/ /de nyid bskyed de bzhag nas ni/ /snying gar yang ni bsgyur bar bya/ /me tog bzhi pa zhes bya ste/ /pad ma'i rig pa dam pa'o/ /de nyid spyi bo nas brtsams te/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor

bskor bar bya/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di/ /rdo rje las ni rab sgrub pa'o/ /sems ma'i rdo rje dam byas te/ /mthe'u chung rdo rje bsgreng ba ni/ /thams cad rig pa'i snying po 'di/ /phyag rgya 'di ni

thams cad sgrub/ /mthe bo mthe chung bcings nas ni/ /g.yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma gsum/ /rtse gsum pa ni dbus ma'i rtse/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gzung ba ste/ /rdo rje rig pa dam pa 'di/ /rdo rje mdung zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas

rab tu bshad pa ni/ /sgyu ma rdo rje la sogs brtags/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad de/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni kun gyi 'di'o/ /rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te/ /

mtshan ma kun kyang des bzhag go/ rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung ba ste/ /sor brkyang steng du gzhag pa dang / /mdzub mos mtheb stan sbyar ba dang / /oM zhes bya ba spyir bzhag

nas/ /rdo rje steng du bzhag pa'o/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs rnams so/ /rab tu brkyang nas lag gnas pa/ /lag pa'i rgyab tu de bzhin te/ /khu tshur bcangs gzhag lag ngar bskum/ /

kha yi phyogs su bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /g.yon pa'i mthe bo steng du gzhag /phreng ba'i bcing ba'i thabs su sbyar/ /nor sbyin par ni g.yas pa ste/ /ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog /
'dus pa'i dbang po'i phyag rgya chen po 'dus pa'o/ /g.yas pa mdun du gtun rings 'dzin/ /lag pa brkyang ba'ang de bzhin te/ /g.yas pas 'od ni 'bar bar bstan/ /rdo rje khu tshur bskyod par bya/ /pho

nya'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so/ /bsgyings bcas mdzub mo'i khar mche ba/ /dbyug pa bsnan cing gnas pa dang / /dpung ba bskum zhing dbyung ba dang / /g.yas pa g.yon gyis 'dren pa'o/ /bran gyi phyag rgya'i

tshogs chen po'o/ /dkyil 'khor kun du bstan pa ni/ /g.yon pas rdo rje gzur nas so/ /de nas rab tu bshad pa ni/ /sgrub pa dang ni las nyid do/ /sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang / /de ni bdag nyid nyid kyis

kyang / /bdag nyid goms par gyur na ni/ /phyag rgya dam par 'grub par 'gyur/ /gtsug tor chen po bsrung ba che/ /gzi brjid phung po rab grub ster/ /rdo rje hU~M zhes bya kun byed/ /snying gar gzhag pa thams cad

'gug / /sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /thams cad rig pa thams cad 'grub/ /rdo rje rig pa dam pa'o/ /rdo rje gdung ni phyag rgya che/ /grub pa chen po sbyin par byed/ /sgyu ma'i rdo rje rab 'grub ster/ /dril bu
yis ni yang dag 'bebs/ /dbyug pa'i shing gis mya ngan 'da'/ /rdo rje'i rdo rje gsod par byed/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so/ /'bar ba'i mchog ni ma rungs 'dul/ /zhi ba'i mchog ni thams cad gsod/ /

dbyug pa'i mchog ni gsod pa ste/ /'jigs pa'i mig ni skrag par byed/ /rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya rnams so/ /myos pas rab tu myos par byed/ /phreng ba kun ni byed par bshad/ /'dod byed dga' bar byed pa
ste/ /gsod pa thams cad gsod pa'o/ /tshogs kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /tho ba gdug pa 'joms pa ste/ /ras kyi rgyu ras de bzhin te/ /'bar ba'i mchog ni gdug pa sreg /gnod sbyin ma ni gdon 'bod
do/ /pho nya'i phyag rgya rnams so/ /rdo rje'i mche ba za ba ste/ /gsod pa thams cad gsod pa'o/ /bgegs byed ma ni rab tu bgegs/ /'phrog ma yang ni thams cad 'phrog /bran gyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs

so/ /oM badzra ba si tre swA hA/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra d+ha ri hU~M/ badzra bi kra me hU~M phaT/ yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje

rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na go tre swA hA/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra pad ma nai

tre swA hA/ de nas yang byang chub dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra kar ma ka re swA hA/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa

dam pas rang gi rig dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra shU lA gre swA hA/ de nas rdo rje sgyu ma rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra tsa kre hU~M/ rdo rje dril bus smras pa/ oM badzra g+haN+Da ke

hU~M/ thub pa'i rdo rjes smras pa/ oM badzra dan ta kaSh+The hU~M/ rdo rje mtshon chas smras pa/ oM badzre hU~M/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po'i dam tshig

gi phyag rgya 'di smras so/ /oM badzra dz+wA le hU~M/ de nas rdo rje 'od kyis smras pa/ oM badzra sau me hU~M/ de nas rdo rje dbyig pas smras pa/ oM badzra daN De hU~M/ rdo rje ser smug gis smras pa/ oM badzra bi ShA Na hU~M/ rdo rje khro bo'i dam

tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje glang snas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya smras pa/ oM badzra me de hU~M/ rdo rje phreng bas smras pa/ oM badzra mA le hU~M/ rdo rje dbang gis smras pa/ oM badzra a b+hi She hU~M/ rnam par rgyal

ba'i rdo rjes smras pa/ oM badzra a pa rA dzi ta hU~M/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje gtun rings kyis rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams smras pa/ oM badzra mu sa la gra he hU~M/ de nas rdo rje rlung gis

smras pa/ oM badzra pA te hU~M/ rdo rje mes smras pa/ oM badzra dz+wA le hU~M/ rdo rje 'jigs pas smras pa/ oM badzra gra he hU~M/ rdo rje pho nya'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyus smras pa/ oM badzra daM hU~M/ rdo rje

dus kyis smras pa/ oM ba she hU~M/ rdo rje ngan khrid kyis smras pa/ oM badzra big+h+nan hU~M/ rdo rje klus smras pa/ oM badzra ha ra Ni hU~M/ rdo rje bran gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams

cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /gru bzhi pa la byang phyogs sgo/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bus bre/ /de yi nang du der yang ni/ /de bzhin
sgo ni shar phyogs gdod/ /de yi dbus su ci rigs par/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal sogs pa/ /bzhi po de yi phyogs kun bzhag /dkyil 'khor de bzhin gtso bor

yang / /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rigs kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa/ /bzhi po de yi phyogs kun gzhag /dkyil 'khor de bzhin gtso bor yang / /rdo rje

phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rigs kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa/ /bzhi po rnams ni sgo srungs so/ /'jigs ma dpal dang sgra dbang dang / /dur ga g.yon pa'i grwa

rnams nas/ /phyi yi grwa rnams phyag rgya ni/ /de rnams nyid ni bri bar bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor rnams su ni/ /lha mo rnams ni bri bar bya/ /de nas cho ga rgyas pa'i rnams/ /ji bzhin par ni bshad par bya/ /de nas

rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byas te rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dam tshig gi las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i cho ga bzhin du bcings la khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba su'i

mdun du yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya de rnams ma smra shig /gsang ba 'phel bar ma byed cig ces bsgo shig /de nas las kyi rdo rje de rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i steng du bzhag ste cho ga bzhin du chug cig /
zhugs nas rdo rje de de bzhin du 'or cig /gang la bab pa de de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dbang du 'gyur te/ des las thams cad byed do/ /de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bstan

te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba smros shig /dam tshig phyag rgya 'di khyod kyi/ /rtag tu las kun byed pa ste/ /ma dang sring mo rnams dang ni/ /chung ma bu mo bgreng ba'o/ /de la de'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM

sarba ga ma ni sarba bAk+t+re sA d+ha ya gu h+ya badzr-i Ni hU~M phaT/ 'di lan cig bzlas pas bud med thams cad dbang du byas te spyad na chos ma yin par mi 'gyur ro/ /ci dga' bar thams cad spyad nas bsgrub par bya
ste/ de nas sems can thams cad dag par phyag rgya thams cad yid kyis shes nas las dam pa thams cad kyang byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs so/ /de nas dam tshig g-i phyag rgya

bslab par bya'o/ /dam tshig khro bo mdzub gtsug dang / /snying gar yang ni bsdam par bya/ /ngos kyi mdzod spu kha nas drang / /spyi bor bzhag nas gnyis su bya/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo yis/ /mdung rtse rtse
gsum mnan par bya'o/ /'di bcings pas ni yang dag par/ /rig pa dam pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje gtso bor 'dus/ /dam tshig cho ga ji bzhin par/ /

phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya/ /thams cad 'khor lo mdzub rtse bcum/ /dril bu phyag rgya'ang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin oM gyi phyag rgya dang / /seng ge'i rna bar bya ba ste/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya rnams so/ /'bar ba

kun du 'dzin pa dang / /'od ni yang dag 'dus pa nyid/ /dbyug pa'i khu tshur 'dzin pa dang / /kha 'gram phyag rgya bskor ba'o/ /khro bo'i dam tshig rnams so/ /btung ba'i phyag rgya phreng ba dang / /rdo rje mnan nas mdud pa yin/ /

spyi bor bzhag pa tshogs kyi ste/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni bsrung ba'o/ /tshogs rnams kyi ni dam tshig go/ lag pa bskum pa khar gzhag ste/ /rgyab tu yang ni bskor bar bya/ /'bar ba me stag gtong ba ste/ /phye nas khar

yang gnas par bya/ /pho nya mo'i dam tshig rnams so/ /mtha' ma gnyis ni khar bcug dang / /btsir cing rab tu gnon pa'o/ /dpung pas bsnol bas bsnol ba dang / /myur du 'phrogs pa'ang de bzhin no/ /bran mo

rnams kyi dam tshig go/ rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas

yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /

oM badzra bid/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM ha na ha na badzra hU~M` phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje snying pos rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM ha ra ha ra hU~M` phaT/ de nas yang

rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma ra ma ra hU~M` phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM ku ru ku ru hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje rig pa dam pas

rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM hU~M hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje sgyu mas smras pa/ oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ oM A bi sha A bi sha hU~M phaT/ oM b+hUr bu ba swaHhU~M phaT/ oM b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha hU~M phaT/

rig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi'o/ /oM da ma da ma hU~M phaT/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya hU~M phaT/ oM b+ha ya b+ha ya hU~M phaT/ khro bo rnams kyi'o/ /oM da ma da ma hU~M phaT/ oM ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM

ba shI b+ha ba hU~M phaT/ oM dza ya dza ya hU~M phaT/ tshogs rnams kyi'o/ /oM b+h+yo b+h+yo hU~M phaT/ oM g+hu g+hu hU~M phaT/ oM dz+wA la dz+wA la hU~M phaT/ oM khA da khA da hU~M phaT/ pho nya rnams kyi'o/ /oM kha na kha na hU~M phaT/ oM ma ra ma ra hU~M phaT/

oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M phaT/ oM pi b+ha pi b+ha hU~M phaT/ bran mo rnams kyi'o/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dam
tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor te/ /'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor

tshul lta bu/ /snying gar mtshan ma yang dag gzhag /de nas 'di'i chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga bzhin du las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu bcings pa bcings te 'di skad smros shig /

khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang / lha'i rigs ma mthong ba su la yang ma smra shig ces bsgo ba la dril bu dkrol du chug cig /'di skad bsgos nas kyang mna'i snying po byin la/ ji ltar dril bu 'di dkrol ba'i/ /

de yi sgra des ji lta ba/ /de bzhin las kyi rdo rje khyod/ /de bzhin nges par ma rung byed/ /rdo rje slob dpon bsti stang med/ /rdo rje grogs dang mi mdza' dang / /gdug la byams dang skyo bar ni/ /gal te khyod

kyis byas na'o/ /de nas gdong g.yogs pa dkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan te/ chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no/ /thams cad

mnyam pa nyid bsam pa/ /rdo rje rig pa dam pa skye/ /'gro ba 'di dag sgyu ma bzhin/ /de bzhin sdug bsngal dril bu 'dra/ /sdug bsngal thams cad mya ngan 'da'/ /rdo rje 'jom pa bla na med/ /rig pa'i rgyal po ting nge 'dzin rnams

sa so/ /sems can gdul phyir khro bo'i mchog /zhi ba yis ni nges par gsod/ /dbyug pa 'dra la 'tshog par byed/ /log par lta ba 'jigs par byed/ /khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /ra ro 'dra bar dpa' ba med/ /

phreng ba 'dra bar 'ching ba med/ /bud med 'dod pas 'gro dbang byed/ /brten pa tsam gyis gzhan pham mo/ /tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /'tshog pa'i chad pa'i mchog yin de/ /reg pa rnams ni rlung gi'o/ /
gzi brjid can ni byin za mchog /zas rnams kyi nang khrag dam pa/ /pho nya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /mche ba dag par zhugs pa ste/ /'chi bdag thams cad gnas na 'dug /'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs
gzhan med/ /chu las lhag pa'i ro gzhan med/ /bran gyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje'i rigs thams
cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig las 'byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabaso
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra kaR+ma pra brta ni sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na

rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra bi lA se pU dzA ya hU~M/ de nas rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM a b+hi She ke a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ de nas rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi

rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra gI te gA hi hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi rig pa 'di gsungs pa/ oM badzra nr-i t+ya nr-i t+ya hU~M/ de nas rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi las kyi

dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra bi d+yot+ta ma ne tra bi kur ba bi kur ba hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje khro bo rdo rje me'i lha mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa/ oM badzra kro d+ha badzra a dz+wA la tri shU lan+bi na hr-i da ya badzri

Ni hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje gser lha mos rang g-i las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra he me ts+tshin+da tsakre Na badzri Ni hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje gzhon nu mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra ku mA ri shI g+h+ra~M

A be sha ya g+haN+Ta shap+de na badzra pA Ni pri ye badzra sa ma ye ma nu smar na hU~M phaT/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje zhi bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra shAn+ti dza pa dza pa a g+ha mA la ya sarbAn ma

ra ya shAn ta tr-i h+ya hU~M phaT/ de nas lha mo chen po rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra muSh+Ti ha na ha na badzra b+hin d+ha b+h-in d+ha pi Da ya pi Da ya/ sarba duSh+Ta hr-i da yA ni oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M

hU~M phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal mo rnams kyi'o/ /de nas rdo rje mi 'ching ba khro bos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra a mr-i te sarba duSh+Ta gr-ih+Na ban+d+ha ha na sarba bi dwa~M sa ye/ bi nA sha ya ts+tshin+da ba bi ku ru

mut+ta ni/ ta ya badzre Na ye ge tsit+ma ma mu kar bi na yA ka tan+ta ma dIp+ta kro d+ha badzri hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje mdangs can gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra kan+ti mA ra ya sau me ru pe pra ti ba ta rA

gen shI g+h+ra~M s+pho Ta ya badzra d+ha ra t+ye na ma hA dz+yo sna kA ra le shi ta rasmi badzri Ni hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbyug pa'i mchog mas rang gi las kyi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badzra daN+Da gri g+hA ta ya hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje tsong tsong khro bo

chen mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra mA le me kha le kha na kha na sha pa ba de ni ba shi~M ku ru tra~M da~MSh+TA ma ra ya bi sha ne hU~M phaT khro bo'i rig pa rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje 'ju mas rang gi las kyi dam

tshig smras pa/ oM badzra ba la ye me ts+tshin+da si na b+hin+da badzri Ni mA ra ya u ma da ya pi ba pi ba hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje zas kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzra a sha ne ba krA ya sarba duSh+Ta badzra da sha ne sha ga ti d+ha ra

Ni ma nu sha ma na se a ha re na ra ru ti sa shud tsi pri ya ma dza ba sA nu le ba na bi le ba ta gra tre/ a na ya sarba dan+t+ya n+ya ya hi r+ya Na su brna A di ni gra ma ya de bar k+Sha Ni hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje bgo bas rang gi las

kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzra bA sa ne A na ya sarba sra an+na ba Na di n+yu ba ka ra Na ni shI g+h+ra~M ba shi~M ku ru dI pa de me pra yats+tsha A bi sha sa d+ya~M ka ta ya badzra ko Sha d+ha ra NI hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi las

kyi dam tshig smras so/ /oM badzra ba shi A na ya ba shaM ku ru sarba pri ya sarba pu ru Sha na da si ku ru krud+da~M pra se da ya sarbe b+h+yaHba ha re b+h+yo ha ra ya bi tsa ra ya ka ri badzra pa ta ka d+hA rA NI hU~M phaT/ rdo rje tshogs kyi'o/ /

de nas rdo rje pho nya mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras so/ /oM badzra duSh+Ti A na ya sarba maN+Da la~M pra be sha ya/ A be sha ya ban+d+ha ya sarba karma Ni me ku ru shI g+h+ra~M shI g+h+ra~M la gu la gu la tra sa ye mA ra ya/

da bya ba re b+ho d+ha ra ya bi dza ya~M ka ri badzra pa ta ka d+hA ra NI hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje shugs kyis rang gi dam tshig smras pa/ oM beg+ha badzri Na g+hu g+hu g+hu g+hu sha ba de mA ra ya bi g+hir bi dwa~M sa ma ya badzra pA sha d+hA ra NI

hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'bar bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzra dz+wA la dz+wA la ya sarba badzra dz+wA la ya dz+wA la ya da ha da ha ba smi ku ru hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'jigs pas rang gi las kyi dam tshig

smras pa/ oM badzra bi ga te pra be ka da~MSh+TA ka rA li ka rA la ba sha na bAka tre shI g+h+ra~M shI g+h+ra~M A be sha ya bak+Sha ya ru di ra~M p-i pa ma hA yak+Shi Ni badzra pA sha d+hA ra NI hU~M phaT/ rdo rje pho nya mo rnams kyi'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i bzhin

rdo rje bran mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras so/ /oM badzra muSh+Ti A na ya badzra da~MSh+Ti ba ya ni ke ba tA la ni ba si ni kha na kha na khA hi khA hi sarba mu khe phra be sha ya s+phoT ya mA ra mA ra Ni sarba duSh+Ta nA~M badzri Ni shi ta si

d+hA ri NI hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje du mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzra kA li ma hA pre ta r+'u pi Ni ma nu Sha mA~M sa ru d+hi ra pri ye e h+ye hi gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ya/ b+hak+Sha ya badzra DA k+ki nI badzra shA~M kha le sarba de ba ga Na

mA tr-i b+hU te ha ra ha ra pra NA~M/ a mu ka s+ya ka pA la mA lA la~M kr-i ta sarba ka ye kiny+tsi rA ya si badzra kha T+wA~M ga d+hA ri NI pre ta ma nu Sha sha rI re shI g+h+ra~M A be sha ya pra be sha ya ban+d+ha ya ba shi ku ru mA ra ya badzra rak+Sha si hU~M hU~M

hU~M hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje rul mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra p+'u ta me ma nu Sha ya ma na sa sarba du di ra mu tra pu rI Sha sha le smA shI g+h+ra~M na re ka to gar+b+ha hi NU hI shI g+h+ra~M i da mu ka s+ya ku ru badzra

sho d+ha ni ka d+ha ra NI sarba karma Ni me ku ru swA hA/ hU~M/ de nas rdo rje ma ka ras rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzra ma ke re gra sa gra sa shi g+h+ra~M pra be sha ya pA tA la~M b+hak+Sha ya badzra ma ka ra d+hA ra NI hU~M phaT/ rdo rje
bran mo rnams kyi'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje'i dkyil
'khor tshul gyis ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs par bya/ /de dag phyogs su rim par yang / /sems dpa' chen po
rnams bzhag go/ de yi dbus su chung mar bcas/ /rdo rje rig pa dam pa nyid/ /rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs srang / /gar gyi mchod la sogs pas mchod/ /de la lha mo'i go rim bzhin/ /'khor lo'i dkyil

'khor tshul bzhin du/ /rang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya 'dra/ /gar byed par yang bri bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod phyir/ /rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis so/ /grwa dang sgo yi phyogs rnams su/ /bdug pa la sogs rim pa bzhin/ /

de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin bcings te 'di skad smros shig /khyod kyis lha'i rim pa ma mthong ba dang las

mi shes pa su la yang gsang ba'i las 'di ma smra shig /khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes smros shig /rdo rje slob dpon rang gi las kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te khro bo'i lta bas blta

zhing 'di skad brjod do/ /oM badzra twar+ya a be sha ya pra be sha ya nr-i te ba ya sarba karma sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha hU~M AHhU~M a la la la la badzri/ de nas yang bdag la babs nas bdag nyid kyis 'jug ste phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'-i

phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o/ /phyin chad lus dang / ngag dang / lta ba dang / yid dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyis las thams cad 'dod pa bzhin byed pa'o/ /de nas gdong g.yogs pa

bkrol te/ gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi/ /dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas te/ /rdo rje rig pa dam pa la/ /rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs mchod/ /rig pa 'di
rnams thams cad kyang / /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ /gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya/ /rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni/ /phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus

so/ /dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas nas/ /las kyi phyag rgya dkrol bar bya/ /gar gyi mchod pa 'di yis ni/ /gtso bo thams cad mchod na ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa che sogs kyi/ /las grub par yang nges par 'gyur/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs de dag thams cad sems can thams cad kyi
don du bsgos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bzhag ste mkhyen bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gsang ba thams cad 'dzin
par dbang bskur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba de gang lags/ bka' stsol cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ /ji ltar ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de ltar de ltar sems can don/ /'dod chags la sogs gtsang bas

bya/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /sems can thams cad phan phyir dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa'i phyir/ /sems can thams cad bsad kyang ni/ /sdig gis gos par mi

'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi nor bu gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /sems can thams cad phan phyir dang / /sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis/ /pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni/ /sdig

pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi pad ma'i gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /'dod chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med/ /rgyal ba la ni de phul la/ /gzhan gyi chung ma sems can

phyir/ /bsten pas bsod nams thob par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /sems can thams cad phan phyir dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan
pa'i phyir/ /las rnams thams cad byas pa yis/ /bsod nams shin du mang po rnyed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba la

legs so zhes bstod pa/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /mdo 'di legs par smras pa ste/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na

med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i

rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs s+ho// / /bam po drug pa/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi bdag po spyan ras gzigs
kyi dbang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ pad mo'i sems dpa' pad mo che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bstan pa'i mchog /rdo rje chos la phyag

'tshal lo/ /chos kyi rgyal po dag pa che/ /sems kyi rgyal po blo gros che/ /pad ma'i bdag nyid pad ma che/ /pad ma'i mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad ma las byung pad bzang 'od/ /pad mo dag par rab dag byed/ /

rdo rje pad ma pad mchog lus/ /pad ma pad ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sna tshogs chen po snang ba che/ /dogs pa chen po che dang mtshungs/ /brtan pa chen po dpa' ba che/ /dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sems can bsam pa theg pa che/ /rnal 'byor chen po mes po che/ /bde za bde byed dag pa'i don/ /sangs rgyas pad ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /chos de nyid don dam pa'i chos/ /dag pa'i chos ni chos rab 'dzin/ /
chos chen po dang chos bzang mchog /chos kyi 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas sems dpa' sems bzang mchog /chos kyi sems dpa' chos mchog 'dzin/ /sems dpa' dam pa sems
mchog 'dzin/ /sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po mchog /mgon po chen po rnam gzigs pa/ /'jig rten snang ba 'jig rten don/ /'jig rten mgon po

khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'jig rten yi ge yi ge che/ /yi ge mchog ni yi ge 'dra/ /yi ge yi ge thams cad gzigs/ /'khor lo'i yi ge khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phyag na pad ma phyag chen po/ /dbugs 'byin pa ni sbyin
pa po/ /sangs rgyas chos ni sangs rgyas che/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzugs chen po/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni gzugs bzang 'chang / /chos kyi snang ba gzi brjid
mchog /'jig rten snang khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad ma'i dpal ni mgon po mchog /chos dpal mgon po mgon ldan pa/ /tshangs pa'i mgon po tshangs chen po/ /tshangs sras khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snang

ba'i snang mchog snang ba'i gtso/ /snang gsal shin du snang ba po/ /snang ba'i mgon po snang ba che/ /sangs rgyas snang khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur sangs rgyas mchog /sangs rgyas sras po mkhas

chen po/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur gtsug gi mchog /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni spyan chen po/ /chos spyan gzigs pa chen po yi/ /ting 'dzin ye shes thams cad pa/ /rdo rje spyan khyod

phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nyid kun gyi yon tan 'di/ /khyod ni mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad rnams/ /bstod nas goms par byed pa na/ /'jig rten dbang po thob par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo khyod la gsol btab pa/ /rang gi rigs

rnams bskyed nas kyang / /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni/ /thub pa chen pos bshad par gsol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol

ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der mngon du phyogs te 'dug nas rdo rje pad ma de rang gi thugs kar bzhag ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e
ma'o/ /rab tu dag pa bdag gi rdo rje pad ma 'di/ /pha yin 'di ni bdag gi bu/ /rigs 'di byin gyis brlab par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyi brlabs pad mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /hrIH/ de nas de byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas pad ma lta bu'i 'od zer kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam dang / 'od

rnam pa du ma byung ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par dag pa dang / chos nyid kyi ye shes yang dag par sbyangs nas yang slar log ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang

po'i thugs kar zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya bas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra pad mot+ta ma hrIH/ de nas byang chub sems

dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra bid+ya hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rarnot+ta ma trI/

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra bi d+yat+ta ma hrIH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di

gsungs so/ /oM badzra bid+yo t+ta ma aH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'gro ba

thams cad 'dul ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra hU~M hrIHho/ /de nas de smras ma thag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i gzugs 'dzin pa pad ma la zhugs te/ phyag rgya'i mtshan ma pad mo 'dzin pa'i kha dog dang / gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / rgyan sna tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems dpa'

thams cad kyi gzugs 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i lus su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad ji ltar 'dul bar so so'i gzugs su bstan nas ma lus pa lus pa

med pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul bar byas te yang slar logs nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad kyi zla ba'i dkyil

'khor rnams la 'khod nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /thabs ni snying rje bdag nyid de/ /gang du thabs kyis 'dul mdzad na/ /lha rnams su yang 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa

dang / don dang / grub pa dam pa dang / rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir phul nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu

bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ste/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa dang / /srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ /dar dang phreng bas

brgyan pa dang / /dkyil 'khor grwa ni thams cad dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan par/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bu bre/ /de yi nang du srad bu ni/ /gru bzhi par ni bri bar bya/ /gnyis pa'i

grwa ni sgo gdod cing / /pad ma 'dra bar bya ba yin/ /ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni/ /pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri/ /de yi ge sar dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gzugs bzhag de la sangs rgyas gzhag pa'i snying po ni 'di

yin no/ /bud+d+ha hU~M/ sangs rgyas phyogs kun bri ba ni/ /pad ma'i dbus su gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje rin chen pad ma dang / /sna tshogs pad ma'ang de bzhin no/ /de la de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM hU~M hrAHkr-i/ 'gro ba 'dul
ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /der ni spyan ras gzigs dbang bri/ /gzugs rnams thams cad 'byin pa ste/ /de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje 'gying la sogs tshul du/ /sangs

rgyas la sogs sems dpa' che/ /mtshan ma pad ma 'chang ba bri/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /AHoM ta thA ga ta d+harma hU~M/ oM badzra pad ma a~M ku sha ko Sha d+hA ra badzra satwa hU~M phaT/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya pad+ma

ku su ma A yu d+ha d+ha ra a mo g+ha sha ra ho/ oM pad+ma sam+b+ha pad+ma hasta sA d+hu hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin te/ /de yi dbus su bri ba ni/ /thor tshugs dbus na'ang de bzhin gshegs/ /

de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /khro gnyer la sogs tshul du ni/ /mtshan mar pad ma 'chang bri ba/ /ltag 'og go rim ji bzhin bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /hU~M/ oM pad+ma b+h+r-i ku TI Ti Ti tra/ oM pad+ma sU

r+ya dz+wA la hU~M/ oM pad+ma ma Ni ke tu d+ha ra/ tsan+d+ra pra ha da la a ba lo ki te shwa ra da hi me sarba arta na shI g+h+ra~M sa ma ya hU~M/ oM pad+ma aT+Ta hA sa e ka daR+sha mu ka ha ha ha ha hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor
gsum pa'ang de bzhin te/ /sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs par/ /pad ma'i steng du bzhugs par bri/ /de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rim ji bzhin bya/ /pad ma la sogs tshul du ni/ /

sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ hrIH/ oM tA rA pad+ma a ba lo ka ya mA ma sa ma ya satwa hU~M/ oM pad+ma ku mA ra pad+ma shak+ti d+ha ra kha Ta ge na ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/

oM pad+ma nI la kaN+tha sha ra ka tsakra ga ta pad+ma pA Ni byA g+h+ra tsaR+m+ma ni ba sa ni kriSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bA ti a dza nar+m+ma ba tsa tsan+tota/ d+ha ri ya nA rA ya Na r+'u pa d+ha re trI ni mu kha aT+TaT+Ta hA sa na pra be sha ya sa ma ya na/ de hi ma sid+d+hi i

ba lo ki te shwa ra hU~M/ oM brah+ma pad+ma sa~M b+ha ba dza pa dza pa pad+ma p+ta sha hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'ang de bzhin te/ /der ni pad+ma zhal bzhi pa/ /pad ma mdung rtse thogs par bri/ /

de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje gar la sogs tshul du/ /mtshan ma pad ma 'dzin bri ba/ /sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga bzhin/ /de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ hrIH/ oM pad+ma narte shwa ra nA tha pU dza ya

sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya pra be sha ya ban+d+ha ya A be sha ya sarba kaR+ma sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha a ba lo ki te shwa ra hU~M/ oM ba ya na d+ha ta da a ba lo ki te shwa rak+Sha ban+d+ha ya ka ba tse sa ma ye hU~M/ oM ma hA

pra tsaN+Te bi shwa ra rU pa tsi ka / pad+ma daM A ka rA la bi shwa na badzra hr-i ya sarba pad+ma yak+Sha khA da khA da d+hi ke/ oM pad+ma muSh+Ti sa ma ya s+t+wa~M ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /grwa rnams kun du bri

ba ni/ /rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs tshul/ /pad ma sgeg mo la sogs lha/ /de dag gi ni phyag rgya 'di rnams so/ /oM pad+ma lA s+ye rA ga ya ma hA de bi rA ga ma hA pU dza sa ma ya hU~M/ oM pad+ma mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ a b+hi

She ka pU dzA sa ma ya hU~M/ oM pad+ma gI te gI te pU dzA sa ma ya hU~M/ oM pad+ma nr-i t+ye nr-i t+ya sarba pU dza pra brta na sa ma ye hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ /pad ma'i mchod pa

la sogs bzhi/ /mchod pa'i lha mo rnams bri'o/ /de la de dag gi mchod pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pad+ma d+hu pe p+'u dza sa ma ye pra h+la da ya pad+ma ku la de yi te ma hA ga Ni pad+ma ra ti hU~M/ oM pad+ma pu

Sh+pe pU dzA sa ma ya pad+ma bA si ni ma hA shri ye pad+ma ku la pra ti ha ra sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya hU~M/ oM pad+ma dI pa pU dzA sa ma ye pad+ma ku la sun+da ri ma hA du t+ya A lo ka badzra ba tsi na ya pad+ma sa ra swa ti hU~M/ oM pad+ma gan+d+ha pU

dzA sa ma ye ma hA pad+ma ku la tsi te ku ru sarba kaR+mA Ni me pad+ma sid+d+hi hU~M`/ de nas pad ma'i sgo bzhi po/ /kun du tshogs sogs ji bzhin du/ /ji lta ba bzhin legs bri ba/ /de dag snying po don gyis bri/ /oM ha ya
