ya grI ba ma hA pad+ma a~M ku sha ya A kaR+Sha ya shI g+h+ra~M sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma ya~M pad+ma a~M ku sha d+hA ra hU~M dzaH/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya pra be sha ya ma hA ba shu pa ti ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra brah+ma

be sha d+hA ra pad+ma ku la sa ma yA~M hU~M hU~M/ oM pad+ma s+pho Ta s+pho Ta ban+d+ha sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yA~M shI g+h+ra~M hU~M ba~M/ oM Sha~M mu kha sa nang+ku mA ra be sha d+ha ra pad+ma g+haN+Te A be sha ya sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yA~M sarba mu drA~M ban+d+ha ya sarba sid+d+hi yo

me pra yats+tsha pad+ma A be sha aHaHaHaH/ de nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i pad ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad do/ /de la dang po kho nar pad ma'i slob dpon nyid rdo rje pad ma dam tshig gi

phyag rgya bcings la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du snying po 'dis las rnams bya'o/ /oM ma hA pad+ma s+pho Ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha a/ de nas de bzhin du bka' mnos nas dam
tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur te/ pad ma'i dbyibs bslabs nas rang gi pad ma'i ming brjod la pad ma lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams bya'o/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya de dag nyid kyis
sems dpa' chen po rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas pad ma'i slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste/ de las dang por pad ma'i slob ma rnams mna'i snying po byin la

'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/ /deng n-i khyod kyi snying ga na/ /pad ma sems dpa' nyid bzhugs te/ /ji ste tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /de nas yang 'di skad du bsgo bar byas te/ gsang ba'i

cho ga rgyas pa 'di su la yang ma smra shig /khyod kyis mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas snying po 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /oM badzra

pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas gos dkar po bgos la dar dkar pos gdong g.yogs nas gzhug par bya ste/ snying po ni 'di yin/ oM pad+ma sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas pad ma'i dbyibs lag

tu sbyin no/ /oM pad+ma hasta badzra d+harma ha na pa la ya he ni/ des kyang 'di skad du pad ma'i chos nyid ji lta bu lags zhes dri bar bya'o/ /de la yang 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/ /ji ltar pad mo dmar po 'di/ /'dod pa'i nyes

pas mi chags bzhin/ /thams cad dag par bsgoms na ni/ /de bzhin sdig pas chags mi 'gyur/ /de la chos nyid ni 'di yin no/ /de nas pad ma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ snying la pad ma

bris nas kyang / /pad ma bsgoms na snying ga yi/ /pad ma dpal yang dbang 'gyur na/ /bud med phal la smos ci dgos/ /dpral bar sangs rgyas dbyibs bris te/ /rtag tu bsgom pa byas na ni/ /bsgom pa des ni myur

du yang / /dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur/ /kha yi nang du lce steng du/ /sangs rgyas dbyibs ni rab bsgoms na/ /sgra dbang lha mo bdag nyid kyi/ /rtag tu kha na gnas par 'gyur/ /gtsug tor dbus su pad ma ni/ /

snyoms par zhugs te bzhag nas kyang / /gtsug tor pad ma bsgoms na ni/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'ang de dbang 'gyur/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pad+ma shre ya~M b+hA Sha ya ho/ /oM pad+ma a b+hi She ka pra yats+tsha ba~M/

pad+ma sa ras+thi bi sho d+ha ya hU~M/ oM pad+ma u d+ha gra~M ba shiM ku ru dza/ rtsig pa'am yang nam mkha' la'ang rung / /pad ma dam pa bsgoms na ni/ /'di ni sems can thams cad kyang / /dbang du byed pa dam pa'o/ /kha 'am yang

na phyogs gzhan du/ /pad ma dam pa bsgoms nas kyang / /gang tshe mthong ba de tshe blangs/ /ci dga' bar ni mi snang 'gyur/ /rtsig pa'am yang na nam mkha' la/ /pad ma rgya gram bris na ni/ /gang tshe mthong nas blangs
pa yi/ /de tshe sna tshogs gzugs de 'gyur/ /kha 'am yang na phyogs gzhan du/ /rdo rje pad ma bsgoms nas kyang / /de blangs skad cig nyid kyis ni/ /pad ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de dag gi snying

po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra dza gad ba shi dz+nyA na pad+ma A be sha ya/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tiSh+Tha a sha na ba ku ru ba~M/ oM sa mA d+hi bi shwa pad+ma tiSh+Tha rU pa~M ne d+hA ra sha ya b+ha ga bA~M ba~M/ oM sa mA d+hi badzra pad moSh+Tha a d+hi tiSh+Tha shI g+h+ra~M
ti/ dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bris nas ni/ /de yi mdun du rta mgrin gyi/ /phyag rgya mchog gis 'dren par bya/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du/ /spyan ras
gzigs dbang bri bar bya/ /nges pa'i zhags pa phyag rgya yis/ /'gro ba thams cad des dbang byed/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya/ /de yi mdun du pad ma yi/ /
lcags sgrog mchog gi phyag rgya bcings/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bri de yi/ /mdun du pad ma dril bu yis/ /thams cad 'bebs pa'i dam pa'o/ /de la de

dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pad+mo A kaR+Sha ya sarba ma hA satwa~M hU~M dzaHoM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha hU~M ho hi oM pad+ma s+pho Ta ba~M/ oM pad+ma g+haN+TA A be sha ya sarba aH/ bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid/ /
pad ma zhal bzhi sems dpar yang / /bsgoms te de nas grub nas ni/ /skad cig gis ni gzugs ma 'gyur/ /de ltar bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis/ /rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gnas/ /pad ma pad ma bsgoms
na ni/ /zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'thob/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang gtsug tor dbus/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas gzugs su ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms gyur na/ /tshe dpag med pa'ang mnyam par 'gyur/ /
sna tshogs gzugs kyis ting 'dzin gnas/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di yin no/ /

pad+ma bi shwa/ d+harma kA ya pad+ma/ bud+d+ha a b+hi She ka a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /de la re zhig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes yin te/ ji ltar ri

mo'i tshul du ni/ /zla ba'i dky-il 'khor dbus gnas shing / /pad ma la gnas sems dpar ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid bsgom/ /de nas de dag gi las ni 'di dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya che bcings na/ /
tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad ma bcings na ni/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dbang gis bcings na ni/ /bde bar gshegs pas de dbang bskur/ /pad ma pad
ma'i ting 'dzin 'thob/ /sna tshogs kyis ni sna tshogs mchog /sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'dul ba dang / /sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur 'gyur/ /pad ma sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /pad ma khro bo

dbang phyug dpal/ /rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gis/ /pad ma 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog /sangs rgyas dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid/ /rdo rje pad ma grub mchog sbyin/ /'dod pa'i pad ma rab 'dod ldan/ /dga' ba
yis n-i legs pa sbyin/ /khro gnyer gyis ni khro zhir 'gyur/ /pad ma'i nyi ma gzi brjid mchog /pad ma zla bas mdzes pa che/ /bzhad pas rab bzhad grub pa 'thob/ /grol bas dngos grub mchog 'thob bo/ /
pad ma ral gris longs spyod 'thob/ /mgrin sngon gyis ni 'gugs pa che/ /gos dkar gyis ni dngos grub 'thob/ /pad ma gar dbang gis 'grub ste/ /mi 'jigs rtag tu 'jigs pa med/ /rab gtum gyis ni ma
lus 'dul/ /pad ma khu tshur rab tu sgrub/ /sgeg mo dga' zhing phreng ba nor/ /glur blangs gar bde bdug pas tshim/ /me tog mdzes shing me mar lta/ /dris ni mchog gi drir yang
'gyur/ /rta mgrin gyis ni yang dag 'gugs/ /gdon mi za bar dbang du byed/ /pad ma lcags sgrog bcing ba che/ /dril bus kun nas 'bebs byed do/ /de nas pad ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes

yin te/ rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung mnyam par bsgreng / /phyag rgya 'di ni chos dam tshig /sangs rgyas chos ni rab thob byed/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/ /mdzub mo gung mo srin lag

mnyam/ /sangs rgyas rigs mchog phyag rgya de/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par byed/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/ /gung mo rdo rje rab mnyam pa/ /'di ni rdo rje rig dam pa'i/ /phyag rgya yin te rdo rje 'grub/ /de las gung

mo rin chen 'dra/ /rdo rje rin chen rab 'grub byed/ /gung mo pad ma'i tshul du byas/ /pad ma'i dngos grub thob par byed/ /rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas ni/ /rdo rje'i las ni byed par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rdo rje bcings na ni/ /skad cig

gis ni dam tshig 'grub/ /rdo rje bsdams las mdzub mnyam pas/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par byed/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /sems dpa'i phyag rgya khyad par du/ /rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas kyang / /gung
mo mnyam par bsdams nas ni/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung phye ba ni/ /sna tshogs pad mar bshad pa yin/ /de las mthe bo gnyis bsnol te/ /mdzub gnyis rtse mo sprad la dgug /dbus kyi rdo rje spyi gtsug phud/ /
gtsug phud sangs rgyas yin par bshad/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /mthe bo mnyam te btud nas ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sprad dgug /bkan nas ting nge 'dzin du bcug /thal mo pad mo

mnyam sbyar la/ /mdzub mo rdo rjer mnyam na ni/ /mthe bo ngos la sbyar ba 'di/ /nges pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams nas ni/ /legs par bkan te bcings nas kyang / /mthe bo gnyis ni

pad mar sgreng / /sangs rgyas pad ma yin par bshad/ /mthe bo gnyis ni rdo rjer mnyam/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu ral grir bya/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni so sor dbye/ /gung mo srin lag pad mor bya/ /pad ma mnyam par

rab sbyar la/ /mdzub mos mdzub mo gzung nas su/ /'dren par byed pa pad ma'i mda'/ /thal mo mnyam par sbyar nas bkan/ /legs pa'i phyag rgya bcings na ni/ /legs so zhes bya sbyin par byed/ /pad ma'i legs pa

yin par grags/ /thal mo mnyam par rab sbyar la/ /mdzub mo rtse mo mnyams ste dgug /mthe'u chung phye nas mdzod pur bzhag /pad ma khro gnyer zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /sor mo thams cad dkyil

'khor du/ /snying gar rab tu brgyang ba ni/ /pad ma'i nyi ma yin par bshad/ /thal mo rab tu dam sbyar la/ /mdzub gnyis rin chen 'dra bar bya/ /dpung pa'i spyi bor rab brgyan pa/ /pad ma rin chen rgyal mtshan rtse'o/ /rdo rje

bsdams pa spyi bor bzhag /kha dang bcas par rab brkyang nas/ /nyid kyi kha nas rgod pa dang / /kha ni bcu gcig nyid du 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin pad mar bcings nas ni/ /mthe bo gnyis ni so sor 'byed/ /pad ma sgrol ba'i

phyag rgya las/ /mdzub gnyis pad ma'i tshul du dgug /pad ma sgrol ba'i phyag rgya 'di/ /dngos grub thams cad grub par byed/ /ral gri'i tshul du byas pa 'di/ /pad ma'i ral gri'i phyag rgya yin/ /mthe'u chung pad

ma chen por bya/ /mtheb gnyis de bzhin dbyug ltar bsgreng / /mdzub mo rtse mo dung chen bya/ /gung mo srin lag 'khor lor bya/ /rdo rje thal mo dam byas la/ /g.yas pa oM du nang du gzhug /g.yon pa'i mdzub

mtheb bzlas par bya/ /sor kun chu skyes kha bye 'dra/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la/ /g.yon dang g.yas nas de bzhin du/ /'gying bcas gar byed bskor nas ni/ /spyi bor bzhag pa pad ma can/ /rdo rje thal mo

dam byas la/ /rtse mo thams cad kha phye ba/ /bskor te pad ma'i snying gar ni/ /bzhag nas bstan par byed pa po/ /rdo rje thal mo dam byas la/ /gsang ba'i gnod sbyin tshul du ni/ /thal mo brkyang ste bskums nas ni/ /khar

bzhag pad ma'i gnod sbyin ma/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas kyang / /gung mo gnyis ni phyir bkug ste/ /rang gi mthe bo rgyab mnan pa/ /pad ma'i khu tshur zhes kyang bshad/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje thal mo

las byung ba/ /mchod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig mchog rnams bcing ba'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas/ /bkug nas rtse mo sbyar ba ni/ /rta mgrin gyi ni yin par
bshad/ /pad ma'i thal mo mnyam sbyar la/ /mdzub gnyis mdud par mdud pa na/ /nges par zhags pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /mtheb mdzub lcags sgrog 'dra bar bya/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /pad ma'i thal

mo mnyam sbyar la/ /srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis bar du/ /mthe bo gnyis bcug dam du btsir/ /de nas pad ma rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ hrIHgr-i kr-i hi/ shr-i shi d+hi hi/ gr-i ti kr-i bi khi mi

Sh+Ti a/ pad ma khu tshur gnyis byas la/ /las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil

'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs

so/ /oM badzra sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma Ni rat+na sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis

rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM pad+ma sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM karma sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan
'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje

dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /pad ma'i gsang ba zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ /de dbus pad ma'i steng du ni/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo bri/ /de yi

phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /dam tshig mchog rnams snga ma bzhin/ /rang gi rig pa rnam ldan par/ /chos kyi rdo rje la sogs bri/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harme

shwa ri hU~M/ oM d+harma sa ma ye badzra pad+ma ni hU~M/ oM bud d+ha a b+hi She ka rat+na sa ma ye hU~M/ oM tA rA sa ma ye hU~M/ oM bi shwa mu ke hU~M/ sna tshogs gzugs mchog dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas
ni/ /de yi dbus su pad ma yis/ /bskor ba'i pad ma bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad ma'i phyag rgya gnyis gnas pa/ /pad ma'i mtshan ma bri bar bya/ /bde gshegs nyid

kyi nyid phyag rgya/ /de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no/ /hrIH/ oM pad+ma ta thA ga to/ oM pad+ma sa man+ta b+ha dre/ pad+ma badzra a~M ku sho ko Sha d+hA ri NI hU~M/ oM pad+ma ra ti/ oM pad+ma duSh+Ti/ de bzhin
dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang / /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /gtsug pud chu skyes che gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin

du/ /pad ma'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi/ /dam tshig mchog rnams gzhag par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /shrIH/ oM b+h+ra~M ku TI be ta Di pad+me hU~M/ oM pad+me dz+wA le/ oM sau me ni pad+me ni hU~M/ oM pad+ma hA si ni

e ka da sha ba ka tre di ri di ri i aT+Te/ baT+Te tsa le pra tsa le ku su ma d+ha re i le pra be sha sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha hU~M/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gsum par yang / /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /de yi dbus su pad ma mdzes/ /

pad ma'i phyag rgya gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rim ji bzhin par/ /pad ma'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi/ /pad ma la ni gnas par bri/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /

b+hi d+hIHdz+hi/ oM tA re tut+tA re hU~M/ oM d+hi hU~M/ oM pad+ma tsakra sha~M kha d+hA ra NI/ nI la kaN+tha sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya hU~M/ oM paN+Da ra pA se na pad+ma sa~M b+ha be ba d+ha ba d+ha hU~M/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bzhi par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /
pad ma'i dbus su pad ma ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor 'od bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rim ji bzhin par/ /pad ma'i dbus na gnas pa yi/ /pad ma'i mtshan ma ldan par bri/ /

de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /s+t+ri/ oM pad+ma nri t+ye shwa ri pU dza ya sarba ta thA ga tA nA~M na ta na ta hU~M/ oM A be sha ya pad+ma ka ba tsa ban d+ha ra kra man hU~M/ ham/ oM ma hA pra tsaN+Di pad+ma yak+Shi Ni bi shwa r+'u pa d+hA ra

NI bi shwa pa ya sarba duSh+Ta khA da khA da hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma muSh+Ti a mu/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams bri ba/ /pad ma lcags kyu la sogs rgya/ /mdor na pad ma'i mtshan ma can/ /de nas de dag gi

phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/ /oM pad ra ti pU dze ho/ oM pad+ma a b+hi She ke pU dze ra ti/ oM pad+ma gI te pU dze gi/ oM pad+ma nr-i t+ye pU dze ho/ oM d+hU pi pad+ma ni hU~M/ oM pad+ma puSh+pa hU~M/ oM pad+ma ku la sun da ri/ d+harma A lo ke pU dzA ya hU~M/ oM

pad+ma gan d+he hU~M/ mchod pa rnams so/ /oM pad+ma a~M ku sha A kaR+Sha ya ma hA pad+ma ku la na/ ha ya grI ba sa ma ye hU~M dzaHoM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha sa ma ye pra be sha ya sarba satwa sa ma yan hU~M/ oM pad+ma shA~M ka le ba~M/ oM pad+ma

gan d+ha d+hA ri shrI g+h+ra~M A be sha ya/ sa ma yan sha na mu ki a/ de nas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas pad ma'i slob ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin btsud de/ 'di skad du khyod kyis

gsang ba 'di su la yang ma smra shig /khyod sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re/ tshe gcig tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ta re/ de nas phab nas 'di skad du khyod kyi mig lam du ci zhig snang zhes dris nas/ des ji skad du smras

pa de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /des gal te nam mkha' dkar bar mthong na ni de'i tshe de'i dngos grub dam pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /yang na ser po mthong na ni de nor 'grub pa'i ye shes bslab bo/ /ci ste

dmar po mthong na ni rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ba'i ye shes bslab bo/ /ci ste nag po mthong na ni mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab bo/ /ji ste sna tshogs mthong na ni dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab pa go bar shes nas

ji lta ba bzhin du gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bskyed de/ phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /de ltar rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang snod ji lta ba
bzhin du phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa ni 'di bzhin du brtag par bya'o/ /de nas dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang sems dpa' che/ /sna tshogs gzugs su

bdag nyid kyis/ /bsgoms na phyag rgya chen po yi/ /mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dbang gis dam tshig ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas brtan byas te/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /mchog gi

dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /pad ma pad ma sems dpa' che/ /bdag nyid mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms/ /bdag nyid kyis ni dam pa yi/ /dngos grub thob pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rang byung gdon mi za ba yi/ /dbang phyug

las kyi phyag rgya ni/ /cho ga bzhin bsgrubs myur bar yang / /mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pad+ma satwa ha~M sid d+h+ya ho/ oM bud d+ha a b+hi She ka kro d+ho ha~M/

sid d+h+ya ho/ oM d+harma sa mA d+hi ra ha~M sid d+ha ho/ oM a mo g+he shwa ro ha~M/ sid d+h+ya mA~M/ de nas nor sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ kha yi nang du dbyig bcug ste/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che/ /bdag nyid nyid
kyis bsgoms na ni/ /gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/ /gser srang brgyad cha blangs nas ni/ /dam tshig mchog ni rab brtan par/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /gc-ig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/ /mu

tig 'brum bu khar bcug la/ /bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya lag gnyis kyis/ /rin chen thams cad blangs na ni/ /

bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na yang / /gcig tu 'gyur las stong du 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pad+ma ma hA rat+na pra d+ha hU~M dza/ oM pad ma su bar+N+Na pra d+ha hU~M dza/ oM pad+ma mu ku Ta pra d+ha hU~M

dza/ oM pad+ma sarba rat+na pra d+ha hU~M dza/ de nas rjes su dga' ba'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /pad ma blangs te mdun gnas pa/ /gang yin des ni de

mgur byed/ /dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis/ /pad mo dmar por dam bzung ste/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms nas kyang / /pad ma blangs te

ji lta ba/ /rdo rje lta bas de ltar bltas/ /'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/ /cho ga bzhin du pad ma gzung / /lag pa gnyis kyis bskor na ni/ /bud med thams cad der

mgur 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM bi shwe shwa ra ma hA pad+ma ho/ oM pad+ma sa ma ya pad+ma ho/ oM yo ga pad+ma ho/ oM pad+ma kar ma ho/ sna tshogs ye shes dbang phyug che/ /bdag nyid mdun du

pad ma gtsang / /phyag rgya pad ma de nyid kyis/ /de yi 'chi ba skad cig go/ /pad ma bzung nas brtan bya ba/ /cho ga legs pa ji bzhin du/ /dam tshig dam pa de nyid kyis/ /nan tan kho nar gzhig par bya/ /gang gis

ming smos 'jig pa ni/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya sbyar nas su/ /ji ltar de ltar pad ma thogs/ /las de nges par 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang gi gzhig par khros na ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya sbyar nas su/ /bskor zhing brdab

par byas na ni/ /de yi mtsho ba rdol bar 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM ma hA pad ma ts+tshe da mA ra ya ho phaT/ oM sa ma ya pad+ma s+pho Ta nA sha ya ra ta phaT/ oM d+harma pad+ma ts+tshe da bi nA sha ya pra ti ya phaT/

oM karma pad+ma s+pho Ta ya dzI bi ta ma s+ya kr-i ta phaT/ de nas chos kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/ /pad ma la ni bud med bsam/ /de steng bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgyur/ /pad ma pad mchog rtse byed
cing / /mnyam par bzhag na dngos grub 'thob/ /pad ma la ni bud med bsam/ /de steng bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgyur/ /rtse zhing dbu rgyan sangs rgyas ni/ /bsgoms na des ni des
'grub bo/ /pad ma la ni bud med bsam/ /de steng pad mar bdag bsgyur te/ /rtse zhing pad ma pad ma mchog /dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /pad ma la ni bud med bsam/ /de steng sna tshogs bdag

bsgyur te/ /rtse zhing sna tshogs pad ma mchog /sna tshogs dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM badzra pad ma sa~M yo ga sA d+ha ya hriHoM bud d+ha ma ku Ta sa~M` yo ga sA d+ha ya shIHoM

pad ma pad ma sa~M` yo ga sA d+ha ya d+h+r-i/ oM bi shwa pad ma sa~M` yo ga sA d+ha ya s+t+ri/ de nas pad ma rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ji lta ba bzhin du bslab bo/ /sor mo rtse sprad pad mar bya/ /rdo rje khro bo'i

mdzub gnyis sprad/ /rtse gnyis nor bu'i pad ma ltar/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'ang de bzhin te/ /rdo rje bcing ba bsdams nas kyang / /gung mo gnyis ni myu gur bsgreng / /mdzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'i/ /phyag

rgya shAkya thub pa'-i brtan/ /chos kyi rdo rje snying gar bzhag /bsgyur te dpral bar bzhag pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin tshul pang du gzhag /bsgyur nas spyi bor gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la/ /

mchod rten pad ma'i tshul du ni/ /gung mo gnyis ni bcings gyur na/ /sangs rgyas pad ma yin par bshad/ /de las mthe bo rdo rje dang / /mdzub gnyis ral gri lcags kyur bya/ /pad ma rdo rje 'dzin pa de/ /gsang

ba'i phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /de las mthe bo bsnol nas kyang / /mdzub mos mdzub mo rab gzung la/ /drangs na rab dga' yin par bshad/ /legs so zhes pa'ang de bzhin te/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas las/ /

mthe bo gnyis bsnyams bcug nas kyang / /mdzub gnyis rtse bkug rtse mo ni/ /dpral bzhag gung mo pad+mar bya/ /de nyid las ni snying gar yang / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang / /de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan cing / /

ltag par rab tu brkyang bar bya/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ / mdzub gnyis rtse mo pad mar dgug /de bzhin pad ma ral gri ste/ /mdzub mo pad mar byas pas sbyar/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ / mthe bo g.yon pa nang

du gzhug /dung ste mthe bo tho bar bsgreng / /sor mo bskum brkyang pad mthe'u chung / /de las thams cad bcum nas kyang / /mthe'u chung pad ma lta bur bya/ /mthe bo g.yas la sbyar ba yi/ /mdzub mor nor bu bgrang bar bya/ /

rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /mthe'u chung pad ma lta bur bya/ /mdzub mo bsgreng ste gar byed pa/ /pad ma spyan gyi yin par bshad/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /mthe'u chung pad ma lta bur bya/ /dam du mdzub mo gnyis

bkug ste/ /mthe bo gnyis ni go char bya/ /de las mtheb gnyis mche bar bya/ /mtheb gnyis nang du gzhug par bya/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig mchog ni bla med de/ /rdo rje nang du bsdams nas kyang / /mdzub gnyis pad

ma 'dra byas la/ /mthe bo phan tshun bsnol ba ni/ /gsang ba'i sna tshogs dbang du bshad/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mthe'u chung gung mo mnyam bsgreng la/ /mtheb mos rdo rje sbyar ba ni/ /gtsug pud dbus na de bzhin gshegs/ /

de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mthe bo pad ma 'drar byas la/ /kha nas dbyung ltar byas nas kyang / /pang du ting nge 'dzin ltar gzhag /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /sor mo kun gyi ngos rnams ni/ /mnyam par dam du bsdams

nas kyang / /mdzub gnyis rdo rjer mnyam pa'o/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mdzub gnyis pad ma 'drar byas la/ /mthe bo gnyis kyang bsnol nas ni/ /gung mo gnyis ni rtse sbyar bkug /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /
mtheb gnyis rdo rjer rab sbyar la/ /mdzub mo ral gri lcags kyur bya/ /mthe'u chung pad ma 'drar byas la/ /de bzhin du ni bsgyur nas kyang / /mdzub mo g.yon pa bsgreng ba la/ /mdzub mo mthe bo rtse

sbyar ba/ /dam du bzung ste dgug ltar bya/ /de la mdzub mo gnyis bkug la/ /mthe bo gnyis kyis mnan pa ni/ /pad ma dgyes pa bdag nyid che/ /legs so zhes bya sbyin byed kyi/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /

sor mo kun gyi ngos sbyar la/ /mthe bo gnyis kyis mnan nas ni/ /mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar ba'o/ /de nyid snying gar nyi mar bya/ /spyi bor pad ma rgyal mtshan bya/ /phab ste kha yi 'gram bzhag pa/ /pad ma cher

dgod dgod pa yin/ /rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la/ /chos kyi rdo rje tshul gyis ni/ /mthe'u chung mthe bo rab bsnyams pa/ /'di ni sgrol ma'i dam tshig yin/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mdzub gung pad ma

ral grir bya/ /de bzhin nang du 'khor lor bya/ /zlos pa sbyin pa de bzhin no/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mtheb mdzub sprad de gnyis su bya/ /de nas snying gar sbyar ba ni/ /gsang ba'i bsrung ba yin par

bshad/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mthe'u chung pad ma 'drar byas la/ /mdzub gnyis sh-in du bkug nas kyang / /mtheb gnyis phyir bskyed mche ba can/ /de las khu tshur tshul gyis ni/ /mtheb gnyis ngos

kyis btsir ba yi/ /pad ma gsang ba'i khu tshur che/ /dam tshig mchog tu rab brtag pa'o/ /pad ma lA s+ye la sogs pa/ /de dag gzhan rnams kun gyi ni/ /rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la/ /de 'dra bar ni bcing bar bya/ /

de nas pad ma gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yin te/ hrAHgrAHprAHhrAH/ shrAHsAHd+hAHhrAH/ gAHd+hAHkrAHbAH/ dAHrAHSh+TAHsAH/ las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdu na khu tshur gnyis su bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las chos gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlab pa'i pad ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM d+harma sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na ta thA ga ta hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems

dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi chos 'byung ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra d+harma hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig

pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM rat+na d+harma hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM d+harma d+harma hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM karma d+harma hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid

kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni/ /chos kyi ye shes zhes brjod do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du
ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ /de yi dbus su bri ba ni/ /ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /sems dpa' che rnams cho ga bzhin/ /sna tshogs dbang

phyug la sogs pa/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs bri/ /de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnams so/ /oM dz+nyA na bud d+ha hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na bi shwe shwa re hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na bud d+ha mu ku Ta hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na d+harme shwa re hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na a

mo g+he shwa re hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma bud+d+ha hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma dzA d+hA ra hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma mA ra hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma duSh+Ti hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma b+h+r-i ku TI hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma sUr+ya hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tsan+d+ra hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma hA sa

hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tA rA hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ku mA ra hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma nA rA ya hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma hA sa hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma nr-i t+ye shwa ra hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma rak+Sha hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma yak+Sha hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma muSh+Ti hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma

lA s+ye hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma mA le hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma gI t+ye hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma nr-i t+ye hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma d+hU pe hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma puSh+pe hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma dI pe hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma gan d+he hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma a~M ku sha hU~M/ oM dz+nyA

na pad+ma a mo g+ha pA sha hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma s+pho Ta hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma A be sha hU~M/ de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis gzhan

su la yang ma brjod cig /khyod sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug snyoms zhugs la/ /snying gar pad ma bsgoms nas kyang / /pad

ma'i ting 'dzin thob na ni/ /de ma thag tu myur bar lding / /'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /dpral bar pad ma bsgoms byas te/ /goms nas shin du brtan gyur na/ /de ma thag tu mkha' la lding / /'jig

rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis/ /lce la pad ma bsgoms nas kyang / /grub par gyur na myur bar yang / /nam mkha' la ni de 'gro'o/ /'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis/ /gtsug tu pad ma bsgoms nas kyang / /

grub par gyur na myur du ni/ /skad cig gis ni steng du lding / /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM pad+ma dz+nyA na hr-i da ya A be sha / oM pad+ma dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka A be sha / oM pad+ma dz+nyA na bid+yo t+ta ma A be sha / oM pad+ma dz+nyA

na uSh+NI Sha A be sha / nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /pad ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang / /cho ga 'di ni 'grub 'gyur na/ /skad cig gis ni mi snang 'gyur/ /nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /

pad ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang / /de yi steng du bdag 'dug par/ /bsgoms par gyur na mi snang 'gyur/ /nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /pad ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms byas la/ /gang tshe mthong ba de tshe

blangs/ /mi snang bar ni myur du 'gyur/ /nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /pad ma'i dbyibs ni bsgoms byas la/ /mthong ba'i pad ma de zos na/ /de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di

rnams so/ oM pad+ma A kaR+Sha/ oM pad+ma ra tha/ oM pad+ma dz+nyA na gra hA na/ oM pad+ma ra sa ya na hU~M phaT/ phyag rgya che bcings pad ma ni/ /kha dog dbyibs rnams sna tshogs pa'i/ /dbyibs de lag pas bzung na ni/ /
gzugs rnams thams cad 'chang bar 'gyur/ /pad ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni/ /sna tshogs pad ma'i dbyibs bris la/ /de nyid bsgoms pa byas na ni/ /gzugs mang 'chang bar de 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'

'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /pad ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni/ /sna tshogs dbyibs su bsgoms na yang / /sgra yi gzugs su de 'gyur ro/ /pad ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni/ /sna tshogs dbyibs su byas nas kyang / /

de la zhon nas mkha' 'gro zhing / /ci dga'i gzugs su nges par 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /o~M` pad+ma d+ha ri bi shwa rU pa pra brta ya A be sha / oM bi shwa pad+ma pra brta ya mA~M/ oM sa mA d+hi bi

shwa pad+ma A be sha / oM bi shwa pad+ma ma nod+k+ShaM pa A kA sha bi shwa rU pa~M a d+hi tiSh+Tha mA~M/ gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya che/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis legs bcings la/ /pad ma blangs te rab byin na/ /gdon mi za bar dbang du

'gyur/ /gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya zhes bya bcings na ni/ /des ni pad ma blangs nas kyang / /byin par gyur na dbang du 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin skyes dge ba yi/ /phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings

la/ /ye shes pad ma gang byin pa/ /de ni de yis myur bar 'gyur/ /gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig ldan/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /pad ma byin pa gang yin pa/ /de ma thag tu de dbang 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni

'di rnams so/ /oM ma hA dz+nyA na pad+ma ho/ oM sa ma ya pad+ma ho/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ho/ oM karma pad+ma ho/ de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ /phyag rgya chen

po bsgrub par bya/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig mchog ni bsgrub bya ste/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ /pad ma'i pad ma gzhag par bya/ /chos kyi khu tshur brtan byas la/ /las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos

kyi las kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma kr-i hU~M/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi

rigs kyi las 'byung ba rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM hU~M d+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM rat+na karma sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje

spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM pad+ma karme hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM bi shwa karme hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba ni/ /pad ma'i las zhes bya ba ste/ /
dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre/ /sangs rgyas phyogs kun pad ma yi/ /mtshan ma 'dzin par thams cad bri/ /de la de dag gi rig pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /

oM pu ri Ni hU~M/ bi shwa karme shwa ri hU~M/ oM ta thA ga te shwa ra a b+hi She ka karma bid+yA+e hU~M/ oM d+harma karme shwa ra dz+nyA na pU dzA sa ma ye hU~M/ oM a mo g+ha karme shwa ri hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma bud d+he hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma badzri Ni hU~M/

oM pad+ma karmi Ni mA ra Na pU dzA karma sa ma ye hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma duSh+Ti hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma b+h+r-i ku TI hU~M tra/ oM pad+ma karma sUr+ye hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma d+h+wa dze hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma hA sa hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma tA re hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma ku mA ri

hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma nA rA ya ni hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma brah+mi hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma nr-i te shwa ri hU~M/ oM pad+ma rak+Sha rak+Sha karma sa ma ye hU~M/ oM ma hA pra tsaN+Da gI ti ni pad+ma da~MSh+Ta karma ka ri hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma muSh+Ti ga tA ya hU~M/ oM ra ti pU dze hU~M dza/

oM a b+hi She ka pU dze hU~M dza/ oM gI te pU dze hU~M d+ha/ oM nr-i t+ye pU dze hU~M ba~M/ oM d+hU pe pU dze hU~M aH/ oM puSh+pe pU dze hU~M tra/ oM A lo ke pU dze hU~M d+hiH/ oM gan d+he pU dze hU~M ba~M/ oM ha ya grI ba a na ya hU~M dza/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha pI Da

ya hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma shA~M ka la ban d+he hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma g+han d+ha A be sha ye hU~M phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/ 'di skad du rigs

kyi bu khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang ma smra shig /sems can dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re zhes bsgos shig /de nas ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ 'jig
rten dbang phyug phyag rgya cher/ /shin du mnyam bzhag bsgoms nas kyang / /sdig rnams bshags pas myur bar ni/ /sdig pa kun las de 'dag 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis/ /
dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings te/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags na ni/ /mtshams med lnga las 'byang bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin du/ /shin du mnyam par bzhag bsgoms la/ /sdig pa thams cad
bshags na ni/ /sdig pa kun yang rab tu 'joms/ /mdor na gang yang rung ba yi/ /las kyi phyag rgya legs bcings la/ /las rnams thams cad bshags na ni/ /las rnams kun las rnam par 'dag /de la de dag

gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM sarba pA pa~M sa~M sho d+ha na ma hA pad+ma oM sarba A nan+ta t+ya sho d+ha na sa ma ya pad+ma oM sarba pA pa~M prA Na sha Na d+harma pad+ma oM sarba pad+ma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka karma pad+ma de nas sgrib pa thams

cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ba'i ye shes bslab bo/ /'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher/ /shin du mnyam bzhag bsgoms byas la/ /shud d+h+ya shud d+h+ya zhes brjod na/ /las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/ /'jig

rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi dam tshig bcings na ni/ /bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya zhes brjod na/ /las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /chos kyi phyag rgyar bsgoms nas

ni/ /d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hi zhes brjod na/ /las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / /hI hI hI hI zhes brjod na/ /las rnams kun las dag par

'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM pA pa~M k+Sha ya pad+ma/ oM A pha ra Na k+Sha ya pad+ma/ oM karma k+Sha ya pad+ma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i ye shes bslab bo 'jig rten dbang
gi phyag rgya cher/ /rab tu mnyam par bzhag bcings la/ /oM oM oM oM zhes brjod na/ /mchod pa thams cad rab tu byed/ /'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /

b+hu b+hu b+hu b+hu zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad de mchod 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang pos snyoms zhugs la/ /chos kyi pad ma bsgoms nas kyang / /he he he he zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod

'gyur/ /pad ma'i las kyi phyag rgya ni/ /shin du mnyam par bzhag bcings la/ /d+he d+he d+he d+he zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM kA ra pad+ma/ oM

b+hU kA ra pad+ma/ oM he kA ra pad+ma/ oM d+he kA ra pad+ma/ oM ni ba ra Na k+Sha ya pad+ma/ de nas dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab bo/ /'jig rten dbang po phyag rgya cher/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bcings nas ni/ /hrI hrI hrI hrI zhes brjod

na/ /'jig rten dbang por grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dam tshig ces bya bcings nas kyang / /shrI shrI shrI shrI zhes brjod na/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang po'i

mnyam bzhag par/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /d+hig d+hig d+hig d+hig zhes brjod na/ /pad ma khro bor 'grub par 'gyur/ /pad ma chen po dge ba yi/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / /s+si s+si s+si

s+si zhes brjod na/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM hrIHsid+h+ya/ oM shrI sid+h+ya/ oM d+h+rI ga sid d+h+ya/ oM si sid d+h+ya/ de nas las gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/
'jig rten dbang po snyoms zhugs la/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed cing / /a ho su ka zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /bud med kun dang rtse

byed cing / /pri ya pr-i ya zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgyes so/ /'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed cing / /a ho ra ti zhes brjod na/ /de ni rtag tu dga'

bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed cing / /su kha su kha zhes brjod na/ /de y-i bde ba nyams mi 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM sarba bud d+ha pU dza pra brta na

pad+ma/ oM prI ti kA ra pad+ma/ oM ra ti pra brta na pad+ma/ oM ma hA su kha pad+ma dr-i D+ha hU~M/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bya ste/ de nas pad ma thal sbyar te/ /dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje dgongs/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor

tshul gyis ni/ /gnas rnams kun tu bzhag par bya/ /de nas pad ma rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni dra zhes bya ba brjod par bya/ las kyi phyag rgya gnyis byas la/ /las kyi phyag rgya des bsgrub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi chos dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzri d+harma pad+ma hU~M/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra dz+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying

pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na mu ku Ti hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM d+harma pad+ma d+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis
rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba mu khe hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas

rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya bzhi mchog dkyil 'khor te/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba dang / /dkyil 'khor chen por 'dra bar bya/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya/ /de

yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje pad ma la sogs bri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/ 'di skad du 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma

brjod cig /khyod rtag tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba dang / mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes bsgo zhig /de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ lag pas pad ma bzung
nas kyang / /bsgrims te legs par bsdam par bya/ /dri de sangs rgyas rnams mchod na/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /mnyam par bzhag pas gtsug pud dbus/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bzhag

la/ /'gro zhing rdo rje 'gying bstan na/ /'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed/ /pad ma pad ma chen po'i gzugs/ /ting nge 'dzin 'dug ji lta bzhin/ /yid kyis su ni de bsad do/ /gang du phog pa de rgyas pa'i/ /sa

sogs pa 'i las byed do/ /pad ma pad ma chen po'i gzugs/ /pad ma rgya gram nyid du ni/ /byas te lag pas bzung nas kyang / /bskor nas dbab la sogs de byed/ /de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM

gan d+ha pU dzA gri sA d+ha ya hrIH/ oM pad+ma mu ku Ta ta thA ga ta ba sha~M ku ru sarbA na lo ke shwa ra a b+hi She ka sa ma ya ho/ oM pad+ma pad+ma mA ra ya sarba dra t+yar+thi ka na sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na d+h+r-ika /oM bi shwa pad+ma sarba karma kA

ro b+hA ba la li lu la la li hU~M phaT/ de nas phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bslab bo/ /chags nas dgos pa thams cad ni/ /bsgrub par bya ste dam tshig 'di/ /bsgrub par dka' ba'i phyag rgya yang / /rnal 'byor gyis ni

myur du 'grub/ /de la 'di yi dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM sA d+ha ya pad+ma rA ga sa ma ya a/ de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya chen po thams cad bslab par bya'o/ /phyag rgya bzhi'i

dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /

oM sarba dza gad+bi nA ya ma hA satwa a/ A gats+tsha shI g+h+ra~M bi sha rU pa~M san d+hA rA ya ma me tsa sarba sid+d+hA ya pra yats+tsha hrIH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes

bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi nang du pad ma yang / /de bzhin du ni

bri bar bya/ /der ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa'i/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni bri bar bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du btsud nas/ de bzhin du bsgo ste 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes

bslab bo/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas kyang / /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/ /sna tshogs 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes

bslab bo/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /dbang po gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de ni de grub bo/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya bcing ba rnams

bslab par bya'o/ /dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin du ras la sogs pa la yang bya'o phyag rgya gzhan rnams kyang / phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du phyag rgya la sogs pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs

gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa/ /rdo rje theg pa bla med kyi/ /mdo sde 'di ni

legs bshad pa/ /legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

chos kyi dam tshig las rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po dum bu gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// // bam po bdun pa/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i

rin po che rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo/ /nam mkha'i snying po sems can don/ /sems dpa' chen po gzi chen

po/ /rin chen che ba'i rin chen mchog /rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dbang bskur sbyin pa rin chen che/ /dag pa che zhing dge ba che/ /sangs rgyas rin chen rnam dag sku/ /rin chen rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ /nam mkha'

nam mkha' las byung ba/ /nam mkha' kun gyi 'od che ba/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs kun gyi/ /re kun mchog ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen mdzod spu rin chen 'byung / /sangs rgyas mdzod spu bde gshegs rab/ /
rin chen thams cad rab kun mchog /rin chen dgos pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen rin mchog rin chen drag /de bzhin gshegs pa kun rin chen/ /rin chen dam pa nam mkha' che/ /mkha' mnyam khyod la phyag

'tshal lo/ /rgyan yin pas ni mdzes pa che/ /mdzes par snang zhing rab mdzes mdzad/ /don kun dag cing dag pa'i don/ /sbyin spyod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rin chen ni rnam dag mchog /dge 'dun rin chen de

bzhin gshegs/ /dbang bskur chen po 'jig rten don/ /don sbyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin pa rab sbyin sbyin pa'i mchog /gtong zhing gtong mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ /sems can kun don de nyid don/ /don

chen don ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bsam pa'i rgyal po gzi brjid che/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems dpa' che/ /sangs rgyas kun te khyod phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen che/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa 'od che ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po/ /bzhad chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur mchog /dbang chen khyab pa chen po ste/ /'jig rten mgon rab 'jig

rten mchog /'jig rten nyi ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen phul te rab kyi mchog /rin chen rgyan te rin chen mdzod/ /rin chen snang bas snang ba che/ /rin chen grags pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen phung po rin chen 'byung / /

nor bu rdo rje nor yon tan/ /rin chen 'byung ba sku rab 'bar/ /rin chen sku ste khyod phyag 'tshal/ /che nyid shing ste rin chen dbang / /re ba thams cad skong mdzad pa/ /bsam pa thams cad legs par mnyes/ /rin chen phung

po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'od mchog khyab pa'i bdag nyid kun/ /mchog rab sbyin zhing mchog che ba/ /phun sum thams cad 'byor pa'o/ /rdo rje snying po bdag phyag 'tshal/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad zhi ba 'di/ /su yang rung bas

'chang byed na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba/ /skad cig tu ni sdig med 'thob/ /rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni/ /nor 'dus pa ni bshad par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang gi mchog /nges pa'i rigs ni bskyed
par mdzod/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' 'di thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi snying po 'di

gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A sha pa ri pU ra Na ma

hA rat+na hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra hU~M tra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs

so/ /oM ma Ni hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM pad+ma hriH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi

rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM bi shwa rat+na hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs so/ /de nas snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bu 'od zer rnams byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang
bar byas te/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas yang gcig tu gyur te bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs kar

zhugs so/ /de nas nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbang bskur la sogs pa'i bkod

pa dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku rdo rje'i nor bu'i rin po che'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sku rnams su gyur te byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
rin po che chen po'i char 'bab pa la sogs pa nor bskyed pa rnams kyis sems can rnams mgu bar byas nas yang slar byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje

dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rin chen thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /rdo rje rin chen rigs
nyid du/ /'gro ba'i don du 'di gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsam pa thams cad yongs su

rdzogs par byed pa 'di phul te don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /thams cad grub pa

zhes bshad pa/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa ste/ /srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa la/ /dar dang phreng ba lda ldis brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor chen po grwa rnams dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/ /

rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor srad bus bre/ /de yi nang du rdo rje yi/ /rin chen las byung gnas bya zhing / /ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni/ /rin chen sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor

lngar ni brgyan gyur par/ /der ni srad bu bre bar bya/ /rang gi phyag rgyas bskor ba yi/ /der ni sangs rgyas gzhag par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM bud d+d+ha rat+na hU~M/ oM badzra ma Ni hU~M/ oM badzra rat+na

a~M ku ru hU~M/ oM badzra rat+na pad+ma hU~M/ oM badzra rat+na paR+Sha hU~M/ re ba kun grub dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /rdo rje snying po der gnas shing / /rin chen mchog ni sbyin par bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams

thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ /rin chen phyag rgyar ldan pa yi/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM sarba ar+tha sid d+hi pra da hU~M/ oM badzra ma Ni tsin+d+h+ya ha na

A kA sha gar+b+ha b+ha ga bAn sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya hU~M/ oM rat+na oM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya sarba ar+thA na sa ma ya shI g+h+ra~M/ sarba ta thA ga ta satwa ma nu sma ra hU~M/ oM ti rA ga bi sho ku ru sarba nak+Sha sha gar+b+ha hU~M/ oM rat+na duSh+Ti hU~M/ rin chen phreng

ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /rin chen phreng ba 'dzin pa'i mchog /nges pa'i dbus su legs par bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzh-in par/ /nor bu'i

mtshan rnams lag thogs pa'i/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM rat+na tiSh+Tha tra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka rat+na mA le hU~M`/ oM rat+na ma Ni sUr+ye hU~M/ oM tsan+d+ra ma Ni d+h+wa dza sarbA shA

pa ri pU ra A kA sha gar+b+ha hU~M`/ oM rat+na hA sa hA sa hU~M/ rin chen pad ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis bgal nas ni/ /rin chen pad ma 'dzin khyab pa/ /de dbus gnas par bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad

du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /nor bu mtshan ma 'chang ba yi/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na pad+ma hU~M/ o~M` he ga sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na gar+b+ha hU~M/ oM rat+na ko Sha gra hU~M/

oM ma Ni tsakra pra bar+t+tA ya hU~M/ oM rat+na ba shI hU~M/ rin chen char 'bebs dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /rin chen char ni rab 'bebs pa'i/ /sems dpa' chen po der yang bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams

thams cad du/ /mdor na lag na phyag rgya yang / /rin chen mtshan mar ldan pa yi/ /sems dpa' che rnams cho ga bzhin/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na br-iSh+Ti baR+Sha ya sarba brta sam+b+ha d+ha b+ha ga bAn ma Ni

hasta hU~M/ oM ma Ni pU dza sa ma ya hU~M/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha ka ba tsa hU~M/ oM ma Ni da~M`Sh+Ta ka rA la ma hA yak+Sha ha ra ha ra sarbA r+thAn ti sha ya hU~M/ oM rat+na ban d+ha sa ma ya hU~M`/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams

cad du/ /ltag 'og go rim ji bzhin par/ /rin chen lA s+ye la sogs bri/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na ra ti hU~M/ oM rat+na mA le hU~M/ oM rat+na gI ti hU~M/ oM rat+na nr-i t+ye hU~M`/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni rdo rje

shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ /bdug pa'i mchod pa la sogs bri/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na d+hU pe rat+ne/ oM puSh+pe ma Ni/ oM rat+na A lo ke/ oM ma Ni gan d+he/

sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus su ni/ /sgo ba rnams ni bzhag par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM sarba rat+na A kaR+Sha a ru Na ma hA sa twa b+ha ga bAn twa~M A kA sha gar+g+ta~M tso dA ya A kaR+Sha ya shI g+h+ra~M ho dza/ oM sarba rat+na pra

be sha ya/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma hA ma Ni rA dzA ku la~M rat+na pA sha hU~M/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha hU~M ba~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na A be sha a/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir nor bu rin po che'i slob dpon nyid ji lta ba bzhin zhugs

te cho ga rgyas pa bdag nyid kyis byas la/ de nas rin po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa gang ba'i chus nor bu'i slob ma dbang bskur te/ rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do/ /oM

badzra ma Ni rat+na sa ma ya ba~M/ de nas kha dog ji lta bu rnyed pa'i bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te de dang 'dra bas mi g.yogs la snying po 'di brjod du bcug ste gzhug par bya'o/ /oM hU~M` ma Ni rA dza ku la~M/ de nas da ltar
bcug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis 'di su la yang ma brjod cig / khyod tshe rabs thams cad dbul por gyur ta re/ sdug bsngal las mi thar bar gyur ta re/ sems can dmyal bar yun ring por gnas par gyur

ta re zhes bsgo la dam tshig gnyis su bya'o/ /theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa yang brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bsam pa dang gter chen po gang na yod/ ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhes rdo rje'i tshig gis dri bar bya'o/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos thams cad smrar stsol cig ces smras ma thag tu gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi

dam tshig kyang bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o/ /de nas ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas ye

shes kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya che/ /shin du mnyam par bzhag pas bcings/ /gter brkos nas ni gang dag na/ /gter yod pa ni de mthong 'gyur/ /dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings la/ /gang

na gter rnams yod gyur pa/ /der ni phyag rgya btsir na ni/ /de tshe bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni/ /gang na gter rnams yod pa yang / /yid kyis

shes pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gang du phyag rgya babs gyur na/ /de na gter yod shes par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM ma hA ma Ni

rat+na A bi sha hU~M/ oM ma Ni piN+Da pa ri sha ya hU~M/ oM rat+na sa mA d+hi bru hi/ oM rat+na A be sha dar sha ya hU~M/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni/ /gang du lus ni khor gyur pa/ /de na rin chen gter yod par/ /dam tshig nyid
kyis shes par bya/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /gang du babs nas gnyis gyur pa/ /de ni rin chen chen po yi/ /gter yod par ni shes par bya/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gang
la babs pa bdag nyid kyis/ /rin chen chen po bdag nyid kyis/ /gter ni gang na yod par smra/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / /gang tshe lag gnyis phan tshun du/ /babs nas dam tshig

bcing gyur pa/ /de ni gter ni yod par bshad/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM ma hA rat+na kA ya dar sha ya rat+na/ oM A kA sha gar+b+ha ma Ni rat+na/ oM s+pho Ta s+pho Ta ya tra ni d+hi/ oM ma Ni rat+na dz+nyA na swa ya~M bru hi/

oM pu na sa ma ya ban d+ha dar sha ya swA hA/ phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni/ /de bzhin gang du dogs gyur pa/ /de ni rin chen 'byung ba yi/ /gter yod ye shes shes par bya/ /gang du dogs yod der yang ni/ /dam tshig

mchog ni mchog bcings la/ /gang tshe nyid ni grol gyur pa/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gang du nges par dogs gyur pa/ /de na nges par gter yod par/ /ye shes bskyed de shes

par bya/ /gang na yang dang yang dogs pa/ /las kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin/ /der bcings de ni gnyis gyur pa/ /gter yod par ni shes par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM ni d+ha dz+nyI na A bi sha / oM rat+na sa

ma ya muny+tsa ni d+hIHban+d+d+ha~M/ oM d+harma rat+na bru hi ni d+hiHna~M/ oM sarba karma ni s+pho Ta ya dar sha ya ni d+hIHban d+ho dA k+Shi pa/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni/ /gter rnams kun du btsal nas kyang / /gang na gnas pa der babs na/ /

de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /gter rnams kun du btsal nas ni/ /gang na gnas pa brtag gyur pa/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gter rnams kun

du btsal nas kyang / /gang na yod par rtag tu shes/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gter rnams kun du btsal nas kyang / /gang na yod par las phyag rgya/ /bskor ba de na yod par

par bshad/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na pa rak+Shi A bai sha / oM rat+na sa ma ya hr-i da dar sha ya/ /oM rat+na pa rak+Shi dz+nyA na A bai sha / oM ma Ni karma brah+mA ya/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab

par bya'o/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ /gter rnams kun du tshol byed cing / /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/ /babs par gyur na gter rnyed do/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /bud med dang ni rtse

byed cing / /gang du phyag rgya dam gyur pa/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar na/ /gter rnams kun du tshol byed cing / /ye shes phyag rgya bsgoms nas ni/ /gter gyi ye shes 'jug par 'gyur/ /

dbang po gnyis kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gang du phyag rgya gnyis gyur pa/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM ma hA ma Ni sa~M` yo gA bai sha / oM

sa ma ya sa~M yo ga /dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ oM di ni dz+nyA na A be sha sa~M yo ga /oM sarba karma sa~M s+pho Ta sa~M yo ga /de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thams cad bslab bo/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di yin te/ /zla

ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ji lta ba yi ri mo bzhin/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/ /don gyi mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi las ni 'di rnams yin no/ /sangs rgyas

phyag rgya sangs rgyas nyid/ /rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab 'grub/ /rin chen lcags kyus kun spyan 'dren/ /nor bu dga' bar rjes gar byed/ /nor bu mgu bas dgyes par byed/ /nor bu lta bas nor thob bo/ /nor bu phreng bas
dbang bskur zhing / /nor bu nyi mas gzi brjid mchog /yid bzhin nor bus ji dgar sbyin/ /rin chen bzhad pas nor thob 'gyur/ /rin chen chos kyis chos kyang thob/ /gtong ba'i dpal gyis dam pa rnyed/ /rin
chen ral gris mtshon chen po/ /rin chen 'khor los dbang por 'gyur/ /smra bas btsal ba'i dngos grub 'thob/ /rin chen char gyis nor chen po/ /nor bu'i mchod pas rab mchod nyid/ /rin chen chos

kyis brtan par byed/ /rin chen mche bas nor thob bo/ /khu tshur nor bus dngos grub 'thob/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/ /rdo rje rin chen phyag rgyas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun

gyis dbang bskur 'thob/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings nas/ /rdo rje rin chen grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gnyis las nor bur byas/ /rdo rje 'dzin las nor 'thob bo/ /de nyid mthe bo rdo rje yis/ /nor bu sbyar te snying gar gzhag /

mdzub gnyis pad ma'i nor bur bcings/ /'jig rten dbang gis nor byin 'gyur/ /rdo rje las nor sna tshogs kyi/ /nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan sbyin/ /rdo rje dbyings mdzub nor bu yis/ /sangs rgyas rin chen

nyid 'thob bo/ /mdzub mo bsnyams te phyir bkug la/ /mthe bo rdo rjer bcings pa yi/ /rdo rje snying po'i phyag las byung / /'di ni rdo rje'i nor bur gsungs/ /'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang / /rdo rje'i nor bu chen po 'thob/ /

mdzub gnyis rin chen 'drar bcings la/ /gung mo myu gur bsgreng ba ste/ /'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang / /rang gi dbang bskur thob par 'gyur/ /de nas gung mo srin lag dang / /mthe'u chung rnams ni pad mar bya/ /'dis

ni kun du spyan ras gzigs/ /mtshan 'dzin pas ni nor sbyin 'gyur/ /mdzub mo mthe bo mthe'u chung rnams/ /rdo rje rin chen tshul du bya/ /gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo sbyar/ /srin lag myu gu 'dra bar bsgreng / /rdo rje

bsdam pa dam byas la/ /mdzub gnyis nor bur byas nas kyang / /mtheb gnyis brkyang ba'i ngos snying gi/ don kun grub pa sbyin par byed/ /rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams nas kyang / /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya/ /

nor bu mtshan gyi phyag rgya 'di/ /nor bu chen po rab sbyin no/ /de nyid las ni mdzub mo gnyis/ /lcags kyu'i tshul du byas pa ni/ /don kun dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /nor bu rin chen lcags kyur bshad/ /de nyid las ni bsgyur nas

kyang / /mdzub mos mdzub mo gzung nas ni/ /mda' 'phang ba yi tshul byas la/ /drangs nas 'gro ba dga' bar byed/ /de nyid las ni mdzub mtheb gnyis/ /sbyar ba legs so zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas mtheb gnyis sbyar ba yis/ /

mdzub gnyis rtse mo sbyar ba dang / /mthe bo gnyis ni dbus sbyar la/ /mdzub gnyis ngos dang sbyar ba ni/ /nor bu lta bar bshad pa ste/ /lta ba'i don rnams 'phrog byed pa'o/ /don kun grub pa'i phreng ba ni/ /rang gi dbang ni rab sbyin

'gyur/ /de nyid snying gar mthe bo gnyis/ /bsgreng ste ngos kyis sbyar ba ni/ /nor bu nyi ma'i snying gar gzhag /gzi brjid chen po rab sbyin 'gyur/ /srin lag bsnyams te bsgreng nas ni/ /phye ste spyi bor gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje nor

bu chen po gtso/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /de nyid las ni 'gying byed cing / /kha 'gram rgod par bskor ba ste/ /rin chen char rgod zhes bya ba/ /bzhad pas don rnams thams cad 'grub/ /ting nge 'dzin du sor mo

bsgom/ /nor bu pad ma nor 'chang ba'i/ /de nas mtha' nas grol ba ni/ /sbyin pa chen po rab sbyin byed/ /mthe bo gnyis ni nang du dgug /mdzub gnyis nor bur byas pa ni/ /nor bu ral gri yin te mthus/ /'gro ba rnams

kyi nor 'phrog pa'o/ /rdo rje bsdams las 'khor lor bya/ /mtheb gnyis nang du bcug nas kyang / /mdzub gnyis nor bu 'drar byas pa/ /'khor los sgyur ba thob par byed/ /de nyid thal mo'i tshul du byas/ /kha nas

'dren par byas pa ni/ /de bcings nas ni ngag gis kyang / /rang gi bkas ni nor 'phrog 'gyur/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /rin chen char ni rab 'bebs te/ /sor mo thams cad bsgreng ba ni/ /phyogs bzhi nas ni nor char
'bebs/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /gar byas gtsug phud dbus bzhag nas/ /kun la cho ga bzhin mchod na/ /rin chen kun gyis de mchod 'gyur/ /don kun grub pa'i phyag rgyas ni/ /mgrin pa'i phyogs su

'khyud par bya/ /nor bu bcings pa zhes bya ste/ /bsrung ba yi ni cho gar grags/ /don kun grub pa de nyid las/ /gnod sbyin tshul du khar bzhag pa/ /nor bu mche ba zhes bya ste/ /'jig byed don kun 'phrog byed pa'i/ /

rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la/ /mdzub bkug mthe bo gnyis kyis ni/ /legs par mnan te btsir ba ni/ /nor bu'i khu tshur dngos grub 'thob/ /dam tshig rnams kyi mchod mchog rnams/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du ni/ /

ji bzhin nor bu ldan pa la/ /'di ni dam tshig mchog tu brtags/ /gung mo nor bu'i tshul du bya/ /de dag nyid la rnam par brtags/ /lcags kyu gcig sogs tshul gyis ni/ /las rnams thams cad rab 'grub byed/ /

de nas nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/ /hraHgraHtriHhrIHshrIHiHriHd+h+riHdiHd+hIHgriHbiHriHDaHyaHaH/ rin chen phyag rgya gnyis byas la/ /las kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po las don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na

d+hU pe hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra a b+hi She ka mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ye hU~M`/ de nas byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM rat+na a b+hi She ka hU~M`/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra d+ha

rma a b+hi She ka hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka pU dza sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /

rin chen gsang ba zhes bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ /de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri bya ste/ /khri la gnas pa'i nor bu'i

gtso/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi mdun du ni/ /nor bu'i phreng ba pad ma'i nor/ /nor bus bskor ba'i nor bu'i rnams/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM tra/ oM ma Ni sa ma ye hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She ka mA

le hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na pad+ma hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na br-i ti sa ma ye hU~M/ thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen dbus su ni/ /rdo rje nor bu chen po bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams

thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rim ji bzhin par/ /rang gi phyag rgya nor bur ldan/ /rin chen slob dpon nyid kyis bri/ /de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/ /oM sarba ar+tha sid d+hi pra be sha ma hA badzri rat+na sa ma

ye ma Ni sarba ar+thA na me sA d+ha ya d+hA ra NI hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na A kar Sha ye swA hA/ oM ma Ni rat+na sa ma ye a~M` ku sha ma Ni ku lany+dza/ oM ma Ni rA ga sa ma ye hU~M/ oM ma Ni sA d+hu hU~M/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis
par yang / /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /spyan gnyis dang ni ldan pa yin/ /nor bu de yi dbus su bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rim ji bzhin par/ /nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan

pa yi/ /rang gi phyag rgya rnams bri'o/ /de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di dag go/ /oM badzra ma Ni rat+na ne tra A na ya ba shi ku ru sarba ar+tha sam+b+ha ba dA na shI g+h+ra~M tiSh+Tha a~M` ku shi hU~M`/ oM ma Ni rat+na rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na sUr+ye dz+wA la ya

sarba ma hA rA dzi ni hU~M/ oM ma Ni tsan+d+ra d+h+wa dzA gri hU~M/ oM ma Ni hA se hA sa hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /nor bu pad ma bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rim ji bzhin bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di

rnams so/ /oM ma Ni sa mA d+hi pad+me ni hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+ya gra sa ma ya hU~M/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya go She hU~M/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya tsakra hU~M/ oM ma Ni b+hA ShA gri hU~M`/ dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /rdo rje

rin chen ldan pa yi/ /rin chen char 'bebs der gnas shing / /las kyi phyag rgya ji bzhin pas/ /yongs su bskor bar bri bar bya/ /nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan pa rnams/ /ltag 'og go rim ji bzhin bya/ /de nas de dag gi phyag

rgya ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na braSh+Ti sA d+ha ya ma hA ma Ni hU~M/ oM ma hA pU dzA sa ma ye ne tra A/ oM ma hA pU dzA sa ma na sa ma ye rak+Sha/ oM badzra ma Ni rat+na da~MSh+Ta kA rA le ha ra ha ra hU~M`/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya muSh+Ti hU~M`/ de nas nor bu gsang

ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas rang gi slob ma rnams btsud de 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang ma smra shig /khyod rab tu dbul ba dang dus nas sems can dmyal bar

lhung ta re zhes bsgo la rang gi nor bu'i dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri/ /bdag nyid kyi ni dpral bar yang / /bzhag na rgyal por nges par 'gyur/ /rin

chen rdo rje bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri/ /dbang gi gnas su bzhag na ni/ /nges par rgyal po nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri/ /ye shes rdo rje de bzhag na/ /nyid kyis

grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bris/ /rang gi gnas su de bzhag na/ /nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /ma hA badzra

rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA~M/ sa ma ya rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA~M/ d+harma rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA~M/ karma rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA~M/ phyag rgya chen po'i snying gar ni/ /rdo rje rin chen bsgom par bya/ /bsgoms nas mngon par dbang du bskur/ /mchog tu

rmad du byung ba 'thob/ /mnyam par bzhag pas rdo rje yi/ /rin chen dpral bar bsgoms nas ni/ /rin chen rdo rje bcings gyur na/ /thams cad kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /lce la rdo rje

rin chen bsgom/ /chos kyi rgyal po nyid du ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas rdo rje yi/ /rin chen gtsug tor bsgoms nas kyang / /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /las legs byed

pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM badzra rat+na hr-i da ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa ho/ oM badzra rat+na a b+hi She ka dra/ oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa ba~M/ oM badzra rat+na uSh+NI Sha a d+hiSh+thA na swa mAn/ phyag rgya chen po bdag

nyid kyis/ /bsgoms na rdo rje rin chen yang / /ras la sogs la bris nas ni/ /rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /ras la sogs la bris nas kyang / /sems dpa' rdo rje bsgoms na ni/ /dam tshig

rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid kyis/ /ras la sogs la bris nas kyang / /bsam gtan phyag rgya bsgoms na ni/ /nges par chos kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /ras la sogs la rdo rje yi/ /rin chen

bris nas las rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya bsgoms par gyur na ni/ /bdag nyid las kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /badzra rat+na ba b+ha a d+hi tiSh+tha/ oM badzra rat+na bi~M b+ha pra ti tiSh+Tha/ oM

badzra rat+na bi~M b+ha a b+hi She/ badzra rat+na biM b+ha ku ru/ gser ram yang na dngul yang rung / /rdo rje rin chen bcings gyur tam/ /yang na rin chen gzhan yang rung / /snying gar bsgoms nas dbang bskur 'gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na

med/ /gser ram rin chen gzhan las byas/ /rtag tu dpral bar bzhag na ni/ /nor che ba yi rgyal por 'gyur/ /gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi/ rdo rje rin chen bsgoms nas kyang / /rang gi khar yang bcug na ni/ /

tshig la dbang bar de 'gyur ro/ /gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi/ rdo rje rin chen bsgoms na ni/ /gtsug tor du ni yang bsgoms na/ /las rnams kun gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams

so/ /oM badzra rat+na hri da ya A ba ra na hU~M/ oM badzra rat+na a b+hi She ka ma hA ar+tha pA da/ oM badzra rat+na pA tsa pA de/ oM badzra rat+na ma hA karma pA de/ de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bslab

bo/ /phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /nor bu bud med bu gar bcug /de ltar dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /dam tshig mchog gi nor bu ni/ /bud med bu gar bcug nas kyang / /dam

tshig mchog bcings thams cad kyi/ /dbang bskur ba yi dngos grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /chos kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nor bu/ /de ni bud med bu gar bcug /bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /

las kyi phyag rgya nor bu bcings/ /bud med bu gar las phyag rgya/ /bcings par gyur na las kun gyi/ /dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM ma hA ma Ni sid d+hi/ oM sa ma

ya a b+hi She ka sid d+hi/ oM d+harma sid d+hi/ oM karma sid d+hi/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bshad de/ rin chen rdo rje myu gur bcing / /gung mo srin lag mthe'u chung rnams/ /sor mo brkyang ba byas nas ni/ /

spyi bor bzhag pa grub mchog 'thob/ /rdo rje bsdam pa byas nas kyang / /mdzub mo gnyis mdud mtheb gnyis dang / /srin lag rdo rje bsgyur nas ni/ /mdzod spur bzhag pa dbang thob bo/ /rdo rje rin chen tshul byas la/ /

mdzub gnyis ngos dang mtheb ngos sprad/ /de nyid bsgyur nas de dbang 'thob/ /de nyid mtheb gnyis mdzub gnyis ni/ /chos kyi rdo rje tshul du ni/ /bcings nas dpral bar bzhag pa ni/ /chos chen gyi ni dbang bskur

'gyur/ /las kyi rdo rjer bcings nas kyang / /dbang rnams kun gyi phreng ba ste/ /bsgyur nas dpral ba nyid du yang / /bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje dbyings skyes dam

tshig kyang / /bcings nas rin chen dpral bar ni/ /bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/ /mtheb gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang / /nor bu 'dra bar bkug pa ni/ /rdo rje nor bu

chen po 'thob/ /rdo rje bsdam pa byas nas kyang / /rdo rje khu tshur gung mo gnyis/ /nor bu 'dra bar byas nas ni/ /nor bu phreng ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur/ /rdo rje bsdam pa byas nas ni/ /gung mo nor bu 'drar byas la/ /
mdzub mo srin lag gnyis pad ma/ /kha bye 'dra bar byas pas 'grub/ /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcings/ /sor mo thams cad bsgreng ba rnams/ /nor bu nyid du bsgoms na ni/ /'khor rnams mchog dang ldan par

'gyur/ /gung mo mthe bo rdo rje yi/ /rin chen tshul du byas nas kyang / /srin lag mthe'u chung bsnyams pa yi/ /khar bzhag lce ste nor bu sbyin/ /de la mdzub gnyis rdo rjer bya/ /de ltar de gnyis lcags kyur bya/ /
mdzub mos mdzub mo drang ba dang / /de nyid dga' bar rab sbyin pa'o/ /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcing / /mdzub gnyis ngos la dgug pa ste/ /srin lag ngos gnyis mdud pa la/ /mthe bo gnyis kyis

bkab pa ste/ /de nyid rdo rje nyi mar bskor/ /dpung pa'i spyi bor brkyang bar bya/ /nor bu'i rgyal mtshan spyi bo'i rgyan/ /bzhad pa'i tshul du byas pa'o/ /rdo rje bsdam pa byas na ni/ /mdzub mo srin lag gyen du bsgreng / /de dag

pad ma 'dra bar bya/ /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya/ /de las mtha' mar rab sbyin bya/ /rdo rje ral gri sbyar ba dang / /rdo rje 'khor lo tshul du bya/ /de nyid kha nas dbyung bar bya/ /mdzub gnyis rin chen myu gur bya/ /sor

mo thams cad brkyang ba dang / /de dag spyi bor bzhag pa ni/ /rin chen char gyis char 'bebs so/ /de nyid go cha'i tshul du ni/ /snying gar rin chen gnyis byas pa/ /mdzub gnyis nor bu 'dzin mche ba/ /dbus su bsnyams

pa khu tshur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid/ /snyim pa sbyar ba bcings na ni/ /mdor na gsang ba gsang ba yi/ /dngos grub bzhi 'gyur sbyin par byed/ /ji ltar rdo rje'i gsang

ba'i sbyin/ /dus rnams kun du bcing mi bya/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i mdo bshad par bya'o/ /traiH/ graiH/ traiH/ saiH/ kraH/ khaH/ d+haiH/ haiH/ braiH/ d+haiH/ kraiH/ baiH/ kraH/ raiH/ yaH/ maiH/ gsang ba gsang ba'i khu tshur mchog /gnyis

su byas na las kun byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las rin po che'i phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas

yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba mkhyen pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di

gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka dz+nyA not+ta ma hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa

'di gsungs so/ /oM d+harma a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /rin chen ye shes

zhes bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ /snying ga'i mtshan ma bri bar bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i ye shes kyi snying po ni

'di rnams gsungs so/ /oM dz+nyA na sarba sid d+hi dz+nyA na hU~M/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na hU~M/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na a~M ku sha dza/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na rA ga /oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Te/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Ti ma Ni hU~M/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka / oM ma Ni dz+nyA na sUr+ya/

oM ma Ni dz+nyA na d+h+wa dza/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na aT+Ta T+Ta hA sa/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na pad+ma hU~M/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na t+ye ga /oM ma Ni dz+nyA na ko Sha/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni tsakra/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni b+hA Sha/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni rat+na bar Sha hU~M/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na nr-i d+ye pU dza sa ma ye hU~M/

oM ma Ni dz+nyA na rak+Sha/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na yak+Sha/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na muSh+Ti/ de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis chos ma mthong ba su la yang ma brjod

cig /khyod dngos grub ma thob par myur bar shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la/ /rdo rje snying po bris na ni/ /bsgoms

nas rin chen don byin ces/ /smra zhing gsol ba gdab par bya/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la/ /rdo rje snying po bris nas ni/ /bsgoms nas rin chen byin cig ces/ /tshig tu smra zhing gsol ba gdab/ /rdo rje

snying po ras sogs la/ /bris te mnyam par bzhag nas kyang / /rnam par bsgoms te ye shes la/ /dam chos sbyin zhes gsol ba gdab/ /rdo rje snying po ras sogs la/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bris nas kyang / /bsgom

nas dam pa'i las byin zhes/ /las la gsol ba gdab par bya/ /de nas de dag gi sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM de hi sarba ar+tha b+ha ga bAn badzra gar+b+ha/ oM de hi sarba rat+na b+ha ga bAn badzra gar+b+ha/ oM de hi sA d+ha

d+harmA mi b+ha ga bAn badzra gar+b+ha satwa/ oM de hi sA d+ha karma b+ha ga bAn badzra gar+b+ha/ nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ /nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas su/ /phun
sum tshogs don gsol bar bya/ /nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ /nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /nor bsags pa ni gsol bar bya/ /nam
mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ /nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa'i/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /phun sum tshogs ni gsol ba gdab/ /nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ /

nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /las sogs pa ni gsol ba gdab/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba ar+tha na/ oM dz+nyA na

gar+b+ha de hi sarba rat+na/ oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba d+ha rma~M/ oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba karma mA~M/ rdo rje snying po bris nas kyang / /snying gar yongs su bsgom byas la/ /gang gi tshe na snying 'phar ba/ /de tshe grub pas nor ster ro/ /rdo rje snying po

dpral bar ni/ /br-is te rnam par bsgoms nas kyang / /gang tshe mgo bo 'dar gyur pa/ /des ni mngon par dbang thob bo/ /rdo rje snying po khar bcug la/ /de nyid du ni bsgoms nas kyang / /gang tshe de ni byed gyur pa/ /de tshe

des ni ngag 'grub bo/ /rdo rje snying po bdag spyi bor/ /rab tu bzhag ste bsgoms nas kyang / /gang tshe de ni 'bar gyur pa/ /de tshe 'phang du lding bar 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM hr-i da ya gar+b+he de hi

da na~M`/ oM rat+na a b+hi She ka gar+b+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ oM b+ha ga gar+b+ha sid d+h+ya/ oM rat+na gar+b+hoSh+NI Sha A kA shA gats+tsha/ rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni/ /bdag la dngos grub stsol zhes gsol la/ /i li

rat+na zhes brjod 'grub/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /dbang bskur ba ni gsol btab la/ /mi li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob/ /rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin du/ /rab mnyam
