bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni/ /chos bdag stsol zhes gsol btab la/ /tsi li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob/ /nam mkha'i snying po las kyi mchog /rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas ni/ /rin chen thams cad gsol

btab la/ /ki li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM i li/ oM mi li/ oM tsi li/ oM ki li/ de nas nor bu ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /nam mkha'i

phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ /rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sprad na/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /gzhi la ri mo bris pa bzhin/ /rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/ /dbang
po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ /dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ /sdug pa de dang gar brtses pa/ /'jig rten kun gyis

de dgar byed/ /nam mkha' kun gyi rdul dbyibs kyis/ /rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ /thams cad 'grub par nges par 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /A kA sha g+'u h+ya

dz+nyA na sa ma ya hU~M/ bi tsit+t+ra gu h+ya dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ pri yA nu smri ti dz+nyA na gu h+ya sarba lo ke rA ga ya hU~M/ sarba gu h+ya dz+nyA na sarba sid d+hi me pra yats+tsha hU~M/ de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di ji lta ba bzhin bcing bar bya'o/ /dngos grub

kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /de nas chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /rdo rje nor bu ni rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin no/ /sA bA rA sA ra

te ka hA da~M ti he bA kan ka ra ya ma/ de nas mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni gnas ci bzhin par gzhag par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las ye shes

kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /sarba ta thA ga ta karma ab+b+hi She ka hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa

'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra hU~M kA ra a b+hi Shi ka / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta a b+hi She ka hU~M/ de nas byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba d+harma a b+hi She ka rat+na/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa

dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM bi shwa a b+hi She ka hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /

las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /rin chen dgos pa zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre/ /de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du/ /sangs

rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya/ /sems dpa' chen po tshul gyis ni/ /rin chen mchod pa rnams bri'o/ /de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/ /oM ma Ni rat+na pU dzA gra/ oM sarba ar+tha sid d+ha badzra rat+na a b+hi She ka

hU~M/ oM badzra ma Ni d+harma sa ma ye hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na A kar Sha karma sa ma ye hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na rA ga ra ti karma pU dze pra brta/ oM ma Ni rat+ne sA d+hu kA ra pU dza sa ma ye hU~M/ oM ma hA ma Ni rat+na tr-iSh+Ta A kaR+Sha/ oM ma Ni rat+na

mA la pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na sUr+ya lo ka pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+h+wa dza pA ta ka pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na aT+TA T+Ta hA sa pU dze/ oM pad ma ma Ni sa mA d+hi sa mA ye hU~M/ oM sarba d+yA gA nu smr-i ti sa mA d+hi kar+m+ma ka ri hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na

tIk+Sh+Na sa ma ye ts+tshin+da hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na tsakra sa ma ye hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na b+hA She b+ha da b+ha da hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na baR+sha ni hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na karmi N-i hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na ka ba tse rak+Sha mA~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na daM khA da khA da hU~M/ oM ma

Ni rat+na kar+m+ma muSh+Ti hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na lA s+ye pU dza ya ho/ oM ma Ni rat+na mA le a b+hi She ka pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na gI d+ye pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na nri t+ye pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+hu pe pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na puSh+pe pU dzA

ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na A lo ke pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na gan+d+he pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na a~M ku sha A kaR+Sha ya dzaHoM ma Ni rat+na p+shA ge hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na s+pho Ta ba~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na A be sha aH/ de nas las kyi

dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par byas nas bcug ste 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/ /'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig /khyod las kyi sgrib pas non nas shi bar gyur ta re zhes sgo la/ las

kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /mchod pa kun gyis mchod na ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig

mchog /phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni des 'thob bo/ /rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams
cad rab mchod na/ /'gro ba'i dam pa 'dul bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod gyur na/ /skad cig tu ni don kun 'thob/ /de

la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na pU dza ba shi ku ru/ oM rat+na pU dza sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM rat+na pU dzA ya d+harma nA sha ya bA di/ oM rat+na pU dzI karma sarba a na me sA d+ha/

de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni/ /'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur/ /

de nas phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyis dngos grub dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni/ /gnas rnams kun du gzhag par bya/ /

rdo rje dgos pa'i tshul du ni/ /ltag 'og go rim ji bzhin bya/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ twa dza ga d+ha/ t+na dza tu sa/ r+m+ma k+Sh+Na tu Sha/ r+m+ma k+Sha k+Sha d+hi/ rdo rje rin chen gnyis byas la/ /las kyi phyag rgya
de bsgrub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na trA~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

phyag na rdo rjes rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra mA le/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma Ni rat+ne/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra d+harma rat+na/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM bi shwa dr-iSh+Ti/ de
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor

dam pa ste/ /phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag par bya/ /de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas bslab par bya ste/ khyod kyis 'di su la yang ma smra shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /de

nas ye shes bskyed bya ste/ /rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni/ /dpral bar rab tu gzhag na ni/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di gsungs so/ /

oM badzra rat+na sarba a b+hi She ka sarba sid d+hi me pra yats+tsha ra la ra la hU~M tra/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bslab par bya ste/ khyo 'am yang na sdug pa 'am/ /bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung / /dpral ba gnyis ni sprad nas kyang / /

gtugs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de la de bsgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra rat+na sa khi bid+yA d+hA ra s+t+wa/ pra yats+tsha shI g+h+ra~M a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya hi ha ha ha twa/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi bslab bo/ /dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra ma Ni d+hA ra sarba ar+tha sid d+hi me pra yats+tsha ho/ b+ha ga bAn badzra rat+na hU~M/ de nas dkyil

'khor 'di yin te/ de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /dngos grub kyi ni dkyil 'khor ni/ /ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya/ /de nas 'dir ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /
gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i rnams/ /chags par gyur pa'i bde ba ni/ /sangs rgyas la yang phul gyur na/ /las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /ras la
sogs pa la yang sems dpa' 'am phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris te bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i

snying po la/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin pa 'dis bstod do/ /legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na
med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /thegs pa chen po mngon 'dus pa/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po dum bu bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// // bam po brgyad pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la re shig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rgya che/ /bcings nas mkha' dbyings

thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs byin brlabs la/ /rang gi snying du bcug nas ni/ /ci ste 'dod na tshe 'di la/ /zhi ba dam pa mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid 'thob nges 'di bsgrub/ /ci ste mi 'dod dngos grub bzhin/ /

phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang / /de nyid chen po tshig re rer/ /brjod nas kun dang ldan par yang / /thams cad bdag ni yin bsgoms na/ /ci ste 'dod na bdag nyid des/ /de bya gzi can dge ba yi/ /go 'phang tshe 'di nyid la 'thob/ /

mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /de nas dam tshig phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin 'grub pa/ /de ltar bdag ces bsgoms na ni/ /sangs rgyas dang ni gzi chen 'thob/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong

ma bzhin/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ /dag ces brjod na nges par yang / /sangs rgyas dang ni gzi can 'gyur/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /de nas

las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ thams cad kyi ni kun dag par/ /las rnams thams cad sbyangs na ni/ /sangs rgyas gzi can thob ci ste/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i

rigs dam pa'i dngos grub rnams so/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa'i dngos grub kun gyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /dngos grub kun sbyor sangs rgyas kyi/ /bkas ni sems can kun don du/ /phyag rgya chen por bsgrub na ni/ /

tshe de nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do/ /phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni/ /ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin grub pa/ /de bzhin bdag ces bsgoms na ni/ /skad cig gis ni gzi

chen 'thob/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ yi ge med pa'i chos rnams la/ /rab tu spros pa yod min te/ /chos mchog 'di ni brjod byed cing / /bsgoms na gzi can nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas

las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba'i/ /gang gi las rnams byas pa ni/ /rgyal ba rnams la phul byas na/ /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes pad ma'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ 'dod chags ngo bo nyid kyis dag /mu stegs can gyis ming

gyur la/ /de la chags pa'i chos 'di ni/ /theg pa che la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/ ting 'dz-in brtan pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /byams pa chen po bsgoms nas kyang / /cho

ga bzhin ldan khyab byas na/ /skad cig gcig gis gzi can 'thob/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ 'dod chags ngo bo nyid dag ces/ /smra bar gyur pa'i tshul 'di ni/ /'dod chags pha rol

phyin rnyed de/ /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ bdag gi lta dang reg pa dang / /mnyan pa dang ni drang ba'ang rung / /sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /

sdug bsngal kun gyi mthar phyin 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes nor bu'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub

kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po ji bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas kun dbang bdag gyur ces/ /bsgom par bya ba rnams bsgoms nas/ /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud

bshad de/ nam mkha'i snying po 'dra bar ni/ /sems can kun gyi re ba kun/ /yongs su rdzogs par byed gyur cig /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ bdag

nyid kyang ni spangs nas su/ /nor byin rab tu dga' byed cing / /chos byung phyag rgya smra na ni/ /gzi can tshe 'di nyid la 'thob/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ dbul po rnams la phan

pa'i phyir/ /nor bsgrub pa la brtson ldan na/ /gzi can 'gyur ro ci ste yang / /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa rnams

kyi dngos grub thob pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ gang gis 'dod la snyoms zhugs pa/ /de la 'dod pas spyod par byed/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po yi/ /ye shes dam tshig yin
par bshad/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ 'dod pa rnams la chags bral min/ /dam tshig mdzes pa chen po 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa/ /

rgyal bas kyang ni 'da' mi mdzad/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ sems can don du khro min yang / /khro bo chen por rab tu ston/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po yi/ /dam tshig

'di ni 'da' dka'o/ /de la pad ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ rang bzhin dag par shes nas kyang / /de yi dgos pa de byed de/ /pad ma'i rigs ni chen po yi/ /dam tshig 'da'

bar dka' ba'o/ /de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ nyung ngam yang na mang yang rung / /ci tsam nus pa nyid du ni/ /sbyin pas nyi ma stongs par ni/ /bya min dam tshig 'di yin no/ /

rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud

'di gsungs so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas chos zhes grags so zhes/ /brjod na chos nyid yi ge ni/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi phyag rgya che/ /ye shes mchog

gi tshul yin no/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /'dod chags las ni dag pa'i chos/ /bde ba thams cad rab sbyin byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni/ /dngos

grub byed pa'i mchog 'di'o/ /de la rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /sangs rgyas bka' ni sbyang ba dang / /sems can drang bar bya ba'i phyir/ /de la khro bar ma gyur yang / /ma rungs bdud byas dngos grub

'thob/ /de la pad ma'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /pad ma chu yis mi chags pa/ /de bzhin 'dod pas mi chags zhes/ /smra zhing dgos min byed kyang ni/ /sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de

la nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /sbyin dang mnyam pa'i chos med de/ /sgrub par byed cing smra ba ni/ /nor bu'i rigs ni chen po'i chos/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /rigs thams

cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la de bzhin

gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' nyid rnams su/ /ji bzhin du ni btul nas su/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog 'grub sbyin/ /de la de

bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /dus bzhi yi ni tshul dag tu/ /mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni/ /rtag tu ldan pa rnam bzhir yang / /byas nas las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /de la rdo rje'i

rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /ma rungs sems can gnod bya'i phyir/ /dgos pa gang dang gang de byed/ /las kyi rdo rje rigs kyis 'dis/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed/ /de la pad ma'i rigs kyi

las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /'jigs pas gzir la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /ji bzhin par ni 'dul de bzhin/ /'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi las/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub sbyin pa'o/ /de la nor bu'i rigs kyi las

kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur de bzhin du/ /lus can rnams la sbyin pa dang / /re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/ /las kyi don du bsgrub pa'o/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub

kyi cho ga rgyas pa'-i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dgongs/ /'di ni sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid/ /gzhan

la sangs rgyas 'gyur ba med/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /

'di ni de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi/ /chos nyid dngos grub dam pa 'thob/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /dam tshig mchog ni/ bcings

nas kyang / /las rnams thams cad bsgrubs na ni/ /rdo rjes dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/ /chos

kyi phyag rgya brjod byed cing / /rdo rje chos ni chos rnams kyi/ /chos nyid du ni 'dis bsgrubs pa'o/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos nyid ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/ /las kyi

rdo rje snying gar gzhag /chos nyid 'di dag bsgoms na ni/ /las kyi chos nyid thob par 'gyur/ /rigs thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi
rgyud yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /zla ba'i rdo rje tshul gyis ni/ /ji ltar de gnyis kha dog shes/ /de ltar 'jig rten de shes te/ /dag la dag dang dkar 'od gsal/ /chags la dmar dang

dmar ser 'phro shes nas kha dog ji bzhin pa'i/ /de yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa'i/ /phyag rgya chen po

bcings nas ni/ /rang gi lus la ji ltar shes/ /de ltar 'gro ba'i yid shes so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /'phros par gyur nas dkyil 'khor

ni/ /ji lta bur yang mthong 'gyur ba/ /de lta bur ni yid shes so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' 'am sa phyogs phra mo 'am/ /yi ge phreng ba mthong 'gyur na/ /

mdor na kha dog ci 'dra bar/ /shes pa de 'drar nges sems shes/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten kun la bltas nas kyang / /ji lta bur ni snang gyur cing / /mthong bar gyur

na de 'dra bar/ /'gro ba'i sems ni shes par bya/ /de gnyis snyoms par zhugs nas ni/ /'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba dang / /byed pa dang ni 'chags pa'ang rung / /ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs/ /snyoms par zhugs nas bsams

na ni/ /sems can gang dang gang yin pa'i/ /de dang de ni de bzhin du/ /sems can thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i

rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgoms na/ /ye shes kyi ni tshul de yis/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni

de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni ser skya mthong / /sems dpa' nyid ni phyag rgya nyid/ /mngon sum du ni mthong 'gyur

na'o/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do/ /de lta bu'i dbyibs gyur pa yi/ /dbus na sngo bsangs snang na ni/ /rdo rje rigs mchog dngos grub 'thob/ /de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi

dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ de nyid la ni mkha' 'dra ba'i/ /pad ma sngon po lta bur mthong / /pad ma chen po'i rigs rig pa'i/ /dngos grub de ni legs par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi

dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /de nyid mkha' bzhin dri med las/ /'od zer dkyil 'khor 'phro bar ni/ /mthong na dngos grub myur du 'thob/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'i rnams/ /

zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas par/ /dngos grub dus su rang bzhin du/ /bdag nyid kyi ni mdun mthong na'o/ /rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /lus kun de bzhin gshegs rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgoms la/ /de bzhin lus las

byung mthong na'o/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni/ /sgrub pas cho ga

'di yis ni/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni 'phrul gyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub yin no/ /phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni/ /mig gi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang / /gang yang rung

ba des bsams na/ /shin du ring ba'ang mthong 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs/ /phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni/ /rna ba'i rnam shes bskyed nas kyang / /de ni dgos pa gang bsams kyang / /shin du

ring na gnas thob zhes/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni/ /yid kyi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang / /sems can gang la des brtags na/ /de yi sems ni des shes 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen
por zhugs nas ni/ /bdag gam sems can gang yang rung / /yid kyis bltas nas gar skyes pa/ /gzugs ni de yis shes par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho ga

shes pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin no/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang / /rdzu 'phrul gang dang gang 'dod pa/ /de nas gang yang rung bar ni/ /ting 'dzin gyis ni mthong bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems

chen pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal mchog tu ni/ /rab mnyam bzhags pas bcings nas kyang / /cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos/ /mngon

par shes pa lnga 'thob bo/ /khros nas dgos pa thams cad ni/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin bya/ /rdzu 'phrul mig la sogs tshul gyis/ /mngon shes kun bdag nyid du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas

gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog /rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni/ /cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos/ /mngon par shes pa lnga
'thob bo/ /ltag 'og go rim ji bzhin du/ /cho ga bzhin du 'dod pas chags/ /'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis/ /mngon shes thams cad thob 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs/ /de la

'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /don kun grub pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni/ /cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos/ /mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo/ /ltag
'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod byas la/ /mngon shes lnga ni des 'thob bo zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams

cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub

kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yi/ /tshig gis mna' ni 'dor byed cing / /bden pa chen po bsrungs na ni/ /

myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob bo zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i/ /

dam tshig la ni mna' bor la/ /rdo rje'i bden pa bsrungs na ni/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /

ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /shin du 'di las 'da' bar dka'/ /rdo rje 'dzin la mna' dor cing / /bden pa 'di la bsrung bar bya zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i

rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /pad ma chen po'i rigs mchog gi/ pad ma chos la mna' 'dor zhing / /bden pa'i dam tshig bsrung bar bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos

kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /'di las shin du 'da' dka' bar/ /sangs rgyas chos la mna' mdor zhing / /bden pa mchog 'di gsungs na ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni thob par

'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mchod pas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mna'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes brjod nas/ /de yi
'og tu ma bsgrubs pas/ /rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgya rnams/ /nyid kyis bcings nas dam tshig 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i

rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /su ra ta s+t+wa~M zhes brjod na/ /de nyid bskul ba'i bdag nyid che/ /ma bsgrubs par yang phyag rgya kun/ /nyid kyis bcings na 'grub par 'gyur zhes

bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /hU~M zhes bya ba gcig tsam gyis/ /mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /bdag

gam yang na gzhan yang rung / /nyid bcings 'ching du bcug kyang rung / /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /sarba shud d+hA zhes brjod na/ /bdag gam yang na gzhan dag

gis/ /bud med chags la sogs ldan na/ /thams cad du ni grol mi 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /o~M` zhes bya bas mdor bsdu na/ /phyag rgya thams

cad 'grub 'gyur te/ /'jig rten kun gyi mchog nyid kyi/ /rang 'byung nyid la mchod par 'gyur/ /rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dran byed cing / /

sangs rgyas phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub brtan par yang / /bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /

bcings nas de yi mdun du yang / /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni/ /shin du myur bar dngos grub 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dam tshig gi ni mchog

bcings na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni/ /nyi rim du ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / /'jig

rten mgon po bsgoms na ni/ /nyi rim du ni dngos grub thob/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje snying po bsgoms na ni/ /nyi rim

du ni dngos grub 'thob/ /rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud

'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do/ /phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni/ /bdag nyid dang ni mdun du yang / /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /

de nas de ma thag tu 'grub ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i rgyud do/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /

'dod pa bdag ces bsgoms nas kyang / /phyag rgya thams cad bsgrubs na ni/ /grub pa'i mchog ni kun bsgrubs pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub

thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do/ /bdag nyid nyid kyis rdo rje dbyibs/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas sgom byed cing / /phyag rgya thams cad bcings na ni/ /de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ye shes kun 'byung dngos grub kyi/ /pad ma chen po'i rigs la gnas/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bdag

nyid nyid/ /pad ma'i dbyibs su bsgom par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i rgyud do/ /nor bu rin chen
'od zer 'bar/ /bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni/ /nor bu chen po'i rigs mchod na/ /kun las 'byung ba'i dngos grub 'thob ces bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi

dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /

de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /rdo rje dbyings dbang phyag rgya ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/ /bzhag na sangs rgyas
byin rlob bo zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyud yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje dam

byas la/ /snying ga mdzod spu mgrin pa dang / /spyi bor bzhag na byin gyis rlob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /rdo rje hU~M gi phyag rgya ni/ /rab

mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/ /bzhag na nyid du byin gyis rlob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtso bos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi byin gyis brlab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/

'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje pad ma dam byas la/ /snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/ /byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di

ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyud do/ /rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/ /byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos

gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di

gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni/ /dpral bar rab tu gzhag byas na/ /rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen gyis/ /dbang bskur bar ni de 'gyur

ro zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje dbyings dbang la sogs pa/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya mdun nas ni/ /

brtsam pa byas nas ngos bzhir yang / /phreng ba nyid kyis dbang bskur 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /rdo rje dbang gi phreng ba ni/ /bcings nas dpral bar bzhag na yang / /phreng ba'i

dbang ni de yin te/ /rdo rje rnams ni de dbang 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chos kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang / /mgo bor bzhag ste de dbang bskur/ /sangs rgyas kyis

ni 'jig rten gyi/ /dbang phyug gis ni dbang bskur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje rin chen myu gu bcings/ /
dpral bar bzhag ste des dbang bskur/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni mchod pa yi/ /dbang phyug tu ni dbang bskur 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i

dngos grub kyi rgyud do de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad

kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rgyal ba kun gyi rnam par ni/ /phyag rgya mnyam par bzhag par bcings/ /zlos shing sngags kyi rig pa ni/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems dpa'i byin brlabs tshul gyis ni/ /ting 'dzin rdo rje chos kyis kyang / /snying po phyag rgya

sngags rigs rnams/ /zlos pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /'dod chags
las ni khyod phyung ste/ /bdag ni khro bo yin bsgoms nas/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad

ma rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten dbang po rig zlos pas/ /byams pas 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /snying po la sogs bsgrubs na yang / /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur zhes bcom
ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag par bsgoms na yang / /

snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams/ /bsgrubs na kun du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos
grub kyi rgyud de/ rab mnyam bzhag pas dang por ni/ /bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la/ /da nas dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam bzhi yis/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod byed cing / /bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yi/ /mchod

pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro bo rdo rje mchod chen po/ /khro bo gsang ba brjod byed cing / /

khro bo'i khu tshur rab sbyar na/ /myur du bdag gi rigs 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba'i/ /tshul
rnams legs par brjod nas kyang / /yid dang ngag gis phul na ni/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi

mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /gdugs dang 'phan dang rgyal mtshan gyis/ /rgyal po'i mchod pas mchod byed cing / /sbyin pa thams cad byin na ni/ /nor bu'i rigs ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das

rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /nyid la byin gyis brlabs sogs ldan/ /rdo rje sems dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi yis ni/ /rdo rje sna tshogs ting 'dzin gyis/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par

'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes

pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin no/ /lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ni/ /'di ni bde gshegs nyid mngon shes/ /de ni rab tu rtogs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub 'thob/ /ces sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /'phrul gyi mig sogs mngon shes ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms
nas kyang / /mngon shes lnga ni bdag gyur na/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos
grub kyi rgyud de/ khro bo mngon shes bskyed nas ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na yang / /mngon shes lnga ni bdag gyur nas/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas
gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang / /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ /mngon shes lnga ni bdag

'gyur nas/ /dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa'i mngon
shes bskyed nas kyang / /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ /mngon shes lnga yang bdag gyur nas/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad

mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di

gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas dran byed cing / /sangs rgyas byang
chub ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos

grub kyi rgyud do/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /phyag rgya chen por sgom byed cing / /byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos

gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings la/ /byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms na

dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin gnas/ /de bzhin

chos kyi phyag rgya bzlas/ /byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byang

chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /las kyi phyag rgya las legs byed/ /byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan

'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /nyid kyi sangs rgyas byang chub phyir/ /sems can
don rnams rab byed cing / /sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes

par bya ba gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ji ltar yul dang ldan 'gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed ces/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sgom byed cing / /de nyid bskul na myur bar ni/ /mnyes par 'gyur ba

des 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mnyes par byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas bka' ni bsrung ba dang / /sems can don ni spyad pa'i phyir/ /rngam

pas mngon spyod byas na ni/ /rdo rje rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma rigs mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /chags

pa kun du blta ba dang / /byams dang snying rjes chos smra dang / /mi 'jigs kun sbyin byed pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mnyes par byed ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs

mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dbang bskur ba ni rab sbyin dang / /nor bsags rab tu sbyin byed cing / /de yang sangs rgyas don du sbyor/ /'di ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa

nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi

dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de ltar rnam dag bde sbyin pa/ /'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya/ /sems can

kun gyi don du brtson/ /'di ni sangs rgyas dbang du byed ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /'dod sten

bde ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /su ra ta s+t+wa~M zhes smra zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrubs na ni/ /de nyid bskul na dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i

dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /sangs rgyas bka' ni sems can rnams/ /dag bya lus can skyabs sbyin dang / /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ /bsad na yang ni dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs

so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ pad ma 'dab ma kha 'byed cing / /'dod chags dag la kun rtog la/ /gdul ba'i phyir ni chags byed cing / /'dod par byed pa dbang du 'gyur zhes

bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur phyir/ /rdo rje rin chen nyin re

rer/ /spyi bor bzhag ste dbang bskur na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi

rgyud de/ sems can kun don ma mthong zhing / /sangs rgyas de nyid ma sbyangs la/ /yid dang ngag dang lus kyis ni/ /bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis

gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dngos grub thams cad ma thob la/ /rigs rnams kyang ni mi brtson zhing / /rdo rje kun du brtags nas ni/ /bsad na dngos

grub myur du thob ces bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ma rungs mi brtul khro med cing / /de bzhin sems can mi 'dul la/ /bdag

nyid sdug bsngal 'thob byed na/ /hU~M zhes bya bas bsad par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ snying rje med cing byams med la/ /
sems can ma rungs mi sbyong zhing / /bdag nyid kyis ni bslus na yang / /bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la
'di ni nor bu rigs kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mi gtong bdag la nor med cing / /nor stor ba dang gnod byed la/ /dbul por gyur la sems can rnams/ /bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes
bcom ldan 'das re ba thams cad skong bas gsungs so/ /kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /rnal 'byor ma thob gsod bcug na/ /de dag drang bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bdag gi dngos grub sbyin par bya zhes bcom
ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du bzang pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsrung ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can thams cad mi gtong
zhing / /rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod bdag nyid/ /rtag par sangs rgyas yid la byed/ /'di ni bsrung ba rmad kyi mchog ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin

gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig /lan gcig tsam yang brjod gyur na/ /'di ni bsrung ba rtag chen po/ /skad cig dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan

'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rigs dang rgyud kyis chog mi shes/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid kyi/ /rdo rje hU~M la mos byed pa/ /'di ni bdag dang

gzhan la bsrung zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod chags dag cing byams pa che/ /thams cad la ni mi 'jigs sbyin 'jig rten

dbang gi mtshan zlos pa/ /bsrung ba 'di ni rmad du che zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas sems can gtong byed par/ /ci nus par

ni sbyor byed cing / /nyi ma stong par mi bya bar/ /bsrung ba 'di ni rmad kyi mchog ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsrung bas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub
sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rgyud 'di bzhes par gsol/ gang gis sems can thams cad

brtag pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu gyur nas rtogs par bgyi ste/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje la legs par bshad pas nged kyis blangs shing byin gyis brlabs kyis legs so legaso/ /

so/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /

theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/ /legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos ni khyod legs te/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las brtag pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la dang po 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud de/ sangs rgyas byang chub ting nge 'dzin/ /rab mnyam bzhag
pas bsgoms na ni/ /byang chub bde bas thob par 'gyur/ /bsams nas de ni rtogs par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems dpa' rdo rje snying gar bcings/ /nga yi chung ma khyod sdug pa/ /brtan par gyur cig ces smras nas/ /phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub
bya ste/ /cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /rang gi las rnams ma grub kyang / /gsang ba'i chung ma zhes smras na/ /shin du dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de

la 'di ni rdo rje rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ji lta ba bzhin bsgrubs na yang / /dngos grub thob par ma gyur na/ /hU~M gi phyag rgyas bsad na ni/ /skrag ste dngos grub sbyin par byed ces bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud de/ ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / /rdo rje blta bas bltas nas kyang / /bdag gi chung

ma'am gzhan chung ma/ /sdug pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i 'dod pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs dam pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ /

bde ba'i mchog ces smra byed cing / /sangs rgyas kun la nyid dbang po/ /phul na myur du dngos grub 'gyur ces bcom ldan 'das nor bu bzhed pas gsungs so/ /rigs dam pa thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga

rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i

rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes brjod cing / /bud med kun la chags byas la/ /sems can don gyis mi skyo na/ /nges par sangs rgyas des mnyes so zhes bcom ldan 'das

rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de 'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed pa/ /rdo rje rnams kyi
gsang dam tshig /'di ni bsrung na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ gsod pa 'jig
rten thams cad gsod/ /lus dang ngag la dam dgyes pa/ /'jig rten rnam par sbyangs nas ni/ /dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas
gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ dag pa'i bdag nyid 'dod chags dag /mu stegs rnal 'byor ma dag la/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig ni/ /bsrung

na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis/ /

rdo rje nor bu sngar bcings la/ /ma rungs rnams kyi nor phrogs na/ /dam tshig dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i

rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi
dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /dgos pa thams cad byas nas kyang / /sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub 'thob ces bcom ldan 'das
rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ sems can kun la chags byed cing / /yul la skyo bar ma gyur la/ /bud med dga' ba'i

dag pa ni/ /gsang chos dngos grub rab sbyin no/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rna yi hU~M gi sbyor ba yis/ /phra ba'i rdo rje
ting 'dzin gnas/ /mi 'grub rnal 'byor 'di bsad ces/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rjes bsgyel/ /dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig dam pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad

ma rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /bud med kun dang brtse byed cing / /chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das

kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ /re ba thams cad yongs bkangs nas/ /bud med dam
ni sdug pa yi/ /dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen

po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting
'dzin gyis/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgoms la/ /bud med lugs kyi bu gar blugs/ /bud med rnams ni dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'-i ting 'dzin gnas/ /bu ga nas ni de bzhin zhugs/ /bud med lus su legs khyab byas/ /sems med pa yang mgu bar

'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dgyes pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje hU~M gi phyag rgya ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /khros nas

bu gar zhugs na ni/ /yid kyis de ni dbab par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ /chos kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni/ /
bcings nas pad ma'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bu gar bcug na bud med rnams/ /thams cad kyang ni bsrungs bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad mas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi
las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi rdo rje nor bur bcings/ /bu gar bcug na bud med rnams/ /nyid du phab nas gar byed 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
rin po ches gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil
'khor dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni/ /gsang

ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing / /phyag rgya bud med rnams kyis bskor/ /des ni sangs rgyas gzhag par bya/ /gsang ba der ni zhugs nas kyang / /sangs rgyas la ni nyid du smra/ /'di khyab pa yi btsun mo ste/ /
kun gtong bas ni bdag sogs zhes/ /rigs rnams kun gyi phyag rgya ni/ /tshul rnams la yang de skad brjod/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam med pa'i/ /gsang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud de dbyings dang 'dra bar ni/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar bya/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams ni/ /thams cad kyi ni mchog 'tshal te/ /dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs nas kyang / /dngos grub 'dod pas myur bar ni/ /su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+wa~M ho/ badzra satwa Ad+ya sid d+h+ya mA~M/ ces
brjod snying po 'di bzlas te/ /bsgrubs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid bskul ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /mgu nas myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di
ni rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dra bar ni/ /rdo rje rigs kun rnams kyi ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jug par yang / /mkhas pas
legs par bri bar bya/ /der zhugs nas ni myur ba yang / /dngos grub gsol ba 'debs byed cing / /'dod chags las ni khyod 'byung zhes/ /zhes smras kun du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo

rje hU~M gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i r-igs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ pad ma'i rigs n-i thams cad kyi/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul du ni/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor
bri bar bya/ /der zhugs nas ni brjod bya ba/ /'dod chags chos te pad ma che/ /khyab pas bdag ni myur dngos grub/ /de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor ni/ /kun gyi des ni dngos grub thob ces bcom ldan 'das
'jig rten dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ nor bu chen po'i rigs rnams ni/ /don kun 'grub pa'i tshul du yang / /dkyil
'khor legs par bris na ni/ /zhugs nas 'di skad smra bar bya/ /bsam pa kun gyi dngos grub las/ /'dod chags bsam pa dngos grub mchog /grub shig grub shig sems dpa' che/ /bcom ldan thams
cad grub pa po/ /de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor kun/ /zhugs nas mchod gsang bla med pa'i/ /dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur/ /phyin chad dngos grub bdag nyid kyis/ /bsgrubs na dngos grub 'grub
par 'gyur/ /gang tshe myur du mi 'grub na/ /de nyid bskul na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga

rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin

gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba'i rgyud dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha mo che/ /sdug cing bde ba kun sbyin pa/ /bden las byung ba'i tshig bden pas/ /bsgrubs kyang de ni ma grub na'o/ /zhes

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ltag 'og go rim ji bzhin du/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings nas

ni/ /'di ni de nyid gsang ba yi/ /rdo rje tshul gyis 'di smros shig /bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /khyod nga'i chung ma snying la gnas/ /lus kun la ni mkhyud nas kyang / /rdo rje 'gying bas 'gying bar mdzod/ /rdo
rje 'gying ba'i lha mo che/ /de nyid bskul bas chags 'gyur bas/ /lus kun la ni brtan 'gyur nas/ /ji bzhin myur du dngos grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'gying ba'i bdag pos gsungs so/ /de la

'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dngos grub dam tshig grub pa ni/ /khyod dgyes dam tshig bdag yin no/ /zhes bskul myur du chags gyur na/ /rab tu yang ni 'grub par 'gyur

zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rtogs pa sems dpa' rtogs chen khyod/ /bdag gi chung ma shin dgyes

mdzod/ /zhes ni bskul na myur bar yang / /rjes su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/

las kun byed pa'i chung ma khyod/ /bdag la 'grub mdzod rdo rje ma/ /rdo rje can gyis bskul myur bar/ /rjes su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rig pa thams

cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /

de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mu stegs can rnams phan gdags phyir/ /ri mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du ni/ /sangs rgyas btsun mo rab sba bar/ /shes
na rab tu grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/
sems can kun gyi yid la khyab/ /sems can kun la bde sbyin zhing / /sems can kun gyi yab nyid ni/ /dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa'i mchog ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
gsungs so/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i mchog ste rmad che bar/ /dad ldan shes nas dad byas nas/ /bsgrub dka' ba yang 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas

gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chags pa dag pa'i chags bral gyi/ /sems can don gyi yid byung nas/ /mu stegs lta bar byas pa ste/ /lta ba ngan pa'i

gcong rong ltung / /theg pa che la dgod pa'i phyir/ /gsod pa'i tha tshigs mchog yin te/ /de ltar shes na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi

dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mu stegs can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ /'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung / /mi gtsang zhes ni ci phyir brjod/ /nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das

rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bud med chags phyir rin chen rnams/ /rtag tu legs par bsag par bya/ /bud med bla med rin chen zhes/ /bsams

nas de ni grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du mdzad pas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud
de/ bud med chags rnams yongs bskor la/ /kun nas brtses pa'i bde ba ni/ /sangs rgyas mchod phyir phul na yang / /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs

so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rab dgas ngal te skyo ba na/ /rab dga' las byung bde ba de/ /phyag bzhi pos ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /phul na myur du grub
par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ hU~M gi dam tshig bcings nas ni/ /skye bo bud med 'khyud nas ni/ /

'khyud par 'gyur ba'i skye bo de/ /phul na de ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ 'jig rten dbang por bdag

bsgoms la/ /sdug pa'i gong du bltas nas ni/ /bltas par gyur pa'i bde ba de/ /phul na de ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i spyan gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos

grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ las kyi phyag rgya bcings 'gyur la/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas kyang / /bud med 'khyud pa'i longs spyod ni/ /mchod phyir phul na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen gyis

gsungs so/ /r-igs thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub

kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas su ni bdag bsgoms la/ /ci nas sus kyang mi tshor bar/ /gzhan gyi bud med rtse

byed na/ /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rgyud de/ rdo rje 'jo ma byas nas kyang / /rdo rje phreng ba

'ching byed cing / /de nas rdo rje glu blangs la/ /rdo rje gar gyis mchod byas la/ /'dod pa'i dga' bas dbang bskur mchog /glu dang gar gyi bde ba las/ /bde ba gzhan gyis myong min te/ /de phyir gsang mchog 'di bla med/ /
de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal bsgom/ /cho ga ji bzhin tshul du yang / /gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod na ni/ /mchod pa'i dngos
grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi mchod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgyar gnas/ /gsang ba'i

tshul ni ci bzhin par/ /las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na/ /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi

gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don kun grub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gsang ba'i tshul ni ji bzhin par/ /las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na/ /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das

rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub

kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ mdor na ting 'dzin ye shes las/ /sems can rnams la chags tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub

'gyur na/ /myur du bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid chen po bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/

sems can thog ma tha ma med/ /nam mkha' 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /'dod pa'i 'gro ba kun bdag po/ /sems can kun gyi sems gang ni/ /bstan phyir sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /

rdo rje mnyam par mnyam gzhag na nges par rdo rje nyid gyur pa/ /sems dpa'i byin brlabs tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du gyur/ /bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid de/ /rdo rje bzhad pa de bzhin gshegs/ /
nyid sems rab tu rtogs la sogs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin/ /de nyid bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /thams cad kyi ni rigs su 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas

gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid de/ /de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po/ /de nyid pad ma'i rigs dag pa/ /de nyid nor bu'i rigs kyi mchog ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor

los gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya

mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid ni/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' thugs la gnas/ /mnyam par bzhag las ting 'dzin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i

mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rab tu rtogs phyir rdo rje ste/ /gzung ba'i tshul gyis lcags kyu yin/ /phra mo rtogs phyir mda' yin la/ /mgu bar gyur phyir legs zhes bya/ /spras pa'i
phyir yang rin chen gsungs/ /gzi brjid tshul gyis nyi ma ste/ /rgyal mtshan legs par sgreng bar gsungs/ /mdzub phyir bzhad par grags pa la/ /'dod chags dag phyir pad ma yin/ /ral gris nyon mongs dgra

gcod yin/ /dkyil 'khor tshul du 'khor lo ste/ /tshig gis brjod pas smra zhes bya/ /rgya gram tshul du kun rdo rje/ /mi tshugs tshul gyis go cha yin/ /'jigs byed tshul gyis mche ba ste/ /phyag rgya'i tshul gyis
bsdams pa'o/ /ji ltar bcom ldan sems rtag pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' kun 'gro ba/ /de bzhin rdo rje mtshan la sogs/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi mtshan mas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi

phyag rgya bcing ba skye ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting
'dzin gnas/ /rdo rje dkyil mo dkrung bcings la/ /lag gnyis rdo rjer bsdams pa las/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin

gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ ji ltar rgyal po nyid phyag rgya/ /rgyal po khrims la 'debs pa ltar/ /bdag nyid chen po skye bo rnams/ /sku gsung

thugs ni rdo rje yi/ /gzugs brnyan gyi ni tshul du yang / /nyid kyi phyag rgya btab pa ni/ /bdag nyid che ba'i phyag rgya cher/ /shes na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen pos

gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ ji ltar dam tshig dam pa ni/ /skye bo 'gas ni bcing gyur na/ /shin du 'da' bar mi bya ba/ /de ltar de

bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa yis/ /rdo rje bcing ba'i mchog bcings na/ /ma shi bar du mi 'da' bar/ /shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis

gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ mdor na rgyal bas rdo rje bka'/ /'de' bar bya ba ma yin te/ /'di ni bcings par shes nas kyang / /

des ni chos kyi dngos grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje las kyi rigs kyi phyag bcings pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje bka' dang las mang rnams/ /

'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing / /bka' nyan pa yi las de ni/ /shes na myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos

grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag gis yongs su gzung zhing byin gyis

brlabs so/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po sngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na/ /legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ /

rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas
rjes su dran tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi ting 'dzin ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms na yang / /bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chags pas rjes su dran tshul gyis/ /sems dpa' thams cad ting 'dzin gnas/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ /
dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khams gsum
rnam rgyal cha lugs su/ /bsgoms nas mdun dang de bzhin te/ /phyag na rdo rje'i mthur gyur nas/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
pad ma'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i chos su ni/ /bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan par/ /'dul bar de ni rab byed ces/ /bcom ldan

'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don kun grub pa'i skur yang ni/ /bsgoms na mdun du de bzhin te/ rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi/ /phun sum

tshogs don des 'thob bo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs

rgyas rjes su dran 'gyur la/ /rdo rje phra mo tshul gyis ni/ /badzra badzra zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i

rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin du/ /rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing / /badzra satwa zhes brjod na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /

de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su/ /dran byed mdun du de bzhin te/ /hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod na/ /dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom

ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis ni/ /rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing / /sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya zhes brjod na/ /

dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don grub pa yi gzugs kyis ni/ /rdo rje phra mo

bsgoms nas kyang / /sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya zhes brjod na/ /don gyi dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i chos kyis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga

rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dam pa'i chos ni yi ge med/ /ting 'dzin ye shes 'byung ba ste/ /a zhes bya bas chos rnams ni/ /skye ba med par dgongs pa ste/ /phyag rgya 'di yi
tshul gyis ni/ /shes pas bsgoms te de nas kyang / /yi ge kun gyi ye shes ni/ /bde gshegs skad cig gis 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de bzhin gshegs kun de nyid kyi/ /mdo sde 'di ni dad pa yis/ /dad nas bcangs sam klags gyur

na/ /dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdig pa'i sems can phan don du/ /sdig can

sdig spyod bzlog pa dang / /sangs rgyas bka' ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /bsad pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes

kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /'dod chags rang bzhin dag par shes/ /dam pa'i don du dgongs nas kyang / /thog ma tha mar 'di bsgoms na/ /chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can kun gyi don phyir sbyin/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed cing / /chos bsgoms
'di ni nor bu yi/ /rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das chos rin chen gyis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub

sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las

kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas kyi ni ting 'dzin las/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa/ /'di ni bsgom par byas nas kyang / /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis

gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bla med dang ni las mang rnams/ /sems dpa' kun 'gyur thams cad dang / /

shes na yang ni grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdig pa dag pa rgyu ba'i phyir/ /mtshams med byed las

mi zlogs na/ /gsod pa'i las la dad pa na/ /des ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/
sdig kun rnam par dag pa'i bdag /kun dag pas na dgos pa kun/ /des byed las 'di yin no bar/ /shes na yang ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sred ldan dbul po thams cad kyi/ /rtag tu bsam pa kun bkang la/ /don kun grub pas kun bdag ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med ces bcom ldan

'das rin po che rgyal mtshan gyis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

rigs phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rtag tu rdo rje phra mo'i tshul/ /'bad pa kun gyi sbyor na ni/ /rnam pa'i
mchog kun ldan pa yi/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub
kyi rgyud de/ slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni/ /slob ma ma yin bu min pa'i/ /mdun du phyag rgya mi brjod de/ /de dag gsang ba phyag rgya 'grub ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la

'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /sna nas hU~M byung ldan gyur la/ /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed ces bcom

ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ pad ma chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje blta bas bltas na ni/ /

'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad ma bzhad pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje

phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /shin du phra ba'i lta 'bar bas/ /don ni thams cad 'dren par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mig gi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi ye shes

kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gang tshe phyag rgya'am ting nge 'dzin/ /bsgrub phyir stsol bar gyur pa na/ /gang tshe mkha' la skar ma 'dra/ /dkar po rgyug par des mthong na/ /de tshe blo ldan sangs rgyas kyi/ /spyan ni
bdag gis thob 'gyur zhes/ /phyin cad sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /rtog pa kun las bsgrub par bya zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi spyan

gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gnas dang 'gro ba de bzhin te/ /ji snyed dngos po yod 'gyur ba/ /de snyed kyi ni gzugs brnyan rnams/ /mkha' rgyug 'gro ba'am 'ong yang rung / /mthong na rdo rje spyan dag par/ /
