shes pas mchod na dngos grub ni/ /bla na med pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ g.yas pa'am ni g.yon

phyogs kyi/ /mkha' la nam mkha'i dbyings nyid ni/ /sprin 'drar myur du 'khor bar yang / /mig gis mthong bar gyur pas kyang / /rdo rje las byung phyag rgya de/ /mthong nas 'jigs par ma gyur la/ /phyag rgya de ni

bzung na ni/ /rdo rje spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gang tshe skya 'am dmar ba dang / /dkar ba'am ser
ba'am sna tshogs kyi/ /dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /dgongs 'gyur 'khor lo'i spyan 'grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad mas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes

kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mkha' la rin chen 'dra ba dang / /gser la sogs par 'dra bar ni/ /gang tshe mkha' mthong mkha' yi mig /de ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs
so/ /rigs thams cad kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi las dam pa'i
dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ /'dod chags bde ba rnam smin phyir/ /
gtso bo thams cad mchod byas pa/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi
rgyud de/ 'dod chags bdag ces sgom byed cing / /gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas na/ /rdo rje 'dod pa'i gzi can mnyam/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bzhad pas gsungs
so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro ba bdag ces sgom byed cing / /gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas pa/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dra ba yi/ /dngos grub
dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nang du song ba'i yid kyis ni/ /'dod
pa dam par sgom byed cing / /dbyangs dang ldan pa'i yi ge yis/ /sangs rgyas mngon par mchod na ni/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs
kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje snying por mnyam bzhag la/ /bsam pa g.yos pas btud nas ni/ /phyag la rtag tu brtson byas
na/ /dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbang rin po ches gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i
dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod la sogs pa'i bde ba kun/ /rtag tu bdag gi snying la gnas/ /e ma'o sems can don rnams la/ /skyong bar gyur pa gang bshad rmad/ /'di ni las kyi dam tshig ste/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin du/ /bsgoms nas sangs rgyas mchod na ni/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las
kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /sems can kun la bde sbyin pa'i/ /kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te/ /mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes

bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so/ /de la rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can kun la phan byed pa'i/ /kun bzang khro bo bdag yin te/ /rdo rje hU~M gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /

mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'i/ /
kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te/ /bdag nyid 'gro 'dul skur gnas la/ /mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad ma chags pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las
dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can kun la don chen sbyin/ /kun bzang rgyal po bdag yin te/ /don kun 'grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes
bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi las kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rang gi ting nger 'dzin pa
yis/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mos mdud nas ni/ /go char bcings te spyi bor bzhag /shin du yang ni bsrungs par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las

kyi rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ brtsig pa la ni ldan 'dra ba/ /ri mor bris nas mtshan bsgreng ste/ /mnyes na bud med gang bsams pa/ /de ni 'di yi dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das

'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sa la gnod sbyin gdong bris te/ /de yi mig gi phyogs su ni/ /mdzub mo'i sen mo btsugs na yang / /bud

med mchog ni 'dren par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ lag pa gnyis su pad ma blangs/ /'dod chags dag pa

lta byed cing / /rdo rje lta bas bud med de/ /bltas na yang ni dga' bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad ma 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje
rin chen ting 'dzin gnas/ /lag pa gnyis kyis nor bu bzung / /hU~M zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /bud med kun la 'dud byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M gis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi

dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gsheg
sa pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa'i las kyi cho gar sbyar/ /gang dang gang gi dgos bsams pa/ /de dang de ni gsol btab ste/ /mkhas pas phyag rgya bsgrub par bya zhes
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa'i

cho gar sbyar/ /dgos pa gang zhig smras pa de/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
de/ khro bo'i ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang / /rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod chen byas/ /mkhas pas cung zad gang bsams pa/ /de ni myur du dngos grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bos gsungs so/ /
de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /yid kyis mchod pa byas nas kyang / /mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa/ /de
yi dngos grub thams cad thob ces bcom ldan 'das pad ma 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bdug
pa la sogs mchod byas la/ /mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa/ /de kun skad cig nyid 'grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i
dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin

gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya rab bsgrubs pas/ /dngos grub dam pa thob
par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ kun
gyi bdag nyid sems dpa' ni/ /bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste/ /sems dpa' bdag ces byin brlabs la/ /bdag ces bya ba'i nga rgyal gyis/ /bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ sems dpa' ji

bzhin phyag rgya bzhin/ /phyag rgya ji bzhin bdag de bzhin/ /cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs

kyi chos kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas la/ /ngag g-i phyag rgyas de dag kun/ /sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin
ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas kun la
dbang bskur dang / /mchod dang dam tshig dngos grub rnams/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bsgoms nas kyang / /rdo rje las rnams bsgrub par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gsungs so/ /rigs thams
cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo 'di legs

par bshad pas na/ /legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus
pa las brtag pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // bam po dgu pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di

gsungs so/ /lta ba ngan cing chags bral la/ /gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs te/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de la 'di ni snying po'i yo byad
dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud yin te/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas/ bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog dang / dri'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod pa byas te/ de nas rdo rje tshig gis bzlas pa brtsam
par bya'o/ /de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ zla ba bzhir gnas ji bzhin par 'dug ste/ dus bzhir bdug pa la sogs pas cho ga bzhin du mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod de/ phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag byas la sngags 'di bzhis bdag gi lus dbul zhing mchod pa

bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pas+thA nA ya Ata mA~M na~M nir yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwA tiSh+tha sa mA~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA a b+hi She kA ya Ata mA na~M nir yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi

Shiny+tsa mA~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra brte nA ya At+ma na~M nir yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra brta ya mA~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA karma ne Ata mA na~M nir yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma

ku ru mA~M/ de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang ma bral la kha zas kun dang 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod cing bdag nyid/ snying po'i don du sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mdun du tshig tsam gyis

kyang bsgoms la ci dga' bar byed cing rdo rje tshigs gis lan brgya rtsa bzlas na myur bar dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /ci ste bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'dod na
de ni ras la bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbus na bzhugs/ de'i sems dpa' chen po bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du kha dog dang rgyan rnams ci dga' bar bya ste/ bri zhing sems dpa' chen po rnams

zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs la rigs kyi lha mo rnams grwa rnams su bri'o/ /de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas la dzab bya ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas

mthar mchod pa rgya cher byas la mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan

'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /yang na phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na ni des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi phyag rgya'i spyan sngar ci dga' ba bzhin du

ji lta ba bzhin bcings zhing bkrol te rdo rje'i tshig 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mthar mtshan thog thag ngal mi bso bar cung zad tsam zhig phyag rgya bkrol te/ ji lta ba bzhin bcings nas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas

phyag rgya 'bar zhing 'bab la 'phar zhing nyung bar smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings bzhin du nam mkha' la lding bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs ci dga' ba dang / mi snang ba dang las thams cad kyang byed par

'gyur ro/ /bcings ma thag tu phyag rgya thams cad kyis kyang las thams cad ji lta ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /yang na ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par 'dod na ni/

des rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams te/ ting nge 'dzin de gang la dga' ba'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la/ de nas mthar mtshan thog thag skyil mo dkrung mi zhig par snyoms par zhugs

te 'dug par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de nas ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems

dpas gsungs so/ /ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du bzlas zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgrubs la/ de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur

ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste las shig bya bar 'dod na yang lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis bdag dang gzhan dang grong dang grong khyer rnams go cha bcing ba la sogs pas bsrungs par 'gyur

ro/ /dbab pa yang bya ste tsan dan dri zhim pos gdon gyis zin pa dang / gdon gyis ma zin pa rnams rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang mda' dang / lag pa dang / rin po che dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang so'i phreng ba dang pad ma dang /

ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lce dang rdo rje rgya gram dang / go cha dang mche ba dang / khu tshur gyi phyag rgya la sogs pa dngos po thams cad la lan gcig brjod pas 'bebs par byed do/ /sgyu ma'i las kyang byed de/ rma bya'i mjug

sgro'i nang du rdo rje bcug ste bcings la/ de nas rma bya'i 'jug sgro de sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya babs kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas rma

bya'i mjug sgro las gzugs sna tshogs pa la sogs par snang bar 'gyur te/ de phyin cad rma bya'i mjug sgro rang gi lus la cho ga bzhin du gzugs thams cad kyang ston te/ mjug sgro de nyid lan gcig bzlas te/ bskor bas

kyang bdag nyid las gzugs thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mjug sgro de nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu ma'i las rnams kyang ston/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs brnyan yang ston/ phyogs

bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis/ bdud sde dang bcas pa rnams 'dul ba la sogs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa la sogs

pa mdzad pa rnams kyang ston pa nas/ bdag nyid las rnams pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang ston pa'i bar du'o/ /ci ste dbang du byed par 'dod na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi sems ma'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la phyag rgya de 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed cing dbang du byed

na sems dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ci ste 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod na yang des dang po kho nar de bzhin du/ bzlos shing zla ba gcig tu brgyad stong bzlas la

de nas mthar phyag rgya bcings te de bzhin du mtshan thog thag phyag rgya 'bar gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de phyin cad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi dngos grub gang yang rung ba gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan

'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas rdo rje rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por ni sngar bsnyen

pa bya ste/ de ltar ci 'dod pa bzhin du yi ge 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /de'i mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa byas la de phyin chad sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / chad pas gcad par nus
par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /'on te bsgrub par 'dod na yang / des ji lta ba bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs bris la/ des de bzhin du mchod pa byas nas zla ba gcig tu 'dod

pa kun la longs spyod cing ci dga' ba bzhin du byas nas brgya stong du bzlas par dus bzhir rdo rje'i tshig gis zlos zhing zla ba'i mthar phyin pa dang / ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas nas rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i

phyag rgya bcings la phyag rgya bcings pa de las hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mdun du

gnas nas bka' nod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rigs 'dzin gyis 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/ /gang gi tshe ngas khyod tshur shog 'di byos shig /ces bsgo ba de'i tshe na khyod 'dir 'ongs la nga'i bka' bzhin byos
shig /de phyin cad 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag por 'gyur te/ yud tsam gyis kyang sa gsum pa thams cad la ci dgar bka' stsol cing / bskor te slar 'ongs nas kyang phan gdags pa dang / chad pas

gcad pa rnams byed cing lha rdzas kyi 'jig rten gsum longs spyod la nye bar spyad nas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du byed cing lha thams cad kyi dbang po'i bud med la sogs pa bud med thams cad mgu bar byas nas/

nye bar spyad kyang de la su gang gis byas kyang gnod par byed nus pa med de hU~M zhes bya bas lha la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad gnon cing de nas bskal pa chung ngu'i stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom

ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod pa na yang ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas pa byas la bzlas pa'i/ mthar rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ mtshan thog thag tu bzlas

par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas hU~M zhes bya ba dang ldan par ji lta ba'i cho ga bzhin du/ phyag rgya bcings na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / gzugs sna tshogs ston pa dang /

mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / sgyu ma rnams ston pa dang / thams cad la dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / thams cad kyi dga' ba bskyed par bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad 'phrog pa dang 'od zer 'bar ba chen

po bstan pa dang / rin po che'i char 'bebs par bstan pa dang / rgad mo cher rgad pa dang / sems can thams cad sbyang ba dang / gcad pa dang dbye ba dang dus kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin pa'i de kho na nyid brjod pa

dang / las thams cad la 'jug pa dang / bsrung dang rmongs pa dang gnon pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / bsad pa dang / sems can thams cad phyag rgya gdab pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba la 'jug pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang /

dngos po thams cad glu len du bzhugs pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbab pa la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas

gsungs so/ /ci ste rdo rje phra mo bsgrub par 'dod na yang des rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du bsgom zhing de bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis/ zla ba gcig tu bsgrub par bya ste de nas mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid
kyis mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / tshar gcad pa nus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan

'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du zlos zhing zla ba gcig tu bsgrub la de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro
zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de nas las rnams byed par 'dod na yang lan gcig brjod de yid kyis bsam pas bsrung ba la sogs pa las/ thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /

rdo rje rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas pad ma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bsgrub
par bya ste ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris la de'i/ phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du sems dpa' chen po bzhi bris la grwa rnams su lha mo rnams
bri'o/ /de nas bzlas pa'i cho ga de bzhin du rgyas par byas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byon

te dus ji bzhin par dam pa'i skabs 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang des de bzhin du pad ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la

stong phrag brgyad tshang bar brjod pa'i bar du dus bzhir bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu phyag rgya bcings te bzlas pa byas la nam langs pa dang dngos grub du 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya

bcings pas ji lta ba bzhin 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byed do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /ci ste ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul du bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du

zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji ltar dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas

gsungs so/ /ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /

pad ma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rnam
bzhi byas la 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la/ de nas de bzhin du bsgrub la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig

thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byon nas dbang bskur ba sbyin pa

mdzad do/ /dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub

par 'dod na yang de bzhin du chos kyi rdo rje ma'i tshul rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i phyag rgya/ ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs na bsam pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas

gsungs so/ /ci ste nor bu ye shes bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du rdo rje rin po che 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ ji lta ba'i rim pa bzhin du bsgom pa byas te dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' las rin chen ji ltar 'byung

ba rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la/ ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas zla ba'i mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid
kyis mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas/ ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i
snying pos gsungs so/ /de nas las bsgrubs pa bshad de/ de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i

snying pos don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /nor bu rigs kyi nye bar sbyong ba'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// //
de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por snying po thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas par bshad do/ /snying po bsgrub par

'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub par gyur cig ces brjod la snying po ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad dang cho ga ste/ phyag rgya thams cad bdag la

dga' bar gyur cig ces smras la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te ci dga' bar ci nus kyis bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas ci lta ba bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas
pa ste/ spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bdag la skye bar gyur cig ces smras la sngags ci dga' bar/ bzlas pa byas te 'di ni dngos grub bo/ /
de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ste/ kye sems can 'di dag thams cad ni ma rig pas ldongs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rig pa rtogs shing sdom par gyur to
zhes smras la rig pa ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de nas snying po dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rigs pa thams cad

ji ltar bsgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ sems pa gang gi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni bdag gam
sems dpa' bsgoms na bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// //

de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrubs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste/ de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/ nor 'grub pa'i dngos grub dang / rdzu 'phrul

gyi dngos grub dang / rig 'dzin nyid du 'grub pa dang / dngos grub chen po rnams so/ /de la nor 'grub pa ni 'di yin te/ gang na gter yod par dogs pa der phyag rgya bcings la rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis

gter gyi gnas der rdo rje 'dzin gyis gter gyi gnas der rdo rje blta bas blta ba na ci ste rdo rje lta bu yar bar mthong na de na gter yod par shes par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi dam tshig gi phyag
rgya bcings te sa bkos la ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du blangs na rtsod pa med par thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa

yin te/ phyag rgya gang sgrub par byed na badzra sid d+hi zhes brjod par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/ de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng nas phar 'gro zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa dang / ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / dpag tshad stong gi steng du lding ba dang / 'og tu
'gro zhing 'ong ba dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong du ci dga' bar song la bskor te slar 'ong ba dang / dpag tshad stong kho ra khor yug gi sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang /
dngos po thams cad mig gis mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang / phyogs thams cad tu dpag tshad stong khor yug na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad ci dga' bar 'phang du blangs te 'dug pa dang / gser
dang / nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa'i dbyig thams cad dang / nor thams cad phrogs nas kyang sus kyang cung zad kyang brgal mi nus te/ bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na gzhan

gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ skyes bu stong phrag bcu bsdoms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu dar la bab

cing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na med pas mchod pa byed cing lo stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar 'tsho
bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dngos grub kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya sgrub pa na rdo rje
rigs 'dzin ces brjod la 'grub pa dang rdo rje rig 'dzin gyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig

gis bskor te/ slar 'ong zhing bde ba thams cad la yongs su spyod pa dang / lo bcwo brgyad pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa dang / skra 'khyil ba dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mthong zhing bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig 'dzin gyis
gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni dngos grub chen po 'grub pa yin te/ bdag nyid phyag rgya'i snying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas skad cig gcig gis kyang
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis bya ba sna tshogs byed pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa thams cad mthong nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad
dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas sems can ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas nas slar 'ongs te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa'i mchog
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad la spyod cing rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur nas tshe'i tshad ma
lus shing lus pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub ste/

de yang 'di ltar gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang / dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / dngos grub dam pa rnams so/ /de la 'di ni 'jig rten
gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub yin te/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la dbang phyug chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas gzugs de skad
'byin pa dang hU~M zhes bya bar brjod par bya'o/ /hU~M zhes brjod pa tsam gyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa'i mdun du
bka' nyan cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /da phyin cad 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'jig rten gsum po 'khor lo thams cad kun du
bskor te slar 'ongs nas lha ma rungs pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad hU~M zhes bya bas 'dul bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas
'jig rten gsum po thams cad la bka' stsol cing rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo stong du 'tsho bar byed par bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M

zhes byed pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ phyag rgya bsgrub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por bdag nyid

dbang bskur la bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas grub pa dang dbang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang dang / rin po che'i dbang dang / chos kyi dbang dang / las kyi dbang rnams so/ /de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /rin po che'i dbang thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi dbang gis ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /las kyi dbang gis ni 'jig
rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos

grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob
par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni dngos grub dam pa ste/ de yang ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag

mnyam mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di dag ni pad ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te/ de ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / pad ma'i dngos grub
rnams so/ /de la mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/ ji ltar pad ma 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad mnyes par byed nus par 'gyur ro/ /

bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su dran par byas na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro/ /byams pas 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab

nus par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid pad ma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la pad ma lag par blangs te bsgrubs na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag
bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pad mas gsungs so/ /de la 'di dag ni nor bu rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te/ de yang 'di ltar rigs thams cad kyi dbang

gi dngos grub dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/ nyid kyis dbang

dbul ba dang / mar me dbul ba dang / ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rin po che bsgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod na ring po mi thogs

par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi thun mong ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas rtog pa thams

cad kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten

'dul ba ji lta bar/ /de 'dra bar ni dngos grub 'dod/ /de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste/ /dngos grub chen po kun sbyin no/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten 'dul ba chags bral min/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags

las skyes/ /de yi thabs ni bsgom pa ste/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bden las 'jig rten 'di nyams pas/ /sngags kyi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /spros pa

med pa'i thabs kyis ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rigs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ma rig mun chags 'di la ni/ /rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te/ /de yi thabs ni rgya che ba / /

dngos grub kun gyi mchog thob bo/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni/ /bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te/ /bsod nams med kyang

sangs rgyas mchod/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dam tshig gsang ba bsrungs na ni/ /bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te/ /bsod nams med

kyang myur bar ni/ /dam tshig bsrungs na myur du 'grub/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas mtshan la sogs brjod na/ /bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te/ /bsod nams

med kyang myur bar ni/ /chos sbyin pas ni dngos grub 'thob/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bsod nams nang na sbyin pa mchog /byin na bsod nams thob 'gyur te/ /sbyin pa'i pha

rol phyin rdzogs na/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar snying po shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ yi ge a la 'jug byed cing / /yi ge thams cad rnam bsgoms la/ /rang gi kha
nas gzhan zhal du/ /bsgoms na bsod nams thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i shes rab kyi dngos grub
kyi rgyud de/ shes rab nges 'bigs zhes bya ba/ /ting nge 'dzin ces grags pa ste/ /des ni phyag rgya myur 'grub par/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das shes rab mchog gis

gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ shes rab sgra yi rjes 'brang ba/ /ting 'dzin tshig ni rab spros pa/ /de bsgoms na ni myur ba yang / /sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /

zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje blos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rig dang sngags dang khyad par du/ /khyad par yod pa ma yin te/ /shes rab bsgoms na myur bar ni/ /
nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes kyis gsungs so/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas

pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar snying po thams cad tshogs kyi dngos
grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa thams cad rab byas na/ dge ba yi ni chos rnams kyi/ /tshogs ni rnam par 'phel 'gyur te/ /de nas tshogs ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos
grub kyi rgyud de/ 'khor lo mang por zhugs pa dang / /dkyil 'khor mang por bris pa'i phyir/ /tshogs rdzogs pas na phyag rgya rnams/ /dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs
kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rjes su yi rangs la sogs tshul/ /de bzhin dam pa'i chos bklags dang / /bzlas pa mang po byas nas ni/ /nges par sngags kyi dngos grub 'thob/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i

tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ma rig rab tu spangs pa dang / /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul phyir/ /tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs nas kyang / /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rtogs pa thams cad
kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma byang ba'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
'di gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na/ /de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste/ /thams cad sems de nyid bdag po/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ /sems dpa' rang byung brten pa ste/ /
sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa'/ /rdo rje snying gar rab bsgoms na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags ste/ /'di la rdo rje rab tu gnas/ /de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ /ye shes tshul te

mnyam pa med/ /snying las sna tshogs byung nas ni/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs 'gyur te/ /khams kun gyi ni rdul grangs su/ /de dag nyid ni rgyal ba yin/ /rdo rje'i sku ni de dag las/ /rdo rje sems dpar yang dag
'gyur/ /sems dpa' dang po las de nyid/ /mtshan ma thams cad yang dag 'byung / /mtshan ma las ni sems dpa' che/ /de las tshul 'di thams cad 'byung / /gang gis 'di ni thos 'gyur la/ /dad cing
'dzin byed snying gar yang / /rtag tu dga' bas bsgoms nas ni/ /de dag myur du dngos grub thob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung

ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud yin te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni/ /rtag tu rnam smin rtog las byung / /mi rtog pa yi ye shes las/ /de phyir rtag pa zhes
brjod do/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ mi rtog gang la rtog nyid du/ /rtags pas rtog las byung ba ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /de

phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ cho ga bzhin du ri mor bris/ /rtog pa grub sbyin zhes brtags pa/ /rtog dang bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /de phyir

rtog pa zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rtog pa las ni 'dod chags 'byung / / dge ba yi ni chos rnams kyi/ /tshogs ni rnam par 'phel 'gyur te/ /

de nas tshogs ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'khor lo mang por zhugs pa dang / /dkyil 'khor mang por bris pa'i phyir/ /tshogs rdzogs pas na phyag rgya

rnams/ /dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rjes su yi rangs la sogs tshul/ /de bzhin dam pa'i chos bklags dang / /bzlas pa mang po byas nas ni/ /nges

par sngags ni dngos grub 'gyur/ de la 'di ni rigs pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ma rig rab tu spangs pa dang / /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul phyir/ /tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs nas kyang / /
myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi tshogs rgyud rdzogs s+ho// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma
'byung ba'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na/ /de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste/ /thams cad sems de nyid bdag po/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje
ni/ /sems dpa' brtan pa rang byung gi/ /sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa'/ /rdo rje snying gar rab bsgoms na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags te/ /'di la rdo rje rab tu gnas/ /de nyid
sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ /ye shes tshul te mnyam myed 'ong / /snying las sna tshogs byung nas ni/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs 'gyur te/ /khams gsum kun gyi rdul snyed du/ /de dag nyid
ni rgyal ba yin/ /rdo rje sku ni de rnams las/ /rdo rje sems dpar yang dag 'gyur/ /sems dpa' dang po de nyid las/ /mtshan ma thams cad yang dag 'byung / /mtshan ma las ni sems dpa' che/ /
de las tshul 'di thams cad 'byung / /gang gis 'di ni thos 'gyur la/ /dad cing 'dzin byed snying gar yang / /rtag tu dga' bas bsgoms na ni/ /de ni myur du grub pa 'thob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems

dpas gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes
kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtog med pa'i/ /ye shes rtag
pa nyid gyur pa'i/ /mi rtog pa yi ye shes las/ /brtags pas rtog pa zhes brjod do/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ mi rtog gang la rtog
nyid brtags pa rtog pa byung ba ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes ky-i rgyud de/ cho ga bzhin du

ri mo bris/ /rtog pa grub sbyin zhes rtog pa/ /rtog las bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rtog pa las
ni 'dod chags 'byung / pad ma la ni de gnas te/ /de phyir rtog la gnas pa ni/ /grub pa nyid du de 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rtog pa med
pa'i nor bu ni/ /mthu yis shin du mchog tu 'gyur/ /de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas/ /lha rdzas dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams
cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyud do/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ yid kyis 'dod pa'i cho ga yis/ /yid kyis 'dod pa grub 'gyur te/ /ting 'dzin bsgrub pa

snying la gnas/ /de phyir snying po zhes brjod do/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog /khrims ni 'da' ka mi phyed bzhin/ /bdag nyid chen po
gzugs brnyan gyis/ /mtshan ma phyag rgya zhes par grags/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi sngags 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing / /dbye bar dka' la gsang ba nyid/ /gsang
ba grub phyir brjod pas na/ /de yi phyir ni sngags zhes brjod/ /de nas rigs pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ ma rig pa ni gzhom pa dang / /ngag gi rig mchog 'grub pa'i phyir/ /rtogs shing rig
pa dngos grub ste/ /de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po la sogs pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do/ /de nas rtog pa

thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ de la dang po kho nar snying po'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud yin te/ snying po bzlas te bdag gam ni/ /gzhan yang rung ste byung ba na/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur gang gis ni/ /mthong
zhing thos 'gyur shes par bya/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ bdag gi cho ga ji bzhin du/ /gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya bcings/ /'jig rten pa la bltas nas ni/ /gong ma
bzhin du kun shes 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ lan gcig tsam yang sngags brjod na/ /'das dang 'byung dang byung gang yin/ /rang gi lce la smra 'gyur ba/ /de
dag thams cad bden par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud de/ rig pa lan gcig brjod na ni/ /byung dang 'byung
dang 'byung 'gyur rnams/ /ji ltar rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du/ /yid kyis de ni shes par 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes skye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // de nas rigs thams cad

kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin no/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar de ltar 'dug nas kyang / /
skyil mo dkrung bcas bsgrub bya ste/ /ji ltar ri mo'i tshul byas nas/ /sems dpa' chen po grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang

ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni/ /brgyad bsgrub tshul du rab tu gnas/ /shin tu khros nas bsgrub byas na/ /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin te/ rdo rje skyil mo dkrung bcas la/ /lag gnyis rdo rje bcings nas kyang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi
sku gyur la/ /pad ma 'byung ba bsgrub par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar 'dug
gam nyal ba'am/ /'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni/ /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur na/ /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ lce rtse shin du mi bsgul zhing / /so dang mchu gnyis sbyar nas ni/ /rtog pa thams cad bsgrub bya zhing / /

sgra bral rdo rje'i tshig yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsungs gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ hU~M zhes bya ba 'brug sgrar bsgrags/ /khro bo'i
ngag ni zab cing bstan/ /rdo rje chen po khro bo'i gsal/ /rdo rje khro bo'i gsung 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi
phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ dbugs mi 'byin ltar dbugs 'byin cing / /phra ba'i tshig ni shin du gsal/ /ting 'dzin ye shes snying po yis/ /zlos pa po rnams grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ shin du yongs su
gsal tshig gis/ /rtag tu 'dud la brtson byed cing / /tshul 'di bzlas par gyur na ni/ /myur du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes
gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ rtag tu 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can thams cad bde sbyin pas/ /rdo
rje sems dpa' bdag nyid du/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/

sems can kun la phan pa dang / /ma rungs pa rnams gdul ba dang / /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ /khro bo dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hU~M

zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ ji ltar pad ma rab chags la/ /bsgos pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa/ /de ltar bdag gis chags skyon
yang / /srid na chags pa de 'grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad ma bzhad pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ nam zhig sems
can thams cad kyi/ /dgos pa'i don ni kun sgrub cing / /rin chen char ni 'bebs 'gyur zhes/ /grub na myur bar de 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de
bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ ji ltar langs sam 'dug pa'am/ /'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni/ /lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya mchog /thams cad

byed na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ de
lta de ltar gnas nas kyang / /ji lta ji ltar byed kyang rung / /rdo rje khro bo mdzub mo bcings/ /gos kyis g.yogs na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i

rgyal pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ lag ni g.yon pas pad ma yi/ /khu tshur bcings te sbas nas ni/ /ji dgar myur du pad ma yi/ /dngos
grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ g.yon pa'i rin
chen khu tshur ni/ /bcings te dam pa'i lag g.yogs la/ /ci dga' bar ni rim 'gror byed/ /rin chen dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /

de la 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i thun mong gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ rang gi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni/ /rdo rje dag dang rdo rje'i lta/ /ring por mi
thogs mchog 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub
pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
rtog pa 'di ni byin gyis brlab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas yang legs so zhes bya ba 'di byin no/ /rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na/ /legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos
khyod legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las rgyud thams cad kyi phyi ma'i phyi ma'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// //de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa' che/ /sems can
don mchog bdag nyid can/ /shAkya'i rgyal po ye shes che/ /rdo rje bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sems dpa' 'byung ba de nyid don/ /sems can rgyu ste tshul chen po/ /sems can don chen dgos pa'i
don/ /sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas chos ni chos chen po/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba/ /smra ba chen po rab rig mchog /sems dpa' chen po khyod phyag
'tshal/ /las chen bsrung ba chen po ste/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /bdag nyid chen po 'gro spyod mchog /sems dpa' rgyu khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol phyin pa kun brnyes
pa/ /kun mkhyen ye shes mkhyen pa po/ /sems dpa' kun te thabs chen po/ /shes rab chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /thugs rje chen po mchog gi mchog /thugs rje thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /
thams cad gtong ba byams pa che/ /kun mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shAkya seng ge shAkya che/ /shAkya shAkya thub pa che/ /'dul ba chen po khyab pa po/ /'gro don 'dul mchog khyod phyag 'tshal/ /
chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam brnyes pa/ /chos dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ /rdo rje mgon po mgon chen po/ /sems can tshogs ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'od chen snang ba chen po ste/ /brtson
'grus chen po stobs chen po/ /dpa' bo chen po rab dpa' mchog /bde spyod dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /tshangs pa rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das/ /shAkya dpa' bo thub pa che/ /kun bdag
thub pa dag pa yi/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha'i sku ste sku yi mchog /sku gsum sku min sgom pa po/ /kun gyi sku ste sku che ba/ /rdo rje'i sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /
gsung min gsung ste gsung gi mchog /gsung gsum gsung min ston pa po/ /gsung kun shin du gsung che ba/ /rdo rje'i gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems min sems te sems kyi mchog /
sems gsum sems min ston pa po/ /thams cad sems te sems che ba/ /rdo rje sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdor min rdo rje rdo rje'i mchog /rdo rje gsum pa rdor min sbyong / /rdo rje thams cad

rdo rje che/ /rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /kun khyab srid pa'i rtse mo mchog /bde gshegs bdag po rgyal ba ni/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal po che/ /snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan brgya
rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/ /gang gis skad cig nyan byed dam/ /klog gam yang na bsgom pa'ang rung / /kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sems can kun la phan
pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang / /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor / /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka'
stsal pa'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad
par gsol/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan
pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams
cad kyi mdun du rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor kun du khyab par byas/ /nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to/ /de nas yang
byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba'i sna tshogs
pa'i/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum
las rnam par rgyal bas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /
khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags
pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul bar sna tshogs pa'i/ /pad ma'i
'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
kyi rgyal pos pad ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/ /
sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul bar sna tshogs pa'i/ /nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can phra
ba 'am sbom pa yang rung / de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ri rab ri'i rgyal po rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad gdan la bzhugs nas rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar phyogs kun nas mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de'i tshe tshigs
su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /mi yi nang du babs nas kyang / /dgos phyir sems can kun gyi don/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo mchog bskor zhing / /mgon po rab tu bsgrub par mdzod/ /de nas
yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'du ba mdzad du gsol/ de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam

par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid du gyur par mkhyen nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyed kyang nga'i thugs dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rigs thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su zhugs shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snang bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /mdor na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /zhugs nas sems can thams

cad la/ /phan pa'i phyir ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed
bzhugs pa rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i sku 'phro ba mdzad pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
thugs su zhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad dang / gsung thams cad
'jug pa'i gnas dang / sems kyi rgyud 'byung ba thams cad dang / rdo rje'i tshul thams cad dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / mtshan thams cad dang /
dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i khung bu thams cad dang / rdul shin du phra mo snyed kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thugs rnams su zhugs nas bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid

gyur par mkhyen nas ri rab ri'i rtse mo nas snying po byang chub pa gang na der gshegs nas ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi shing drung du 'jig rten pa dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir rtswa blangs nas ched du
brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma sems can brtan pa yi/ /sems can don ni bdag don mchog /gang phyir gdul dbang brtan pa rnams/ /mu stegs lta bas gnas par mdzad/ /mdor na
mi 'dul 'jig rten pa/ /lta ba ngan pas ldongs pa rnams/ /ye shes snang bas dag bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom
ldan 'das la de kho na nyid mi shes pas 'di skad du kye dge sbyong ji byang chub kyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag cing mi zad pa la bzod par mdzad dam zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis rtswa de bting ste steng du bzhugs nas lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to grogs po rnams/ kho bos byang chub thob par bsgrubs shig /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ma rtogs nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der dong nas ched du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la de ltar gyur pa 'di brjod do/ /de nas lha'i dbang

po brgya byin gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs kyis bskor te gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po la de ltar gyur pa 'di dag brjod do/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po 'dod pa
na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad dang / lhan cig tu 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la de ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum
po mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen pos lha rnams kyi bdag po mthu bo che la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dang 'thun par mdzad cing yang bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston gyis 'di ltar 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no snyam du shes par ma byed
cig lha nyid las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur gyis/ lha de dag nyid du bsgrub par bya ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du ni ma yin no/ /de legs kyis der mchod du 'dong bar bsgrub bo/ /de
nas lha thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa snying po byang chub gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por byang chub par bzhugs pa gang na ba der dong nas
ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te rin gyi gdan
'di las bzhengs la/ lha rdzas kyi gdan la bzhugs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i
bdag po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po rnams kho bo la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par bsgrubs shig /de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol
to bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bstsal bar mi nus so ci ste bdag cag gis nus par gyur na bdag cag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don
de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing yang tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /de ni gzugs min gzugs min min/ /bden min brdzun min gtsang ba yi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di/ /rtogs
na rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas lha'i dbang po de dag gis cung zad cig cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rtswa yi gdan las bzhengs te lha de rnams la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /grogs po rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di lta bu rtogs par bya ba bsgrubs shig /de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rngo mi thog go/ /de nas yang bcom ldan
'das kyis gdan de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /yid kyis rab tu rtogs pas na/ /byang chub sems ni brtan par byos/ /sems dpa' rdo rje brtan byas
la/ /sangs rgyas su ni bdag bsgoms shig /de nas de dag gis 'di skad du de lta bu legs so zhes bya ba thams cad kyis smras nas dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo de'i
tho rangs 'jig rten dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi
khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad la phan par mdzad pa 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs la zhugs pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems

dpa' che/ /theg pa chen po bdag nyid che/ /snang ba che zhing dag pa che/ /mgon chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /sems dpa' chen po brtson
'grus che/ /thabs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dod pa dag pa che/ /kun gyi bde ba bde ba che/ /bde mchog thog ma tha ma med/ /bzhed chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje legs pa dgyes
pa che/ /legs zhes bya ba rab mnyes pa/ /mnyes pa che zhing dgyes pa che/ /rab dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che/ /dbang bskur bzang po bdag po che/ /rin chen
thams cad mdzes pa che/ /rnam rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i gzi brjid gzi brjid che/ /'od chen lham pa chen po ste/ /rgyal ba'i 'od de 'bar ba che/ /sangs rgyas 'od khyod phyag
'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan dbal che ba/ /rgyal mtshan che bas nor rab gtong / /nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan yu ba che/ /gtong ba'i rgyal mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad
pa che/ /dgyes pa che zhing rab dgyes pa/ /dgyes pa'i shugs kyis rol cing dgyes/ /chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje chos ni chos che ba/ /sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyong ba/ /
sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog /'dod chos khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rnon po ral gri che/ /shes rab ye shes blo gros che/ /sdig gcod ral gri chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas mtshon khyod
phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rgyu ste 'khor lo che/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po/ /dkyil 'khor kun te chos kyi mchog /chos kyi dkyil 'khor khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che/ /
spros med yi ge chen po ste/ /yi ge med pa bzlas pa che/ /sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje las te las rab mchog /las chen las rab byed pa ste/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa

che/ /sangs rgyas mchod khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bsrung ba go cha che/ /go cha'i mchog ste bstan pa che/ /bsrung ba che zhing snying po che/ /sangs rgyas brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo

che/ /ma rungs thams cad skrag byed pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen te/ /srung ba mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bsdams pa phyag rgya che/ /dam tshig chen po bcing ba che/ /khu tshur chen po phyag

rgya che/ /rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya zhing / /brjod de mchod de bsti stang bya/ /gang phyir thog ma tha ma med/ /byang chub sems ni khyod yin te/ /khyod la brten nas rgyal
ba dang / /dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag
'tshal/ /rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje las ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ /yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /mtshan mchog gis ni khyod bstod pa'i/ /bsod nams gang yin de kun kyang / /
sangs rgyas byang chub thob par shog /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /rab dad pas ni lan gcig tsam/ /gang gis legs par brjod pa ni/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ gsung gcig tu legs so
zhes bya ba 'di byin no/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo 'di leg par bshad pas na/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpar bcas pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa thams cad dgyes shing
mnyes nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
mdo rgyud nye bar bsdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// //rgyud 'di la 'gyur byang mi snang na'ang / paN+Di ta shrad+d+hA kA ra war+m+ma dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba rin chen bzang
pos bsgyur bar grags shing rgyud dpe rnying 'gyur mi 'dra ba gsum bstun te zhus dag bsgrubs so/ /
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra shi kha ra ma hA gu h+ya yo ga tan tra/ bod skad du/ gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo/ oM kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug
gis/ /'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas/ /rnal 'byor can ni mi gsung bzhugs/ /mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun/ /ma lus thub pa'i skyes mchog gis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
rgyal po che/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug la gsol 'debs/ /rnal 'byor tshul chen sgrub byed cing / /cho ga sna tshogs yang dag 'byung / /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba'i/ /'khor lo mchog
ni bshad du gsol/ /mgon po khyod ni skal chen te/ /khyod ni bya ba don sems byed/ /gsang ba mkhyen cing dgongs bshad mkhyen/ /rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog gyur gsungs/ /de nyid
rjes kyi de nyid ldan/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid rnal 'byor che/ /rdo rje chen po byang chub sems/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig tshul chen po/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ste/ /rdo rje rnal
'byor sna tshogs bdag /gsang ba'i snying po dkyil 'khor che/ /chos kyi tshul ni sgrub byed pa/ /rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi/ /chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod/ /'dir ni rtog pa ji
lta bu/ /sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/ /ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma/ /rgyud don ci yin brjod par bgyi/ /ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma lags/ /rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung / /rdo rje 'chang
drag 'di ci zhig /drag po'i don ni ji ltar byung / /rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig /ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod/ /phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir/ /rdo rje gtum po'ang ci zhig lags/ /ci yi phyir na
gtum por brjod/ /ci yi phyir na khro bor brjod/ /rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa/ /ci phyir rdo rjer brjod par bgyid/ /rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci/ /de yi rdo rje ji lta bu/ /rdo rje 'chang ba
rnams ni du/ /rdo rje rigs kun gang gi lags/ /chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas/ /rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod/ /ci yi phyir na rigs su brjod/ /rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig /
ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du/ /ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags/ /rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci/ /rdo rje legs pa ci yin
brjod/ /rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir/ /rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan bzhad pa che/ /gsungs shig ci yin brjod pa gsungs/ /ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos/ /rdo rje rnon po

ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che/ /rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje las dang gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che/ /rdo rje bsrung ba khu tshur che/ /gsungs shig ci yin brjod
par gsungs/ /sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung / /de bzhin pha dang ma ni gang / /dang po gang zhig gleng gzhi gang / /dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gang zhig lags/ /gsang ba 'di ni gang
las byung / /khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung / /thog ma tha ma med 'di ci/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs/ /rab tu dga' nyid rab bzang nyid/ /rdo rje snying bdag ji
lta bu/ /ci yi phyir na kun du bzang / /de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / /dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung / /chos kun skye ba med pa dang / /'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems
dpa' ci yin brjod/ /ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ci yin brjod/ /de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci/ /
ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod/ /shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod/ /ci phyir shes rab brjod par bya/ /de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin/ /tshul ni ci zhig ting 'dzin gang / /bsam gtan rnal 'byor
rnal 'byor ci/ /srid gsum 'jig rten gsum don ci/ /ci yi phyir yang khams gsum pa/ /'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin/ /mya ngan 'das pa'ang ci yin brjod/ /rtag dang 'jig dang de
bzhin dag /theg pa chen po ci yin brjod/ /nam mkha' yang ni ci yi phyir/ /sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod/ /'byung ba chen po gang las 'byung / /'gog pa ci zhig gang gis byed/ /ci yi
phyir na phyag rgyar brjod/ /ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya/ /ci yi phyir na rigs sngags brjod/ /de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams/ /phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid gsungs/ /sngags
kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya/ /rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs/ /de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams/ /rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang / /ji ltar bcing ba thub chen po/ /phyag
rgya dag ni 'ching ba na/ /ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes/ /rig sngags ji ltar bzlas par bgyi/ /thub pa chen po de gsungs shig /rig sngags dag ni zlos pa na/ /ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas/ /
dri ba'i tshogs mdor bstan pa'o// //oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad/ /yi ge hU~M ni ci yin brjod/ /ci yi phyir na yi ge phaT/ /swA hA zhes pa ci yin brjod/ /mchod par ci phyir brjod par bya/ /de
bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang / /ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu/ /dkyil 'khor dang por zhugs pa yi/ /skyes pa yang na bud med kyi/ /bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni/ /
gsungs shigs gsang ba'i dbang phyug che/ /thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la/ /sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bgyi/ /de yis srog gi phyir yang ni/ /dor bar mi bya gang zhig lags/ /khrus kyi
las ni ji ltar bya/ /de bzhin kho nar phyogs bcing ba/ /bgegs rnams bcing ba dang bcas pa'i/ /logs 'dren ji ltar bskrad par bgyi/ /dga' ba chen po ji lta bur/ /rab tu gus bcas
phyag dag bgyi/ /spos dang me tog de bzhin du/ /mar me mchod stsogs ji ltar lags/ /dkyil 'khor brtag pa ji lta bur/ /gzhug pa yang ni ji ltar lags/ /dam tshig ci zhig yin par
bshad/ /rdo rje slob ma'i cho ga gang / /sngon du bsnyen pa ji ltar bgyi/ /sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu/ /snyoms 'jug ji lta bu zhig lags/ /mdun du
dgug pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/ /'dir ni rjes su chags pa'ang ji lta bu/ /bcing bar bya ba'i las ni ji lta bu/ /'dren pa rnams ni mnyes par ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dir ni gshegs
su gsol ba lags/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni ji ltar gdeg par bgyi/ /'gro ba'i bya ba yang ni ji ltar bgyi/ /las kyi cho ga'i bya ba ji ltar bgyi/ /dge ba stug po gsang chen ji lta bu/ /las
rnams tha dad bya ba ji lta bu/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan ni ji ltar bgyi/ /mchod dang mchod pa'i lan ni ji ltar blang / /dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo ji ltar 'byung / /'khor lo'i rnam pa'i
bye brag du zhig mchis/ /dngos dang dngos med ji ltar spang ba lags/ /bla ma gsang byung 'od zer gsang ba ci/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa du ru brjod/ /thab khung ji lta bu zhig lags/ /sbyin sreg mdor
bsdus ji lta bu/ /las rnams ji ltar 'byung ba la/ /las rnams rnam pa du ru brjod/ /gsang ba rnams ni rnam pa du/ /mchog tu gsang ba ji ltar brjod/ /de nyid ji lta bu zhig lags/ /phyag

rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ci/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags/ /rigs kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /ji ltar bsgrub bya shin du bsgrub/ /rdo rje phra mo ji ltar brjod/ /bgegs ni ji ltar bsal bar bgyi/ /mdor
na rig pa 'dzin pa dang / /slob dpon ji lta bu zhig lags/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i/ /'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod/ /dngos grub mtshan nyid sgrub byed pa'i/ /sna tshogs rtog pa ji
lta bu/ /thig rnams rtag pa nyid dang ni/ /dngos grub ji ltar nye bar brjod/ /dngos grub tshogs ni ji lta bu/ /gsang ba kun nas btus pa gsungs/ /bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bar/ /bya ba'i cho ga
ji lta bu/ /yang na gzhan dag nyid la ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /ting 'dzin ji lta bu zhig lags/ /de nyid rig pa 'di rtag tu/ /rdo rje ye shes
ji lta bu/ /gzhan yang dgongs pa ji lta bu/ /spyod pa ji lta bu zhig lags/ /gang yang rung ba'i rtags las byung / /ming dang ming med shes pa'i mtshan/ /las 'bras med par byed po dang / /'byin

par byed par gang las bshad/ /lus ni nam mkha' bzhin 'byung ba/ /gang las 'byung bar brjod par bya/ /ci yi phyir na thar par brjod/ /rnal 'byor pa don ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje dbyings ni skyed byed pa'i/ /

rdo rje phra mo'i rnal 'byor gang / /gzhan yang rang gi rigs dag las/ /rnal 'byor brtul zhugs ji ltar rtsam/ /mdor na dbang du bya ba dang / /de nyid gsang ba gang zhig lags/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i/ /

gsang ba rtog chen las gsungs pa/ /dgongs pa rnam pa du ma yis/ /gsang ba gsungs shig blo gros che/ /rnal 'byor rnam pa du ru brjod/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung du/ /ji ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud du brjod/ /gsang

ba'i rigs byung ji lta bu/ /de ni rang byung nyid byung te/ /khams gsum 'jig rten sa 'og dang / /sa steng sa bla mya ngan 'das/ /ji skad bshad pa'i gsang ba gzhan/ /rdo rje can nyid khyab 'jug rang nyid yin/ /nyi ma zla ba
gshin rje drag po nyid/ /rang nyid skye dgu'i bdag ste pha ma yin/ /'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /dri ba'i tshogs gnyis pa mdor bstan pa'o// //tshangs pa 'jig rten gsum lus dbang phyug

che/ /gdung drug tshogs bcas lha'i rigs dkyil 'khor rnams/ /gzhan yang gza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa/ /nga bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /nga ni 'dod pa thar ba nga / /nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal
ba pa/ /nga ni yi dgas dud 'gro bdag /tshig de ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang 'dod la chags sems ldan/ /lta bcas tshig ldan 'dzin pa'i lta la chags/ /mu stegs theg dman mngon skye
dgu'i rigs/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin don rnams rtogs byed cing / /ji skad bshad pa'i sna tshogs rigs dkyil 'khor/ /dag pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas dgongs mi shes/ /rang gi 'dod pas mu ngan rtog byed
pa/ /de la skye dgu'i bdag chen brtse bas gsungs/ /mchod 'os chen po mchog dang ldan pa'i gnas/ /gsang ba'i dbang mchog mngon bsdus dbye bar gsol/ /skye dgu'i bdag po'i dkyil 'khor gsang
mdun du/ /dam tshig mchod pas ji ltar mchod par bya/ /'dod yon lngar bcas rol bar byed pa yi/ /dngos grub tshogs mchog chen po thob par 'gyur/ /dman pa'i 'dod las rigs kyi dngos grub 'byung / /

dga' ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin b+ha ga ji ltar rtags ci 'dra/ /de yi 'jug pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /rdzas de dag ni ji ltar rab tu bsgrub/ /'jig rten gsum na dman pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /
de nas 'dod chags zhen pas dngos grub thob/ /'dod chags dag phyir de ni ji ltar rung / /chags bral sdig pas chags dang bral ba la/ /gsang ba bstan pas sdig dngos ji ltar 'gyur/ /gtor mas
bsod nams mchog thob ji lta bu/ /skye dgu bsad pas bsod nams ji lta bu/ /ma byin blangs pas bsod nams 'gyur zhes pa'i/ /'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /dga' ba chen po'i
bud med bsten pa yis/ /tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas mchog 'grub pa/ /mi gtsang 'dod pa bsten pas sangs rgyas dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /'dir ni brdzun dang mtshungs pa'i
bsod nams med/ /ji ltar brdzun ni bsod nams ldan par brjod/ /'dir ni sems can gzhan bsad bza' bar bya/ /'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /'khor ba spangs kyang chos min

'gyur ba dang / /mya ngan 'das la gzhol ba chos ma yin/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gyi ni rjes 'jug pa/ /chos min 'gyur zhes ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /dregs dang ser sna sdang ba'i sems ldan pa/ /chos min
spyod cing brdzun pa'i tshig la chags/ /srid gsum mngon par chags pas rnal 'byor sgrub/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags bcas pas lhag par rgyal/ /rigs kyi rnal 'byor las byung ji ltar 'grub/ /bla med go 'phang

dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /dag cing ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lhur blang bya/ /skyor gcin 'thung dang bshang ba za ba yis/ /dag cing mchog gyur rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod/ /mi gtsang bshang gci zos shing 'thungs pa yis/ /
yid 'dod dngos grub ji ltar dngos grub 'dod/ /bud med bcas par lhan cig chos spyod cing / /gnyis ka lhan cig gyur pas dag gtsang mchod/ /ji ltar bud med lhan cig dkyil 'khor mchod/ /dngos grub dam
pa mchog tu ji ltar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rdo rje rigs 'byung kun ldan zhing / /mchog tu mi zad drag po'i las can te/ /dag cing shin du sdug la mtho bar 'gro/ /'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /

gzhan yang brdeg dang gsad pa lhur len cing / /bskrad dang drag pa'i las can de dag ni/ /dag cing shin du sdug la mtho bar 'gro/ /'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bza' dang btung ba lhur

len cing / /snying 'byin pa yis dag par 'dod pa nyid/ /de ni dag cing sdug la mtho bar 'gro/ /'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin/ /gzhan yang nor bu rin chen 'phrog pa yis/ /sdug cing bstan la dag cing mthor
'gro dang / /gzhan yang nga rgyal ser sna lhur len pas/ /dag par 'gyur ba nyid ni 'gal ba yin/ /gzhan yang las kyi rig pa byung ba yis/ /mi dge ba yi las rnams thams cad bya/ /'khrig sogs las kyi ze

tshogs rnam mang po'i/ /las byed pa ni ji ltar skyon mi 'gyur/ /gzhan yang brdzun tshig de bzhin 'khrig pa yis/ /dag 'dod 'phags pa min pas gsang ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i dbang chen 'dod pas bdud rtsi ltar/ /

sdug cing mthor 'gro ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /kye mgon khyod ni dag pa'i chos kyi tshogs/ /khyod ni rtag tu rnal 'byor 'gyur/ /kye mgon khyod ni dgyes chen bdud rtsi 'chang ba dam chos gsang ba'i 'byung gnas
