te/ /kye rgyal khyod ni dri med nyi ma bzhin du mi shes kun du sbyong mdzad pa/ /khyab byed rgyal ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dren chen byang sems dga' ston kye/ /mdor bsdus pa'o// //
kun mchog thams cad rig pa ste/ /kun mkhyen dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /byang sems sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid ni/ /ting nge 'dzin las bzhings nas kyang / /phyogs rnams kun du
gzigs mdzad de/ /thub pas mgon rnams rab btud nas/ /sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs/ /kye ma'o rnam dag ye shes bdag /kye ma'o sangs rgyas nyer thob pa/ /kye ma'o gar mkhan 'khor lo

'di/ /rang gi ye shes 'dri bar byed/ /rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i/ /mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya/ /shin du rnyed dka' dam pa yi/ /rin chen sgrom gyi kha dbye bya/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi/ /rgyal

mtshan dam pa bsgreng bar bya/ /rin chen sgrom gyi kha phye nas/ /shes rab kyis ni snang bar bya/ /de nas gsang ba mchog gyur pa/ /dam pa yang dag bshad par bya/ /bya ba bsgrub pa'i thabs chen po/ /rtog pa thams cad

bsdus pa dang / /gsang ba'i bye brag 'byed byed cing / /rnal 'byor dgongs pa rnam par 'grol/ /nga nyid dam pa shes byed pa'i/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga dang / /'khor lo'i rnal 'byor cho

ga ste/ /mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya de'i/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /dus gsum khyab pa'i bya bar ldan/ /gsang ba rnal 'byor kun 'byung zhing / /bya ba kun gyi thabs chen gyi/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus

pa dang / /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor cho gar ldan/ /rdo rje chos ni rab 'jug pa/ /sku gsum zhes bya gsang chen gyi/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /rdo rje rnal 'byor cho gar ldan/ /ma rungs thams cad

'dul byed pa/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba'i/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /chos kyi rnal 'byor cho gar ldan/ /pad ma gar mkhan skyed byed pa/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i/ /rtog pa thams

cad bsdus pa dang / /sbyin pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /rin chen 'khor lo skyed byed cing / /byang chub sems dpa' yid ches byed/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po/ /
sna tshogs gar mkhan skyed byed pa/ /las kyi rnal 'byor cho ga yi/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /de nyid shes shing dgongs pa shes/ /tshul chen mchog ni shes byed cing / /mchog gi dang po sangs
rgyas mchog /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa ste/ /go rim bzhin du 'jug byed pa'i/ /gcig par sems can bya ba byed/ /bya ba chen po mchog zhi ba/ /chos dang longs spyod mchog gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas
gar mkhan 'khor lo ni/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di/ /skal ba ji bzhin gsang ji bzhin/ /ji ltar sems can 'dul 'gyur bshad/ /sngon 'gyur 'das pa'i dus su ni/ /byang chub sems ni
yongs 'dzin cing / /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ /spro ba chen pos ngo mtshar che'i/ /dka' ba dpag tu med pa spyad/ /go rim bzhin du de yis ni/ /dbang bskur bar
du legs thob 'gyur/ /shes rab chen pos sa mthar phyin/ /gos kyi dbang ni thob gyur nas/ /'og min stug po nyams dga' bar/ /blo gros chen po bzhugs par gyur/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas mchog
'gyur zhes/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsams nas ni/ /bya ba mthar phyin bdag gis ni/ /sems can don 'byung thob bya zhes/ /bya ba de la dgongs nas ni/ /sngon dang phyi mar bde chen med/ /chos kyi dga'
ba rmad chen po'i dka' ba spyad par bya snyam ste/ /byang chub shing drung bzhugs gyur nas/ /bya dka'i bya ba kun ldan de/ /dbugs 'byung rngub pa 'gog pa dang / /sems pa med cing g.yo ba med/ /lus
ni gang yang mi 'gul zhing / /yan lag bskyod par mi byed de/ /de bas g.yo ba med chos ma/ /yun ring du ni gnas par gyur/ /phyogs bcu yi ni thob dbang po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs 'gyur ba/ /
'di ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub dus/ /sdug bsngal bya bar rigs pa min/ /de bas bdag cag kun lhan cig /bskul bar bya phyir 'gro snyam du/ /dgongs nas thams cad rab chas te/ /stug po ru ni byon par
gyur/ /byon nas thub pa thams cad kyis/ /bskul ba mchog ni mdzad par 'gyur/ /oM badzra ud tiSh+Tha ces pa yi/ /rigs pas se gol brdabs nas ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bslang / /
phyogs rnams kun du bltas pa na/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rgya mtsho mthong / /thub pas mgon rnams la btud de/ /bka' stsol zhes ni gsol ba btab/ /mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /
gsung cig gis ni bka' stsal pa/ /sems kyi spyod yul ci 'dra zhes/ /rang gi sems ni so sor rtogs/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas/ /rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du/ /yung ring du ni gnas pa na/ /sems
kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste/ /yan lag kun gyis rab btud nas/ /zhus pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs

pa/ /sems kyi spyod yul shes par dka'/ /khyod la snying po rab sbyin gyis/ /phra mo'i bzlas pa rab tu spyod/ /oM tshid ta pra ti be d+ha~M ka ro mi/ snying po dag pa blangs ni/ /rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du/ /thang cig de la gnas
pa na/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du mthong / /de nas sems 'di ci zhig yin/ /nyon mongs sa bon can nam ci/ /dge ba'am mi dge ba yi sems/ /kun gzhi sa bon can sems sam/ /chos kyi rgyu 'thun
rtogs gyur nas/ /pha rol phyin pa drug bsten pa/ /'di ni sems can dag pa ste/ /kun nas nyon mongs gnas ma yin/ /yun ring du ni bsod nams dang / /ye shes tshogs chen bsags pa ste/ /ji ltar zla ba

gang ba 'di/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog ma med/ /de bzhin tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /sems ni zla ba gang dang mtshungs/ /dngos po yod dang med min pa/ /ji ltar zla ba mtshungs nyid yin/ /'on kyang bsod nams

ye shes che/ /rdzogs pa zla ba dang mtshungs bstan/ /legs byas tshogs ldan rang sems kyi/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong nas ni/ /dga' zhing mgu ba skyes nas kyang / /slar yang tshig tu rab smras pa/ /bcom ldan

mgon po bdag gis ni/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun dag cing / /gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i/ /rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong / /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ /thog mar byung ba'i sems 'di

bzang / /dang por blo bur nyon mongs rnams/ /byang chub sems kyis dag par byed/ /dngos po thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/ /dag pa yi ni snying po 'dis/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /byang chub kyi ni sems

la rtogs/ /oM bo d+hi tsi ta uta pa ta yA mi/ snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/ /sems kyi dbus su rtog pa na/ /zla ba'i dbus su yang zla ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mthong ba ni/ /thub pa rnams la tshig smras pa/ /

dkyil 'khor gnyis pa dag mthong ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin brten/ /brtan par bya ba'i ched du ni/ /de ni legs par bsgrub par gyis/ /khyod la snying po sbyin bya ste/ /
zlos shing de ni brtan par dgongs/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra/ dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje chen po sems byed cing / /thang cig so sor brtags pa na/ /shin du brtan pa mthong gyur nas/ /
smras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rdo rje mthong / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yi/ /dbus na rdo rje dang ldan mthong / /de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/ /lha rnams kun

gyi rdo rje che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni skyed pa yi/ /shin du brtan pa 'di smros shig /oM badzra At+ma ko ha~M/ snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/ /rdo rje'i lus ni rnam bsgoms pa/ /des ni sra brtan khong stong med/ /rdo rje'i sku

ni thob gyur nas/ /smras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rang bdag rdo rje'i skur mthong ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tA
sta thA a ha~M/ snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgom pas/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /kun mkhyen ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun la rab btud nas/ /

smras pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /mgon po bdag la byin rlob cing / /bdag gi byang chub brtan par mdzod/ /grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi tshig thos nas/ /mgon rnams thugs kar

zhugs par gyur/ /rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gsungs/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi sa ma bo d+hi dri D+ha badzra ban d+ha/ grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rigs sngags chen po brjod pa na/ /rdo rje dbyings ni shin

du brtan/ /de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /rdo rje thugs ka nas byung ste/ /chos kyi dbang bskur bzhi po yis/ /de tshe thub pa dbang bskur gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' byas

pa yi/ /byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba/ /'bras bu byang chub sems ldan gang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum dag gi/ sbyin dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bzang dang / /mkha'

mtshungs rin chen thob byed pa/ /nor bu rin chen dbang bskur yin/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum du ni/ /gzhan gyis dka' ba spyad pa dang / /brtson 'grus kyis ni 'bras bsgrub pa/ /rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur yin/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i snying po dag /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chen te/ /nyon mongs 'dam gyis ma gos pa/ /rdo rje pad ma'i dbang bskur yin/ /byang chub sems rdzogs rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi/ /dbang bskur bzhi po

de rnams chos kyi dbyings/ /de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin yon tan dam pa'i tshogs/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru 'dod/ /rdo rje chos kyi

dbang bskur bas/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'dod/ /rdo rje r-in chen dbang bskur bas/ /de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che/ /mkha' mtshungs chos nyid snying po can/ /

rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur bas/ /sprul pa yi ni sku ru 'dod/ /gsang ba bzhi yi dbang bskur bas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob/ /de nas ming gi dbang bskur bas/ /thub de rnam snang mdzad chen
gyur/ /chos nyid kyang ni yang dag rtogs/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par brtag /chos kun dngos po med pa ste/ /mtshan ma med cing gsal byed med/ /mtshan nyid med cing mkha' dang mtshungs/ /
dmigs pa rnam par spangs pa ste/ /rang bzhin med cing brjod du med/ /chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min/ /gzhan yang gsang bar rtags pa ste/ /de phyir 'dir ni rtogs par brjod/ /rtog pa med
pa'i chos rnams kyi/ /chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod/ /bdag med dngos po yod pa min/ /chos rnams med cing rtog pa med/ /'on kyang chos nyid yang dag rtogs/ /chos dang longs spyod
rdzogs par rtogs/ /rtog pa nyams su myong bar brjod/ /'dir ni ngo mtshar nyid du rtogs/ /chos kun gzugs can min pa dang / /gzugs can du yang 'di ru bstan/ /chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min/ /sgra ru
yang ni 'dir bstan te/ /de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru/ /rtog pa rtog pa yin par brjod/ /ci phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos/ /de nyid gsang ba bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /las rnams drug po nyid dang ni/ /
gzugs can tshig gi mthu dag dang / /'bras phyir sdom pa'i ngo mtshar te/ /de phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos/ /de phyir 'di ni rtog par brjod/ /de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru/ /rtog pa 'ba' zhig rtog pa
yin/ /yang 'dir rtog pa ji lta bu/ /sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/ /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa dag /bsten pa rtog pa nyid yin no/ /sgrub pa'i don ni ji
lta bu/ /gang zag chos la bdag med dang / /gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yi/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa sgrub pa/ /de tshe sgrub pa'i don y-in no/ /ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma/ /rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes

bya ste/ /'khor ba rgyud du 'dod pa yin/ /phyi ma zhes bya pha rol te/ /rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin/ /rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste/ /phyi ma snga ma las byung ba'i/ /de nyid gsang ba sbas zhes
pa/ /rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin/ /ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma lags/ /sa mthar phyin pa'i rgyal ba mchog /srid pa'i btson ra las rgal yin/ /yang na gang zhig rgal gyur pa/ /rgyud ni phyi ma
yin par bshad/ /rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung / /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos longs spyod/ /sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba ni/ /rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin/ /

sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs byung ba'i/ /chos dang longs spyod byung ba ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni/ /rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin/ /rdo rje 'chang drag 'di ci zhig /sangs rgyas gzugs kyis mi

'dul ba'i/ /sems can gdug tshogs de yi phyir/ /rang gi ye shes byang chub sems/ /rdo rje drag por yang dag 'byung / /drag po'i don ni ji ltar 'byung / /drag po drag po'i mig gis ni/ /drag po'i khro bo

zhes su bstan/ /drag po'i las ni spyod byed rnams/ /'chos shing bzlog par bya ba yin/ /rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig /gdug pa de kun btul nas ni/ /slar yang zhi bar yang dag byung / /de nyid rgyal po rdo rje

'chang / /sems can don gyi thabs ston mdzad/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /khro bo'i dbang phyug dag tu bstan/ /de nyid zhi dang drag po dang / /phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/ /ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod/ /
sna tshogs gzugs can rnal 'byor che/ /sems can smin bya 'ba' zhig phyir/ /nyon mongs gdug la brtser dgongs shing / /zhi ba'i don ni yang dag byung / /phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir/ /nyon mongs gdug pa

nyes gzhom phyir/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin bzang / /rdo rje phyag na bsnams mdzad pa/ /de ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod/ /dus gsum bdud rnams de bzhin du/ /mi mthun phyogs kyis mi shigs pa/ /byang

sems rang bzhin rdo rje ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa'i tshogs/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun dang ldan/ /gsang chen rdo rje de lta bu/ /phyag na rtag tu bsnams pas na/ /de ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod/ /rdo rje gtum
pa'i don ci zhig /rdo rje gtum po gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin shin du brtan/ /nga rgyal nyon mongs zhags pa za/ /byang chub sems dpa' rang byung ba/ /ci yi phyir na gtum por brjod/ /gtum

gdug drag po chen po ni/ /rang byung nga nyid kho na ste/ /srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed cing / /drag po'i don ni gtum po yin/ /rdo rje khro bo ci yin brjod/ /gsod dang skrod pa drag po ste/ /de ni khro bo'i don du

brjod/ /nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar/ /nyon mongs phyogs rnams sreg byed yin/ /rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa/ /ci phyir rdo rjer brjod par bya/ /sra zhing snying po khong stong med/ /gcad dang gzhig par bya ba min/ /

bsreg par bya min 'jig med pas/ /stong nyid rdo rjer brjod par bya/ /'gro drug 'khor lo spong byed cing / /sdig pa dral bar byed pa yi/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /nyon mongs thams cad sel bar byed/ /

rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang / /byang sems brtan pa gang yin pa/ /de ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /de yi rdo rje ji lta bu/ /rtog pa
thams cad dang bral zhing / /chos su 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa/ /chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/ /stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer brjod/ /gzugs sogs chos kyi rang bzhin gang / /'gyur ba med pa'i de

bzhin nyid/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa gang / /de lta bu ni 'di rdo rje/ /rdo rje rigs kyi don 'di ci/ /bden zhing don yod de bzhin nyid/ /'gyur ba med cing skye ba med/ /'gag med de kho na nyid gang / /de lta
bu ni rdo rje yin/ /don yod 'gyur ba med pa yi/ /de lta bu yi rigs gyur pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su brjod/ /de ni rdo rje'i rigs shes bya/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i chos/ /byang chub sems dpa'

zhes su brjod/ /bden zhing slu ba med pa yi/ /byang chub sems gang de rigs yin/ /rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du/ /phyogs rnams thams cad kun khyab pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni/ /chos dbyings

dang mnyam thug pa med/ /rdo rje 'chang rnams de snyed do/ /rdo rje'i rigs kun gang gi yin/ /chos kyi bdag po bla med pa/ /rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /mgon des yongs su bzung ba de'i/ /de yi
dkyil 'khor yin gsungs pa/ /ston pa gang zhig 'di rnams su'i/ /rjes su ston par byed pa gang / /de yi spyod lam bya ba ci/ /gsang ba kun du bsdus pas gsungs/ /'di yi ston pa byang chub sems/ /

rjes su ston byed shes rab thabs/ /phyag rgya rnams ni spyod lam ste/ /sngags rnams de yi bya ba yin/ /rdo rje 'chang gi rigs gang yin/ /rdo rje 'chang ba de kun gyi/ /rigs ni byang chub sems yin te/ /
byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs bzang / /sangs rgyas kyi yang de nyid yul/ /chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas/ /chos rnams kun la gnas med de/ /rtsa ba med sems spyod yul lo/ /chos rnams thams
cad gzugs can min/ /chos kyi dbyings te spyod yul med/ /rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod/ /rtag dang mi 'khrugs rin chen dbang / /'od dpag med pa dngos 'grub rnams/ /rigs ni
rnam pa brgyar gsungs te/ /mdo ru bsdu na rnam pa lnga/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang / /chos dang las dang rnam pa lnga/ /ci yi phyir na rigs su brjod/ /mchog dang dman pa'i
bye brag gis/ /rigs zhes bya ba de rnams gnyis/ /sems can lam ngan zhugs pa yi/ /rigs ni dman pa yin par brjod/ /lam ngan 'gro ba spangs nas ni/ /byang chub sems la 'jug
pa chos/ /de bas rdo rje rigs brjod pa/ /rigs de yang ni lnga pa yin/ /rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig /byang chub sems ni rgyal po che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs pa med/ /
mgon po chen po rigs kyi bdag /de ni rigs kyang lnga pa yin/ /ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod/ /sems dpa' zhes bya rnam gsum ste/ /byis pa de bzhin mkhas pa dang / /de bzhin byang chub
sems dpa' dang / /rnam gsum sems dpa' brjod par bya/ /yang gsungs pa/ ci yi phyir na sems dpa' brjod/ /sems dpa' ci yin byis pa brjod/ /sems dpa' mkhas pa ci yi phyir/ /
byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod/ /gnas gang zhig tu brjod bya ba/ /de ni de yi sems dpar brjod/ /chos sam yang na chos min dang / /legs byas nyes par byas pa la/ /mi shes mun pas
bsgribs gyur cing / /chos la nyon mongs bdag nyid 'dzin/ /dman zhing gti mug rigs can gyur/ /de lta bu ni byis par brjod/ /nyon mongs kun la chags pa dang / /de bzhin srid pa ngan song gsum/ /
mi shes mun pa la chags pa/ /de 'dir byis par brjod par bya/ /sems dpa' mkhas pa gang zhig yin/ /dri ma las 'das nyon mongs spong / /rnal 'byor ldan zhing brtul zhugs che/ /mi shes
ling tog 'joms byed pa/ /de ni sems dpa' mkhas par brjod/ /'dir ni byang chub sems dpa' gang / /chos kyi de nyid rtogs gyur cing / /'khor ba'i gnas nas sad 'gyur te/ /sems can rnams

ni sad byed pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du/ /de la byang chub rnam gsum ste/ /dman dang mchog dang bar ma'o/ /dman pa nyan thos sems yin te/ /bar ma rang rgyal
byang chub bo/ /mchog ni byang chub sems yin te/ /de ni mi 'gyur rdo rje yin/ /sku gsung thugs rnams gzhag pa gang / /byang chub mchog tu brjod par bya/ /ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ /byang chub

mchog gi ye shes gang / /de ni rdo rje nges par brjod/ /ye shes rdo rje las byung ba/ /de ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod/ /rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rgyal/ /ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
mgon po che/ /dga' chen de ni chags sam ci/ /sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i phyir/ /sems can rnams la chags pa ste/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su bsgrags/ /byang chub

sems kyi 'bras bu ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla med gang / /de ni rdo rje sems rang bzhin/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'o/ /rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje rigs kun rgyal po ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhes su brjod/ /

dgug dang dbab pa'i rdo rje ni/ /de ni rdo rje rgyal por brjod/ /bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang spyad pa/ /sems can dgug pa'i thabs zhes pa/ /rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung / /rdo rje chags

pa 'di don ci/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed pa/ /rjes su chags pa zhes su brjod/ /rdo rje chags pa bdud chen po/ /de ni rdo rje chags par brjod/ /sems can smin phyir bcom ldan gyis/ /gang tshe byang chub spyod

pa spyad/ /byang chub spyod pa rjes chags pa/ /rdo rje chags par yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing / /legs so zhes bya rab ster byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'
kun mgu byed/ /de ni rdo rje legs par brjod/ /sems can dag pa mgu byed cing / /rdo rje 'chang rnams sgrub par byed/ /sems can mkhas rnams dga' byed cing / /gsang ba 'dzin pa rangs par byed/ /

chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sku'i phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di chos rnams drug /gang gi tshe ni sngon bsgrubs pa/ /rdo rje legs par yang dag byung / /rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir/ /byang chub sems dpa'i

sbyin pa gang / /mkha' mnyam rin chen lta bu ste/ /rdo rje rin chen skal ba che/ /de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/ /sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur te/ /sems can kun gyi dbang bskur ba/ /byang chub snying po'i dbang

bskur gyis/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'dzin par byed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin pa gang / /mkha' mtshungs rdo rje yang dag byung / /de ni rin chen don yod de/ /de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/ /rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod/ /

ma rig ling tog 'khor ba yi/ /mi shes mun pa 'joms byed cing / /thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che/ /de ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod/ /ci phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan yin/ /rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /thar pa'i

lam 'gro rgyal mtshan te/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan che/ /de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan brjod/ /rdo rje bzhad pa ci yin brjod/ /rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje bzhad/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bzhad byed cing / /byang chub sems

dpa' kun dbugs 'byin/ /de ni rdo rje bzhad par brjod/ /ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos/ /rnal 'byor chen po sangs rgyas chos/ /sangs rgyas sems can rtogs byed pa/ /dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po/ /de ni

rdo rje chos su brjod/ /rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjod/ /shes rab rnon po ye shes che/ /shin du sdug pa'i nyon mongs gcod/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa'ang gcod pas na/ /de ni rdo rje rnon por brjod/ /rdo rje rgyu yi don

ci zhig /'khor lo sangs rgyas gar byed pas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo shin du brtan/ /dam chos ro yi bcud las byung / /de ni rdo rje rgyu zhes bya/ /rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi chos chen po/ /

mkha' mtshungs tshig dang bral ba ste/ /tshig me tshig las yang dag byung / /de ni rdo rje smra bar brjod/ /ci yi phyir na rdo rje las/ /sems can smin dang grol ba yi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi las gang dang / /sangs rgyas

las ni bdag med pa/ /de ni rdo rje las shes bya/ /rdo rje srung ba ci yin brjod/ /byang chub sems dpa'i srung ba ste/ /theg pa dman pa spong byed cing / /rtse mo nas ltung srung byed pa/ /de ni rdo rje srung bar brjod/ /rdo rje gnod

sbyin 'di don ci/ /sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing / /nyon mongs thams cad nges par gcod/ /srid pa za byed gnod sbyin che/ /de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod/ /rdo rje khu tshur ci yin brjod/ /bden zhing gzhan min de

bzhin nyid/ /'gyur med de kho na nyid gang / /sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid ye shes/ /de ni rdo rje khu tshur brjod/ /sngon du byang chub sems 'gyur gang / /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung / /bsdus ba'i dngos po bzhi

po ni/ /rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung / /sems can smin byed chags pa'o/ /byang chub spyod pa legs pa ste/ /de nyid ces bya dam tshig che/ /byang chub sems las yang dag byung / /sngon gyi sbyin pa'i spyod gyur gang / /

de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /de ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod/ /'byung po kun la byams pa ni/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag byung / /chos kyi sbyin pa bzhad pa ste/ /dbang

bskur bzhi por bstan pa yin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gang / /rdo rje chos ni de las byung / /nyon mongs gcod byed rdo rje che/ /rdo rje rnon por yang dag byung / /mngon shes dang ni mthu la sogs/ /

de ni rdo rje rgyu ru brjod/ /gzungs la sogs pa grub pa ni/ /rdo rje smra bar yang dag byung / /ye shes chen po chos chen po/ /dam tshig ces bya'i dga' chen po/ /ye shes mngon par rtogs te dag /rdo rje chos las
yang dag byung / /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rgyal po/ /rdo rje las su yang dag byung / /theg pa dman pa spong byed pa/ /de phyir rdo rje srung bar brjod/ /nyon mongs srid pa'i gdon chen po/ /

rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag byung / /de nyid ye shes mngon byang chub/ /de nyid rdo rje khu tshur brjod/ /las kyi dam tshig bzhi po ste/ /las kyi sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /las kyi 'khor lo las byung ba'i/ /

rdo rje las ni de las byung / /gzhan yang byang chub sems ni bskyed pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung / /rdo rje rang bzhin sems de yang / /rnam pa bzhi ru byung ba ste/ /'dzin pa dang ni bral ba dang / /dbugs
'byin mya ngan 'das 'god byed/ /sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa che/ /rdo rje legs par yang dag byung / /bsod nams ye shes tshogs nyid las/ /rdo rje rin chen rab tu bsgrags/ /bsod nams rang bzhin

rin chen de/ /rnam bzhi ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /ye shes kyi ni tshogs brjod pa/ /de ni rdo rje chos zhes bya/ /ye shes rang bzhin chos de yang / /rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung / /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa

nyid/ /de ni rdo rje las su brjod/ /brtson 'grus rang bzhin las de yang / /rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung / /rtsom dang sbyor ba zhes bya dang / /so sor rtogs dang sgrub pa ste/ /brtson 'grus de bzhin las
bzhi po/ /de las mthar gyis byung ba yin/ /sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung / /rdo rje sems sogs de bzhin du/ /byang chub sems las yang dag byung / /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa las/ /rdo rje can

rnams byung bar 'dod/ /de bzhin pha dang ma ni gang / /ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste/ /pad ma las ni sangs rgyas sras/ /rdo rje can rnams gang las byung / /rdo rje rgyal po de bzhin

chags/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / /rdo rje chos dang de bzhin rno/ /de rnams shes rab gtso bor bstan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje legs/ /gzi brjid de bzhin bzhad pa nyid/ /rgyu dang smra ba sems dpa' che/ /

de rnams thabs las byung ba yin/ /rdo rje las dang rdo rje bsrung / /gnod sbyin de bzhin khu tshur nyid/ /shes rab thabs su grags pa ste/ /brtan pa chen po tshogs su bshad/ /rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun gyi

gtso/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ma ru bshad/ /rdo rje rin chen mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin pha/ /pha ni rdo rje rgyal po rgyu/ /ma ni rdo rje rnon po ste/ /pad ma'i rigs chen bzang po yi/ /pad 'dzin
gang las byung ba'o/ /rdo rje gzi brjid rin chen pha/ /rgyal mtshan ma ni yin par bstan/ /nor bu rin chen bzang po yi/ /rin chen gang las byung ba'o/ /pha ni rgyal po rdo rje las/ /ma ni gnod sbyin

srung ba ste/ /las kyi rigs can bzang po yi/ /las rnams gang las byung ba'o/ /dang po gang zhig ci zhe na/ /dngos kun dang po sa bon te/ /rdo rje can kun dang po sems/ /'dun dang dran dang ting nge 'dzin/ /

rigs rnams kun gyi dang por bshad/ /yang gleng gzhi ci yin zhe na/ /rigs bzhi las ni yang dag byung / /tshangs pa'i gnas chen dang ldan pa'i/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi/ /snying rje chen po gleng gzhi yin/ /

dmigs pa gang zhig yin zhe na/ /rtog pa med cing dmigs pa med/ /dang por byang chub sems byung ba'i/ /pha rol phyin pa mchog drug ni/ /de'i dmigs pa yin par bshad/ /rkyen gang zhe na/ rtag tu srid gsum
mngon dga' ba/ /sems can sdug bsngal gyur bltas nas/ /snying rje dang ni ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems kyis bskul ba'o/ /gsang ba 'di ni gang du byung / /'og min stug po nyams dga' zhing / /
stug po'i zhing khams 'jigs med pa/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos/ /rdzogs par longs spyod tshul 'di byung / /khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung / /rdo rje rin chen mchog chen gyi/ /gzhal

yas khang pa yid 'ong zhing / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ldan pa/ /de nas khyab bdag 'di rnams byung / /thog ma tha ma med 'di ci/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen po gsung / /sems can kun gyi shes pa dang / /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / /chos dbyings rdo rje chen po ste/ /thog ma tha ma med par bshad/ /rab tu dga' ba nyid 'di ci/ /bde chen rab tu grub bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

rgyal po che/ /rab tu dga' ba nyid ces bshad/ /rab bzang nyid ni ji lta bu/ /dngos po kun mchog rdo rje ni/ /byang chub kyi ni sems shes brjod/ /sangs rgyas skyed byed bzang po yi/ /rdo rje rab bzung nyid ces bshad/ /rdo rje snying

bdag ji lta bu/ /gdul bya 'phags pa'i skyes mchog nyid/ /de ni rdo rje snying por brjod/ /de rnams bdag po rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje snying po bdag por bshad/ /ci yi phyir na kun du bzang / /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas

ldan pa'i/ /'gro ba srid pa'i skye gnas gang / /de kun rtag tu bzang bas na/ /kun du bzang por brjod par bya/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'chang ba gang / /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /rdo rje gang de rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje sems dpa'

rgyal po che/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'chang bar brjod/ /dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung / /sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub kyis/ /grags chen rdzogs par byang chub pa/ /de ni dang po'i rigs byung ste/ /de kho na nyid rigs las so/ /
yang na rab tu mkhas pa rnams/ /bskal pa grangs med 'das nas ni/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob gang / /de ni dang po'i rigs byung yin/ /chos kun skye ba med pa dang / /'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /
de nyid rtogs shing shes pa yis/ /chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa med/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med las/ /rigs de byung ba nyid du 'dod/ /chos rnams 'ga' yang skye ba med/ /chos rnams 'gag par
'gyur ba med/ /rnam par rtogs pa nyer zhi gang / /de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod/ /chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa dang / /'khor ba'i gnas las sad gyur cing / /

sems can rnams kyis rtogs byed pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod/ /ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya/ /de bzhin nyid bden shin tu brtan/ /de kho na nyid gang rtogs nas/ /chos kun rtogs pa zhes bya gang / /

de ni rtogs pas sangs rgyas brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod/ /chos kyi de nyid yang dag gnas/ /slar yang gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing / /de nyid lam ni ston byed pa/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs shes bya/ /

bcom ldan 'das ni ci yin brjod/ /las dang nyon mongs de bzhin skye/ /de bzhin nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib/ /mi mthun phyogs kyi chos rnams gang / /de bcom pas na bcom ldan brjod/ /de yi bcom pa ci yin
brjod/ /bcom ldan de bzhin bcom par brjod/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags gcod byed cing / /nyon mongs 'joms shing pham byed pa/ /de ni de'i bcom par brjod/ /de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci/ /nyon mongs
bdud sogs gcod byed cing / /skye dgu ma lus thabs chen gyis/ /ngan 'gro srid las skyob byed pa/ /ston pa'i ston par brjod pa yin/ /ci'i phyir na ye shes brjod/ /de nyid shes pas ye shes te/ /
slar yang chos su rtogs pa min/ /rtag dang chad pa spong byed cing / /'chi med de bzhin ye shes ni/ /shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod/ /rnam pa mang po shes byed cing / /rtogs pas sdug bsngal las

grol byed/ /kun nas nyon mongs chos spong pa/ /shes rab ye shes zhes su brjod/ /ci phyir shes rab brjod par bya/ /rab sbyor sbyor ba shes 'gyur zhing / /khyad par du ni rtogs par byed/ /bden pa de bzhin

nyid shes pa'i/ /shes rab shes rab shes su bshad/ /shes rab pha rol phyin don ci/ /nyan thos rang rgyal phyi rol gyi/ /shes rab las ni bla mar brjod/ /de bzhin nyid gzhol pha rol phyin/ /shes rab pha rol phyin zhes bshad/ /

tshul zhes bya don ci yin brjod/ /na ni dgag pa'i don chen te/ /dngos med dngos po med min pas/ /gang du dri ma med gyur pa/ /de ni de yi tshul du brjod/ /ting 'dzin don 'di ci yin brjod/ /chos kun dngos po
med ces pa'i/ /mnyam pa nyid du rab gnas pa'i/ /shes rab can gyis lhag par bsten/ /sems la dmigs par brjod par bya/ /ci yi phyir na bsam gtan brjod/ /sdug bsngal thams cad spong byed cing / /
nyon mongs dra ba rab 'joms pa'i/ /shes rab bcas par sems dpa' ni/ /srid pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog /rnal 'byor don ni ci yin brjod/ /chos rgya chen po dam pa dang / /zab mo'i mchog
tu gyur pa des/ /kun shes kun rigs ldan 'byor pa'i/ /rnal 'byor du ni brjod par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa ni ci yin brjod/ /shes rab kyi na nges sems pa/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor don sems shing / /

sems can kun gyi don sems gang / /de ni rnal 'byor pa don brjod/ /nga ni kun gyi rgyal po che/ /thams cad rig cing thams cad ster/ /rdo rje 'chang chen dang po ste/ /bde ba yi ni rgyu 'di yis/ /de bzhin
nga ni 'jig rten gsum/ /khams gsum rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog /de bzhin 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ /bde 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro dang / /'dod pa lnga la longs spyod yin/ /srid gsum 'di yi don
ci zhig /sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/ /srid pa gsum du brjod par bya/ /'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med las/ /'di ltar thams cad rig pa mchog /bdag med byed pa po yang med/ /
chos kyang yod pa ma yin te/ /dge dang mi dge byed pa yi/ /bag chags kyis ni kun du bsgribs/ /chos ni thog med dus can te/ /byed pa po ni yod ma yin/ /rtogs pas nyams pa'i sems ldan pas/ /
rgyu dang 'bras bur mthong bar 'gyur/ /kun gzhi sa bon thams cad pa/ /de ni chos kun skyed par byed/ /bsgos shing bag chags dang ldan pa/ /de ni srid pa gsum zhes bya/ /'dod pa'i las skyes khams gsum

gyi/ /rgyur ni kun gzhi de nyid snang / /gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba yi/ /chos rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin/ /chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /nyes pa kun dang bral ba ste/ /thog ma med 'byung chos snying po/ /

blo bur dri mas nyon mongs 'gyur/ /nga ni kho na chos chen po/ /nga ni chos kyi snying por bshad/ /de bas nga ni rgyal po che/ /nga ni srid pa gsum du bsgrags/ /'jig rten gsum ni ci yin brjod/ /'dod pa 'jig rten de bzhin gzugs/ /

gzugs med pa yi skye dgu rnams/ /'jig rten gsum po zhes pa ste/ /rang byung nga nyid kho na yin/ /'dod pa zhes bya chos chen te/ /dag pa btsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ /gzung 'dzin chos rnams zhes bya ba'i/ /de bzhin
nyid las so sor rtog /chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med phyir/ /nga ni chos de dag par byed/ /de bas nga ni rgyal po che/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por bstan/ /ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin gzugs/ /de bzhin
gzugs med rab tu bsgrags/ /stong pa nyid dang dbyer med pa'i/ /nga ni snying po'i bdag por bshad/ /khams gsum pa yi don ci zhig /'dod

khams de bzhin gzugs khams dang / /gzugs med pa ni nyid dag dang / /khams gsum bzang po 'di dag ni/ /rang byung nga nyid kho na yin/ /'di ni khams dang rgyu dang don/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyu sems pa/ /

stong dang mtshan ma med bshad cing / /smon pa med pa nga nyid bstan/ /'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin/ /byis pa rnams ni kun du 'byung / /de bzhin yang dang yang du 'khor/ /'khor ba dag pa'i bdag nyid de/ /rang byung nga

nyid kho na yin/ /gang la 'khor ba yod pa yi/ /chos ni rdul tsam yod ma yin/ /yang dag ma yin kun rtags phyir/ /de ni thog mtha' med pa yin/ /med gang de ni stong pa ste/ /stong pa nyid gang nga nyid do/ /de bas

'khor ba de nyid ni/ /rdo rje 'chang rgyal nga nyid bsgrags/ /mya ngan 'das pa ci yin brjod/ /gang zhig de bzhin nyid rtag stong / /bden bzhi rang bzhin bzang po nyid/ /mtshan nyid dang ni dngos po gzugs/ /mtshan ma nyid

kyang rnam par spangs/ /tshig dang sgra yis gzung bya min/ /rnam par rtog pa yod ma yin/ /de bas mya ngan 'das sgra ru/ /nga nyid kho na rab shes bya/ /de yi rtag pa'i don ci zhig /rtag nyid rtag la 'byung gnas te/ /

rnam par rtog pa dang bral gang / /rtag pa de nyid kho na ni/ /mya ngan 'das 'da' pa'i sgra ru bsgrags/ /'jig pa yang ni ci yin brjod/ /gang zhig 'khor bar mi 'jug cing / /thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang / /
sdug bsngal 'byung ba 'gog byed pa'i/ /'jig pa mya ngan 'das sgra yin/ /dag pa yang ni ci yin brjod/ /yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang min/ /dngos po'ang ma yin dngos med min/ /brjod bya rjod byed ma

yin min/ /dag pa mya ngan 'das nyid yin/ /theg pa chen po ci yin brjod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs gyur cing / /theg pa kun las nges rgyal ba/ /yang dag gyur pa'i sems can ni/ /theg pa chen po zhes su bstan/ /

mthu dang las rnams 'jug pa dang / /tshogs rnams rnal 'byor ngo mtshar rnams/ /rgya che zhes pa theg chen te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo mtshar mchog /nam mkha'i don ni ci zhig yin/ /sa nyid kyang ni ci yin

brjod/ /'byung ba med cing rdzas kyang med/ /skye ba med cing 'chi ba med/ /dus gsum dngos po dang bral mchog /nam mkha' zhes pa'i sgra ru bstan/ /yang dang yang du skye ba dang / /de bzhin nyon mongs kun bdag
nyid/ /grangs med dpag med dang bral ba/ /de ni sa nyid brjod par bya/ /'byung ba chen po gang las byung / /'gog pa ci yin gang gis byed/ /ma rigs nyon mongs la sogs las/ /'byung ba chen po yang
dag 'byung / /sa bon kun ldan kun gzhi ni/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /gnas ni yongs su gyur pa dang / /kun gzhi sa bon mi 'byung zhing / /rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba/ /'byung ba chen po
'gog pa yin/ /rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang zhing sbas pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud/ rdo rje rtse mo las shin du gsang ba stug po'i tshogs kyi las thams cad bsdus pa ste/ drug pa las

sems dpa' bcu drug gi bshad pa zhes bya ba bshad pa'i dang po rdzogs s+ho// // ci yi phyir na phyag rgya brjod/ /gang gis phyag rgya bcings gyur pa/ /des ni srog chags gdug kun dang / /'gro ba sdig can
thams cad dang / /rtag tu rgyas ni btab par 'gyur/ /ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya/ /gsang sngags rnams ni 'bod byed cing / /gdug pa thams cad skrod par byed/ /nyon mongs sngags rnams 'joms byed
cing / /sangs rgyas chos ni spyan 'dren yin/ /ci phyir zhe na rig sngags brjod/ /'dod chags mun pa rnams 'dul zhing / /nyon mongs rnams kyang rnam par 'dul/ /ma rig pa ni zlog byed pa/ /
nga ni rigs sngags legs par brjod/ /gzungs sngags rnams ni ci yin brjod/ /chos rnams kyi ni rten byed cing / /srid pa'i phyogs ni rab 'joms byed/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams

thob byed cing / /dge ba la rten sbyin pa'ang yin/ /phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun dang brtul zhugs ldan/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad dag /spyod lam phyag

rgya mtshon par byed/ /sngags rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid kyang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te/ /chos kyi snying po sgrub byed cing / /chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag ldan/ /sngags kyi mtshan nyid yin par brjod/ /
rigs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs/ /'khor bar myong ba'i sdug bsngal dang / /'dod chags la sogs nyes pa'i tshogs/ /rigs dang bcas pa zhi byed pa'i/ /rigs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod/ /

de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags kyi/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin byed cing / /chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa dang / /dge ba zhes bya 'dzin byed pa/ /gzungs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod/ /rtsa ba'i phyag

rgya'i gnas ni gang / /ji ltar bcing bya thub chen po/ /phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba na/ /ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes/ /dang po kho nar khrus bya zhing / /de bzhin phyogs dag bcing ba dang / /logs 'dren rnams kyang

bcing bya ste/ /gos dag gtsang ma bgo bya zhing / /grong dang yul 'khor dag dang ni/ /grong khyer dang ni grong rdal rnams/ /de yi dbus su phyag rgya dag /nam yang bcing bar mi bya ste/ /lha khang yang na dgon pa
'am/ /ri bo yi ni phug dag gam/ /rnams pa sna tshogs kyis dben zhing / /'du 'dzin med pa'i gnas gtsang ma/ /der ni dkyil dkrung bca' bar bya/ /bkra shis dkyil dkrung nyid bya ste/ /ji ltar byang

chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang chub snying por bcings pa bzhin/ /der ni mig dag btsum bya zhing / /so la so ni gzhag par bya/ /mchu gnyis dag kyang mnyam bya zhing / /dran pa rtse gcig byas nas kyang / /sbyor med

sbyor ba'i sngags bzla zhing / /phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya/ /phyag rgya'i rnam pa de lta bu'i/ /bcings pas rdo rje can kun mnyes/ /rigs sngags ji ltar bzla bar bya/ /dbang phyug chen po gsang bas gsungs/ /

rigs sngags dag ni zlos pa na/ /ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas/ /dkyil dkrung ji lta ba bzhin bya/ /dran dang yid ni ma g.yengs pas/ /rigs sngags dag ni bzla bya zhing / /sku nyid kyang ni bsam par bya/ /mchu

yis ma yin gcig kyang min/ /rkan gnyis kyis kyang ma yin te/ /lce dang lkog ma kyang ma yin/ /rtag tu snying ga nas kyang min/ /shin tu phra ba'i yid kyis ni/ /sems ni chos nyid nang chud bya/ /de ltar bzlas

pa byas na ni/ /yid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa yin/ /oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad/ /mchog dang nor ste dpal dang g.yang / /skal bzangs rnam pa dang ldan zhing / /dam bca' ba dang bkra shis don/ /nor bu 'dzin

pa'i snying po yin/ /yi ge hU~M ni ci yin brjod/ /sdug bsngal 'chos shing 'joms par byed/ /srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed cing / /gdug pa sngangs shing gsod byed pa'i/ /hU~M ni mchog tu dran par bya/ /yi ge phaT ni
ci yin brjod/ /gdug dang sdug bsngal 'joms byed cing / /bde ba dag ni 'gugs par byed/ /phaT ni 'joms byed sgra yin te/ /grogs dang bcas pa 'joms par byed/ /swA hA zhes pa ci
yin brjod/ /sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing / /dge ba'i tshogs ni 'phel bar byed/ /nyes par byas pa 'phrog byed cing / /sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog /mchod pa ci phyir brjod par
bya/ /mchod par byed pas mchod pa ste/ /gang du gsang bya mi 'jigs pa'i/ /de yi mchod pa rnam mang 'gyur/ /phyi rol gyi ni mchod pa min/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod/ /de bzhin
du ni thar pa'i mchog /gsang ba'i mchod pa de rnams ni/ /'jigs med rgyal sras rnams kyi ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dang / /nyid kyi sras kyis mtshungs med pa'i/ /cho ga bsgrub pa'i gsang
ba ni/ /rtag tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang / /zhugs pa gang dang gang yin pa/ /de ni dam tshig shes pa yin/ /dam tshig goms par byed pa yang / /dam tshig shes pa
yin par brjod/ /bskal pa grangs med 'das pa yi/ /byang chub sems dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig la zhugs pa/ /de yi dam tshig shes par brjod/ /ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor
yin/ /dam pa'i chos kyi bcud snying po/ /'byung bas de ni dkyil 'khor brjod/ /dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba che/ /chos chen shin du bstan pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu/ /cho ga chos dang rnal
'byor te/ /gsang ba'i thar pa yang dag 'byung / /skye ba 'di nyid kho na la/ /rab dga' sgrub par byed pa'i mchog /dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs pa yi/ /skyes pa'am yang na bud med kyis/ /bya ba gang zhig

bya ba ni/ /gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang phyug che/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro dang / /byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang / /de bzhin du ni sgrub pa'i mchog /shin du brtan par bya ba yin/ /thub pa'i

dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la/ /sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bya/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin pa yang blang mi bya/ /'dod pas logs par g.yem mi bya/ /brdzun du yang ni smra mi bya/ /nyes pa kun

gyi rtsa ba yi/ /chang dag 'thung ba spang bar bya/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad dor/ /mchog tu sems can gdul bar bya/ /dam pa rnams la rim gro dang / /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ /rnal 'byor rig pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /

mkhas pa rnams la bsten par bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag kyang / /ci nus par ni bsrung bar bya/ /slob dpon brnyas par mi bya ste/ /bla ma sangs rgyas

kun dang mtshungs/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rnams la yang / /nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad ma sogs/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gang yin pa/ /'gom pa nyid du mi bya zhing / /bza' bar yang ni mi bya'o/ /

de bzhin sman ma lha yi grib/ /rkang pa dag gis brdzi mi bya/ /de yi steng du 'dug mi bya/ /slar yang gzhag par mi bya'o/ /lha yi phyag mtshan bzang po dang / /lha yi bzhon pa'i mtshan ma rnams/ /'gom zhing brnyas par mi bya ste/ /

sems can la ni gnod mi bya/ /de yis srog gis phyir yang ni/ /'dor bar mi bya gang zhig yin/ /'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni/ /byang chub sems ni dor mi bya/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya ni/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /dkon mchog

gsum la dad pa yang / /rnam pa kun du gtang mi bya/ /sdom pa gtang bar mi bya'o/ /bdag nyid gdung bar mi bya'o/ /khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya/ /mi dge bcu ni spongs nas su/ /dge ba bcu ni bsten byed cing / /'byung po rnams la phan

'dod pa/ /nang gi bdag nyid khrus su 'dod/ /bdag nyid rab tu dag bya'i phyir/ /bdag nyid phyag rgyas rgyas gdab phyir/ /phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcings/ /rnal 'byor pa yi khrus su brjod/ /gsang ba'i khrus lnga khas len

pa'i/ /chu yi khrus ni bya ba ste/ /las 'di rnam par rtog pa'i khrus/ /rdo rje slob dpon dag gis bya/ /yang na cho gas khrus bya ba/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar bshad bya ste/ /dang por bdag nyid go bgo zhing / /bdag nyid bkru ba'i phyir du ni/ /khro bo

yang ni dran par bya/ /don kun rab tu sgrub byed pa'i/ /yig gnyis go cha bzang po yin/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin drag chen dang / /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste/ oM badzra ki li ki li badzra hU~M phaT/ oM Tu~M go cha'o/ /

oM hU~M A rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi'o/ /oM mrI te hU~M phaT/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i 'o/ /rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di dang ni/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje 'bar rab bzod dka' bas/ /bdag nyid dag ni 'bar ba bya/ /oM d+hu pi

d+hu pi kA ya d+hu pi pra dzA la ni swA hA/ chu yi nang du 'jug pa dang / /snyim pa gsum ni blugs pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs dag la/ /rigs sngags 'di ni 'dod pa yin/ /rigs sngags mngon par bzlas pa yi/ /

sa yi phung po gsum dag ni/ /bdag gi stod dang smad dang dbus/ /rab tu dag byed mchog yin no/ /oM b+hU ra dz+wa la hU~M/ sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran pas/ /rigs sngags thams cad mngon bzlas pa'i/ /chu ni phyag rgya kun

gyis blang / /rigs sngags 'di ni gsang bar 'dod/ /phyogs ni ji ltar bcing ba yin/ /me lha rgyal chen shar phyogs su/ /lho yi phyogs su gshin rje dang / /nub tu rlung lha nyid dang ni/ /byang du chu lha gzhom par 'dod/ /

rnal 'byor pa yis gzugs bzhi ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu nges par bcing / /de nas steng 'og mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje nag mos nges par gcad/ /bgegs bcing ba ni ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje khu tshur rab 'bar dang / /rdo rje nyi ma ltar

'bar dang / /rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs bcing ba ni brtan par 'gyur/ /dga' ba chen po ji lta bu/ /rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bya/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis phyogs bzhi ru/ /lnga pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /steng dang

'og dang mtshams rnams su/ /bstod dang bcas pas phyag bya'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyi/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i dam pa yis/ /brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du/ /de bzhin du ni bcing bar bya/ /mchod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/ /rigs sngags mngon

par bzlas mchod dang / /phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len dang / /rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i mchod pa dang / /sgrub pa dag gi mchod pa'o/ /sbyin sreg las ni ji lta bu/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi

dag dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag dang / /bsreg bya sbyin sreg mchog yin no/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba'o/ /de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi/ /snying po gsang ba kun bsdus pa'i/ /shin du sbas pa dam pa'i mchog /

de kho na nyid bshad par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon spyod chen ldan/ /dkyil 'khor gsang bar rab tu zhugs/ /slob dpon las ni dbang bskur thob/ /gsang dang dgongs pa kun shes shing / /dpa' zhing brtan la brtson 'grus

che/ /yid gzhungs 'dzin cing gsal bar ldan/ /dul drang bshes gnyen can dag gis/ /rdo rje slob dpon nyid bya'o/ /dang por ji srid tshogs bar du/ /zla ba'am yang na zla ba phyed/ /yang na lo yi bar du ni/ /rig
pa'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya/ /gal te de ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /rig 'dzin sgrub pa rnam gsum mo/ /ji ste rdo rje can gyi yin/ /rnam pa gsum du nges pa yin/ /nor bu rigs can bzang po la/ /rnal 'byor

bzhi po nyid bya'o/ /ji ste pad 'byung dag pa la/ /rnal 'byor bzhi ni rab tu bsgrub/ /ji ste las kyi rang bzhin bzang / /las rnams kun gyi rigs las ni/ /sbyor ba bzhi ni yang dag byung / /rnam pa bcwa brgyad dag

tu 'gyur/ /snga dro phyi dro nyin phyed dang / /nam gyi stod smad gung la ni/ /bya ba chen po kun bya ste/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rigs/ /dang por re zhig rnal 'byor ches/ /chen pos phyogs kun phyag bya ste/ /

rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga yis/ /rdo rje slob dpon nyid bya'o/ /shes rab chen pos sangs rgyas kun/ /yang dang yang du dran bya ste/ /bdag nyid chen pos sangs rgyas kun/ /rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya/ /

oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dze pas+thA nA ya/ Ata mA nA~M nir+ya tA yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swA mA~M/ shar gyi phyogs su song nas ni/ /yan lag kun gyis phyags byas te/ /rdo rje'i

gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /bdag nyid dbul bar bya ba yin/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA a b+hi She kA ya Ata mA na~M nir+ya tA yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rata na a b+hi shiny+tsa mA~M/ rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /

lho phyogs su ni phyag byas te/ /sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad la/ /bdag ni dbul bar bya ba yin/ /de nas nub kyi phyogs su ni/ /sngags 'di yis ni phyag byas te/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA pra bar ta

nA yA/ Ata mA na~M nir+ya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra bar ta yA ma~M/ dag pa'i chos can slob dpon ches/ /nub phyogs su ni phyag byas te/ /rdo rje'i sngags 'dis bskul bya zhing / /bdag nyid rab tu dbul bar bya/ /

oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA karma Ne Ata mA nA~M nir+ya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mA~M/ mchod dang dbang bskur las ldan zhing / /byang du chos la nges sbyor bas/ /byang phyogs su ni phyag byas te/ /bdag nyid rdo rje

las su 'gyur/ /shar du mchod pa'i las yin te/ /lho phyogs su ni dbang bskur ba/ /nub phyogs su ni chos chen po/ /byang du chos la nges par sbyor/ /thub pa kun gyi nyi ma'o/ /mgon po chen po rab btud nas/ /phyogs

rnams kun du sngags 'di yis/ /phyag ni rab tu btsal bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta pra na me na badzra ban da na~M ka ro mi/ de nas ji skad bshad pa'i phyag bya ba/ /sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni/ /

rab tu gus bcas phyag rgya rnams/ /myur du snyen pa'i sgrub pa yin/ /phyag byas 'og tu langs nas ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni las rnams bya/ /bdag nyid dbul ba bzang po yi/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya ste/ /
ma lus phyogs bzhugs mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /'di ltar nye bar zhi ba bdag /ci nas rdo rje nyid gyur mdzod/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas
thams cad la/ /rtag tu rnam par thams cad kyis/ /bdag nyid dag ni dbul bar bya/ /rdo rje'i gsang sngags de yis ni/ /bdag nyid dbul bar 'gyur ba yin/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad ni/ /yang dang
yang du rjes dran te/ /sdig pa la sogs nyon mongs kun/ /mya ngan 'das par bshags par bya/ /skye ba 'di 'am gzhan dag gi/ sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad
kyi/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs skyed dang / /de bzhin sems can kun gyi la/ /rjes su yi rang bya ba yin/ /byang chub mya ngan mi 'da' bar/ /sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub sems ni

thabs chen gyis/ /sems can sangs rgyas rjes dran bya/ /shin du ngo mtshar mchod pa ni/ /ci nus par yang bsgrub par bya/ /yang na mya ngan sogs dang / /rnal 'byor dge ba sogs pa la/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa'i

mchod pa yis/ /mchod pa'i sprin dag dbul bar bya/ /gnas 'di 'am ni gzhan dag na/ /lha sogs bdag gir ma byas pa'i/ /me tog chu skyes thang skyes rnams/ /thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /de yi 'od kyi dkyil
'khor nas/ /thub pa'i dbang po rnams la dbul/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /me tog mchod pas rab mchod cing / /phyag rgya rnal 'byor bcas pa yis/ /phyogs rnams kun du nges par spro/ /

oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ /gang dag spos kyi shing bzang po/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la 'bul/ /lha yi spos sogs rmad byung ba/ /phyogs rnams kun

du spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ /dri yi zhing rnams bzang po ni/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la 'bul/ /phyag rgya bcas rab bskul nas ni/ /

phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+phar Na sa ma ye hU~M/ rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho dang / rin chen ri bo la sogs mchog /mchod pa'i sprin ni spro ba yis/ /

phyogs rnams kun du dbul bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+h+yad ga ra ta na a laM kA ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ rtsed 'jo bde ba dga' chen dang / /dgod dang sgeg la sogs pa'i tshogs

phyogs rnams kun du thams cad nas/ /dga' ba'i mchog ni spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta hA s+ya lA s+ya ra te krI DA sau khya a nut+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ gos dang rgyan sogs 'byung

ba yi/ /de bzhin dpag bsam shing bzang po/ /rdo rje sngags ni brjod bya zhing / /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra bo d+hi a lang ka ra bas+t+ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/

rin chen bzang por cher 'bar dang / /snang ba'i shing las byung ba dang / /zla ba nyi ma la sogs 'od/ /phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta tha ga tA lo ka pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ sems can

kun gyi sdug bsngal che/ /yang dang yang du rjes dran nas/ /snying rje bskyed pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/ /sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /sangs

gyas kun la dbul bya zhing / /phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA g+ha ta badzra bo d+hi tsit+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ sems can kun la bde legs dang / /'byung po kun la byams

pa dang / /dud 'gro kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /ngan 'gro thams cad zhi 'dod dang / /byams dang snying rje btang snyoms dang / /dga' ba tshangs pa'i rnal 'byor byung / /rdo rje'i sngags ni brjod bya zhing / /sangs rgyas kun

la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ma hA tsa dur brah+ma bi hA ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin spyod pas/ /sems can thams cad dpal dang ni/ /nor dang ldan pa grub

par shog /bde ba ma tshang med par shog /ces pas dbul zhing spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badzrod b+ha ba dA na pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ sems can thams cad byang chub dang / /

sdom la rab tu gnas par shog /rgyags sogs nyes pa chen po rnams/ /zhi 'gyur kun du spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ma hA bo d+h+yi ha ra shI la pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/
'jigs dang 'khon sogs sdug bsngal las/ /stsogs pa'i 'jigs kun zhi gyur cig /byams dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos la bdag med bsgrub par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra mo hA d+harma

a ba bo d+hi k+ShAn ti pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ 'khor ba mthar thug bar du ni/ /bdag 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /de bzhin sems can thams cad ni/ /de nyid sgrub pa byed par shog /

oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa~M sA rA pa ri t+yA ga a nut+ta ra bIr+ya pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ srog chags kun gyi 'dod chags stsogs/ /nyon mongs chen po zhi bar shog /sems can thams

cad g.yeng med cing / /bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ma hA sau khya bi hA ra d+h+yA na pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ sangs rgyas ye shes shes rab che/ /

sdug bsngal gcod byed bla na med/ /shes rab sbyor bas dag byed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sems can dag gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra kle sha ts+tshe da sarba d+harma sa man ta dz+nyi na ma hA pradz+nyI pA ra mi

tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi/ /bdag nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing / /mchod pa'i phyir ni rnam bsams nas/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta

kA ya nir+ya ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi/ /bdag nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing / /lce ni de snyed ldan dang bcas/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA

ga ta bA ga nir+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas rnal 'byor de nyid kyi/ /lus dang ngag sems byung ba yi/ /mchod pa dag ni bsdus nas su/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta

tsit+ta nir+ya ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ grags chen ldan pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /ma lus kun la mchod nas ni/ /dge ba dag ni bsdus byas nas/ /sems can don du bsngo bar bya/ /
sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran nas/ /sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bca' bar bya/ /byams sogs rnal 'byor chen po rnams/ /phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/ /go cha mchog gi yig gnyis kyis/ /

blo ldan bdag nyid go bgo zhing / /rigs sngags gang zhig mngon 'dod pa'i/ /rigs sngags de ni bzla bar bya/ /rgyud chen gsang ba 'di ru ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i sngags bzlas pa/ /brgya rtsa bcu ru bshad pa yin/ /
yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig go/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'bring la ni/ /thun mong du ni rnam lngar bshad/ /gang gis sdigs can 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /gsang ba'i bzlas pa rnal 'byor che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
rigs mchog la/ /bzlas pa 'di ni mchog yin no/ /bkra shis skyil dkrung bcas nas ni/ /sems kyis sangs rgyas la dmigs nas/ /blo dang ldan pa bdag nyid ni/ /rtag tu kun mkhyen sangs rgyas bsam/ /
gtsug gtor la sogs mtshan bzang dang / /ldan par bdag gis lus bsams te/ /sangs rgyas snying po nang 'dug cing / /nga nyid sangs rgyas zhes su bsam/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las byung ba'i/ /gang
gis 'khor lo rnam sprul pa/ /mngon par byang chub chen po yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya/ /gdul bya'i tshogs ni longs spyod pa'i/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'ang 'grub/ /gnas ni yongs su

gyur pa yis/ /sems ni kun gzhi las byung min/ /bsod nams ye shes rab rdzogs phyir/ /zla ba gang ba dri med pa/ /snying ga ru ni bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rig pa'i yi shes rnam par

bsgom/ /de lta bu yi tshul mchog gis/ /zla ba phyed na 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /lo gcig na ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji srid skyo bar mi 'gyur ba'i/ /de srid rnal 'byor chen pos

bzlas/ /lus ni ngal bar gyur pa na/ /phyag rgya bcing ba brtsam par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i/ /de tshe byang chub mchog bcing bya/ /yang na chos 'byung zhes pa 'am/ /shin du rmad byung dpal be'u 'o/ /

de nas rdo rje'i rigs bzlas pa/ /phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid/ /byang chub snying po la gnas bdag /bdag ni phyag na rdo rje bstan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /gsang
chen rdo rje'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /gsang chen rdo rje'i dbus su ni/ /rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /de nas pad ma'i rigs bzlas pa/ /pad ma sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /
zla ba'i dbus su pad ma che/ /pad ma'i dbus su yi ge rnams/ /de bzhin rin chen rigs bzlas pa'i/ /rin chen rgyal po rang bdag nyid/ /zla ba'i dbus su rin chen che/ /rin chen dbus su'ang yi ge

rnams/ /de na las kyi rigs bzang po/ /rnal 'byor don kun sgrub byed la/ /sangs rgyas snying po rang bdag nyid/ /rdo rje las su rnam par bsgom/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rin chen rdo rje rnam par

bsgom/ /rin chen rtse mo rdo rje che/ /de yi dbus su'ang yi ge rnams/ /rigs lnga yi ni bzlas pa 'di/ /gsang ba'i bzlas pa brjod par bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /bzlas rgyud gsang ba mchog 'dzin
pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid bkra shis 'dzin/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ /sangs rgyas dbus su rnam par bsgom/ /sangs rgyas de yi thugs dbus
su/ /rigs pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /rang gi lus ni bdag med cing / /chos dang gang zag stong pa nyid/ /sangs rgyas de dag gi gzugs ni/ /bdag med par ni rnam par bsam/ /lus ni sangs rgyas zhes brjod

pas/ /sangs rgyas de yang yod ma yin/ /phung po dang ni skye mched khams/ /chos zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas med/ /gang zag nyid kyis sangs rgyas med/ /sangs rgyas med pa yang ma yin/ /pha rol phyin drug sa
bon te/ /shes rab sa bon sbyong mdzad pa'i/ /gnas dang gnas min skal ldan pa/ /de nyid byang chub bdag med 'dzin/ /de lta bus ni gsang chen gyi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na/ /myur bar slob

dpon chen po yis/ /rab tu dga' ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje'i rigs bzlas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje de yi

lte dbus su/ /rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /dngos med ces bya rdo rje de/ /byang chub 'bras bu gang yin pa'o/ /gang zhig rdo rje zhes su bshad/ /gang zhig de nyid 'gyur med pa'i/ /lus kyi de nyid ces brjod la/ /
gang zhig chos dang chos nyid stong / /gzugs la sogs pa'i chos chen po/ /'byung ba che sgra 'dzin pa min/ /lus ni gzugs zhes bya bar brjod/ /gzugs zhes bya bar yod ma yin/ /gzugs de yang ni rnam phye

la/ /phra mo'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom/ /cha shas su ni rnam phye na/ /gzugs shes bya ba yod ma yin/ /cha shas de ming rnam phye na/ /cha shas zhes bya yod ma yin/ /gzugs ni stong pa zhes bshad do/ /'di de
rdo rje zhes byar bstan/ /gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad ni/ /stong pa nyid ni rnam par bsgom/ /de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rab tu dga' ba bsgrub par bya/ /de nas rin chen rigs bzlas pa/ /
rdo rje rin chen rigs bdag nyid/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ /stong nyid nam mkhar rnam par bsgom/ /de ni nam mkhar rnal 'byor chos/ /rtog pa dang bcas yi ge bsam/ /chos kun dngos med
ces bya ba/ /stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces brjod/ /dngos med ces bya'i gzugs med de/ /mkha' mtshungs sangs rgyas spyod yul lo/ /gang la gzugs ni yod min pa'i/ /mig ces bya ba ci yin brjod/ /
mig de yang ni gang zhig gi/ mig ces bya ba yin par brjod/ /bdag po rgyal po 'di gang zhig /'di yi skye ba'ang ji lta bu'i/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi 'dus las/ /mig gi dbang po yang dag byung / /mig de
la yang gzugs med la/ /ci zhig byed de yod pa'ang min/ /mig ni ji lta ba bzhin du/ /thams cad gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs/ /bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /chos chen po yi dbang bskur
'gyur/ /de nas pad ma'i rigs bzlas pa/ /pad ma'i sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ /pad ma'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /pad ma shin tu dag
de la/ /rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /shes rab chen pos pad ma de/ /chos kyi snying por bsam par bya/ /pad ma chu yis ma gos shing / /'dam gyi nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ /sems can thams
cad de bzhin dag /chos ni gzod nas ma skyes pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs nyid 'di gang zhig /chos dang chos nyid stong gang yin/ /gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /chos nyid de bzhin nyid
du 'dod/ /de nas las kyi rigs bzlas pa'i/ /las kyi rnal 'byor rnam par bsam/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'khor lo 'di/ /chos dang longs spyod thob byed yin/ /gang la chos shes bya ba med/ /

sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul snang / /e ma'o sangs rgyas de dag snang / /rang gi las kyang sgrub par mdzad/ /de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /tshe 'di nyid la dam pa yin/ /
sangs rgyas nyid ni mchog thob 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i snying sogs phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje'i rigs la bdag por bshad/ /rin chen la sogs dbang bskur zhing / /dag pa'i mchog ni pad mchog 'dzin/ /

sangs rgyas sku ni chos chen la/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor nges bstan bya/ /byang chub mchog ni kun 'dul ba/ /'di ni bzlas pa dam par 'dod/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin/ /phreng ba nges par bsten par bya/ /gang du

bzlas pa bye ba byed/ /rnam gnyis rnam gsum nyung ba'ang rung / /phreng ba sangs rgyas la 'dzum bcas/ /gung mos rdo rje'i rnal 'byor skyes/ /srin lag steng du rin chen skyes/ /mthe'u chung gis ni pad kha phye/ /

las kyi phreng bas las byed pa/ /sor mo kun gyis bya bar bshad/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yi/ /'di ni gsang ba'i bzlas pa che/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor bo de tse/ /rdo rje can la ru rak+Sha/ /phyi rol rdor rig dbang po ste/ /

mu tig nor bu'i rnal 'byor can/ /pad ma'i snying po'i phreng ba ni/ /pad ma'i rigs rnams kun la bsngags/ /yang na kun las mchog gyur pa/ /bo de rtse de srog 'dzin pa/ /lcags kyi bzlas pa nyis 'gyur te/ /zangs kyi

yang ni bzhir 'gyur ro/ /ru rak+Sha yi bye ba gnyis/ /mu tig gi ni brgyar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po'i stong 'gyur rnal 'byor te/ /dngul gyi 'bum du 'gyur ba yin/ /pad ma'i bye ba brgya 'gyur brjod/ /bo de rtse yi grangs med do/ /lag pa

g.yon pas phyag rgya bcing / /g.yas pa phreng ba dang ldan bya/ /ji ltar sngar bshad gsang ba stsogs/ /rmad byung chen po'i bzlas pa bya/ /ci yi phyir na bzlas pa brjod/ /dge ba la brtson rgyal 'gyur zhing / /rmad byung rnams

kyang mthong 'gyur la/ /byang chub spyod pa rgyal 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas rol pa mngon par 'gyur/ /bzlas pas skyo na langs nas ni/ /phyag rgya dag ni bcing bar bya/ /sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /phyogs
kun du ni bdud pa bshad/ /byang chub sems tshul thob byed pa'i/ /mdo sogs gsang ba bklag par bya/ /bsod nams tshogs ni bskyed pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa yang dag bya/ /de nas zas kyi
dus su ni/ /rnam pa kun du chang bu sbyin/ /sangs rgyas rig pas mngon bsrungs la/ /bza' ba dag pa dbul bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid bza' ba dbul/ /legs par bgos nas bza' ba

dbul/ /snga dro sdom pa blang bya ste/ /de nyid nyin phyed dang mtshams su/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje nor bu dang / /pad ma byed pa'i rnal 'byor gang / /rnam pa bzhi po de las sbyor/ /
sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs byang chub/ /nyin dang mtshan la rnam pa drug /rdo rje dril bu tshogs slob dpon/ /rdo rje can rnams de bzhin drug /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang ni/ /byams pa nyin zhag
kun la yang / /chos gsum tshangs pa bzhi zhes pa/ /rnam pa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /'di yi chos chen gsum po la/ /rtag tu snyoms par 'jug par bya/ /gsang mchog dkyil 'khor mchog dang ni/ /
de bzhin las kun byed pa'o/ /gang du sdig par mi 'gyur ba'i/ /thams cad bza' zhing thams cad len/ /lus nas lhag mar gyur pa spang / /de bzhin dri ma thams cad spang / /nyin re zhing ni lan gsum du/ /

khrus gsum bya zhing gsang blang ba/ /gos kyang lan gsum brje bar bya/ /gtsang gos lan gsum yang na sbyin/ /sha dang chang dang gtsong la sogs/ /dri ngan kha yi sgregs pa dang / /'khrig pa 'dod dang bstan

pa dang / /sems can 'tshe la dga' mi bya/ /brtson zhing las mkhan spyod par ldan/ /sgrin zhing dul la dga' dang gtsang / /bya ba byed cing bla ma 'khur/ /dge legs rgyan ni 'chang bar byed/ /kun rdzob don dam

rnam pa gnyis/ /bslab pa'i sdom pa blang bar bya/ /chung ngu bza' zhing bsnyen par bya/ /kha ni nang du lta yid ches/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rigs sngags dang / /gzungs dang lha dang bla ma dang / /rdo rje la sogs
mtshon cha bzang / /lha yi gnas dang yang dag ldan/ /'jigs min g.yo dang sgyu can min/ /mi brtan pa yi blo can min/ /mya ngan 'das la dga' ba min/ /sems ni dbang pos phrogs pa min/ /blo ldan
'jig rten 'dir mi dga'/ /de bzhin pha rol dga' ba min/ /lus srog btang snyoms mi bya zhing / /bslab pa las ni 'da' mi bya/ /skrag ldan nga rgyal ldan pa min/ /'jig rten bya ba 'dod mi bya/ /

de lta'i ngo mtshar tshul la ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya/ /smra ba spang zhing brjod chen ldan/ /rnyad pa spang zhing legs rnyed ldan/ /dpa' zhing brtan la bla mar gus/ /sdig pas 'jigs shing kun du bsdams/ /

ci nus ji ltar spro bar bya/ /zla ba'am yang na lo re 'am/ /nyin zhag gcig la lan gnyis su/ /de bzhin bla ma blta bar bya/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /de lta bu yi tshul gnas shing / /phyag rgya rnam pa brgyad

bcings nas/ /rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /brtul zhugs tshang par rdzogs gyur nas/ /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje 'chang ba slob dpon la/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'gyur/ /

rig pa kun bdag rgyal po ste/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi de nyid rig /rnal 'byor cho ga de nyid shes/ /de bzhin lha yi rigs rnams mthong / /sdom pa blangs shing rnam par mkhas/ /rig pa'i slob dpon dbang bskur 'gyur/ /

lam rnams chen po byed rgyal po/ /rig pa ldan zhing de nyid shes/ /phan pa dang ni gnod par shes/ /lha la sogs pa kun dbang byed/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po lha dbang sogs/ /rig pa'i rgyal po mngag bzhug pa/ /'di ni

chos kyi gru la gnas/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa legs mchod byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rgyal po/ /mdzod 'dzin rtag tu gsang ba 'dzin/ /'khor lo grong khyer chen por gnas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin

pa'i/ /dam chos bcud kyi snying po skyes/ /snying po 'dzin cing dkyil 'khor mchod/ /dgongs pa de nyid tshul shes 'di/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul don shes/ /mchod sbyin lhag pa'i mchod dam pa'i/ /gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor

bya/ /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyi/ /gang zhig gi ni thog ma ru/ /bgegs kun nges par 'joms pa yi/ /gsang sngags drag po brjod par bya/ /bkra shis sdig pa 'joms byed pa'i/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga yang / /
nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar/ /drag po'i bzod dka' ye shes 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor mchod pa bya ba ni/ /yo byad yongs su brtag par bya/ /yang na phyi nas byed pa yis/ /ci rigs par ni brtag par bya/ /

dpag tshad las lhag mi bya zhing / /khru drug las ni chung ba min/ /sgrub pa bcu gnyis zhes bya ste/ /gzhan yang byed pa bcu gnyis so/ /gal te de ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /dpag tshad kyi ni khyon tsam bya/ /yang na kun

nas bzang po ste/ /ngos bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/ /yang na sgrub pa blon po yin/ /khru stong yod pa mchog yin no/ /yang na kun nas bzang ba yi/ /khru drug pa las chung mi bya/ /yang na tshong dpon 'gag zhig gam/ /

yang na ded dpon yin yang rung / /ngos bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/ /lnga pa las ni chung mi bya/ /yang na gang zhig gzhan dag gam/ /sgrub pa po dag yin yang rung / /bcu pa las ni chung mi bya/ /zur bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/ /rgya cher yang

ni mi bya'o/ /yang na sgrub byed slob dpon yin/ /drug pa las ni chung mi bya/ /yang na dpag tshad dang ldan pa'o/ /yang na yo byad ldan par bya/ /gal te sgrub byed de rgyal po/ /rin chen phye ma rab tu bya/ /rin chen btags las legs bya zhing / /

shin du khyad 'phags yid tu 'ong / /in dra nI la sngon po che/ /tshon rtsi sngon po rab tu bya/ /pad ma rA ga rA ga che/ /tshon rtsi dmar po yang dag ldan/ /tshon rtsi ser po mdog bzang po/ /dri ma med pa'i 'od zer ldan/ /tshon rtsi dkar po

ldan pa yi/ /dkar po dag ni shel las bya/ /bai DUr+ya dang btsod mdog ste/ /tshon rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad/ /gal te de ni ma 'byor na/ /rin po che dang bsres pas bya/ /tshongs dpon yang na ded dpon rung / /tshon rtsi dag la rab tu bya/ /yang na

gzhan ni 'ga' zhig yin/ /tshon rtsi gzhan ni dam par sbyar/ /thal ba yis kyang dus ci bzhin/ /'dir ni slob dpon dag gis bya/ /rin chen phye mar yang dag ldan/ /yang na yo byad dang ldan pa/ /gal te sgrub byed de rgyal po/ /

sna tshogs bye ba'i tshad du bya/ /yang na 'bum dang yang dag ldan/ /stong las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /spos dang mar me'i mchod bstod dang / /dri yi bum pa nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin bum gang gtor ma dang / /bum pa rnams dang mar me dag /

tshong dpon yang na ded dpon rung / /bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /gzhan 'ga' zhig ni 'ongs kyang rung / /bca' ba dag ni stong phrag bcu/ /bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /bza' ba dag ni brgya 'am stong / /bcu las nyung bar mi

bya'o/ /g.yos kyi rnam pa kun dang ni/ /de bzhin dri rnams thams cad kun/ /rol mo sgeg dang rtsed mo dang / /de bzhin phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /de tshe mchod pa byed nas ni/ /ci nas sang ni

khyed cag rnams/ /grub par bya phyir brtul zhugs brtsom/ /rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/ /dag cing gtsang ma'i gos gyon cing / /rnam par dben pa'i gnas 'dug ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/ /
me tog spos snod lag thogs shing / /phyogs rnams kun du phyag bya'o/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs shing / /gsang ba'i spyan ni 'gugs pa yi/ /rdo rje'i

phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/ /de nas gnas ni yang dag bsgrub/ /dben zhing kun du g.yeng ba med/ /ri bo yang ni dgon pa'am/ /de bzhin phug gi nang dag

gam/ /shing drung gi ni gnas dag gam/ /chu bo'i 'gram mam yang na ngogs/ /dngos grub gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /lha rnams myur du gshegs par 'gyur/ /rdo dang gseg ma rus par ldan/ /thal ba ljan ljin mi gtsang

bcas/ /rtsub cing rtsa ba khyab la sogs/ /de 'brir sa gzhi rnam par spang / /shin tu bzang zhing 'od bzang snum/ /tshad dang ldan zhing gseg ma med/ /'dom gang yang na khru gang tsam/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyang bar bya/ /grong dang yul

'khor nyid dag dang / /grong khyer dag dang ljongs dang ni/ /rgyal po'i pho brang tshong dus su/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bya ba min/ /de 'dra'i sa gzhi bsgrubs nas ni/ /steng gi char ni bsgrub par bya/ /'dom gang yang na khru

gang tsam/ /skas gdang bzhi dang ldan pa ru/ /sbyangs te de nas gnas kyi ni/ /dbus su phur bu gzugs par bya/ /rdo rje phur bu'i sngags dang ni/ /rdo rje phur bu'i phyag rgya yis/ /mchod pa'i sa gzhi mdzes par bya/ /

rig pa 'dzin pa byed pas bcag /bges bcing ba yi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams kun du bcing bar bya/ /me dang gshin rje chu dang ni/ /rlung dang dbang po rdo rje phyogs/ /rdo rje bzod dka'i phyag rgya dang / /rdo rje'i sngags kyi

sbyang bar bya/ /mchod gnas dpag tshad tshad tsam du/ /bcwa lnga nas ni yang dag brtsam/ /gnyis pa'am ni gsum pa yi/ /nya la nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /ci ste 'byor pa med na ni/ /zla ba gcig tsam rab tu sbyar/ /bcwa lnga

nas ni yang dag brtsam/ /bcwa lnga la ni rdzogs par bya/ /ci ste zla ba phyed tsam du/ /bcwa lnga la ni rnam par sbyang / /ci ste rings na tshes brgyad nas/ /bcwa lnga la ni rdzogs par bya/ /tshes dgu dang ni bcu dang ni/ /bcu

gsum pa dang bcu bzhi pa/ /bdun pa lnga pa nyid dang ni/ /nya la nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /ci ste nyin zhag de brtsams nas/ /de nyid la ni yongs rdzogs bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor sa gzhi

rab tu bsgrub/ /rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gos bgo zhing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras/ /rdo rje slob dpon rnam par brgyan/ /gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan/ /
gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu/ /sems can kun don yang dag ldan/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag gzung / /bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang / /ci nas mngon par brtson byas kyang / /gang zag bzhi po

'jig rten du/ /sgrubs kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /sems ni bskyed par ma gyur dang / /dad med 'grub par mi 'gyur nyid/ /the tshom 'dzin pa nyid dag dang / /bka' bsgo ba ni mi byed pa'o/ /dri yi chu yis legs
bskus pa'i/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gnas de ni/ /dri dang ldan pa'i chu dag gis/ /phyogs rnams kun du chag chag btab/ /ba yi lci bas legs sbyangs te/ /dri dang bcas pas legs byugs te/ /de nas gur gum
la sogs pa'i/ /dri dag gtsang mar sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yis/ /pad ma'i mig can dag gis blta/ /dkyil
'khor bar dang tha ma ru/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /sbyin sreg las ni rnam pa lnga/ /sbyin sreg las ni rnam par sbyar/ /rig pa'i dngos grub cho ga la/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /
de bzhin sngags dang phyag rgya tshogs/ /de 'dra'i sngags dang phyag rgya'ang min/ /sngon la bgegs rnams gzhom par bya/ /de nas sbyin sreg yang dag brtsam/ /de 'og gsang ba'i mchod chen gyi/ /
dkyil 'khor kun du bri bar bya/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /yang na bcu drug dag tu 'gyur/ /rang rang gi ni cho ga bzhin/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /dgongs pa'i gang zhig bsgrub
pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig mchod pa yang dag brtsams/ /gal te mi nus skal chen gyis/ /bza' ba dag ni rab tu bya/ /dri dang bcas pa dang sbyar ba'i/ /yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya/ /'di
ltar rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams nges 'joms nga yi ni/ /slob dpon gyi ni las bzang po/ /bgegs rnams zlog par byed pa'i mchog /

bcing ba dam pa bshad par bya/ /rtag tu rdo rje khro bo dang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag bya zhing / /rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya/ /rdo rje

las kyi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad kun du dgug /sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig /sems can rnam par 'tshe ba'ang med/ /rang gi rnam rtog las byung bgegs/ /ma rig las byung mi dge bzhin/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis/ /

bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje ra ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzir bar bya/ /rdo rje lug rgyud phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bkri bar bya/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad kun du dbab/ /
rdo rje brdab pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad brdab par bya/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad sbar bar bya/ /rdo rje ral gri phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams

cad gcad par bya/ /rdo rje cod pan phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar bya/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/ /rdo rje 'khrul 'khor phyag rgya yis/ /

bgegs rnams thams cad btsir bar bya/ /rdo rje kha T+wA~M phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya/ /rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/ /rdo rje sreg byed phyag rgya
yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg par bya/ /rdo rje 'khor byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje srad bu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bskyod par
bya/ /rdo rje bzlog byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad rnam par brlag /rdo rje 'joms byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom par bya/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis/ /
bgegs rnams thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /rdo rje za byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje 'cha' byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bca' bar bya/ /rdo rje

dral ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dral bar bya/ /rdo rje sgyel byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya/ /rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad slang bar
bya/ /rdo rje gsod pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gsad par bya/ /rdo rje 'tsho byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'tsho bar bya/ /rdo rje sgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs
rnams thams cad yang dag bsgrub/ /rdo rje rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yis/ /gdug pa thams cad rgyas gdab bya/ /rdo rje rlung gi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad rlung la bskur/ /rdo rje chu
yi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad chu la g.yeng / /rdo rje me ni rab rno bas/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg par bya/ /rdo rje brgyal byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams
thams cad brgyal bar byed/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje bsdus ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje
mche ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad sos gdab bya/ /rdo rje 'bigs pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis/ /
bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/ /rdo rje bka' bzhin byed pa yis/ /bkug nas bka' la dgod par bya/ /rdo rje sdigs 'dzub phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad
bsdigs par bya/ /rdo rje 'gas byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgas par bya/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs kyi rigs kun gzhom par bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin
bzod dka' dang / /rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba dang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya/ /bgegs 'joms pa yi phyag rgya yis/ /de nas steng gi bgegs gzhom bya/ /

mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i mchog /rdo rje chen po'i gsang rgyud las/ /rdo rje khro bo'i snyoms 'jug bya/ /brgya dang rtsa bcu lhag pa dang / /rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni/ /rgyas pa ru ni yongs su bstan/ /
bgegs la sogs pa gdug pa kun/ /chad pa gcad phyir btus pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /sbyin sreg la ni yang dag brtsam/ /rnam pa brgyad dang rtsa bcu lhag /rdo rje

slob dpon gsang ba ni/ /'di ni gsang ba'i rgyud chen po/ /rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad/ /gsang ba'i sbyin sreg cho gar bcas/ /gzhan yang dang po rab bshad bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po gsang ba'i las/ /sbyin sreg las ni rgyun mi gcad/ /las rnams thams cad btus

pa yis/ /gsang ba rgyud chen 'di ru ni/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa nyi shu yis/ /thams cad bsdus par 'gyur ba yin/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /mngon spyod kyi ni las dang ni/ /tshe spel ba dang dgug pa dang / /nor dang 'bru ni 'phel ba dang / /bsrung dang bsrung ba min

dang bgegs/ /sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom dang / /bcing dang gsad dang drag po dang / /chags dang rjes su bcom pa dang / /dbang du bya dang gzugs bzang nyid/ /'dod dga' gzugs su snang ba dang / /mkha' la 'gro dang dngos grub kyi/ /rdzas ni grub par bya ba la/ /
sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor byed pa yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya/ /de lta bu yi rnam pa yi/ /sbyin sreg bzang po nyi shur bshad/ /ji ltar sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin/ /sngon du thab khung bya ba yin/ /
gru bzhi la ni rgyas pa ste/ /zlum po la ni zhi ba'o/ /gang zhig 'gugs par byed pa yi/ /rdo rje'i rnam par yang dag bya/ /de bzhin pad ma'i rnam pa gzhan/ /mngon spyod la ni gru gsum ste/ /sdig pa
thams cad rab gzhom phyir/ /zlum po rta babs ldan pa yin/ /rin chen rnam pa rigs rgyas la/ /tshe 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang / /shin du dag phyir phyag rgya'i dbyibs/ /bsrung la go cha lta bu yin/ /
bcing ba la ni 'obs kyis bskor/ /gsad la mche ba dang ldan pa'i/ /ci 'dod gzugs la gang yang rung / /mi snang ba la gzhu dang ldan/ /phyogs dang mkha' 'phur la lcags kyu/ /bka' byed
phyag rgya bsgrub pa dang / /dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa la/ /'khor lo 'am ni gru bzhi'o/ /rdzas dang sman ni 'grub pa la/ /thab khung bud med yan lag mtshungs/ /yang na thun mong dngos grub kyi/ /
dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ji lta ba/ /sbyin sreg thab khung de mtshungs 'gyur/ /rig 'dzin dngos grub bzang ldan zhing / /thams cad phun tshogs de ltar 'gyur/ /
'khor lo sogs la cung zad mthar/ /sbyin sreg thab khung brko bar bya/ /thab khung nyi shu'o/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga thams cad la/ /thab khung gang zhig mthong tsam gyis/ /sdig pa kun las

grol bar 'gyur/ /thab khung bstan pa bshad par bya/ /sngon du thig ni gdab bya zhing / /tshon gyis sa phyogs legs par bri/ /gru bzhir thig brgyad ces bya ba/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo dbyung bar bya/ /gru bzhi'i
cha ni mnyam pa ste/ /legs par bgos shing legs bris pa/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sgo khyud rnams kyis legs par spras/ /sgo bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/ /sgo ni cha brgyad ldan par bya/ /

dra ba zla ba phyed pas spras/ /rdo rje sgo khyud rdo rjer ldan/ /pad ma'i nags kyi lcug ma dang / /phreng ba rab tu 'khor ba dang / /spyi blugs phyag rgya chen po ni/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi cha ru bri/ /rtse gsum zla ba phyed

pa dang / /ral gri khyu mchog mdzes rgyal mtshan/ /'dod ces bde ba phyag rgya che/ /lho yi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /'khor lo dung dang dbyug to dang / /rta babs glang po dang ni phag /phyag rgya nub du bri bar bya/ /mdung thung

dril bu ba dan dang / /rma bya de bzhin ra skyes dang / /khyim bya 'thab mo la phyogs pa/ /byang gi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /de yi dam tshig 'khor lo la/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya yang dag bri/ /dbus kyi gnas su cod pan te/ /phyi rol
