rdo rjes nye bar spras/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar ba yi/ /rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru/ /lho ru nor bu sna tshogs pa/ /nub tu pad ma rdo rje'o/ /byang du rdo rje hU~M mdzad de/ /gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas

rdo rje thabs chen rnams/ /phyi rol phyag rgya bcu drug tu/ /thab khung brkos pa gang yin pa/ /de yi bla re rnam par bsgom/ /me tog shing dang spos sogs kyis/ /ji bzhin du ni dkyil 'khor mchod/ /rang nyid khrus byas yan

lag byugs/ /sna tshogs gos dang rgyan ldan pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras/ /dri dag bzang pos dbang bskur 'gyur/ /nga ni pad 'dzin rgyal po ste/ /thor tshugs dbus na de bzhin gshegs/ /yang na rdo rje

sems dpa' 'am/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ldan/ /bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/ /dpung pa dam du bsdams byas te/ /mtshan ma 'greng bar rab gyur nas/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /e ma'o bde ba

bde chen po/ /'dod chags bde ba bla na med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod chags che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bdag grub mdzod/ /'dod chags bde ba rjes dran nas/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags rtag mi bya/ /bud med khams ni

bkug nas su/ /'khrig pa bdun ni spang bar bya/ /mtshan ma langs par rab gyur nas/ /dbang po nye bar zhi byas te/ /'dod chags rjes dran gyur nas ni/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes brjod de/ /

lang pa lhag par bya ba yin/ /rdo rje can gyi phyag mtshan las/ /mkhas pas lhag par bcang bar bya/ /rdo rje can dang byang sems kyi/ /byang chub sems ni brtan pa dang / /pha rol phyin pa drug gi mtshan/ /brtse bas rjes chags dngos grub

ster/ /shes rab thabs la dga' ba bstan/ /rtag tu bsten par bya ba yin/ /mtshan ma langs par rab gyur nas/ /lhag par yang ni bsten par bya/ /mngon 'dod rig ma sdug gang yin/ /de la rnal 'byor pas bya'o/ /lhag pas

phyag rgya che gyur nas/ /dpung pa dam du bsdam par bya/ /rab tu dga' ba mang po gang / /de ni rab dga'i sa ru 'dod/ /gang la chags pa rab brtags pa/ /yang dang yang du bran par bya/ /brtse dang byams pas yang dag byugs/ /

khrel yod pa yi gos kyis dgab/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag byugs/ /byang chub kyi ni sems kyis brgyan/ /de 'dra'i brtul zhugs ldan pa yi/ /tshon rtsi chen po bsten par bya/ /gzhan yang phyi yi yan lag dag /gang

phyir rdo rje can gyis 'dzin/ /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga bzhin/ /shar du kha bltas sbyin sreg bya/ /ci skad gzhung las gsungs pa bzhin/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya/ /zhi la sangs rgyas byang chub mchog /rgyas la rdo rje rin

chen gyis/ /rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la/ /lcags kyu yi ni 'gugs par bshad/ /bcud kyis len la rdo rje'i sman/ /tshe 'phel de bzhin mi g.yo ba'i/ /rdo rje sman gyi rgya chen dang / /rdo rje'i rtse mo nor 'phel la/ /bsrung

la 'khor lo cho ga ste/ /bzlog pa la ni rdo rje gzung / /g.yon pa lcags sgrogs phyag rgya ches/ /sdig pa gzhom par bya bar bshad/ /bcing la rdo rje bcing ba ste/ /gsod la rdo rje gsod byed do/ /chags la rdo rje

chags pa yis/ /rjes su bstan pa la yang bshad/ /dbang la rdo rje dbang gis so/ /ci 'dod gzugs la sna tshogs te/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la/ /rdo rje'i dngos grub rnam 'phrul gyis/ /pad ma'i sman

gyi phyag rgya ches/ /rdzas su grub pa'i bde mchog yin/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i grub pa la/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgya yis/ /rig pa kun bdag rgyal po yi/ /phyag rgya'i mchog de yongs su gzung / /dngos grub thams cad

sgrub pa la/ /pad ma chen po'i sman mchog gis/ /lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya bcing / /g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje sna tshogs phyag rgya yis/ /sbyin sreg las la rgyas gdab bya/ /g.yon pa hU~M ldan sdigs mdzub

ste/ /g.yas pa mche ba gtsigs pa ste/ /mngon spyod kyi ni phyag rgya yis/ /rus pa'i phye mas phyogs rnams bcing / /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hU~M/ grih+Na grih+Na hU~M/ grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga ban bid+yA rA dza hU~M phaT/
g.yon pa chos 'chad dang ldan zhing / /g.yas pa yi ni sbyin sreg bya/ /sangs rgyas chos ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /til bsregs pas ni sdig pa bsregs/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ lag pa g.yon
pa rin chen gyur/ /g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /'bru bdun yang na rin chen nas/ /yo byad kun gyis mnyes par bya/ /oM ma Ni rata na kra ma ka ya swA hA/ shin du mnyam par bzhag pas ni/ /mngar bas

me ni rab sbar te/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'bras sregs na/ /khyim ni nges par rgyas par 'gyur/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ shin du mngar ba'i bud shing gis/ /me ni rab tu sbar byas te/ /ku sha'i myu gu til bcas

pas/ /sbyin sreg byas na bsrung don mchog /oM badzra a pra ti ha ta badzrA ya swA hA/ yam shing mngar po nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin dur ba'i myu gu dag /mar smyugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis/ /sregs na tshe 'phel

byed pa'i mchog /oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ bud shing tsha ba rnams kyi ni/ /rdo rje khro bdag ting 'dzin gyis/ /thab khung du ni me sbar te/ /tsher ma rnams kyis dgug par bya/ /oM badzra A kar Sha ya swA hA/ de bzhin

sna tshogs thams cad kyis/ /mkhas pa yis ni me sbar te/ /rtag tu chu skyes sbyin sreg byas/ /rdo rje 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin/ /oM badzra ban d+ha ya ba~M/ de bzhin sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/ /mkhas pas yam shing

bsreg bya zhing / /'bras bu kha ba'i sbyin sreg byas/ /skad cig gis ni gsod par 'gyur/ /oM badzra mA ra na ye hU~M/ de bzhin p+lak+Sha dmar po/ /bsregs na dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /oM badzra rA ga na ye hrIH/
sha pus pas ni sbyin sreg byas/ /de bzhin chags par byed pa'i mchog /oM badzra sha~M ka rA ya swA hA/ khros pas 'dod pa'i 'bras sregs na/ /ci 'dod gzugs ni thob par 'gyur/ /oM badzra kA ma rU pa

Ni swA hA/ oM badzra kha ra tsi re Ni swA hA/ bud shing ro ni kha ba yis/ /shin du khros pas me sbar te/ /khros pas rdo rje me tog sregs/ /rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /hU~M badzra shang ka rA ya swA hA/ oM b+hu
ta ba sha~M ka rA ya swA hA/ dngos grub kun gyi cho ga bzhin/ /mkhas pas yungs kar sbyin sreg bya/ /yungs kar shin du bkra shis pas/ /dngos grub sbyin sreg mchog yin no/ /oM sarba sid d+hi ye swA hA/

rig pa 'dzin pa grub bya'i phyir/ /mkhas pas swa sti ka bsreg bya/ /grub pa'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /sbyin sreg rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du/ /oM sid d+ha sid d+ha ye swA hA/ oM da la a ti pa ta ye swA hA/

maN Da la a ti pa ta ye swA hA/ oM b+hUHswA hA/ oM b+hu ba swA hA/ oM swa swA hA/ oM b+h+'ur b+hu ba swaHswa hA/ oM swa sti swA hA/ oM swa sti na maHswA hA/ oM sid d+he pra b+ha ta ye swA hA/ oM sarba du kha u pa sha ma ne swA hA/

oM badzra sid d+ha ye swA hA/ oM kAr+ya kA ra Ni puSh+Ta shan ti ke swA hA/ yi ge phaT ni mngon spyod la/ /yi ge dzaHyis 'gugs par 'gyur/ /yi ge ba~M ni bcing la sbyar/ /dbang du bya la yi ge shrI/ /yi ge

hU~M ni bsdigs la sbyar/ /gsad pa la yang yi ge hU~M/ /ha ni bsrung ba bzang po la/ /yi ge hU~M ni bzlog pa la/ /shrIs ni sna tshogs gzugs bsgrub bya/ /oM ni mi snang bstan pa la/ /ho ni chags dang dgug pa la/ /

u ni gsang ba'i dag pa 'dzin/ /mngon spyod ldan la yi ge hU~M/ /hU~M ni rdzu 'phrul sgrub byed pa/ /lha mo chen po sgrub la A/ /oM ni kun la nges par sbyar/ /yam shing ser po rgyas pa la/ /zhi ba la ni dkar po'o/ /

dbang du bya ba dmar po ste/ /nag po mngon spyod las la'o/ /zhi la mar gyis byugs pa ste/ /rgyas pa la ni 'o ma bcas/ /dbang du bya la lan tshwar ldan/ /tsha ba dang bcas mngon spyod la/ /dbye ba rgya chen dag gis ni/ /sbyin sreg

las rnams shes par bya/ /de nyid sbyin sreg nyi shu 'di/ /rdo rje 'chang gis gsang ba yin/ /de kho na nyi shu pa zhes bya ba sbyin sreg gi gsang ba'o// // de nas dngos grub thabs chen po/ /thams cad 'grub 'dod dkyil 'khor

du/ /grub pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/ /dngos grub tshogs kyi sbyor ldan zhing / /rdo rje yi ni slob dpon che/ /brtan bcas rigs su yang dag skyes/ /theg pa chen por yang dag gnas/ /bskal pa grangs med mthar thug par/ /

chos kyi shing rta che la zhon/ /shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan/ /sems can kun gyi don la brtson/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs su bzung / /slob dpon chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /mchog tu sa yi mthar phyin pa/ /sangs

rgyas kun gyi rigs su skyes/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su yang dag ldan/ /sbyin sreg cho ga byas nas kyang / /chos sbyin chen po yang dag brtsam/ /

dam chos snying po bcud las byung / /sangs rgyas mchod pa bla med pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul/ /shes rab thabs kyi tshul thob byed/ /rgyal chen shes rab chen po dang / /thabs kyis rmad byung chos nyid do/ /bram ze

bzhin du rigs mchog skyes/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gsang chen 'dzin/ /gal te nus na skal chen gyis/ /gang tshe mchod pa rtsom pa nas/ /ji srid zin par gyur gyi bar/ /bza' ba dag ni mi bya'o/ /dri dang bcas par legs sbyar ba'i/ /

yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya/ /gang phyir rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /ci ste bzod ldan nyin mtshan du/ /bza' ba dag ni mi bya ste/ /gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas/ /tshim par 'gyur bar the

tshom med/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni dag byas shing / /dri rnams kun gyis mngon 'dus byas/ /sngags kyis bsangs pa'i chu yis ni/ /thams cad kun nas chag chag gdab/ /gang tshe mchod par byed pa na/ /phyogs rnams kun gyi phyag

bya zhing / /bshags dang gsol ba gdab nyid dang / /mchod pa'i sprin dang rjes yid rang / /bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i/ /las rnams rim bzhin byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mnyam dbus su/ /sems dpa'i dkyil

dkrung bca' bar bya dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa yi/ /skyil dkrung rnam pa bcu ru bshad/ /gsang chen de nyid mchog 'di ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa'o/ /dpal dang bkra shis sdigs mdzub byed/ /de bzhin g.yas kyi phyed

dkrung nyid/ /phyi rol brkyang dang bzhugs pa'o/ /de bzhin rin chen rang bzhin te/ /de dag bcu ru rang bzhin bshad/ /dkyil dkrung brgya dang bcu lhag pa/ /gsang ba'i rgyud kyi gsang ba yi/ /rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad/ /sems dpa'i

dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ /sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum/ /byams pa chen po rjes dran nas/ /dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin mchog /rnal 'byor pas ni snyoms 'jug bya/ /de nas dkyil
'khor rgyal po mchog /de nas yang ni las rgyal po/ /ting 'dzin lhag pa'i bzang po nas/ /bcu phrag gcig lhag brgya ru bshad/ /las thams cad pa gsum du brjod/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu

bshad/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba med par ni/ /dkyil 'khor brtan par mi 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor ba med par ni/ /dngos grub nyid ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de bas rtag tu 'bad pas ni/ /ting 'dzin dngos grub dkyil 'khor bya/ /

gal te mchog tu gsang ba ni/ /bla med theg pa'i gsang 'dod na/ /ting 'dzin gsum gyi spyod yul ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /de nas byang sems rnam 'phrul du/ /so so'i skye bos mi nus so/ /de rnams kyi ni

ting 'dzin mchog /sems nyid kyis ni yang dag bya/ /dang po'i rgyud las bshad pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bshad/ /blo ldan byang sems ting 'dzin gyis/ /bdag nyid rdzu 'phrul chen po bsam/ /dka'
thub sna tshogs drag po ni/ /bdag gis byas par bsam par bya/ /'og min zhes bya gnas yin pa/ /lha yi gnas ni bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi/ /dag pa'i 'dus pa rnam par bsam/ /

dang por sangs rgyas phyag byas nas/ /de nas thub rnams la de bzhin/ /bka' mnos ji skad bstan pa yi/ /slar yang dkyil dkrung bca' bar bya/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /kun du dga' byed bsam par bya/ /

mtshan nyid thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku dang ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba/ /lnga ni bdag nyid la bsam bya/ /rdo rje'i gnas su 'dug bya zhing / /rtse mo mthon por bsam par bya/ /

dang por sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / rdo rje shar du 'dug bya zhing / /sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang spro/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul/ /rgyal po dang
bcas rigs dkyil 'khor/ /sgo srung sgeg mo la sogs dang / /lha mo dang bcas phyag rgya yi/ /sbyor bas rdo rje can dbang bskur/ /rdo rje'i las su yang dag bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyi ni mkha' dbyings su/ /
sangs rgyas thams cad mos byas te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/ /dbang bskur bar ni yang dag bya/ /rdo rje chos 'dzin rgyal po ru/ /dkyil 'khor bkod la brtag par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad

dgug bya zhing / /rdo rje can rnams mchog zhugs bya/ /bsgrub pa dang ni dbang du bya/ /bya ba 'di ni mchog yin no/ /rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /gnas de lhag par mos par bya/ /'khor lo ji bzhin bkod

ji bzhin/ /phyag rgya ji bzhin dbang byas pa'o/ /las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// // rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/ /rgyan dang gos ni sna tshogs ldan/ /dpung rgyan gdu bu nyid dang ni/ /
de bzhin sor gdub dbu rgyan bcas/ /gser skud mu tig dang ldan pa'i/ /lag pa rkang pa de nas ske/ /lus kun rnam par brgyan 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin ko sha'i ris lhag pa'i/ /gos dag bzang po bgos zhing

bsang / /yang na chos gos 'dzin pa ste/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya rgyal mtshan bzhin/ /gal te skra bregs dge slong ste/ /ring zhing 'khyil la mdog sngo ba'i/ /skra ni sngon po bcing bar bya/ /yang na rang gi mgo la skyes/ /

bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /yang na rdo rje las su bya/ /rnal 'byor rang bzhin gsang med par/ /dngos grub bzang po thob mi 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su mnyam pa ru/ /ci rigs par ni 'dug nas su/ /

shar du kha bltas langs nas ni/ /khengs pa med cing ma 'khrul bar/ /rdo rje sems dpar yongs su bskor/ /mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya/ /bstod pa byas nas rang bdag nyid/ /
dngos grub sbyor ba yang dag bya/ /snying rje chen po sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gis drang srongs bskul bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /don yod dbang phyug dam pa ste/ /theg pa che mchog skyes

pa'i mchog /byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /sems dpa' chen po thabs chen po/ /rdo rje 'khor lo mchod pa che/ /dngos grub chen po rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /rdo rje ming ni

yang dag gzung / /phyogs rnams kun tu yang dag bskor/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par blta bya zhing / /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rjes dran bya/ /slar yang dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ /nga ni rang nyid 'khor los bsgyur/ /

phyag rgya'i tshogs ni bcing ba la/ /stong las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /tha na rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /de nyid phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /langs nas tshig ni brjod par bya/ /bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /dkyil
'khor chen po rab sgrub pa/ /rdo rje la sogs kun gshegs shig /bdag ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ /tshon chen kha bsgyur dri ldan pa'i/ /srad bu lhag pa grims par

bsgril/ /rdo rje srad bu phyag rgya ches/ /dkyil 'khor chen po thig gdab bya/ /'khor lo ji bzhin bkod ji bzhin/ /ji bzhin gzhung gi rjes 'brangs nas/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ji bzhin bri/ /rdo rje'i thig ni

yongs su gdab/ /de nas de yi rang rigs gsang / /'khor lo chen po rab tu sgrub/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ni/ /go rim bzhin du bshad par bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa'i/ /

thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo yi sgo khyud mtshams su ni/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de yi

nang gi rim pa ni/ /'khor lo lta bur bri bar bya/ /rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje ka ba'i mdun gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /ji ltar phyi dang nang gnas pa'i/ /

dkyil 'khor re re rnam par dbye/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/ /dkyil 'khor lnga bris gang yin de/ /ka ba mchog ni brgyad kyis spras/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi pa yin par bshad/ /dbus kyi shin du dbus song nas/ /
chos 'dzin rgyal po chen po ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad khyab bdag che/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ni/ /dam tshig mchog rnams
bzhi po yang / /go rim bzhin du yang dag bris/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /mdun rgyab tu ni gnas pa yin/ /rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas phyogs su/ /nub kyi phyogs su bdud 'joms pa/ /rdo rje legs pa

rgyal po che/ /chos 'dzin chen po dbang dang ldan/ /chos 'dzin pa ni byang du ste/ /mdun du rdo rje bsnyems tshul lo/ /de la de yi snying po gsang / /shin du rtog par byed pa'i mchog /sdug bsngal kun las rab grol

byed/ /byang chub sems ni rab bskul ba/ /hU~M dza ho sA/ shar phyogs cha yi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus de ru/ /mi bskyod pa ni dgod par bya/ /rdo rje shugs

kyi snying po ni/ /the tshom gcod pa sngon 'gro can/ /tshogs sngon 'gro ba bzang po ste/ /sdig pa thams cad rab 'jom byed/ /oM be ga kra ma ho/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che/ /thub pa skyes chog mi bskyod

pa/ /glang po phyag rgya la gnas shing / /zhi ba'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /de la snying po 'di yin te/ /hU~M de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje mchog rnams dgod pa ni/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras shing / /

khros bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bstan pa che/ /rdo rje 'dod chags bdud chen po/ /rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje rin chen dgod par bya/ /rdo rje

chags pa gang bshad pa/ /rdo rje chos ni dgod par bya/ /rdo rje legs par gang bshad pa/ /rdo rje las ni yongs su gzung / /dam tshig rnam pa bzhi po ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba dgod par bya/ /thams cad sangs rgyas cod

pan ldan/ /'khor los sgyur bar dbang bskur ba/ /rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las/ /pad ma sna tshogs dga' chen po/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /byang chub mchog de yang dag gzung / /yan lag 'gyur

ba lhag ma rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs dgod/ /de nas sangs rgyas rigs bzhag ste/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po la/ /phyag rgya dang ni snying po bshad/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /hU~M dzaH

ho swa/ yi ge dza sogs bshad pa la/ /yi ge oM ni yang dag dgod/ /ho d+hi chos dbyings yi ge a/ /yi ge swa ni yongs su bsgyur/ /rdo rje shugs kyis lhor song nas/ /rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor lo/ /

bcom ldan mchog ni yongs su 'dzin/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje rin chen la sogs bris/ /rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang / /rin chen so yi rgyan bcas pa/ /de la rnams kyi snying po ni/ /

oM aHtrA ha/ nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje chos/ /'od dpag med ni dgod par bya'o/ /de yi snying po ni hrIH /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /

rdo rje pad ma la sogs bris/ /pad ma rnon po de bzhin rgyu/ /smra ba phyags brgya pad ma bcas/ /de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni hrIHda~M ma~M ra~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /bcom

ldan 'das ni don yod grub/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni dgod par bya/ /de yi snying po ni ka~M / de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje las la sogs pa bri/ /thams cad bsrung ba gnod sbyin che/ /las dang khu tshur shin

du brtan/ /de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ ka~M ha~M hU~M ba~M/ dbus kyi 'khor lo grwa bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las/ /pad ma lha mo bzhi ru bshad/ /de la de rnams kyi snying po ni/ /oM oM

hrIHa thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po las cha dang po'i dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs so// // dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs nas ni/ /phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bri/ /phyag rgya de ni byin brlab pa/ /

rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /byang chub mchog tu dbus nas mchog /shis pa shar gyi phyag rgya ste/ /lho yi phyogs su mchog sbyin no/ /nub tu chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin/ /byang du mi 'jigs sbyin zhes
pa/ /don yod grub pas yongs su gzung / /phyag rgya lhag ma phyag mtshan bcas/ /de nas rdo rje sems tshogs bri/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las rdo rje 'khor lo chen

po'i dbus kyi cha zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su/ /shar phyogs kyi ni dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje rigs chen nyams dga' ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor lnga ni yang dag bri/ /ka ba brgyad ni rdo rje che/ /

dkyil 'khor lnga yis rgya rnam par brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi dang ldan pa yi/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongs su dgod/ /de yi shar gyi dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs can yang dag bri/ /uta pal sngon po 'od chen

ldan/ /khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i/ /drag po 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/ /rdo rje ti ri ti ri 'dzin/ /khro bo rdo rje'i lta ba 'dzin/ /gtum pa thams cad rab 'dul byed/ /sangs rgyas mdun du rdo rje 'dzin/ /'bar ba'i dbus su

dgod par bya/ /de bzhin 'bar dbus pad ma dang / /de bzhin rin chen sna tshogs mtshan/ /de nyid shar gyi 'khor lo che/ /shar gyi cha ru song nas ni/ /de yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad yang dag bri/ /zhal

bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /phyag rgya brgyad ni yongs su 'dzin/ /mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs/ /khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i/ /lcags kyu rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang / /zhags pa phyag rgya bzhi ru bshad/ /mda' dang

gzhu ni gnyis su 'dzin/ /gnyis ni yi ge hU~M gis bsdus/ /des ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya/ /g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi/ /nu ma'i bar du mnan pa ste/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis legs

par gnas/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab 'od ldan/ /sku mdog sngon po drag po ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje khro bo dgod par bya/ /thams cad khro bo'i 'bar bas

khyab/ /mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs/ /khro bo sems dpa' khro rdo rje/ /de bzhin khro bo chags pa ste/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /khro bo'i rgyal po g.yas phyogs su/ /khro bo'i

bdag nyid chen pos bskor/ /dbus su khro bo khro gnyer can/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje khro bo'i dbang bskur ldan/ /thams cad bri zhing yang dag dgod/ /khro gnyer can gyi dkyil 'khor mchog /de yi phyogs

rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen khro bo dgod par bya/ /khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / /khro bo bzhad pa shin du byung / /dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa ru/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /khro bo'i bdag nyid chen por bskor/ /

rdo rje'i sde ni yang dag bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad ma'i khro bo dgod par bya/ /chos dang rnon po de bzhin rgyu/ /bzhad pa khro bo rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /

las kyi rgyal po bdag nyid che/ /rdo rje dbab pa yang dag bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las kyi khro bo la sogs bri/ /las kyi gnod sbyin srin po dang / /bsdu ba'i rdzu 'phrul khu tshur che/ /dkyil 'khor lnga po kun du

bri/ /de ni rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/ /dkyil 'khor chen po che zhes bya/ /gsang ba de nyid tshogs kyi bdag /de nas kun gyi snying po ni/ /rdo rje rigs kun nyams dga' ba'i/ /yi ge hU~M ni 'dir brjod do/ /drag po ha ha zhes

sgrogs hU~M/ /hU~M hU~M zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed/ /de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i legs 'dus bya/ /'khor lo dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /khro bo'i sems ma rin chen
dang / /pad ma dang ni las shes bya/ /kun nas mtshams rnams dag tu ni/ /phyag rgya dam bcas de dag bzung / /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las cha gnyis pa rdzogs so/ /shar phyogs kyi cha'i dkyil

'khor yang rdzogs so// // dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/ /ka ba'i phyi rol dkyil 'khor du/ /sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ /gar ma lha mo phyag rgya bcas/ /shar gyi rdo rje rigs nyid la/ /phyi rol gnas su

de bzhin nyid/ /nyi ma la bskyed bzhi po ni/ /rdo rje lha mos yongs su bzung / /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba/ /yi ge hU~M ni kun tu dgod/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs rgyal po/ /yi ge hU~M ni 'dir brjod do/ /

phyag rgya rang gi yan lag 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /phyag rgya thams cad rab sbyor bas/ /de dag gsang zhing mchog gsang bshad/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po mchog

tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las rdo rje rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // lho yi rin chen dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de ru phun tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'khor lo lnga po dgod par bya/ /de yi
dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /rin chen chen po rta la bcibs/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku/ /'od zer phreng bas kun

du khyab/ /rin chen phreng ba mchog 'dzin pa'i/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ /so yi phreng ba rab bzhad cing / /so yi phreng ba'i phyag rgyar ldan/ /mthe bo'i rtse mo rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /nyi ma'i dbus na sangs

rgyas che/ /zla ba lta bu'i bdud rtsi'i sku/ /rdo rje rin chen skal ba che/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i rigs mchog go/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen sems dpa' pad ma dang / /de bzhin rdo rje las nyid do/ /rgyan rnams

thams cad kyis spras pa/ /'khor los sgyur bas rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen chen po rigs las byung / /nor bu'i rdo rje nyi ma 'dzin/ /de nas snying po ni trA~M/ lho yi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /

de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /nor bu'i 'od can yang dag bri/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang bskur ldan/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen de bzhin yang dag bri/ /rin chen

sems dpa' de bzhin chags/ /rgyal po legs pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje rin chen sogs phyag rgya/ /rang gi phyag rgya phyag mtshan phrag /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /lho yi gnas kyi steng 'dug nas/ /rin chen rigs chen

bzang po la/ /rdo rje rin chen bzang po bri/ /rin chen bzhi yi dbang bskur ldan/ sangs rgyas spyi bo 'dzin pa'i mchog /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /rin chen phreng ba'i dbang bskur ldan/ /de yi phyogs rnams

thams cad du/ /sems dpa' bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /rin chen rgyal po rgyal mtshan dang / /bzhad dang rin chen rgyal po che/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /nub kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor la/ /pad ma rin chen

bdag nyid che/ /rin chen phreng bas dbang bskur ldan/ /rin chen pad ma'i mchog 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas dbu rgyan sems dpa' che/ /rin chen zhi ba yongs su 'dzin/ /zur mig 'dod chags chags pa'i spyan/ /skyes bu 'dul ba la gzigs

pa/ /pad ma 'dzin pa'i rgyal po che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug tshe dpag med/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen pad ma yang dag bri/ /rin chen pad ma de bzhin rno/ /de bzhin rgyu dang smra ba 'dzin/ /rdo rje shugs kyis

song nas kyang / /byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /rin chen las chen rgyal po ni/ /bdag nyid chen pos yang dag bri/ /bcom ldan thub pa'i dbang po don yod grub/ /las kun 'dzin pa'i sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa'i/ /

rdo rje las te rgyal po mdzod 'dzin pa/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i gtso bo mchog dam pa/ /sangs rgyas dbu rgyan las rnams bzhi dang ldan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis yan lag legs par rgyan/ /las kyi rin chen dam pas

rgyas gdab cing / /rin chen dkyil 'khor tshogs chen mchog gyur pas/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las kyi rin chen yang dag bri/ /las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang / /de yi bsdu ba'i khu tshur 'dzin/ /de nas kun

gyi snying po ni/ trA~M rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor pa/ /yi ge trA~M ni brjod par bya/ /ci rigs par ni rang nyid kyi/ /phyag rgya phyag mtshan yang dag bri/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las rkang pa gsum

pa rdzogs so/ /lho phyogs cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so// // de nyid kyi ni grwa bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor mdun nas su/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /sems ma'i rin chen de bzhin
chos/ /las ma 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ /gar ma rnam par sgeg mo yi/ /nor bu rigs chen bzang po ni/ /rin chen phyag rgyas kun khyab la/ /phyag mchog

rang gi phyag rgyas mtshon/ /'od zer phreng bas khyab 'od ldan/ /rin chen rdo rjes dbang bskur ba/ /rang rang phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /rin chen mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs/ /rin chen las byung rin chen ldan/ /rin chen
rang bzhin khang par gnas/ /spos dang rin chen me tog bcas/ /rin chen mchog chen la gnas shing / /lus la rin chen gos gyon pa/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba mchog

tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las nor bu'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /nub kyi pad ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /pad ma'i rigs chen bzang po ni/ /dga' ba chen pos yang dag bri/ /

de yi nub kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /dkyil 'khor lnga ni yang dag bri/ /dbus kyi lte ba'i 'khor lo la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /pad ma bzang po 'dab ma brgyad/ /'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba/ /chos dbyings brtan

pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /pad ma'i phreng bas rnam par mdzes/ /de yi dbus su rgyal po che/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rang bzhin mchog /sangs rgyas shes rab thabs ldan pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin/ /pad ma

gcig po de gnas shing / /de yi dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ /pad ma'i sems dpa' bzhi po bri/ /'khor los sgyur ba 'jigs pa med/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /sangs rgyas pad ma dbang bskur ldan/ /
rdo rje pad ma la sogs bri/ /pad ma'i sems dpa' 'jigs pa med/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas cod pan ldan/ /chos kyi phreng bas dbang bskur bas/ /pad ma'i phyag mtshan mtshon cha bsnams/ /sangs rgyas 'phrul

pas rnam par rol/ /pad ma'i sems dang de bzhin rgyal/ /rin chen chos ni tshul chen po/ /dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po ni/ /rim pa bzhin du yang dag bri/ /nub kyi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje'i shugs kyis song nas kyang / /

de yi dbus su rgyal po che/ /sna tshogs 'khor lo dgod par bya/ /chos kyi snying po rab tu gnas/ /pad ma 'dab ma brgyad la brten/ /pad ma'i ge sar dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs can dgod par bya/ /rgyan rnams thams

cad kyis spras pa/ /gzugs bzang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbang bskur ldan/ /spyan gsum phyag ni brgyad pa ste/ /thor tshugs tshangs pa dpral bar dbang / /me tog mtshon cha smin mtshams su/ /

mig la nyi ma zla ba dgod/ /tha skar gzhon nu rna ba la/ /khyab 'jug sna yi rtse mo ste/ /mche ba nag po gsus po che/ /lce la dbyangs can ma yin te/ /gsung dbyangs la ni dbyangs chen ma/ /ku mu da dang pad phreng can/ /kha

dang 'gram pa dag la gnas/ /spyan la shes rab pha rol phyin/ /gdong gi phyed ni sprul par byed/ /phrag pa g.yas par seng ge ste/ /g.yon pa phag ni yang dag gnas/ /sna yi bu gu gnyis la ni/ /rgya mtsho nye bar gdung ba dag /

dga' bo nye dga' dpung pa la/ /lto ba la ni rgya mtsho gnas/ /brla g.yas pa la dpung chen gnas/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug dpung pa la/ /lha chen dbang phyug chen po ni/ /mtshan ma'i steng gi sgo na gnas/ /dpal be'i snying

ga la gnas te/ /lhag pa lha mo chen mo dpal/ /'og gi kha yi sgo ru ni/ /gshin rje'i rgyal po rnam par brten/ /rdzong dang 'jigs byed lha mo che/ /pus mo la ni yang dag gnas/ /rkang pa'i sor mo bcu la ni/ /ma mo bcu'i

kun du gnas/ /drag po rje ngar gnas pa nyid/ /chu yi lha mo rgyab na gnas/ /dpyid dang so ga dbyar dang ni/ /ston dang dgun dang dgun smad lha/ /g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa yin/ /rkang pa dag la yang dag gnas/ /'og gi 'khor lo

rtsibs stong la/ /drag po'i phung po 'ching ba dang / /sgra gcan thag bzangs ris snang byed/ /lha ma yin rnams kun du gnas/ /lag pa bcu yi thal mo la/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu dag gnas/ /mngon par 'dod pa nyid dag gi/ lha chen la

sogs 'di dag bri/ /zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste/ /zhal re zhing ni spyan gsum pa'i/ /gos dang gzugs ni bzang por ldan/ /de 'dra'i rang bzhin thub pa dgod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad tu/ /pad ma'i

sems dpa' yang dag bri/ /pad ma'i sems dpa' lcags kyu dang / /mda' dang pad ma legs par sbyin/ /nub kyi lho yi phyogs mchog tu/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /rin chen

pad ma yang dag bri/ /zhal ni bcu gnyis ldan pa nyid/ /phyag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i mchog /rin chen pad mar yang dag bzhugs/ /rin chen las ni 'byung bar 'dod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad ma'i rin

chen dra sogs bri/ /khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / /de bzhin zhal ni bcu gcig pa/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /'od dpag med ni dgod

par bya/ /pad ma chen po rab ster ba/ /pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtso/ /spyan dang phyag ni stong par ldan/ /phyag rgya mtshon cha thams cad bcang / /zhal bcu gnyis pa bzang po ste/ /pad ma'i lha mo yang dag ldan/ /

pha rol phyin pa bcu dang ldan/ /tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par rol/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri/ /sgrol ma gzhon nu'i mthu can dang / /mgrin sngon tshangs pa'i mdog

las byung / /nub kyi byang gi cha ru ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /pad ma la sogs dgod par bya/ /zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa'i/ /phyag rgya mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog /

chen po sna tshogs rab ster ba/ /pad ma las ni yang dag bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun gnas pa/ /pad ma'i srin po gnod sbyin dang / /pad ma'i khu tshur

yang dag bri/ /g.yas dang g.yon dang rgyab dang ni/ /mdun nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas snying po ni ha/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po hrIHste/ thams cad kyi snying po yin no/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen

po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// // pad+ma'i rigs kyi tshogs dag gi/ dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni/ /de yi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /

pad ma'i sems dpa' rin chen dang / /las dang chos ma yang dag bri/ /sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ /gar ma 'di ni yang dag bri/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las pad ma'i rigs chen po zhes

bya ba rdzogs so// // byang gi las kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni/ /'khor lo lnga lnga dgod par bya/ /de yi dbus su las chen po/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod

par bya/ /chos 'dzin pa yi rgyal po che/ /nam mkha' lding gi gdan la bzhugs/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las kyi phyag rgya yang dag bri/ /las kyi sems dpa' rin chen dang / /de bzhin las dang chos nyid

do/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /byang gi shar gyi dkyil 'khor la/ /mi bskyod pa ni sangs rgyas che/ /rdo rje las ni dgod par bya/ /de yi mchod pa mtshon cha bcas/ /de yi phyag rgya bcas pa bzung / /las chen 'dzin

pa bzang po ste/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa yang dag ldan/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las kyi sems dpa' yang dag bri/ /sems dpa' chags pa'i rgyal po che/ /legs pa de bzhin las nyid do/ /rdo rje shugs

kyis song nas kyang / /byang gi lho yi cha ru ni/ /rin chen ting 'dzin rgyal po che/ /rin chen las ni yang dag bri/ /rin chen char ni rab 'bebs shing / /sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad

du/ /rin chen las ni yang dag bri/ /sems dpa'i gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang / /las dang bzhad pa rnam sbyong ba/ /las kyi rin chen bzang po la/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas

kyang / /byang gi nub kyi cha ru ni/ /pad ma'i las kyi sems dpa' che/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su yang dag bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad ma'i las ni yang dag bri/ /pad ma rnon po de bzhin rgyu/ /de bzhin smra ba

las yin no/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /byang gi byang phyogs dkyil 'khor la/ /las chen 'dzin pa dbang ldan pa/ /las kyi rgyal po yang dag bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las kyi sems dpa' dgod

par bya/ /las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang / /de bzhin bsdu ba'i khu tshur nyid/ /de nas snying po ni aH/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni aHste/ thams cad kyi snying po yin no/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen

po gsang ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa lnga pa rdzogs so/ /byang gi cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so// // byang du dkyil 'khor bri byas te/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni/ /de yi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni dgod par bya/ /

sngar gyi dam tshig bzhi po ni/ /thams cad sum cu rtsa gsum yin/ /dbus ma zhes bya sum bcu gsum/ /shar gyi phyogs na sum bcu gsum/ /de bzhin nub kyi phyogs cha'o/ /byang dang lho yang de bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor

thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba las las kyi rigs zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor thams cad kyang rdzogs so// // brgya drug bcu rtsa lnga pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor

'khor lo mchog /thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/ /'khor lo chen po'i grwa bzhi ru/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya/ /'khor lo sbyor chen shar lho ru/ /zla ba'i gzugs su dgod par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus

su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /'dzum zhing zla ba'i mdog can te/ /'od zer dmar po sna tshogs 'bar/ /sems dpa'i skyil dkrung yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog /phyag g.yas pa
na rdo rje bsnams/ /de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsnams/ /mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dpa' che/ /sems can kun gyi don sems pa/ /de yi pad ma yang dag gnas/ /de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ /lha mo bzhi ni

yang dag bri/ /gsang ba lnga ni yang dag bstan/ /dang po dang ni gnyis pa ni/ /g.yas kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas/ /gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa ni/ /g.yon logs na ni rab tu gnas/ /lha mo rdo rje ca co sgrogs/ /dbus khyud rang gi lha mo de/ /

de yi glo na mgo sgyur zhing / /'dzum bcas kun du lta ba ste/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la 'jus/ /chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /de yi glo na bzhad bcas zhing / /rdeg byed skye dgu'i bdag mo yi/ /rdo rje ca co'i sgra sgrog dang / /de

bzhin rdo rje don yod dga'/ /lha mo rdo rje 'dod dbang phyug /gzi brjid dga' ba'i rdo rje ma/ /lho dang nub kyi mtshams su ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /pad ma chen po dgod par bya/ /pad ma'i

dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /pad ma'i sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste/ /'khor los dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa/ /de yi pad mar yang dag gnas/ /de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ /pad ma'i

rigs can las byung ba/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /kun nas gsang ba'i lha mo yi/ /de nas ming ni rab bshad bya/ /rdo rje dpal dang rdo rje dkar/ /rdo rje sgron ma rdo rje can/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /nub byang mtshams

kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bri nas ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma yang dag ldan/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rin chen sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /sngon dmar gyi ni 'od kyis khyab/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis

brgyan pa'i/ /de yi pad ma yang dag gnas/ /de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ /rin chen rigs chen las byung ba'i/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /nam mkha' las byung mkha' rdo rje/ /nam mkha'i mdog can skye dgu'i bdag /

rin chen dpal ldan lha mo che/ /rin chen dang bcas rigs mdzes ma/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /byang shar mtshams kyi 'khor lo la/ /de bzhin uta pal sngon po'i 'dab/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya/ /uta pal

sngon po de dbus su/ /las rnams 'dzin pa chen po'i mchog /sangs rgyas kun las sogs bshad pa/ /rdo rje'i las ni dgod par bya/ /de yi pad mar yang dag gnas/ /de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten cing / /las kyi rigs

can las byung ba'i/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /las rgya rdo rje rin chen ma/ /las ma chos ma dpal ldan che/ /ji ltar sngon du rdo rje'i rigs/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ /de nyid pho nya mo ru gnas/ /de

nyid lha mor yang dag gnas/ /de nyid sgeg mo rnam sgeg sogs/ /phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho gzhan yang byed/ /ser mo dmar mo nyi ma mtshungs/ /uta pal sngon po'i mdog 'drar 'gyur/ /bsnyems bcas zhi ba'i dbang bskur

ldan/ /rang gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /de nas snying po hU~M hrIH oM aH/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa drug pa rdzogs so/ /

mtshams rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so// // brgya dang brgyad bcu rtsa lngar ldan/ /'khor lo yongs su rdzogs nas kyang / /de yi mtshams kyi logs rnams su/ /lha bzhi dag ni yang dag bri/ /shar du rdo rje

chen po ste/ /rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o/ /rdo rje rigs chen mtshan ma ste/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba rab 'jigs pa'i/ /lho ru rin chen phun tshogs pa/ /chu lha rin chen chu srin rnams/ /rin chen rigs chen mtshan ma ste/ /

sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod/ /nub tu sa lha bri bar bya/ /rtsal ldan skyes bu zhes bya yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'dzin byed cing / /pad+ma'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'ang yin/ /byang du rlung gi skyes bu ni/ /rlung gi shugs kyis gos

'chang zhing / /de bzhin las kyi rigs 'dzin ma/ /g.yo zhing rtsal ldan bri bar bya/ /brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa dgu ru/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bsgrub/ /chos kyi tshul gyi gru chen po/ /thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/ /

dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // thun mong mchog tu gsang ba yi/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /rang rigs 'khor

lo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /phyogs gcig tu ni bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug rnam snang mdzad/ /seng ge pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /de ni byang chub mchog 'dzin pa/ /mi

bskyod pa ni glang chen bcibs/ /rin chen dbang ni rta la bcibs/ /bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa ni/ /rma bya'i khri la yang dag bzhugs/ /don yod grub pa bla na med/ /mkha' lding dbang po yang dag bzhugs/ /'di

rnams kyi ni bzhon par bshad/ /rigs mchog kun gyi dbye ba'o/ /mi bskyod pa yi sa gnon te/ /de bzhin rin chen dbang mchog sbyin/ /tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin sbyin/ /don yod grub pa'i mi 'jigs sbyin/ /

sngon po ser po de bzhin dmar/ /kha dog ljang gu las 'dzin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yid 'ong / /sku mdog dkar po rab tu bsgrags/ /de bzhin rdo rje rin chen la/ /rdo rje phreng bas rdo rje mtshan/ /rdo rje'i

dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba/ /rdo rje'i ri mo yang dag bri/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po la/ /pad+ma'i phreng bas pad+ma mtshan/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba/ /pad+ma'i srad bus thig gdab bya/ /rin chen
rigs can bzang po la/ /rin chen phreng bas rin chen mtshan/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba/ /rin chen ri mo rnam par mdzes/ /las kyi rigs la sna tshogs bshad/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas

rigs mchog la/ /'on kyang rdo rje khyad par gyis/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba'i/ /rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru/ /lho ru rin chen dkyil 'khor te/ /nub tu pad ma yang dag bshad/ /byang du las ni yang dag sbyor/ /

rdo rje can kun khro gnyer can/ /rin chen tshogs ni rab bshad pa/ /pad ma chen po dul zhing zhi/ /drag po zhi ba las 'dzin pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ru/ /'khor lo chen po yang dag bri/ /de nas phyir rol
'khor lo sogs/ /cho ga 'di kun de dang 'dra/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsang ba zhes bya ba rkang pa bdun pa rdzogs so/ /las

kyi rnal 'byor las byung ba rdzogs so// // nang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni/ /tshon rtsi las ni dgang bar bya'o/ /thig dang ri mo thams cad ni/ /tshon rtsi kun gyis rab tu dgang / /dang po nas ni tha ma ru/ /

phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun du bri/ /mnyam zhing kun du cha mnyam pas/ /gru bzhi ru ni rab tu brtag /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa/ /ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /yid du 'ong zhing

legs par phye/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje rin chen srad bu yis/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor/ /rdo rje kha khyer mdzes byas

la/ /zla ba phyed pa'i lcug mas khyab/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i tshogs dang ldan/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/ /zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/ /g.yer ka'i dra bas yang dag ldan/ /kha dog sna tshogs rnam par brgyan/ /de dang dbus kyi bar

thig la/ /byang chub sems rnams yang dag bri/ /bskal pa bzang po stong dag ni/ /'das pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams/ /shar du thams cad rdo rje mtshan/ /lho ru rin chen phyag mtshan bsnams/ /nub tu pad ma rdo rje sogs/ /byang

du las kyi rdo rje bsnams/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha gang dag /phyi rol thig la yang dag bri/ /drag po la sogs lha chen rnams/ /snam bu las ni lus phyed phyung / /dbang phyug chen po tshangs pa che/ /khyab 'jug g.yung drung gzhon

nu ni/ /rigs bcas dpung dang bcas rgyal po/ /shar gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri/ /'khyil pa'i 'od can gtum po dang / /ser skya rdo rje ser skya rnams/ /rigs bcas 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ /lho yi phyogs su yang dag

bri/ /myos pa phreng ldan rgyal nyid pa/ /rnam par rgyal dang skyel byed rnams/ /rigs bcas dpung dang yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi cha ru yang dag bri/ /ko shi gos can me dang rlung / /rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs rnams/ /nub

kyi cha las 'og tu ni/ /byang gi cha ru yang dag bri/ /de bzhin dpung dang bdag por bcas/ /ma mo 'jig rten rab grags dang / /gtso bo 'khor lo rnam rol pa/ /lha min la sogs rdzu 'phrul che/ /phyi rol 'khor lo'i rigs su

bshad/ /rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya las/ /stong phrag bcu ru bshad pa rnams/ /ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas zur du/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya/ /me tog spos la sogs ldan pa/ /

mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri/ /ji ltar nus shing bri ba dang / /ji ltar mdzes shing rjes su 'thun/ /ji ltar rang gi rigs bshad pa/ /ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor

chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchog tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba rkang pa brgyad pa rdzogs so// // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ma lus pa rdzogs so/ /
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma lus par dgug pa 'di 'byung ngo / /'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug
dgug pa nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la thabs mkhas pa chen po 'jug par byed pa nyid dang / don thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub chen po'i

tshogs bsags pa dang / sems can gyi don la mi slu ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di las theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi bskyed cing 'gyur ba med par 'ching ba nyid dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /

gzungs dang / spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa sdud par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po nyid la yang dag par byed pa nyid do/ /de la shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin dgod

par bya'o/ /lho ru ni rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba dang / nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba dang / byang du rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgod par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor

chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshul ched du brjod pa las rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so// // de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yin no/ /byang chub

sems dpa'i tshul thob byed/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni/ /dam tshig mchog chen sems dpa' yis/ /bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya/ /ma lus gsang ba blta bya zhing / /kun du tshogs nas dga' bar bya/ /

gsang ba chad na dag bya zhing / /lhag ma rnam par sbyang bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /myur du phyag rgya che bsten bya/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya/ /'khor lo zur ni yang dag gnas/ /

rdo rje lha mo spyan drang bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten spyan drang bya/ /sgo yi dbus na gang gnas pa/ /sgo bsrungs rnams ni spyan drang bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /sems

dpa' chen po spyan drang bya'i/ /de nas sgo rnams thams cad du/ /lcags kyu la sogs las byas te/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni yang dag bcing / /brgya dang rtsa brgyad dag bya ba/ /rdo rje lcags kyu kun du dgug /rdo rje zhags pas gzhugs par

bya/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog kun du bcing / /rdo rje dril bus dbab par bya/ /sgo'i bya ba'o/ /de nas dbus su 'dug byas nas/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /rdo rje dbye ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya/ /sgo srung ba ru

dmigs nas ni/ /sgo rnams dbye bar bya ba yin/ /rdo rje sdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis/ /gdug pa thams cad bsdigs par bya/ /gang tshe mchod pa yang dag rtsom/ /ji srid dus kyis rdzogs 'gyur ba/ /grwa ni thams cad dag tu ni/ /

bdug spos rnams ni gdul bar bya/ /sngon du sgo yi las byas te/ /de nas mchod pa yang dag bya/ /dang por me tog shing la sogs/ /spos dang mar me phyag rgyar bcas/ /mtshams kyi dus las sngon du ni/ /bum pa rdo rje spyan

drang bya/ /rdo rje bum pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /ci nus par ni spyan drang bya/ /bum pa shin du bzang po gcig /rin chen sna bdun las byas mdzes/ /yang na rin chen dang bsres pa'i/ /rdo rje dri yi chu ldan bya/ /rdo rje chu yi

sngags dang ni/ /rdo rje phyag rgya chu gtsang ma/ /stong dang rtsa brgyad bzlas byas na/ /rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur/ /bum pa'i sngags ni oM badzra u da ka hA~M/ me tog gi sngags ni/ /oM badzra puSh+pe hU~M/ mar me'i

sngags ni oM badzra A lo ke hU~M/ dri'i sngags ni oM badzra gan d+he hU~M/ bdug spos kyi sngags kyi ni oM badzra d+hU pe hU~M/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa/ /thams cad phyag rgya ldan par bya/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gzung byas nas/ /

rdo rje'i sngags kyis rab tu sbyor/ /dgongs ka'i dus nas brtsams nas ni/ /khrus kyi cho ga yang dag bya/ /lus la dri yis byug pa dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan/ /rdo rje'i shugs kyi sngags

dang ni/ /rdo rje'i shugs kyi phyag rgya yis/ /'byung ba dang ni 'jug pa yi/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur/ /smin ma rdo rje ri mo mtshan/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya la sogs tshogs/ /sems dpa' thams cad

'gom byas kyang / /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur/ /der ni 'gyod pa med par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol ba yis/ /cho ga chad dam lhag kyang ru/ /'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te de ni cho gar ldan/ /kun
du 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor go cha yis/ /sangs rgyas skyon du 'dzin mi mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches/ /dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par bya'o/ /zhugs nas dkyil 'khor

dbus su ni/ /rdo rje dag ni dgug par bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu kun bcings nas/ /sor mo yis ni dgug par bya/ /de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu yis/ /rgyud las dgug pa nyid tu gsungs/ /de bzhin rdo rje rigs chen

la/ /rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bcing / /rin chen lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /rin po che ni dgug par bya/ /pad ma lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni/ /pad ma'i rigs chen dag la bshad/ /las kyi lcags kyu'i phyag

rgya yis/ /las kyi rigs chen dgug par bya/ /rdo rje chen po'i lcags kyu bcing / /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/ /dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang bya/ /phyi

rol rdo rje lcags kyu bcing / /phyi rol rdo rje rigs spyan drang / /bkra shis rdo rje'i lcags kyu yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang bya/ /byang mchog lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor pa rnams spyan

drang bya/ /rin chen lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan drang bya/ /snying po'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /kun la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /
bsnyems tshul sngags kyi phyag rgya yis/ /rnam snang yang dag spyan drang bya/ /sangs rgyas lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin kho nar sangs rgyas rnams/ /dam tshig lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /

dam tshig sems dpa' spyan drang bya/ /dgugs pa'i sbyor ba byas nas ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs nas ni/ /mchod pa'i sprin rnams yang dag sgrub/ /bdag nyid dbul
ba la sogs pa'i/ /ji skad bshad pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /bshags dang gsol gdab mchod pa dang / /bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs rnams/ /bdag gi bya ba rdzogs nas ni/ /phyag rgya bcing ba yang dag brtsam/ /

brgya 'am yang na stong dag gam/ /brgya phrag brgya ni bsdus pa yis/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs ni bcing byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te/ /ji srid skya reng shar gyur
pa/ /de srid phyag rgya yang dag bcing / /nges par dngos grub ster bar byed/ /de nas langs te phyag rgya bcas/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni/ /gdug pa la sogs kun bsdigs te/ /dkyil 'khor mchod

phyir 'jug par bya/ /rang gi khrus byas lus dris byugs/ /ji ltar 'tsham pa'i rgyan gos ldan/ /shin du mdzes pa'i gos gyon zhing / /phreng ldan kha ni dri zhim pas/ /rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /me tog spyi

bor gzhag byas te/ /rol pa'i rdo rje dga' ba yis/ /zhugs nas mgon la rab btud cing / /de nyid 'dod chags rjes chags dang / /de nyid bskul ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/ /sangs rgyas

kun ni bskul bar bya/ /skyon dang bral zhing rtag pa ste/ /'dod chags kun la rjes chags pa/ /mchod 'os chen po rgyal po che/ /bcom ldan de nyid bdag grub mdzod/ /de nas dam tshig mchog gi ni/ /phyag rgya

cho ga bzhin bcings nas/ /rdo rje slob dpon zhugs nas ni/ /lcags sgrog phyag rgya yang dag bcing / /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu bcing / /steng du se gol brdabs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams

cad bsdu bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bsdu ba'i sngags ni dzaHdzaHdzaH/ /shar gyi sgo ru yi ge dzaH/ /de bzhin lho ru yi ge hU~M/ /nub tu lcags sgrog chen po ba~M/ /byang du kun du dbab pa aH/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ /las

'di dag ni yang dag bshad/ /las ni kun du rdzogs byas nas/ /de bzhin ngo mtshar mthong 'gyur ba/ /cho 'phrul chen po rmad 'byung che/ /sna tshogs brgya dang rtsa bcu ste/ /cho 'phrul rmad byung chen po rnams/ /rdo rje slob dpon

gyis mthong 'gyur/ /dngos grub bdag nyid chen po kun/ /dkyil 'khor kun du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje can dang byang chub sems/ /de bzhin rigs ni rnam lnga dang / /rdo rje dbyings ni bdag nyid che/ /bcom ldan mchog
kyang gshegs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems sogs sangs rgyas sras/ /ngo mtshar slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur/ /mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid/ /ji bzhin cho ga bcas par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dngos grub

dag /mthong nas dkyil 'khor bya ba yin/ /ji ltar bkod pa 'khor lo dang / /ji ltar yo byad zad pa dang / /ji ltar brtul zhugs spyad pa bzhin/ /de bzhin dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen dang / /

sangs rgyas yang dag mthong bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'khor lo chen po byon/ /'di ni ngo mtshar mchog yin no/ /ji ltar de rnams bzhugs pa bzhin/ /de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su bzung / /ye shes bzang po khyab pa yi/ /

rmad byung dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor rmad byung thams cad ni/ /sa dag brtol nas mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na dkyil 'khor bar snang gi/ nam mkha' la gnas mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na sangs rgyas kun gang ba'i/ /

sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rab mthong 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs bzhin du/ /rdo rje can gyis bdag nyid mthong / /yang na gsang ba lnga zhes pa'i/ /

yang na sangs rgyas mkhas pa'i mchog /yang na dkyil 'khor gnas de ni/ /stong phrag gsum ni yongs su gzung / /yang na rdo rje sems gcig po/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po zhes bshad do/ /de yi mtshan mo nyin mo mthong / /nyi ma'i

'od kyis kun khyab pa'i/ /yang na nyi ma 'char ba ste/ /yang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dag pa'i zhing ni mthong nas su/ /sangs rgyas rol pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /'dus pa shin du dag pa yi/ /dbang bskur ba ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /

rmad byung sna tshogs zhes bya ba/ /rnam 'phrul ngo mtshar 'di mthong 'gyur/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyis/ /dkyil 'khor mchod pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ /yo byad tshogs par gyur kyang ni/ /gang zhig bsgribs par gyur pa yi/ /

de bzhin ngo mtshar nyid mi mthong / /rnal 'byor gzhan ni yang dag rtsom/ /phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni/ /sdig pa dral ba yang dag bya/ /rmad byung sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ /la lar zhugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /'grub pa nyid du

gdon mi za/ /dang po thun la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin la lar mtshan phyed na/ /gsum pa'ang skya reng 'char na 'grub/ /de bzhin la lar nyi shar na/ /de ma thag tu mngon 'dod pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog 'grub

'gyur/ /skal ldan thar par 'dod 'gyur na/ /sa ni dang por 'dod pa ste/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob nas/ /gang gis gnas med 'gro ba'o/ /yang na rig pa 'dzin nyid dam/ /de bzhin rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/ /ji ltar mngon par

'dod par 'grub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yongs su 'dzin/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang / /de bzhin sdig pa kun byed pas/ /gang tshe lan bdun byas nas ni/ /bsgrub pas rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur/ /'byung ba

bzhi las gzugs can min/ /nam mkha'i gzugs su rtag tu 'gyur/ /chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur ba nyid/ /rdo rje'i bka' ni gzhan du min/ /gang dag lan bdun bsgrubs na ni/ /sdig pa dge ba nyid 'gyur zhing / /nyes par byas pa

bsod nams tshogs/ /gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /dad pa med par gnas pa dang / /gang tshe the tshom za 'gyur ba/ /de ni rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni yongs ma bzung / /sngon du bsnyen pa nyams

'gyur te/ /rtag tu brtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur/ /de 'dra la sogs bgegs mang dang / /nga rgyal 'di dag rnam par spangs/ /sdom pa yongs su ma bzung zhing / /rnal 'byor de nyid tshul shes min/ /rdo rje slob dpon mi brten 'gyur/ /

'grub pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /gal te rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur/ /mkhas shing sdom pa blangs pa dang / /byang chub sems ni yongs su gzung / /gang tshe 'tsho ba don yod cing / /gal te skye ba

'bras bcas 'dod/ /'bad pas thams cad nyid kyis ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po yang dag brtsam/ /byang chub sems dang ldan gyur nas/ /rig pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa yi/ /de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam/ /sangs rgyas byang

chub rab 'grub 'gyur/ /yang zhus pa/ /rig pa'i rgyud ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /sdom pa ji ltar blangs bar bgyi/ /ji ltar dam tshig bsrung bar bgyi/ /dam tshig nyams pa ji lta bu/ /sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /byang

sems yang dag bskyed nas ni/ /theg pa gzhan la 'dod mi bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam/ /dkyil 'khor gang na gnas kyang rung / /slob dpon gyi ni mdun song ste/ /zhabs dag la ni btud nas brjod/ /dga' chen

khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol/ /gtso bo bdag

la sdom pa stsol/ /slob dpon gyis ni nye bar brtag /rnam pa kun du dri bar bya/ /dam tshig brjod bya gang zhig ni/ /snod du rung ba de gzhug bya/ /bu dang slob ma ma yin min/ /snod dang ldan la sbyin par bya/ /gal te snod dang ldan

par shes/ /srog dang bdog pa kun sbyin bya/ /sngon du dkyil 'khor rab 'jug cing / /cho ga bzhin du bcug nas ni/ /de nas me tog bcas thal mo/ /lus btud dga' ba che rnams kyis/ /bshags pa dang ni gsol ba gdab/ /

rjes su yi rang kun du bya/ /rgyud dbang gsang ba las gsungs bzhin/ /mchod pa dang bcas yongs su bsngo/ /phyogs rnams kun du phyag bya zhing / /sdom pa chen po blang bar bya/ /slob dpon la ni rab tu brjod/ /gtso
bo bdag la sdom pa stsol/ /thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ /slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/ /mi

ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor bar ldan/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen po 'jug par bgyi/ /gsang ba'i rigs mtho thams cad du/ /slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod/ /mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur

ba/ /skal ba chen po bdag la stsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing / /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che/ /

sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /gsang ba'i rigs las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje'i rigs bcas 'khor lo ste/ /rta babs bcas par yang dag ldan/ /

slob dpon gyur par shes par bya/ /bdag nyid nye bar zhi ba nyid/ /byang chub sems ni yongs su gzung / /gsang ba yi ni 'khor lo ru/ /sdom pa dang bcas 'jug par bgyi/ /de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya

ste/ gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ /yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /

dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /blo chen gyis ni gzung bar gyis/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bshad

do/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing

mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /'di ni pad ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /las kyi

rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya/ /de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi ni/ /phas pham par ni rab tu bshad/ /spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste/ /

rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya/ /gang tshe nyams 'gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin pa

yang mi blang ngo / /'dod pa log par mi spyad cing / /brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi/ /chang ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / /

dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing / /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /ci nus par ni rjes su skyongs/ /theg pa dman la

'dod mi bya/ /sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/ /'khor ba dag kyang spang mi bya/ /rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing / /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang / /mtshan ma

'gom par mi bya'o/ /'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /rjes mthun sdom pa rgya cher ni/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/ /de nyid kyis kyang brjod par bya/ /'dir ni slob dpon
bdag la gson/ /gtso bo ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de bzhin du ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis
bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /

sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /

slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad ma'i rigs
chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i
las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma grol ba ni grol bar

bgyi/ /ma rgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /cho ga ji bzhin dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba/ /gsang

ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/ /de lta bu yi cho ga yis/ /rtag pa nyid du spyod pa na/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen du/ /'di ni 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzogs so// // de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i

las/ /yang dag nyid du bshad par bya/ /slob ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /ji bzhin gsang ba chen por gzhug /snod dang snod min brtag pa nyid/ /bdag nyid chen pos mi bya'o/ /'di ni mthong ba tsam gyis kyang / /

sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'dod/ /gal te de ni snod min na/ /de la gzhug pa sbyin par bya/ /yang na gang zhig don gnyer 'gyur/ /de la ji ltar bde ba nyid/ /ci ste gang zhig 'dug par 'gyur/ /mkhas pas gzhug pa sbyin par

bya/ /gang phyir mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /thams cad 'grub par gdon mi za/ /'on kyang gang zhig 'dug par 'gyur/ /de la las ni bya ba min/ /gzhug pa tsam zhig sbyin bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad nyid mi bya/ /dga' zhing dad

dang ldan gyur na/ /snod du rung ba brtag par bya/ /gsum la skyabs 'gro sngon song ba'o/ /de la gzhug pa sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje slob ma la sbyin bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' ches/ /

sbyor bzhin su yin brjod par bya/ /dkar po dmar po dang ldan pa'i/ /gos kyis mig ni bkab gyur dang / /rdo rje 'jug byed phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya/ /de nas sgo yi las bya ste/ /sngon la rdo rje lcags

kyu yis/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dgug bya zhing / /yi ge dzaHni brjod par bya/ /badzra a~M ku sha dzaH/ rdo rje lcags kyu bkug nas ni/ /rdo rje zhags pas gzhug par bya/ /lho yi sgor ni sbyor bya zhing / /yi ge hU~M ni brjod par bya/ /hU~M badzra

pA sha hU~M/ rdo rje zhags pas bcug nas ni/ /lcags sgrogs ldan pas bcing bar bya/ /nub kyi sgo ru bcings nas ni/ /yi ge ba~M ni brjod par bya/ /badzra s+pho Ta ba~M/ rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag dgug /rdo rje zhags pas gzhug bya zhing / /

rdo rje lcags sgrogs gis bcing bya/ /rdo rje dril bus yang dag dbab/ /badzra g+han Da aH/ rdo rje gzhug pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor mchod phyir gzhug par bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgya chen po yis/ /rdo rje'i ye shes yang dag dbab/ /

sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ dam tshig phyag rgya chen po yis/ /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/ /dam tshig bdag nyid chen po yis/ /sangs rgyas ye shes dbab par bya/ /sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas mchod pa phyag rgyar bcas/ /spos dang me tog la

sogs tshogs/ /phyag rgya dag ni thams cad bya/ /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/ /de nas cho ga ji bzhin du/ /rdo rje slob ma mna' bsgag bya/ /badzra u da ka / rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas/ /ji ltar 'dod pas dbang bskur bya/ /

badzra a b+hi She ka / rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /de nas de la dbab pa sbyin/ /badzra A be sha a a/ bcu/ nyi shu/ sum bcu/ bzhi bcu/ lnga bcu/ drug bcu/ bdun bcu/ brgyad bcu/ dgu bcu/ brgya/ rdo rje yis ni sngags 'di yis/ /thams

cad du ni yang dag dbab/ /de nas gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /badzra ak+Sha/ rdo rje'i rigs ni skal ldan gyi/ /dkyil 'khor ltos shig ces brjod bya/ /badzra pa sh+ya ho/ de nas de la bum pa bzang / /rdo rje slob

dpon gyis dbang bskur/ /gang ming bzang ba tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ snod ni yang dag brtag bya zhing / /de yi ye shes yongs su sbyang / /gal te snod tu rung shes na/ /rnam par dbye

bar dga' bar bya/ /he badzra nA ma/ cho ga bcu/ gzung nyi shu/ chu sum bcu/ rdo rje bzhi bcu/ rin chen lnga bcu/ pheg rdob drug bcu/ kha sbyar bdun bcu/ bzhad pa brgyad bcu/ dag pa dgu bcu/ sems pa brgya/

sangs rgyas stong / las nyis stong / gzugs sum stong / rnal 'byor bzhi stong / 'dzin pa lnga stong / gzugs drug stong / kha dog bdun stong / dbyibs brgyad stong / mtshan ma dgu stong / tshig 'bum a 'bum phrag

gcig ni yongs rdzogs nas/ /'khor lo'i mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /gsang ba yi ni spyod yul gzhan/ /de nas las ni rab bshad bya/ /slob ma'i cho ga dang ming gi dam tshig rdzogs so// // ye shes dag pa bdag nyid che/ /
de nas gsang ba rab bshad bya/ /gang gi cho ga thams cad kyis/ /'khor lo chen po brtan 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid/ /sa yi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /gsang ba'i dam bcas yi rang

bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dag pa/ /rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /ye shes dag pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin gyur nas ni/ /mtshan nyid dag ni yang dag brtag /rnal 'byor dpe

byed don ldan pa/ /mtshan nyid rjes su brtag par bya/ /rdo rje'i thugs kyi rjes sbyor bas/ /ye shes dag pa yang dag gzung / /mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog /ye shes bzhugs pa kun du bshad/ /de nas ye shes

dam pa yis/ /'jig rten 'das pa rab gzhug bya/ /mtshan nyid chen po dang ldan pa'i/ /rtogs pa'i sa la yang dag brten/ /rnal 'byor pa yi spyod yul mchog /rdo rje chos ni yid 'ong ba'o/ /thim dang chos sku zhes

bya dang / /bsdigs dang 'od zer lnga pa dang / /glog dang chu zla zhes bya bas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes yang dag 'thob/ /chu yi zla ba bzang po yis/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor spang bar bya/ /nyi ma lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /rigs chos skar

ma zhes bya ba/ /nyon mongs gnod pa 'joms byed pa/ /e ma'o gsang ba chen por bshad/ /gsang ba zhes bya rdor 'od 'byung / /gzhan yang zla ba phyed par 'dod/ /pho nya'i dkyil 'khor kha T+wA~M ga /bcing ba rtse gsum

sbyor las byung / /lcags kyu shin du 'bar ba dang / /gtum po rdo rje can gyi tshogs/ /rtogs pa'i gnas ni yongs 'gyur ba/ /thob byed rdo rje chen por 'dod/ /kun gyi gong ma'i 'og ma yis/ /nyi tshe ba de spang bar bya/ /

mchog tu gsang ba rdzogs so// // de nas mchog tu gsang ba rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul can/ zab pa/ tshul rgya che ba mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul las kyi tshogs ston pa/ dga' ba chen po'i bkod

pas kun khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la sogs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'byung ba rol pa'i 'khor lo chen po 'di las phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud mchog ces bya ba

'byung ste/ gsang ba mchog tu rgya che ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab las rnams ston/ /rol pa'i 'khor lo chen po ru/ /chos kyi mdzod ni 'dzin par bya/ /re shig dang por las kyi tshogs bstan par bya ste/ 'di lta ste hU~M 'khor lo'i dkyil

'khor gzung ba yi/ /sbyor thabs yi ge hU~M brjod de/ /'di yis kyang ni rgyal po dang / /phyag rgya'i rgyal mo brgya ru 'gyur/ /gnyis pa ni byang chub chen po'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul la 'jug pa yin no/ /

'di lta ste hU~M/ 'dis ni phyag rgya zhes bya yi/ /yi ge hU~M ni brtan par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal mo rnam pa stong / /gsum pa phyag rgya stong phrag ni/ /brgya yi tshogs su 'gyur ba yin/ /sangs rgyas 'khor

lor 'jug pa yi/ /yi ge hU~M gis brtan par 'gyur/ /hU~M rnal 'byor bzhi pa'i dbye ba ni/ /brgya phrag khri ru 'dir 'gyur ro/ /rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal mo kun hU~M bcas/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya ji snyed yod/ /mngag bzhug

pa ni bye bar 'gyur/ /rtse gsum la sogs mtshon cha ni/ /rtag tu phyag rgya'i rgyal po yin hU~M/ /de nas sngags kyi tshogs 'byung ste/ /Tag gi bcu/ maT nyi shu/ phaT sum bcu/ raT bzhi bcu/ baT lnga bcu/ riT drug bcu/

kha Ta bdun bcu/ waT brgyad bcu/ taT dgu bcu/ taT brgya/ ka ta ni la na stong yin/ /ta dang wa zhes bya ba dang / /Da ni rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur/ /yi ge Da ni lan gsum sbyar/ /yi ge a yang rnam pa bzhi/ /yi ge ba ni rnam pa

lnga/ /yi ge a ni lan drug sbyar/ /ka ni lan bdun yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge d+ha ni lan brgyad sbyar/ /yi ge sha ni phyad tu 'gyur/ /khiT ni stong phrag brgya ru 'gyur/ /stong phrag brgya las rnal 'byor gyis/ /phyag rgya'i

rgyud ni btu bar bya/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i drug pa gsang ba'i tshogs chen po'i mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po shin du

gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rdo rje rtse mo las/ byang chub pa'i tshul rgya chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba yang rdzogs so// // de nas byang chub

sems dpa'i tshul rgya chen po 'di las dkyil 'khor chen po'i dang por phyag rgya dang nye ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes 'byung ste/ gang tshe rdo rje slob dpon dang / /rdo rje slob mar gyur pa na/ /phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bcing / /

gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas/ /gang tshe rdo rje sems dpa' 'ching / /rdo rje khu tshur dam du 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje rgyal po 'ching / /rdo rje gnod sbyin rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje chags pa 'ching / /rdo rje srin po rab tu 'ching / /

gang tshe rdo rje legs pa 'ching / /rdo rje las ni rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje rin chen 'ching / /rdo rje smra ba rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje gzi brjid 'ching / /rdo rje rgyu ni rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'ching / /rdo rje rnon po

rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje bzhad pa 'ching / /rdo rje chos ni rab tu bcing / /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yang dag sbyar/ /phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya brtan par 'gyur/ /mchod pa'i

phyag rgya ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyus bkug nas su/ /rdo rje'i mdas ni dgang bar bya/ /rdo rje'i mdas ni 'phangs nas su/ /rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis bsgrub bya/ /phyag rgya ji bzhin bkrol nas ni/ /de ni

bcing ba rab tu bya/ /mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchod par 'gyur/ /de bzhin g.yon pas gar bya zhing / /g.yas pas khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /dpral bar yongs su bskor nas su/ /kha

yi mdun du dgod par bya/ /rdo rje nyi ma bzhad pas bgad/ /mnyam zhing cung zad gdangs te gnas/ /ral gri dri ma med snang bas/ /rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya/ /rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo ni/ /yang dag bsgreng ba legs par bsgrub/ /

de nas spyi gtsug kha dag tu/ /las byas dkyil 'khor mchod pa na/ /rigs kyi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /legs par bsgrubs pas gtam 'grub bya/ /dang por bdag nyid rdo rje sems/ /de bzhin lha nyid brtag par bya/ /

brtul zhugs sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rigs kyi lha nyid bsgrub par bya/ /'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod/ /ji ltar rigs de bzhin 'khor lo/ /ji ltar dgod pa de bzhin 'gyur/ /ji skad gsungs pa dgongs pa bzhin/ /

mdor bsdu na ni rnam pa lnga/ /rdo rje rin chen de bzhin chos/ /pad ma sna tshogs shin du bstan/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gsang / /'khor lo rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /gsang ba rnam pa du ru 'gyur/ /gsang ba rnam pa lnga ru

brjod/ /rgyas pa'i sgo nas rnam pa mang / /sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang / /chos dang las ni grags chen no/ /cho ga rnam pa du ru brjod/ /'dor na rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /mngon spyod

kyi ni rtog pa la/ /rdo rje sbyor ba las byung du/ /rdo rje sbyor ba bla med pa/ /tshad med bgrang du med pa yis/ /ji ltar gdul bya rnams kyi khams/ /de bzhin rdo rje sbyor 'byung rnams/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud du ji ltar brjod/ /gsang ba

lnga ldan gang yin pa'i/ /de ni rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya/ /dbang bskur phyag rgya chen po dang / /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor 'byung / /ji ltar gsang ba'i rigs la byung / /gang zhig sngon du chos nyid snang / /yid la byed pa dang

ldan pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi thabs chen po/ /de bzhin gsang ba rab tu brtag /'di yi rtag tu de nyid rigs/ /rdo rje'i ye shes ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar bsgoms pas rdo rje can/ /mngon par sbyor ba de nyid rig /de tshe

ye shes rang bzhin sems/ /de nyid ye shes brtan par 'gyur/ /mchog tu gsang ba ci 'drar brjod/ /phyag rgya rnam pa lnga ldan pa/ /de ni mchog tu gsang ba bsgrags/ /phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bsdu/ /nye bar bzhad pa'i

mchod pa'o/ /de nyid kyang ni ji lta bu/ /rig pa'i bsgom pa bstan pa dang / /ting 'dzin sgo dang yang dag ldan/ /rig pa'i lha mo'i 'khor gyi mchog /de nyid du ni rtag tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje phra mo ji ltar brjod/ /shes rab can gyis

bdag bsam bya/ /da ni su zhig bdag mi dmigs/ /'byung ba bzhi yi rang bzhin lus/ /'byung ba rnams las ji ltar 'byung / /de nas lus 'di thams cad ni/ /rnal 'byor spyi bo nas brtsams te/ /rkang pa yi ni mthil

bar du/ /mi gtsang rdzas ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba'i rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /yang na bdag nyid bsam par bya/ /yang na snying ga'i dbus su ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /yang na zla gnyis yang dag ldan/ /

dbus su rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /yang na rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa/ /lus kun brtan par spro bar bya/ /yang na rdo rje bdag nyid sku/ /rdo rje'i dngos po rnam spangs pa'i/ /yang na mkha' mtshungs chos shes pa'i/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor

yang dag gzung / /lce ni rkan la sbyar byas te/ /sna yi rtse mor blta bya zhing / /rdo rje phra mo bde reg pas/ /sems ni mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur/ /rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg la/ /rtag tu mtshan ma'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mtshan

ma de ni spro byas te/ /phyogs kun du ni yongs su spro/ /s+pha ra Na badzra/ ci ste sems ni spro bar 'dod/ /phyogs rnams kun du yongs su spro/ /sna yi rtse mor phyin bar du/ /sems ni slar yang bsdu bar bya/ /sa~M hA ra Na badzra/

de nas brtsams te mnyam bzhag pas/ /gang zhig cung zad ci bsgom pa'i/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med cing / /gzung dang 'dzin pa spang ba'o/ /badzra badzra tiSh+tha badzra/ sems can gang la byams pa ni/ /rtag tu brtan par

dmigs nas su/ /sems ni spro ba'i spyod pa yis/ /phyogs rnams kun du yongs su spro/ /ma hA badzra mai tri s+pha ra Na/ sdug bsngal kun la yang dag gnas/ /sems can 'di rnams rab tu dka'/ /snying rje chen po'i

sbyor ba yis/ /phyogs rnams kun du yongs su spro/ /ma hA kA ru Ni s+pha ra Na/ mya ngan 'das la btang snyoms gzhag /sems can don ni yang dag brtsam/ /kye ma sems can 'di 'dul dka'/ /phyogs rnams kun du yongs

su spro/ /ma hA u pa k+Sha~M s+pha ra Na/ thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/ /gzod nas dag pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /kun nas nyon mongs mi dmigs 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das pa grol ba'ang med/ /sarba bud d+ha pra mo d+ha s+pha ra Na/

mkha' 'am gzhan gyi phyogs dag tu/ /rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /snying ga'i rdo rje byang chub sems/ /shin du mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /go rim ji lta ba bzhin du phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen

po/ /pad ma'i chos nyid bsgom par bya/ /rnam pa mchog rnams kun ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya/ /bud d+ha a nu smri t+yA bi sha / zla ba'i dkyil

'khor dbus su ni/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /rang gi snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du/ /zla bsgom rmad byung rnal 'byor che/ /sa man ta b+ha dra A be sha /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom

bar bya/ /rang gi snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du/ /zla bsgom rmad byung rnal 'byor che/ /sa man ta b+ha dra A be sha /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rang bdag nyid ni rdo rje'i gzugs/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' cho ga bzhin/ /badzra sa twa/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' cho ga bzhin/ /badzra sa twa/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /snying gar zla ba'i dbus

su ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /badzra sa twa sa mA d+hi dz+nyA nA be sha / rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid/ /bsgom zhing snying gar zla ba'i dkyil/ /dbus su sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /

ta thA ga to ha/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam bsgom pa/ /rnam pa brgya dang rtsa bcu ni/ /rgyas pa ru ni ci rigs par/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/ /rdo rje phra mo rdzogs so// // 'jig rten pa ni ji ltar 'dod/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni gter gnas pa/ /

snying gar yongs su bsgom par bya/ /sa yi gnas kyang bsgoms na ni/ /gter dag rab tu mthong bar 'gyur/ /badzra ni d+hi/ rin chen chen po'i rdo rje gzugs/ /nam mkha' la ni yongs su bsgom/ /gang du lhung bar mthong ba ni/ /

de ni gter yod shes par bya/ /rat+na ni d+hi/ lce la pad+ma'i gzugs dag ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /de na yod ces bcas nas ni/ /rdo rje'i lce nyid rang nyid smra/ /d+harma ni d+hi/ lus kun rnal 'byor chen po yis/ /

rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /kun du babs nas gar lhung ba/ /de na gter yod bstan pa yin/ /karma ni d+hi/ gter shes pa rdzogs so// // rdo rje dbab pa 'byung ba yin/ /chu ni rdo rje'i gzugs rang bzhin/ /sgom zhing rdo rje'i shugs

kyis ni/ /chu yi steng du 'gro bar bya/ /badzra dzA la/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs su ni/ /rdo rje sems sogs 'dod pa rnams/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom bya ste/ /'dod pa'i gzugs nyid thob par 'gyur/ /badzra rU pa/ chos kun mkha'

dang mtshungs pa ste/ /bdag ni nam mkha' zhes rang nyid/ /de nyid dag pa bsgom bya ste/ /de ni mi snang ba nyid 'gyur/ /badzra A kA sha / rdo rje'i skas la 'dug nas ni/ /'dzeg pa ru ni bsgom byas na/ /ji srid tu ni 'dzeg pa'i

gnas/ /de srid nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /badzra ma ha~M/ mi snang ba dang / mkha' la 'gro ba dang / chu'i steng du 'gro bar bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid shes pa rdzogs so// // zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas su/ /rdo rje sems

dpar rnam par bsgom/ /lag na rdo rje bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /badzra d+hA ra/ zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas su/ /rdo rje rin chen bdag rang nyid/ /rab tu rin chen bsgoms nas ni/ /rin chen rig

pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rata na d+hA ra/ zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas su/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rang bdag nyid/ /lag pa pad ma dag tu bsgom/ /pad mo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /pad ma d+hA ra/ zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug

nas su/ /rdo rje'i las su yang dag brtan/ /lag tu las ni bsgom byas na/ /las kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /karma d+ha ra/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid rdzogs so// // phyag rgya kun gyi ting nge 'dzin/ /

nam mkha' dbyings su kun khyabs nas/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod/ /de srid skad cig gis 'phar 'gyur/ /badzra/ dngos grub kyi ni ting 'dzin ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings su kun bsams nas/ /mngon par shes

pa lnga thob cing / /myur du ye shes rang grub 'gyur/ /shud d+ha/ shud d+ha/ rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun/ /nam mkha'i dbyings su kun bsams nas/ /rjes su dran pa bstan pa yin/ /myur du rin chen 'dzin

mtshungs 'gyur/ /badzra badzra/ thams cad sangs rgyas gzugs rang bzhin/ /nam mkha'i dbyings su mos byas nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du 'gyur/ /bud d+ha bud d+ha/

mchog gi dngos grub rdzogs so// // rang nyid rdo rje khu tshur ni/ /chags pa'i dga' bas mig gdangs pa/ /de yis gang la bltas pa ni/ /des kyang rdo rje can du mthong / /oM badzra driSh+Ti ma Ta/ gsal zhing rab tu 'bar

ba'i mig /mig 'bras kun du 'dren byed pa/ /'bar ba'i lta ba zhes su brjod/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed pa/ /dIpa ta dr-iSh+Ta a~M ku shi dzaH/ khro gnyer bsnyer ba rab 'joms pa/ /khros pas mig ni rab tu g.yo/ /
