khro bo'i lta ba la brten nas/ /'jig rten gsum yang gzhom par bya/ /kro d+ha dr-iSh+Ti hriH/ ri rab ri bo ma d+hA ra/ /brtan zhing mi 'dzums pa yi mig /byams pa'i lta ba zhes bshad de/ /gdon dang rims dang dug 'joms pa'o/ /

dr-i D+ha tiSh+Ta tra~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / chad pa gcad pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa'i las rdzogs so// // bde ba gzhan ni yod nyid min/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka'

thub ches/ /'on kyang dgug pa bde ba ste/ /de ni kun las khyad par 'phags/ /dus 'dir skal ba chen po ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po byed pa las/ /dngos grub med kyang bde ba gang / /bde ba kun las khyad par 'phags/ /lha

dang mi yi 'jig rten pa'i/ /bde ba bsdus par 'gyur ba yis/ /rdo rje slob dpon bde ba gang / /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /yang na gang zhig dngos grub thob/ /sangs rgyas nyid tu rab shes bya/ /rang gis rtogs pa gang

yin pa/ /gzhan dag gang gis shes par 'gyur/ /sar chud rgyal ba'i gnas dang ldan/ /gsang ba'i dngos grub ster mdzad pa/ /bde ba thob pa gang yin pa/ /de ni gsang ba 'dzin ji bzhin/ /gsang ba yi ni tshogs chen po/ /

'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa/ /sa thob par ni shes bya ste/ /mi ldog rgyal ba'i bdag nyid sras/ /rgyal ba'i gnas kyi sa thob kyang / /yid ches par ni mi 'gyur te/ /de yis sa brgyad kyi bar du/ /theg pa dman pa spong

mi 'gyur/ /gsang chen rtog pa 'di ru ni/ /zhugs pa bdag nyid rgyal ba'i sras/ /theg chen la ni gzhol ba rnams/ /yid ches par ni 'gyur ba ste/ /gsang ba yi ni phan yon ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni rab tu mkhyen/ /

'dir ni yon tan mdor bsdus pa/ /sangs rgyas bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /yon tan gyi dbang du byas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// // byed pa po dang skyed byed med/ /las dang 'bras bu gang las bshad/ /ces ji skad bshad pa

la/ /nga ni byed po skyed byed dang / /nga ni skye dgu'i bdag po yin/ /nga ni sna tshogs bdag po ste/ /byed po skyed byed mes po yin/ /yang gsungs pa/ dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po/ /sems dpa'i snying po zhes
byar bshad/ /nga ni de bzhin gshegs snying po/ /sems can thams cad bdag dang mtshungs/ /mya ngan 'das bcas sa 'og steng / /sa bla 'jig rten 'di sems can/ /ma lus srid pa dag gi gnas/ /sems
tsam du ni rab tu 'jug /sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/ /de ni byed po 'byin byed brjod/ /nga ni rgyal po sems dbang phyug /ci phyir nga ni byed por bshad/ /ji skad gsang ba gzhan las gsungs/ /nga
nyid rang las byung ba ste/ /mya ngan 'das bcas sa 'og steng / /sa bla srid gsum 'jig rten gsum/ /gang zhig gnas zhes bya ba'i sems/ /gnas med las byung gang yin pa/ /snying po de bzhin gshegs

dag pa/ /de nyid rang byung nga nyid do/ /nga ni rdo rje can yang yin/ /sdug bsngal thams cad spangs pa dang / /nyes pa thams cad zad pas na/ /nga ni byang chub sems rdo rje/ /nga nyid rang nyid byung ba'o/ /nga nyid yang ni khyab 'jug ste/ /
gzung ba la sogs kun spangs pa'i/ /dag pa de bzhin nyid rnam shes/ /bdag dang nyon mongs med pa ste/ /de bas nga ni khyab 'jug bshad/ /nga ni de bzhin nyi ma ste/ /ci phyir de nyid ces bshad

pa/ /zab mo'i chos ni ngas rtogs pa/ /de phyir rang byung nga nyid ni/ /nyi ma zhes ni bya bar brjod/ /nga ni zla ba ru brjod de/ /nga ni chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /zhi ba ru ni rtogs par bshad/ /de bas zhi ba chen po yis/ /

nga ni zla ba blo gros ches/ /nga ni de bzhin gshin rje ste/ /ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /ye shes chen po lhag par bshad/ /de nyid rtogs pa gang yin pa/ /gshin rje nga ste gshin rje 'dzin/ /dbang po ste/ dbang po mi

'phrul zhes bya ba/ /'khor ba las rgal pha rol phyin/ /ye shes nor ni bsgrubs pa yis/ /nga ni dbang byed dbang po yin/ /skye dgu yi ni bdag po ste/ /chos rnams kun gyi rnam pa ni/ /skye ba rtsa nas 'don byed pa/ /

sdug bsngal chen po yongs su shes/ /de phyir nga ni skye dgu'i bdag /nga bdag nyid ni mes po ste/ /nga yis bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs nas/ /thar pa'i grong khyer chen po ru/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bas/ /

nga nyid kho na mes po yin/ /nga ni 'dod pa'i 'jig rten yin/ /ngo bo nyid dang longs spyod rdzogs/ /sprul pa'i sku ni rab 'jug byed/ /rol chen 'jig rten zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten lta ba ston byed yin/ /srid pa'i 'jigs pa

las bsgral yin/ /nyon mongs chen po rnam par spang / /srid par bshad de/ srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed pa/ /nga ni srid pa'i rgyal po che/ /khams gsum pa ni/ rgyud ni khams zhes rab tu brjod/ /byang chub

sems shes bya bar bshad/ /nga ni theg pa gsum 'dzin pas/ /nga ni khams gsum pa ru bshad/ /sa 'og ni/ yang dag de nyid rdo rje che/ /stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces bshad/ /ji ltar sa ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /

de bzhin nga ni chos 'dzin pa/ /sa steng ni/ sa steng nam mkha' zhes su brjod/ /nga ni rang bzhin mkha' mtshungs/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med pa/ /nga ni sa steng de nyid bshad/ /me ni/ nga ni gzod nas ma skyes 'byung ba med/ /

bdag min bdag med nga ni skye dgu'i bdag /srid pa'i 'khri shing gis bcings sems can gdungs/ /nga ni grol byed 'khri shing dag byed pa/ /rlung ni/ mtshan ma rnam par bsgoms nas ni/ /mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas/ /

byang sems 'khri shing zhags pa dag /'thor byed de bzhin rlung yin no/ /nga ni dbang phyug chen po ste/ /rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po chen po byed/ /nga ni sangs rgyas dbang phyug gzhan ci smos/ /bdud rtsi chen po thar pa'i grong

khyer che/ /nga ni dbang phyug dbang bsgyur dbang phyug che/ /nga ni brtul zhugs zhes bshad de/ /nga ni nyon mongs 'joms par bshad/ /nga ni rga dang 'chi ba las/ /nges par grol bas tshangs par bshad/ /'jig rten
gsum gyi lus su ni/ /zhags pa zhe sdang gti mug ni/ /khams gsum 'jig rten gsum yin no/ /nga ni srungs ma bran du 'gyur/ /de rnams 'byung bas khams gsum nga / /gdong drug ni/ sangs rgyas rdo rje rin

chen dang / /chos dang las dang gsang 'dzin bcas/ /rnam pa drug ni 'khor lo che/ /nga ni gdong drug mchog chen po/ /gzhan yang / bza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa/ /nga bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /
gang zhig gdon la sogs pa kun/ /sems las kun du byung ba'i brlabs/ /nga ni thugs 'dzin rgyal po ste/ /de bas nga ni srid pa'i gnas/ /nga ni 'dod pa ste/ thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/ /
dgongs pa mthar thug nga yis bshad/ /nga ni sems can kun la 'dod/ /de bas nga ni 'dod par bshad/ /thar pa nga ste/ nga nyid thar cing sems can kun/ /so sor yang ni grol bar byed/ /

thams cad zad pas na/ de ni byang chub sems rdo rje/ de bas rang byung nga nyid ni/ /thar par 'dzin pa'i rgyal po yin/ /nga ni dmyal ba ste/ nga ni bdag dang chos rnams min/ /nga ni chags sdang kun du bral/ /nga yis 'chi med
lam bstan pas/ /nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba pa/ /nga ni yi dgas te/ mngon par 'dod pa nga yis 'thob/ /sems can sgom pa smin par byed/ /nga yis dga' ba'i gnas thob pas/ /nga ni yi dgas yi dgas skyes/ /

dud 'gro nga ste dud 'gro skyes/ /'khor ba'i chu bo brgal dka' bas/ /sems can dag ni thams cad gnas/ /ji ltar mi shes rmongs gyur pa/ /de bzhin nga yis grol bar byed/ /gzhan yang nga ni chags pa ste/ /sems can grol

ba rjes chags phyir/ /srid pa gcod byed zhe sdang dang / /gsang mdzod 'dzin pas ser sna can/ /sems can 'dod pas 'dod pa dang / /sems can smin byed sems can nga / /gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal po gang / /de ni nga yi 'jigs

byed sras/ /des na gsang ba chen po yi/ /nga ni chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub gsang 'dzin po/ /de bas nga ni gsang ba'i bdag /yang na byin gyis rlob pa dang / /bsnyems bcas sgeg pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ /tha ni

de yi steng sbyar nas/ /gang du gsang bar brjod pa'o/ /da ra d+harma da ra gsang / /nga ni lnga lnga 'dzin pa yin/ /rma bya chen po mdzod ldan ma'i/ /nga ni gsang ba'i bdag por bshad/ /rtsa dang lpags pa nu mar ldan/ /mdzod sogs gsus pa

'phyang ba dang / /zla ba'i steng na gar byed pa/ /de rnams gsang ba'i rgyal po yin/ /sa la bsnyems pa'i gar byed pa/ /rdo rje gar byed skra dkar 'joms/ /dra ba spus len gsus pa can/ /mdzod ldan dang ni gos 'dzin ma/ /

yi ge ta 'don zla ba dang / /mchog dang 'jigs byed bzhin ldan ma/ /sgra gcan rdo rje rjes 'thun sgra/ /mche ba 'byin pa myos pas khyab/ /de bzhin spyod pa yang dag ldan/ /phreng ldan gti mug 'joms byed ma/ /spyan 'dren 'dus

byas thams cad ma/ /yun ring gar gyi tshogs ldan ma/ /rigs kyi gar na spyod ma dang / /'jigs byed rnams par 'jigs byed dang / /gar gyi gnas byed ces bya dang / /gar byed rdo rje'i gar byed ma/ /phul byung thams cad 'thor

byed ma/ /lnga phung skyabs dang 'dzin byed pa/ /rkang gdub kyis ni bdud kyi tshogs 'joms byed/ /'brug gi bdag po rkang gdub kyis 'dar byed/ /rkang gdub kyis ni yang yang bdag chan skyel/ /bskyod pa'i 'dar 'dar brtan pa

skyel byed pa/ /lag pa rked pa ji bzhin bskyod pa'o/ /gar gyi rol pas kun du sdud byed ma/ /rdo rje nyi ma sa yi gar/ /de bzhin na di ki si ri/ /zas chen gar ma'i gsang ba ste/ /de bas nga ni gsang ba'i bdag /hA hA hA thA pA tA

pa kA ta sa ra ma ra hU~M/ rnal 'byor chen po spyan 'dren ma/ /gus ldan ma dang sprul byed gzhan/ /'phrog ma 'joms byed gzhu ma dang / /snying po bdud ma sgra sgrogs ma/ /pheg rdob 'dzin dang drag po dang / /gzhan yang rdo rje ldan

par bshad/ /rta sgra'i tshogs ni drug ldan ma/ /'od tshogs kyis ni mtshan mo 'joms byed ma/ /seng ge yi ni nga ro sgra sgrogs pa/ /rta yi sgra sgrogs sgra gcan ma dang ni/ /gzhan yang gsang ba stug pos khrus byed ma/ /

sna tshogs ha ha sgra yis 'phrog bdag ma/ /spyan bzang yangs ma gsang ba ston byed ma/ /gzhan yang 'bad pas dga' ba nyid byed ma/ /gzhan yang spyan yangs uta pal gyis brgyan ma/ /sprin 'joms byed cing sa

rnams kun 'joms ma/ /seng ge'i bzhin rol gong nas go rim ldan/ /de 'dra'i 'khor ni dam pa dang ldan pa/ /gzhan yang gsang ba'i yid la ta~M sgrogs pa/ /de bzhin rim gyis dge legs nyid byed ma/ /Tu hU~M Tu hU~M

d+ha ri d+ha da ri/ ma hA shri ri sha yang na shri ya ri ka~M ma ta sa ta ka~M / de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba rdzogs so// // de yi dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mchog gis/ /rnal 'byor pa

ni rol byed na/ /des ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i mdo yi dbang bshad pa'i/ /sems can spyod pa ji lta bu/ /yang gsungs pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bshad pa/ /gsang ba yi ni rab sgrub pa/ /dang por
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /sgrub pa yi ni rol par bya/ /b+ha ga ci yin brjod par bya/ /'joms pas b+ha ga zhes su brjod/ /gang du nyon mongs 'joms byed pa/ /shes rab lus 'joms nyon mongs pa/ /de bas

shes rab b+ha gar brjod/ /de bas rtags ni ci yin brjod/ /rtags ni mtshan ma zhes byar bshad/ /blo ldan shes rab rtags las byung / /byang chub sems ni thabs chen po/ /de ni rtags su rab tu bsgrags/ /b+ha gar ling

ga bcug nas su/ /'khor lo'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs gang yin/ /mkhas pas sgo gnyis gzung bar bya/ /de ni bcug pa zhes bshad de/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur/ /de nas dgongs

pas bshad pa yi/ /b+ha ga ru ni rdzas bsgrub pa/ /gsang rgyud dbang po las gsungs bzhin/ /bsgrub pa dag ni ji ltar bya/ /b+ha gar gum gum phyung nas ni/ /mtshan ma yang ni gzhug par bya/ /rdzas rnams bzang

po thob par 'gyur/ /rnam pa bzhi yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /b+ha ga pad ma zhes byar brjod/ /mtshan ma rdo rje zhes bshad do/ /rdzas ni pad ma'i steng bzhag nas/ /rdo rje srub mas bsgrub par bya/ /shin du chags pas

'dod chags can/ /des ni gsang ba rab bsgrub 'gyur/ /'dod chags chags pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dngos grub chen po ji ltar 'gyur/ /'di ni chags can rab bsgrub 'gyur/ /bden pa nyid du yang dag bshad/ /'dod chags bral

ba gsang ba med/ /de ni gsang ba 'grub mi 'gyur/ /dad pa'i dad pa chen po yis/ /gsang ba'i sbyor ba las byung chags/ /bsgrub pa la ni 'jug 'gyur ba/ /de yis sgrub pa gdon mi za/ /chags dang bral ba'i sdig pa ni/ /gang

zhig gsang la chags bral 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub spyod byed pa/ /sdig chen kha na ma tho che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu smad/ /chos la kha na ma tho med/ /de yis gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur/ /rnam pa thams cad
nyon mongs kun/ /'joms pa 'dod chags mchog yin no/ /'dod chags zhe sdang sogs nyon mongs/ /rtogs dang mtshungs pa'i chos med do/ /skye dgu kun bsad bsod nams ji lta bu/ /ji srid 'khor bar bcings

bar du/ /srid pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba'i btson ra 'di ru ni/ /sems can kun gyis gzhom par bya/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa/ /des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur/ /nor ni 'khor ba zhes bshad de/ /sems can

de rnams nyon mongs 'gyur/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa/ /byang chub sems ni rab 'grub 'gyur/ /bud med rnams dang lhan cig rtse/ /des ni gsang ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang / /rig pa'i

lha mo bla med dang / /lhan cig rnal 'byor rol pa yis/ /rol pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te rigs ni 'grub 'dod na/ /brdzun pa'i tshig kyang smra bar bya/ /chos kun dngos po med pa ste/ /brjod min tshig gi spyod
yul min/ /med pa gang yin brdzun tshig ldan/ /rig pa'i bzlas pa bden pa yin/ /gal te dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub 'dod na/ /sems can gsad bya de bzhin bza' bar bya/ /sems can chags pa zhes bshad de/ /

ming dang gzugs la kun du chags/ /bkug nas zos par gyur na ni/ /bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/ /'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba ni/ /'khor ba spong ba gang yin pa/ /sems can don la rgyab phyogs
'gyur/ /blo ldan theg pa dman dga' ba/ /de ni rtag tu nyes ldan yin/ /mya ngan 'das la mngon dga' na/ /sems can don la phyir phyogs 'gyur/ /blo ldan theg pa dman dga' ba/ / de
This is a blank page without image
This is a blank page without image

ni rtag tu nyes ldan yin/ /ser sna can ni de yi rigs bsgrub 'gyur/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag 'gyur zhing / /srog gi phyir yang gtong mi byed/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs ldan 'gyur ba/ /des ni gsang ba rab

bsgrub 'gyur/ /drag dang ldan pa'i sems ldan pa/ /des ni 'grub par 'gyur bar 'dod/ /sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i phyir/ /rtag tu drag po nyid du 'gyur/ /sdig pa sdang ba rnams spong na/ /des ni gsang ba rab 'grub

'gyur/ /chos min spyod pa rnal 'byor mchog grub yin/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa chos shes pa/ /gang tshe spong bar gyur pa ni/ /rtag tu chos mchog spyod pa ste/ /des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur/ /srid gsum mngon par chags

pas rnal 'byor bsgrub/ /srid gsum la ni chags par 'gyur/ /sems tsam du ni rtogs pa'i phyir/ /de ni rnal 'byor bsgrub pa yin/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i 'dod chags rgyal 'gyur gang / /gsang ba chen por brtan par

bsgrub pa yin/ /'dod par bya ba 'dod pa ste/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags shes bshad do/ /rab tu dga' la chags pa ste/ /blo ldan blo gros de la chags/ /gci ba khyor ba gang 'thungs na/ /bshang ba cung zad bza' bar bya/ /

thams cad dag pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/ /myur du dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ /gci ba rdo rje zhes bshad de/ /bshang ba pad ma yang dag ldan/ /dga' ba'i chos la reg pas ni/ /de nas thar pa'i grong khyer 'gro/ /rnal 'byor

chen po b+ha ga 'thungs/ /rnal 'byor rab tu bsgrub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes gang / /b+ha ga yi ni sgra ru bsgrags/ /gang zhig bdud rtsi btung ba btung / /rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /bud med sdug dang
lhan cig tu/ /dkyil 'khor chen po brtag par bya/ /rigs kyi lha mo rnal 'byor byung / /rig pa sdug pa nyid yin te/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba brtag byas na/ /skad cig de la rang 'grub 'gyur/ /

khro zhing gtum la drag po ste/ /rdo rje yi ni rigs su 'gyur/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams la khro/ /'khor ba'i sbyor 'byung las sdang ba/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor phun tshogs 'gyur/ /rigs ni nyams par 'gyur ba yin/ /dge ba

thams cad spangs nas ni/ /chos min pa ni yang dag spyad/ /bya min byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnam par rtog pa kun spangs nas/ /dge ba la ni rab tu 'jug /chos la lta bar

gyur pa nyid/ /chos min kun du spyod mi bya/ /bya min gang zhig dngos med de/ /de nyid brtan par byed par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po de lta bus/ /rtog pa chen pos rab 'grub 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i drug pa

gsang ba'i tshogs chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba rtogs pa'i rgyal po chen po shin du gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rdo rje rtse mo las rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dgongs pa rnam par 'grel pa zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa gsum pa

rdzogs so// //rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mchog / gsang ba'i chos kyi gnas mchog tu gsang ba yang rdzogs so// // sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum gshegs pa sras bcas la/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas/ /mchog tu rmad byung rig pa'i rgyud/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad

par bya/ /hU~M a dza ka ra/ d+ha ra ho/ d+ha ra sa/ oM a dra na ha ha he wa ra/ d+hi d+ha d+ha/ d+hI d+hA ra Ni/ ma he to raM ka kra Na~M/ ka ba tse hU~M ba~M de la gsang ba mchog tu gsang / /ye shes dam pa'i rang bzhin che/ /rgyal po gsang ba'i

mdo dbang po/ /theg pa chen po kun du bsdus/ /rigs 'byung blo ldan chen po dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba dang / /rdo rje kun dbang cho ga ni/ /shin du rmad byung rab bshad bya/ /ngo bo nyid kyi

sku ru ni/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can kun 'byung / /rmad byung chos kyi rgyud chen po/ /thar pa mchog tu bstan pa ste/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug rnam snang mdzad/ /thugs ka nas ni rgyud 'di byung / /kun du bzang po rdo rje'i

bdag /phyag na rdo rje 'od po che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /don yod dbang phyug dam pa ste/ /theg pa chen po byang chub sems/ /bden pa dam tshig ces bya ba/ /thub pa chen po chos phung po/ /stong phrag dag ni grangs
med gsungs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog chen gyis/ /chos kyi mngon par rtogs pa bshad/ /so sor rtogs pa'i mngon rtogs dang / /de bzhin mngon par byang chub dang / /dpe byad mchog ni mngon du byung / /

de bzhin ye shes thob pa nyid/ /ye shes chen po'i chos 'di ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni mngon rtogs bshad/ /theg pa chen po'i mngon rtogs yin/ /shin du gsang ba'i tshul chen po/ /rang sems so sor rtogs pa ni/ /

byang chub sems dpa'i tshul chen po/ /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa mchog /theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ /mthar thug sa ste sa chen po/ /sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med/ /theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/ /ye shes

thob par rtogs byed pa/ /spyod pa bcu yi byang chub che/ /pha rol phyin pa dam pa bcu/ /sa bcu kun du rtogs pa ste/ /theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ /byang chub chen po rgya che ba/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog /

kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byang chub/ /theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /theg pa chen po chos kyi mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /
chos kyi gnas ni yongs su gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor shin du dag /mkha' mnyam dang ni mtshungs pa yin/ /gnas ngan len ni kun las grol/ /

rnam par rtog pa kun las grol/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun dag pa/ /dang por zla ba bzhin du mthong / /thugs rje'i brtse ba yang dag byung / /sems can yongs su 'dzin par byed/ /byang chub sems ni dag pa che/ /

sangs rgyas zhing ni gos pa med/ /dge ba'i chos kyis kun du gang / /nyon mongs thams cad nges par 'joms/ /zla chen gang ba'i dbus su ni/ /byang chub zla ba gnyis pa ste/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum byang chub/ /

yang dag blangs las byung ba nyid/ /dam pa'i chos mchog grangs med pa/ /sbyin pa'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan/ /sa dang sa ru rtogs byed pa/ /ye shes dag pa zag pa med/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /de ni

rdo rje shin du brtan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin/ /snang ba med cing gnas med pa/ /ma skyes ma byas dag pa ste/ /skyes dang 'jig pa rnam par spangs/ /mi tshig mi chod mi phyed pa/ /lhag ma med pa'i chos kyi sku/ /

rdo rje'i bdag nyid yang dag byung / /rdo rje'i sku ni bla na med/ /sku dang gsang ba de bzhin spyod/ /spyod yul kun du rtogs pa dang / /lnga po de dag kun thun mong / /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid can/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /

chos kyi ye shes bla na med/ /lnga po de dag gsang zhes bya/ /snying por yang ni de dag gsungs/ /gang phyir don kun grub pa'i phyir/ /sngon ni don kun grub par byed/ /bcom ldan kun du bzang po dang / /rdo rje'i las ni bla na med/ /

rdo rje'i dbyings ni brtan pa'i bdag /rnam par snang mdzad bla na med/ /de dag gsang ba'i mtshan yin te/ /rnal 'byor gyi ni gnas skyabs thob/ /de nas snying po ni/ oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+ha~M ka ro mi/ /oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+ta pA da yA mi/

oM tiSh+Tha badzra oM badzra Ata ma ko ha~M/ oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tA sta thA a ha~M/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /thub pa yi ni thugs kar bzhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsungs/ /rdo rje'i rigs pa 'di brjod do/ /oM sarba

ta thA ga ta a b+hi sa~M bo d+hi Di D+ha badzra tiSh+Tha/ sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad kyis/ /rig pa 'di ni brjod pas na/ /rnam par snang mdzad thub chen po/ /de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /

nyid kyi thugs las byung bar gyur/ /chos bzhi'i rnal 'byor chen po ni/ /byin nas lha mo dbang bskur 'gyur/ /sems can kun don yang dag ldan/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed/ /mkha' mtshungs brjod las

yang dag byung / /rin chen chen pos dbang bskur 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes gang / /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug chen po byin/ /bya ba kun la don yod
pa/ /dga' ldan la sogs rnam par 'phrul/ /gdul bar bya ba thabs kyi las/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba gang / /byang chub sems ni tshul chen po/ /nyon mongs kun
las rnam par grol/ /sangs rgyas gtso bo chen pos byin/ /dbang bskur tsam gyi mod la ni/ /gsang ba'i ming ni yang dag byung / /sangs rgyas kun bdag rgyal po ste/ /kun mchog dbang bskur dam pa'o/ /

de nas snying po ni oM sarba ta thA ga ta e shwa dz+ya a b+hi She ka hU~M/ de nas sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /chos ni mngon sum gyur mdzad pa/ /stug po'i gnas nas gshegs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas lhan cig sna

tshogs che/ /rnal 'byor dang bcas bdag nyid che/ /rdo rje'i dbang po'i gnas su gshegs/ /de nas ngo bo nyid sku las/ /slar yang byung ba spros par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las chen po/ /ci bzhin sngon gyi

rjes 'brangs nas/ /rdo rje'i dbus su bzhugs par gyur/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas mdzad pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni mdzad pa bstan/ /gsang ba rol pa'i 'khor lo ru/ /sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog /sangs

rgyas thams cad bdag nyid che/ /sna tshogs rnal 'byor bdag nyid che/ /'khor lo thams cad bzhugs par 'gyur/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du/ /ci bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /sangs rgyas rol pa

yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas ston pa bzhugs par 'gyur/ /dus gsum ye shes rjes 'thun ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rnal 'byor brjod/ /hU~M badzra sa twa/ oM badzra rata na/ /hrIHbadzra d+harma/ aHbadzra karma/ bskal pa grangs med

gsum sngon du/ /bcom ldan byang chub mdzad pa gang / /rnal 'byor sems dpa' bzhir bcas pa'i/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor snang bar bgyi/ /byang chub chen po chos kyi mchog /byang chub sems ni tshul chen po/ /rdo rje sems

dpa'i rang bzhin bgyi/ /zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang / /pha rol phyin pa spyad pa ni/ /sngon du bcom ldan spyad pa gang / /rdo rje rin chen sbyor ba yis/ /zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang / /theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/ /

chos kyi mchog ni rab rtogs pa/ /rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba yis/ /zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang / /sems can smin cing grol bar byed/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa rab tu 'jug /brtson 'grus dang ldan las chen po/ /zla ba yi ni

dkyil 'khor snang / /byang chub sems ni gsang chen po/ /bsod nams tshogs dang shes rab dang / /byang chub spyod pa rab sbyor ba/ /rgyal po bzhi ni rab tu 'byung / /go cha'i sbyor ba gang yin dang / /spyod pa de bzhin mngon

rtogs te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub che/ /rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung / /byang chub snying po mngon rtogs dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur dang / /chos kyi 'khor los brtul ba dang / /rgyal po bzhi ni rnam

par byung / /chos mchog mngon par rtogs pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin sgo gzungs dang ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thabs chen po/ /rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung / /rgyal chen rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / /de bzhin chos ni mngon rtogs
dang / /chos mchog byang chub chen po dang / /rnam pa bzhi ni yongs su byung / /mgon po thugs ga nas spros nas/ /rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung / /phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas ni/ /sa ni thams cad

g.yos byas nas/ /phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas ni/ /'od kyi snang bas gsal bar byas/ /mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /ched du brjod pa ched brjod do/ /e ma'o gsang ba'i chos chen po/ /e ma'o ye shes

bla na med/ /e ma'o rol pa'i 'khor lo'o/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas rmad byung che/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar ldan pa nyid/ /mi snang rang bzhin chos rnams ni/ /'di ni snang ba bcas par dmigs/ /

rgyal po rnal 'byor che de rnams/ /phyogs rnams kun du gsal byed cing / /chos kyi sku yi ting 'dzin brnyes/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs rmad byung ba/ /gang zhig shar gyi phyogs cha ru/ /sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun/ /rdo

rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /chos kyi dbyings su yang dag spros/ /chos kyi sku ru spros nas ni/ /chos kyi dbyings ni stug por 'gyur/ /gang phyir shar du yang dag byung / /mi bskyod pa ni bdag nyid byas/ /lho ru rdo rje rin

chen te/ /nub tu rdo rje chos yin no/ /byang du rdo rje las nyid de/ /chos kyi sku ru ldan par 'gyur/ /ma lus mchog tu bstan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad phyogs bzhi ru/ /mi bskyod rdo rje rin chen dbang / /don yod grub

pa bla na med/ /rgyal po bzhi ni phyogs bzhi ru/ /rdo rje'i steng du bzhugs par 'gyur/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams bzhi dag tu/ /mnyam par dmigs nas bzhugs par gyur/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyal po che/ /sangs rgyas

thams cad yang dag bsdus/ /chos dbyings brtan pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /gsang ba kun du khyab par bsdus/ /dbus su mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur ba/ /phyogs dang mtshams kyi sangs

rgyas kun/ /brtan par mdzad nas rab tu bzhugs/ /gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /thub pa'i skyes mchog mi bskyod pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/ /shar gyi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs/ /dbang bskur ba ni

rgyal po che/ /nam mkha' thub pa'i skyes mchog ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/ /lho yi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /dag pa'i chos 'dzin rgyal po che/ /chos 'dzin gtso bo chen po ni/ /sangs rgyas thams

cad brtan mdzad nas/ /nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa 'dzin rgyal po/ /don yod grub pa bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/ /byang gi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /mi bskyod

rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /mkha' snying rin chen 'byung ldan yin/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag med/ /rdo rje las ni don yod grub/ /gsang zhing shin du gsang ba mchog /chos dbyings brtan pa gang yin pa/ /de nyid mgon po rnam

snang mdzad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag por bshad/ /sangs rgyas thams cad phyogs bzhi ru/ /sbyin pa bzhi ni rab tu bshad/ /phyogs mtshams drug ni brtan mdzad nas/ /rnam par snang mdzad yang dag ldan/ /shar gyi

sangs rgyas dbang phyug rgyal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs mi mnga'/ /thub pa mi bskyod snang ba des/ /snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /hU~M badzra satwa/ dzaHbadzra rA dza/ ho badzra rA ga /sA badzra sA d+hu/ dam tshig sems
dpa' zhes bya ba/ /de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' sogs/ /'jigs pa mi mnga' sems dpa' bzhi/ /mgon po yi ni thugs las byung / /phyag na rdo rje bzang po mchog /rdo rje lcags kyu chen po bsnams/ /rdo rje

chags pa bdud chen po/ /rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje rgyal po bzhi thub pa/ /thub pa'i thugs ka nas byung ba/ /grangs bzhi dang ni ldan pa dag /'khor lo'i rim gyis bzhugs par gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen skal ba che/ /

rin chen 'byung ldan rab grags pa/ /lha yi bdag po sangs rgyas chos/ /snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /oM badzra rata na/ oM badzra te dzaH/ trA~M badzra ke tu/ hA badzra hA sa/ rdo rje rin chen stobs po che/ /grangs

bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rin chen rgyal po las byung ba/ /thub pa'i thugs ka nas byung ba/ /rdo rje rin chen rin po che/ /rdo rje gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin du mthong / /rdo rje bzhad pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /

de dag re re las kyang ni/ /rgyal po grangs med rab tu byung / /g.yas dang g.yon dang brgyab dag dang / /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du bzhugs/ /dag pa'i chos ni ye shes che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/ /

shes rab pha rol phyin dag pas/ /snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /hrIHbadzra d+harma/ d+hIHbadzra tIk+Sh+Na/ ma~M badzra he ru du/ ra~M badzra b+hA Sha/ chos kyi rgyal po bzhi yang ni/ /mgon po'i thugs ka nas byung ba/ /sems can kun la

phan don du/ /'khor lo rim bzhin bzhugs par gyur/ /chos rnams kun la don yod pa/ /spyod pa yi ni slob dpon mchog /don yod grub pa rgyal po ches/ /snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /ka~M badzra karma/ ha~M

badzra rak+Sha/ hU~M badzra yak+Sha/ ba~M badzra muSh+Ti/ kun kyang 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ /ye shes dag pa mchog gi rnams/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'khor lo ni/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog /sngon gyi byang chub sems

gang ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par byung / /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni/ /rdo rje rin chen nyid du 'gyur/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa/ /de ni rdo rje chos mchog ldan/ /thabs la mkhas pas 'khor lo ni/ /rdo rje las

su rnam par 'phrul/ /de nas chos ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rten/ /byung gyur byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa bla na med/ /byang chub sems ni mchog tu 'dzin/ /dag

pa'i chos gyis 'dul mdzad pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che/ /dbu ma'i chos las rnam par byung / /gzhan yang rjes su brtse dang de bzhin sbyin/ /shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan/ /chos kyi rgyal po bzhi po de/ /rnam

par snang mdzad thugs las byung / /'du shes 'du shes med pa min/ /btags pa ma yin gnas pa med/ /bdag dang chos nyid lta ba min/ /rnam rtog las ni byung ba min/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru ni/ /so sor snang ba yang

dag byung / /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yis ni/ /chos kyi longs spyod 'di lta bu/ /thams cad brjod pa dang bral zhing / /zhi dang phra ba blta bar dka'/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni dgongs mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas
rnam 'phrul mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nyid theg pa che rang bzhin/ /mdzad chen po yi rang bzhin mchog /shes rab chen po thabs chen po/ /theg pa chen po'i mngon par bsdus/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mngon
par rtogs/ /sngon du bcom ldan mdzad gang yin/ /sems dpa' bzhi po de rnams te/ /theg chen mngon par rtogs par 'dod/ /byang chub kyi ni sems de las/ /thub pa mi bskyod rnam par byung / /

sems de yang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /rnam pa bzhi ni yang dag byung / /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /rdo rje phyag na rdo rje yin/ /sgrol dang grol dang dbugs 'byin pa/ /lcags kyu 'dzin pa rab tu gnas/ /sems dpa'

bstan pa don yod pa/ /ye shes de nyid shin du chags/ /slar yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ /legs pa las ni yang dag byung / /gang zhig mgon po thub 'byin pa/ /sems can rjes su 'dzin mdzad pa/ /rin chen 'byung

ldan zhes bya ba/ /de ni slar yang rnam pa bzhi/ /chos kyi sbyin pa rin po che/ /mi 'jigs gzi brjid yang dag gnas/ /byams pa rgyal mtshan yang dag brjod/ /zang zing bzhad par yang dag ldan/ /shes rab pha rol

phyin rgyal po/ /tshe dpag med ni rnam pa bzhi/ /so sor rig pa mngon par rdzogs/ /ting nge 'dzin sgo pad ma can/ /sdug bsngal gcod pa shin du rno/ /chos kyi 'khor lo tshe dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam

'phrul gzhan/ /brjod du med pa'i chos kyi mchog /don yod grub pa mdzad pa ste/ /thabs de yang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /sems can la sogs 'dul ba las/ /rdo rje las ni mchod pa che/ /theg pa gzhan du mi 'jug pa/ /rdo rje

bsrung bar rab tu brjod/ /gdug pa 'dul zhing nges byed pa/ /phyir mi ldog pa khu tshur yin/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i mtshan ni rdo rje sems dpa'/ rdo rje rgyal po/ rdo rje chags pa/ rdo rje legs pa/ rdo rje rin chen/

rdo rje gzi brjid/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan/ rdo rje bzhad pa/ rdo rje chos/ rdo rje rnon po/ rdo rje rgyu/ rdo rje smra ba/ rdo rje las/ rdo rje bsrung ba/ rdo rje gnod sbyin/ rdo rje khu tshur/ de la dang po ni rdo rje sems dpa'/ rdo rje chos/ rdo rje rin chen rdo rje

las de nas rnam grangs mi bskyod pa/ rin chen 'byung ldan 'od dpag tu med pa don yod par grub pa/ de nas 'di rnams gsang ba'i snying po ni hU~M oM A ha/ rgyal po'i snying po ni oM hU~M hrI hoH/ bcu drug gi snying po ni hU~M

dzaHho sA/ oM A~M twA~M ha/ hrI d+hi ma~M ra~M ka~M ha~M hU~M ba~M/ /shin du gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa rnam pa bcu drug tu yang dag par byung ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa'o/ /byang chub spyod pa'i

mthu yis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi pha rol byon/ /de bas pha rol phyin ldan pa/ /rdo rje sems mar brjod par bya/ /bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi/ /so sor rtogs pa mngon par rdzogs/ /chos bzhi gcig tu gyur pa ni/ /rdo rje rin chen

ma ru brjod/ /gsang ba'i chos kyi ye shes ni/ /de nyid pha rol phyin pa mchog /pha rol phyin pa che las byung / /rdo rje chos mar brjod par bya/ /sbyor ba yang dag shes pa gang / /rdo rje las mas brjod par bya/ /rgyal po pha rol phyin bzhi ni/ /rdo rje

pha rol phyin pa mchog /gang phyir rnam par rol pa mchog /sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ /brgyan pa'i lus can yid 'phrog pa/ /phreng ba tshul khrims pha rol phyin/ /ched du brjod pa ched du brjod/ /glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol

phyin/ /myur du sangs rgyas ster byed pa/ /gar ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin/ /'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa/ /me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin/ /kun du mtshungs par 'phro ba yi/ /bdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin/ /

dri nga mi dge las phyir phyogs/ /thabs ni dri dang yang dag ldan/ /phyogs rnams kun du snang byed pa/ /smon lam snang ba chen po yin/ /thob pa'i pha rol phyin zhes pa/ /stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog /mi shes mun

pa 'joms 'byed pa/ /lha mo ye shes pha rol phyin/ /bdud rnams thams cad pham byed pa/ /lha mo mi thub pha rol phyin/ /byang chub rdzogs pa'i byang chub che/ /rdo rje'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor

mdzad ma/ /bdag med chos kyi rang bzhin mchog /rdo rje'i lha mo yang dag byung / /rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog /de nas de rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming ni rdo rje sems ma/ rdo rje rin chen ma/ rdo rje chos ma/ rdo rje las ma/

rdo rje sgeg mo/ rdo rje phreng ba ma/ rdo rje glu ma/ rdo rje gar ma/ rdo rje me tog ma/ rdo rje bdug pa ma/ rdo rje dri ma/ rdo rje mar me ma/ rdo rje tho ba ma/ rdo rje ye shes ma/ rdo rje mi thub ma/ rdo rje las ma/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs

chen po/ /rnam pa bzhir ni rab tu 'jug /sems can dgug pa'i thabs chen po/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhes byar bshad/ /byang chub spyod pa la spyod la/ /rdo rje zhags par rab tu bsgrags/ /theg pa gzhan la 'dod

med pa/ /de ni rdo rje lcags sgrogs bshad/ /chos rnams thams cad skye ba med/ /rab tu 'od gsal bzod nas zhi/ /rdo rje theg pa theg chen po/ /rdo rje dril bu zhes byar brjod/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i

ming dag ni rdo rje lcags kyu/ rdo rje zhags pa/ rdo rje lcags sgrogs/ rdo rje dril bu/ de nas pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs kyi 'khor lo de dag thams cad kyi snying po ni hU~M trA~M hrI ho/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi'o/ /

dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ 'khor lo'i rol pa la gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /chos kyi longs spyod rdo rje can/ /chos sku bla na med par 'gyur/ /dbus kyi sangs rgyas sangs rgyas bzhi/ /'khor lo lnga dang yang

dag ldan/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun/ /rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 'thob mdzad la/ /re re zhing yang rdo rje ni/ /grangs med pas kyang yongs su bskor/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung / /dag pa'i chos kyi tshul

chen po/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni oM satwa badzri oM rata na badzri/ oM d+harma badzri/ oM karma badzri/ oM badzra lA s+ye/ oM badzra mA le/ oM badzra gI te/ oM badzra nIr t+ya/ oM badzra puSh+pe/ oM badzra d+hu pe/ oM badzra gan d+he/ oM badzra

A lo ke/ oM badzra ang gu sha / oM badzra pA sha oM badzra s+pho Ta/ oM badzra g+haN+Da/ de nas 'di dag thams cad kyi thun mong gi snying po ni hU~M/ mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che/ /'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzhi/ /sems dpa'

chen po bcu drug dang / /gsang chen lha mo bcu gnyis dang / /sgo srung ba ni bzhi dag ste/ /sum cu rtsa bdun las mi nyung / /gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi po ni/ /phyis kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog /gsang ba'i lha mo kun las ni/ /

rjes thog nyid du yang dag byung / /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid ches/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun bgrang mi bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas/ /chos kyi rigs mchog yang dag byung / /byang chub sems las

kun du byung / /mi bskyod la sogs tshogs chen po/ /nga yis rdo rje rigs su brjod/ /phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che/ /sbyin pa'i spyod pa kun du byung / /rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa/ /nga yis rin chen rigs su bshad/ /

rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid che/ /sbyin pa spyod pa kun du byung / /dag pa'i chos la kun du byung / /tshe dpag med pa la sogs pa/ /de ni pad ma'i rigs su bshad/ /rdo rje chos ni bdag nyid che/ /grub pa'i las las kun du byung / /don yod

grub pa la sogs las/ /de ni las kyi rigs su bshad/ /nam mkha'i mdzod ni las chen po/ /rdo rje ji bzhin lha mo yang / /lha mo ji bzhin bsten te 'dra/ /ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin zhi/ /ji ltar zhi ba de bzhin byung / /
rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod mtshungs/ /shar gyi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje rin chen rin chen mchog /lho yi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs/ /rgyal po 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon/ /nub kyi

phyogs su yang dag bzhugs/ /bya ba kun la don yod pa/ /byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par 'gyur/ /dbus su mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /kun mkhyen ye shes rnal 'byor che/ /zla ba gang ba bzhin du zhi/ /rdo rje 'khor lo

bla na med/ /gang phyir kun du sngon 'gro ba/ /rdo rje byang chub sems don ldan/ /de las spyod pa de las chos/ /de las spyod pa spyad dka' ba/ /sems dpa' chen po bla na med/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor bzhugs par 'gyur/ /
sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gcig gis/ /mgon po la ni gsol ba btab/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje sems/ /mgon po la ni gsol ba 'debs/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus/ /khyod la brten nas

de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/ /khyod la brten nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang po'i thugs ni rnal 'byor che/ /byang sems shin du rnyed dka' ba/ /kye ma sems can 'di sdug bsngal/ /sangs
rgyas chos kyi snod min pa/ /sems can kun gyi don ched du/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug gis/ /mgon po'i
gsung ni gsan nas su/ /'khor lo'i sbyor ba gsungs par 'gyur/ /de ni yang dag bshad par bya/ /'khor lo chen po grong khyer che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs las byung / /snying po'i chos mchog rnal

'byor ldan/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i bstan pa yin/ /sems can 'di dag gdul bya min/ /de rnams bde ba'i don ched du/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon cho ga'i tshul/ /bdag nyid ji bzhin rnal 'byor byas/ /

sangs rgyas byang chub thob 'gyur ba/ /de la dang por rab bshad bya/ /de ru sems can thams cad kun/ /shin du brtan par rab 'jug na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rdo rje nyid/ /thob 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /theg pa chen po mngon

par bsdus/ /sangs rgyas byang chub shin tu gsang / /thar pa mchog tu bstan pa nyid/ /sngon du gzhung mchog mnyan par bya/ /bskal pa brgya phrag dag tu ni/ /ji ste mngon par brtson byas kyang / /gang zag bzhi ni

'jig rten du/ /bsgrubs kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni ma skyes dang / /the tshom ldan pa nyid dang ni/ /bka' bzhin du ni mi byed pa/ /dad pa med nyid 'grub mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar dus gsum gshegs de bzhin/ /

byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad byas te/ /the tshom med par byed pa'i mchog /khyim pa dang ni rab tu byung / /phyogs ni gnyis po 'dis bsgrub bya/ /ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru/ /

go rim bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /byang chub sems ni lhur blangs nas/ /lha gzhan 'dod pa brtson mi bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad bya ste/ /de gzhol ba la brtson par bya/ /srog gcod rku dang 'khrig pa dang / /

brdzun dang myos byed rnam par spang / /khyim pa'i sdom pa la gnas nas/ /de tshe rig pa'i rgyal po bsgrub/ /gal te de ni rab byung gyur/ /sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnas/ /so sor thar dang byang chub sems/ /rig

'dzin sdom pa mchog yin no/ /zla ba'am yang na lo re'o/ /de bzhin yang na lo gcig tu/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /sngon du rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya/ /nyin re zhing ni ci nus par/ /thun gsum du ni cho ga

bsgrub/ /rtog pa 'di ni thun bzhi ru/ /ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham par ni/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya/ /bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang / /sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab/ /de yi bsod nams byang chub bsngo/ /

de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/ /sangs rgyas bla med thams cad la/ /gsol ba gdab cing rab btud nas/ /zhabs la mnyam bzhag phyag bya'o/ /ji skad gzhung rgya che las gsungs/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyor ba yis/ /

rgyud gzhan dag ni thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab brjod bya/ /de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pas+thA nA yA ata mA na~M nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa twa a d+hi tiSh+tha swa mA~M/ oM sarba ta thA

ga ta pU dzA a b+hi She kA ya Ata mA na~M nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rata na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA pra bar ta nA ya Ata mA na~M nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra bar ta ya mA~M/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta

pU dzA karma Ne Ata mA na~M nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta tha ga ta badzra karma ku ru mA~M/ phyag rgya dang bcas cho gar ldan/ /yang dag nyid du rab bshad bya/ /sor mo thams cad sbyar ba ni/ /rdo rje thal mor rab tu brjod/ /sa phyogs
gtsang mar 'dug nas ni/ /mkhas pas yan lag kun phyag bya/ /rdo rje thal mo brkyang nas ni/ /rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya/ /mgo bos de bzhin byas nas ni/ /mkhas pas dpral bas phyag bya'o/ /

mgo bo nas ni phab byas nas/ /de bzhin kha yis phyag bya'o/ /de bzhin snying gar bzhag byas nas/ /spyi bo nas ni phyag bya'o/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor pas phyag bya/ /slar yang cho ga la
gnas te/ /mchod pas cho ga dang ldan pa/ /spos dang me tog mar me dang / /dri dang phreng ba byug pa ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas nas/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i

sbyor ba yis/ /ci nus par ni mkhas pas dbul/ /gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan/ /gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu/ /rdo rje'i sdom pa bla med par/ /bslab pa'i gnas ni blang bar bya/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i

sbyor ba yis/ /dad cing de la rab gzhol bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /slob dpon yang ni phyi ma yin/ /nyin re zhing ni ci nus par/ /khrus bzhi dag ni rab tu bya/ /rnal 'byor ji ltar khrus bya ba/ /go rim
bzhin du rab tu bshad/ /sdom pa gsum la rab tu gnas/ /dang po khrus su brjod pa yin/ /gnyis pa rgyud las gsungs pa yis/ /bshags dang gsol ba 'debs la sogs/ /phyag rgya bcing ba gsum pa ste/ /bzhi

pa chu ste tha ma yin/ /khrus kyi cho ga 'di yis ni/ /mkhas pas 'dir ni khrus bya'o/ /gos ni lan gsum brje ba yi/ /sgrub pa pos ni cho ga bya/ /sdom pa la ni legs gnas pa/ /gos ni dang por brje ba dang / /

gnyis pa cho ga bsgrub pa dang / /gsum pa ngo tsha khrel yod pa/ /gtsang ma'i gos ni gsum po dag /lan gsum du ni brje bar bya/ /gang la kha na ma tho med/ /thams cad bza' zhing bsten par bya/ /sha dang chang dang

sgog pa sogs/ /bza' ba min pa rnam par spang / /dri nga ba dang mi gtsang nyid/ /bza' dang btung ba rnam par spang / /gzhan la gnod pa dang ldan pa/ /lus kyi phyir yang bya ba min/ /'khrig pa bdun dang yang dag
ldan/ /mi sdug sgom pas spang bar bya/ /yid gzhungs mkhas shing gsal ba dang / /theg pa chen po'i don sems pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya che/ /shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs/ /klog pa dang ni
bsam pa dang / /yang dang yang du gsol ba gdab/ /dgra dang grogs dang bar ma la/ /sems snyoms mi 'jigs rab tu byin/ /snyan cing bden par smra ba yis/ /zhe sdang 'joms byed byams pa bsgom/ /chos dang

gang zag bdag med cing / /'dus byas dang ni 'khrul pa tsam/ /blo ldan brtan pas brtag par bya/ /'dus byas kun la rmongs mi bya/ /'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni/ /byang chub sems ni dor mi bya/ /rdo rje dril bu

phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bya gzhan/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /sbyor ba lhod par mi bya

zhing / /cho ga ston pa lhur blang bya/ /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa la/ /go rim bzhin du bslab par bya/ /sems can gyi ni don ldan pas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad/ /kha na ma tho chung ngu yang / /

srog ni btang snyoms dor mi bya/ /khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba'ang rung / /'dris pa thams cad rnam par spang / /bu dang chung ma dag la yang / /srid pa'i bcing ba las grol bya/ /brkam zhing chags la sdang ba dang / /
rmongs shing le lo ldan pa'ang min/ /bag yod shin du brtson pa yis/ /rnal 'byor cho ga bsgrub par bya/ /lta ba kun las rnam par grol/ /de nyid las ni legs par mthong / /dge zhing dgongs pa bshad

pa yi/ /don shes don ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /rigs dang mi rigs cho ga shes/ /de nyid rnal 'byor shin du mkhas/ /brtse ldan byang chub spyod par ldan/ /spyod pa rnams la rab tu mkhas/ /de 'dra'i tshul ni sna

tshogs dang / /de lta bu yi bsgrub pa yi/ /dngos grub dang ni thar pa 'thob/ /dngos grub kun la the tshom med/ /gnas dang gos dang bza' ba yi/ /lhag pa thams cad rnam par spang / /lha rnams brnyas par mi bya zhing / /

bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / /le lo med par nyin re zhing / /bsrung ba yi ni cho ga bya/ /bgegs med 'jigs par mi bya ste/ /rang sems 'di ni gdul bar dka'/ /pha dang ma ru 'dzin pa dang / /bram ze dge slong de dang

'dra/ /dag cing dul la zhi ba dang / /bsdams shing thar pa shes pa dang / /rgyal srid mtho ris longs spyod min/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod 'phel phyir min/ /gzhan du sems can don gyi phyir/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges

byas pa/ /zas kyi tshod ni shes pa dang / /mtshan mo gnyid kyang sad par bya/ /'dod chags skyon la sogs pa gzhan/ /sems kyis rnam par mi brtag go/ /sems ni rab tu dang byas nas/ /g.yo ba med cing nges

byas pas/ /legs par smra zhing rab tu 'byed/ /chos ni nges par don gnyer byed/ /mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba bzhin/ /sems can gnod dang 'tshe mi bya/ /nyes ldan gdug pa'i sems can rnams/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug mi bya/ /lha

yi sku dang phyag mtshan dang / /lha yi bzhon pa dag dang ni/ /dman ma lha yi grim pa dang / /lha yi mtshan ma thams cad dang / /bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa/ /mtshan ma gzugs su byas pa dang / /bgom par mi bya bza' mi bya/ /

nam yang brdzi bar mi bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum dang 'brel pa'i zas/ /nam yang nye bar longs mi spyod/ /tha na phul dang dman ma yi/ /dri yang mnam par mi bya'o/ /ri bo 'am ni nags kyi nang / /gtsang zhing yid 'ong
dben pa 'am/ /chu bo'i mgram mam bskyed mos tshal/ /ne'u sing shin du yid 'ong ba 'am/ /lha khang gtsang ma nyams dga' 'am/ /khang pa gtsang ma dben pa 'am/ /gang du tshogs pa med pa ru/ /
sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni/ /gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu/ /de 'dra'i gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /thar pa'i mchog tu bstan pa nyid/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag brtsam/ /thun

bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis/ /mgon po mchog la phyag bya zhing / /sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgom pa pos/ /bshags pa la sogs de bya'o/ /mchod pa nyid kyang ci nus bya'o/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya yang dag bcing / /mchod pa'i yo

byad thams cad ni/ /phyogs kun du ni yang dag spro/ /sa gzhi dag ni ma lus nyid/ /kun nas rin chen shing ldan dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs mchog ldan dang / /rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya/ /me tog shing dang bdug pa dang / /

dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong dang / /rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho ni/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la 'bul/ /de nas phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /me tog bdug pa la sogs sprin/ /rol mo'i tshogs ni yid 'ong ba/ /mchod pa'i

sprin ni rnam par bsam/ /mchod pa thams cad rab byed pa/ /rig pa'i rgya chen 'di rnams dang / /phyag rgya dag kyang yongs gsal ba'i/ /bsam pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na

sa ma ye hU~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta br-ik+Sha pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan d+ha pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ gang du rgyal chen

me tog dang / /bdug pa dang ni dri yi tshogs/ /de bzhin kun du yang dag sbyar/ /tha na rgyan spel rnams kyang ngo / /mchod pa'i phyag rgya tshul chen dang / /phyag rgya chen po bslab par bya/ /theg pa chen po bsdus pa las/ /ji skad

rgya chen gsungs de bzhin/ /sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / /bde ba chen po'i rgyu dang ni/ /'gro ba gsum las dgrol ba'i phyir/ /de lta bu yi bsam pa bya/ /'dir ni lha rnams thams cad kyi/ /bag med nye bar zhi ba dang / /

mi rnams sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa/ /rab tu mthar phyin de bzhin nyid/ /theg pa dman par 'dod byed pa/ /'khor ba rnam par gzhol ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor bdag nyid ches/ /'di de bsam par bya ba yin/ /bdag gi
bsod nams stobs dag gis/ /bde ba thams cad tshogs kyi mchog /sems can thams cad bde chen ldan/ /ma lus par ni grub gyur cig /sems can thams cad bde gyur cig /'byung po kun la

byams par shog /dud 'gro thams cad 'jigs med shog /ngan song thams cad zhi gyur cig /bde ba chen po 'di bsams nas/ /sdig pa dral ba bcing bar bya/ /sdig pa thams cad dral byas shing / /de bzhin ngan song

thams cad do/ /phyogs rnams thams cad sangs rgyas kun/ /yang dang yang du rjes dran nas/ /gsang ba'i mdo sde ma lus pa/ /yang dang yang du bklag par bya/ /mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ru/ /gcig tu 'gyur

'dod sems kyis bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor bla na med/ /rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya/ /zla ba 'am yang na zla ba drug /lo gcig gam ni de las gzhan/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs 'di 'drar bya/ /phyag rgya thams cad

yang dag bcing / /sangs rgyas rnams la nyin re bzhin/ /nges par lha bshos dbul bar bya/ /lha bshos snang ba ster byed pa/ /de bzhin rig pa'i lha bshos la/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che/ /thams cad du ni rjes dran

bya/ /'ching ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyis brtan bya/ /rdo rje go cha'i sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor kun du bsrung bar bya/ /de lta bu yi cho ga yis/ /rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya/ /bsrung ba byas shing
brtson 'grus brtsam/ /stobs chen spro ba bskyed pa yis/ /nyin re zhing ni brtags nas su/ /rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /sku mdog dkyil 'khor ji bzhin par/ /ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru/ /
dgug pa la sogs las rnams ni/ /thams cad mnyam par bzhag par bya/ /ci nus par ni nyin re zhing / /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /lo gcig na ni rab 'grub

'gyur/ /theg pa chen po'i tshogs nang na/ /mchog 'gyur rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /rgyud gzhan gyi ni cho ga dang / /mdo sde dang bcas ci bzhin du/ /de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs blang / /sdom pa'ang dor bar mi bya zhing / /kha na ma

tho rdul tsam yang / /'gyod pa ru ni bya ba yin/ /gnas ni yang dag brtag par bya/ /tsher ma la sogs dang bral ba/ /ri bo 'am ni dgon pa 'am/ /lha khang bskyed mos tshal dang ni/ /chu yi 'gram dang 'brog dgon par/ /gang du phyogs

ni gtsang mar gyur/ /gseg ma gyo mo bong ba dang / /rdo ba dag ni bsal bar bya/ /shin du legs par dag bya ste/ /gang phyir lha rnams yongs su 'dzin/ /gal te de ni sbyor lhod gyur/ /rnam pa kun du mi 'jigs bya/ /sangs rgyas

thams cad rgyal po che/ /chos kyi bdag po dgongs pa can/ /thugs rje snying por ldan gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas nyes par 'dzin mi 'gyur/ /gnas ni kun du dag bya zhing / /dkyil 'khor yang ni ci nus par/ /rgya ru dpag tshad tsam bya ste/ /khru drug

las ni dma' ba min/ /sngon la phur bu gdab bya ste/ /rdo rje lta las sogs pa bcing / /de nas yo byad thams cad ni/ /cho ga mchog gi blang bar bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid 'dir/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bsgrub par bya/ /thal ba la sogs

dus ji bzhin/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /ji ltar nus shing spro ba dang / /ji ltar rdzas ni 'byor pa dang / /de bzhin rnal 'byor chen pos bya/ /yang na sems kyis brtag par bya/ /ci ste bsgrub pa rgyal por

'gyur/ /cho ga gzhan gyis blo ldan pas/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni dag par bya/ /tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /khrus ni stong dang ldan pa mchog /yang Na rgyang grags

tsam du ni/ /sa yi cha ni thig gdab bya/ /gal te 'byor pa ldan pa min/ /khru bzhi mdo ru bsdus par bya/ /yang na phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /khru brgyad dang ni yang dag ldan/ /in drA nI la shin du sngo/ /tshon

rtsi sngon po rab tu bya/ /pad ma rA ga shin du dmar/ /tshon rtsi dmar po zhes byar bshad/ /rdo rje mchu dang mchu chen po/ /ser po yang ni yang dag ldan/ /dag cing dang ba'i gser dang ni/ /kha dog ser po ldan

par bya/ /shin du dag pa shel dang bas/ /tshon rtsi dkar po rab tu bya/ /gang phyir rgyal po nor chen ldan/ /tshon rtsi 'di dag yang dag bshad/ /phyug cing nor dang yang dag ldan/ /gal te de ni khyim bdag gyur/ /khru brgya

yongs su tshang bar bya/ /bcu drug las ni nyung mi bya/ /tshon rtsi dri dang yang dag ldan/ /gur gum la sogs dang bsres pa/ /tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /mkhas pa yis ni dkyil 'khor bya/ /phyug cing nor dang

yang dag ldan/ /tshong dpon yang ni ded dpon nam/ /khyim pa 'byor pa dang ldan pa/ /gzhan dag dga' zhing 'ongs gyur na/ /rin chen phye ma dang bsres pa'i/ /tshon rtsi chen po rab tu bya/ /rams dang ba bla la sogs pa/ /

tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /bdag nyid chung ba'am che ba'ang rung / /de yi 'byor pa brtag bya ba/ /ji ltar rigs par nges par sbyar/ /rgyal po la ni tshad bshad pa/ /khyim bdag la yang de bzhin no/ /tshong dpon dang ni

ded dpon gyi/ /khru ni lnga bcu nyid kyang ngo / /gzhan dag dga' zhing 'ongs gyur na/ /khru ni nyi shur byas pa yin/ /gal te dngos grub bsgrub 'dod na/ /khru drug las ni chung mi bya/ /mang po de bzhin nyung ba yang / /
dri dang kun du yang dag ldan/ /rtag tu sna tshogs dri yis ni/ /sngon du sa gzhi dag par bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor ngos dag gi/ grwa ni bzhi po thams cad du/ /shes rab can gyis bdug spos sreg /
gang phyir rdo rje can dag gshegs/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gnas de na/ /sngags kyis bsangs pa'i dri chu yis/ /rtag tu legs par chag chag gdab/ /gang phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ /nyin zhag drug gam

bdun brgyad dang / /mar dang 'o ma 'bras chan nyid/ /slob dpon zas ni dkar gsum bza'/ /yang na thun mong gyur pa'i zas/ /ci ste bzod ldan nyin mtshan du/ /mi bza' bar ni bsgrub par bya/ /gang phyir chos kyi rang
bzhin zas/ /stobs ldan 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni rgyal chen po/ /gang yin bsam pas bya ba'o/ /bcwa lnga la ni brtsams nas su/ /gnyis pa'i nya la rdzogs par bya/ /yang na mar gyi

ngo la ni/ /bcu bzhi la ni yang dag brtsam/ /bcwa lnga la ni thug par bya/ /legs pa ru ni rdzogs par bya/ /yang na tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ /tha ma nya la kun du bri/ /yang na bcu bzhi la brtsams te/ /nyin zhag gnyis

par yang dag bri/ /yang na bcwa lnga de yi ni/ /snga dro de yi yang dag brtsam/ /tshul chen po dang mtshungs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bri/ /gang gi tshe nas brtsams nas su/ /ji srid rdzogs par ma gyur par/ /

gal te kun nas mi bza' bar/ /brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya/ /dri dang bcas shing legs byas pa/ /yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya/ /gang phyir rgyal ba'i rdo rje 'dzin/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad par 'gyur/ /
bsod nams che zhing bkra shis pa'i/ /nyin zhag dag pa gang yin pa/ /de la rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /skal ba chen pos dkyil 'khor brtsam/ /sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas/ /dbus kyi cha ru 'dug par
bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la dmigs nas/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /sems ni yongs su 'dzin byed pa/ /lus ni drang por byas nas su/ /bshags la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/ /

thams cad sngon du bya ba yin/ /byang chub sems la brtson gyur cing / /rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pa yis/ /phyogs bcu ru ni phyag byas nas/ /bdag nyid kyang ni spro ba bskyed/ /deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /
bdag gi 'tsho ba'ang 'bras bu yod/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang dam tshig gis/ /deng ni srid par mnyam par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtse gcig pa'i/ /sems kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i/ /bdag 'gyur bar ni the tshom med/ /deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /deng ni bdag mchod bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /de ltar dga'

ba dang ldan pas/ /de nas dbus su 'dug gyur nas/ /spos kyi reng bu lag thogs pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/ /sems ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis/ /tshig ni 'di skad brjod par bya/ /yan lag kun gyis
rab btud de/ /sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje bdag ming 'di zhes pa/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'bri bar 'tshal/ /sangs
rgyas la sogs kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni bdag la gsol/ tshig ni de skad brjod nas su/ /sems dpa'i skyil dkrung bca' bar bya/ /chos chen po la snyoms zhugs nas/ /bdag nyid ting 'dzin

dang ldan bya/ /gal te nus na skal ba ches/ /yang na sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog /ting 'dzin zhes bya ci 'dra dang / /rdo rje'i gzugs dang ldan pa la/ /rnal 'byor pa yis

snyoms 'jug bya/ /yang na rnal 'byor gang rung la/ /nus na snyoms par 'jug par bya/ /sems ni mnyam par gzhag 'gyur ba/ /go rim bzhin du bshad par bya/ /bcom ldan sngon ni ci 'dra ba'i/ /byang chub sems

dpa' nyid 'gyur ba'i/ /de 'dra bar ni bdag rang nyid/ /rnal 'byor don sems bsam par bya/ /dka' thub sdom pa sna tshogs pa/ /bdag gis bya bar bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po ni/ /stong gsum pa

ni bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas bskul ba bla na med/ /shes rab can gyis bskul ba bsam/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas shing / /ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya/ /nges par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rang sems so sor

brtag par bya/ /byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni/ /dbus su zla ba brtag par bya/ /de nas rang gi ye shes brtag /zla ba'i dbus su rdo rje bzhin/ /rang lus rdo rje'i gzugs su ste/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rang bzhin nyid/ /

de nas sangs rgyas mngon rtogs nas/ /rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya/ /rang bdag sangs rgyas thams cad du/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor blta bar bya/ /ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru/ /stug po'i gnas las babs nas su/ /rdo rje'i gdan

la 'dug nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bya/ /sems dpa' bzhi ni phyung nas su/ /phyogs rnams kun du yongs su spro/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan byas nas/ /phyogs bzhi ru ni dgod par bya/ /'tshams su rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlabs/ /phyogs bzhi ru ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po byung / /'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas nyid/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad blta bar bya/ /

sems dpa' gsang ba'i lha mor bcas/ /sgo srungs rnams ni bsam par bya/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag pa ni/ /snying po chen po brtag par bya/ /rang gi 'khor lo yang dag bzhugs/ /'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /

thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /mtshan ni rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang / /rdo rje'i lta bas blta bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /slar yang snyoms par
'jug par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs dbus su/ /byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par ni/ /mgon po'i snying ga nas gzung bya/ /sems dpa' kun gyi spyan snga ru/ /
bka' ni rim bzhin nod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur gyis/ /rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya/ /gsol ba btab pas gsan par bya/ /bdag ni rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor mchog /chos kyi sbyor

ba 'di yis ni/ /ting 'dzin shin du bla na med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang / /bka' ni nye bar nod bya ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /

nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /dkyil dkrung bshig ste langs nas ni/ /rang gi 'dren pa'i zhabs phyag bya/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ba ru/ /phyogs rnams bzhi ni blta bar bya/ /theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/ /rdo rje'i

tshig ni brjod par bya/ /bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /bdag ni stobs chen rdo rje can/ /bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal/ /bdag ni phyag na rdo rje mchog /

oM badzra satwa hU~M/ rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di/ /lan gcig nyid ni brjod par bya/ /bdag ni gtso bo rdo rje che/ /byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtshos kun du gang / /'khor los lnga par yang dag gnas/ /

bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan par bya/ /slar yang bdag nyid go bgo zhing / /bdag nyid dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad
bcad par bya/ /lag nyed pa yi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad rab tu mnye/ /rdo rje gtun shing nyid kyis ni/ /bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar bya/ /rdo rje ral gri rab rno bas/ /bgegs
rnams thams cad gtub par bya/ /rdo rje mche ba drag po yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/ /rdo rje bzang po'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom par bya/ /rdo rje ral gri'i phyag
rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/ /rdo rje mche ba rab grags pas/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/ /

rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya/ /rdo rje dung thung phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad
dbug par bya/ /rdo rje 'bab pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya/ /rgyas pa yis ni ci nus par/ /lus rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /bgegs ni 'ga' yang yod min zhes/ /sems
ni dag par gyur pa yin/ /rang sems bdud ces bya bar bshad/ /bgegs nyid kyang ni rang gi sems/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsal/ /rnam rtog las ni bgegs rnams 'byung / /gdul bar dka' ba'i sems

gzung zhing / /'dod pa lnga ni spang bar bya/ /sngon du rjes dran nas brtsams te/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /bcom zhing nges par bcad nas ni/ /yi ge hU~M gis bskrad par bya/ /rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yis/ /

rdo rje ra ba bcing bar bya/ /hU~M mdzad rdo rje bsdams bya zhing / /de ni rdo rje ra bas bskor/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag byin brlabs nas/ /ci nus par ni rgyas pa ru/ /ra ba mchog ni bcing bar
bya/ /rtog pa kun la nges sbyar nas/ /sems ni dag par 'gyur ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi mtshan nyid ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /grogs dag dang ni thams cad la/ /g.yel ba med par

bsrung bar bya/ /gsor zhing legs par bkal ba dang / /tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang / /dri zhim reg bya 'jam pa dang / /legs par byas shing sra ba dang / /dri bsung dang ni yang dag ldan/ /sna tshogs tshon gyis

kun du khyab/ /dri bcas tshon du spang bya zhing / /chos kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de nas de ni yang dag bshad/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che/ /dkyil 'khor kun

gyi gsang ba che/ /sangs rgyas brtan pa'i rdo rje can/ /sems can 'di rnams gdul bya min/ /bsod nams ye shes rgya mtsho che/ /tshogs ni kun du ma bsags pa/ /bsod nams tshogs dang mi ldan zhing / /sangs rgyas

'byung la chags dang bral/ /sems can de rnams mos bya'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ /de ni dkyil 'khor 'dzin du 'jug /yang na bsod nams dag gi tshogs/ /

de ni rang nyid kyis mthong 'gyur/ /gang phyir tshogs bcas longs spyod dang / /chos kyi sku ni bla na med/ /rdo rje'i dam chos las byung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'dzin du gzhug /gal te de ni tshogs bsags gyur/ /sngon du

sangs rgyas rjes su mthong / /dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la gnas te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad des mthong 'gyur/ /tshogs ni bsags pa med pa dang / /sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru/ /des ni thos pa rnyed mi 'gyur/ /

dang por 'dir 'jug smos ci dgos/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /'di ni gsang ba mtshungs med pa/ /'di ni theg chen snying po ste/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/ /skal pa grangs med pa ru byung / /sa yi pha

rol phyin pa mchog /gang phyin gsang ba mtho ba thob/ /rab tu dga' ba sgrub par 'gyur/ /gal te rnal 'byor pa de brtson/ /tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan 'das/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob cing / /rdo rje nyid ni the tshom med/ /

yang na mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /skye ba bcu drug mya ngan 'da'/ /rab tu dga' ba thob pa yang / /yang na rdo rje nyid kyang ngo / /sa la nyi zla ltung byed cing / /de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ /

so so'i skye bos sangs rgyas nyid/ /'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni bla med pa/ /de phyir rnal 'byor chen po sbyor/ /gal te sangs rgyas nyid 'dod na/ /brtson 'grus chen pos bsdad mi bya/ /tshad ni ji skad

bshad pa ru/ /de bzhin gzhung gi rjes 'brangs nas/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /

cha mnyam pas ni mdzes par gyur/ /dar gyi chun pos brgyan gyur cing / /rin chen dra bas rnam par brgyan/ /g.yer ga'i dra bas yang dag ldan/ /kha dog lnga pos rab tu mdzes/ /dril bu'i dra bas shin du spras/ /rnga yab sna

tshogs kyis mdzes pa/ /phreng ba rnga yab bla re dang / /nyi zla dag gis nye bar mdzes/ /kun nas phyi rol gnas dag tu/ /rdo rje kha khyer yang dag rten/ /kun du kha khyer dang ldan pa/ /sgo ni kha khyer med pa'o/ /rtse mo rdo rje sngo rang

bzhin/ /gzhan ni gser gyi mdog can dang / /dmar po pad ma lta bu dang / /gzhan yang shel ltar dkar ba dang / /rin chen rang bzhin mchog kun gyi/ /dkyil 'khor mdzes par bri bar bya/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni mdzes

pa mchog /rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /rim gnyis sgo dang yang dag ldan/ /rta babs sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ /dkar zhing gsal dang rdo rje dang / /nyi zla dag gis rnam par spras/ /'dab ma bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /

sgo bzhi dag ni mchog tu mdzes/ /mtho zhing yangs la mdzes pa ste/ /rdo rje rdo rje yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje sgo srungs skal chen po/ /bdag nyid rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin/ /gtum po srung byed rnal 'byor pa/ /shar gyi sgo ru

yang dag gnas/ /lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ste/ /nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrogs go/ /rdo rje dril bu skal chen po/ /byang gi sgo ru yang dag gnas/ /'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba'ang rung / /rdo rje shugs ni brjod par bya/ /

ri mo dman ma brdzis byas na/ /dam tshig de nyid mthong mi 'gyur/ /oM badzra be gA gra ma hU~M/ gang gi dus su thig 'debs pa/ /rdo rje'i thig ni brjod par bya/ /sa yi cha ni ma lus pa/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang

bzhin 'gyur/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hU~M/ sngon du tshon rtsi'i phye ma la/ /'bar ba'i blta bas yang dag blta/ /badzra rA ga zhes brjod na/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ /oM badzra rA ga hU~M/ 'tshams kyi

cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni 'tshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /logs dang cha ni mnyam pa dang / /kun nas cha ni rnam par phye/ /dkyil 'khor

cha ni rnam par gsal/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de yi nang gi rim pa ru/ /zhugs nas 'khor lo de mtshungs pa/ /kun du cha ni mnyam par bri/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje'i ka ba'i mdun

gnas su/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni lnga yis brgyan/ /gnas lnga dag ni thams cad du/ /'khor lo lnga ni dgod par bya/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /kun du bri zhing dgod par bya/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul gyis

bltas nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzung bar bya/ /oM badzra satwa hU~M/ de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas rgyal po dgod par bya/ /gang gi thugs las nges byung ba/ /gsang ba'i tshogs ni stug cing brtan/ /rnam

par snang mdzad rnal 'byor che/ /phyogs rnams kun du rnam par gsal/ /gang gi mtshan smos tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur/ /'khor los sgyur ba tshogs chen po/ /sems dpa' bzhi po rgyal po che/ /

phyogs rnams dag ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje shugs 'chang dag gis dgod/ /shar du rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /lho ru rdo rje rin chen no/ /nub tu rdo rje chos shes pa/ /rdo rje'i las ni byang du'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lnga po ni/ /

thams cad sangs rgyas cod pan ldan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /nam bza' dkar po dag banabs pa/ /de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ oM sarba yo gI shwa ra ya hrI hU~M/ oM badzra satwa hU~M/ oM badzra rat+na hU~M/ oM badzra d+harma hU~M/ oM badzra karma hU~M/

rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che/ /rtse mo lnga pa dgod par bya/ /rdo rje rin chen rin po che/ /rdo rje pad ma'i pad ma ste/ /rdo rje las kyi rdo rje ni/ /rdo rje rnon po mtshon cha che/ /rnam snang rang gi phyag rgya ni/ /ye shes khu tshur yongs
su 'dzin/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ /'od kyi dbus su yang dag gnas/ /bdag nyid chen po bzhi po kun/ /bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung / /gang na 'khor lo med pa yi/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo'i

grwa bzhi ru/ /btsun mo chen mo lha mo bzhi/ /dgod pa'i chos nyid bsam par bya/ /rdo rje sems ma rdo rje chos/ /de bzhin rdo rje rin chen ma/ /rdo rje las ma btsun mo che/ /dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir bri bar bya/ /rdo rje sems
ma byang sems ma/ /pha rol phyin pa chen po mchog /lha mo chen mo rdo rje chos/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog /dpal chen rdo rje rin chen ma/ /bsod nams kyi ni tshogs gter byed/ /mkha' mdzod ces

bya rdo rje las/ /las kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog /de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming ni/ dpal chen rdo rje dkar mo dang / /rdo rje sgrol ma mkha' rdo rje/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad las/ /de dag

gsang mchog bla na med/ /thams cad zla ba gang 'od ldan/ /rked par bsnyems bcas rol par ldan/ /ji ltar rgyal ba'i rnam bzhi bzhin/ /rang gi phyag mtshan gyis 'brel phyag /seng ge'i snyoms tshul rol ldan
pa/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su/ /shar gyi mi bskyod dkyil 'khor la/ /zla ba'i dbus su mi bskyod pa/ /ston pa'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/ /de yi phyogs rnams

yongs su 'dzin/ /mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /dam tshig dag ni bzhi po bri/ /mdun du phyag na rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas su'o/ /rdo rje chags pa de bzhin g.yon/ /

rgyab tu legs pa yang dag bri/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras shing / /rdo rje phyed pa'i dbang bskur ldan/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /lho yi rin chen dkyil 'khor du/ /zla ba'i dbus su rin chen 'byung / /mchog 'dzin

pa yi phyag rgya 'dzin/ /mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen sems dpa' bzhi po ni/ /mdun du rdo rje rin chen te/ /g.yas su rdo rje gzi brjid do/ /g.yon du rdo rje rgyal mtshan te/ /

rgyab tu bzhad pa yang dag bri/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras shing / /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur ldan/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /nub tu pad ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin/ /dbus

su 'dug pa 'od dpag med/ /sems dpa' chen po ye shes che/ /phyogs bzhi ru ni dgod par bya/ /rdo rje chos ni mdun du ste/ /g.yas su rdo rje rnon po'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje 'khor lo ste/ /rdo rje smra ba rgyab tu'o/ /rdo rje

shugs kyis song nas kyang / /byang gi las kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /mchog sbyin phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /thub pa don yod grub pa dgod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad tu/ /las chen po dag yang dag bri/ /kun

nas phyogs ni bzhi dag tu/ /phyag na rang gi phyag mtshan mtshon/ /mdun du rdo rje las yin te/ /g.yas su rdo rje srung ba'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ /rdo rje khu tshur rgyab tu'o/ /de nas phyag mtshan bcu drug dang / /

dbus ma nyi shur rab bshad bya/ /bcu drug dbus ma nyi shu ni/ /go rim bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /ji ltar rigs shing 'tsham pa la/ /rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa/ /rdo rje rin chen rin po che/ /rdo rje pad ma chen po dang / /rdo rje

rnon po dbus ma yin/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje che/ /de bzhin rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin/ /rdo rje chags pa gzhu nyid do/ /rdo rje legs pa'i rdo rje gnyis/ /rdo rje rin chen chen po che/ /rdo rje gzi brjid nyi ma ste/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan

sgreng / /rdo rje bzhad pa tshems chen po/ /rdo rje chos kyi pad ma ches/ /rdo rje rnon po ral gri bzang / /rdo rje rgyu yi 'khor lo che/ /rdo rje smra ba'i yi ge ste/ /rdo rje rnon po las chen po/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i cho ga ste/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin mche

ba che/ /rdo rje khu tshur bsdams pa ste/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu dag ni sgo ba bzhi/ /rdo rje sems ma'i rdo rje che/ /de bzhin rdo rje rin chen nor/ /pad ma rdo rje chos ma ste/ /rdo rje rnon po las ma yin/ /grwa

bzhi dag tu gsang ba yi/ /phyag mtshan de rnams dgod par bya/ /'khor lo chen po'i phyi rol gyi/ /grwa bzhi dag ni thams cad du/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi/ /rdo rje lha mo yang dag bri/ /rdo rje sgeg mo rdor phreng

ma/ /de bzhin rdo rje glu ma nyid/ /bsnyems bcas phreng ba pi bang dang / /glu gar gsang ba'i lha mo rnams/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'tshams rnams su/ /mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri/ /me tog spos dang de bzhin dri/ /
mar me nub byang 'tshams su'o/ /mar me la sogs bar nyid kyis/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ /bskal pa bzang po'i sems dpa' che/ /stong ni nges par dgod par bya/ /mtshan ma ji bzhin ci rigs
pas/ /byams pa la sogs ma lus pa/ /ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa yi/ /sems dpa' chen po dgod par bya/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /kun du bri zhing dgod par bya/ /rang gi snying pos kun dbab phyir/ /

rang rang gi ni snying po yin/ /de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /badzra pA Ni hU~M/ badzra a~M ku sha dzaH/ badzra rA ga ho/ badzra sA d+hu sa/ dam tshig mchog gi snying po'o/ /oM badzra ma Ni o~M`/ badzra te dza a/ badzra ke tu trA~M/

badzra hA sa hA/ badzra pad+ma hrIH/ badzra tik+Sh+Na d+ha~M/ badzra he du ma~M/ badzra b+hA Sha ra~M/ dbang gi sems dpa' dang / ye shes kyi sems dpa' chen po'i snying po'o/ /badzra karma kaM/ badzra rak+Sha ha~M/ badzra yak+Sha hU~M/ badzra muSh+Ti ba~M/ las kyi

sems dpa' chen po'i snying po'o/ /de rnams ni rab tu gnas pa'i snying po yin no/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni/ badzra hU~M/ rata na trA~M/ d+harma hrIH/ karma A/ lha mo rnams kyi sngar bshad zin to/ /sgo srungs rnams kyi

yang de bzhin no/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad dgod par bya/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi las bshad par bya ste/ kun nas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos kyi blo can gyis bri bya/ /dpal mchog

dang po las gsungs pa'i/ /sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/ /lan bdun du ni brjod par bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/ /lan bdun du ni bskor bar bya/ /'khor lo'i

dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni/ /mkhas pas thams cad blta bar bya/ /gal te chad dam lhag kyang rung / /rdo rje shugs kyis dag par bya/ /'khor lo chen po dag par byas/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor yang dag gzung / /

rgyal ba rnams la bdag nyid ni/ /dbul ba'i las ni kun du bya/ /de nas yo byad thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya/ /ci 'byor pas ni bya ba ste/ /dman par gyur kyang nyes pa med/ /'byor pa ci snyed

yod pa kun/ /go rim bzhin du rab tu dbul/ /bum pa gang ba 'bum phrag gam/ /stong ngam yang na brgya yang rung / /mar me 'bum phrag stong ngam ni/ /yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung / /dri dang spos kyi snod 'bum

'am/ /yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung / /ga pur a ga ru nyid dang / /du ru ska dang tsan dan sogs/ /mang sbyar dri zhim dang ldan pa/ /spos rnams 'di dag bsreg par bya/ /gser ram dngul gyi snod dag dang / /

sa las byas kyang nyes pa med/ /yo byad ji snyed yod pa kun/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya/ /de la skong bu stong phrag gam/ /mar me sdong bu shin tu 'bar/ /tha na mar me snod gcig ste/ /ma tshang gyur kyang nyes pa med/ /

dar ni phyar bar bye ba bre/ /rnga yab phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/ /zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/ /sna tshogs bzhon pa brgya 'am ni/ /stong phrag gcig kyang nyes pa med/ /thams cad ma tshang

cig nyid kyang / /bde bas rol mo mchog rnams bya/ /phan pa'i zas ni stong phrag dang / /bye brag dag ni rgya mtsho tshogs/ /bca' ba sna tshogs pa yang ste/ /gal te ma tshang nyes pa med/ /dri dang gos bzang thams cad

dang / /dri zhim pa yi byug pa dang / /bya ba mchog ni nye bar mdzes/ /bla re rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs dri yi chus bkang ba/ /bum pa shin tu yid 'ong dang / /me tog shing ni brgya nyid dang / /bzhi yang nyes
par mi 'gyur ro/ /dri dang me tog thams cad dang / /bdug pa yid du 'ong ba kun/ /gal te sbyor ba ldan gyur na/ /mchod pa rnam pa thams cad bya/ /mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid/ /ji bzhin sgrub pa pos
de phul/ /de bzhin dngos grub rdzu 'phrul ni/ /mthong ba'i chos la thob par 'gyur/ /sngar ni ji skad bsgrags pa bzhin/ /thams cad cho ga bzhin du dgod/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / /mchod pa
nyid kyang rab tu bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo phyag byas nas/ /pus mo btsugs te 'dug nas ni/ /yang dag par ni dgug par bya/ /sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu bcing / /
rdo rje lcags kyu brjod par bya/ /nyi shu gcig tu bzlas pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams kun du gshegs/ /de nas sgo srungs bcings nas ni/ /yi ge dzaHni yongs su brjod/ /rdo rje can ni thams cad

dgug /the tshom med par gshegs par gyur/ /rdo rje zhags pa bcings nas ni/ /cho ga ji bzhin nges par gzhugs/ rdo rje lcags sgrog bcings nas ni/ /dbang du yang ni rtag tu bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya
yis/ /de dag nyid kyang dbab par bya/ /rdo rje gnas pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /gnas rnams kun ni dgod par bya/ /ci nus par ni rab tu bsgrags/ /de nas mchod pa rab tu bya/ /spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i/ /
phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kun la sbyar/ /bdag nyid dbul dang mchod pa dang / /bshags dang gsol ba btab la sogs/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang / /sdom pa yang dag spyad par bya/ /rdo rje
sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches/ /bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bya/ /se gol dag ni brdab bya zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/ /bkug cing rab tu bcug
nas ni/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag dbab/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches/ /dral nas de ni yang dag dbab/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /ye shes dag pa skye bar 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i ye shes 'bab
par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbab pa yang dag brjod/ /ji ste babs par ma gyur na/ /yi ge a yis dril bu dkrol/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon 'di lta bu/ /ye shes dam pa skye 'gyur
zhing / /rmad du byung ba'ang 'dis mthong 'gyur/ /brgya las rtsa bdun lhag pa nyid/ /mtshan ma'ang de las lhag 'byung 'gyur/ /gzhan dag gang yang rung ba nyid/ /gal te bsod nams skal ba che/ /des

ni sangs rgyas thams cad mthong / /yang na byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ /yang na rdo rje 'dzin gang nyid/ /yang na 'od zer 'phros pas mthong / /hU~M sgrogs 'brug gi sgra dang ni/ /spos dang me tog dag gi
bar/ /ba spu langs pa la sogs byung / /de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni/ /sems ma'i phyag rgya ldan gyur pas/ /sor mo gnyis kyis phreng ba gzung / /gar gyi tshul gyis
zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje gar ni rab bskor bas/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo rab zhugs nas/ /phreng ba nyid ni dor bar bya/ /phreng ba de ni gar babs pa/ /de dang de ni skad cig 'grub/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung

bcas nas/ /phyag rgya thams cad bcing byas na/ /dngos grub thams cad nges pa ru/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /gzhan yang de la rdo rje 'chang / /byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /langs nas der ni bcom

ldan 'das/ /yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang rung / /'dar ba dang ni g.yo ba'ang rung / /de bzhin yan lag 'khums pa dang / /yang na tshig ni byung ba dang / /ci ste hU~M ni brjod pa'ang rung / /nges par legs so zhes bya ba/ /cho

'phrul bde ba chen po ni/ /rmad byung bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal ba ches/ /mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /de nas langs te brjod par bya/ /mgon po thub
pa la btud nas/ /ci 'dod pa ni bka' gnod bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon bka' thub che/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /slob ma rab tu gzhug par bgyi/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu

khams gsum gyi/ /sems can kun gyi bde gang yin/ /des ni rdo rje slob dpon de'i/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzogs so// // de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po der ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad 'jug tu rung ngo / /snod dang snod ma yin pa yongs su brtag par mi bya ste/ gzhug
pa la mngon par zhen pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi mod la phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /dad pa med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma

bsags pa dang / rgyud yongs su ma smin pa dang / mos pa med pa mang du zin kyang 'on kyang mthong ba tsam gyis so/ /gang gi phyir gsang ba chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor

gsang bas 'dul ba'i thabs dang / 'khor lo'i tshul dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul ba pa ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ngan song thams cad
rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba'i sras ni 'jigs pa med/ /ngan song sgo ni bcad pa dang / /thams cad thar pa la gzhol dang / /phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song ste/ /
byang chub sems ni bskyed du gzhug /sems can kun gyi don bsams nas/ /sdom pa yang ni sbyin par bya/ /srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas logs par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du

smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang dang / myos par 'gyur ba dag de nas brtsams te spang bar bya'o/ /sngon la sdom pa 'di dag ni/ /ji ltar 'dod cing mos pa ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyin bya ste/ /
rang dbang med par sbyin mi bya/ /gal te de ni dad gyur na/ /de la sdom pa sbyin par bya/ /sdom pa gsum la bkod nas ni/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /dkon

mchog gsum la skyabs song ste/ /bslab pa lnga la rnam par gnas/ /byang chub sems la mchog brtson bya/ /sems can shin du gdul dka' gang / /sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed cing / /dad dang ldan pa med pa yang / /'jug
