pa nyid ni dgag mi bya/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas thugs rje can/ /de dag gi ni sku ru 'gyur/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni/ /sdom pa dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid ngan pa'i sems can gang / /khro zhing shin du gshe ba dang / /

bzhad gad byed cing 'phya yang rung / /de nyid rgyi ru 'gyur ba yin/ /gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ru/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru/ /rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya/ /sbyor ba bzhi yis phyag bya zhing / /rdo rje sngags

kyang bsgom par bya/ /sngar bshad cho ga ji bzhin du/ /phyag bzhi dag kyang bya ba yin/ /stod g.yogs gos ni dmar po dang / /dmar pos mig kyang dgab par bya/ /gos ni dmar po bskon byas te/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas sku

'dzin pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /shin du gsal ba 'ching du gzhug /snying po lan gcig brjod bya zhing / /sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes bya brjod/ /dga' zhing mgu la rangs pa yis/ /sor mo gnyis kyis phreng ba blangs/ /

snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /slob dpon chen pos gzhug par bya/ /sa ma ya hU~M/ shar gyi sgo yi nang du ni/ /yi ge dzaHni yang dag brjod/ /lho ru zhags pa'i yi ge hU~M/ /nub tu lcags sgrog ba~M lhan cig /byang du
dril bu byang chub par/ /yi ge a ni brjod par bya/ /dus phyis rol pa dang bcas par/ /bkug ste phyag kyang btsal bar bya/ /bshags dang gsol gdab mchod pa dang / /yongs su bsngo dang rjes yi rang / /

bdag nyid dbul ba nyid kyang ni/ /go rim bzhin du byed tu gzhug /deng bdag ye shes rdo rje ni/ /the tshom med par bskyed par bya/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya ste/ /khyod ni phung bar gyur ta re/ /brjod nas phreng ba

dor tu gzhug /rdo rje'i phreng ba sbyin par bya/ /phreng ba de ni gang du babs/ /'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /oM badzra mA le/ rdo rje'i tshig ni rab brjod cing / /deng nas gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya/ /nges par

yid ches sbyin bya zhing / /dkyil 'khor ltos shes brjod par bya/ /oM nga ni rdo rje sems rang nyid/ /sangs rgyas snying po las byung ba/ /rdo rje mig ni dbye bar bya/ /kyai rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor ltos/ /dam tshig nyid ni

sbyin bya zhing / /sems ma'i phyag rgya steng du bcing / /'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig 'joms/ /rdo rje tshig ni brjod par bya/ /oM u da ka tha/ rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /phyag na rdo rjes srung bar byed/ /dam tshig nyid ni mnyam

gyur na/ /'bras bu 'di ni thob mi 'gyur/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'thung shig rdo rje bdud rtsi 'thung / /rdo rje sems dpa'i mna' yi

ni/ /snying po 'dis ni mna' bsgag go/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid ni/ /de ring khyod kyi snying la zhugs/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /skad cig de la dral nas gshegs/ /gang zhig sdom pa mi len cing / /shin du gdul
dka' dad med la/ /gzhug pa tsam ni sbyin par bya/ /de la las ni mi bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad dang ldan/ /sdig la 'j-igs shing rab tu bsdams/ /dad dang ldan pa phun sum tshogs/ /de la dam

tshig gang zhe na/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /gtso bo de dag lhur blang bya/ /'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni/ /byang sems nges par dor mi bya/ /lha rnams la ni smad mi bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya nam yang min/ /rdo rje slob dpon

brnyas mi bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs/ /bzhon pa mtshon cha phyag mtshan dang / /dman ma lus kyi grib ma rnams/ /gya tshom du ni brdzi mi bya/ /nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sngon ni ji ltar mthong / /

sems can gzhan la brjod mi bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bslab pa ni/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /sems can gsad par mi bya zhing / /theg pa gzhan la dga' mi bya/ /sems can don dang 'khor ba las/ /nam yang skyo bar mi

bya'o/ /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni/ /nam yang 'dor bar mi bya'o/ /bya ba ma yin rtag tu spang / /khyod kyi dam tshig sdom pa yin/ /gal te snod ldan mchog yin na/ /'di 'dra'i dam tshig brjod par bya/ /ci ste min na btang snyoms

gzhag /ci ste 'dod pa bde bar bya/ /sbyor ba 'di dag thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa ru/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi dam tshig mchog /thams cad tu ni sbyor bar bya/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje

slob ma gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje chos ni bsgrub pa yis/ /dngos grub mchog kyang sbyin par bya/ /gal te rdo rje can rang grub/ /mkhas pas gzhan la'ang bslab par bya/ /rang nyid ye shes yang dag skyes/ /de bzhin gzhan la bskyed par

bya/ /dkyil 'khor mthong zhing cho ga shes/ /dam tshig dngos grub dang ldan pa'i/ /dad dang ldan pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dir ni slob dpon 'gyur ba yin/ /de yis mchod pa byas nas ni/ /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /

mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /lan bdun gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje slob ma la brjod bya/ /'di las 'jig rten gzhan du min/ /sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol/ /khyod 'dir rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /sangs

rgyas rnams kyi spyod sprul zhing / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye/ /'khor ba'i gnas kyi btson ra ru/ /slar yang sdug bsngal 'gyur ba med/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs pa ru/ /de ring

khyod ni gyur pa yin/ /nga la spyi bos gus pas gtugs/ /lus ni theg gsum pha rol phyin/ /mi khom par ni skye mi 'gyur/ /byang chub spyod pas nyes pa med/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob 'gyur/ /rdo rje can khyod brtson par gyis/ /

gzhan tsho bcu drug gis thob pa/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis sa thob kyang / /dkyil 'khor gsang ba mthong ma gyur/ /ji ltar khyod ni der gyur pa/ /de bzhin theg pa yid ches min/ /skye dang skye ba thams cad

du/ /rdo rje can ni ston brtson 'gyur/ /skye ba bcu drug mthar thug pas/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i gnas kyi sa thob cing / /bskal pa grangs med gnyis dka' spyod/ /gsang ba'i theg par ma

zhugs par/ /bcu drug gis ni 'gyur ba yin/ /'byung po kun gyis mthong mi 'gyur/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /lha tshogs gdug pa thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje can gyis zil mi non/ /rims gdon dug dang phyag rgya dang / /

mkha' 'gro la sogs 'jigs pa'i gdong / /nga rgyal dang bcas gzhan dag gis/ /slar yang khyod ni zil non min/ /de ni bskal pa brgya ru yang / /rdo rje'i yon tan nyid brjod 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong 'gyur/ /

nam yang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems dpa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya bcings/ /brtson 'grus chen pos brtan par bya/ /ji skad du ni brjod par bya/ /dbab pa bla na med pa ste/ /'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ni/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' zhes byar bshad/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med pa/ /de nyid kyis ni dbab par bya/ /badzra A be sha aH/ de nas dbab par gyur pa nyid/ /mngon par shes pa drug thob cing / /ye shes dam pa thang cig gis/ /sngon byung

min pa'i dga' bde dang / /dga' ba mgu ba mchog dag dang / /rig pa thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul dag ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /de nas phyag rgya snying gar dgrol/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

rgyal po che/ /rtag tu snying gar zhugs par 'gyur/ /oM tiSh+tha badzra D-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ shA shwa to me b+ha ba/ hri da ya~M me a d+ha taSh+tha/ sarba sid d+hi ma me pra yats+tsha hU~M ha ha ha ha hoH/ de nas snying po 'di yis ni/ /phreng ba nyid ni dor bar bya/ /

pra tIts+tsha ho/ gnas gang du ni phreng ba babs/ /de yi lha ni rigs de yin/ /go rim bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi/ /gsang ba chen po bstan par bya/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas sa ni the tshom med/ /

dri dang ldan zhing yid 'ong ba/ /bum pa'i chu ni blangs nas ni/ /snying po 'di yis dbang bskur bya/ /sdug bsngal rab tu 'khrud pa'i mchog /oM badzra a b+hi shiny+tsa/ de nas phyag rgya gang rung bas/ /phreng ba byin nas dbang bskur bya/ /

rdo rje'i ming gi dbang bskur la/ /ming gi sgra ni rab sbyar bya/ /oM badzra satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badzra nA ma/ slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /de la ye shes bslab par

bya/ /bzhi las gang yang rung ba ni/ /skal ba ji bzhin dri bar bya/ /gal te nor gyi dngos grub smra/ /de ni rnam bzhir bshad par bya/ /nor gyi ye shes chen po bzhi/ /dngos grub rnams ni bslab par bya/ /gang na gter ni yod

re ba/ /der ni dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ /snying gar rdo rje bsgoms na ni/ /gter gyi gnas ni rab mthong 'gyur/ /badzra ni d+hi/ nam mkhar rdo rje bsgom bya zhing / /me long la ni yang dag blta/ /gang du lhung bar mthong gyur pa/ /de na

gter ni yod par bstan/ /rat+na ni d+hi/ rang gi lce la rdo rje bsgom/ /'di na yod ces rang nyid smra/ /d+harma ni d+hi/ rdo rje las ni yang dag babs/ /gang du babs pa der bstan to/ /karma ni d+hi/ gal te rdo rje'i dngos grub smra/ /

rnam pa bzhi ni bslab par bya/ /chu ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin mthong / /shin du mnyam gzhag dga' bar 'gyur/ /chu ni stug pa'i rang bzhin mthong / /chu yi steng du bcag par 'gyur/ /badzra dza la/ bdag nyid ting 'dzin dang ldan pas/ /

yang dang yang du dgar bar bya/ /bdag nyid dga' ba'i gzugs su ni/ /bsgoms na de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /badzra r+'u pa/ bdag nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin mtshungs/ /rang bzhin med pa nyid bsgoms shing / /rdo rje dbab pa bskyed

byas na/ /myur du mi snang ba nyid 'gyur/ /badzra A kA sha / rdo rje'i skas ni nam mkha' la/ /bsgom zhing steng du 'dzeg byas na/ /ji srid du ni 'dzeg pa'i gnas/ /de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /badzra ma hA/ rig pa

'dzin pa 'dod smra na/ /ye shes rnam bzhi sbyin par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing / /nam mkha' la ni bdag nyid gnas/ /lag na rdo rje dang ldan par/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rig pa

'dzin par 'gyur/ /gal te chos kyi phyag 'dod na/ /gnas sam yang na gzhan yang rung / /bdag nyid gnas par bsgoms na ni/ /de ltar gnas shing lag pa ru/ /rdo rje pad ma rab bsgom zhing / /bdag nyid rdo rje chos su ste/ /pad ma

rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /badzra d+ha ra/ pad ma d+ha ra/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste/ /bdag nyid las dang yang dag ldan/ /nam mkha' la gnas bdag nyid ni/ /las kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen

dang / /de bzhin du ni bdag nyid gnas/ /lag tu rin chen rnams bsgoms na/ /rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /karma d+ha ra/ rata na d+ha ra/ gal te sangs rgyas dngos grub smra/ /ye shes rnam bzhi brjod par bya/ /rtag tu nam mkhar bsgoms

nas ni/ /lus ni yang ba nyid 'gyur zhing / /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni gnas thob 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du 'phar/ /badzra ri d+hi/ stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin bstan/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod/ /

de srid skad cig gis 'phar 'gyur/ /badzra badzra/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dag /yan lag pad ma dang ldan zhing / /bdag nyid dag par rab bsgoms na/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur/ /shud d+ha shud d+ha/ nyin mtshan
brtson 'grus dang bcas pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' yi/ /dbyings su bzhugs par bsams na ni/ /rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /khams gsum 'di dag thams cad ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su mos

byas nas/ /brtan par rjes su dran grub na/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /satwa satwa/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ gang tshe gsang ba'i lha mor 'gyur/ /de yi rigs kyi lha ru 'gyur/ /ye shes dag pa brjod bya zhing / /de la mna' yang

bsgag par bya/ /ji skad gsang mdo dbang gsungs pa/ /de bzhin b+ha gar gzhug par bya/ /yid kyis thams cad bcug nas ni/ /de yi lus ni mnyam du spro/ /mi bskyod thugs ka nas byung ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas/ /de yi

thugs khar zhugs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun ni mnyam du spro/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te/ /mnyam par bzhag pas pheg rdob bya/ /rdo rje thal mo'i pheg brdabs pas/ /dngos grub thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /badzra pA sha / rin

dbang thugs ka nas byung ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas/ /sangs rgyas kun ni bcug nas kyang / /bdag nyid rdo rje'i lha mo ru/ /rdo rje thal mo byas nas ni/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthil brdab bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor bsgrub bya zhing / /rdo rje

ye shes yang dag brdab/ /rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni/ /de bzhin du ni b+ha gar zhugs/ /rdo rje thal mo byas nas ni/ /sor mo'i rtse mos mnyam du brdab/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /rtag tu nyon mongs dang 'brel ba/ /nyon mongs zhes bya'i

sgrib pa dag /skad cig gis ni rigs brgya 'joms/ /badzra hA na/ de bzhin b+ha gar gnas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas sku ni mnyam du spro/ /rdo rje lha mor rang bdag nyid/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs kar gnas/ /rdo rje lha mo bcings nas ni/ /badzra badzra

lan gnyis brjod/ /rdo rje bsdams pa nges bkrol na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog /badzra ha ra/ de nas rnam par snang mdzad bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni/ sngar gyi ting 'dzin ji bzhin du/ /rdo rje dbyings ni rab

tu bya/ /rnal 'byor lnga la'ang rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min/ /oM tsit+ta pra ti b+he d+hang ka ro mi/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta uta pA da yA mi/ oM tiSh+Tha badzra/ oM badzra Ata ma ko ha~M/ oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tAsta thA a ha~M/

rnal 'byor lnga po 'di yis ni/ /phyag rgya lnga ni yang dag bsgrub/ /rnam par snang mdzad rang bdag nyid/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /

sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung 'dug ste/ /rdo rje gsor la gzung bar bya/ /sku dang gsung thugs phyag rgya dag /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur/ /badzra satwA ha~M/ bsgrub pa dag gi mchog chen po/ /de nas yang dag bshad

par bya/ /rang nyid rdo rje gsung gis bshad/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor bsgrub par bya/ /bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul yang dag gzung / /rdo rje dbab par rang gyur nas/ /bdag nyid rdo rje zhes byar bsgom/ /badzra

satwA ha~M/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan zhing / /dkyil 'khor ma lus ston mdzad pa/ /phreng ba'i rnam pa 'od dang ldan/ /rgyan dang gos dang kha dog ldan/ /Da ba ta ni brjod bya zhing / /sems dpa' chen po rjes dran bya/ /ye shes

sems dpa' gos pa med/ /dga' bdag ji srid mthong bar du/ /badzra satwa dr-i sh+ya/ sems dpa' mdun du bltas nas ni/ /bdag nyid la ni yang dag dbab/ /oM badzra sa twa aH/ sdug cing che ba'i sku de ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyus yang

dag dgug /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/ /bdag nyid chen pos blta bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka ru/ /slar yang de yi snying gar gzhug /sa ma ya aH/ zhes brjod nas ni rnal 'byor pa/ /zla ba dang ldan steng du

gnas/ /ci 'dod pa yi bya ba byed/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'di ji bzhin/ /de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rang gi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa'i/ /rdo rje can kun bsgom par bya/ /gang dang gang la mos gyur

pa/ /de bzhin snying po bzla bar bya/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje can dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran rab grub nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bya/ /rang gi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i

thugs grub pas/ /'khor los sgyur ba nyid thob 'gyur/ /rgyal po bya ba sngon 'gro bas/ /mnyes pa dang ni dbang bskur bya/ /thun ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /chos kyi bzhad dang dga' bar 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin gzungs kyi 'khor lo dang / /

gsang ba'i mdzod ni bla na med/ /smin pa dang ni grol ba nyid/ /sangs rgyas byang chub brtan pa'i mchog /rtog pa gsang chen 'di las ni/ /phyag rgya grangs med yang dag byung / /rigs kyi dbye ba yang dag ldan/ /rgya cher rab tu

bsgrags pa yin/ /go cha ma bgos snod mi 'gyur/ /le lo khro dang g.yengs bcas pas/ /nges par 'dzin par mi nus te/ /de bas nyung bar rab tu bsgrags/ /mdo sde'i dbang po gsang rgyal po/ /de nas phyag rgya rab tu bshad/ /

theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/ /rin chen snod du blta bar bya/ /ye shes kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so// // rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi snying po/ gang las 'khor lo yang dag byung / /rnal 'byor thams cad kun 'byung ba/ /

mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya/ /dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag bshad/ /rnam 'phrul zhes ni rab tu bsgrags/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul te/ /'khor lo thabs ni rab ston pa/ /'khor lo lnga ru yang dag bshad/ /

thabs ni rnam pa lnga yang yin/ /gsang ba yi ni dbye ba gnas/ /'khor lo yi ni rnam 'phrul ston/ /dbus ma gang yin byang chub sems/ /shar gyi bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi/ /lho yi tshogs su bshad pa ste/ /bsod nams tshogs dang

yang dag ldan/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams dang / /chos su 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /nub tu yang dag brjod pa yin/ /byang ni sems can smin byas te/ /phyi rol grwa bzhi gang yin pa/ /tshad med pa ni bzhi dang bcas/ /

byams pa snying rje btang snyoms dang / /dga' ba zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /gang zhig thig skud yang dag bshad/ /chos kyi rgyun gyi lam las byung / /lta ba thams cad rnam dag 'di/ /theg pa gzhi ni rnam par spangs/ /gang zhig kha khyer

zhes bya ba/ /ting 'dzin chos nyid dag pa ste/ /rdo rje lha mor yang dag bshad/ /gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya bar bshad/ /sgo ru yang dag bshad pa gang / /thar pa'i sgo ni bzhi po yin/ /rta babs dang ni dra ba nyid/ /chos mdzod rang bzhin grong khyer yin/ /

dra ba dra phyed bla bre ni/ /rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rnam 'phrul pa/ /tshon rtsi yang dag bshad pa gang / /de 'dra ba yi byang chub tshogs/ /gang zhig mar me yang dag bshad/ /de na chos kyi snang ba mchog /dri ru yang dag bshad pa gang / /grags pa'i dri ni bla

na med/ /rdzu 'phrul byug pa gang yin pa/ /tshul khrims dri yis byugs pa yin/ /bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa/ /chos kyi zas ni bla na med/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bar bshad/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /grong khyer du ni bshad pa gang / /de ni thar pa'i

grong khyer mchog /gang zhig dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad/ /chos kyi snying po rang bzhin grong / /nad med ces ni bya bar brjod/ /de ni dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /dbus su rnam snang mdzad ces pa/ /chos kun gcig tu bsdus pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rgyal po gtso

bo che/ /phyogs rnams kun du rnam par gsal/ /rdo rje sems dpar yang dag bshad/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin mchog /de bas rgyal po byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems las yang dag byung / /rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung / /sems ni rnam pa bzhi zhes bya/ /

sgrol dang grol dang dbugs dbyung dang / /mya ngan 'da' bar lcags kyu'o/ /rdo rje chags par yang dag bshad/ /byang chub spyod pa la sbyor ba/ /rdo rje legs par yang dag bshad/ /rab tu sbyor ba ston pa nyid/ /rdo rje rin chen yang dag bshad/ /sems can bsam pa yongs

rdzogs byed/ /rdo rje gzi brjid yang dag bshad/ /chos kyi sbyor ba 'od byed pa/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag bshad/ /sems can 'khor ba las grol byed/ /rdo rje bzhad par yang dag bshad/ /sems can the tshom gcod par byed/ /rdo rje chos su yang dag bshad/ /chos kyi

ye shes bla na med/ /rdo rje rnon por yang dag bshad/ /nyon mongs gcod cing 'joms byed pa/ /rdo rje rgyu ru yang dag bshad/ /'khor lo rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/ /rdo rje smra bar yang dag bshad/ /rdo rje chos ni ston byed pa/ /rdo rje las su yang dag bshad/ /sems can 'dul

bar byed pa'i mchog /rdo rje bsrung bar yang dag bshad/ /sems can grol bar byed pa'i mchog /rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag bshad/ /'khor ba'i zhags pa zad byed pa/ /rdo rje khu tshur yang dag bshad/ /byang chub mchog ni brtan par byed/ /rdo rje sems ma rdo rje chos/ /rin chen

las kyi rdo rje ma/ /rdo rje rin chen chos chen po/ /las kyi gsang ba las byung ba/ /rdo rje lha mo lhag pa brgyad/ /pha rol phyin mchog lhag ma brgyad/ /chos ma shes rab pha rol phyin/ /las ma thabs kyi mchog yin no/ /pha rol phyin bcu dam pa ni/ /sa bcu dag tu yang

dag bshad/ /dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer srung / /byang chub sems dpa' zhes byar bshad/ /e ma'o ye shes e ma'o chos/ /e ma'o thar pa'i grong khyer mchog /e ma'o rnam 'phrul 'khor lo ni/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug dag gis bstan/ /chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis

ni/ /mgon pos thar par dgod par mdzad/ /gang du sangs rgyas rgal gyur nas/ /sems can rnams kyang grol bar mdzad/ /'di ni chos kyi rang bzhin grub/ /'di chos rang bzhin shing rta ste/ /chos kyi rang bzhin snying po 'di/ /'di chos rang bzhin grong khyer yin/ /de kho na nyid mchog tu

gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje rtse mo las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa ste le'u dang po rdzogs so// // dngos grub thams cad bla na med/ /de nas gsang ba

bshad par bya/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni sbyar bar bya/ /cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du/ /phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya/ /ci rigs par ni bcing bya yi/ /gzhan du myur du 'grub mi 'gyur/ /thal mo mnyam pa bcing bya ste/ /sngon la thal mo

mnyam par bya/ /de nas rdo rje thal mo bcings/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcing bar bya/ /sor mo rdo rje bsdams bcings nas/ /snying po brjod cing dral bar bya/ /de nas phyag rgya dbang du gyur/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /badzra ban d+ha traT/ 'di ni sngon du brjod bya zhing / /de nas phyag rgya yang dag

bcing / /gang gi drung du bcings pa ni/ /bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlabs/ /ma hA sa ma ya satwA ha~M/ shes rab can gyis dbab pa bsam/ /bdag la sems dpa' dbab par bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /snying po yang ni brjod par bya/ /a phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis

ni/ /yan lag kun la yongs su gnas/ /snying po brjod par bya ba ste/ /snying po 'di dag nyid yin no/ /sa ma yo ha~M/ de nas bdag nyid byin brlabs nas/ /rang lha yang dag rjes su dran/ /snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /snying po brjod par bya ba yin/ /sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mA~M/ phyag rgya bsgrub pa

lhur len pa/ /de nas shes rab can gyis bsgrub/ /dam tshig sems dpa' chen po dag /rnam pa bzhi ni bsgrub par bya/ /de la 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po ni/ aR+tha sid+d+hi/ badzra sid+d+hi/ badzra bIr+ya ra/ bud d+ha sid d+hi/ de nas phyag rgya brtan

par byed pa ni/ oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ sarba sid+hi me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+ta~M shre yaHku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha hoH/ b+ha ga wAn sarba ta thA ga to badzra mA

me muny+tsa badzrI b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya sa twa AH/ mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'drar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing / /thams cad 'grub par the tshom med/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba ni thun mong

yin no/ /phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni/ /tha mar bdag nyid dbang bskur bya/ /sor mo'i rtse mos phreng ba che/ /rnam bzhi yang na rnam pa gsum/ /oM badzra rata na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ shes rab can gyis go cha bcing / /ci nus par ni dbang

bskur bya/ /snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /phyag rgya thams cad brtan par bya/ /ba ra ka pa tse na ba~M/ gang nas byung ba der grol te/ /snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /gnas de ru ni dgrol bar bya/ /gzhan du bya ba mi

byed do/ /oM badzra mu/ mgon po thal mo mnyes bya zhing / /rdo rje thal mo bcing bar bya/ /snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /rdo rje can kun mnyes par bya/ /badzra tu Sh+ya ho/ /cho ga 'di yis dgrol bya ste/ /phyag rgya dgrol ba mchog yin no/ /phyag

rgya thams cad brtan 'gyur na/ /rdo rje can ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /snga dro'i dus su nyin re zhing / /shin du bsdams shing gsang gyur pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'dod bzlas/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /badzra satwa/ gsang ba'i

yi ge hU~M bzlas pas/ /rnam pa lnga ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /zla ba gnyis pa yongs su bsgom/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas dang ldan pa/ /rdo rje'i

dbus su bsgom par bya/ /mdor na rdo rje'i dbus su ni/ /yi ge hU~M ni sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /yi ge hU~M ni bsgrub par bya/ /hU~M/ de ltar rnam pa bcu drug ni/ /phyag mtshan thams cad rab tu bsgom/ /zla ba'i dbus su rab sbyor bas/ /

bdag nyid thams cad skad cig 'grub/ /yang na yi ge sbyor bas ni/ /dbus su sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ /zla ba yi ni sbyor ba yis/ /yi ge dza sogs 'grub mi 'gyur/ /yi ge ho dang sa dang ni/ /yi ge oM sogs rab sbyor bas/ /zla ba la ni oM

a tra~M/ /yi ge ha~M ni rab tu bsgrub/ /hrIHdang d+hIHdang ma~M pa~M ra~M/ /ka~M ha~M hU~M ba~M bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag gis/ /rdo rje bzlas pas 'grub par bya/ /bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /bcu drug bdag nyid rab sbyor bas/ /rnal 'byor

rgyud tu bsgrub bya zhing / /zla ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /de kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni/ nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams te/ /bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun la mchod par bya/ /rdo rje can rnams bzod par gsol/ /

phyag rgya thams cad bcing bya zhing / /rdo rje thal mos mnyes par bya/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /thams cad byas nas gdon par bya/ /lan gsum dang ni lan bdun du/ /bskor ba dag kyang rab tu bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /mkhas

pa yis ni dral bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /'khor lo'i dbus su steng du bcing / /gang gis sems ni dag gyur pa/ /phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcing / /oM badzra muH/ snying po 'di ni brjod nas su/ /phyag rgya thams cad steng du bcing / /sgo dang phyi

rol mchod pa la/ /rdo rje'i mu ni brjod par bya/ /gsang ba 'di ni gsang ba che/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa ni/ /shes rab can gyis kun mi bstan/ /sdom dang ldan pa mchog la sbyin/ /shin du snod ldan pha rol la/ /de ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs te/ /

lag pa g.yas su rdo rje ste/ /g.yon du dril bu sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje'i brtul zhugs gsang chen po/ /snying po 'di ni sbyin par bya/ /de byin snying gar 'dzin du gzhug /thams cad bsgrub pa'i mchog yin no/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brten/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha twa~M d+hA ra yA mi badzra satwa/ hi hi hi hi hU~M/ de nas thams cad mtshungs pa ru/ /

phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor dgrol bar bya/ /badzra satwa muH/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi bya ba rdzogs so// // ji ltar cho gar rab ldan nyid/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/ /de bzhin kun du bsgrub par bya/ /

rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis/ /rnal 'byor gyi ni rgyud bsdus pa/ /mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas mgon po che/ /spyod pa spyod phyir byung ba ste/ /chos kyi mgon po rnal 'byor che/ /

rgyud rnams thams cad yang dag byung / /sangs rgyas med cing sems dpa' med/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor sgrub pa med/ /sa dang gsang ba mchog med de/ /de bzhin gdul ba'i don du byung / /sangs rgyas mchog dang dam tshig mchog /sems

dpa' mchog gi bsgrub pa dang / /gsang mchog sems dpa'i spyod pa mchog /rdo rje rnal 'byor yang dag byung / /yon tan mchog dran dam tshig rnams kyi mchog /yon tan mchog dran dbu rgyan dam pa ste/ /grags chen dang ldan spyod pa

mchog 'dzin pa/ /yon tan mchog ldan rnams kyi spyod pa mchog /rdo rje chen po rab bsdams can/ /rnal 'byor chen po spyod pa chen po spyod/ /gsang ba chen po'i yon tan 'dzin mdzad pa/ /bde ba chen po yang dag 'byung ba gsol/ /

yon tan mchog dran ldan pa cod pan mchog /dam tshig tshogs mchog 'byung bas rgyan gyur pa/ /mi g.yo rab mchog mchog ster dri ma med/ /spyod mchog spyod pa'i mchog ste dri ma med/ /tshogs kyis bskor bar shin du bzhad mdzad pa/ /

gnod byed 'joms pa tra Ta tra Ta sgrogs/ /g.yo byed bskyed pa'i bzhad cing bzhad par mdzad/ /yon tan mchog drag rtsa la rtsa la pa/ /da ha da ha pa ya gnod mdzes 'joms/ /ha ra ha ra ha re ha re las mchog 'joms/ /gnas chen po ni stobs

kyis grub mdzad pa/ /rigs mchog stobs kyis sgrol zhing sgrol mdzad pa/ /ha ha hA ha ha hA ha ha hA/ hi hi hI hi hi hI hi hi hI hi hi hI/ hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu/ rab mchog bdag nyid mkhas pas 'dren gyur pa/ /Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI

Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI/ Tu Tu T+ya T+ya/ n+ya n+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya/ rgyan gyi spyod pa 'dar zhing 'dar bar mdzad/ /spyod pa spyod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur/ /spyod pa spyod byed rab mchog bdag nyid can/ /dam tshig rgyan te

rigs drug mchod gyur pa/ /bdag po chen po 'phrog byed 'joms par mdzad/ /'phrog byed bsgrub pa rnams ni grub mdzad pa/ /mchog gsol mchog gi bdag nyid yang dag byung / /ta te Ta te bstan pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /yi ge dza las rab byung

mchog ste hUM ni dang po las sbyor ba/ /ho ho 'dod chags mchog ldan bud med bstan byed sa ni len pa rab ster ba/ /oM ni dang po bla med Ta Ta Ta Ti sa a ni gzi brjid rab 'bar ba/ /tra~M tra~M rjes su chags pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs byed ha ni bzhad pa yang dag sbyor/ /

hrI ni chos can byed cing rab rno dri med hi ni rgyu yi 'khor lo che/ /ha~M dang ra~M ni mkha' dgyes smra ba'i sbyor ba 'ching byed a ni sna tshogs byed/ /ha~M ni bsrung ba tra ta 'ges byed ta Ta ta Ti sa hU~M ni za zhing 'cha'/ /ba~M ni dga' byed dga' ste tsha ta tsha ti Ta ni rab dga' byed/ /ha~M ni rdo rje

bstan pa dang bcas bde brtan 'dod chags bcas pa dga' byed do/ /ho ni mgon po skye ba mchog gi rgyur gyur hri ni dga' ba bdag nyid can/ /hi ni spyod pa 'god byed dul spong mchog ste dus gsum mgon pos bskor gyur pa/ /gsang zhing gsang

ba'i yon tan kun mchog dri med ho ni byang chub spyod pa mchog /mchog gi mchog ste mchog gsol go 'phang mchog thob yi ge hU~M ni gsol ba mchog /nyon mongs dri ma thams cad 'joms shing rab 'phro hU~M gi mche ba'i mtshon

char ldan/ /sna tshogs dga' ba mchog gis rnam par brgyan mdzes yi ge a~M dang yang dag spel/ /he ho ha~M ni yid 'ong hU~M gis rnaM 'joms gnod mdzes nges 'joms bdag nyid can/ /bde mchog glu dang rol mo dang bcas pa/ /gzugs

bzang dang ldan lha mo rnams kyis mchod/ /zla ba ltar dkar 'phro ba'i zhal mnga' ba/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i yon tan brtsegs pas mtshan/ /rin chen kun gyis rnam spras yid 'ong ba/ /rin chen dra ba'i bla res rnam par mdzes/ /rdo rje lha mo'i

tshogs kyis mchod cing mdzes/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ni 'jigs med pa/ /sa rnams kun gyis rnam sbyang dri med pa/ /byang chub spyod pa yongs rtogs bdag nyid can/ /chos mdzad yongs su rtogs pa'i zas dang ldan/ /bsod nams de

yis bskyed pa'i dga' ba che/ /tshangs pa'i gnas 'byor gru bzhir yang dag gnas/ /chos mchog go rim bzhin du thig btab pas/ /'khor lo mu khyud rab tu mdzes bris pa/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni gtso bo bzhugs/ /ting 'dzin mchog

rnams kha khyer gyis mdzes pa/ /gzungs kyi lha yi tshogs kyis mchod pa'i tshogs/ /thar pa'i theg pas byams pa'i sgo yis brgyan/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs/ /pha rol phyin pa btsun mo gar byed pa/ /sems can smin

byed rnam par 'phrul la dga'/ /bsam gtan zas ldan mngon shes mchog gis brgyan/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor de ni gtso bo'i chos nyid can/ /chos nyid bstan pa'i snying po kun zhugs pa/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs 'dus mdzes pa yis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang ba zhes byar bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa che/ /gsang ba kun 'byung ting 'dzin yang dag gnas/ /de ni rnam snang thub pa'i chos

nyid gzigs/ /gzungs dang dam tshig yang dag 'byung ba mchog / dga' ba'i chos bzhin rdo rje yang dag gnas/ /de ni rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug gtso/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po nges par phyung / /hU~M/ shin du dag pa'i chos nyid lta bur byung / /

sangs rgyas dbang phyug dam pa'i kun gyi mchog /rtse gcig dang bcas e ma'o dga' ba che/ /sangs rgyas sku yang bud med gzugs can te/ /sems can khams ni gdul phyir yang dag gnas/ /bud med gzugs kyang chos nyid dag pa

ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gdung rgyud gnas gyur pa/ /rang gi rigs chen byung ba des byung mdzod/ /oM badzra d+hA twI shwa ri hU~M/ oM badzra badzri Ni hU~M/ oM rata na badzri Ni hU~M/ oM d+harma badzri Ni hU~M/ oM karma badzri Ni hU~M/ mchog gi dang po rmad byung gsang ba lnga/ /sangs rgyas lngas byas

bud med gzugs can te/ /rmad byung dang bcas dbang phyug dam par gnas/ /rdo rje gsang chos nyid kyi gsang ba mchog /'khor lo'i sbyor bas kyang ni bzhugs gyur pas/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis ni shar du bzhugs/ /de ni rigs

kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor brjod/ /re re zhing yang rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan/ /rnal 'byor 'khor lor yongs su bshad pa mchog /de yis mi bskyod mchog tu byung ba yi/ /mchog tu gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor gsungs/ /

oM badzra sa twa gu h+ya sa ma ye hU~M/ oM gu h+ya badzra satwa ang ku sha hU~M/ oM badzra gu h+ya rA ge rA ga ya hU~M/ oM badzra gu h+ya sA d+hI shwa ri hU~M/ rdo rje rin chen dkyil 'khor bstan gyur pa/ /de yis slar yang snying po bzhi gsungs so/ /oM badzra gu h+ya

rata na sa ma ya~M hU~M/ oM badzra gu h+ya pra b+ha hU~M/ oM badzra d+h+wa dzA gra gu h+ya hU~M/ oM badzra gu h+ya hA sa hU~M/ rdo rje chos ni dbang phyug dam pa che/ /de yis slar yang snying po bzhi gsungs so/ /oM badzra d+harma gu h+ya sa ma ye hU~M/ oM badzra g+ho Sha gu h+ye hU~M/ oM

badzra gu h+ye maN Da le hU~M/ oM badzra gu h+ye bA tsa sa ma ye hU~M/ rdo rje las ni yongs su dag pas mchod/ /'khor lo thams cad la ni yongs gnas mdzes/ /chos mchog dbang phyug dam pa mchog gyur pa/ /de yis snying po bzhi ni gsungs

par 'gyur/ /oM badzra gu h+ya karma sa ma ye hU~M/ oM badzra gu h+ya ka ba tse hU~M/ oM badzra gu h+ya da~MSh+Ta d+hA ra Ni hU~M/ oM badzra gu h+ya muSh+Ti hU~M/ sngar bzhin 'khor lo'i grong khyer yongs gnas pa/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su yongs gnas mdzes gyur pa/ /

de nyid sangs rgyas sras te rdo rjer bcas/ /'on kyang da ltar bud med gzugs su sprul/ /de dag srid pa dag byed rab tu 'bar/ /thar pa'i grong du 'dod chags dag byed pa/ /rtog dang rnam par rtog pa bzlog pas dag /chos la dga' zhing sku

mchog 'byung 'gyur ba/ /bden dang mi bden rnam dag nyi shu dang / /chos dang chos min dga' zhing dga' ba'i snod/ /byed dang byed min rdo rje tha dad gcig /rdo rje bstan pa ho yis rab sbyongs spyod/ /gsang 'byor rin

chen las byas chos grong ste/ /rnam 'phrul 'khor lo 'di ni ma pham don/ /rdo rje bla re'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /gsang dbang rdo rje chen po yis/ /thar pa' rang bzhin grong khyer mdzad/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /

'khor lo lnga ni yang dag byung / /de bzhin gshegs rigs shes bya dang / /mi phyed brtan par byed pa dang / /byang chub spyod pa rab spyod mchog /theg pa chen po'i tshul gyis mchog /gdul bya ji bzhin 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /

gtso bo'i spyod pa ji bzhin lhan cig spyod/ /sems can gdul bya ma yin snod mchog min/ /mthu chen rnams ni dngos grub stsol mi mdzad/ /der ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin dag /yon tan mang po yang dag 'byung / /sems can rnams ni gdul

bya'i phyir/ /rdo rje'i btsun mo yang dag byung / /de nyid sangs rgyas sras bcas pa/ /de nyid 'khor lo'i grong khyer che/ /mchod pa sgo srungs dang bcas pa/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag byung / /mgon po rdo rje gsang dbang phyug /rdo rje dbyings kyi

dbang mor bshad/ /rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog /sngon ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis/ /de bzhin dbus su rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs yin te/ /gsang ba'i sbyor ba yang dag byung / /rdo rje dbyings ni ji skad brjod/ /

de nyid gsang ba zhes byar brjod/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/ /rgyas par phyag rgya dang bcas par/ /'khor lo lnga yi dkyil 'khor mchog /rgyas pa ru ni yang dag bshad/ /mdo sde'i gsang dbang rgyal po ni/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las/ /

gsang ba'i rgyud dang phyag rgyud dang / /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zla ba dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni/ /de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi snying rab mchog /mdor na drug tu bshad pa yin/ /dam chos spyod pa dang ldan pa/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa'i rigs/ /nus pa ji bzhin rigs pa bzhin/ /ji ltar spyod pa dkyil 'khor mchog /ci rigs par ni cho ga bzhin/ /mchog tu rmad 'byung bshad par bya/ /sngon la de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi/ /sems dpa' nga yis dbye bar bya/ /

nga yis mdo sde gsang dbang bshad/ /gang du byis pa dag rmongs pa/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu drug ni/ /gsang ba nges par bslab par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

dbus su ni/ /rkang lag thal sbyar rdo rje ni/ /kha gyes pa ni bsgom bya zhing / /rdo rje can yang chags par bya/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /zla ba gcig tu yongs su bsdu/ /rdo rje'i dbang phyug lha mo nga / /dbus ma la ni yongs su gzung / /

sgeg pa dang bcas 'gro bya zhing / /rnam par 'phrul pas bzhin rmongs bya/ /bsgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje can yang mnyes par bya/ /sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas nas ni/ /spyi bor thal mo sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni

bcings nas su/ /bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /bsgom bya'i phyag rgya 'di yis ni/ /sku yi phyag rgya rnam par bcing / /lag ngar lcags kyur bskum bya zhing / /bdag nyid yongs su bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /

rdo rje'i mda' ni kun du dgang / /legs pas legs so zhes bya zhing / /dpung pas bdag nyid go bgor bya/ /slar yang gsang ba bya ba ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /bdag nyid rdo rje gc-ig pu gnas/ /gsang ba lha mo'i dbang phyug mchog /

de bzhin lag ngar bkug bya zhing / /spyi bor rdo rje bsam par bya/ /phyogs gcig tu ni nga 'dug ste/ /rdo rje gnyis kyi go cha bya/ /thams cad rdo rje'i lus yin te/ /rin chen mig ni yongs gsal ba/ /gdong dang tshig ni pad ma

dang / /me tog kun 'dar bsgom par bya/ /byis pa bzhin du mig bskyod cing / /bud med rgyu mtshan yang dag bsgrub/ /smin ma bskyod cing khro gnyer gtsigs/ /khro bor lta bas mig gdangs pa/ /khro mo'i lta ba 'dod chags che/ /

'dzum bcas mig ni btsum par bya/ /mig gdangs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje'i lta bas bgrad par bya/ /slar yang tshig ni rnam pa bzhi/ /ho ni rkan dang lkog ma la/ /dza ni lce yi dbus dang rtse/ /oM ni lkog ma mchu dag la/ /mchu dang

mchu yi rtse la ba~M/ /de rnaMs gsang ba rab rgyas pa/ /bskrad dang spyos dang gcad pa dang / /bcing ba rdo rje tshig gis bya/ /de bzhin kho nar zla dbus na/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rang bdag nyid/ /rin chen chos dang de bzhin las/ /gsang ba'i bdag nyid bsgom

par bya/ /cho ga thams cad rgyas pa ru/ /rdo rje gsang ba rjes su srung / /ji ltar rnal 'byor yang dag gnas/ /de bzhin gsang mchog 'dzin pa gnas/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bla na med/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag

gnas/ /rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya/ /dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /phyi rol las grol yang dag gnas/ /langs sam yang na 'dug kyang rung / /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul dag pa/ /spyod pa chen po tshul chen po/ /

bdag nyid chos chen rab bsgoms na/ /rdo rje'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'du byed sdug bsngal chen po las/ /dga' ba'i spyod pas spro bar bya/ /snying rje chen pos dmigs nas ni/ /sems can btang snyoms dor mi bya/ /lce dang rkan

la sbyar bya zhing / /sna yi rtse mos bsgom par bya/ /rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /sna yi rtse mor de bzhin gnas/ /snying ga'i spyi bo ci nus par/ /sku ni thams cad yongs su spro/ /rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg pas/ /sems ni mnyam par bzhag

par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje phra mo yongs su spro/ /rang gi lus kyi mdun du ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs

dbus su/ /rdo rje kun gyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /lte bar sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rnams bsgoms sems gang zhig /gzugs med bstan du med pa dang / /rmongs

pa med cing 'jigs pa med/ /rdo rje phra mor 'dir brjod do/ /dngos po med cing rdzas med pas/ /snang ba med par rab tu bsgom/ /bdag med sems can med pa ru/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rnal 'byor bsgom/ /lus ni rdzas lnga'i bdag nyid

can/ /khams bzhi la ni yang dag brten/ /skye mched bcu gnyis nyid dang ni/ /gzhan yang khams ni bcwa brgyad dag /sha dang rus pa khrag nyid dang / /rkang dang glad pas kun du khyab/ /sna tshogs rdzas kyis kun du khyab/ /bad kan mkhris pa

la sogs tshogs/ /sna tshogs srin bu'i rigs kyis khyab/ /dri ngan mi gtsang 'byung ba ru/ /rang gi lus la so sor brtag /sdug bsngal gsum ni kun 'byung bar/ /nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu ni/ /lus ni rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /rang sems

so sor brtag bya ste/ /gang zhig de ru yang dag byung / /'gro ba med cing song ba med/ /de la 'pho ba yod ma yin/ /de la 'byung ba yod min na/ /gang las sems ni yang dag byung / /yang dag ma yin kun rtog 'di/ /brdzun bzhin sems ni

rmongs par byed/ /sems med tsam yang yod ma yin/ /brdzun bzhin 'byung ba snang bar 'gyur/ /'di la gnas dang mtshan nyid dang / /rab gnas 'byung ba yod ma yin/ /gzung bar dga' ba gti mug che/ /rdo rje phra mor brjod

par bya/ /de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /sems bsgom pa yi rnam pa bzhin/ /lus dang sems dang tshor ba dag /phra mo'i rnam par bsgom par bya/ /sU k+Sh+ma badzra/ rdo rje reg pa'i mtshan ma yi/ /gnas ni yang dag shes par bya/ /de ni byung na

spro bya ste/ /stong gsum du ni yongs su spro/ /s+pha ra Na badzra/ reg pas sbyor ba bsdu bya ste/ /skrag cing rmongs par mi bya'o/ /gnas gsum du yang bsdu bya ste/ /blo yis so sor brtag par bya/ /sa~M ha ra Na badzra/ chos la dmigs pa'i sems

nyid ni/ /rmongs shing bzhom par mi bya'o/ /rdo rje de ni brtan bya zhing / /rdo rje phra mo reg par bya/ /badzra dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/ /rgyal po tshangs pa'i gtsug phud can/ /spyi bor sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing / /sku ni thams

cad yongs su spro/ /badzra Ata ma ko/ dpral bar rdo rje rin chen ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /mtshan ma dag ni spro bya zhing / /sems dpa' kun yang spro bar bya/ /badzra rata na Ata ma ka /rdo rje chos ni shin du

dag /sna yi rtse mor bsgom par bya/ /de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing / /lus rnams kun yang spro bar bya/ /badzra pad ma Ata ma ka / lus kun la ni yang dag khyab/ /chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su bsgom/ /de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing / /sems

dpa' kun yang spro bar bya/ /sarba badzra Ata ma ka / sems dpa' de bzhin rin chen las/ /chos ni spyi bor bsgom par bya/ /de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing / /sku ni thams cad yongs su spro/ /sarba badzra/ sna la lcags kyu yang dag gnas/ /

blo ldan mi yis bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug bya zhing / /rang gi lus ni brtan par bya/ /snying ga 'dod chags gnas su ni/ /'dod chags rnam par dag pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya ste/ /chos kyi dbyings

ni brtan par 'gyur/ /legs so zhes pa gzung bya ste/ /spyi bor yang dag gnas pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya zhing / /chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro/ /hr-i da badzra ang ku sha / tiSh+tha badzra rA ga hr-i da ye A di badzra

duSh+Ti/ snying gar rdo rje nyi ma ni/ /blo ldan mi yis bsgom par bya/ /'od kyi gzi brjid spro bya zhing / /'jig rten kun kyang spro bar bya/ /spyi bor 'khri shing 'od bcas pa/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mor rnam par bsam/ /rin chen char dag spro bya zhing / /

snod kyi sprin ni yang dag spro/ /bzhad pas bde ba bsams nas ni/ /shin du sdug bsngal nges par sbyar/ /chos kyi char yang spro bya zhing / /snang ba'i sprin yang spro bar bya/ /hr-i da ya badzra sUr+ya tiSh+Ta badzra d+h+wa dzA gre/ hr-i da ya badzra hA sa/

spyi bor rjes dran nas brtsams nas/ /ral gri gtso bo bsam par bya/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gcad bya zhing / /sems dpa' thams cad spro bar bya/ /snying ga'i 'khor lo'i gnas su ni/ /chos kyi rgyu mthun bsgom par bya/ /nam mkha'

kun du spro bya zhing / /chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro/ /de yi rigs las byung ba'i sgra/ /shes rab can gyis lce rtser bsam/ /chos kyi tshig ni spro bya zhing / /phyogs rnams kun du yongs su spro/ /hr-i da badzra g+ho Sha/ tiSh+Tha badzra hri da ya~M/ pra be sha badzra wA g+t+ra/

spyi bor rjes dran nas brtsams te/ /mchod pa'i las ni rnam par bsam/ /mchod pa'i phyir ni rdo rje spro/ /phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/ /snying gar rdo rje go cha ni/ /shin du mnyam par bzhag pas bsam/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol byed pa/ /go cha'i

rnam par spro bar bya/ /spyi bo nas brtsams rkang mthil du/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bsam par bya/ /rdo rje'i snying po gzhug bya zhing / /rdo rje'i rang bzhin thams cad spro/ /hri da badzra ka ba tse/ tiSh+Tha badzra yak+Sha badzra badzra muSh+Ti hr-i da ya~M/ grogs dang grogs min ma lus pa/ /'byung po kun la

byams pa ni/ /ma lus lus pa med pa ru/ /mnyam du khyab par spro bar bya/ /kye ma sems can 'di sdug bsngal/ /'gro ba lnga ru kun du 'khyams/ /nyin dang mtshan du rab sbyor bas/ /snying rje nyid ni spro bar bya/ /nyin mtshan dge dang zhe sdang med/ /sems

can dge ba don gnyer gang / /rjes su yi rang bde chen po/ /sems can kun la yongs su spro/ /rgal bar bka' ba'i lam zhugs shing / /sangs rgyas byang chub la gnas pa/ /sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /blo chen ldan pas btang snyoms

bzhag /ma hA mai tri s+pha ra Na/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya s+pha ra Na/ sarba bud d+ha pra mo da s+pha ra Na/ ma ho pe k+Sha s+pha ra Na/ nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par bsam/ /sems can mnyam par dmigs pa yis/ /

nam mkha' kun du yongs su spro/ /badzra mu khi b+ha ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /snying ka rdo rje chos nyid brtan/ /don rnams thams cad bsgom par bya/ /chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran nas brtsams

te/ /rnam pa kun du sna tshogs nyid/ /de ni rang gi bdag nyid bsgom/ /chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro/ /rdo rje phra mo gzhan dang ldan/ /chos rnams thams cad rnam bsgom pa/ /myur du phyogs kun yongs su spro/ /

snying gar rdo rje bsgom bya zhing / /ma hA bo d+hi satwa bi shwa/ bud d+ha a nu smr-i ta bi shwa/ badzra pA Ni dar sha ya sa rU pa~M/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/ /sa man+ta b+ha dra bi shwa/ zla

ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /bdag nyid rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /badzra satwa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje snyems pa rol bcas pa/ /badzra satwa sa ma ya sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na bi shwa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

dbus gnas par/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid/ /ta thA ga ta sa mo ha~M/ dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /rdo rje slob dpon dag gis bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /shes rab can gyis nges par bya/ /

mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsam/ /ji bzhin mtshan gyis brgyan pa ru/ /rtag tu bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas de bzhin bdag /bdag nyid sangs rgyas rtag tu bsgom/ /

sangs rgyas gang yin de bdag nyid/ /sangs rgyas mang por yang dag gnas/ /bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyes

par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa mo ha~M/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /ji ltar sku mdog cho ga bzhin/ /dbang po gnyis ni yang dag gnas/ /de bzhin bdag ni rtag tu bsgom/ /oM badzra satwa sa mo ha~M/ bdag ni rdo rje

sems dpa' mtshungs/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /nges par 'jig rten pham par bya/ /khams kyi snying po gang yin dag /de ni rdul bral dri med dag /bdag ni rdo rje chos nyid du/ /

rtag tu bsgom par bya ba yin/ /badzra d+harma sa mo ha~M/ bdag nyid rdo rje chos dang mtshungs/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /rdo rje'i chos ni thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i las ni bdag nyid de/ /tha dad med

cing rtags gcig gis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod de/ /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /oM badzra karma sa mo ha~M/ bdag ni rdo rje las dang mtshungs/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni yang yang brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /

rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /nga ni rdo rje rin chen nyid/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur ba/ /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur/ /oM badzra rata na sa mo ha~M/ bdag ni rdo rje rin chen mtshungs/ /

rdo rje'i tshig ni yang yang brjod/ /rdo rje rin chen sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur thob par 'gyur/ /gzugs gnyis 'brel ba ni dbang po gnyis zhes bya'o/ /bdag gi lus gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gang yin pa gcig

tu 'dres par gyur pa ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /rdo rje gcig tu mos byas shing / /sangs rgyas gzugs dang mtshungs pa ru/ /dbus su bdag nyid bsgom

par bya/ /nam mkha' la ni rdo rje bsgom/ /rdo rje gcig ni yongs gsal ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dbus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /rdo rje gcig ni yongs gsal bas/ /

rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /dbus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /ci nus par ni byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje gcig ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ rtag tu bdag ni bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya

zhing / /rin chen bdag nyid dbus su bsgom/ /kun du rdo rje'i dbus su ni/ /rtag tu bdag nyid las su bsgom/ /gtso bo gang dang gtso dag gis/ /sku mdog cha byad ji bzhin du/ /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /sems can dam pa de nyid thob/ /bdag gtso

rdo rje'i tshig brjod cing / /rdo rje'i thugs su bsam par bya/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur/ /yang ni bsgom pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /rang dbang du ni rab bshad bya/ /ji ltar yid las byung ba bzhin/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam par

bsgom/ /sna yi rtse mo la brten nas/ /sems kyi rgyun ni yang dag gnas/ /brgya las rtsa bdun lhag par ni/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /gal te bsgoms pas dngos grub 'dod/ /rdo rje bsgom pa bsgrub par bya/ /sangs rgyas rjes

dran sbyor ba yis/ /sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor yang dag gnas/ /sems dpa' rjes dran sbyor ba yis/ /gdon mi za bar nges par bya/ /gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid/ /bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom par bya/ /sku mdog rnal 'byor ji bzhin du/ /ci rigs par ni

sna tshogs bdag /yang na rdo rje bsgom gtso bo/ /sgrub pa yang ni bsgom par bya/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rnam 'phrul 'khor lo byung / /e ma'o ngo mtshar spyod mchog dam pa bsgrub/ /kye ma'o ngo mtshar gsang mchog gnas thob pa/ /bdag ni rdo rje'i rnal 'byor

sgom pa'i mchog /rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i sgrub pa ste/ /rnal 'byor rig pa sgrub byed pa/ /mchod pa bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /de nas mchod pa rab bshad bya/ /thun bzhi dang ni kha dog bzhi/ /dus bzhi yi ni rab sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor

rjod byed cing / /sangs rgyas la ni mchod par bya/ /phyogs rnams kun du yongs spros shing / /mchod pa rnams ni yongs spro zhing / /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pas/ /rtag tu yang dag rnal 'byor bsgom/ /mchod la spro ba yang dag sbyor/ /zhes bya chos

ni yongs su spro/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te/ /chos kyi mchod pa rab tu bya/ /oM ta thA ga ta badzra sa twa a nuta tA ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di/ /yang dang yang du rab tu bzlas/ /rdo rje dbyings ni sbyor ba yis/ /

phyag rgya lnga ni rab tu bya/ /so sor rtogs dang mngon rtogs dang / /rdo rje de bzhin rdo rje bdag /rgyas par ru ni sngar bshad pa/ /rdo rje dbyings ni rab tu bskyed/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ma lus pa/ /rang gi bdag nyid bsgoms nas su/ /

rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/ /thub pa dbang phyug dag la dbul/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /thub la mchod pa phul nas ni/ /bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /bdag gis khams ni rnam par spros/ /byang chub sems ni spros nas

su/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul/ /rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /mchod pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa/ a nuta ta ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur ba/ /rdo rje rin

chen spros nas ni/ /bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /bdag gis khams ni rnam par spros/ /rdo rje'i sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul/ /rin chen mchod pa rab spro zhing / /bsdams pa'i sbyor ba rab tu

bsgrub/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rata na a nuta ta ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du/ /rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin gyis/ /ji ltar sems dpa' phyung ba bzhin/ /de bzhin bdag ni bsgom par bya/ /rang bdag nyid

ni bsgom nas su/ /rmad 'byung chen po yongs spro zhing / /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /de lta bu la snyoms zhugs te/ /rdo rje chos ni rab tu byung / /phyogs rnams kun du spro bya zhing / /rdo rje dag la

dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma a nuta ta ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te/ /rdo rje las rnams spro nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / /thams cad du ni spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA

ga ta badzra karma a nuta ta ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ mchod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /thun bzhi ru ni bsgom par bya/ /mchod pa'i cho gas 'grub 'gyur te/ /sdig pa can yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchod pa'i las ni bla na med/ /

ci rigs par ni rab bshad bya/ /chos kyi phyag rgya'i rgyal por ldan/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba Ata ma nir+yA ta na pU dzA s+pha ra Na karma badzri a/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom

par bya/ /bdag nyid yang dang yang du ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba Ata ma nir+yA ta na pU dzA s+pha ra Na karmA gri dza/ rdo rje lcags kyu rang bdag nyid/ /phyogs kun du ni spro bar bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgug bya zhing / /

thub pa dag la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba Ata ma nir+yA ta na a nu rA ga pU dzA s+pha ra Na karma bA Ne hU~M ho/ rdo rje'i rigs ni rjes chags par/ /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /chos rnams dag la mnyes byas shing / /'di brjod

nas ni spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba Ata ma nir+yA ta na sA d+hu kA ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na karma tuSh+Ti ma~M/ rdo rje rin chen rnal 'byor che/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/ /rin chen mchod pa bla na med/ /phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/ /oM

na maHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a b+hi She ka rata ne b+h+yo badzra ma Ni oM/ sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal po che/ /byang chub snying por dbang bskur ba/ /sems kyang de ltar bsams nas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen nyid thob 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rdo rje gzi brjid ni/ /

phyogs rnams kun du snang byed pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bskul bya zhing / /mchod pa gzi brjid yongs su spro/ /oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta sUr+ye b+h+yo/ badzra te dzo ni dz+wA la hrIH/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan kun du mthong / /shes rab can gyis rgyal mtshan

bsgreng / /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing / /rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya/ /oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta A shA pa ri pU ra Ni tsin tA ma Ni d+h+wa dza a gre trA~M/ grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis

blta/ /rtag tu bdag nyid dga' bya zhing / /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA prI ti pra mo d+ya ka re b+h+yo badzra hA se hA/ sems can thams cad chos chen po/ /bdag ni chos chen dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad

rab bskul bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kun/ /dkyil 'khor grong khyer thams cad gdab/ /shes rab can gyis bdag nyid bsam/ /rdo rje'i sngags kyis rab bskul bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma sa mA d+hi b+hi stu no mi ma

hA d+harma a gri hrIH/ bdag ni shes rab ral gri rno/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /'khor lo'i yi ge rab tu bskor/ /mdo sde thams cad 'dzin pa yin/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ni ra te re tu no mi ma hA g+ho Sha nu ge d+h+wa~M/ sems can dag

ni kun gyi tshig /bdag ni sems dpa' smra ba brtan/ /rdo rje smra ba gsang ba'i bdag /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta san+d+hi b+hA Sha bud d+ha sa~M gI ti b+hirga ya stu no mi badzra wA tse rba~M/ bdag ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor/ /

'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin byed pa/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongs su bsngo/ /mchod pa thams cad yongs spro bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsakra ak+Sha ra pa ri bar tA di sarba su trA~M te na ya stu no mi sarba man Da le hU~M/ bdag ni rdo rje las rgyal po/ /phyogs rnams

kun du rab mchod byed/ /me tog bdug pa la sogs dri/ /rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa me g+ha s+pha ra Na pU dzA karma ka ra ka ra/ cho ga bgos pa dang ldan pa/ /me tog mchod pa 'bul byed pa/ /bdag nyid rang nyid rgyal po ste/ /

rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pra sa ra s+pha ra Na pU dzA karme ki ri ki ri/ bdag ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ /nyon mongs za byed chos sgron 'bar/ /phyogs rnams kun du spro bya zhing / /snang ba 'bar ba yang dag spro/ /oM

sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ka dz+wa la s+pha ra Na pU dzA karme b+ha ra b+ha ra/ rdo rje khu tshur yang dag nyid/ /dri yi snod dang yang dag ldan/ /phyogs rnams kun du spro bya zhing / /char rnams kun gyis rab mchod byed/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan d+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na pU

dzA karma ku ru ku ru/ sems can kun don yang dag ldan/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang / /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /mchod pa mchog ni rab bsgrub pa/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra Ata ma nir+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na

sa ma ye hU~M/ shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/ /yan lag kun gyis rab btud bya/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / /phyogs rnams kun du spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya nir+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ rdo rje sems

dpa' bsdus pas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas/ /rdo rje las rnams byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis/ /rang bdag nyid ni dga' bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / /rdo rje'i sngags kyang rab brjod bya/ /

oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka nir+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ phyogs rnams kun du mchod pa kun/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/ /oM sarba

ta thA ga ta tsita ta nir+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ phul nas shes rab can gyis ni/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i ting 'dzin bsam/ /rdzas mchog ldan pas spro bya zhing / /sangs rgyas kun la yongs su dbul/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nuta tA ra

haR+Sha ra ti prI ti su kha a nuta ta ra pradz+nyA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kun

bsdus pa/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bsam/ /mchod pa'i tshogs ni bla med pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /tshe dang mdog dang nad med nyid/ /phun tshogs bde ba thams cad 'thob/ /sdig pa

thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gang zhig gis/ /nyin re bzhin du mchod byas na/ /the tshom med par dngos grub kun/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas thob 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i sngags kyis bslab pa dang / /phyag rgya thams cad bsam par

bya/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las/ /phyag rgya shin du rgyas par bshad/ /rdo rje las kyi go rim bzhin/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bslab/ /rdo rje dbyings dang rab mtshungs pa/ /slar yang rnal 'byor pa la bshad/ /'jig rten mgon

po rdzu 'phrul che/ /rtag tu de bzhin mchod bya ba/ /gsang mchog rnal 'byor pa dag a/ /de las gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /gang tshe sngon du sems bskyed pa/ /rdo rje sems ni bla na med/ /byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed nas/ /mchod

pa'i bya ba bslab par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis sbyor ba/ /rdo rje dga' ba bsam par bya/ /'dod chags dga' ba bskyed nas ni/ /dga' ba'i mchod pa rab tu mchod/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgom bya zhing / /bsgoms nas mchod pa rab tu bya/ /

dga' ba chen po'i bde don du/ /rig pa'i lha mo rab 'brel pas/ /bud d+ha Ata ma ko ha~M/ byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs sogs rnams kyis/ /rang bdag nyid ni dbang

bskur bya/ /bud d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya/ /rdo rje yi ni glu blang zhing / /bdag nyid mngon par mchod par bya/ /bud d+ha sid d+hi ka ro mi/ byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed nas/ /

bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya/ /rdo rje gar gyis gar bya zhing / /mkhas pas bdag nyid mchod par bya/ /bud d+ha pU dzA/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog /sbyor bas de bzhin phyag byas shing / /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod

byas nas/ /nges par phyag ni byas par 'gyur/ /pra Na mA mi/ rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung / /sangs rgyas bsod nams chen po kun/ /rjes su yi rang mchog bdag gis/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /a nu mo de/ bdag

nyid dbul ba la sogs pa/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/ /mchod pa kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid/ /mchod pa'i bdag nyid can gyis mchod/ /bud d+ha pU dzA/ rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung / /dge ba'i tshogs ni thams cad kun/ /yongs su bsngo

ba'i mchod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /pa ri nA ma/ chos kyi dbyings ni snying po che/ /'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa/ /gzod nas dag pas skye ba med/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pad ma mtshungs/ /sarba shud d+ha/ chos

rnams thams cad ma skyes pa/ /gzod nas zhi zhing gos pa med/ /blo bur dri mas gos pa med/ /yi ge a yis rnam par sbyangs/ /sa man ta b+ha dra/ e ma'o 'khor lo bde rang bzhin/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/ /chos rnams thams

cad nyid kyi ni/ /'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu/ /d+harma tsakra/ sgra brnyan dang ni mtshungs pa'i sgra/ /med de gzhan yang yod ma yin/ /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin du/ /bdag ces bya ba 'ga' yang med/ /nis pra pany+tsa/ sngon du blo dang

ldan pas bsam/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom bya zhing / /de 'og rdo rje sna tshogs brjod/ /de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i/ /rang gi lus ni phra rab dag /rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom

bya zhing / /rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /badzra kA ya/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i/ /yan lag rnam pa ji snyed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing / /thams cad yongs su spro bar bya/ /d+harma kA ya/ rang gi lus la gnas

pa yi/ /phra rab rdul ni ji snyed pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /don yod mchod pas rab mchod bya/ /satwa kA ya/ de bzhin lus ni thams cad kyi/ /rang gi phra rab rdul rnams ni/ /kun du bkod pa'i bsgom byas te/ /de ni sangs rgyas

mchod par bshad/ /bud d+ha kA ya/ sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su mnyes/ /byang chub sems dpa' slob gang yin/ /shes rab can gyis mchog gsang bslab/ /sangs rgyas sa ni thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /

lus rnams thams cad yongs su bsdams/ /yan lag kun la chags pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa yis/ /lus kun la ni yongs su chags/ /bde ba'i mchod pa rang byung ba/ /e ma'o rjes su chags mchod bdag /

rdo rje'i tshig ni brjod par bya/ /e ma'o yid 'ong e ma'o sdug / e ma'o dga' ba rab tu mdzes/ /chos kyi chags pa 'dod chags che/ /gang la rab dga' chags 'gyur ba/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med pa/ /stong pa 'dod chags

brjod par bya/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spang bya zhing / /sems can yang ni dor mi bya/ /sred pa dang ni chags dang spyod/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam par spang / /ming dang gzugs ni shes bya zhing / /mtshan nyid gsum ni rtogs par bya/ /theg chen

bde ba zhes bya ba/ /'dod chags chags par rab brjod par/ /lta ba thams cad mi gzung zhing / /srid pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par spang / /rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med/ /sdug bsngal thams cad nges par gcod/ /phung po dang ni skye mched

khams/ /rtog pa rdul tsam yod ma yin/ /de la 'dus byas yod ma yin/ /'dus byas min pa nyid kyang med/ /skyes pa bud med dag nyid med/ /bdag dang sems can rnam rtog med/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med/ /nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon

mongs spangs/ /de lta bu yi chags pa yis/ /gang du rdo rje can chags 'gyur/ /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes chags bya/ /kha yi 'o ni mchog dag pa/ /gsang ba'i sbyor bas rab bsgrub bya/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa/

rjes su chags pa'i cho ga bstan/ /dpung pa dam por bsdam bya zhing / /'dod chags chags par bstan pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab 'grub 'gyur/ /chags pa lnga las rnam grol bas/ /'dod la chags par mi bya zhing / /blo ldan cho

gas dga' ba yis/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis/ /gsang ba thams cad rab bstan bya/ /zhi ba thams cad mnyes bya zhing / /rdo rje sems sogs mnyes par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang

chub sems dpa' 'am/ /rdo rje can dang dga' chen po/ /'dod chags chen po 'di lta bus/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /oM sarba rA ga ra ti su kha yA mi hU~M/ mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog /gang zhig byas nas gsang ba

kun/ /brtags nas 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /lhag par shes rab can gyis bslab/ /mtshan ma brtan por rang 'grub nas/ /pad ma'i lte bar 'dug bya zhing / /mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlabs nas/ /rang bdag rdo rje mtshungs

pa nyid/ /mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las/ /de yis shin du gsang tshig gsungs/ /de ni dgongs pas gsungs pa ste/ /de ni dgongs par shes par bya/ /mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes byar brjod/ /brtan pa lhag pa nyid yin te/ /byang chub

sems dpa'i phyag mtshan gang / /mkhas pas lhag par bcang bar bya/ /pha rol phyin pa drug spyod pa/ /de yi mtshan mar rab tu bsgrags/ /gang phyir lhag par bstan par bya/ /blo ldan rnams kyi rigs 'byung 'dod/ /mtshan ma brtan

par rang gyur pa/ /de dag kho nar rab tu bsgrags/ /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni/ /rdo rje'i rigs su brjod par bya/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /rdo rje mtshan mar 'di brjod bya/ /byang chub sems kyi rab sbyor bas/ /mtshan ma brtan por brjod

par bya/ /pad ma shes rab pha rol phyin/ /pad ma'i lte bar 'dug bya ba/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi/ /rnal 'byor yang yang snyoms 'jug bya/ /b+ha ga ling ga'i sbyor ba ni/ /yang dang yang du bsten byas nas/ /g.yo dang nyes pa rnam spangs par/ /

gdon mi za bar yang dag byung / /shes rab dang ni byang chub sems/ /yang dang yang du bsten byas nas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /byang chub gdon mi za bar 'gyur/ /bsgrub byar gyur pa'i chos 'di ni/ /lus can kun gyis rnyed par dka'/ /

byang chub sems dad shes rab che/ /mchod rten mtshan ma'i rjes chags bya/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgom dang / /'di lta bu yi sgrub pa dang / /spyod pa gsang ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje gsang ba nyid thob 'gyur/ /gsang ba dgongs pas bsdus

pa yi/ /mdo las rgya cher ji skad gsungs/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /sems can thams cad rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje gsang dbang bsdus pa yi/ /sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /gsang ba chen po bsgrubs na ni/ /

skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur/ /kha cig nyin zhag de nyid la/ /yang dang yang du 'grub par 'gyur/ /nyi ma gnyis gsum bzhi lnga 'am/ /drug dang bdun la the tshom med/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /ci rigs pa yi cho ga yis/ /

lo gcig tu ni rab sbyor bas/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// // gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog /rdo rje slob dpon cho ga ni/ /ji ltar rigs shing 'tsham pa ru/ /de nas yang dag bshad par

bya/ /mdor na rig pa'i brtul zhugs ni/ /gong du dkyil 'khor las bshad bzhin/ /ci ltar spro zhing ci nus par/ /sngon du mkhas pas bshad par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' skal ba che/ /rgyal po kun du khyab pa'i 'od/ /the tshom med par

stong phrag brgya/ /rtag tu rdo rje'i tshig brjod bya/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje goms bya ste/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor goms byas te/ /chos rnams dag pa goms par bya/ /goms pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs rab spong nyon mongs bzlog

par bya/ /rnal 'byor goms pa yis ni rnal 'byor bsgrub/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis dga' chen 'grub 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor cho gas bsgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /yang na bzlas pa tsam nyid ni/ /bzlas pa mchog gis bzlas pa bya/ /

rnal 'byor rig pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /dngos grub cho gas bzlas par bya/ /de ni rnal 'byor cho ga yis/ /skad cig sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor cho ga med par ni/ /'grub min 'di la the tshom med/ /rig pa 'dzin pa

thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba bzhi ni yang dag bshad/ /gsang ba chen po tshad med pa/ /bzhi po thams cad bsdus pa yin/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga dang / /phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len pa/ /rig pa'i mchog gi cho ga ni/ /gsang

ba bsdus pa dang po yin/ /gsang dang skem byed phur pas btab/ /brdeg pa dang ni mngon spyod dang / /bgegs bskrad pa yi 'khrul 'khor 'di/ /gsang ba'i bsdus pa gnyis pa yin/ /go cha mi 'gyur bcing ba dang / /spyod dang de bzhin

rab bskyod dang / /bdag nyid mngon par bsrung nyid dang / /bgegs rnams bsal bar bya ba dang / /rdzas 'phrog pa dang gzhom pa dang / /gdug pa thams cad mngon bsrung ba/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba bsdus
pa gsum pa yin/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mchod pa dang / /de bzhin rig pa'i dngos grub nyid/ /bgegs rnams bsod nams nye bar bsdu/ /gsang ba bzhi par 'dod pa yin/ /gsang ba bzhi po

thams cad ni/ /rang bzhin rdzu 'phrul kun bsdus pa/ /gsang ba mchog gi rgyud chen po/ /rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga ni/ /de ni rgyud mchog las bshad bya/ /gang phyir rig pa 'dzin kun gyi/ /

bzlas brjod sbyin sreg bsgrub par bya/ /bzlas brjod sbyor ba med par ni/ /rig pa'i dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg tsam ni med pa ru/ /rig pa'i bya ba byed mi 'gyur/ /gang gis rnal 'byor brtson 'gyur ba/ /

bzlas pa'i rim pa bshad bya ba/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi/ /snying po 'di ni gsang mchog yin/ /gsang ba'i rigs 'dir bzlas pa ni/ /rnal 'byor nyi shu yang dag byung / /bzlas pa rnam pa nyi shu ni/ /gsang ba'i

rgyud tu nyi shu gcig /gnas ngan len gyi bag chags rtogs/ /rtog pa bag chags zhes bya ste/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis thim 'gyur te/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis brjod par bya/ /nyes pa byas pa spong ba dang / /de bzhin srid pa

sbyong byed cing / /rmad byung sna tshogs mthong 'gyur te/ /de bas bzlas pa brjod par bya/ /byang chub spyod pa 'byung 'gyur zhing / /tshul mchog mthong bar 'gyur ba ste/ /de bas bzlas pa'i cho ga ni/ /rnal 'byor pas ni nges

par bya/ /gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di ru/ /hU~M ni dang por rab tu bsgrags/ /gsang ba thams cad yang dag 'byung / /hU~M gis bzlas pa brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo ni/ /de bzhin yi ge hU~M rab mchog /gsang ba

thams cad 'khor lor bcas/ /rigs lnga dag dang bcas pa 'byung / /'dir ni yi ge hU~M 'byung bar/ /sngon la shes rab can gyis brtag /lce sogs thams cad khong stong du/ /lus kun la ni brtag par bya/ /sbyor ba bcu las

'byung mi 'gyur/ /so las rnam pa kun du min/ /lce dang rtsa ba las kyang min/ /rkan las rnam pa kun du min/ /gnas gang las ni sbyor ba 'byung / /snying ga nyid las 'byung mi 'gyur/ /khong stong dngos po thams cad la/ /skye ba

nyid ni snang mi 'gyur/ /yi ge hU~M gi sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi dbyings la yang dag sbyar/ /de nyid nyon mongs can mi 'gyur/ /kun gzhi sa bon thams cad pa/ /rkan dang lkog ma'i 'bad pa dang / /lce yi tshogs las yang dag 'byung / /

yi ge hU~M gi sgra byung ba/ /de ni mi rtog yang dag byung / /de ltar 'byung ba'i sbyar ba las/ /gnas kyi nyon mongs can mi 'gyur/ /tshig dang bcas pa'i ji bzhin sgra/ /'dus byas thams cad dor bar bya/ /ji bzhin hU~M gi sbyor ba las/ /chos

rnams thams cad skye ba med/ /rnam par rtog las yang dag byung / /de ni mi rtog yang dag 'byung / /'khor ba dag gi thog ma ni/ /ji ltar yang ni shes mi 'gyur/ /'dir ni skye ba mi snang zhing / /'dus byas dag ni 'jig pa min/ /

de bas yi ge hU~M tsam gyis/ /'dus byas so sor brtag par bya/ /dag cing mthar thug gnas nyid ni/ /hU~M gis kyang ni sbyar bar bya/ /rang bzhin med pa'i sgra 'di ni/ /yi ge hU~M las yang dag byung / /'di la dngos po yod ma yin/ /

rang bzhin med cing bdag med pa/ /de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin nyid ni yod ma yin/ /bdag gam sems can gso ba med/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spang / /zag pa med cing 'dus byas min/ /gnas

ni dag pa brtan par bya/ /dngos grub sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /yi ge hU~M ni yang dag 'byung / /ye shes dag pa yang dag 'byung / /chos kyi dbyings kyis brtan par

bya/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po yang / /'dir ni nye bar mi dmigs te/ /gang phyir dus gsum gshegs snying po/ /sangs rgyas snying po tshogs su bshad/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad dang / /rdo rje can ni rgyal sras bcas/ /

hU~M tsam gyi ni sbyor ba yis/ /kun du yang dag dgug par bya/ /yi ge sbyor ba gcig gis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po brtan/ /gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /'di ni rang gi sbyor bas gnas/ /chos kyi rgyu 'thun bag chags

ni/ /byang chub sems ni ma rtogs par/ /thog ma med ldan 'khor ba las/ /'byung ba cung zad yod ma yin/ /nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul ni/ /byang chub kyi ni sems med par/ /'gas kyang

mya ngan 'da' mi nus/ /gal te sangs rgyas 'byung med na/ /nyan thos dag ni ga las byung / /sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod min na/ /rang rgyal de ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' med/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni gang

las 'byung / /gal te byang chub sems med na/ /de bas 'khor lo 'di kun ni/ /byang chub sems las yang dag byung / /byang sems gsang ba chen po ni/ /yi ge hU~M las yang dag byung / /sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'byung ba/ /

yi ge hU~M gi snang bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir mtshan ldan gzugs can ni/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas rab 'byung ba/ /hU~M yig gi ni sbyor ba hU~M/ /de nyid rdo rje yang dag byung / /chos dbyings rab sbyor rdo rje ni/ /de las yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /

de las rdo rje rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bla na med/ the tshom med par rnal 'byor kun/ /yi ge hU~M gi sbyor bas 'grub/ /de lta bu yi bzlas pa yis/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ /sngon ni bsngo ba mdzad pa ltar/ /
rnal 'byor las byas dge ba bsngo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /rang gi sems kyang bsngo bar bya/ /rdo rje chen po mthar phyin byed/ /byang chub sems kyis bsgral bar bya/ /chos kyi dbyings

kyi snying po che/ /sems can thams cad gos pa med/ /thams cad de bzhin gshegs snying po/ /nyon mongs 'dam gyis gos pa med/ /ji ltar zla ba bzhin du dag /zla ba gang ba'i 'od gsal ba/ /rtag tu yang dag rdzogs par

gnas/ /rab tu dang ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni dang po chos ye shes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin/ /rtag tu dag par gnas pa ste/ /rang gi nyon mongs dag gis bsgribs/ /de bas rang sems rnam pa ni/ /zla ba gang

bar shes par bya/ /bdag ni 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /chos nyid 'di ni rgyal bas shes/ /ye shes zla ba gang ba min/ /gang phyir bdag ni yod ma yin/ /zla ba gang ba dang mtshungs rigs/ /gang phyir dag cing gos pa med/ /

sangs rgyas ye shes skyon med pa/ /zla ba'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /mthong nas shes rab can gyis bsam/ /'di yang gang gis rtogs par 'gyur/ /yun ring dus su sdug bsngal ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bcom

ldan 'das/ /nyon mongs pa yi bag chags kun/ /de bzhin sbyong bar byed par bsam/ /byang chub sems ni sems chen po/ /nyon mongs thams cad 'joms byed pa/ /chos kyi rgyu mthun bag chags kyi/ /gnyen po ru ni byung ba yi/ /

de bas 'di yi mthu yis ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rnam par spyod/ /gnas ngan len ni bag chags bcas/ /'dod pa'i 'dam gyis gos pa med/ /nyi ma lta bu'i sems chen po/ /nyon mongs rtsa ni rab sreg byed/ /zla ba lta

bu'i sems chen po/ /dge ba'i sman ni rnam 'phel byed/ /sos ka'i tsha ba'i zla ba bzhin/ /nyi ma'i gdung ba rab sreg byed/ /shar bar gyur pas zhi bar byed/ /gdung ba thams cad zhi bar byed/ /nyon mongs gdung bas ma gdungs shing / /

mi shes pa la nyi ma nyid/ /byang chub sems ni zla ba che/ /nyon mongs gdung ba zhi byed par/ /kun nas nyon mongs bag chags bcas/ /gnas ngan len ni 'joms pa'i mchog /khab len gyis ni lcags bzhin du/ /nyon mongs

bag chags 'dren byed pa/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pas/ /byang chub sems de bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas de ru/ /slar yang zla ba rnam par bsgom/ /byang chub sems kyi mthu yis ni/ /bag chags

thams cad sreg byed pa/ /ye shes de ru 'byung 'gyur te/ /gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa spangs/ /rnam par mi rtog mtshungs med pa/ /bdag med de bzhin stong pa nyid/ /mi shes ri bo 'joms par byed/ /rdo rje dang mtshungs khong stong med/ /

rdo rje'i rang bzhin snying po che/ /'jigs tshogs ri bo brtan pa ni/ /rdo rje des ni 'joms par byed/ /de phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin bstan/ /de bas rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas/ /zla ba'i dbus su zla ba mtshungs/ /zla ba gnyis dbus rdo rje

yis/ /rdo rje'i ye shes brtan par bya/ /stong nyid de bzhin nyid de nyid/ /yang dag mtha' dang 'dus ma byas/ /skye ba med cing 'gag pa med/ /yi ge hU~M ni bsgom par bshad/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa mchog /

nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa ni/ /zla ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /hU~M gi sbyor ba de yis ni/ /rdo rje'i mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /lus kun la ni spro bya zhing / /stong pa nyid dang mtshungs par spros/ /gzugs 'di nyid ni ming

tsam ste/ /dngos po 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /cha shas kyis ni rnam dpyad na/ /gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin/ /de dag phra rab rnam brtags kyang / /phra rab zhes bya yod ma yin/ /'jig rten kun rdzob ces bya ste/ /dam pa'i

don du yod ma yin/ /de lta bu yi rang bzhin du/ /gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin/ /gzugs de yod pa ma yin na/ /ji ltar yod ces bya ba yin/ /gal te gzugs de yod min na/ /ming yang de la yod ma yin/ /ming ni gang

las yang dag byung / /ming zhes bya ba ci 'dra bar/ /dngos zhes bya ba de dang mtshungs/ /ming des so sor brtags byas na/ /gnas gang zhig na rab tu gnas/ /dngos po gcig ni rnam phye na/ /ming ni mang po yang dag byung / /

re re yi ni dbye ba yis/ /sngar gyi ming ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de la ming ni yod min pa/ /ming ni yang dag 'byung ba med/ /gang la ming ni yod min na/ /ji ltar ming du brjod par bya/ /gang gis ming ni rab gnas pa/ /rnam pa
kun du dmigs mi 'gyur/ /gzugs ni nye bar mi dmigs la/ /de la gzugs ni ji ltar yod/ /'di ni yang dag mi rtog pa/ /bag chags dag gis kun nas dkris/ /gang du byis pa rab rmongs shing / /mya ngan 'das pa

thob mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar gzugs ni rnam bsgom pa/ /de bzhin tshor dang 'du shes dang / /so so ru ni rnam phye na/ /de la snying po dmigs mi 'gyur/ /gang la snying po yod min pa/ /de la dngos po ji ltar yod/ /gang la dngos po

mi dmigs pa/ /dam pa'i don ni ji ltar yod/ /gang zhig bstan par mi dmigs pa/ /de ni yod min dngos por med/ /chos rnams thams cad med pas na/ /skye ba med par brjod par bya/ /gang zhig ma skyes de yod min/ /gang

zhig yod min ji ltar yod/ /mkhas pas chos rnams thams cad ni/ /'gag pa med ces bya bar brjod/ /skye ba med cing 'gag pa med/ /de ni gzod nas zhi bar 'dod/ /de phyir rang bzhin mya ngan 'das/ /'di ni stong pa

nyid du brjod/ /'di ni yang dag de nyid che/ /yang dag mtha' ru brjod par bya/ /chos kyi dbyings ni snying po che/ /theg pa chen por brjod par bya/ /de ni snying po khong stong med/ /rdo rje'i bstan pa bla na med/ /lus kun la ni spro bya ste/ /

bdag gi lus ni 'di lta bu/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid ces bya gang / /yi ge hU~M ni yongs su spro/ /bsgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di 'dra'i chos ni skye ba med/ /'dir yang 'byung ba snang ba med/ /

hU~M zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /skye bar yang ni snang mi 'gyur/ /chos nyid dag pa bden pa gang / /yang dag mtha' ni zag pa med/ /chos dbyings brtan pa dam pa ni/ /yi ge hU~M du 'dir rab bsgrags/ /rdo rje yi ge hU~M de nyid/ /chos

dbyings stug po bstan pa yin/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /rdo rje gang yin de nyid hU~M/ /chos nyid dag pa 'di lta bu/ /rdo rje ye shes yid 'ong ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che/ /rdo rje bdag gi lag na gnas/ /

de bas rdo rje can kun gyi/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor thams cad dang / /yi ge hU~M la sbyor ba yis/ /spros med rnal 'byor bsam par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /snying ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /zla ba de
la zla ba gnyis/ /dbus su zla ba rab bsgom bya/ /zla ba'i dbus su rdo rje ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje'i dbus su

yi ge hU~M/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya/ /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /lus kun rab tu bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad bzlas pa yis/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du thob/ /hU~M rdo rje hU~M mdzad bsgom pa rdzogs so// //

hU~M gi sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /yi ge thams cad rnam par bsgom/ /sems dpa' chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /yi ge bcu drug dag pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yi ge hU~M/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas rigs byung ba/ /rdo rje can dag kun gyi hU~M/ /

drag po gcod kun rab tu bsgom/ /oM ni rin chen yang dag ldan/ /hrI ni pad mar yang dag ldan/ /yi ge a ni sna tshogs brjod/ /de lta bur yang bsgom par bya/ /hU~M ni sangs rgyas rdo rje dag /trA~M ni rdo rje snying po ste/ /yi ge hrI ni rdo rje bstan/ /

sna tshogs rdo rje yi ge a/ /hU~M ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /rdo rje rgyal po yi ge dza/ /ho ni rdo rje chags pa ste/ /rdo rje legs pa yi ge sa/ /oM ni rdo rje rin chen te/ /rdo rje gzi brjid yi ge a/ /trA~M ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan te/ /rdo rje

bzhad pa yi ge ha/ /yi ge hrIHni rdo rje spyan/ /rdo rje rnon po yi ge d+ha~M/ /oM ni rdo rje 'khor lo ste/ /rdo rje smra ba yi ge sa/ /yi ge ka~M ni rdo rje las/ /rdo rje bsrung ba yi ge ha~M/ /hU~M ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ /rdo rje khu tshur
yi ge ba~M/ /gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid/ /snying gar de bzhin bsgom par bya/ /yi ge hU~M ni rnal 'byor pa/ /de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis/ /gzugs gcig rnam par

spro bar bya/ /yi ge hU~M bzlas tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs su ste/ /rdo rje gcig

ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje'i dbus kyi lte bar ni/ /de ru yi ge hU~M bsgom bya/ /theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ /ji bzhin mdo yi rjes 'brangs nas/ /ji bzhin rgyal po skyes bur bcas/ /yi ge hU~M ni dang por

bcas/ /de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas/ /snying ga ru ni bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs su ste/ /dbus su yi ge hU~M bsgom bya/ /de bzhin yi ge thams cad kyang / /rnal 'byor pas ni snying gar bsgom/ /

zla ba'i gzugs las yang dag gnas/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom bya zhing / /rigs kyi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gang 'ga' zhig /gang dang gang zhig mngon 'dod pa/ /rigs

pa de ni snying gar bsgom/ /yi ge hU~M ni dang por sbyar/ /gang phyir de las rtogs pa 'byung / /de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas/ /snying gar bsgoms pas bsgom par bya/ /yang na nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis/ /yi ge hU~M ni dang por sbyar/ /
