nam mkha'i rang bzhin bsgom bya zhing / /yi ge dag ni thams cad sbyar/ /yang na nam mkha'i zla dbus su/ /gnas pa'i yi ge hU~M bsgom bya/ /bdag nyid rigs kyi lha mor bsam/ /skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur/ /hU~M ni ji skad bstan

pa bzhin/ /sngags kun rab tu bsgom par bya/ /rig pa kun gyi gsang ba ni/ /rgyud kun yang dag bsdus pa ste/ /bzlas pa'i gsang ba des spangs pa/ /gsang ba 'di ni rnam pa drug /rig 'dzin rnams kyi snying po dang / /rnal 'byor rgyud ni bsdus pa dang / /

don yod shin tu rmad 'byung ba/ /gsang ba las kyang mchog gsang bshad/ /bzlas brjod tsam gyi sbyor ba yis/ /lta ba'i ri bo 'joms par 'gyur/ /rang gi snying ga'i dbus su ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil

'khor de dbus su/ /zla ba gnyis pa bsgom par bya/ /dbugs 'byung rngub pa gang yin pa/ /rdo rje yi ge hU~M du bsgom/ /me bsrubs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /steng dang 'og tu rgyu bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas/ /dbus
su yi ge hrIHbsgom bya/ /steng 'og 'gro ba bsgom par bya/ /yi ge hU~M ni de sbyar nas/ /ji ltar shing skam gtsub stan pa/ /gtsub shing yang dag sbyor gnas su/ /rtsol ba byas pa tsam gyis ni/ /
skad cig gis ni me 'byung bzhin/ /yi ge a ni gtsub stan te/ /yi ge hU~M ni gtsub shing yin/ /rgyu ba'i rnal 'byor pa yis ni/ /skad cig gis ni ye shes skye/ /shes rab pha rol phyin

ye shes/ /yi ge hrIHru 'dir brjod bya/ /byang chub sems ni yi ge hU~M/ /me yi sbyor bas bsrub par bya/ /bsrub pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /ye shes dam pa skye bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje de ni bsreg bya ste/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /b+ha ga

sangs rgyas kun shes rab/ /ling ga rdo rje brjod par bya/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /b+ha ga ling gar rab tu bsgrub/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas ni/ /mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs so/ /b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /

mkhas pas ling ga bzhug par bya/ /gsang ba gzi brjid chen po 'di/ /mi bsrub pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /'ga' zhig gis ni 'di bsgrubs na/ /skad cig gis ni ye shes skye/ /bzlas pa gsang ba rnam pa bdun rdzogs so// //

sbas pa gsang ba rgyud chen po/ /'di nyid rnal 'byor kun du bsdus/ /'di nyid chen po bsdus pa ni/ /de ni gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /zla ba gang ba yang dag gnas/ /bdag nyid rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje ste/ /

rdo rje rigs kyi bzlas pa bya/ /zla ba gang ba la gnas par/ /bdag nyid pad mar bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su pad ma de/ /pad ma'i rigs kun bzlas par bya/ /zla ba gang ba la gnas par/ /bdag nyid nor bur bsgom

par bya/ /de yi dbus su rin chen dang / /rin chen rigs kyi bzlas par bya/ /bdag nyid rdo rje gcig pu ni/ /rdo rje rnon por rab tu bsgom/ /de yi las kyi rigs mchog la/ /las kyi rigs kun bzlas par bya/ /sangs rgyas

rjes dran nas brtsams te/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rigs kun bzlas par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen po/ /sems dpa' gcig ni rnam par bsgom/ /de yi
thugs kar zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje rigs kun bzlas par bya/ /pad ma'i sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rnam par bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/ /pad ma'i rigs kun bzlas par bya/ /

nor bu rin chen skal ba che/ /rdo rje rin chen rnam par bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/ /rin chen rigs kun bzlas par bya/ /sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las/ /sems dpa'i gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar

zhugs nas ni/ /las kyi rigs kun bzlas par bya/ /bden pa dam tshig mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab grol byed/ /thos pa tsam gyis thabs chen po/ /yang na snying gar rdor rang bzhin/ /sna tshogs bdag po bzlas

brjod mtshungs/ /shes rab can gyis gang bsams pa/ /phun sum tshogs kun bde bar thob/ /gsang ba yang dag bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya/ /de yi thugs kar 'jug bya zhing / /yid kyis

thams cad bcug nas ni/ /de yi sku ni mtshungs par spro/ /de yi thugs ka'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni rab tu bshad/ /ji bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spro/ /de lta bu yi

sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na/ /the tshom med par sangs rgyas kun/ /skad cig de nyid kyis 'grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i mda' ni zhi ba 'di/ /'di lta bu yi gzugs bsgom bya/ /de yi thugs kar zhugs nas

ni/ /rdo rje'i gar dang mtshungs par bsgom/ /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje'i rigs can thams cad ni/ /the tshom med par dngos grub kun/ /ye shes bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /pad ma'i sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing / /
thugs kar ji bzhin 'jug par bya/ /sna tshogs thabs ni rab bsgoms na/ /pad ma'i rigs can 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen bsgom bya zhing / /thugs kar ji bzhin 'jug par

bya/ /rin chen mdzod ni bcug nas su/ /yang dang yang du spro bar bya/ /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje rin chen dga' chen po/ /the tshom med par dngos grub kun/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /

stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ /rdo rje las su rnam par bsam/ /de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/ /sna tshogs rnam 'phrul spro bar bya/ /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /sna tshogs mdzod ni rab spros nas/ /the tshom

med par dngos grub kun/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /shin du gsang ba 'di lnga ni/ /bzlas pa gsang ba bla na med/ /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bzlas pa'i cho ga'i
sbyor ba 'di/ /rgyud kyi snying po kun bsdus shing / /nyon mongs thams cad rab 'joms la/ /rig pa 'dzin pas bzlas par bya/ /bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs nges par blang / /

gal te 'di ni dngos grub 'dod/ /rnal 'byor pa yis brtul zhugs bya/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog tu brtson par bya/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/ /bye ba gsum ni yongs su bzla/ /bye ba

gsum ni bzlas byas nas/ /sgrub pa dag ni brtsam par bya/ /byang chub sems ni dga' chen po/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /sems can gcig gis yang dag bri/ /gang phyir rgyal

po mchog gsang dbang / /rdo rje mchog ni rab ster byed/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/ /de ni sngon du yang dag brtsam/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/ /khru ni bcu par yang dag bri/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni

rnam par brgyan/ /ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /kha khyer dag gis shin du spras/ /rin chen dra bas yongs su bres/ /gser skud dril bu g.yer khas brgyan/ /

sgo khyud dang ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje 'ching bas rab tu bcing / /rdo rje rin chen rab tu bkod/ /rdo rje thig gis thig btab pa/ /dri yi sbyor ba'i cho ga dang / /phur bus bgegs ni bsal bya zhing / /tshon rtsi lnga

yi srad bu ni/ /rdo rje gsang bas bsrung bar bya/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /ji skad sngar bshad de nyid ni/ /rdo rje gsang ba yongs su bkod/ /rdo rje gsang ba yongs bkod nas/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig

gdab bya/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rab mdzes la/ /'khor lo'i dbus su rab tu dgod/ /rdo rje chags pa yongs su dgod/ /tshon rtsi lnga ni rab tu dbye/ /ji skad gsang rgyud las gsungs bzhin/ /dkar po sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba/ /sngon po ser

po shin du 'bar/ /btsod sogs dang ni rab tu ldan/ /'od zer dmar po sna tshogs ldan/ /sna tshogs tshon rtsis bri bar bya/ /'od zer dmar po sna tshogs 'bar/ /rdo rje 'khor lo yongs bkod nas/ /zla ba gang bar rab bkod do/ /

'khor lo thams cad yongs su bzung / /kha dog ji bzhin rigs pa bzhin/ /ji ltar mdzes shing shin du dkar/ /ji bzhin zla ba nya ba mtshungs/ /zla ba gang ba yang dag bri/ /zla ba gang ba'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bri/ /

gang gis mtshan ni bzung ba yis/ /skad cig gis ni sdig las grol/ /'dzum pa dang bcas zla ba'i mdog /shin du chags pa dga' chen po/ /myur du rdo rje'i tshig brjod de/ /rdo rje nyid kyi snying po yin/ /oM ma hA su kha

badzra satwa hU~M dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ rdo rje'i glu ni blang bya zhing / /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed/ /'dod pa'i chags pa yang dag dran/ /thams cad rjes chags bde ba thugs mchog mnga'/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

rab tu dga' ba mchog /kye khyod bde chen bstan pas 'phel mdzad pa/ /rab tu myur du sgrub pa 'grub par mdzod/ /rdo rje'i glu ni de lta bu/ /blang zhing 'khor lo spyan drang bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /rjes su chags shing rab 'grub

'gyur/ /sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog /rol pa dang bcas spyan g.yo ba/ /bsnyems tshul chen po dga' ba che/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje ni/ /thugs ka ru

ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /g.yon pa dril bu yang dag ldan/ /slar yang snyems tshul dang bcas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje che/ /rgyal po chen po thub pa che/ /spyod pa chen po theg pa che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /

rin chen chen po rdo rje che/ /rgyal mtshan chen po dran pa che/ /sangs rgyas dran pa rdo rje che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /bde ba chen po bla na med/ /sa dang pha rol phyin bde bar/ /rdo rje

sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /shes rab chen po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad las byung ba/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje che/ /rdo rje sems ni rdo rje che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /rdo rje chen po chags pa che/ /rgyal po

chen po thub pa che/ /don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /chos kyi srid pa 'khor lo che/ /smra ba'i las ni bla na med/ /bsrung zhing bsrung ba drag po che/ /rdo rje khu tshur
bdag grub mdzod/ /rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis/ /de nyid mchog tu bskul nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma dang mtshungs par/ /dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag bri/ /

de nas rdo rje ltas nas ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya/ /chos kyi rig pa 'dzin pa ni/ /dbab dang gzhug pa la sogs pa/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/ /las rnams thams cad yang dag bya/ /
bum pa la sogs yo byad dang / /spos dang me tog la sogs mchog /rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/ /las rnams thams cad yang dag bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rig pa yis/ /bum pa brgya

rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ /de ni zhabs kyi drung bzhag na/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga ji bzhin 'jug bya zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches/ /bdag nyid
la ni dbang bskur bya/ /hU~M gis yang dag zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje mchod pas yang dag mchod/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /ci rigs par ni bsgrub par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar
gnas/ /phyag rgya chen po yongs su gzung / /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che/ /skad cig re re bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' rgyal po che/ /brtan par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bsgrubs nas ni/ /shin du bstan pa bla med pa/ /rjes chags sems dpa' chen po ni/ /skad cig
gis ni bsgrub par bya/ /de 'dra'i mchog tu gsang ba mthar phyin pa/ /sems dpa' rgyal chen yongs su dag pa mchog /dag pa'i tshul 'di cung zad mtshungs pa med/ /rjes chags 'dod chags
yongs su dag pa mchog /rdo rje rgyal mchog rab dag dri ma med/ /gsang ba las byung 'khor lo dam pa 'dzin/ /rig pa'i gsang sngags tshul 'di byang chub byed/ /snying rje dang ldan spyod pa spyod
byed pa/ /de bzhin rab 'jigs sdug bsngal chen po'i pha rol phyin gyur pa/ /mchog tu mkhas shing phra la rgyud dang rgyud dag las byung ba/ /de ru srid pa dag gi dra ba chen po gcod mdzad pa/ /gsang
sngags 'khor lo las byung gsang ba de 'drar bshad/ /gsang rigs mchog tu byung ba'i 'khor lo ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dgongs pa gcig /sras kyi gtso bo dbang sgyur rgyal

po ste/ /de yis thar pa'i grong khyer rab tu bshad/ /gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdo sde
gsang ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa ste/ le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so// // de nas rnal 'byor gsang ba che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kun 'dus pa/ /

chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i mchog /nam mkha' sna tshogs dngos ldan pa/ /ri dbang rgyal po chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa sprul/ /rdo rje dbang po chen po'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yang

dag 'dus/ /rdo rje rgyal po rtse mo ste/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag byung / /rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mtshungs/ /rdo rje kun gyis rab mdzes pa/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas de ru/ /
rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsung bzhugs/ /sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung yang dag bzhugs/ /gtso bos chos kun dbang du 'gyur/ /rol bcas rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' dga' ba che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas gcig ste/ /chos chen po yi rnal 'byor mchog /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug la gsol btab/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal
'byor che/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dga' chen po/ /sems dpa' byang sems las byung ba/ /rang gi rigs 'byung bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal po ste/ /rgyud kyi snying po gsang ba che/ /gsang ba
chen po rigs kyi dbang / /mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po ste/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/ /zhi bas byang chub 'grub 'gyur te/ /thams cad yang dag bsdus pa min/ /gtum po thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /
rang rigs rtag tu bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal po ste/ /kun du mi gsung bzhugs par gyur/ /mi gsung gsang ba ma gsungs te/ /zhi ba'i bde ba la bzhugs gyur/ /gsang ba de bzhin
gshegs pa mchog /sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs/ /rtog cing gzigs par mi mdzad de/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bzhugs par gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /
chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas gcig bzhin yang dag 'gyur/ /don yod grub pa bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnal 'byor che/ /gsang ba kun las yang dag byung / /rdo rje'i sbyor
ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje can la bskul ba gsungs/ /oM badzra sa twa uta tiSh+Tha/ rdo rje bskul ba gsungs pa na/ /chos dbyings sangs rgyas gcig pu nyid/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ting 'dzin
gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzhengs par gyur/ /thub pas mgon rnams la btud nas/ /tshig ni 'di skad gsungs par gyur/ /rnam pa kun du ci zhig bgyi/ /bdag la sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs/ /
phyag na rdo rje brtan pa la/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs/ /gsang ba rdo rje rigs zhes pa/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas/ /rdo rje dbang
po'i gnas snang byed/ /rab tu btud nas tshig gsungs pa/ /mgon po rnal 'byor gzigs su gsol/ /bdag gi snod dang ldan pa'i mchog /'di ni sems can 'ga' yang med/ /gang phyir mu stegs
la chags shing / /skye dgu lta ba'i dri mas khyab/ /sems can 'di dag gdul bya min/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin/ /log pa'i lam du yang dag zhugs/ /mun pa stug po la
gzhol ba/ /la la lha mi lta la chags/ /kha cig brtul zhugs lta ba'i gnas/ /kha cig dka' thub gdungs pas 'khrul/ /nyon mongs pas ni 'khrug pa'i sems/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
la chags/ /skyo bar yang ni mi 'gyur te/ /rdo rje rigs kyi gsang 'di la/ /nam yang sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag 'dod chags che la chags/ /'dod pa'i chags pa dag las rgyal/ /sangs rgyas

byang chub chags bral ba/ /gsang ba 'di la sbyor mi 'gyur/ /lta ba'i chags pas rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i chags pas lta ba can/ /srid pa'i zhags pas shin du chags/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa la chags bral/ /

nga rgyal lhag pa'i nga rgyal bcing / /gdug cing drag la shin du khro/ /snying rje med cing brtse med 'gyur/ /de la gsang ba rung ma yin/ /rmongs pa kun mkhyen yin snyam pa/ /ye shes chen po la mkhas pa/ /
gsang ba 'di ni rung ma yin/ /'dren pa ji ltar bshad par bgyi/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po nyid/ /sha za 'byung po gsang ba pa/ /lha la sogs pa gdug chen po/ /bstan pa la ni 'jug mi 'gyur/ /
nga ni sangs rgyas rab tu zhi/ /byang chub sems ni dga' chen po/ /sems can 'di dag shin du gdug /bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /nga ni rgyal chen theg chen la/ /nam mkha'i dbyings
bzhin rab tu yangs/ /kye ma sems can 'di dag dman/ /bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /nga ni theg chen dag pa ste/ /nyon mongs 'dam gyis gos pa med/ /kye ma'o sems can 'di nyon
mongs/ /bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur/ /nga ni shes rab ye shes che/ /theg pa che la shin du bstan/ /kye ma sems can shes rab ngan/ /bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur/ /bsod nams
chen po ye shes che/ /nga ni mchod pa chen po'i tshogs/ /kye ma'o sems can bsod nams chung / /bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur/ /sems can 'di dag nye bar 'tshe/ /'jigs pa sna tshogs
kun du khyab/ /rnam rtog gis bskyod shes rab ngan/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /bdag po chen po dbang phyug kyang / /rmongs pa kun sel nyid
gyur pa/ /stobs chen rdzu 'phrul chen po ste/ /de la rgyal po grogs byed yod/ /sgyu ma'i sngags ni yongs su 'dzin/ /de ni mi rgyud ces bya ste/ /sems can rmongs byed lhur len pa/ /de ni rgyal
po lha chen po/ /gtso bo rgyal po chen po mtshungs/ /de ni dbang phyug che zhes bya/ /gdug pa'i sems can 'joms byed pa/ /de yi gzugs can rgyal po che/ /skyed byed byed pa po bdag po/ /tshangs pa

chen po rgyal po che/ /lta ba sna tshogs rab ster ba/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi rgyal po che/ /dbang po zhes bya sha tsi'i bdag /brtson 'grus dbang phyug chen po'i bu/ /gdong drug rdzu 'phrul chen po can/ /dpung

chen zhes bya'i ming che ste/ /gzhon nu mi pham 'od lnga ming / /rgyal po chen po 'di lnga ni/ /khams gsum gyi ni bdag por bshad/ /rgyal po lnga ni gzi brjid che/ /lus gsum gyi ni ngo mtshar che/ /skul byed dbang phyug
chen po ni/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /de yi lus can rgyal po che/ /dbang phyug chen po zhes grags pa/ /sems can gdug pa shin du drag /sngags bcas 'khor dang bcas pa yi/ /
rgyal po lnga po de dag ni/ /sems can dag ni rnam rmongs byed/ /lta ba chen po 'dzin byed cing / /bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa ste/ /nyon mongs chen pos rab nyon mongs/ /gzhan yang kun nas nyon
mongs byed/ /sems can dag ni 'joms byed cing / /bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur/ /dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid che/ /bdag nyid dam pa'i yid chen po/ /de lta bu yi rnam rtog gis/ /sems can
rnam par rmongs par byed/ /tshangs pa 'byin byed skye dgu'i bdag /byed pa rang bdag byed pa po/ /lta ba chen po de lta bus/ /sems can dag ni rnam rmongs byed/ /khyab 'jug kun song khyab
byed pa/ /khyab 'jug rang bzhin grong khyer kun/ /de ltar yang dag mi 'dzin pa/ /lta ba'i 'ching ba rab ster byed/ /rgya cher rgyal po 'di rnams ni/ /lta bar smra la nges par ston/ /rmongs pa mkhas
pa yin sems shing / /sems can 'ching bar byed pa yin/ /sems can de rnams gzhan gyis bskul/ /lta bar smra ba nges par sten/ /khyab 'jug tshangs pa la sogs pa/ /dbang phyug chen po phyag byed de/ /
sangs rgyas ye shes rnam kun du/ /bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi byed/ /sems can 'di rnams rmongs par gyur/ /de la gsang ba rung ma yin/ /de lta bu yi rnam pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga'
chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mkhyen nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsung bzhugs/ /mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun/ /thub pa nyi ma ma lus pas/ /gsung gcig gis ni gsang ba che/ /rdo rje
yi ni tshig gsungs pa/ /kye ma'o sems can 'di gdul dka'/ /gdug cing drag la shin du gtum/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mi 'dul ba/ /de phyir bdag cag gsol ba 'debs/ /mgon khyod
shes rab chen po ste/ /khyod ni thabs chen brjod par bya/ /byang chub sems ni thabs chen po/ /nyon mongs thams cad nges par 'joms/ /gdug pa thams cad rab gdul ba/ /mgon po khyod la
gsol ba 'debs/ /gdug pa 'dul byed rnam 'phrul ba/ /thabs chen po ni rab tu gsungs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis sems can 'di/ /'dul bar mi 'gyur snod min la/ /thabs
chen khro ba chen po ni/ /thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig gsan nas/ /phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/ /tshig dag gis ni zhus gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas
kun la 'di skad gsungs/ /e ma'o gsang ba 'khor lo che/ /thabs chen bdag nyid chen po ste/ /chos kyi dbyings ni bstan pa'i dngos/ /thabs kyi 'khor lo rab ston pa/ /
ji skad tu ni bka' stsal pa/ /de bzhin du ni bdag gis bgyi/ /sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /drag po nyid ni bstan par bya/ /de skad gsungs nas sems
dpa' che/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /mi gsung bzhugs nas rnal 'byor gyis/ /drag po nyid la snyoms par zhugs/ /drag po'i dkyil
'khor rdo rje mchog /ces bya'i ting 'dzin de lta bu/ /drag po chen po snyoms par zhugs/ /de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ba/ /drag po 'jigs
rung yi ge hU~M/ /khro bo chen po brjod par 'gyur/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad khro rgyal po/ /mgon po thugs ka nas byung gyur/ /sa gzhi ma lus g.yos gyur cing / /
sa 'di dag ni sgra sgrogs gyur/ /stong gsum ma lus 'di dag ni/ /hU~M hU~M zhes bya brjod par gyur/ /tshad med gzhal du med pa yi/ /khro bo'i rgyal po byung
gyur pas/ /phyogs rnams kun du gdug chen dag /skad cig de la gtum par gyur/ /slar yang gcig nyid gyur nas ni/ /gong bur byas nas rab bsdams te/ /khro
bo'i rgyal po sku chen po/ /'jigs su rung ba gcig tu gyur/ /de ni khro bo'i rgyal po che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi grags chen po/ /khro rgyal mdun du 'dug nas ni/ /
slar yang snying po rab tu brjod/ /hU~M t+ya hU~M t+ya/ 'jigs su rung ba'i spu langs byed/ /gnod sbyin kun bdag gnod sbyin te/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul che/ /khro bo chen po brjod
pa yin/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od kyis khyab/ /rdo rje me ni drag po che/ /ma lus gsal zhing me 'bar gyur/ /phyi rol gyi ni gdug pa can/ /ma lus
dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /rdo rje me ni rab 'bar bas/ /g.yo ba med cing shi bar gyur/ /lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams/ /gang
dag rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gdungs nas/ /g.yo ba med cing 'bar bar gyur/ /de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin che/ /drag po'i gzugs can rab 'jigs byed/ /khro gnyer bsnyer
ba'i gdong can te/ /de bzhin gzhag dang sngo bar gyur/ /mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ /dbu skra gyen brdzes shin du skrag /spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa ste/ /de bzhin rdo rje bstan pa'i
zhal/ /drag po rdo rje drag tshogs 'dzin/ /gcig pu 'bar ba rab ldan pa/ /zhags pa lcags kyu rdo rje bdag /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /sa rnams ma lus g.yo bar
byed/ /sa 'di yang ni g.yo bar byed/ /gnod sbyin chen po 'byung po sogs/ /g.yo ba med cing 'og tu 'gyel/ /de ni drag po gnod sbyin che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /
de yi spyan sngar 'dug nas ni/ /ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod/ /e ma'o byang chub kyi ni sems/ /kun du bzang po kun dge ba/ /sems can 'dul ba'i thabs su ni/ /
brtse med khro bo nyid du gyur/ /sngar ni rdo rje sems dpa' gang / /zhi ba'i gzugs su rnam gnas pa/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin 'dzin gyur nas/ /rdo rje drag
po zhes byar grags/ /de ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin/ /'jigs rung ba spu langs par byed/ /yi ge hU~M bzhi'i phyag rgya yi/ /
snying po gtum po nyid kyang gsungs/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho
b+ha ga bAn badzra hU~M phaT/ shin du gtum zhing cher grags pa/ /de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ste/ /zhal bzhi dang ni phyag brgyad pa/ /bskal pa yi ni me ltar drag /
rdo rje dus kyi me ltar byung / /nyon mongs phyogs ni rab sel byed/ /smin ma bskyod pas gtsigs pa'i

zhal/ /de bzhin rnam par 'jigs pa'i gdong / /'jig rten gsum sreg dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje can kun sreg par byed/ /'bar phreng kun du 'khrigs pa'i sgra/ /rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgya ni/ /phyag gnyis

kyis ni yongs su gzung / /rdo rje bsdams pa 'dzin rgyal po/ /lcags kyu dang ni zhags pas brgyan/ /rdo rje yi ni lu gu rgyud/ /phyag gnyis na bsdams 'jigs rung zhal/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdigs byed pa/ /rdo rje gtum po

yang dag byung / /drag po bka' ni mos par byed/ /myur ba ru ni bka' stsol cig /min na sangs rgyas khyed rnams kun/ /the tshom med par bza' bar bya/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs/ /Taka ki dzaHhU~M shin du drag /rigs dang bcas par

lha chen po/ /stobs chen po yis dgug par gyis/ /de nas rig pa'i mchog rgyal po/ /bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis bzhad byed cing / /khro bo drag po rnga sgra sgrogs/ /rdo rje zhags pa bskul bar bya/ /rdo rje zhags pa drag po che/ /dpung bcas grogs dang bcas

pa dang / /de bzhin rigs dang dkyil 'khor bcas/ /song la dbang phyug chen po khug /badzra pA sha hU~M/ dbang ldan rgyal po chen po ni/ /sna tshogs rang gi 'khor na gnas/ /'jigs byed ma dang lhan cig tu/ /'dod pa can ni mchog tu rol/ /rdo rje zhags

pa der song ste/ /khro bo'i dgra yis bsdigs par gyur/ /dbang ldan rgyal po la smras pa/ /khyod la ston pa spyan 'dren mdzad/ /skrag cing khros nas lha chen pos/ /'jigs pa yi ni tshig brjod pa/ /nga ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal po/ /nga las

ston pa gzhan yod dam/ /rdo rje zhags pa khro bo ches/ /tshig ni lan gsum brjod par gyur/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che/ /khyod la shin du spyan 'dren mdzad/ /lha chen dbang phyug chen po yis/ /slar yang lan gsum smras pa ni/ /nga ni pho ra

rgyal po rang / /nga la spyan 'dren gang zhig yod/ /de nas zhags pas bka' bzhin byed/ /khro bo drag po rab 'jigs pas/ /yan lag thams cad bcings nas ni/ /dbang phyug chen po bkug par gyur/ /'jigs shing skrag nas

lha chen po/ /shin du smre sngags 'don cing ngu / /skyabs ni gang yang yod ma yin/ /'jigs pa chen po kun du byung / /stobs dang de bzhin nga rgyal gyis/ /stobs dang shugs ni bstan nas su/ /zhags pa bcad nas bros par gyur/ /rang gi

gnas su song gyur nas/ /'jig rten gsum gyi lha rnams bos/ /lha dang lha min dri zar bcas/ /skad cig gis ni 'dus gyur nas/ /'khor rnams dag ni ngu bar gyur/ /ji ltar sngon gyis ma byas pa'i/ /de lta bu ni yang dag mthong / /

sems can rab drag 'di su zhig /rdo rje zhags pa'i mdun song ste/ /rdo rje rig pa mchog la zhus/ /dbang phyug chen pos bdag bcad de/ /drag po tshangs pa rab tu bros/ /rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /khro bo gtum po shin du

drag /de lta bu yi tshig gsan nas/ /thams cad tu ni 'bar bar gyur/ /khro bo rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /drag po yis ni bka' bsgo ba/ /myur du song la lha chen po/ /rigs chen po dang bcas pa khug /khro bo'i rgyal po lu gu rgyud/ /gsan
na dbang phyug che gnas song / /yan lag thams cad bcings nas su/ /lha mo dang bcas kun du bkug /skad cig 'jigs pas ngus byed cing / /lha rnams thams cad shin du 'jigs/ /'jigs pa'i sdug bsngal smre

sngags 'don/ /de ring 'dra na lha chen min/ /stobs dang shugs ni thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje kun dang 'thab par gyur/ /mthu dang stobs dang shugs kyis ni/ /bcag nas thams cad bros par gyur/ /lha chen la sogs thams cad ni/ /

phyogs rnams kun du bros par gyur/ /mun pa yis ni kun du 'khrug /phyogs rnams kun du 'jigs par gyur/ /khro bo lu gu rgyud 'ongs nas/ /rnam pa kun du smra bar byed/ /ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /

bdag cag gnas ni bros par gyur/ /khro bo rdo rje rig pa mchog /slar yang shin du khros par gyur/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas rab 'bar zhing / /rdo rje drag po nyid du gyur/ /drag po ha ha zhes bzhad dgod/ /rang gi yan lag za bar byed/ /rang gi

mgo la rdeg byed cing / /rdo rje gsor ba bskor bar 'bar/ /de lta bu yi khyad par dang / /bcas pas khro bo yang dag byung / /slar yang rang gi bdag nyid dran/ /khro bo'i rgyal po brjod par gyur/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/ gr-ih+NA pa ya

gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzra hU~M phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po bcas nas ni/ /yi ge dzaHni yongs su brjod/ /rdo rje lcags kyur rab tu bsngags/ /stobs dang ldan pa khug la shog /oM badzra dz+wa la ag ni sa tri Sha a~M ku sha dzaHdzaH/ rdo rje

'bar ba lcags kyu ni/ /song nas phyogs kun bdag nyid che/ /skad cig gis ni stobs chen rnams/ /lha rnams thams cad bkug par gyur/ /rgyal po dbang phyug lnga dang ni/ /lha rnams thams cad grangs med par/ /rigs bcas dpung dang bcas

pa nyid/ /gcig nyid du ni bsdus par gyur/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog rab tu mngags/ /chings shig stobs chen dang ldan pa/ /tshogs dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kun/ /bcing ba lnga yis bcings par gyur/ /nang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs/ /lha

tshogs gnod sbyin srin po dang / /lha min rlung dang 'byung po'i tshogs/ /gzhan yang gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ni/ /thams cad bcings par gyur nas ni/ /rdo rje zhags pa rab tu mngags/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dang bcas par/ /song la dkyil

'khor dag khug cig /rdo rje zhags pas mngon chags pas/ /yan lag kun las yongs su spro/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin zhags pa ste/ /brtan par gyur par the tshom med/ /bye ba dag ni grangs med bcu/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rab tu byung / /lha la sogs

pa'i re re zhing / /spyi bo nas 'gugs yang dag sbyor/ /lha chen dbang phyug chen po yi/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu btab nas ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po yis/ /dbang phyug chen po 'gugs par byed/ /lha sogs 'khor dang bcas pa kun/ /

phan tshun du ni ngu bar byed/ /shugs rings kun du phyung nas ni/ /phan tshun du ni smra bar byed/ /kye ma'o sdug bsngal kye ma'o shi/ /tshogs ni gang du khyer bar gyur/ /rdo rje 'bar ba chen po des/ /skad cig de la sregs gyur nas/ /

ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru/ /lha la sogs pa thams cad bkug /gnas de ru ni thams cad dag /yongs su bskor nas kun du gnas/ /rdo rje kha khyer phyi rol du/ /lha rnams de dag thams cad gnas/ /rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol du/ /lha la sogs pa

thams cad bkug /phyi rol rdo rje ra ba ni/ /lcags sregs rang bzhin rdo rje mtshungs/ /rdo rje can gyi rdor 'bar mas/ /nang nas shin du gdungs par gyur/ /lha tshogs sems can de dag kyang / /'jigs su rung ba'i 'o dod 'bod/ /stong

gsum 'di dag thams cad kyang / /hU~M hU~M sgra ni yongs su brjod/ /'o dod bos nas smra bar byed/ /ngan song dag ni ci zhig byed/ /sngon ma mthong ba 'di ci zhig /'dir ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas rgyal po de/ /slar yang

thugs rje kun du skyes/ /thams cad bcings pa las bkrol te/ /rdo rje me yi nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor nas phyung ste/ /lha la sogs pa kun bos te/ /nga yi tshig 'di rab tu nyon/ /de nas lha

rgyal la sogs pa/ /khyod ni su yin smra bar byed/ /nged kyis khyod ni sngar ma mthong / /gnas mchog 'di yang sngar ma mthong / /rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che/ /ha ha zhes dgod bzhad pa yis/ /smras pa rdo rje gnod sbyin nga / /thams cad za

byed bzod dka' ba/ /de nas lha chen gyis smras pa/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi shes/ /nga yis khyod ni sngar ma mthong / /bdag nyid kho na rang byung ba/ /rdo rje drag pos rab smras pa/ /nga yi bka' la myur gnas kyis/ /min na rdo rje 'bar

ba 'dis/ /rang gi rigs ni sreg par byed/ /lha chen po yis tshig smras pa/ /bstan pa la ni nga mi gnas/ /'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug nga / /su yi bstan pa la gnas pa/ /'khor dang bcas pa'i stobs gang yin/ /de ring nga yis

bstan par bya/ /khyod la stobs ni ci yod pa/ /stobs chen ldan pas bstan par gyis/ /dbang phyug chen po rgyal po che/ /'byung po'i tshogs bcas lhan cig tu/ /tshig dag smras par gyur pa ni/ /drag po nyid ni bstan par bya/ /stong gsum

gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/ /ha ha zhes bya shin du drag /dbang phyug chen pos bstan par bya/ /oM shU la a tri shU la ma hA sa ha sra shU la A yu d+he/ rtse gsum mngag gzhug rgyal po ni/ /

stong phrag gcig ni byung bar 'gyur/ /rtse bcas kun du 'bar ba yis/ /rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/ /na rA ya nas smras pa/ /oM ma hA sa ha sra tsakra A yu ra d+he/ khyab 'jug gis ni de dag smras/ /'khor lo gcig tu rnam pa stong / /thams cad 'od zer

'bar bas khyab/ /rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ oM ma hA sa ha sra badzra A yu d+he/ rdo rje stong ni byung bar gyur/ /rdo rje 'bar ba tsha bas khyab/ /brgya byin gyis ni smras pa yin/ /rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/ /gzhon nus smras pa/

oM ma hA sa ha sra shA k+t+yA yu d+he/ gzhon nus de skad smras nas ni/ /mdung ni rtse gsum stong byung gyur/ /sgra ni drag po sgrogs byed cing / /rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/ /tshangs pas smras pa/ oM ma hA sa ha sra daN Da A yu d+he/ tshangs pas de skad

smras nas ni/ /dbyug to stong ni byung gyur nas/ /mtshon cha drag po 'jigs byed pas/ /rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/ /gzhan yang lhag ma ma lus pa/ /rnams kyis yang ni mtshon cha dag /re re stong phrag gcig gyur nas/ /rdo rje can dang lhan cig

'thab/ /tha na sprul pa gang yin dang / /phyi rol gyi ni dam ldan pa/ /de rnams nges par stong gyur nas/ /rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/ /me yang kun du 'bar gyur cing / /'jigs par byed pa'i rlung yang byung / /'brug gi sgra dang glog chen pos/ /

khyad par srid gsum gnas par gyur/ /ha la ha la'i sgra chen po/ /nam mkha'i bar snang la ni grag /rdo rje drag po tshogs chen po/ /lha rnams thams cad 'thab par byed/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /gtum po drag po 'jigs

byed pas/ /lha yi lan gyi phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje yi ni snying po gsungs/ /oM ma hA sa ha sa ha ra badzra tsa kre/ oM ma hA badzra shU le/ oM dIp+ta dz+wA la ag ni badzra/ oM badzra shak+t+ye/ /oM ma hA badzra na d+hi/ de lta bu yi rnam pa ru/ /snying po

dag ni stong phrag gcig /srid gsum zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'chang ni chen pos phyung / /gtum po 'od zer 'bar bas khyab/ /rdo rje me dang yang dag ldan/ /drag po'i snying po las byung gyur/ /rdo rje 'chang ni dbus na bzhugs/ /

lha tshogs phyag rgya de dag ni/ /rnam par bshig cing dum bur byas/ /bcom zhing bsdams te bsres nas ni/ /phyogs rnams kun du thim par gyur/ /rdo rje me yis rab bsdams pas/ /lha yi rgyal po 'bar bar 'gyur/ /

'og nas sa ni rab tu 'bar/ /steng nas me ni shin du gdungs/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches/ /dbang phyug chen po la gsungs pa/ /lus srul po ni drag po che/ /nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/ /dur khrod gnas la rab tu dga'/ /lus la thal

ba dag gis byugs/ /mi yi sha ni bza' bar byed/ /nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/ /khrag rlon gyis ni rab tu bskus/ /lpags pa rlon pa gos su gyon/ /lha rnams thams cad khyod kyi 'khor/ /nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/ /gdug pa drag chen

mtshan mo rgyu ba slongs mo ba/ /khrag la sbangs pa'i lpags can lus la thal bas byugs/ /nga yis bka' nyon drag po'i sems ldan lus srul po/ /min na bskal pa'i me yis rtswa bzhin khyod bsreg bya/ /ro bsregs thal ba'i phung po bzhin du

thal bar 'gyur/ /rigs bcas dpung ldan dkyil 'khor dang bcas gnod sbyin drag /rdo rje drag po yi ni rab gzhom gzhig par bya/ /dbang phyug chen pos smras pa/ nga ni ma lus dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor la sgyur/ /'jig rten gsum

gyi lha tshogs ma lus pa yi 'khor/ /shin du drag cing rnam gtsigs 'jig rten khyod yin yang / /khyod kyis nga yi bka' ni mnyan par gyis/ /gdug dang sangs rgyas mang po'i 'khor ni sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas nga yis sprul/ /
zhi zhing de la rnam 'dul gsang ba dri med nyon mongs med pa'i pha rol phyin/ /de 'dra'i mgon po dga' ba dus gsum bzhugs pa thams cad nas dbang bskur/ /slar yang nga yid 'byung po'i tshig nyon

zhes pa'i tshig ni 'di lta bu/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dul ba'i don la shin du mkhas/ /khro bo gdug pa gtum chen po/ /rab 'bar khro ba'i rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje'i byin brlabs phyag rgya las/ /bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ /

snyoms par zhugs nas sems dpa' ches/ /rang rigs khro bo las byung ba/ /gdug pa rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/ /khro bo'i chos kyi tshul bzung nas/ /rkang pa nas brtsams spyi bo'i bar/ /lus kun las ni rnam par phyung / /

oM badzra kro d+ha uSh+NI Sha hU~M/ rdo rje'i gtsug tor khro bo che/ /'bar ba'i spyi bo nas phyung nas/ /sa rnams thams cad g.yo byed cing / /khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad 'joms/ /oM badzra b+h-i ku Ti kro d+ha hU~M/ khro bo'i rgyal po khro gnyer can/ /mdzod

spu las ni rab tu byung / /'jigs byed drag po yang dag ldan/ /lus rnams thams cad 'bar 'gyur ba/ /oM ni sum b+ha badzra hU~M/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /kha las rab tu byung bar gyur/ /spyi bo nas brtsams rkang mthil bar/ /rdo rje 'bar

ba yang dag ldan/ /Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ thugs kyi khro bo rgyal po che/ /thugs ka nas ni rab tu byung / /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku/ /'jigs su rung ba spu langs byed/ /oM badzra a~M gu sha A kar Sha ya hU~M/ rdo rje lcags kyu khro bo che/ /

phrag pa g.yas nas rab tu byung / /rdo rje lcags kyu gsor byed cing / /rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ /oM badzra pA sha kro d+ha A kad+h+ya hU~M phaT/ rdo rje zhags pa khro bo che/ /phrag pa g.yon nas rab tu byung / /rdo rje 'bar bar yang dag ldan/ /

rdo rje zhags pas bskor bar byed/ /oM badzra kI li kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu thogs/ /lte ba'i dbus gnas rab tu phyung / /kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ /blo mchog rdo rje gnod sbyin mtshungs/ /oM badzra me kha lA kro d+ha

hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po ska rags ni/ /rked pa'i rdo rje rab tu phyung / /kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig ldan/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ba la hU~M/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po stobs/ /dpung pa g.yas nas rab tu phyung / /rdo rje 'bar bas 'bar

bar gyur/ /me yis shin du nga rgyal gyur/ /oM badzra ba lA ya kro d+ha hU~M/ khro bo'i rgyal po gdu bu ni/ /dpung pa g.yon las yang dag byung / /gsang zhing rdo rje 'bar bas khyab/ /rdo rje khro bos rab tu khengs/ /oM sa ma ya badzra kro d+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/

dam tshig khro bo'i rgyal po ni/ /de bzhin khro bo'i gnod byed pa/ /khu tshur g.yas nas rab tu phyung / /kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ /oM badzra muSh+Ti kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ khro bo khu tshur drag po che/ /khu tshur g.yon las rab tu byung / /rdo rje 'bar ba dag gis

gsal/ /rdo rje me yis rab tu brgyan/ /oM badzra ban d+ha kro d+ha hU~M sa ma ya hU~M/ oM badzra a~Mdza li ban d+ha kro d+ha hU~M/ sa ma ya hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha an dza li hU~M/ rdo rje 'ching ba rgyal po che/ /de bzhin rdo rje sor mo nyid/ /khro bo lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi/ /sor mo dag

las yang dag byung / /oM badzra na kha hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha a~M gu li ma hA kro d+ha hU~M/ rdo rje sder mo khro bo che/ /de bzhin rdo rje sder mo'i gdong / /phyag ni g.yon dang g.yas pa yi/ /sor mo dag las rab tu byung / /oM badzra ku mA ra kro d+ha ka Ti rA ga hU~M/ oM badzra ku mA ra

kro d+ha mur+d+ha D+ha ka hU~M phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po rked pa dang / /de bzhin khro bo spyi gtsug dag /rgyal po brlab ni g.yon pa dang / /g.yas pa dag las rab tu byung / oM shriM kha li ma hA kro d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha A sha ni ban d+ha hU~M/ gnam

lcags rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /rgyal po 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/ /pus mo'i lha nga dag las byung / /oM badzra ban d+ha kro d+ha ha na hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a~M gu sha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo che/ /rdo rje yi ni yan lag drangs/ /

'bar ba dang bcas gnod sbyin gnyis/ /rje ngar dag las rab tu phyung / /oM nU pu ra kro d+ha hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha mo g+ha be ga A na ya hU~M phaT/ de nas dka' thub khro bo che/ /de bzhin rdo rje don yod nyid/ /rgyal po shugs

chen gnyis po ni/ /gdu bu'i rkang las rab tu byung / /oM badzra ban d+ha ha la kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra pA tA la mA ra ya kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rkang pa khro bo shugs chen po/ /de bzhin mthil gyi khro bo nyid/ /'bar ba 'phro ba

lhur len pa/ /gnyis po zhabs kyi mthil las byung / /de dge la sogs rgyal po ni/ /dpag tu med par rab tu byung / /gang gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa/ /phra rab rdul gyi khams dag ni/ /ba spu'i gseb ni thams

cad dang / /lus kyi gseb ni thams cad nas/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che/ /rang gi snying po las byung 'gyur/ /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyogs rnams kun du yongs spros te/ /slar yang gcig tu gyur nas ni/ /dkyil

'khor du ni yang dag gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'dus/ /ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po/ /e ma'o ye shes shin du bzang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/ /theg pa

chen po zhes byar bshad/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /dpag tu med pa zhes byar gyur/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi khro bo 'di/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/ /sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /de nyid sangs rgyas rigs

chen po/ /de nas de yi gsang ba'i mtshan/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/ /khro bo che las yang dag byung / /rdo rje khro bo'i dbang phyug bshad/ /rdo rje gtsug tor rdor mdzod spu/ /gnod mdzes bdag cag stobs po che/ /thugs

kyi khro bo rgyal po che/ /rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / /rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje zhags/ /rked pa'i khro bo stobs po che/ /ska rags stobs ldan nyid dang ni/ /lag gdub de bzhin dam tshig dang / /rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje bsdams/ /

rdo rje sor mo shin du drag /rdo rje sen mo rdo rje gdong / /de bzhin rked pa khro rgyal po/ /khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po lu gu rgyud/ /rdo rje gnam lcags rdo rje dbyig /rdo rje khro bo yan lag drag /rdo rje rkang gdub

rdor don yod/ /rdo rje zhabs dang de bzhin mthil/ /dam tshig rdo rje rgyal po 'di/ /rdo rje yi ni rigs su bshad/ /de dag la sogs rgyal po ni/ /rgyal po chen po rdzu 'phrul che/ /byang chub sems las yang dag byung / /rtag tu

gzhan yang grangs med pa/ /khros pas rang gi sha za zhing / /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab par gnas/ /bskal pa yi ni me ltar 'bar/ /rdo rje khro bos dkyil 'khor ni/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni bskyed nas kyang / /rab tu drag 'dzin bka' bsgos

pas/ /gdug pa rnams ni 'dul bar gyis/ /nga yi bka' yang mnyan par gyis/ /rdo rje can kun rang nyid kyi/ /bka' thob nas ni gzung bya ste/ /lha rnams kun gyi gsung gcig gis/ /rig pa 'di ni brjod par gyur/ /oM ni sum b+ha badzra hU~M phaT/ rdo rje

khro bo stobs po che/ /gtsug tor la sogs kun gsungs pa/ /lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams/ /'og tu kha bltas 'gyel bar gyur/ /rdo rje khro bo stobs po ches/ /lha rnams brgyal bar gyur nas ni/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar zhes pas/ /snying po dag ni yang

dag brjod/ /oM badzra a na la da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po rdo rje'i me/ /skad cig de las byung nas ni/ /lha rnams de dag sregs nas kyang / /de bzhin 'og tu sgyel bar gyur/ /rdo rje mes ni rab tu sreg /rdo rje 'bar bas 'bar bar

gyur/ /tshig cing btsos par gyur nas ni/ /lha la sogs pa 'o dod 'bod/ /rdo rje khro chen de rnams de/ /de bzhin khro chen la sogs pas/ /thams cad gsung gcig byas nas ni/ /slar yang snying po gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra A be sha a/ rdo rje

dbab pa'i khro ba che/ /rdo rje can gyi thugs las byung / /lha rnams kun gyi gnas song nas/ /de bzhin lha chen la sogs pa/ /lha rnams kun la yang dag babs/ /rdo rje dbab par rab sdug bsngal/ /byas nas rang gi yan lag dag /gcig la

gcig ni za bar byed/ /rdo rje can dang bcas pa kun/ /rdo rje zhags pa yang dag brjod/ /oM badzra dz+wa la ag ni pra dIp+ta ma hA badzra a~M ku sha A kar Sha ya hU~M/ rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal song nas/ /skad cig gis ni yang dag 'gugs/ /

lha rnams thams cad bkug nas ni/ /spyi bo ru ni ltung bar byed/ /rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag 'gugs/ /rdo rje zhags pas drangs par gyur/ /rdo rje 'bar bas rab sregs nas/ /steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/ /ha ha zhes ni bsgrogs

byed cing / /'jigs pa'i skad chen sdug bsngal gyur/ /rdo rje can la gsol ba 'debs/ /stobs chen gzhom par ma mdzad cig /de bzhin lha la sogs pa kun/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dgug par gyur/ /rdo rje can dang bcas kun

gyis/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag brjod/ /oM badzra s+pha Ta ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ lha tshogs gdug pa de dag ni/ /'ching ba lnga yis bcings par gyur/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog khro bo che/ /'ching ba brtan pa bcings par gyur/ /khro bo rdo rje rgyal po che/ /

shin du gtum po stobs chen po/ /slar yang snying po yang dag dran/ /rang gi snying po yang dag brjod/ /hU~M/ snying po drag po brjod pa yis/ /gdug pa de rnams rab tu 'gyel/ /g.yo med shi ba bzhin du gyur/ /'chi ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar

'thob/ /de nas rgyal po rnam snang mdzad/ /chos kun dbang phyug dbang dang ldan/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che/ /rdo rje 'chang la bos par gyur/ /sems dpa' chen po mnyan par gyis/ /'di rnams sems can rab 'jigs byed/ /'jig

rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di/ /srog ni gzhom par ma byed cig /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje kun bdag dbang ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni thos nas su/ /rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod/ /oM badzra u tiSh+Tha/ rdo rje slong ba

rdzu 'phrul che/ /de ni brjod pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha la sogs pa thams cad ni/ /slar yang gson pa nyid du gyur/ /sdug bsngal kun dang rab tu phral/ /'chi ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar gyur/ /rdo rje slong ba'i byams pa yis/ /sangs

rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas/ /de nas lha la sogs pa kun/ /sangs rgyas byams pas langs par gyur/ /thal mo sbyar nas tshig gcig gis/ /bcom ldan 'das la zhus gyur pa/ /bcom ldan nyes pa gang gis ni/ /bdag cag

'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje can kun gyis/ /bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /khyed cag yongs su bskyab pa dang / /phan gdags par ni ngas mi nus/ /'di ni drag po rdo rje

'dzin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag por bshad/ /de rnams kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don/ /ji ltar rung lags mi 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas bdag por gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'phags pa ji lta bu/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub gang / /de nas rdo rje can du gyur/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /rdo rje gang yin drag po 'dzin/ /de rnams kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu zhi/ /de ni byang chub

de dang mtshungs/ /brtse dang byang chub sems las byung / /de 'dra'i drag po ga las byung / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'di ni thabs kyis 'dul ba ste/ /gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di/ /byang

chub sems las yang dag byung / /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje khro bo bdag chen pos/ /lha tshogs kun la bos nas ni/ /dbang phyug chen po la gsungs pa/ /nga yi bstan pa'i bka' dag ni/ /kyai gdug pa dag mnyan par gyis/ /

min na rdo rje 'bar ba yis/ /rigs dang bcas pa nga yis sreg /khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams kyis/ /tshig gcig tu ni 'di skad zhus/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhin bgyi/ /de nas lha chen gyis

smras pa/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi shes/ /nga ni rang nyid rgyal po ste/ /nga yi bka' ni mnyan par gyis/ /lha chen po yi tshig gsan nas/ /rdo rje khro bo rab 'bar bas/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin 'joms zhes pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal po yang dag brjod/ /oM badzra

ni sum b+ha hU~M/ shin du gtum pa stobs chen po/ /khro bo 'di ni brjod pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po brgyal gyur nas/ /de bzhin sa la 'gyel bar gyur/ /g.yo med 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur/ /shing 'gyel bzhin du gnas par gyur/ /'gul

ba med cing g.yo ba med/ /rdo rje khro bos gdungs par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje khro bo thams cad mkhyen/ /bdag nyid chen po 'di yis ni/ /srog gi rgyu ni zad pa dang / /de nyid nyams par ci phyir byed/ /de nas rgyal

po rdo rje 'dzin/ / sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba yin/ /rdo rje tshe zhes bya ba ste/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra A yuH/ rig pa 'di ni brjod pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen pos yang dag langs/ /

rdo rje tshe yis gson byas nas/ /bde ba chen po thob par gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad thub chen la/ /zhabs dag la ni btud nas gsol/ /mgon po bcom ldan skyabs su gsol/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de gdug min/ /kun mkhyen

bcom ldan bka' stsal pa/ /nga yis brtse bar bya mi nus/ /'di ni gdug pa shin du drag /de nyid la ni skyabs su song / /rdo rje khro bos lha chen po/ /kun du bos nas 'di skad smras/ /nga yis bstan pa'i bka' dag ni/ /gdug

pa chen po mnyan par gyis/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag chen la/ /lha chen po yis slar smras pa/ /'chi ba chen po bzod nus kyi/ /khyod kyi bka' la gnas mi byed/ /rdo rje khro bo drag po che/ /khros pas gdug pa 'phel 'gyur na/ /

hU~M ni shin du 'jigs byed pa/ /snying po drag po brjod par gyur/ /hU~M yi ge hU~M ni brjod pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po slar yang 'gyel/ /rdo rje khro bo drag po che/ /rkang par dgug pa yang dag brjod/ /oM pA ta A kar Sha na badzra hU~M/

de nas rdo rje dbang po 'di/ /brjod pas rdo rje khro bo phyung / /tshig ni 'di skad brjod par gyur/ /bka' stsal brjod cing 'od chen po/ /rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa/ /oM pA ta A kar Sha ya sarba badzra d+ha ra ka tsa ra phaT badzra hU~M dzaH/ khro bo

chen pos 'di gsungs nas/ /dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas/ /rkang pas 'gugs pa'i rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje rkang pa dag gis bkug /rdo rje khro bos de dag bkug /steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/ /'jig rten thams cad dgod

'gyur cing / /rdo rje gdung bas gdungs par gyur/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas/ /zhabs kyis mnan nas rdo rje yis/ /dbang phyug chen po rdeg par byed/ /des ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po mnan

byas nas/ /g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi/ /nu ma dag gi bar du btsir/ /rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /dbang phyug chen po rab tu mnan/ /oM badzra A kra ma ho/ slar yang dbab pa'i rig pa ni/ /rdo rje khro bos yang dag brjod/ /oM badzra A be sha

ha na ha na tra Ta/ dbang phyug chen po bcas gyur pas/ /rang gi lag pas lan stong du/ /rang gdong 'jigs su rang la brdeg /stong phrag gcig tu yang dag gyur/ /'jig rten gsum gnas thams cad ni/ /'o dod chen po 'bod par gyur/ /

bdag cag gi ni rgyal po 'di/ /de lta bu yi bdag nyid gyur/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /brtse dang snying rje skyes par 'gyur/ /snying rje steng du gzhug bya ste/ /sangs rgyas byams pa yang dag brjod/ /oM bud d+ha mai tri rak+Sha/ dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin

gtso bos/ /de nas sngags 'di gsungs pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po'i sdug bsngal de/ /skad cig de la nye bar zhi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs dag gis/ /reg pas dbang phyug chen pos ni/ /sa chen po ni yang dag 'thob/ /ting nge 'dzin

dang gzungs de bzhin/ /tha mal pa yi lus bor nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin la phul bar gyur/ /lha chen 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /shi zhing lus ni bor nas su/ /gang gA sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam/ /thal bas

g.yogs pa'i gnas zhes pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni yid 'ong ba/ /de ru song nas lha chen po/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang bstan par gyur/ /thal ba'i dbang phyug sgra dbyangs can/ /de bzhin gshegs pa der gnas gyur/ /de nas shi ba'i lus de

yis/ /ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni/ /tshigs bcad gcig ni mngon par brjod/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /bsad nas skad cig bdag gis ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas

dgod mdzad/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches/ /dbang phyug chen po yang dag phyung / /khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams la/ /kun du bos nas 'di gsungs pa/ /rab mchog dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /gtso bo rab tu zhugs par gyis/ /gal te de bzhin mi byed na/ /dbang phyug chen po bzhin du bya/ /de nas lha kun

'jigs gyur te/ /skrag nas thams cad kyis zhus pa/ /de bzhin du ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /bdag cag khyed kyi bran du gyur/ /rgyal po khyod kyi dam tshig ni/ /ji ltar bsgrub par mi bgyid lags/ /bdag cag rnams ni khyod kyi

'khor/ /bskal pa chen po bka' stsol cig /rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /skyabs su rab tu 'gro bar gyis/ /byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni/ /sems can kun la yang dag sbyor/ /srog

gcod pa na spang bar gyis/ /rku dang brdzun du smra ba dang / /gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin du/ /de ni dang por spang bar gyis/ /sems can gnod dang ldan pa ni/ /ci nas kyang ni mi bya'o/ /byang chub spyod pa rab sbyor ba/ /de la lhod min brtson par

bya/ /nga yi bstan pa'i bka' yi ni/ /'di dag dam tshig yang dag brjod/ /nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis/ /min na khyod ni kun du sreg /de nas 'jig rten gsum 'khor los/ /de nas tshig ni blangs nas kyang / /byang sems yang

dag bskyed nas ni/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches/ /kun du phyag rgya byin nas kyang / /phyag rgya'i snying po 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje ti ri ti ri yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bcug gyur pas/ /oM badzra sa ma ya gr-ih+Na bud+d+ha sa

ma ye badzra satwa sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ta~M/ dr-i d+ho me b+ha ba oM pra ti ha ro me b+ha ba/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+ta~M shre ya~M ku ru ha ha ha ha hU~M/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni/ /phyag rgya kun du babs par gyur/ /rdo rje ti ri ti ri yi/ /

phyag rgya kun du bstan par gyur/ /de dag rim bzhin bcug nas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur gyur/ /rdo rje mtshan ma lag byin nas/ /rdo rje ming ni dbang bskur gyur/ /de la lha rnams thams cad ni/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur 'gyur/ /

sngon la 'jig rten gsum bdag po/ /go rim bzhin du dbang bskur 'gyur/ /khyab 'jug ces byar gnas pa ni/ /sgyu ma'i rdo rje zhes byar grags/ /gzhon nu rdo rje dril bu ste/ /tshangs pa rdo rje thub pa nyid/ /dbang po rdo rje mtshon cha nyid/ /de dag rig

pa'i bdag por bshad/ /rgyal po bzhi po gzi brjid che/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs chen pos/ /bar snang la ni rgyu ba nyid/ /rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur gyur/ /nyi ma rdo rje 'khyil pa ste/ /de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'od/ /dbyig chen rdo rje dbyig to ste/ /

ser skya rdo rje ser skya min/ /de la sogs pa khro rgyal po/ /rdo rje khro bor dbang bskur gyur/ /de nas mkha' spyod lha rnams ni/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur gyur/ /myos chen rdo rje myos pa ste/ /rdo rje phreng ba sbrang rtsi byed/ /rnam par rgyal dang rgyal byed dang / /

rdo rje shes dang rgyal bar ldan/ /tshogs kyi bdag po rgyal po dag /zhes bya la sogs dbang bskur gyur/ /de nas sa la gnas pa rnams/ /rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur gyur/ /gtun shing mdzod ni bsrung ba ste/ /me ni de bzhin rdo rje me/ /rdo rje

rlung ni rlung chen po/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed ngan rdo rje/ /de 'dra la sogs pho nya rnams/ /rdo rje mchog gis dbang bskur gyur/ /de nas sa 'og gnas pa ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rkang za ba/ /de bzhin gshin rje rdo rje nag /sa yi gtsug ni bgegs

rdo rje/ /chu lha mgon po rdo rje 'dzin/ /de nas lha mo ji bzhin du/ /go rim bzhin du dbang bskur gyur/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur gyis/ /yum gyi mchog rnams dbang bskur gyur/ /khyab 'jug ma ni rdo rje gser/ /drug ldan rdo rje gzhon nu ma/ /

tshangs pa rdo rje brgyad bcu ma/ /dbang mo rdo rje khu tshur ma/ /gsod byed rdo rje gsod nyid ma/ /snar ma rdo rje 'od ldan ma/ /de las dbyig pa rdor mchog ma/ /'phrog ma rdo rje ska rags te/ /gsod byed rdo rje 'jigs ma ste/ /gnam lcags rdo rje

gnam lcags ma/ /nam gru rdo rje dbang ldan ma/ /gos can rdo rje gos can ma/ /rdo rje pho nya zhi ba ma/ /rlung lha rdo rje shugs can ma/ /lus ngan ma ni rdo rje gdengs/ /me lha de bzhin rdo rje 'bar/ /phag mo rdo rje gdong can ma/ /rdo rje nag mo tsa mun mu

Ti/ /chu lha rdo rje chu srin ma/ /sna chad ma ni sbrul mo ste/ /de 'dra la sogs grangs med pa/ /lha mo rnams ni dbang bskur gyur/ /rang rang rigs ni rtogs nas su/ /ji bzhin lha yi bdag por bshad/ /de nas phyag rgya bcing ba byin/ /de bzhin dam

tshig snying po'o/ /lha rnams kun gyi bdag po kun/ /bkug nas de bzhin dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas/ /sdigs mdzub dang ni lcags kyu bcings/ /'ching ba dang ni grol byed par/ /dngos po bya ba'i don sems

dpa'/ /de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni/ /bya ba bsgrub phyir gnas par gyis/ /khyod kyi srog ni nyams gyur pa'i/ /de bzhin dam tshig sbyin mi bya/ /rgya cher phyag rgya chen por ni/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pas/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor byed pa/ /

de nyid ces bya bstan pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor mchog rnams de dag dang / /de bzhin lha la sogs pa kun/ /bkug cing rab tu bcug par gyur/ /rdo rje can gyis dbang byas nas/ /rdo rje thams cad dbang bskur gyur/ /rdo rje ming gis mtshan par byas/ /

lha chen po ni gcig pu nyid/ /zhabs kyis 'og tu brdabs nas bzhag /'jig rten gdug pa cher gyur pa/ /gdug pa'i snying po zhes byar grags/ /gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po yi/ /sems can 'ongs par the tshom med/ /thang cig tshes pas

re re ma/ /gang du zla gcig dkyil 'khor du/ /sems can stong phrag brgya dag ni/ /skad cig de la sdug bsngal byed/ /yid ni nye bar 'jal bar byed/ /mdangs ni nye bar 'phrog pa'i nad/ /mi yi skye bo gsod pa dang / /tha na dug chen nyid dang ni/ /

grong khyer dang ni grong rdal dang / /grong dag 'joms par byed pa dag /sems can rnams ni gcod byed dang / /skye bo stong pa sbyor byed dang / /de ltar drag cing 'jigs su rung / /brtse ba med cing sdig byed pa/ /gsod pa dang ni 'joms

par byed/ /shes rab 'phrog par byed pa dang / /drag po sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin pa/ /dud 'gro'i 'gro ba'i bar dang ni/ /sems can rnams la gnod byed dang / /myur du mdangs ni 'phrog pa dang / /lo nyes thog dang char dang ni/ /

char ni mi 'bab byed pa dang / /grang dang dro ba'i gdung ba dag /skad cig de la skyed pa dang / /gdon ni 'thab par byed pa dang / /nges bzhin bdud mchog bskyed pa dang / /sems ni rnam par g.yeng byed dang / /de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mtha'

yas dang / /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkon mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ste/ /skye dgu sna tshogs nad kyis btab/ /ye shes kyi ni spyan gyis gzigs/ /dam tshig sdang ba'i sems can dang / /yams dang de bzhin nye bar 'tshe/ /rims

dang gdon dang dug drag po/ /skye dgu 'di rnams 'joms par byed/ /sna tshogs sdug bsngal kun du 'khrugs/ /'jigs pa sna tshogs dag gis khyab/ /thams cad nyams shing zil gyis non/ /sdug bsngal drag pos sdug bsngal gyur/ /

slar yang bde bar bya ba'i phyir/ /nag po'i sngags ni yongs su gzung / /mkha' 'gro ma mo rnal 'byor mas/ /'gro ba'i don ni kun du khyab/ /rims dang gdon dang 'byung po dang / /mkha' 'gro ma mo 'byung po dang / /gdug pa rnams

kyis kun du khyab/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal snod 'di ni/ /gzigs nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /thugs rje dag ni bskyed par gyur/ /kye ma'o sems can 'di sdug bsngal/ /de la rjes su brtse byed med/ /nga ni kho na rang byung ste/ /de

bzhin sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog /nga la log par rtog pa ste/ /skye dgu de la brtse ba med/ /dbang phyug chen po gang yin dang / /gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed/ /yang dag byang chub rang byung 'gyur/ /skye dgu ma lus

bskyab par bya/ /thams cad dag ni dgug bya zhing / /de bzhin dam tshig bsrung bar bya/ /gnod dang phan pa byas nas ni/ /skye dgu 'di dag rnam par grol/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor skyob dang phan 'dogs pa/ /zhes bya de

'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ /sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs/ /mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun/ /'di ltar bka'i nod par byed/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /de bzhin snying po phyung bar gyur/ /oM badzri sub+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M phaT/

de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas bka' ni gzung nas kyang / /phyi rol dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i phyir/ /lcags kyu'i snying po rab tu phyung / /oM badzra sa ma ya A kar Sha ya sarba maN Da la badzra d+ha ra satwa mA ti kra ma hU~M phaT/ rig pa

brjod par gyur pa yis/ /rdo rje lcags kyu shin du brtan/ /lcags kyu bdag nyid che mchog ni/ /brgya phrag grangs med byung bar gyur/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /rim bzhin rab tu thim par gyur/ /gang zhig phyogs rnams

bcu po ru/ /gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur/ /gdug pa de rnams bkug nas kyang / /de bzhin gong bu gcig tu bya/ /rdo rje me yis kun du gsungs/ /ri rab rtse mo phab nas ni/ /tshad med bgrang du med pa rnams/ /phyi rol gyi

ni dkyil 'khor 'ongs/ /rdo rje dbang po'i gnas kun du/ /'khor nyid tu ni yang dag gnas/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bos nas ni/ /kye gdug skye dgu rnams la ni/ /rnam par 'tshe ba spang bar gyis/ /

khyed rnams kyis ni dam tshig long / /srog chags thams cad gsod pa spangs/ /min na khyed rnams g.yas 'bar bas/ /de bzhin nga yis thal bar bya/ /gdug pa'i dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyis/ /tshig gcig tu ni zhus gyur pa/ /

mgon po bdag cag sha za ste/ /ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig /de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pos/ /ma bsdams pa yi tshig gsan nas/ /rdo rje khro bo rab brjid bka'/ /snying po drag po gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha na da ha pa

tsa ba d+h+wa~M sa ya b-i kr-i ta sarba duSh+TA na sa ma ya mu drA man Da la b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ mar d+ha mar d+ha/ khA da khA da/ pA ra man tra/ badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen pos 'di brjod pas/ /rab drag gdug pa de dag ni/ /tshig cing rab tu 'gyel

'gyur zhing / /dam tshig phyag rgya nyams par gyur/ /'o dod 'bod cing ngu bar gyur/ /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /ji skad smra ba bzhin byas te/ /'on kyang bden par smra mi bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' drag po che/ /rang bzhin gyis ni

sangs rgyas bdag /stobs chen gsang ba'i dbang po yis/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ /oM ni sum b+ha ha na da ha pa tsa gr-ih+Na ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas bka' la rab gnas pas/ /rdo rje khro

bo rab za byed/ /snying po drag po brjod par gyur/ /oM ma hA badzra kro d+ha pA da sarba duSh+Ta man Da la pi nA sha ya/ /sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya yan bi gi ra bi d+h+wa~M sa ma ya s+pho Ta ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA~M ban d+ha grih+Na/ ha na da ha pa

tsa/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya satwa sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di ni brjod tsam gyis/ /rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che/ /gtum po drag po shin du 'jigs/ /rdo rje khro bo rab tu phyung / /rigs bcas dpung dang bcas ldan pa/ /dam tshig sdang ba bzung nas

ni/ /shin du 'jigs pas skrag gyur c-ing / /rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu skur/ /phyag rgya rab 'jigs de dag gis/ /rnam par bcom zhing zil gyis mnan/ /rdo rje me yis bsregs nas ni/ /thams cad tu ni thal bar byas/ /byang sems las

byung rdo rje can/ /ji ltar sems can bsregs par byed/ /'di ni gzhug pa'i tshig yin te/ /phan pa'i rigs can rgyal bdag skyes/ /'dod chags skyon la sogs lta ba/ /nyon mongs dri ma gang shes nas/ /rdo rje can gyis dri ma 'di/ /

bzung nas ye shes me yis bsregs/ /sems can shin du 'jigs te skrag /byang chub spyod pas byang chub gnas/ /mi bskyod pa yi gnas skyes shing / /rdo rje can ni mchog tu gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje chen

po phyag rgya 'gugs/ /zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ /'jigs pa med par snyoms par zhugs/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni rjes sbyang phyir/ /rgyal ba la ni bka' nod gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs chen la/ /de nas sangs rgyas

kun gsungs pa/ /oM ha na ha na badzra hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pos/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas/ /'jigs pa 'gugs pa'i rdo rje ni/ /rang nyid kyi ni sngags 'di brjod/ /oM badzra A kar Sha ya shI g+h+ra~M/ sarba duSh+Ta gr-ih+Na

badzra sa t+ye na hU~M dzaH/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni mdangs 'phrog pa/ /rnal 'byor sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas/ /ri rab tu ni kun du 'dus/ /rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni/ /'bar ba dang bcas 'bar bar gyur/ /spyi bor

thal mo sbyar nas rtsig /smras pa rdo rje 'dzin pas skyobs/ /skal chen rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /kye gdug tshogs chen po myur ba ru/ /gsod pa spongs la bka' nyan gyis/ /de dag re re zhing smras pa/ /bdag cag 'di rnams sha za ste/ /gang

zhig rtag tu gson gyur pa/ /bdag cag la ni thabs bstan gsol/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /de yis thabs ni 'di gsungs so/ /zla gcig lon nas shi ba gang / /de ni bza' ba blang bar gyis/ /byang chub sems la chags bral nas/ /

gsang ba smod pa lhur len pa/ /khyod dang lhan cig yang dag sbyor/ /de bza' ba ni gnang bar gyis/ /phyag rgya yi ni snying po 'di/ /rtag tu bcang bar bya ba ste/ /phyi rol thams cad spangs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar

gyis/ /oM badzra pra ti gr-ih+Na hr-i da ya A kar Sha ya/ tsar+ya ya~M me sa d+ho d+he na mi ni ya te hA sa ri d+ha ya~M niSh+ka ma du sa ma ya hU~M dzaH/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan/ /khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po ni/ /rnal 'byor pa

ni de yis spros/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ /khro bo bdag nyid chen po yi/ /rtag tu mgo bo 'gas byed cing / /rigs dang bcas pa nges par sreg /bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal po zhes/ /bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ /sems dpa'

chen po snyoms zhugs nas/ /nad kyi don du tshol bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /oM badzra hU~M phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems can thams cad 'jig byed pas/ /nad rnams thams cad bkug nas ni/ /'gugs

pa yi ni snying po brjod/ /oM badzra sa ma ya A na ya sarba duSh+Ta dz+wA ra Ni di nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis kyang / /nad dang gdon gyi tshogs kun dang / /rims sogs kyis ni de thos nas/ /steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/ /'bar

ba'i me dang yang dag ldan/ /ha ha zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed/ /bdag cag rigs ni ma gzhom par/ /khro bo chen po bka' stsol cig /rdo rje rnal 'byor chen pos gsungs/ /nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/ /sems can nye bar 'joms pa spongs/ /

mdangs kyang 'phrog par ma byed cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ kye rgyal po rdo rje bdag cag gis/ /srog gi bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ /bdag cag kun nas gzi brjid za/ /thabs ni cung zad brtsam du gsol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po

che/ /de nas stobs chen gyis smras pa/ /nga yi sngags dang phyag rgya dag /gang zhig bsrung la gnod ma byed/ /oM badzra karma bi sho d+ha ya sarba A pa ra na Ni bud d+ha satwe sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas phyag rgya chen po kun/ /theg pa chen

por mngon bsdus pa/ /mdo sde gsang ba rgyal po las/ /yongs su bshad pa thams cad kun/ /sngags dang phyag rgya gnas gang na/ /rtag par rab tu sbyong byed pas/ /gnas de ru yang rtag pa ru/ /khyed rnams shin du gnod ma byed/ /

de skad gsungs pas gdon kun ni/ /hi hi zhes ni sgrogs par gyur/ /spyi bo'i rnal 'byor pa la ni/ /gnod pa byed pa thams cad gtad/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug gis/ /sdig pa bral ba'i

phyag rgya che/ /blo gros chen po snyoms par zhugs/ /ngan song bcing bar bya ba'i phyir/ /mgon po dag la bka' nod byed/ /mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /kun nas snying po brjod par gyur/ /oM k+She pa ya badzra swA hA/

rdo rje sems dpa'i thabs chen po/ /rdo rje las ni yang dag byung / /sems can rnams la brtse bya'i phyir/ /sdig pa thams cad bkug par gyur/ /oM sarba pA pa~M a pA ya na bi sho d+ha na badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ de skad brjod nas

rnal 'byor ches/ /skad cig gis ni ngan song bkug /ri yi rgyal po nye ba ru/ /ngu 'bod la sogs snang bar gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnal 'byor ches/ /ngan song sems can la smras pa/ /dkon mchog gsum dang

nga bstan la/ /myur du bstan pa skyabs su song / /de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ /stobs chen bdag cag bskyab tu gsol/ /gtso bos ji skad bka' stsal pa/ /de bzhin du ni bgyi bar 'tshal/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sdig pa

dral ba nges 'ching ba/ /sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba a pA ya b+han d+ha nA ni pra mo k+Sha ya sarbA bA ya ga te b+h+yaHsarba satwa~M`/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ya T+rA tha/

sems can ngan song rgyu can rnams/ /rig pa 'di yis dbang bskur bas/ /ngan song 'khor lo dral bar gyur/ /rgya mtsho ru ni rab tu ltung / /de bzhin ngan song shi 'phos nas/ /de kun rab tu grol bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol/ /

rdo rje dbang po'i gnas thob gyur/ /de bzhin thub pa rnam snang gi/ zhabs drung du ni skyes par gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /de bzhin mi khom zad par gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /de nas skad cig des zhi thob/ /

rmad byung sna tshogs gsang chen po/ /cho 'phrul dag ni skyes par gyur/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin gnas/ /rin chen bdun gyis rab tu spras/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis rab mdzes/ /de yi rigs kyi nang song

kun/ /sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ /sems can bde ba skyes par gyur/ /rdo rje bde ba yang dag ldan/ /mchog chen po yi zhing 'di ni/ /dag pa'i zhing du rab tu grags/ /sems can dag pa kun du khyab/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor rdor

rang bzhin/ /slar yang shing gi nags la sogs/ /rmad byung chen po snang ba med/ /rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin kun/ /nags dang rtswa las skyes par gyur/ /mthon dman dag dang rnam par bral/ /lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par snang / /ka tsa

li ltar reg na bde/ /stong gsum rab tu gnas par gyur/ /dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal kun/ /dang por ngan song nye bar zhi/ /bkres skom pa yi sdug bsngal dag /kun du 'gag par mnyam par gnas/ /rgya mtsho kun du thim par gyur/ /

ri bo gzugs kyang kun du khyab/ /gzhan 'phrul gyi ni lha rnams dang / /mtshungs pa ru ni mi rnams gyur/ /slar yang mu khyud 'khor lo med/ /ri rab man d+ha ra dag med/ /lha yi 'jig rten gnas kyang med/ /rgya mtsho med cing lha min med/ /klu yi gnas

gzhi dag kyang med/ /mi yi khyim dang khyang pa med/ /grong khyer ljongs dang yul 'khor dang / /phug dang bcas par rnam par bral/ /mi yi gnas kyang med pa nyid/ /chu bo phug dang lung pa med/ /mi dag gi ni lus kyang med/ /sems can 'ga'

yang 'dir mi snang / /ngan song 'khor lo dag kyang med/ /mi khom med cing sdug bsngal med/ /bud med skyes pa la sogs med/ /rnga mo glang po lug kyang med/ /dpag bsam shing dang spos kyi shing / /rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin mdzes/ /spos kyi chu yi rgya

mtsho dang / /rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes/ /shing ni yid 'ong thams cad la/ /rol mo'i sgra ni mngon par phyung / /rol mo'i chos kyi sgra dag kyang / /stong gsum du ni yongs su byung / /ji ltar rdo rje dbang po'i/ // /ri rab ri yi rtse mo ltar/ /de bzhin stong gsum

gyi ni gnas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'od 'bar gyur/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /gru bzhir rab tu gnas par gyur/ /kun nas phyi rol gnas rnams ni/ /kha khyer du yang snang bar gyur/ /slar yang nyi ma zla ba med/ /skar ma med cing lha yang med/ /rang gi khang

pa'i nang du yang / /lha rnams nyid kyang mthong mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis yongs su gsal/ /'od zer sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa/ /gang gis zhing ni yang dag sbyangs/ /rdo rje rin chen yid 'ong ba/ /rdo rje dbang po'i gnas nyid kyang / /slar yang snang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /

gzhan du gzhi ni gcig pa'i gnas/ /gang du sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /lha yi pad ma yongs su gsal/ /rin chen sna bdun rab tu mdzes/ /dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong ldan/ /bskal pa chen po'i zhing gi dbus/ /dkyil 'khor

shin du sdug steng du/ /dpag tshad stong phrag brgya bcu yi/ /rdo rje seng ge'i khri byung gyur/ /kun nas phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /dpag tshad stong phrag drug bcu ldan/ /rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin mdzes/ /seng ge'i khri ni bzhi byung gyur/ /rdo rje bla re rnam par bres/ /dar gyi chun pos

rnam par 'phyang / /dril bu'i dra ba rnam par 'phyang / /zhing ni kun nas rab tu spras/ /me tog sna tshogs kun du bkram/ /sna tshogs sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs/ /sna tshogs dri yis kun du khyab/ /dpag bsam shing gis nye bar spras/ /

dpag bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan/ /rdo rje'i rol mo mdzes pa dag /sgra ni mngon par 'byin par byed/ /'di nyid dang ni lhan cig zhing / /sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin du/ /phyogs rnams kun du snang bar gyur/ /slar yang 'jigs par 'gyur

ba med/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /gang gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa/ /shin du phra ba'i rdul snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal/ /til gyi gang bu gang ba bzhin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal/ /phyogs rnams

kun nas ma lus par/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir gshegs 'gyur/ /dbus kyi seng ge'i gdan dag la/ /chos dbyings 'jigs pa med pa la/ /rnam par snang mdzad stobs chen po/ /ston pa bcom ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /shar du yang ni

mi bskyod pa/ /lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan te/ /nub tu 'od dpag med pa yin/ /byang du don yod grub pa ste/ /mgon po chen po phyogs bzhi ru/ /rdo rje yi ni steng du bzhugs/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu ni/ /mnyam du dmigs

nas rnam par gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings nas bstan par gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brtan par bzhugs/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas grangs med thams cad ni/ /rdo rje can

ni lnga la bzhugs/ /phyogs ni re rer khyab gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas gcig gis yang dag bzhugs/ /mtshams dang steng dang 'og dag gi/ rnam snang mdzad kyis brtan par mdzad/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan gyur pa/ /dbus kyi phyogs kyi sangs

rgyas bzhugs/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs snying po/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rang nyid kyi/ /seng ge'i khri ni lnga la bzhugs/ /grangs med tshad ni med pa yi/ /

sangs rgyas chos nyid ma lus pa/ /ri mo gsal ba dang mtshungs par/ /stong gsum dag ni ma lus gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba che/ /pad ma'i steng du bzhugs par gyur/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ /bye ba dag ni

grangs med lnga/ /sangs rgyas rol pa dang ldan par/ /rdo rje can ni thams cad bzhugs/ /shar gyi cha las yang dag bzhugs/ /bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ /rdo rje rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/ /'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /lho yi phyogs

na thams cad gnas/ /bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ /rin chen rnam 'phrul yang dag ldan/ /'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ /nub kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas/ /pad ma'i rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/ /'khor lo dang

ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ /byang gi phyogs na rnam par gnas/ /las kyi rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/ /'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /gsang dang mchod pa gang yin dang / /lha mo rdo rje lha mo ni/ /grangs med

tshad ni med pa dag /bcu gnyis kyis ni dkyil 'khor gang / /sgo srungs dag ni grangs med pa/ /rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan pa bzhi/ /rgyal po shar dang lho dag tu/ /nub dang byang ni yang dag gnas/ /chos kyi sku las yang dag byung / /longs

spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa/ /sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kun/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung / /gang zhig phyogs bcu dag gi yang / /byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i sa thob pa/ /de dag

kun kyang 'dir 'ongs pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni gang gA yi/ /bye ma dang mnyam ji snyed pa/ /yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i tshogs/ /de dag thams cad yang dag gshegs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni/ /zhing dag rgya ni chen por

gyur/ /yul rnams thams cad bya ba yang / /gnod pa med cing 'tshe ba'ang med/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten pa'i/ /ji ltar sngon ni bar med pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /bar med pa ni de bzhin gnas/ /gang nas

sangs rgyas mi snang ba/ /phyogs ni rdul tsam yod ma yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor che/ /gang dag sa ni bzhi bcu dang / /yang na chos las byung ba nyid/ /sangs rgyas sras ni grags pa che/ /rigs

lnga byung ba la sogs pa/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa dang / /'dir gnas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/ /mchog rnams phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams mthong / /sangs rgyas dag ni grangs med kun/ /lha rnams yang dag

gnas 'di ru/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas dgra bcom ma gtogs par/ /zhing 'dir 'ga' yang mthong ma gyur/ /rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo min/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshogs kyang min/ /dbus dang phyogs ni yang dag

bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur/ /dbang phyug chen po gnod byed pa'i/ /rdo rje khro bo mthong bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas lnga dang de bzhin du/ /khro bo drug bdun rnam par gnas/ /tshangs sogs lha rnams de dag kyang / /ngo mtshar

dag ni skyes par gyur/ /'jigs shing skrag nas lha de dag /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /gtso bo ji bzhin mthong 'gyur zhing / /shin du ngo mtshar ci zhig snang / /slar yang lha yi 'jig rten dag /srid pa nang du mthong mi 'gyur/ /

'gro ba lnga yi sems can min/ /ri rab dang ni rgya mtsho min/ /zla ba nyi ma ma mthong zhing / /ri dang khang pa dag kyang min/ /ci bdag cag ni rmongs gyur tam/ /yang na mig ni long bar gyur/ /yang na bdag cag sems g.yengs pa/ /sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul 'di ci

zhig /bdag cag gis ni sngar 'jigs mthong / /drag cing bkug nas thal bar byas/ /ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru/ /sdug bsngal chen pos gzir bar gyur/ /slar yang ri rab yod ma yin/ /khro bo rdzu 'phrul chen po med/ /gzhan dang khro bo chen

po gcig /dbang phyug chen po gnod par byed/ /gnas ni chung ngur gyur pa yang / /rgya chen po ru 'di ru snang / /stong gsum 'di yang mi snang ste/ /bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin/ /de ltar brjod pa sna tshogs pa/ /gcig

la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /mi smra bar ni gnas gyur nas/ /rdo rje can la lta bar byed/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po sha za sogs/ /gdug pa kun dang gdon sogs kyis/ /mun par khyab pa bzhin du ni/ /stong gsum 'di ni mthong bar

gyur/ /gzhan ni cung zad ma mthong ste/ /gzhan du phyogs dag mun pas khyab/ /rdo rje khro bo 'khrul gyur cing / /sgyu ma yis ni rmongs gyur cing / /kun du rmongs pa nyid gyur cing / /gcig la gcig ni rmongs par gyur/ /ha ha zhes bya'i sgra sgrogs shing / /bdag cag

'dir ni gang du phyin/ /tshig ni rab tu rjod byed cing / /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang / /'di ni su yi gam du phyin/ /bdag cag rang gi gnas na ltung / /bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin/ /rdo rje khro bos gsad par gyur/ /'o na

'di ni ci zhig yin/ /lha yi gnas kyang ma mthong bzhin/ /rdo rje can yang mthong ma gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo min/ /bdag cag rnams ni mun par gyur/ /rang gi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing / /ri rab nyid kyang mthong ma gyur/ /mtsho

dang rgya mtsho dag kyang min/ /skar ma zla ba nyi ma min/ /bdag cag thams cad gang nas 'ongs/ /yul gang zhig tu 'gro bar bya/ /'gro ba lnga yang yod ma yin/ /'jig rten med cing ma mo med/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa dag /rnam pa kun du

mthong ma gyur/ /sngon ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis/ /rmad du byung ba nyid ma gyur/ /gzhan du sa ni g.yos par gyur/ /rlung dag gis ni rnam par bskyod/ /'brug gi sgra dang glog chen po/ /sdug bsngal thams cad yang dag ldan/ /bkres skom

la sogs sdug bsngal dang / /bral min kun du sdug bsngal gyur/ /der ni lha chen rdzu 'phrul dag /cung zad kyang ni mthong ma gyur/ /dmyal ba yi dgas dud 'gro dag /rnam par nyams shing bshig par gyur/ /sdig pa bral ba'i

phyag rgya yis/ /ngan song gsum ni nye bar zhi/ /lha gang 'du shes med pa dang / /gzugs med pa na spyod par gnas/ /phung po lnga ru rang bdag nyid/ /ngo mtshar de bzhin mthong gyur nas/ /rang nyid la'ang rtog par byed/ /gcig la gcig kyang

lta bar byed/ /de bzhin thams cad skrag cing 'jigs/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di ci zhig /tshad med bskal pa chen po ru/ /bdag cag dag par gnas par gyur/ /bdag mchog las ni bdag cag grol/ /slar yang bdag tu 'dzin par gyur/ /sngon

gyi bag chags mngon 'dod la/ /srid gsum gnas nas mthong bar gyur/ /srid pa gsum yang mthong ma yin/ /de bzhin 'gro ba lnga yang med/ /gzhan du shin du dag par gcig /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa sprul/ /sangs rgyas lnga

nyid mthong bar gyur/ /srid gsum gnas ni gzhan dag min/ /tshogs la thams cad mnyes par gyur/ /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang / /bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin/ /sngon nas bdag gis 'jig

rten 'di/ /'gro ba lnga bcas de bzhin du/ /ri rab dang ni rgya mtshor bcas/ /lha rnams drug ni 'khor bcas mthong / /srid pa gsum gyi lha rnams ni/ /gang zhig 'di ni mthong ma gyur/ /gzhal yas khang dang sems can ni/ /gtso bo ji bzhin

mthong bar gyur/ /de 'dra'i ngo mtshar sna tshogs pa/ /gnas chen 'di ru mthong bar gyur/ /byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul 'di/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rol ba yin/ /gang zhig stong gsum 'di yi ni/ /rang rgyal thams cad mchog gyur pa/ /

de yang kun du rmongs gyur nas/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'ang mthong ma gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma yin/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyang min/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan zhi ba/ /gnas ni de ru mthong ma gyur/ /gzhan du stong ni gsum po

'di/ /rnam pa kun du ma mthong nyid/ /sa dang me dang chu khams min/ /gser gyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang min/ /'gro ba lnga yi sems can min/ /zla ba nyi ma dag kyang min/ /skar ma gza' dang rgyu skar min/ /sems can dag kyang khams

gsum min/ /'di dag thams cad stong par gyur/ /gzhan du nam mkha' dkyil 'khor min/ /de dag thams cad 'jigs skrag nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa nye bar thob/ /gang yang phyogs rnams bcu po yi/ /nyan thos 'jigs pa med pa

rnams/ /byang sems can ni chen po yis/ /de dag kun nas skrag par gyur/ /rang rang gi ni zhing dag tu/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma gyur/ /'dus pa chen po dag dang ni/ /chos rnams ston pa dag kyang min/ /zhing de yi ni sems can

min/ /lha dang mi rnams dag kyang min/ /khang pa med cing zhing yang med/ /sa dang me dang rlung yang med/ /rang gi zhing yang ma mthong zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs par gyur/ /skad cig gis ni mi dgar gyur/ /

de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul du/ /byang chub sems ni rab tu snang / /sngon gyi bskal ba chen po la/ /'khor lo rnam par 'phrul pa bstan/ /bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas/ /de lta bu ni byin gyis brlabs/ /sems can

gang dag 'di na gnas/ /nyin dang mtshan mo mi shes gyur/ /de nas de nyid gsang ba che/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i tshogs/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul byung / /

stong gsum yongs su bsdus pa yi/ /lha yi gnas ni bkod par gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas gcig pu/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /la lar sngon pos rab tu mdzes/ /sa yi phyogs ni rab tu spras/ /
rdo rje sngon pos rab tu brgyan/ /la lar gser gyi mdog tu snang / /kha dog ser pos rnam par brgyan/ /sa yi cha yang rab tu spras/ /rdo rje ser pos rab tu brgyan/ /

la lar kha dog dmar po ni/ /byi ru lta bus rab tu mdzes/ /sa yi cha yang rab tu spras/ /rdo rje dmar pos rab tu brgyan/ /la lar btsag gi mdog can gyi/ /bai dUr+ya mtshungs rab tu mdzes/ /sa yi cha yang rnam par spras/ /rdo rje

btsod kyis rnam par mdzes/ /la lar shel gyi mdog can gyis/ /shin du snang bas rab tu mdzes/ /sa yi cha yang rnam par spras/ /rdo rje shel gyis rnam par brgyan/ /shar du sngon po chen po ste/ /lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi cha ni

dmar po ste/ /byang ni btsod dang yang dag ldan/ /dbus kyi sa yi cha dag ni/ /shel gyi mdog can bla na med/ /rdo rje chen pos shin du dag /tshon rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin bshad/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rab tu mdzes/ /cha mnyam

legs par bgos pa ste/ /go rim dang ni yang dag ldan/ /kun nas phyi rol gnas dag na/ /rdo rje kha khyer yang dag ldan/ /kun nas kha khyer dang ldan zhing / /sgo yi kha khyer dag gis spras/ /ri mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin/ /gzhan yang

gser gyi mdog can dang / /kha dog dmar po mchog dang ni/ /gzhan yang shel ni bzang po dag /rin chen kun gyi rang bzhin mchog /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdzes gyur pa/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /rdo rje

lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/ /zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/ /g.yer ka'i dra bas kun du khebs/ /dril bu'i mchog ni kun du 'phyang / /sna tshogs shing ni yid 'ong ldan/ /dpag bsam shing ni yid 'ong
