ldan/ /spos dang me tog de bzhin dri/ /snang ba'i shing mchog yang dag ldan/ /sna tshogs bkod pa nye bar ldan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/ /mtsho mchog chu yis gang bar gyur/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho rgya chen ldan/ /me tog sna tshogs kun

du bkram/ /sna tshogs bdug pa dag gis bdugs/ /sna tshogs dri yi chu yis gtor/ /sna tshogs dri yis kun du khyab/ /drag po chen po sras bcu dag /de nas nyams dga' ba dag byung / /shing dang pad sogs thams cad las/ /

chos rnams 'byung ba thos par gyur/ /phyogs rnams kun du rnam phyung nas/ /dag pa'i zhing du stong nyid bcas/ /rnam par sgra ni gang zhig grag /chos kyi bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ya~M/ la~M/ sha~M/ ba~M/ oM badzra satwa kro d+hA ya hU~M phaT/

oM badzra kro d+ha A kar Sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha rA ga ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha ya sA d+hu sA d+hu hU~M phaT/ khro bo rdo rje rin chen mchog /'bar ba'i phreng ba bkod dka' bas/ /khro bo rdo rje bla na med/ /mchog tu gsang ba

gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra b+h+ri ku Ti kro d+ha ha na hU~M phaT/ oM badzra sUr+ya ma hA dz+wa la mA la kro d+ha dz+wA lA ya sarba hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ke tu ma hA kro d+ha d+he na hU~M phaT/ oM aT+Ta hA sa badzra maT+Ta hA sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hU~M phaT/ khro bo

chen po rdo rje chos/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab gyur pas/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rab bzod dka'/ /mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba smras/ /oM badzra d+harma ba sho d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM tik+Sh+Na kro d+ha ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ oM badzra he tu kro d+ha pra be sha ya maN Da la~M

sarba hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha b+hA Sha ta pA ta hU~M phaT/ rdo rje las ni rgyal po che/ /gsang ba thams cad kun bsdus pas/ /'bar ba bsal bas khyab pa byung / /khro bo rgyal pos brjod par gyur/ /oM badzra karma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra

ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA da khA da hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha muSh+Ti sA d+ha ya sa ma hU~M phaT/ sems dpa' 'di rnams gsang ba che/ /zhi ba'i gzugs las rnam par gyur/ /rdo rje khro bo drag po che/ /'khor

lo'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs gyur/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /khro bo chen po stobs po che/ /gsang ba 'di rnams yongs su brjod/ /mchod pa'i lha mos gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra lA s+ye rA ga ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra mA lai

a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra gI t+ye gA ta ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra nr-i t+ye ba shi ku ru hU~M phaT/ oM badzra puSh+pa pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ oM badzra gan d+ha pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ oM badzra d+hU pa pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye ke

hU~M phaT/ oM badzra A lo ke pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /khro bo drag po shin du gdug /rdo rje khro bo rab gtum pa/ /sgo srungs dag ni kun du byung / /oM a~M ku sha ma hA kro d+ha A kar Sha ya

sarba sa ma ya hU~M dzaH/ oM badzra pA sha ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha ya sarba sa ma ya hU~M hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA kro d+ha ban d+ha ya sarba sa ma ya hU~M ba~M/ oM badzra A be sha ma hA kro d+ha A be sha ya sarba sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ hoH/ 'khor lo

yongs su zlum por ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur/ /khro bo chen po'i tshogs kyis khyab/ /dkyil 'khor chen po yang dag ldan/ /gnas chen po dang yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor chen por kun bsdus pas/ /shin du gsang

ba chos chen po/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /de nyid snying po gsang ba che/ /thar pa chen po grong khyer mchog /dkyil 'khor rgyal po chen po ste/ /sems can don kun yang dag ldan/ /chos nyid rdzogs par

byang chub pa/ /'di 'dra chos dang longs spyod rdzogs/ /rigs lnga'i gsang ba gang yin pa/ /gdon mi za bar byed pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhi ba/ /gang phyir dag pa'i tshogs chen po/ /de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs drag po/ /gang phyir
lha chen rab 'dul byed/ /lha chen la sogs sprul byed pa/ /de bzhin pad ma'i rigs mchog ste/ /gang phyir gdul bya'i sems can rnams/ /sprul pa sna tshogs yang dag byung / /sprul pa'i 'khor

lo zhi ba ste/ /drag po'i mchod pa rab bskor ba/ /sna tshogs rigs can 'khor lo ste/ /rigs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mchog ni/ /shar gyi 'khor lo yang dag byung / /de nas rdo rje'i rigs drag

po/ /sems can don du yang dag 'jigs/ /rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po 'di/ /dkyil 'khor tshogs ni kun bsdus pa/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug rgyal po che/ /gang phyir gsang ba'i bdag por bshad/ /rdo rje thams cad kun bsdus

pa/ /rang gi rigs mchog bshad nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po ches/ /dkyil 'khor chen po kun du sprul/ /lha la sogs pa gdug pa kun/ /skad cig de la yang dag bkug /slar ni bcug par byas nas kyang / /skad

cig gis ni dam tshig phog /rdo rje mtshan ma'i dbang bskur ba/ /dam tshig ldan pa byin nas ni/ /bkug ste rab tu bcug nas kyang / /de bzhin bcings te dbang du byas/ /dam tshig la ni brtson byas te/ /dam tshig sdom pa de bzhin

no/ /mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni gsungs par gyur/ /'khor lo chen po grong khyer che/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po ste/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /'jig

rten gsum tshogs pham byas nas/ /lha la sogs pa rab bcug gyur/ /de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gnas/ /'khor lo chen po grong khyer che/ /gang ming gzung ba tsam nyid kyis/ /sems can rab tu bcom nas ni/ /gdon la

sogs pa 'bros par byed/ /rims dang gdon dang dug dag dang / /drag po gdug pa dam tshig dang / /mtshan bzang ba yi mod nyid la/ /skrag pa dang ni g.yo bar gyur/ /sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog /mi gang dag ni

gdul bya min/ /de bas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po sprul par gyur/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che/ /shin du byang zhing rab tu mkhas/ /dgongs pa yi ni cho ga shes/ /gzhung rnams thos shing don la mkhas/ /rab

tu dang zhing blo ldan brtan/ /rigs dang rigs min rab tu shes/ /byang chub sems la brtson par gyur/ /lha gzhan dag la 'dod ldan min/ /gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong ba/ /snying rje bdag nyid brtser ldan pa/ /dag cing des la rnam par dul/ /rang

gi ngang gis rnam par gnas/ /zhen cing chags la gdug pa min/ /rmongs pa med cing le lo med/ /brtse bldan phan pa'i bsam pa can/ /rtag tu rnam par dgod la dga'/ /gzugs 'dod pa yi yon tan la/ /chags shing lhag par rgyal

gyur nas/ /srid la sems ni skrag par byed/ /srid la mngon par chags pa med/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul la brtson/ /theg pa gzhan la 'dod ldan min/ /sems can kun gyi don la brtson/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog byung ba/ /nyon

mongs kun du chags pa spangs/ /gnyen po dag ni rab tu bsgom/ /'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs che/ /mi sdug pa la sogs pa bsgom/ /rigs dang rigs min cho ga shes/ /sngags dang phyag rgya shin du mkhas/ /dgug dang

gzhug dang bcing ba dang / /dbang du bya dang gshegs gsol dang / /ji skad rdo rje dbyings bshad yin/ /sngon du rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya/ /kha na ma tho rdul tsam la/ /kun du 'dzem par bya ba yin/ /tshad dang tshon rtsi srad bu dang / /yo byad

cho ga yang dag ldan/ /bcing dang phur bus gdab pa nyid/ /sngar bshad rdo rje dbyings bzhin du/ /bza' ba dang ni mi bza' ba/ /rdo rje snyems tshul ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du/ /sngar ni ji ltar de bzhin bya/ /

de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs/ /dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /thig bzhi dang ni

yang dag ldan/ /dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan/ /rgya cher ji ltar rigs pa ru/ /ji bzhin rdo rje grong khyer che/ /rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i grong khyer bri/ /'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /ka ba brgyad dang yang dag

ldan/ /de dbus rang bzhin 'khor lo yi/ /dbus su sangs rgyas dgod par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad ston pa che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs dkyil 'khor/ /
sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni/ /'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya/ /rdo rje me ltar 'bar nyid ni/ /phyag rgya 'jig rten gsum 'joms pa/ /g.yas su rin chen phyag rgya ni/ /'bar

ba'i dbus su dgod par bya/ /g.yon du pad ma'i phyag rgya bri/ /rgyab tu rdo rje rnon po ni/ /'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya/ /phyag rgya yi ni rgyal po bzhi/ /'bar ba'i me dang rab tu ldan/ /rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor

che/ /chos dbyings grong khyer chen po la/ /'khor los sgyur ba bzhi po yi/ /phyag rgya dag kyang dgod par bya/ /gang dang gang gi thig gyur pa/ /dkyil 'khor shes rab can thig gdab/ /rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/ /rdo rje'i

thig ni yongs su gzung / /oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra~M mA ti kra ma hU~M/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsdus pa yi/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bsdus pa/ /rgyal po bri zhing dgod par bya/ /oM badzra be

gA kra ma hU~M/ tshon rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan/ /'bar ba'i lta bas thams cad blta/ /rdo rje tshon rtsi bkye bya zhing / /rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /oM badzra tsita tra sa ma ya hU~M/ phyag rgya gang zhig dgod par du/ /snying po thams cad

dgod par bya/ /sngar ni dgod pa gang yin pa/ /rdo rje gzugs ni skor byed pa/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /rdo rje rigs pa mchog rgyal po/ /mi bskyod shin du mnyam bzhag pa/ /zhal bzhi pa

la phyag brgyad pa/ /mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs/ /khro bo'i rgyal po 'bar bas khyab/ /phyag na phyag rgya dang bcas mtshon/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgya ni/ /steng du phyag gnyis yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin kho nar phyag gnyis dag /

lcags kyu 'phyar ba yang dag ldan/ /phyag gcig gis ni zhags pa bsnams/ /gcig gis rdo rje yang dag bsnams/ /mda' 'gengs pa yi phyag rgya dang / /phyag gnyis dag ni shin du ldan/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgya ste/ /dbang

phyug chen po kun du mnan/ /g.yas pas lha mo dbu ma yi/ /nu ma'i bar du gnon par byed/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje khro bo dgod par bya/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar/ /khro bo 'jigs par byed pa

mchog /mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje chags pa ste/ /rgyab tu rdo rje legs pa'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /lho ru khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /khro bo'i rgyal po khro gnyer can/ /khro bos

yongs su bskor bar bri/ /thams cad 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/ /gdong ni khro bcas bzhad ldan pa/ /rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rgyar ldan/ /khro gnyer can ni yongs su brjod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che/ /

sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su bsdu/ /rang gi gnas su yang dag bri/ /mdun du rdo rje rin chen te/ /g.yas su khro bo gzi brjid do/ /g.yon du rgyal mtshan drag po ste/ /rgyab tu khro bo bzhad pa'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /

nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor ni/ /khro bo chen po rdo rje ste/ /khro bdag chen po rnams kyis bskor/ /rdo rje chos ni mdun du ste/ /rdo rje rnon po g.yas su'o/ /de bzhin g.yon du rdo rje rgyu/ /rgyab tu rdo rje smra ba'o/ /rdo rje shugs

kyis song nas kyang / /dkyil 'khor dag ni mchog bzhi pa/ /rdo rje dbab pa las chen po/ /khro bo chen pos yongs su bskor/ /rdo rje las ni mdun du ste/ /g.yas su rdo rje bsrung ba'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ /rgyab tu rdo rje

khu tshur ro/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo'i mtshams bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /mtshams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje me tog la sogs

bri/ /rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du/ /ji skad sngar bshad cho ga bzhin/ /sgo bzhi dag ni thams cad du/ /sgo srungs rnams ni dgod par bya/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu dbab pa bla na med/ /rang gi phyag rgya

snying gar bzhag /rang rang gi ni snying po yis/ /rdo rje dril bu yid 'ong ldan/ /rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dgod/ /bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo ni/ /gtso bo rdo rje rig pa mchog /rdo rje rgyal po mchog byin brlab/ /rang nyid rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog /

de yis dkyil 'khor de bris nas/ /rdo rje ti ri ti ri 'jug /yang dag par ni brtag byas la/ /lan bdun du ni bskor ba bya/ /chad pa gang yin yongs su dag /mkhas pas lhag par dbri bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu rtogs par bya/ /

grub par gyur te nyes pa med/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs kun/ /mnyam par bzhag pas las rnams bya/ /'khor lo'i dbus su zhugs nas ni/ /mkhas pas sgo ni dbye bar bya/ /yid kyis rdo rje ri mo ni/ /bteg cing

kun du phye nas kyang / /rdo rje sgo ni bzhi po dag /yid kyis dbye bar bya ba yin/ /de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra d+ha ra ud ga ta ya pra be sha ya sa ma ya hU~M/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams su/ /phyi yi rdo rje rigs dag

bri/ /khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams ni/ /kha khyer gyi ni phyed la gnas/ /'khor lo dang bcas rigs bcas te/ /sems can gdug pa gdon la sogs/ /rims dang 'byung po sha za dang / /mkha' 'gro 'byung po ma mo dang / /lha mo mtshon cha dang ldan kun/ /ji ltar mngon

par 'dod pa bri/ /phyi rol kha khyer gnas su ni/ /rdo rje kha khyer mdzes pa rnams/ /de nas sngon la slob dpon ches/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje skyil mo dkrung bcas te/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug bya/ /ji ltar rdo rje rigs byung ba/ /de bzhin

bdag nyid rnam par bsam/ /rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog /ces bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /skal ba chen po snyoms zhugs nas/ /ji skad gong du grags pa bzhin/ /

shes rab can gyis thams cad bsam/ /ji ltar rdo rje rigs 'byung ba/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni/ /rgya chen gsang ba chen po dang / /rdo rje slob dpon cho ga mchog /rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba/ /rtog pa 'di las rab tu bshad/ /de nas dbus su 'dug

byas nas/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bcings/ /khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu bcings/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya/ /

rdo rje me tog sogs mchod pas/ /'dren pa thams cad mchod par bya/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa gang bya ba/ /phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bcing / /phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ldan/ /de bzhin du ni mchod pa nyid/ /phyag rgya'i lan la sogs pa kun/ /cho ga rab

tu ldan pa 'bul/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol bya zhing / /gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdigs par bya/ /gdug pa'i sems ni gdul bya zhing / /nyon mongs mchog tu gsad par bya/ /dbab cing brjod pa nyid du bya/ /rdo rje mchod pas mchod par bya/ /glu dang

mchod pa yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya/ /rdo rje yi ni glu 'di dag /blang zhing mchog rnams mnyes par bya/ /btud cing dbul bar bya ba nyid/ /rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya/ /sha ta sha ta ma ta sa ta ti ri/ Ta ta Ta ta bri ti ha ta/ ma ta sha ta pra

ta ka ta/ ku Ta ta bi Ta bi Ta Ta Ta Ta/ ba Ta i ti ta Ta Ta Ta/ ka ra Ta ra Ta ra ra Ta/ rdo rje ti ri ti ri yi/ /phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur bya/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bka' mnos nas/ /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /sngon

po gos kyis stod g.yogs bya/ /sngon po yis ni mig dgab bya/ /rdo rje ti ri ti ri yi/ /phyag rgya rdo rje slob ma bcing / /oM gr-ih+na badzra sa ma ya hU~M ba~M/ ci rigs par ni gzhug bya zhing / /rdo rje'i sngags ni bskul bar bya/ /

rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/ /rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya pra be sha yA mi/ rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du/ /rgyas par ji ltar snga ma bzhin/ /ye shes dbab pa'i las dag ni/ /mkhas pa dag

gis bya nyid do/ /mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid/ /rdo rje can gyis sngar gsungs nyid/ /shes rab can gyis kun bslab cing / /bdag nyid dang bas rab tu bya/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgya yis/ /shes rab can gyis hU~M` bsgrub bya/ /lha

la sogs pa gdug pa kun/ /bkug cing de ru gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bslab bya zhing / /bdag nyid dam ni gzhan yang rung / /rdo rje phreng bas dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje mna' yi phyag rgya yis/ /sngon la mAm ni bsgag par

bya/ /rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ /rdo rje ye shes rab bsgrub bya/ /lag pas rdo rje mtshan ma bzung / /rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgrub bya/ /rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/ /rdo rje mtshan ma rab tu sbyin/ /oM badzra pA Ni karma kA rod b+hA ba/ de nas ming

gi dbang bskur zhing / /rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bya/ /oM badzra kro d+ha s+t+wa~M a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ /oM badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badzra nA ma/ ye shes 'byung ba phun sum

tshogs/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /shes rab mchog gis bslab bya zhing / /rdo rje rnal 'byor rab tu bsgrub/ /snying gar rdo rje bris nas ni/ /sna tshogs las rnams yang dag ldan/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar/

snying gar rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/ /rgyal po las rnams thams cad 'dzin/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/ /yang na khro bo'i nang nas gcig /bdag nyid yongs

su bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/ /'gro ba thams cad dbab par bya/ /hU~M satwa badzra kro d+ha A be sha aH/ khro bo rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje rin chen yang dag bris/ /bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen te/ /sangs rgyas

thams cad dbang du bya/ /rdo rje pad ma mgrin bcings nas/ /lkog ma'i phyogs su yang dag bri/ /bdag nyid rdo rje chos bsgoms nas/ /des nas nyon mongs thams cad 'joms/ /spyi bor rdo rje bri bya zhing / /rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin pa

dgod/ /bdag nyid rdo rje las bsgoms nas/ /gdug pa thams cad bsal bar bya/ /ho badzra rata na kro d+ha sha man+Ya tra/ hriHbadzra d+harma kro d+ha nA sha ya phaT/ hU~M karma badzra kro d+ha rak+Sha/ lha tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /phyag rgya

dang bcas dgug par bya/ /ye shes brlab cing de nas bzung / /de bzhin kho nar yang dag brlab/ /lag par rdo rje lcags kyu bris/ /sdigs mdzub yi ge hU~M ldan pa/ /khro bo yis ni sor mo bskyod/ /lha rnams 'gugs

par byed pa'i mchog /oM badzra kro d+ha A kar Sha ya hU~M phaT/ de bzhin 'og tu rkang mthil la/ /rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bri/ /de yis lha ni gang zhig mnan/ /de yi dgug pa'i mchog yin no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha a gra a~M ku sha

A kar Sha ya hU~M phaT/ dpung pa brkyang dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bris/ /lha ni gang dang gang la mnan/ /de dang de ni dgug pa'i mchog /oM badzra kro d+ha na A kar Sha ya hU~M phaT/ stan la rdo rje lcags

kyu ni/ /yang dag bris pas de mnan zhing / /lha ni gang zhig kun du mnan/ /de dang de ni dgug pa'i mchog /oM badzra kro d+ha ya sa na A gats+tsha ya A kar Sha ya mi te he badzra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M phaT/ phyag rgya dbab

par yang dag dbab/ /mkhas pas ye shes bslab par bya/ /rdo rje sbyor ba thams cad kyis/ /sgrub pa dag kyang yang dag brtsam/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas rnams su/ /bdag nyid khro bor bsgom par bya/ /myur du sangs rgyas

ye shes ni/ /ring por mi thogs yang dag dbab/ /oM badzra kro d+ha kA ya A be sha hU~M a/ rdo rje hU~M mdzad yang dag sbyor/ /khro bo bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag dgug /rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /oM badzra

bi d+yota ta ma ma hA kro d+ha A na ya ho b+ha ga ban badzra hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid khro bo bsgom bya zhing / /khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya/ /'khor ba'i btson ra 'jigs rung bar/ /sems can thams cad gsad par bya/ /oM driSh+Ta ma hA kro d+ha mA ra ya sarba

satwa hU~M/ rtag tu rang nyid go bgos par/ /yid kyis bdag nyid bsgom bya zhing / /gzhan dag kyang ni bsgom byas nas/ /'gro ba 'di kun bsrung bar 'gyur/ /oM badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba satwa hU~M phaT/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor che/ /rnam

pa bzhi ni bslab par bya/ /rdo rje ye shes de nyid che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes bsam/ /rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/ /sems can gang phyir kun du chags/ /yid kyis gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing / /yi ge hU~M ni rab tu brjod/ /
rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya yis/ /sems can gang la yongs su chags/ /de yi nyon mongs rnam par nyams/ /Taka ki a sa la pe/ a la pe ats+tsha Taka ki hU~M phaT/

'di ni lan gcig brjod pas kyang / /kun nas nyon mongs zhu zhing g.yo/ /Taka ki dza/ sems can gang gi rgyud la ni/ /rdo rje yi ni lta bas bltas/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor spyan chen pos/ /de yi sdug bsngal nyams par
gyur/ /Taka ki hU~M/ yi ge hU~M ni gyur pa las/ /nye ba'i sems can gang yin pa/ /de yi snying gar rdo rje yang / /shes rab can gyis yid kyis bsam/ /de nas 'jigs pa thams cad las/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i

phyag rgya yang / /rdo rje rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dang / /rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab par bya/ /Taka ki ho/ rdo rje rnal 'byor rmad byung che/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rdo rje gang / /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor ni/ /shes rab can gyis

mchog gsang brlab/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /yan lag kun la yongs su 'khyud/ /yi ge hU~M ni sbyor byed pa/ /sdug bsngal rnam par nyams par 'gyur/ /rdo rje khro bo rab drag 'dzin/ /rtag tu bdag

nyid bsgom par bya/ /de yi khro bo'i sku gang yin/ /gcig tu mchog tu gsang ba bdag /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'ang rung / /bdag nyid dang ni mtshungs pa ru/ /lus ni yang dag sbyor ba ni/ /dbang po snyoms 'jug

brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ /rdo rje khro bo'am sems dpa' gzhan/ /de'i lus gang yin pa dang / bdag gi lus gang yin pa mtshungs par shes pa nyid/ 'di ni dbang po gnyis snyoms
par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /yang na rnam par bsgom pa yis/ /ji skad bshad bzhin yan lag 'khyud/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /dpung pa dam por bsdam par bya/ /yan lag kun la yongs 'khyud

pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi bya/ /'di yis mtshungs par bsgoms pa yis/ /mtshungs pa nyid ni dbang po yin/ /ha~M tra~M hU~M gi sbyor ba'i so dag gis/ /mchu

bzung nas ni 'o bya zhing / /sems can gang zhig rnam bsgom pa/ /des ni bde ba don yod thob/ /hU~M dza/ sems can thams cad bde byed pa/ /yi ge hU~M de rab sbyor zhing / /bdag nyid khro bor rnam sbyangs nas/ /
de nas bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /hU~M/ gang gis hU~M ni rab sbyor zhing / /sems can dag ni gang dag gis/ /yan lag thams cad bsdus byas na/ /de yi nyon mongs bsrabs par 'gyur/ /hU~M phaT/
ye shes chen pos thabs ldan pa/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad nyid/ /de bzhin 'khor lo'i 'khor bcas pas/ /mkhas pa yis ni bslab par bya/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rtag tu bdag

ni bsgom par bya/ /rnam smin mchog rnams kun ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par bsgom/ /bsgom pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni/ /skad cig sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /a/ rdo rje'i rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /bdag nyid yongs su

bsgom par bya/ /hU~M/ rdo rje khro bo khro gnyer can/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /tra~M/ rdo rje sde ru rang bdag nyid/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/ /hrIH/ rdo rje dbab pa khro bo che/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom

par bya/ /a/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems la ni/ /rdo rje sems dpar rnam par bsgom/ /hU~M badzra satwa/ rdo rje rgyal po bdag bsgom bya/ /dza badzra rA dza/ rdo rje chags par bsam par bya/ /ra badzra rA ga /khro bo legs

pa bsgom par bya/ /sa badzra sA d+hu/ de nas rdo rje rin chen no/ /oM badzra rata na/ rdo rje gzi brjid de bzhin no/ /dz+wA la ya/ bdag nyid rdo rje rgyal mtshan bsgom/ /d+he he/ rdo rje bzhad pa rnam par bsgom/ /hA sa badzra hA sa/ rdo rje

chos ni bsgom par bya/ /sho d+ha ya/ rdo rje rnon po rnam par bsgom/ /ts+tshin da/ rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che/ /pra be sha ya/ rdo rje smra ba rnam par bsgom/ /b+hA Sha/ rdo rje las ni bsgom par bya/ /karma/ rdo rje go cha rnam par bsgom/ /

rak+Sha/ rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgom par bya/ /khA d+ha/ rdo rje khu tshur rnam par bsgom/ /ba~M/ gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid/ /rigs kyi lha ni ci 'dra bar/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /de ni 'di yis skad cig 'grub/ /

hU~M/ rdo rje phyag rgyas lan gcig bcing / /mkhas pas rdo rje bzlas pa brjod/ /ji skad bzlas pa'i rgyud du bshad/ /gzhan du khro bo gzung bar bya/ /yid kyis kyang ni brjod bya zhing / /lus kyi phyag rgyas

bskul bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor gsum ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /skad cig de la mkhas pas bsgrub/ /de nas nyams dga' rdo rje'i rigs/ /phyag rgya chen po grangs med pa/ /lus kyi phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /gang phyir sems

can snod min pa/ /de yi phyir na nyung bar gsungs/ /phyag rgya chen po yongs bsdu ba/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las/ /rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba/ /rgyud der rab tu bshad pa yin/ /gsang ba'i cho ga 'di

yis ni/ /rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis/ /skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub/ /'dir ni phan yon mang po dag /rang gi las la nges par sbyar/ /gang zhig btul zhing mngon

par sbyor/ /skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /zhugs nas mngon par brtson 'gyur zhing / /rnal 'byor cho ga sgrub byed na/ /'grub par 'gyur bar the tsom med/ /tshe 'di
la ni rnal 'byor pas/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob 'gyur/ /gang gis rdo rje can sbyor bas/ /gdon mi za bar sa thob 'gyur/ /bskal pa grangs med dka' ba ni/ /spyod pa'i bdag nyid med par min/ /rnal

'byor 'di la mngon par brtson/ /de bas sa ni rnyed dka' min/ /theg chen 'di ni gsang ba ste/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi tshul bstan pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub snying po che/ /de las sa ni thob dka' min/ /g.yon
brkyang cha lugs gnas nas ni/ /khro bo'i tshig ni rab tu brjod/ /khro bo'i lta bas yang dag khros/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdo sde'i dbang po
gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gsang ba de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo las khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa ste le'u gsum pa
rdzogs so// //rdo rje'i rigs las le'u dang po'o// // de nas gsang ba dag ni kun bsdus mchog /sems kyi dga' ba kun sbyor yang dag byung / /bya ba byas shing mchog tu rnam par mdzes/ /rdo rje

dbang phyug thams cad rnam 'phrul tshogs/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs chen mchog /rdo rje snying po'i thugs byung bde ldan pa/ /shin du gsang ba'i yon tan mchog bsdus pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po bud med gzugs can
gyur/ /e ma'o bud med dga' ba mchog spyod pa/ /gsang ba kun tu bsdus pa las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'/ /de yis gsungs nas cang mi gsung bzhugs so/ /gzungs
kyi dam tshig yang dag byung ba mchog /ting 'dzin gnas nas chos nyid gsang ba ni/ /spyi bo rkang mthil kun bsdus bstan pa las/ /de yi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs dag phyung / /hrIH/ de nas dga'

ba'i ming can dag kyang phyung / /rdo rje bud med thugs las byung ba mchog /gzugs khams mchog gi lha las shin du 'das/ /rdo rje'i mtshams rnams lha mo'i tshig dag grag /dga' bcas 'dzum pa dang ldan spyan

mnga' ba/ /bzhad cing sgeg dang bcas pa'i zhal ldan pa/ /tshangs sogs rigs kyi lha yi lha mo ste/ /yid 'ong dga' ba chen pos rgyal 'gyur ba/ /lha mo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma de yang / /'khor lo'i dbus su gnas

nas rtog byed pa/ /de yi rigs bsdus mdzes shing yid du 'ong / /rdo rje chen mo rdo rje rmongs byed ma/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA rA ga mo ha na ya hi/ snying po sangs rgyas rmongs par byed pas gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
mchog kyang rmongs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dga' ba rmongs byed dga'/ /sangs rgyas gzugs dag yongs su sgyur ba mchog /rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug mchog de ni/ /bud med gzugs kyi sprul

pa nyid du 'gyur/ /dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul mchog mnga' gang de ni/ /'khor gyi sring mo gang yin bzhi por gyur/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ye s+thi/ de nas gsang ba brtan pa'i tshogs zhi ba/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs skus kun khyab pa/ /rdo rje

gsang ba'i dbang phyug rmongs byed bdag /sangs rgyas btsun mo dag pa'i chos nyid bzhugs/ /sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur/ /'od zer sna tshogs phyogs bcu dag tu gsal/ /lha mo lha dang bcas pa'i lha mo rnams/ /zil

gyis mnan cing shin du rgyas par 'gyur/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs lha mo'i tshogs/ /de dag rang gi gzhal yas khang na gnas/ /de nas sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba yi/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug dam pa 'dren pa

ste/ /rdo rje dga' ba chen po rnam par dgod/ /gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug yi ge ni/ /snying po las byung chos nyid dag pa ste/ /rdo rje btsun mo bzhi dang dbu ma lnga/ /dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi shar phyogs cha la gnas/ /mi bskyod

pa yi dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog /de nas rdo rje'i rigs can las byung ba'i/ /shar gyi dkyil 'khor khro bcas dkyil 'khor bcas/ /mi bskyod dam pa'i dam tshig bdag nyid can/ /de yis snying po bskul ba gsungs

par gyur/ /snying po rab mchog 'byung ba gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ye dzi/ oM badzra ro Sha a~M ku sha A na ya sarba dzi/ oM badzra ro Sha karma badzri ba sha~M me A na ya di dzi/ oM badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ya sarba dzi/ rin chen

'byung ldan de ni bud med gzugs/ /rin chen mchog tu yid du 'ong ba des/ /'khor gyi snying po dag ni bzhi po gsungs/ /oM badzra b+h+r-i ku TI kro d+ha ha ra ha ra sarba gar+b+ha dzi/ oM badzra dz+wa la mA la pra be sha ma hA kro d+ha ag ni dz+wA la ya

sarba ra b+hi Sha dza dzi/ oM badzra d+h+wa dza a gra kre yu ri ma hA kro d+hi de hi sarba dzi/ oM badzra aT+TaT+Ta ha si ni hA sa ma yAT+TaT+Ta ha ra ha ra dzi/ yi ge dzi ni shin du brtan par gnas/ /snying po mchog tu shin du gyur pa gsungs/ /rin chen

dbang phyug dam pa de yis ni/ /snying po bskul bar byed pa'i mchog dag gsungs/ /snying po mchog gsungs rmad byung gsungs par gyur/ /'od dpag med de bud med gzugs gyur pa/ /rdo rje btsun mo dam pa 'byung ba'i mchog /

snying po bzhi po dag ni gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra shud d+hi ha na duSh+Ti d+hi/ oM tIk+Sh+Na kro d+ha ts+tshin da na sarba d+hi ri/ badzra he tu ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha ya sarba d+hi/ oM badzra dzi hwA ma hA kro d+ha b+hA Shi pa tsa ung ga ra ya d+hi/ /snying po rigs mchog brtan pa

gsungs par gyur/ /pad ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang dang ldan pa mchog /'od dpag med pa'i gsang mchog bstan pa ste/ /snying po bskul ba'i mchog ni gsungs par gyur/ /Ni/ dga' ba chen pos mtshan ma dag kyang phyung / /don

jom yod grub pa bud med gzugs gyur pas/ /las la shin du skul ba dang ldan te/ /'khor gyi sring mo dag ni bzhi po gsungs/ /oM sarba mu khe karma badzri ni ma hA kro d+ha ku ru sarba Ni/ oM badzra ka ba tsakra kro d+hi rak+Sha ma Ni/ oM badzra

kro d+he ma hA yak+Shi Ni badzre da~MSh+TA ka rA li bi lA sa sarba Ni/ oM badzra muSh+Ti badzra kro d+ha ni/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dag /mchog tu gsang ba bsdus pa dga' chen po/ /dbus kyi gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor

skul byed pa/ /las kyi btsun mo'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs/ /hU~M/ dbus kyi gsang ba sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba/ /gtso bo 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad gsungs/ /oM badzre shwa rI hU~M/ oM badzra rata ne shwa ri hU~M/ oM

pad ma shwa rI hU~M/ oM karme shwa rI hU~M/ rdo rje rgyal mo dang bcas bskul ba las byung gang yin pa/ /rdo rje btsun mo rnal 'byor bzhi yis dbus kyi dbang phyug nyid du gnas/ /rdo rje rin chen chos ldan btsun mo yan lag mdzes
pa dang ldan pa/ /'di ni gsang ba'i tshogs las gzhan du rnal 'byor mchog ni 'ga' yang med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'/ /de ni rang gi 'khor tshogs dbus na bzhugs/ /des ni

brtse dang phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gsungs gyur/ /de nas 'khor lo'i grong khyer bstan byas nas/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i bdag nyid des/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang

phyug btsun mo yi/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag bri/ /grong khyer rnam pa gnyis su yang dag bri/ /'khor lo rnam pa gnyis su sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin grong khyer 'di ru yang dag 'ong ba dang / /yang na

ji ltar 'dod bzhin yang dag bri/ /de yang phyag rgya dag gi tshogs dang bcas/ /bsgom par 'os pa rdo rje yang dag bri/ /yang na gsang ba'i chos kyis mchod gyur pa/ /da ni gzugs dang ldan pa yang dag bri/ /dbus kyi rim

par rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs/ /zhags pa dang ldan 'khor gyi phyag rgya bcas/ /rdo rje 'bar ba nor bu pad ma las/ /'bar ba'i dang bcas me dang ldan par gzhag /shar gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lnga yi bdag

nyid che/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gang du mi bskyod gtso/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya che dang rol par gyur/ /dbang phyug chen po rtse gsum ldan non mchog /de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag dang / /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' dang dga' ba dag /'bar

ba'i me yi 'od zer yang dag ldan/ /'bar ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i phyag rgya mnga'/ /de ni rin chen rigs na yid 'ong ba/ /rdo rje'i dbus na rdo rje rin chen bzhugs/ /de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag tu/ /rin chen gzi brjid

rgyal mtshan bzhad phyag rgya/ /de bzhin pad ma'i rigs ni yid 'ong la/ /rdo rje pad de pad ma'i phyag rgya ste/ /de nas phyogs bzhi'i mtshams dag tu/ /pad ma'i ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin smra/ /de bzhin las kyis byas pa'i

rigs de las/ /rdo rje rnon po me chen dang ldan pa/ /de yi phyogs bzhi'i mtshams ni brtan pa ru/ /las dang gnod sbyin bsrung ba khu tshur rnams/ /de las rgya cher gzugs kyi tshogs dag la/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i mchog

drag mkha' 'gro ma/ /'bar ba'i mche ba chen po 'jigs rung ma/ /dbus na rdo rje nyi ma 'bar ba ldan/ /sa dag bsrung ba'i cho gar bcas/ /rgya cher gzhung mchog rtag tu blta bar bya/ /sbyang dang dbab pa'i las rnams

thams cad ni/ /yan lag mchog ldan dam pa las gzung bya/ /de nas phyag rgya'i phyag rgya'i yan lag bslab/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgyas mchod pa'i phyag rgyar brjod/ /de nas sgo dang mtshams bcas dkyil 'khor du/ /btsun mo dag bos

gnam lcags gnod sbyin mchog /de nas sgor 'jug pa yi tshogs la ni/ /badzra dzaHdzaH/ dgug pa'i pheg rdob sprin ni rgya che ba/ /badzra hU~M hU~M/ de bzhin 'ching ba'i chos ni ster byed pa/ /badzra ba~M ba~M/ de nas ye shes chos nyid sna tshogs

pa/ /badzra aHaH/ de nas gsang ba'i sgegs pa dang bcas mchod/ /badzra hU~M kha~M/ de nas yan lag phreng ba sna tshogs ldan/ /badzra hU~M g+hu~M/ de nas glu blang ba dang rol mo dag /badzra hU~M ta~M/ de bzhin gzhan dag dkyil 'khor dbang

phyug mchog /badzra hU~M ste/ de nas phyi rol me tog rgya chen po/ /badzra ti te/ de bzhin rol cha stong phrag dag brdungs pa/ /badzra Ta~M ta/ spos dang dri ldan rol mo dag bri ba/ /badzra d+hA tu/ de nas 'od zer snang ba rab tu spro/ /badzra To d+ha/ de nas

rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs kyis dgug par bya/ /dga' bas mnyes bya rdo rje yang dag ldan/ /oM sid d+hi ya badzra/ A na ya badzra/ de nas chags pa'i sa ni 'dod chags pa/ /rA ga ya badzra a hi badzra/ de bzhin nyi ma

la lta ba/ /dz+wA la ya badzra/ rgyal mtshan gyi ni de hi badzra/ bzhad pa yi ni hA sa badzra/ de bzhin rjes su chags pa ni kA ma ya badzra/ ral gri gzung bar bya ba ni/ /ts+tshe da ya badzra/ gzhan yang bskor ba yi ni/ b+ha ma ya badzra/ de nas tshig

gi tshogs dbyung ba bru hi badzra/ las kyi mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i tshogs ni t+yi badzra/ de nas cho ga'i cha'i ni rak+Sha badzra/ de bzhin du bza' ba'i ni khA hi badzra/ yid 'ong lus ni brtan par bcing bar bya/ /ban d+ha

ya badzra/ de nas ye shes kyi ni de bzhin brkyang / /de nas khros pa'i yid kyis bskul bar bya/ /so dag gis ni ma mchu bsdam par bya/ /de bzhin mig dag kyang ni btsum par bya/ /de nas khro bo'i ting 'dzin rab tu bsgom/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bdud bzhi bcom/ /de nas rdo rje'i

tshig gi snying po brjod/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs ni rnam pa sna tshogs bslab/ /lus kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs dag ni/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin du/ /rgyas pa ru ni yongs su brjod/ /gsang ba mchog rdzogs so// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /

kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ni/ /rdo rje phra mo la bzhugs nas/ /rdo rje phra mo brjod par gyur/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs su ni/ /phan pa'i don du rnam bsam bya/ /rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni/ /sems ni zhi ba nyid du gyur/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma

badzra kro d+ha kra ma hU~M/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni/ /rang sems skad cig gis 'dul 'gyur/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra rata na badzra kro d+ha kra ma ka hU~M phaT/ rdo rje rin chen rang bdag nyid/ /mkhas pa yis ni

bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos ni myur thob cing / /rin chen kun mchog gtso bor 'gyur/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra d+harma kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid dag ni rdo rje chos/ /gzod nas dag pa rnam par bsgom/ /gsung gi phyag rgya 'di

yis ni/ /rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra karma kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid rdo rje las su ni/ /yang dang yang du bsgom bya zhing / /rdo rje sngags kyis bskul nas ni/ /rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /

dbang bskur ba yi sems dpa' che/ /'khor los sgyur ba bzhi po ru/ /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom byas na/ /dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur/ /hU~M oM s+'uk+Sh+ma dz+nyA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje rgyal po rang bdag nyid/ /rnam par bsgoms

na rengs par 'gyur/ /snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kun du dgug /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra a~M ku sha A kar Sha ya ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ mda' 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje chags pa bsgom par

bya/ /snying po 'di dag nyid kyi ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rjes chags pa/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha a nu rA ga ya hU~M phaT/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas shing / /bdag nyid kyang ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje dga' ba bdag nyid de/ /rdo rje

dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra duSh+ni kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje rin chen rgyal po nga / /dbang bskur ba ni brtan pa'i mchog /rdo rje sngags kyis bskul byas nas/ /rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra b+h+r-i ku TI kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/

rdo rje gzi brjid ting 'dzin gyis/ /rtag tu bdag nyid 'bar bar bya/ /phyogs rnams kun du yongs spros nas/ /rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma dz+wA la maN Da la kro d+ha sUr+ya dz+wa la hU~M phaT/ sbyin pa rin chen rgyal mtshan du/ /rtag tu bdag

nyid rnam par bsam/ /sems can thams cad dag bya zhing / /rdo rje sngags ni rab bskul zhing / /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra d+h+wa dza kro d+ha ya sho d+ha sarba AHhU~M me pra yats+tsha hU~M phaT/ chos chen po yi bzhad pa bzhad/ /rdo rje bzhad pa bdag brtan pa'i/ /rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing / /

bdag nyid kho na chos kyi gsung / /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra ha sa kro d+ha ha ha hU~M phaT ha ha/ gzod nas zhi ba skye ba med/ /chos rnams thams cad rnam dag pa/ /bdag nyid rdo rje chos rgyal po/ /rdo rje tshig gis lan gcig brjod/ /oM

s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha ya sho d+ha hU~M phaT/ shugs can ral gri dag gi tshogs/ /rdo rje rnon po shin du brtan/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra ts+tshe da kro d+ha ts+tshin d+ha ts+tshin d+ha hU~M phaT/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byas nas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo dang mtshungs 'gyur/ /oM

s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha ma hA~M tsakra ts+tshin da pa hA i shwa ri/ pra be sha hr-i da ya~M ts+tshin da hU~M phaT/ da ni rjod byed brjod bya min/ /bdag ni rdo rje smra ba brtan/ /chos 'dod pa nyid brtan byas nas/ /rdo rje smra ba thob par 'gyur/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra hU~M kA ra krod+ha

ha ra pa tsa ya wa mu dre Na hU~M phaT/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing / /rdo rje las ni brtan par brtag /rdo rje tshig gis chos bshad na/ /rdo rje las ni thob par 'gyur/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra karma sarba kAr+ya hr-i da ya hU~M/

bdag ni rgyal po byams pa che/ /rdo rje bsrung ba bstan pa'i bdag /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom byas nas/ /ngan 'gro thams cad nyams par 'gyur/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ sdig pa thams cad

bza' bya zhing / /rdo rje bsrung ba bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sngags ni bskul byas na/ /rdo rje nyon mongs thams cad 'joms/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra yak+Sha ha ra b+hak+Sha sarba duSh+Ta badzra yak+Sha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje khu tshur rgyal po bdag /byang chub sems

ni rjes su dran/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bcing byas na/ /rdo rje khu tshur dang mtshungs 'gyur/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra muSh+Ti ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ sna yi rtse mo'i sems de ni/ /brtan par byas nas yang dag brtsam/ /yi ge

hU~M nyid sbyor byas nas/ /nyon mongs thams cad rnam nyams 'gyur/ /hU~M/ dang po snying ga sna rtse ru/ /brtan par byas nas de rang bzhin/ /mtshan ma de ni spro byas na/ /nad sogs dgra ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /nA sha ya badzrI hU~M/

sems de brtan par byas nas kyang / /rnal 'byor 'dzin pas spro bya zhing / /shes rab can gyis khro bdag brtsam/ /gnas ngan dag ni nges par 'jig /bi nA sha ya sarba badzra hU~M/ rnal 'byor rig pas ji srid 'dod/ /mtshan

ma de ni bsdu byas na/ /ma lus sdig pa thams cad ni/ /nyams shing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /oM s+'uk+Sh+ma badzra pra t+ya shI g+h+ra~M hU~M/ gsal bar phyogs rnams ma lus par/ /sems can kun la byams pa spro/ /ji srid rdo rje spro

byas pa/ /de srid sems can bde bar 'gyur/ /b+he ra badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ kye ma'o mgon med sems can 'di/ /'jigs pa las ni skyob pa dag /snying rje'i sems de spro bar bya/ /rdo rje ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /kA ru NA badzra

kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun snying po/ /sems can thams cad gzod nas dag /e ma'o bde ba e ma'o chos/ /phyogs rnams kun du yongs su spro/ /hU~M kA ra bi shud d+ha hU~M phaT/ /'khor ba'i sems can la

dmigs nas/ /bde ba dang bcas btang snyoms bya/ /btang snyoms sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sems can rnams la yongs su spro/ /oM bi sho d+ha ya badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje'i gzugs ni yang dag bris/ /gang gi steng du nges

bzhag pa/ /de nyid kyis ni dri ma'i tshogs/ /thams cad rnal 'byor pa yis 'joms/ /hU~M badzra pra brta/ gang la byang chub sems nyid ni/ /rjes su dran pas rab phab na/ /sems can de yis sangs rgyas kyi/ /byang chub nyid ni thob par

'gyur/ /hU~M bo d+hi satwa pra brta/ phyag na rdo rjes dran nas/ /dag pa'i chos nyid phab byas nas/ /sems can de yis bde ba ni/ /dam pa'i thob 'gyur the tshom med/ /hU~M badzra d+hA ra pra brta/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs

ni rnam par bsgom/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams pham byas na/ /'jigs pa nges par 'byung mi 'gyur/ /hU~M bud d+ha pra brta/ zla ba rdo rje rang bzhin dngos/ /bskyed pa bzhin du bsgom byas na/ /blo bzang zla ba rdo rje mtshungs/ /myur du mkha' la

'gro bar 'gyur/ /bud d+ha pra brta ya hU~M/ zla ba'i dbus su rang bdag nyid/ /bsgom zhing gang la phab byas pa/ /sems can de rnams mi ldog par/ /'gyur ba ru ni the tshom med/ /satwa pra brta ya hU~M/ phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom

bya zhing / /gang du phab pa'i gnas de ni/ /dpal dang bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur/ /myur ba nyid du the tshom med/ /badzra satwa pra brta ya hU~M/ sangs rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom bya zhing / /rdo rje de ni gar phab pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rgya

ni chen por gyur/ /bud d+ha pra brta ya hU~M/ rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/ /rang gi lus ni rab bskor ba/ /gang gi ming gis byas pa de/ /the tshom med par byang chub thob/ /oM badzra ba li ta kro d+ha mA ra ya hU~M/ dbugs ni dbyung dang rngub pa la/ /yi ge hU~M ni rab sbyor zhing / /rdo rje

khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/ /'dod chags la sogs nyes pa gzhom/ /oM badzra shwA sa bi bA ta la hU~M phaT/ rdo rje lta bas blta bya zhing / /rdo rje khro bo rab sbyor bas/ /sems can gang la blta byas na/ /de ni 'khor ba las grol 'gyur/ /oM badzra dr-iSh+Ti bi nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ lus ngag

gi ni bdag nyid gnas/ /rang sems 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / /byang chub sems ni rjes dran na/ /des kyang sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /hU~M hr-i da ya A kar Sha ya badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal por/ /mkhas pa yis ni bdag nyid bsgom/ /'bar ba yis ni khyab pa'i sku/ /

rdo rje bsgom pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /hU~M gsang ba'i bdag po kun gyi snying po'i sngags ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang bas rnal 'byor dbang po rtog par mdzad/ /gdul bya min la shin du 'phrog cing gdul bya la chags blo/ /sa 'dzin mchog gi dbang po bslab pa rnam

par rol pa'i/ s+'uk+Sh+ma rdzogs so// // gsang ba skar ma nyi zla ste/ /rdo rje dam tshig brjod par bya/ /rnam rtog gis brtags mdzes gyur pa/ /de nas mchod pa'i cho ga bshad/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs dang ni/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rab tu bsgom/ /dang po sbyor byung ji

skad bshad/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karme shwa ri hU~M/ /rang gi snying khar byang chub sems/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs bsams nas/ /mchod pa yi ni mchog 'di yis/ /'dren pa thams cad mchod pa bya/ /hU~M/ dbang phyug chen po dang

bcas pa/ /lha rnams thams cad dgug bya zhing / /bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo yis/ /khro bo'i mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma sa ma ya bi sti bi stA ra trai lokya bi dza ye shwa sarba duSh+TA na ma hA sa ma ya badzrI hU~M/ khro gnyer can kun nga bdag nyid/ /khro

bo rin chen gyis bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs bya zhing / /rin chen mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka pA sha sa ma ya/ s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dzA A kar Sha ya rbad+ha bistA ra sa ma ya hU~M/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par snang / /rdo rje

chos ni brtan pa bdag /chos kyi mchod pas rab mchod pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dzA bi d+hi bi stA ra sa ma ya hU~M/ bdag nyid rdo rje las nyid nas/ /sangs rgyas

thams cad mchod bya zhing / /las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta lo ka d+hA tu dzi bi ta ma hA karma pU dzA bi d+hi bi stA ra sa ma ye hU~M/ phyag na rdo rje bdag rdo rje/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams

dgug par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod pas/ /mchod pa ru ni bsgom par bya/ /oM badzra satwa sid d+hi dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M dzaH/ rdo rje lcags kyu brtan pa'i mchog /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /bsgom pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ /sangs

rgyas thams cad dgug par bya/ /oM badzra A kar Sha dz+nyA na sa ma ya hU~M dza/ rdo rje chags pa bdag nyid de/ /bkug pa rnams ni mnyes par bya/ /rdo rje chags pas rab mchod pas/ /bsgrub par bya zhes yang dag sbyar/ /oM badzra ra ti rA ga sa ma ye hU~M dza/

rdo rje legs pa rang bdag nyid/ /bsgom zhing rgyal ba mnyes par bya/ /rdo rje legs pas rab mchod pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya/ /oM badzra sA d+hu karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M dza/ rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom

par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing / /rin chen char ni kun du dbab/ /oM badzra b+h+r-i ku TI ba shI ku ru hU~M/ rdo rje nyi mar rang bdag nyid/ /'od zer phreng ba dang ldan bsgom/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang bya zhing / /phyogs rnams su ni 'od

zer spro/ /oM badzra sUr+ya maN Da la ba shI~M ku ru hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing / /bdag ni pad ma'i rgyal po nyid/ /sems can bsam kun rdzogs par bya/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan rab tu mchod/ /oM badzra d+h+wa dzA gra ke yU re ba shI~M ku ru hU~M/ ha ha

zhes dgod bzhad bya zhing / /rdo rje bzhad pa bdag nyid de/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya/ /bzhad pa'i mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /oM badzra aT+Ta hA sa na ba shI~M ku ru hU~M/ bdag ni pad ma'i rgyal po nyid/ /btsun mo brtan par rang byung ba/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas

rjes chags bya/ /'dod la chags pas rab tu mchod/ /oM badzra pad ma rA ga ya hU~M/ bdag ni rang nyid rnon po ste/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa brtan/ /bdag gis nyon mongs gcad bya zhing / /de bzhin gshegs rnams chags par bya/ /oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na rA ga ye hU~M/ lha mo

rdo rje sgrol ma bdag /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ /bdag gis rdo rje can mnyes bya/ /'dod chags brtan pas rab tu mchod/ /oM badzra maN Da la rA ga rA ga ya hU~M/ nam mkha'i lha mo chos smra ba/ /brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid bstan/ /dag pa'i chos la dga' bya

zhing / /de bzhin gshegs rnams mnyes par bya/ /oM badzra bA ka rA ga rA ga ya hU~M/ bdag ni rang nyid las yin te/ /phyogs rnams kun du rab tu grags/ /bdag ni nam mkha'i mdzod kyang yin/ /mchod pa'i char gyis rab tu mchod/ /oM badzra karma sa ma ye pU dzA hU~M/ bdag ni rang

nyid bsrung ba ste/ /sangs rgyas byams pa brtan pa dag /bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par bya/ /chos kyi mchod pas kun du mchod/ /oM badzra ka ba tsa ban d+ha rak+Sha hU~M/ bdag gis nyon mongs bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin brtan pa bdag /bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par bya/ /

chos kyi mchod pa rab tu mchod/ /oM badzra yak+Sha mA ra ya badzra da~MSh+TA hU~M phaT/ nga ni sangs rgyas byang chub yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur rang bdag nyid/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /oM badzra karma muSh+Ti sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya hU~M phaT/ 'di 'dra'i sna tshogs mchod

pa kun/ /ye shes gsang sngags rab thob byed/ /ma lus lha mo sems dpa' kun/ /rgyal po ji bzhin rab snying hU~M/ sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ /gar ma me tog sogs sbyor bas/ /sems dpa' la sogs lha mo dag /shin du bsrung ba'i mchod pa'i mchod pa'o/ /

de nas las ni thabs chen po/ /gang gis myur du rab grub 'gyur/ /gang gis dga' ba la sbyor ba/ /sbyin sregs las kyi cho ga'o/ /ji ltar sbyin sreg dngos grub kyis/ /las ni bla med byed pa ltar/ /de bzhin rig pa'i las rnams kun/ /de lta bu ni byed pa

min/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa mang ldan pa/ /mdo ru bsdu na rnam pa lnga/ /rgyas par rnal 'byor chen po yi/ /gsang ba'i mdo las rab tu bshad/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnam 'phrul ba/ /ji ltar sbyin sreg rnam pa yis/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur

ba/ /mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya/ /sbyin sreg las ni rnam pa lnga/ /re re zhing yang rnam pa mang / /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa nyid/ /mngon spyod kyi ni gsum pa ste/ /dgug pa yang ni bzhi pa yin/ /lnga pa dbang dang yang dag ldan/ /sbyin sreg lnga pa de rnams

ni/ /dbang du byed pa mchog yin no/ /de nas thab khung rab bshad bya/ /sbyor ba ji bzhin sbyor bar bya/ /zhi la thab khung zlum po ste/ /kun ni yongasu zlum po yin/ /rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi ste/ /mngon spyod la ni gru gsum yin/ /thab khung rdo rje'i rnam pa can/ /

kun du dgug par byed pa'i mchog /de bzhin thab khung ring por bya/ /dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /thab khung las ni bla na med/ /srod kyi dus su zhi ba bya/ /snga dro'i dus su rgyas pa'i las/ /nyi ma phyed na mngon spyod kyi/ /drag po'i

las ni nges par bya/ /dgug pa dus rnams thams cad du/ /mtshan mo dbang du bya ba yin/ /sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas las rnams bya/ /shar du kha bltas zhi don du/ /rgyas pa byang du yang dag gnas/ /lho ru kha bltas gyur pa yis/ /

mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams so/ /steng du kha bltas de bzhin dgug /phyogs rnams kun du dbang du bya/ /phyogs mtshams thams cad mnyam sbyor bsam/ /yang na nub kyi phyogs su bshad/ /zhi la sangs rgyas phyag rgya ste/ /rgyas la nor bu'i mtshan mas

so/ /rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la/ /dbang la pad ma'i rigs kyis so/ /shin du dgug pa dang ldan pa/ /rdo rje lcags kyus dgug pa la/ /sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bsgrub/ /zhi ba'i shing ni mngar ba ste/ /rgyas pa de bzhin 'bras bur

bcas/ /tsha ba mngon spyod las dag la/ /dgug pa la ni tsher ma can/ /dbang la me tog bcas par bshad/ /de rnams yam shing go rims bzhin/ /sngon la yam shing rnam pa lnga/ /rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag sbyar/ /de la 'dam gyis byugs

pa yi/ /shing la shi ba rab tu bsgrags/ /gang du sdig pa rnam 'jig cing / /kun du 'khrug par sregs 'gyur ba/ /bud shing mngar ba dag gi me/ /mnyam par gzhag pas rab sbar nas/ /til mar gyis ni sbyin sreg byas/ /sdig pa thams cad

sregs par 'gyur/ /oM sarba pA pa~M da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ bud shing mngar ba dag gis ni/ /shin du mnyam par bzhag pas sbar/ /'bras kyi sbyin sreg byas nas ni/ /bsod nams tshogs ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/

bud shing mngar po dag gis ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas me sbar nas/ /mar smyugs dur ba'i sbyin sreg gis/ /rdo rje tshe ni mngon 'phel 'gyur/ /oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /dge ba 'byung bas me sbar nas/ /ku sha'i myu

gu'i til mar gyis/ /'jig rten gsum yang srung bar 'gyur/ /oM a pra ti ha ta badzrA ya swA hA/ sngon la zhi ba sbyar bar bya/ /dbus kyi gnyis la rgyas de bzhin/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa yi/ /sbyin sreg las ni dang por 'gyur/ /shing ni tsha ba'i yam shing gis/ /

mngon spyod kyi ni las dag la/ /mngon spyod dang ni bcas pa yi/ /dgug pa la yang de nyid kyi/ /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sngon la tsha ba'i yam shing gis/ /khros pas me ni rab sbar nas/ /mkhas pas tsher mas sbyin sreg bya/ /tsher ma dang bcas shing

dag kyang / /tsher ma can gyis nges par dgug /gang dang gang ni 'dod gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par 'gugs/ /oM badzra A kar Sha ya dzaH/ bud shing me tog dmar sogs kyis/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i me sbar nas/ /me tog 'bras bu dmar po yang / /

sbyin sreg byas na dbang byed mchog /hU~M badzra pA shA ya dza/ tsha ba'i yam shing dag bya zhing / /rab tu drag pa'i me sbar nas/ /'bras bu kha ba bsreg byas na/ /mngon spyod kyi ni mchog yin no/ /hU~M badzra mA ra ya phaT/ gsang ba'i sbyin sreg thams cad ni/ /

de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /sbyin sreg 'khor lo cho ga yis/ /de nyid tu ni ji bzhin sbyar/ /yam shing tsha ba dag gis ni/ /shin du drag pas me sbar nas/ /'jigs rung lcags kyus sbyin sreg bya/ /gdug pa thams cad rab 'jigs 'gyur/ /

oM badzra ban d+hA ya phaT/ me tog dang bcas shing me la/ /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sngags sogs 'bras bu'i sbyin sreg ni/ /dbang du byed pa mchog yin no/ /oM badzra ba sha~M ka rA ya swA hA/ kha ba dang ni mngar ba nyid/ /yam shing mngar po sbyar

bya zhing / /'dod pa'i me tog 'bras sregs na/ /'dod pa'i gzugs can mchog tu 'gyur/ /oM badzra karma rU pa Ne swA hA/ de nas bud shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /rab tu khros pas me sbar nas/ /smyug ma'i 'bras bu phra mo sregs/ /myur du mi snang

nyid du 'gyur/ /oM badzra a tri Sha ya swA hA/ shes rab bud shing de nyid kyis/ /drag po'i me ni rab sbyar nas/ /nam mkha' stobs kyi me tog dang / /sregs na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /oM badzra khe tsa re na swA hA/ de nas mngag gzhug pa dang g.yog /

bka' bzhin byed pa rab tu bskul/ /ci nas kyang ni myur 'grub pa'i/ /go rim bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /shing ni kha bos bud shing bya/ /thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs su brko/ /khros pas rdo rje me tog sreg /yi ge dza ni yongs su brjod/ /sngags kyi

sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /rdo rje me tog dag sregs na/ /bka' byed mchog ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /oM badzra A dz+nyA ka rA ya dza/ yam shing de dag nyid dang ni/ /thab khung de nyid brko bya zhing / /byang chub sems dpa'i sman ma gang / /

sregs na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /oM badzra sau ri ba sha~M ka rA ya dza/ bud shing de dag nyid kyis me/ /kun du thab khung de kho na/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sman ma ni/ /sregs nas bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /hU~M badzra pA Ni ba sha~M ka rA ya dza/ yang na sangs

rgyas sman ma 'am/ /yang na bdag dang mtshan ma dag /sgrub pa'i sbyor bas sbyin sreg bya/ /sangs rgyas bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /oM bud d+ha sha~M ka rA ya dza/ tshig gi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sbyin sreg bya zhing myur du 'grub/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas dngos

grub kun/ /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje rigs la sogs kun kyang / /de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rab sgrub phyir/ /rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya/ /rig pa gang zhig yid 'ong ba/ /sring mo'i rigs ni thob bya'i phyir/ /

rig pa'i lha mo dang ldan par/ /shin du rnal 'byor bsgrub par bya/ /bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/ /mkhas pas 'dug pa bsten par bya/ /mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las/ /de nyid tu ni ji skad bshad/ /kun du gur gum phye ma dang / /b+ha gar mig sman

bcug nas ni/ /de yi sems dpa' shes par bya/ /gang phyir dgongs pa rab tu bsgrags/ /sdug pa de yi rig pa ni/ /mngon par 'dod pa gang yid 'ong / /rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang / /de ni bud med ces byar grags/ /rig pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni/ /

rang gi rigs kyi lha dag sgrub/ /mig sman la sogs gzhug pa ni/ /pad ma'i steng du yang dag dgod/ /b+ha ga pad ma zhes bshad he/ /gzhug pa dgod par bshad par bya/ /b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /mig sman dag ni bsgrub par bya/ /

b+ha ga mig sman gzhug pa ni/ /pad ma'i steng du yang dag dgod/ /pad ma dang ni lhan cig dgod/ /rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM gu h+ya ra ti badzra ba sha~M ka rI sid d+ha hU~M/ dro dang du ba 'bar dang rdul/ /rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /

oM gu h+ya badzra sid d+ha hU~M/ b+ha gar gi wang bzhag nas ni/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya gzhag par bya/ /mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi dag gis/ /dngos grub rnam pa bzhi ru bshad/ /oM gu h+ya badzri sid d+hi hU~M/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya yis/ /b+ha gar

gur gum bcug nas ni/ /dgab cing de ni 'bar gyur na/ /rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM badzra d+ha ra gu h+ya sid d+ha hU~M/ rdo rje bya ba'i sbyor ba dang / /rdo rje phyag rgya bsdus pa dang / /rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug dang / /rdo rje khu tshur sbyor

ba dang / /dam tshig mchog ni 'di dag dang / /hU~M gi sor mo'i sbyor ba dang / /chos kyi phyag rgya de bzhin 'dir/ /oM la sogs pa'i yi ge dang / /sbyin sreg cho ga 'di yis ni/ /ye shes phyag rgya rab bsgrub bya/ /rgyas pa ru ni thams cad

dag /gsang ba'i rgyud du rab tu bshad/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas ni/ /mchog nyid bsgrub par 'gyur ba yin/ /rdo rje rigs chen yid 'ong ba/ /rgyud chen kun las

btus pa la/ /gang zhig mngon par brtson 'gyur ba/ /don yod pa yi dngos grub 'gyur/ /tshogs ni bsags pa med pa dang / /sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru/ /gsang ba'i snying po chen po 'di/ /thos pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro/ /
gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// // de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi/ /dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bslab par bya/ /ye shes de nyid gsang ba yang / /

yongs su bsgrubs par rab tu bskor/ /shin du gsang ba chen po ni/ /dngos po thams cad khyab la dgod/ /'di ni rdo rje drag po bzhi/ /rang nyid lnga pa dang bcas pa/ /gsang ba brjod du med pa mchog /ye shes mchog gi tshul thob

byed/ /bde ba chen po rab grub don/ /dga' ba chen po shin du brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ye hU~M`/ hU~M` badzra ma Ta/ oM badzra pra ti b+h+ri ku TI badzra ra ta/ oM badzra pad ma badzra ti ta/ oM badzra karma a tri kro d+ha/ shar dang lho yi phyogs cha dang / /nub dang

byang gi phyogs cha dang / /dbus dang phyogs bzhi dag dang ni/ /sbyor bas phyag rgya dgod par bya/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /thams cad bri zhing dgod par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ji skad bshad pa'i

rnal 'byor bzhin/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rjes sbyor skyes/ /rnal 'byor dag ni lhag ma dag /de dag thams cad brtan par bya/ /shin du gsang ba de nyid che/ /mchog tu gsang ba de nyid mchog /gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dzin/ /rdo rje

gsang ba brtan pa che/ /rig pa mngon par 'dod 'gyur ba/ /rang gi lag gis yang dag bri/ /rgyal mo chen mo brjod byas na/ /dkyil 'khor du ni skad cig 'grub/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi shud d+ha d+harma ho/ rang gis dkyil 'khor che bris nas/ /rig

pa brjod pa la brtson bya/ /byams pas dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khor ba snying rje spyad par bya/ /oM bi shud d+ha d+heSh+T-i dza/ rang gis gsang sngags bris nas ni/ /bu mo'i mchu la 'o byas te/ /'jig rten dbang phyug btsun mo che/ /shes rab pha rol

phyin lha mo/ /oM swa b+hA ba bi shud d+haHmu khe hU~M/ pha rol phyin drug spyod pa yis/ /byang chub spyod pa rab brnyed dka'/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor brtan gyur na/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug bya zhing / /'dod

pa'i yon tan mchog lnga yis/ /rol cing dga' ba nyid du bya/ /mdo sde gsang dbang las bshad pa/ /gsang ba lnga ni rab sgrub pa/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru bshad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga

ru brjod/ /'dod pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /skal ba can gyis dngos grub thob/ /gsang ba de nyid chen po ste/ /rigs lnga dag ni rab bsgrub pa/ /'dod chags chen po rab bsgrub phyir/ /rol cing rab tu dga' bar bya/ /bde ba chen

po grub don du/ /spyod pa chen po tshul chen po/ /de nyid rnal 'byor kun bsdus pa/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad rnal 'byor gyis/ /rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya/ /ji ltar yi ge hU~M las byung / /gsang ba rgyal po chen po byed/ /

rdo rje hU~M mdzad sbyor ba yis/ /rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya/ /de ltar min na phyag rgya che/ /dam tshig zhes bya gtan mi 'grub/ /phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus nas/ /rdo rje phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /de nas grub pa'i phyag rgya che/ /grub pa'i yi ge yang dag

gis/ /myur du rab tu 'grub 'gyur ba/ /rmad byung chen po rab bshad bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ye hU~M/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhugs/ /phyag rgya chen po yongs su gzung / /rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing / /sangs

rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub/ /hU~M badzra ma Ta/ rdo rje'i rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom bya zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byas na/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /oM b+h+r-i ku TI ba ra tha/ rang bdag

nyid ni dbang bskur ba/ /rin chen phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /rin chen char ni rab pa nas/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /oM pad ma badzri hrIHtha/ shes rab spyan du rang bdag nyid/ /rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhes/ /

pad ma'i rigs chen bskul bar bya/ /hU~M karma badzra kri ti ta/ sna tshogs rdo rje rgyal po che/ /bya ba sna tshogs bdag nyid che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byas na/ /dngos grub las ni thob par 'gyur/ /bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/ /

dkyil 'khor dag ni yang dag bya/ /mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las/ /rnam pa bzhi ni rab tu byung / /de nas mtshan nyid sna tshogs yongs bsdus pa/ /rab tu spyan yangs dga' ba chen po mchog /de bzhin tshogs dang rdo rje spyan ldan

ma/ /shes rab spyan gyis btsun mo mchog chen ldan/ /oM badzra karma ho/ badzra hU~M hU~M/ ka Ta ma Ta/ ra Ta ba Ta/ kar na badzrA gri/ badzra gu ru/ badzra phaT/ ka ra ra gri/ shud d+hi g+hi/ shud d+hi/ shud d+ha~M gri/

bud d+ha/ satwa rA dza/ rA ga / duSh+Ti/ rat+na/ te dza/ ke tu/ hA sa/ d+harma/ krISh+Na/ he tu/ g+ho Sha/ d+harma/ rak+Sha/ yak+Sha/ san ti/ sid d+hi/ yo ga /gu h+ya/ bi Sha ka / tsAr+ya/ tsa ri/ dz+nyA na/ ra twa/ sum b+ha/ tag gru~M/ hU~M phaT/ hU~M ba~M/ hU~M tsa/ hU~M ma/ hU~M sa/ hU~M ha/ hU~M hU~M/ hU~M dza/ hU~M ho/

hU~M sa/ hU~M a~M/ hU~M a/ hU~M tra~M/ hU~M ta~M/ hU~M ha~M/ hU~M d+ha~M/ hU~M d+hi/ hU~M ma~M/ hU~M ra~M/ hU~M kaM/ hU~M ha~M/ hU~M ba~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi dz+nyA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsa gre sa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi shA tsa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsakre d+ha~M/ oM a nud pa na ne a/ oM a nu

ru he A/ oM a na le i/ oM nI le I/ oM rata ni u/ oM rata ta U/ oM sa u ri/ oM la e rI/ oM a ta l-i/ oM A ha re ra l-I/ oM A sha ne e/ oM b+he he g+he ai/ oM sarba sha ba ri oM b+ha ra de au/ oM s+pha ra Ne a~M/

oM be shwa aH/ oM ma ho tse bre ka / oM tiSh+Tha kha/ oM a mu kha ga /oM a b+hi She g+ha/ oM dz+nyA na da/ oM ts+tshe da tsa/ oM bA rA hi r+ya tsha/ oM b+ha she dza/ oM b+ha d+he dz+ha/ oM pra sha me nya/ oM kro d+hi Ta/ oM ha ra ne Tha/ oM b+hi g+ha Da/ oM k+Sha be D+ha/ oM a

Nu Na/ oM Taka ki le ta/ oM bi su le tha/ oM d+hA ra NI da/ oM ba ta ke d+ha/ oM ba lo ke na/ oM tra te pa/ oM sarba ha ra ni pha/ oM b+hu sha ni ba/ b+hi ba sha ni b+ha/ oM a ra te ma/ oM a li ni ya/ oM tra ha ra/ oM bi sha la/ oM bud d+he wa/

oM d+ha me sha /oM ya ma b+he Sha/ oM sarbe sa/ oM d+ha li ni ha/ ho tha/ hU~M dzaH/ hA sa/ oM a/ ba ha/ a ro/ ni bi/ da sha / tra ra d+hi/ b+hu ba/ sa ya/ a hi/ kro d+ha/ d+ha ma sha / b+ha ra ya/ yu ga ti/ dar sha na/ hA sa ya/ he ma hA ne/ d+ha ra Na/ oM sarba

ta thA ga ta sa bi dz+nyA ma hA mu ne rA dzA+e gar+b+ho rA dzA kra ya hi hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M ha/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di/ /mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs pas/ /chos dbyings brtan pa'i rang bzhin te/ /chos dang
longs spyod rdzogs las byung / /bde legs bsgom pa byas dang mtshungs pa med/ /e ma'o gsang ba chen po gsang ba kun bsdus pa/ /rnal 'byor rgya cher bsdus pa'ang mtshungs pa med/ /bde ba chen po 'di ni
brtan zhing brtan pa'i dngos por 'gyur/ /dga' ba chen po'i slob dpon dga' chen nyi ma ste/ /mchod 'os gsang ba'i kun bsdus pa/ /kun mkhyen gsung las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/ /tshogs rgyas

rab tu 'phel bar gyur pa gsungs pa yin/ /rdo rje chen po skal ba ches/ /gsang ba thams cad rjes su bslab/ /de nyid chos ni rnal 'byor che/ /stug po bsdus par 'jug par bya/ /brgya dang sum bcu rtsa drug lhag /

tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/ /bri dang rdor tshig yi ge yis/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba bslab par bya/ /rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di ru ni/ /de nyid yi ge rnam dag pa'i/ /rnal

'byor chen po 'jug par bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yi/ /stug po gsang ba shin
du brtan/ /de nyid gsang ba bslab bya'i phyir/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bslab/ /e ma'o dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/ /rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas
pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/ /gru bzhi mnyam pa'i rim pa ni/ /de nyid kyi ni nang du bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ci

rigs par ni yang dag bri/ /ngos bzhi'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor la/ /yi ge sum bcu rtsa drug dgod/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/ /yi ge bcu drug yang dag bri/ /yi ge bcu drug rgyal po ni/ /phyag rgya'i

tshogs dang 'od bcas pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i logs bzhi ru/ /yi ge rnams ni yang dag bri/ /yi ge sum bcu sum bcu ni/ /phyogs rnams kun du dgod par bya/ /sangs rgyas thugs ka'i dbus su ni/ /yi ge hU~M ni sbyar bar bya/ /gang zhig sbyor ba'i

ming can gyi/ /sangs rgyas dbus su dgod par bya/ /rdo rje yi ge rab sbyor byed/ /shes rab can gyis yi ge rnams/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yis/ /dbus su rdo rje rdo rje bzhi/ /shar du yi ge sum bcu bri/ /yi ge sum bcu de

bzhin lhor/ /sum bcu byang gi phyogs cha ru/ /nub tu sum bcu sbyar bar bya/ /yi ge bcu drug yang dag sbyor/ /dbus su sangs rgyas bzhi ldan bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /dpal ldan 'jig

rten rnal 'byor ldan/ /dbab pa brtan pa'i tshogs gyur pa/ /smra ba las byung rgyal ba che/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'jug par bya/ /u ro ti ko ta ma hA r+ya yo d+ha r+ya bi ra te nA ma ne/ de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje 'khor lo gzhug par bya/ /

ha ha ho ho gsang chen po/ /rtse gsum ral pa gsum 'dzin pa/ /rgyal chen gzi brjid chen po'i don/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs su bskor/ /slob dpon chen pos blta byas nas/ /yi ge rab tu brjod par bya/ /rdo rje'i dkyil

'khor 'khor lo yis/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo kun du spro/ /a A'i rnal 'byor yang dag gzung / /i I dbang phyug chen po'i 'od/ /u U rnon po 'chang ba ste/ /e ai sgra dbyangs rab bskul ba/ /o au skyabs byed rtsibs

chen po/ /a~M aHshes rab spyan bzang ba/ /rdo rje lcags kyu 'di yis kyang / /rdo rje 'chang ni bskul bar bya/ /ji ltar 'khor lo ji ltar rigs/ /ci 'os ji ltar rdo rje'i rigs/ /de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su dgod/ /rdo rje
slob dpon dka' thub che/ /skal ba chen po gsang ba 'di/ /rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag sbyor/ /rnam 'phrul de ni rab tu bskor/ /'khor lo dbab dang gzhug pa dang / /cho ga ji bzhin 'jug par bya/ /

rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du/ /rgyas par ji skad bstan pa bzhin/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang / /'khor lo dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ /'khor lo'i gnas ni dbang du 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag

yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje 'gugs dang skal ldan dang / /ngas byed rin chen gzi brjid dang / /rgyal mtshan bzhad pa yang dag ldan/ /chos dang rnon po gtso bo mchog /rgyu dang gtum po drag po che/ /las dang bsrung ba gnod sbyin grub/ /sna tshogs

sbyor ba yang dag ldan/ /'khor lo'i rnam par 'phrul ba byung / /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje 'khor lo kun du bri/ /rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya/ /bu dang slob ma min pa la/ /gsang ba'i tshogs

chen sbyin mi bya/ /gzhan du skal ba dang ldan pa/ /gzhung 'di khyed kyis ci bder byin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin du gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog tu gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po

chen po rdo rje rtse mo las rdo rje rigs kyi de/ kho na nyid shin du gsang ba'i rnam par bshad pa ste le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pas slar yang de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad rdo rje mchog /rdo rje mchog 'dzin rdo rje'i mda'/ /rdo rje khro gnyer rdo rje'i lus/ /rdo rje

'bar ba rgyal mtshan che/ /rdo rje gad rgyangs rdo rje'i bdag /rdo rje sde ste chos mchog 'dzin/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin du rno/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bzlas pa che/ /las kyi rdo rje rdo rje che/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin 'jigs chen po/ /rdo rje phyag rgya sgra chen po/ /

rdo rje khu tshur brtan pa che/ /rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje che/ /las chen po ste mda' chen po/ /rdo rje legs pa dga' ba che/ /rdo rje rgyan ni 'phrog byed pa/ /rdo rje 'od de rgyal mtshan che/ /rdo rje'i tshems ni rab dga' ba/ /rdo rje pad ma shin du

gcod/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje rig /rdo rje ljags te sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs mtshon chen skye dgu mda'/ /go cha chen po rdo rje sku/ /rdo rje mche ba 'jigs byed pa/ /rdo rje bsdams pa rdo rje che/ /rdo rje khro bo gzhu chen po/ /rdo rje

lcags kyu mdzod chen po/ /zhags pa chen po dbang chen po/ /rdo rje lcags sgrogs 'bebs pa che/ /rdo rje dbab pa 'jigs byed pa/ /yi ge dzaHste yi ge hU~M/ /yi ge hU~M ni dam du 'ching / /yi ge ho ste yi ge ha/ /

rdo rje phyag rgya dregs pa mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che/ /lcags kyu bsdigs med rdo rje khro/ /rdo rje bdud de bdud kyi mchog /bdud kyi bdud ni rab 'joms pa/ /rdo rje dga' ba zhi ba che/ /rdo rje dka' thub shis

mdzad pa/ /rdo rje drag po shin du gdug /rdo rje rang dbang rdo rje mdzad/ /rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo che/ /rdo rje sgra ste sgra chen po/ /sangs rgyas hU~M mdzad yi ge hU~M/ /yi ge phaT sogs dang mnyam pa/ /yi ge phaT ni 'bar
ba'i bka'/ /yi ge sa ha rang bzhin med/ /gtso bo gsod dang slong mdzad pa/ /dri med skrag dang dbugs 'byin mdzad/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khro bo che/ /khro bo rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/ /'dod chags

las byung de bzhin nyid/ /rdo rje khro bo khyed phyag 'tshal/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /nyin re zhing du lan cig ni/ /gang zhig 'don par byed pa de/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /
de dag la ni 'jigs pa med/ /phongs dang bran dag nyid mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bstan pa/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo khyod la gsol bar 'debs/ /
gdug pa rnams ni gdul ba dang / /de bzhin sems can don bya'i phyir/ /tshul chen bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ /gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo

zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badzra'i zhal snga nas dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// // bam po bcu gnyis pa/ /
rgya gar skad du/ /sarba ra ha s+yo nA ma tan tra rA dzA/ /bod skad du/ /thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'byung lnga nyid
kyis lnga yi bdag nyid can/ /mi rnams lus la nges par mthong ba dag /rang sems rab tu bsgoms par gyur na ni/ /dngos der bsgoms pas nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /rang shes gsang
ba dam pa ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla med de/ /gnyis med gnyis kyi tshul can te/ /sangs rgyas rtag par rab tu 'dung / / /gang yang bdag med las byung zhing / /gnyis med ye shes las
byung ba/ /sdug dang mi sdug rnam spangs pa/ /ci la'ang phyag ni mi 'tshal to/ /ma skyes pa ni yang dag bskyed/ /skyes pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni/ /sangs rgyas skur ni bsgom pa de/ /
rang gi ye shes mchog phyag 'tshal/ /rnal 'byor pa dang sems can kun/ /ma skyes pa ni yang dag bskyed/ /skyes pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni/ /nyon mongs bag chags kyis
sun 'byin/ /lus can rnams ni 'khor gyur pa/ /sdug dang mi sdug rnam 'byed yin/ /sems gang de nyid sdug bsngal te/ /sems can rnams kyi lus 'byung ngo / /
sems de yi ni rgyun nyid kyis/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal gnon par 'gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mgon/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus gcig pu/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad rtogs gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas 'khor ba sgrol ba po/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje'i nyams dang yang dag ldan/ /rgyu yi de nyid mnyam sbyor bas/ /
'bras bu'i de nyid rnams kyang ston/ /'bras bu'i de nyid yang dag zhugs/ /rgyu yi de nyid mi 'dod do/ /gang du 'dod pa skyes gyur pa/ /
de nyid 'khor ba'i bag chags yin/ /mkhas pa yi ni cho ga yis/ /bsgom pa ru ni yongs su brtags/ /gang zhig slar yang gcig gyur pa/ /rnal 'byor
pa yi rnal 'byor byung / /sangs rgyas rjes dran la dmigs shing / /chos ni rjes su dmigs pa yi/ /tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis/ /rkang gnyis
dam pa nyid du 'gyur/ /b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag ste/ /sangs rgyas skur ni rnam par bsgoms/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor pa/ /sangs
rgyas sprin ni bsgom par bya/ /b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag ste/ /rdo rje chos ni rnam par bsgom/ /chos ni rjes dran rnal 'byor pa/ /chos kyi sprin las char rab
'bebs/ /mtshan ma ling ga zhes bshad de/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi/ /'joms pas b+ha ga zhes bshad de/ /nyon mongs 'joms pa'i dam pa yin/ /
sems can kun gyi dngos kun gyi/ /rang sems chos ni bsdus pa yin/ /chos bdag med pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsad na rang nyid 'chi bar 'gyur/ /
rang gi sems nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rtogs par bya ba sems nyid yin/ /rang gi sems nyid gsad bya ba/ /sems nyid kho na gsad par bya/ /
sbyor ba nyid dang yang dag 'brel/ /gang yang srid pa 'byung ma yin/ /gang tshe sangs rgyas de tshe ni/ /sbyor lnga sangs rgyas bdag ces bsgom/ /ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba/ /
sangs rgyas nyid phyir mdor bsdus pas/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor med par ni/ /rnal 'byor pa ni 'tshang mi rgya/ /phra mo'i dngos po ci bzhin mthong / /sdug pa'i dngos
por de bzhin te/ /dngos dang dngos med khyad par ni/ /bsgom pa kun du brtags pa yin/ /dngos po bsgom pa'i dngos ma yin/ /bsgom par bya ba bsgom
pa min/ /dngos po bsgoms par gyur pa yis/ /rang gi sems ni yongs su sbyangs/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas yul ma yin/ /sems can
yul du'ang mi 'gyur gyi/ /rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
rtogs pas min/ /gnyis med sbyor ba 'di la yang / /ting nge 'dzin gyis ye shes brtags/ /rgyu yi de nyid
ji ltar mthong / /'bras bu'i de nyid de nyid yin/ /rgyu yi de nyid cung zad med/ /
'bras bu'i de nyid de bzhin no/ /

de nyid de ni de bzhin shes/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pa kun spyod/ /rgyu yis rgyu ni dngos por min/ /'bras bu'i dngos por 'bras bus min/ /rgyu de 'bras bu'i dngos por rung / /rang gi sems ni so sor snang / /

ye shes de ni rgyu dngos te/ /gsang de 'bras bu'i dngos po yin/ /gsang ba gnyis med spyod pa yis/ /de yi dngos pos mchog yin no/ /de nyid de nyid rtogs gyur pa/ /gsang de gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gsang ba de rig

shes pa ste/ /mchog ni mchog gi rnal 'byor pa/ /sdug pa'i ngo bor gang bshad pa/ /mi sdug pa yang de yi dngos/ /sdug dang mi sdug gzugs gang yin/ /mi mthong de ni de bzhin gshegs/ /rnam shes tsam ni med pa ru/ /

rnal 'byor rnal 'byor 'byung mi 'gyur/ /ci ltar ye shes mchog dag pa/ /de ltar dag pa de bzhin gshegs/ /rnam par shes pa rnam pa bzhi/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi cho ga yis/ /gsang ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /sku gsung thugs ni yang dag byung / /

thugs ni phyag rgya chen po ste/ /dam tshig phyag rgya kun du 'gro/ /chos kyi phyag rgya gsung gi ste/ /las kyi phyag rgya sku yi yin/ /rgya yis rgyas btab dngos po ni/ /gsang bdag gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa'o/ /rang rig pa yi ngo bo yis/ /

ting 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yin/ /lus ngag sems su rnam brtags pa'i/ /bya ba rgyud du rnam brtags pa/ /gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /rdo rje las can sna tshogs bzhin/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid ni/ /gsang

ba'i ye shes bla med yin/ /phyag rgya bzhi po gsang ba de/ /rnal 'byor pa yis las grub byed/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi po yang / /phyag rgya bzhi zhes bshad pa yin/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi mnyam sbyor ba/ /lha mo bzhi dang yang dag sbyor/ /

sa ni spyan zhes bshad pa yin/ /chu ni mA ma kI zhes bshad/ /me dang rlung zhes grags pa ni/ /gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma yin/ /dbang chen sa yi khams yin te/ /chu yi khams ni chu dkyil 'khor/ /me ni me yi khams yin te/ /rlung ni

rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /dbang chen kha dog ser po ste/ /gru bzhi pa ste rgyas pa yin/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po ste/ /dkar po'i mdog can zhi ba'i yin/ /me yi dkyil 'khor kha dog dmar/ /gru gsum dbang gi las rnams

la'o/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs/ /nag po'i gdug pa'i las rnams la/ /'byung ba che bdag las grub pa/ /las kyi dngos grub yon tan bzhi/ /las kyi dngos grub dngos grub mchog /'khor los sgyur ba rnam

pa bzhi/ /zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul/ /rgyas pa pad ma'i rdo rje can/ /dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas/ /rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la'o/ /zhi ba dgongs ka bya ba yin/ /de bzhin rgyas pa snga dro la/ /gdug pa'i las rnams nyi ma'i gung / /

dbang gi las ni mtshan phyed bya/ /zhi la dkar po sbyar bar bya/ /ser por snang ba rgyas pa la/ /dbang gi las la dmar po ste/ /gdug pa nag po rab tu sbyar/ /ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba/ /las kyi bsgrub pa

dam pa yin/ /bcom ldan dag pa bsgom bya ste/ /sangs rgyas kun las mi g.yo gyur/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su gsang ba'i bdag /rdo rje'i dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs/ /lnga yi bdag gyur bdag nyid ni/ /bsgoms na g.yo ba med par 'gyur/ /snying la

gnas pa'i lha mo che/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byor bskyed/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyed mdzad yum/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste/ /'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum yin/ /sangs rgyas bcom

ldan dug mi mnga'/ /rdo rje dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs/ /chags dang sdang dang rmongs pa rnams/ /bsgoms nas khams gsum pa yi bdag /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gyur te/ /sangs rgyas bden pas dug bcom mo/ /

rang sems so sor rtogs pa yis/ /gti mug sems ni de bzhin gshegs/ /rmongs pa nyid ni 'jig rten gyur/ /sems can kun la blta bar bya/ /zhe sdang sems ni de bzhin gshegs/ /phra mo'i ye shes yang dag bskyed/ /
sdang gyur rdo rje nyid du gyur/ /sems can thams cad gzhig par bya/ /'dod chags sems ni de bzhin gshegs/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/ /chags gyur bzang po nyid gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad chags par bya/ /byams pa'i sems ni de bzhin gshegs/ /nga rgyal yang dag bskyed nas ni/ /mdza' bor gyur cing kun nyid gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun la 'khyud par bya/ /chags pa'i lta bas byams

pa ste/ /thugs rje'i chos ni smra ba dang / /kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya ba'o/ /rnal 'byor sbyin las rab dga' ste/ /tshul khrims ldan las dri med 'gyur/ /bzod pa las ni 'od

byed pa/ /brtson las 'od 'phro can dang ldan/ /bsam gtan las ni sbyang dka' ba/ /shes rab kyis ni mngon gyur mthong / /thabs chen las ni ring du song / /stobs dang ldan las mi g.yo 'gyur/ /smon lam gyis ni legs

blo ldan/ /ye shes ldan las chos kyi sprin/ /rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ /rang rig bdag nyid bcu gcig 'gyur/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams dang / /stobs dang dbang ni rdzogs gyur cing / /sa bcu las ni 'das gyur pa/ /

mtshan ma brtan gyur de las ni/ /rdo rje'i chu ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi bcud len yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mtha' yas pa/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa spongs pa yin/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi bcud kyis len/ /rdo rje'i

chu ni dag mthungs pas/ /rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor pa/ /gdod nas dag par de tshe 'gyur/ /gdod nas dag par gnas gyur pa/ /de nas byang chub sems su 'gyur/ /byang chub sems kyi bdag can 'gyur/ /byang chub sems

dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /rnam par grol ba'i ras kyis g.yogs/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /yang dag bskyed gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snying la 'dug /sems can khams ni mtha' yas pa'i/ /ma gyur dam tshig

'dzin byed pa/ /rdo rje dam tshig gis spyod na/ /rtag tu dam tshig gnas par 'gyur/ /khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar/ /bud med ces bshad ji snyed pa/ /cho ga bzhin du kun spyod cing / /thugs kyi rdo rje smad mi bya/ /rdo rje

gsum gyi sku la gnas/ /dam tshig phyag rgya ji snyed pa/ /rdo rje dam tshig gsum gyis bya/ /gsung gi rdo rje smad mi bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /phyag rgya kun ni bud med bzang / /de rnams sten pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /

phyag rgya thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad na/ /bud med ces bya ji snyed pa/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yin/ /de dag kun la nye bar sbyor/ /gsang ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pa/ /ting 'dzin

ye shes dam pa yin/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /nga rgyal ma yin hU~M ma yin/ /rig pa ma yin sngags rig min/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya'ang mi bca'o/ /mchod rten gyi ni las mi bya/ /glegs bam dag kyang

klag mi bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni mi bya zhing / /rdo rje mchog gsum phyag mi btsal/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya/ /brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar
bya/ /khyod kyis ma byin blang bya zhing / /gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya/ /sbyin sreg yang na bsam gtan min/ /lus ngag yid ni mi phyed pa/ /gzhan min sems kyis bya ba ste/ /'di ni gsang ba'i mchog
yin no/ /sngags rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /rnal 'byor kun kyang rnam kun tu/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sangs rgyas chos ni bsgom par bya/ /ma 'dres chos ni bcwa brgyad po/ /sangs rgyas
chos zhes bshad pa yin/ /de rnams rtag tu bsgom pa ni/ /sangs rgyas chos ni sgrub byed yin/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med bzhi/ /rtag tu thob par byas pa dang / /'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug de yis ni/ /
sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub/ /byang chub phyogs ni sum bcu bdun/ /chos su yang dag bshad pa gang / /de rnams bsgoms pas dag pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' 'gro phan yin/ /'gro ba rnams la

spro ba'i sems/ /brtan zhing snying po rab bsgoms pa/ /stong pa'i de nyid las byung ba/ /rdo rje ye shes zhes bya bshad/ /chos bdag med las yang dag byung / /gnyis med ye shes dam pa ste/ /chos nyid mchog gi ye

shes ni/ /chos kyi dbyings zhes yang dag bshad/ /'di ni chos dbyings ye shes te/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin skyes/ /rdo rje ye shes rang bzhin sems/ /rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar bshad/ /sems kyi spro ba'i sbyor
