ba yis/ /phra mo'i ye shes sogs sbyor ba/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad ces byar bshad/ /byams pa spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /sbyor ba spyod par byed pa'i mchog /zag med brtan

par gyur pa yi/ /thugs ni mi bskyod pa zhes bshad/ /thugs rje spro ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /sems can phan 'dogs mdzad pa po/ /thugs ni 'gro don yang dag ldan/ /rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bshad do/ /dga' bas

spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /theg chen mchog ni dri ma med/ /thugs ni 'od gsal dag pa ni/ /'od dpag med ces de bshad do/ /btang snyoms spro bar mdzad pa'i shugs/ /sems can thams cad rtogs mdzad pa/ /don yod bla med

bya ba ni/ /don yod grub par de bshad do/ /byang chub rang bzhin ye shes mchog /de 'dir rdo rje zhes bshad de/ /rdo rje ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bshad do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pa/ /

rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad de/ /rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun gyi rgyal/ /rdo rje rgyal por de bshad do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad chags byed pas/ /mnyes par byed pa zhes bshad de/ /bdud kyi sbyor ba chags pa che/ /rdo rje chags

par de bshad do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing / /legs so zhes pa rab sogs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed pas/ /rdo rje legs par de bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang / /mkha'

mnyam rdo rje las byung ba/ /don yod rin chen chen po ste/ /rdo rje rin chen de bshad do/ /ma rig bral ba'i ye shes ni/ /tshogs dag las ni nges par byung / /thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che/ /rdo rje nyi mar de bshad do/ /rnam

pa kun gyi dngos ye shes/ /thar pa'i lam 'jug thob mdzad gang / /chos kyi rgyal mtshan tog chen po/ /rdo rje dbal du de bshad do/ /rdo rje bzhad pa rnal 'byor che/ /sangs rgyas kun 'byung rmad byung ba/ /'di ni

byang chub sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje bzhad par de bshad do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /sangs rgyas chos ni rtogs mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dag pa/ /rdo rje chos su de bshad do/ /shes rab rnon po

theg pa che/ /nyon mongs thams cad nges gcod mdzad/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa gcod pa po/ /rdo rje rnon por de bshad do/ /sangs rgyas rol mo'i 'khor lo ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor bas/ /sems dpa' chen po theg pa che/ /

rdo rje rgyu zhes de bshad do/ /shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag /gsung gi sgra ni rnam par spangs/ /'jam pa'i gsung gi bdag nyid gyur/ /rdo rje smra bar de bshad do/ /pha rol phyin pa kun gyi zhabs/ /chos rnams thams

cad rtogs mdzad pa/ /sems can kun don sprul pa po/ /rdo rje las zhes bya bar bshad/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran yang dag grub/ /theg pa dman pa rnam spangs shing / /byang chub sems la rab zhugs pa/ /rdo rje bsrung

bar de bshad do/ /sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing / /de bzhin nyon mongs rnam sreg la/ /nyon mongs zad pa nyer len pas/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin de bshad do/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /bcing ba ru ni yang dag

gyur/ /de nyid de nyid ye shes te/ /rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad do/ /dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /rdo rje bsdams las yang dag byung / /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gyur pa/ /las kyi phyag rgya zhes bshad do/ /nga rgyal

med cing snang ba med/ /mtshan ma med cing zhen pa med/ /bdag med mnyam nyid ye shes ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad/ /gsang ba'i mnyam par 'byor pa 'dir/ /ye shes pha rol phyin dge ba/ /rnam pa bcu gnyis

yang dag byung / /rdo rje pha rol phyin pa'i 'od/ /byang chub sems ni rab bsgoms pas/ /pha rol sangs rgyas nyid son pa'i/ /pha rol phyin thob ye shes ni/ /rdo rje sems mar bshad pa yin/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams

ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin rdo rje/ /chos bzhi gcig tu gyur pa ni/ /rdo rje rin chen mar bshad do/ /gsang ba'i ye shes ye shes che/ /de nyid pha rol phyin dge ba/ /pha rol phyin pa che las byung / /rdo rje chos mar shes par bya/ /pha rol

phyin pa'i dge ba ni/ /sbyor ba'i thabs su rab bstan pa/ /rdo rje las mar shes par bya/ /gang phyir de ni rol ba dge/ /sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin dge bas/ /brgyan pa'i yan lag yid 'ong

yin/ /glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin/ /ched du brjod pa'i chos brjod pa'o/ /gar ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid ster ba'o/ /bdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin/ /kun tu khyab par spros phyir ro/ /

me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin/ /'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa'o/ /mar me smon lam pha rol phyin/ /phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yin/ /dri ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin/ /dri ngan thur sel dge ba yin/ /sangs rgyas

kun gyi thabs chen po/ /dbye ba rnam pa bzhi yis gnas/ /thams cad 'dod pa'i thabs chen po/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad do/ /byang chub spyod pa spyod byed pa/ /rdo rje zhags pa zhes bshad do/ /theg pa 'di la brtan 'gyur gang / /

rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bshad do/ /chos rnams thams cad ma skyes shing / /gdod nas zhi ba mkha' dang mnyam/ /de lta'i tshig ni rab 'jug pas/ /rdo rje dril bu zhes bshad do/ /tshogs gnyis kyis ni sbyor ba yis/ /sems

can kun gyi don ston pa'i/ /sems ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad/ /yang dag rdo rje rtogs pa ste/ /'dzin pa'i sbyor nyid lcags kyu yin/ /phra bar 'bigs pa mda' zhes bya/ /dgyes

pas legs so zhes bya ba/ /spras pas rin po che ru bshad/ /gzi brjid ces bya nyi ma yin/ /bsgreng bas tog tu bshad pa ste/ /rnam par 'byed pas bzhad par bshad/ /'dod chags dag pa pad ma yin/ /nyon mongs

dgra bcom ral gri ste/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor bas 'khor lo yin/ /gang gi brjod pas smra bar bshad/ /kun nyid sna tshogs rdo rje yin/ /gzhig dka'i sbyor ba go cha yin/ /'jigs pa'i spyod pa'i mche ba ste/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor

nyid bcing ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gang bshad pa/ /yid kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin/ /gzhal yas khang ni ye shes te/ /sems kyi brtsegs pa bsgreng ba yin/ /phyi yi gru bzhi pa gang yin/ /tshad kyis mnyam pa

nyid gyur pa/ /byams pa la sogs sems gang yin/ /thig bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /chos kyi sbyor ba rjes dran nyid/ /gang de rdo rje thig tu bshad/ /lta ba kun las rnam grol ba/ /ye shes thig tu bshad pa yin/ /tshul khrims

tshogs kyi dam pa ni/ /gang zhig rgyan du bshad pa yin/ /dad dbang la sogs sems gang yin/ /ra ba lngar ni yang dag byung / /rnam par thar pa bzhi po ni/ /sgo rnams su ni yang dag bshad/ /yang dag spong ba bzhi po ni/ /

rta babs rnams dang ka bar byung / /dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi po ni/ /khyams rnams bzhi por shes par bya/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po ni/ /de ni sgo khyud rnam bzhi yin/ /byang chub yan lag bdun po ni/ /phreng ba me tog chun brgyan

pa/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad po ni/ /ka ba brgyad ces bya bar bshad/ /sgrib pa gnyis las rnam grol zhing / /ting 'dzin ye shes kyis brtags pa/ /lam gyi ye shes khyad par rnams/ /rnga yab ces ni yang dag

bshad/ /nyon mongs thams cad nges gcod cing / /nyon mongs 'phrog pas dra ba ste/ /yang dag gcod cing spong ba nyid/ /sel ba'i spong ba la gnas pa/ /tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba nyid/ /nyon mongs pa yi phyed 'phrog pa/ /dra ba

phyed ces bya bar bshad/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal gang yin de/ /byang chub sems ni bla med yin/ /sems ni don kun skyed byed pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad/ /shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag /rdo rje lta bu'i ting

'dzin skyes/ /thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad/ /tshon rtsi lngar ni yang dag bshad/ /lta ba lnga yi me tog yin/ /ye shes lnga yi des sbyor nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga zhes yang dag bshad/ /
nam mkha' bzhin du bdag med pa'i/ /rnam shes ye shes dam pa yin/ /ye shes de yi rgyan bshad pa/ /chags pa'i sems zhes bya bar bshad/ /chags bral las ni byang chub 'byung / /chags pa'i sems las

gzhan yin no/ /de bas chags dang chags bral ba/ /byang chub sems zhes yang dag bshad/ /'jig rten chags dang bral bas 'dul/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las byung / /der ni thabs kyi sgom pa dag /dngos

grub thams cad ster ba yin/ /ji ltar 'jig rten 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pa yis spyad/ /ji ltar gdul bya dag gyur pa/ /zhen pa kun tu mchod par 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid gang zhig yang dag bshad/ /

mtshan nyid des ni mtshon par 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yis/ /rgyas btab ye shes yin par bshad/ /phyag rgya bsgoms pas rnal 'byor pa/ /rtag tu phyag rgya'i bdag can 'gyur/ /rgyas btab dngos po

shes nas ni/ /bsgoms na phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur/ /mtshan dang mtshan nyid 'brel ba ni/ /shes nas rnal 'byor yang dag spyod/ /ji ltar mtshan nyid yang dag grub/ /de bzhin dag pa myur du 'grub/ /g.yas pa'i cha yi mtshan mas ni/ /shes rab

can ni rab tu bstan/ /g.yon gyi mtshan ma ji ltar mthong / /de yis thugs rje mtshon pa yin/ /phyag ni gnyis ka'i mnyam sbyor las/ /ting 'dzin gnyis su bshad pa yin/ /zhabs gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma yis/ /tshogs

gnyis dag ni bstan pa yin/ /sor mo lnga yi mnyam sbyor las/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi mngon byang chub/ /rim pa bzhin du bstan bya ste/ /gang zhig gung mo ston pa ni/ /nam mkha' las ni

byung ba mtshon/ /gang zhig mdzub mo ston pa ni/ /des ni dbang chen dkyil 'khor yin/ /gang zhig srin lag ston pa ni/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad do/ /gang zhig mthe bo ston pa ni/ /de yis me ni mtshon pa yin/ /

gang zhig mthe'u ston pa ni/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur/ /gang zhig lte ba ston pa ni/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug bshad/ /gang zhig snying ga ston pa ni/ /rdo rje sems mar rjes su dpag /gang zhig smin mtshams

ston pa ni/ /rdo rje rin chen ma zhes bya/ /gang zhig lkog ma ston pa ni/ /rdo rje chos mar shes par bya/ /gang zhig spyi bo ston pa ni/ /rdo rje las mar shes par bya/ /byang chub lngar mngon byang chub pa'am/ /yang na ye shes lnga rnams sam/ /sangs rgyas lnga

dang yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor byang chub yin par bstan/ /sngon gyi sgrar ni ji skad bshad/ /mdun du de ni rab tu bstan/ /rgyab kyi sgrar ni ji ltar bshad/ /phyi mar de ni yang dag bstan/ /gang du thog ma'i sgrar gyur pa/ /

de ni rgyu yi sgra ru bstan/ /gang zhig tha ma'i sgrar gyur pa/ /'dir ni 'bras bur yang dag bstan/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan gnyis mi mnga'/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur ldan 'gyur min/ /gang phyir thog ma tha ma med/ /de phyir rtag pa
zhes bshad do/ /rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te/ /rtogs par bya ba'ang sems nyid yin/ /sangs rgyas zhing zhes bshad pa dang / /byang chub sems su shes par bya/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems can ni/ /

kun du rig par yang dag bshad/ /sems can rang bzhin dag pa ni/ /byang chub sems su shes par bya/ /dang por gyur pa snying gar rdebs/ /brtan pa nyid du'ang rang nyid 'gyur/ /skra 'dzin pa ni ral pa'i dbus/ /'od

dpag med du mnyam gzhag yin/ /tsum pa na ni rjes bshad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gsung / /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnam par snang mdzad ces bshad do/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis par/ /skyes
mchog thub pas gang gsungs pa/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu gnyis su/ /gsungs kyi gzhan du mi rtag go/ bu mo lo grangs bcu drug par/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi/ /

bsgom pa'i don gyi sgra yin no/ /lha mo lo grangs nyi shu par/ /'khor los bsgyur bas ji skad gsungs/ /mchod pa nyi shu'i bdag nyid can/ /nyi shu po dang rim bzhin no/ /rang gi chung ma rang rig las/ /byung ba'i rang

rigs yin par bshad/ /gzhan gyi chung mar gang bstan pa/ /gzhan sdug gzhan gyi rig pa yin/ /gci dang rdo rje zhes bshad pa/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med yin/ /bshang dang pad ma zhes bshad pa/ /chos kyi ye shes

rnyog med yin/ /yongs su gsal bar rnam shes pa/ /dkyil 'khor thugs kyi dam pa yin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi spyod pa yis/ /'bad pa yis ni mchod byed pa/ /rang gi rdo rje pad mar ldan/ /dbang po gnyis las byung

ba yi/ /rang gi khu ba thig le yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchod par bya/ /tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ /gnyis med gnyis nyid la brten pa/ /thugs rje nyams dang yang

dag ldan/ /dbang po gnyis kyi mnyam sbyor bas/ /rang gi khu ba mkhas pa yis/ /rnal 'byor chen po byung nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /dgod dam rab tu smra ba'am/ /sangs rgyas rol mo'i gar byed pa/ /

lha mo bzhi yi mnyam sbyor bas/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyis rol/ /gsang zhing legs par bsgril ba dang / /tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa yis/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab pa/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pas so/ /

zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas la/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras

pas ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo/ /rdo rje'i thig gis yongs bskor zhing / /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ /ka ba brgyad kyi nang gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad par bstan pa dang / /grwa yi dkyil 'khor dor

bar ni/ /rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan cing / /rnga yab kyis ni nyer spras pa/ /khru ni bcu gnyis bya ba 'am/ /khru bcu drug

tu rab tu brtag /yang ni khru ni nyi shu tsam/ /nyi shu lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /khru ni nyi shu lnga pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /sgo rnams kyi ni dbus ma'i cha/ /cha dgu ru ni rnam dbye ba/ /dkyil 'khor sgo ru

bsams nas ni/ /sgo khyud der ni bya ba yin/ /sgo khyud dkyil 'khor rnam pa ni/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang mnyam par/ /dgu cha ru ni rnam bgos te/ /grwa yi dkyil 'khor dor bar bya/ /tha mar khyams dang ldan pa yi/ /

dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa dang / /kha dog lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /gru bzhi par ni brtag par bya/ /lta ba lnga po bgrod dka' che/ /kha dog lnga yi de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas lnga dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /sa ni tshon gyis

rab tu bsgyur/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni dgod par bya/ /kha dog lnga dang ting 'dzin gyis/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyab/ /shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad

gcig bsdus pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang mdzad/ /dpa' bo'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ /in dra nI la'i 'od 'dra zhing / /rdo rje thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ /mi bskyod ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje'i lta ba de bzhin

gshegs/ /'dzam bu'i gser gyi 'od 'dra zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ /sems can kun gyi don du byung / /'bar ba'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ /dpa' bo chen po pad ma 'dra/ /pad ma rA ga'i nor bu'i

'od/ /chos kyi ye shes las byung ba/ /chags pa'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ /margad kyi ni 'od 'dra zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gcig las byung ba/ /byams pa'i lta ba de bzhin

gshegs/ /dbus ma'i sa yi gzhi dag pa/ /nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra ba/ /shar phyogs nyid du sngon po che/ /lho ru ser po yang dag ldan/ /nub phyogs der ni dmar po ste/ /byang du ljang dang yang dag ldan/ /kun tu khyams

dang ldan pa la/ /sgor ni khyams dang bral ba'o/ /gang zhig dbus mar yang dag bshad/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla med yin/ /gzhan dag don kun yang dag ldan/ /ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus

gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la/ /spyan ni dbus su bsam par bya/ /bzhin bzangs spyan ni yangs pa dang / /nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra la/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su

rdzogs/ /bud med sgyu ma'i mchog 'dzin pa/ /phyag tu 'khor lo bsgom bya ste/ /khams gsum pa ni dbang byed pa/ /dngos kun grub byed ye shes ni/ /'khor lo yid bzhin nor bu'i mdog /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus chud par/ /
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog bsgom mo/ /zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs pa dang / /uta pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog /mtshan rnams thams

cad yang dag rdzogs/ /nam mkha'i sgyu ma'i mchog bsam mo/ /phyag tu uta pal sngon dmar te/ /khams gsum pa ni phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog /gsang ba'i dngos grub rdo rje can/ /nam

mkha' rdo rje'i dbus chud pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la/ /rdo rje chos mar rnam par bsam/ /mdzes pa'i zhal la spyan yangs pa/ /pad ma rA ga lta bu'i mdog /sku mdog

dmar po yang dag byung / /chags pa'i pad ma 'dzin sdug pa/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /phyag tu uta pal dmar po ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms

pa'o/ /chos kyi ye shes byed pa mchog /gsang ba dam tshig rdo rje can/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus chud par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms la/ /sgrol ma mchog ni bsam

par bya/ /zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs pa dang / /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan/ /kha dog ser po nyid bsam zhing / /bud med sgyu ma'i dregs bor ba/ /phyag tu uta pal dam pa ni/ /ser po snang ba bsgom par bya/ /

rdo rje nyid 'dzin las byung ba/ /sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa'o/ /o~M` ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid d+ha lo tsa ne/ sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ oM sha~M ka re shAn+ti ka re guT Ta g+huT Ta ni/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya g+huT Ti ni swA hA/ o~M` ka Te bi

ka Te ni ka Te ka Ta~M ka Te swA hA/ o~M` tA re tuta tA re tu re swA hA/ rig pa'i lha mo bzhi'o/ /sku ni lus kyi ngo bo yis/ /thugs ni sems kyi rnam pa nyid/ /gsung ni ngag gi rnam pa yin/ /mchod na mchod pa'i bdag
nyid 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsrung bya ste/ /bsrungs na mchog tu gsang ba ni/ /rtag par kun du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
dngos po yongs su dag pa ni/ /med pas kun du brtag mi 'byung / /rnal 'byor pa yis rnal 'byor thob/ /tshogs med yang dag mi mthong ngo / /de bas gsang ba'i
ye shes 'byung / /rnal 'byor kun du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs/ /ting 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yin/ /chos rnams
thams cad rnam dag pa/ /dag pa nyid du gyur pa ni/ /ji ltar lha yi nor bu ni/ /rang gi 'od kyis rtag tu snang / /srid pa yongs su dag pa yang / /
rnal 'byor rnal 'byor thob byed yin/ /rdo rje dbyings ni gsang chen du/ /gang zhig dbang bskur mkhas pa la/ /thugs kyi gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog /
mkhas pas de la bshad par bya/ /thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad mA kA ra bar ma dang /
zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos/ /bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // oM ye d+harmA he du brab+ha bA he dun te ShAn ta thA ga to/ h+ya ba da ta te ShAny+tsa/
yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA ti ma hA shra ma Na ye swA hA/ zhus so/ /dag go/ /dge'o/ /rdzogs so/ /bkra shis par gyur cig //
